I even connected to my smart tv and watched movies didn't have an 👂 ace,. It's very easy to use even in helmet ........ Not irritation for the neck...... So over all its an fantastic product...but don't expect bass sound that is the only backdraw..... Thanku

name: StarkrahuL
title: Oneplus 8 💞 Bullet Wireless Z
content: Latency only works with Oneplus Devices. So please stop complaining about delays.. I'm finding it perfect @2K price.. Bass is Good' you just have to adjust your Equalizer.. But Voice Quality is Awesome 💕 it feels like music is playing in my head.. Feeling no pain after using continuosly 4-5 hrs.. Sound Quality 5/5.. Build Quality 5/5.. Bass 4/5.. Voice 5/5.. Battery 10/5.. I'm using with my Oneplus 8.. Edit- After using a week I'm really impressed.. No Delay in Pubg ( not even 0.0001Sec) it's perfect for Pubg. I think Latency only works with Oneplus Devices. Because i used with my redmi note 6Pro and found delay in Pubg.. It's light weight and great for Calls.. No pain in ear.. But low Noise Cancellation.. Battery is good as expected but showing imperfect battery percentage.. Everything is fine.. Well I'm recommending to only Oneplus users' due to some extra features.

name: Ankan sarkar
title: Perfectly blended product
content: From my point of view, it is really a perfect earphone.. 1. Audio quality perfectly balanced.. 2. Inline mic crystal clear voice.. 3. Audio range 10m which is more than sufficient.. 4. Absolutely fabulous battery backup.. 5. Really gets charges quickly.. 6. Magnetic auto on off feature is amazing.. 7. Noise cancellation applicable to fair extent.. 8. Really quick connectivity and quick switch with even devices other than one plus.. 9. Compatible with any android device.. *Overall a value for money product.*

name: Sumit bishnoi
title: You get more than what you pay for
content: Disclaimer- I haven’t taken many calls on this product, is currently my primary product for music.. The sound quality is good, very balanced— although the bass tends to overpower sometime- which is manageable through your equaliser settings. I don’t think there is any other product out there that has this good build quality, ease of use, sound quality and weight (which is just comfortable) at this price range.. If you’re in for an earphone, i recommenced you cut the noise and order this!

name: Sagar
title: Good pair for calling... Long battery life... Average bass...
content: I had to switch between laptop and mobile since WFH started. Was looking out for wireless headphones which can switch between the 2 very easily.. Bullets wireless Z made my life easier. Just double tap to switch between the devices.. I am using it for taking calls and other party never complained about the voice. Mic is also good.. Headphone lasts 2 to 3 days with single charge since I am only using it for calls.. Built quality is also good.. Music is pretty average though.. If you are looking for wireless headphones for office work only then buy wireless Z. If your priority is music then by something else. It won't satisfy the audiophile in you.

name: Devesh Kumar
title: I use this for office calls
content: Amazing battery life. I am able to get through 2.5 days of continuous office calls.. Mic closer to mouth, this gives very good call quality.. I was surprised to see how well it works with MS Teams.. One button switch device is pretty handy working on multiple devices. Two devices are stored in memory and can be swapped seamlessly.. Volume is clear and pretty loud.. Cons:. Not good for workouts or bass heavy sounds. It has a flat sound signature which I like but I don't use it for listening to music. Also, not very good for gaming due to minor latency, may be better than other bluetooth headsets but not when compared to wired headphones.. Do not think twice if you want this to take your calls. This is the best out of 3 I tried.

name: profoundcreationz
title: A Five Star Product BUT....
content: Pros:. 1. Connecting to smartphone and swapping inbetween 2 devices is a breeze. 2. Awesome battery life. Charged after 5 days of regular usage.. 3. Completely charges in just 25-30 min. 4. Works without distortion of sound or call from other room when mobile is being charged in different room. 5. Music quality is very good, didn't miss heavy bass.. 6. Overall a very good product and. And if budget permits can be purchased without any hesitation.. BUT ... CONS:. One major drawback I encountered was during riding bike. Lots of wind noise is heard to the person on call.. And when taking a call on open space during moderate breez also wind sound is heard.. Kindly consider the above cons if you are using more of two wheeler or working in open space / windly area.. Other than than its a definately a worth buying product

name: Raj
title: Quick Switch and Quick Charge - These are Amazing Features
content: I was confused between Oneplus Z, Oneplus Z Bass Edition and Oppo Enco M31. I am a regular use of Laptop (work from home) and mobile at same time. So i was looking for a earphone which can connect two devices at same time. Yes there are many earphone in market which connect two devices at a time. But to switch the connection between one (mobile) device to other (laptop) you have to manually open bluetooth devices and click on connect which is annoying as in Oneplus Z Bass Edition. Hence i decided to go with Oneplus Z. It's quick switch feature is very useful for me. Just double tap button in earphone, its connection will switch from mobile to laptop instantly within 2 seconds. Though Oppo Enco M31 have quick switch feature, it doesn't compare with battery life of Oneplus Z and quick charge. Oneplus Z just 10 mins of charge will give you 10 hours of battery life thats amazing.. Now coming to Sound Quality - As i had seen in reviews many had said it does not have good Bass. But when i tested myself it has adequate amount of Bass. It has very balanced Bass where you can listen other instruments sounds as well in the song. There are few people who likes only Bass and vocals (just they enjoy Boom Boom sound and vocals) If you want to enjoy the song you should listen all the instruments in the song, so i enjoyed listening to the music in Oneplus Z which has adequate amount of bass which never overpowers other instruments. If you still need more Bass than this then you can increase the Bass sound in equalizer as much as you want and enjoy only Boom Boom Sound and vocals.. Now Coming to Mic sound quality - Earlier i was using Realme Buds Wireless (first gen). When i was talking in phone while driving meany people never able to listen what i am talking, they were hearing only wind sound. So I could not use Realme buds wireless when i was driving. It was giving lot of wind noise to other end users when i was driving. But i did not face such issues in Oneplus Z, other person is able to hear clearly what i am talking (of course there was wind noise as well but not as high as Realme). Verdict - Oneplus Z quick switch feature and quick charge feature and 20 hours of battery life is Amazing. Even listening to song in this is Amazing. Just go for it without second thought. Instead of buying Oneplus Z Bass edition just for Bass purpose, buy Oneplus Z which has nice features as i have mentioned. Of course Bass you can increase in equalizer ( i am using poweramp in mobile to listen to song which as custom equalizer). Thanks Oneplus Z for giving nice features at affordable price.. Regards. Raj

name: Vishnu
title: Definitely buy one if you have oneplus phone
content: I have a OnePlus phone and I was obviously interested once the product was announced. Of course the pricing was spot on. I had to wait for long due to the delivery restrictions during COVID situation. Meanwhile, I got to see polarized opinions on it. Nevertheless, I wanted to get my hands on it. Finally after 3 weeks of wait ordered one.. Likes:. 1. Comfort - The headphone is very comfort to long usage. 2. Battery - This is enough. It just takes ~25 minutes to charge fully with my Dash Charger. This is more than enough for someone like me. I plan things in advance. Thanks to one plus, now charging my Phone and headphone is out of the list.. 3. Quick Switch - Works perfectly fine. Connected this earphone with my mobile and my wife's. Now switching between them is very easy.. 4. Quick Pair - It pairs super fast on my one plus. Whenever I have to pick call. I just pick the headset and wear them, meanwhile it makes sure that it connects to the phone. Cons:. 1. Bass - It is very low for my music taste. I had adjusted the equalizer settings. Yet, I would say its not for someone who loves the heavy bass. Please stay away from this if you are one. Overall, a nice product. I often suspect when it claims that it's battery is charged 100% in just 25 mins. ;). 3.

name: Another Buyer
title: Good performance and value for money.
content: Received the item on time.- thanks to Amazon d we livery. The product is good quality and reproduces sound adequately. The battery life is amazing... Haven't taken formal measurements but easily lasts 7-8 good at least .... Used it for jogs and they almost stay in place.. you have to push them in once in a while... But I wear them loose... Could be my issue.... It is easily identified and paired with the device's. The functionality of it switching off when the earphones are magnetically stuck to each other and on when separated is very practical. The pairing time is also fast so that by the time you separate the ear pieces and put them in your ear, they are paired and ready to go. If fit snuggly, they provide ample passive noise cancellation.. Strongly recommended for high value for money and performance.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best Bluetooth for calling and receiving
content: Day 1 of use. Received in Amazon one day order system. An amazingly fast delivery mechanism. Ordered yesterday evening and got it today morning 11 am.. Pros:. 1. Very quick pairing with my One Plus 6 handset. Looks like custom built for One Plus handsets.. 2. If both ear piece are joined back to back with magnet then it gets disconnected with handset and hence saves battery life for both Bluetooth device and handset. A very useful feature. Once separated, It gets back to life in under 3 seconds. Whether phone is ringing or not.. 3. I use left ear piece for calling hence for me mic position is the best which is on left side. And also it is closer to ear piece which makes listener to listen clearly.. Cons:. I am using it for calling only and don't see any cons so far.

name: raja
title: Writing it after one month of usage"GO FOR IT"
content: Why all others are writing such a bad reviews for this OnePlus product.. It is actually a genuine and pro quality product not like the cheap realme Bluetooth headset.. Charging is best in class type-c port and Max halfnr for complete charging,I am normal user and I had used it 2 weeks 3days without charging it.. Actually I didn't notice any bass problem.It does have minimum bass and we can clearly all the other instruments used in a song. Voices are crystal clear from both sides during even long calls like 1hr or 2hr calls😂😂

name: Gokulnath
title: OnePlus the BRAND forever... Positive review 😊
content: OnePlus always keeps up its Brand value... I had used almost 3 wireless bluetooth heatsets... This is the best of all... Out of all the three (Boats, Realme and OnePlus), the premium is shown the most not only in product but also in packing, that is ONEPLUS..... Qualitu of Sound, connectivity, noise cancelation everything is perfect and I'm totally satisfied with it... To say about BASS, am quite okay with the performance... May be BASS lovers may feel it little low.... To talk about Battery its aaaawwwwssooommmeeee.... Its been 3 days am using it with one time 100% charge... Still 30% left... Even if u use continuously it can last for atleast 20hrs.... Highly recommended for buying... You ll never get disappointed..

name: Dipendra
title: Mediocre at best
content: I don't know what all the fuss is about. It's the second time reviewers have sold me another product with the hype. First one was Logitech x20 or 50 or something. Like Logitech, sound with oneplus is very mediocre at best. Highest volume is lower than 499 INR flipkart headphone I had bought. There is little to no bass. Vocals are clear as one would expect on a 2000 earphone. Battery on the first few days seems good. Buy it only if you don't want a wired connection lugging around.

name: Saumya
title: Don't forget to check if both the ears produce same sound quality
content: The product was delivered the same day I purchased (Yaay! Amazon prime). But the earphone failed to impress me due to low vol in its right ear. I usually listen music at 60-80% volumes. So as soon I listened through these earphone I could tell there is some mismatch between volumes in the ears. So I listened again at low volume (30%) but could not hear anything from Right but the Left worked fine. I have opted for a replacement due to the right ear issue, although I wanted to return it but no option for it. Will update whether the problem still exists in the replaced earphone I get or not.. Update: Received the replaced earphones, they still have the issue. I'm keeping it because of no return policy. However, the sound quality is good but bass is low, but okay.

name: Raj
title: One Plus the name says it all
content: The best thing I liked is. 1. it can connect 2 devices at once.. 2. I can switch from laptop to mobile device in just a double tap. 3. Build quality at the best. 4. Microphone is something unique. Previously I used Samsung level u, Level u pro, u-flex and jbl.. 5. When both headphone is attached in magnet, the device disconnects itself from our device. When put in ear, it connects in seconds. Thats the best thing to save battery. Cons:. Bass could be better. Still sounds great

name: Sabyasachi sahoo
title: OnePlus bullet wireless z review
content: I would like to give 4/5 ⭐.. The product is really a deal breaker considering the price point and other available product segment on this price range.. Pros :. Good build quality. As soon as you hold the earpiece you feel it's premiumness.. Super smooth and easy to use connectivity. Add on features like switch device option between last two paired.. Google assistance built in. Mic is good and captures the voice accurately hence other party during call won't get any lag or disturbances.. Sound quality is decent but not great.. Important aspect is the battery life. I used the product on day 1 for almost 5.30-6 hrs. The battery % was 80 out of box and post use it was 55. Hence I would say battery life is really great and it's cherry on the cake with the fast 30w charge.. Cons:. I think many users already complained on this which is low bass and not so great sound quality, though I would say the vocals were great and lower notes are quite pleasant.. So one us really needs to work on this area as this is the prolonged issue with all their wireless devices.. Other than that it's really a good product to have and I strongly recommend. At this price range other products may beat this on sound area but overall the product is good most important is OnePlus branding and services.

name: Abhijit W
title: Rated 4 based on.relative Comparison Sony MIC200, TWS Pods, Soundpeats q7
content: Relative Comparison with my older Sony MIC200, TWS wireless Pods, Soundpeats q7. Sound quality is great. In ear buds ergonomics - dint like it. Should have been identical. Need to get used to which ones left and which ones right. For music is understood but for calls who cares.. Wire: is not flat but round Yes!!! I can feel the insulation will crack / wear out if stuck... Battery life is v.good. Probably because the magnet buds function as on and off and it's annoying as before call you end up seperating them to get connected. Security point its good you won't drop/ loose them.. The flashing LED light is too bright in dark - I don't prefer it again good to track if you loose in dark.. Functions still getting used to I liked Sony's simple double tap functions to switch songs using volume keys here is the single key double and triple tap!! Also Sony has feature to start music by just long press this doesnt have it.. Bought considering water resistance and sports usage. The charging port doesn't have coverlid unlike Sony.. Rated 4 based on sound quality.. Overall well packaged and delivered

name: ronaldo
title: Sound and looks.
content: Overall it's good but the shiny protion has too many scratchs.. Talking about the sound quality it's good. For a heavy bass user it seems to be balanced bass but for me it has bass more than enough, if more bass boosted then the background instrumental music will be depressed. It's vocals sounds clear and Avg crisp, but the feeling from inside remain inside only at medium volume. From my experience I noticed that increasing the volume increases the bass and crispness.. Overall it's best budget neckband in 2000. I have tested realme wirless in which driver mm are only and only number the bass the treble are less than avg. 1+ offers a very very good battery life. The last conclusion is that "Invest of 2000 for damaging your own ears is not a better deal"

name: Parth Shah
title: Thank you very much OnePlus!
content: This is a real, boombastic, competitive, pure budget earphones by one of the best brand OnePlus. It fits with almost phones even with iPhone. Yeah... Airpod doesn't support with Android phones but here they do! No discrimination! Bass quality, noise cancellation, light weight, superior Colour, build quality is OK. Have used plastic material yet studdy. Comes with fast charging (damn fast). Takes 20 to 30 mins in full charge. Once full charge, battery life is amazing. Auto play and pause function is very useful. Low latency experience. Price 1999 and if you have Amazon pay balance, more power to you. Lol. Buy without any hesitation. Coool product.

name: Devendra Kumar Raj
title: Premium product
content: I love shopping with Appario Retail Private Ltd, they have almost no diffective products. But first time ever the delivery was very late.. About Oneplus wireless z is a premium product. Compared to realme neckband i would say u will face a lil issue of loudness. Because realme is louder around 30% more. But it doesn't mean that this product does not wort buying. The buds are almost weightless. Sound quality is superb. The issues are not made for heavy bass heads and loud music listeners.

name: Anushkar
title: Battery
content: Is this happened just with me.... Battery drops like 100-80-60-40-20-dead..... Or happened to you guys as well

name: Rimal
title: Horrible experience
content: Horrible experience.. 1.I bought this for online office meetings. Its disconnected automatically so frequently .. 2.Sometimes voice breaking,intially i thought its network issue but if i remove earphones no voice breaking.. 3.It has feature to attach to two different devices. But personally i didn't like this feature.because it did even ask me to pair to second device.as soon as any bluetooth on . it disconnect from my mobile and got attached to other devices which disturb alot in meeting.. 4.I returned this horrible oneplus Chinese item.

name: musabthegreat
title: Best earphones under 2000rs.
content: I was using oneplus' wired earphones till now and tbh i didn't notice any difference in the audio quality....people are saying that the driver is small and that bass is not as good but if you are a casual user then you won't notice any difference......the low latency mode does work and while playing pubg there is no sort of audio lag whatsoever...... The earphones get connected as soon as i put them on....the quick connect works perfectly with my oneplus 7. Battery life is amazing.... I've used it for 4 days today and every day I've played pubg for 3 hours and i just keep them on all the time and I've only charged them once for 30 minutes yesterday and right now it's at 90%. If you're looking for wireless earphones under 2000rs. This is the best

name: kaushik
title: Just Go for it..👍✌
content: First of all thanks to amazon for faster delivery❤❤. Oneplus z wireless earphone Reverb red❤. After using 5th day without charging.(previously 80%)😊. My experience: Awesome sound, perfect bass, no latency, premium feel & good battery backup(now 40%)😊. Gaming experience: PUBG, COD, AMONG US, FREEFIRE & etc. Perfectly balanced & footsteps sound also without latency. 😊😊. Music: 😍😍 just love it. But about noise cancellation i deduct one star😒👎. But Oneplus did a good job after Normal edition.. Bit costly Rs. 1999/- 🤐

name: Yash
title: Best neckband for 1999/-
content: Here are some points which i loved. Pros- 10 min charge for 10 hours is a blessing. - bass is better as compared to the old version. - build quality is good with buttons included. - getting about 14 -15 hrs of battery backup. - call quality is satisfactory. - comfortable for using 6-7 hours continuously. - latency is very low 110 ms which is very low and you will not feel any lag in voice while gaming. Cons- quick switch button is skipped. These are the best neckband i

name: Moonlight
title: Battery power, sturdy headset
content: First time user of wireless headset. Loved the battery life 2 days of 6-8 hrs usage 40% battery used. Sound quality is good, though I feel the wired headsets are still much better in terms of sound and the music (samsung HS 130 and JBL headphones user) but my OP 7t does not has jack option and connector has not been durable enough. Headsets material is sturdy not flimsy, looks durable. Bluetooth connection has been great, have roamed around my home keeping phone in one room with uninterrupted music on the loop. For me it scores 8/10, for bass part not that great.

name: Raghav
title: its good for the price
content: although the bass is good, it overpowers the actual audio. for example your watching a movie and something heavy falls down while people are talking, in a normal set up you can ear everything everyone is saying but in these headphones you will hear the thud louder due to the extra bass because of which the full experience is compromised. but this is not a very common scenario. But the really good part about it is the instant connection from the moment you separate the magnets it will instantly connect to your last connected or closest device which to me is very convenient. The battery life is also great and can last for 2 days with no problems on a full charge at 40% volume (anything louder than that will damage your eardrums😂💀). Overall worth the price but could have been better.

name: Happy customer
title: Amazed by this product
content: BEST bluetooth earphone available, in the given price range. I already possess 3pairs of bluetooth earphones and this is the BEST hands down!. Exactly as advertised it gives great battery backup, the sound quality is GREAT 👍🏻(especially during calls), its so fluid to switch between devices. I am using it across devices from ipad to my oneplus 👍🏻 no issues. Incredible deal, dont miss. Thanks to amazon for early delivery and to oneplus for making such incredible products. 😎

name: Gulam gaus
title: Mind blowing for all type users
content: It is absolutely up to the mark. What i thought it's beyond then that. Sound quality is oweseome, battery life excellent. Charge for onlee 15 min. At use it till next 8 to 10 hrs uninterrupted more important it has some kind of senser in it. While u will not have the ear piece in ur ear it will be on stand by. And if u use any of the mobile app mobipe speakers will work. But when u will put the ear piece in ur ear it will automatically get connected. That is wonder feature tht i admire and gaming my oh my excellent. Over all paisa, wasool one

name: ra one
title: Best if you value convenience at this price point, but beware of you want bass
content: The one plus bullets wireless Z are an amazing choice for the sub ₹2,000 price range!. There is minimal latency in use, and I always kept an eye out to try and notice it.. They keep charge for a sufficient amount of time, and live up to their promised hours. Charging them also takes very less time and it is super convenient if you have a oneplus phone.. The main reason for my purchase was convenience, like the feature to switch between two devices by double tapping a button, quick charge ability and minimal latency.. Sound is good, nothing great. Bass is pretty weak, you will absolutely feel it while listening to songs with strong beats. Calls are crystal clear, so a trade off here for a gain there, all in all, is it value for money? Well, that depends on what your priorities are. If you want a pair of earphones that you can multitask with, keep them in your ears for a long time, and that don't take much time to recharge, these are the ones you're looking for. Their sound quality is good, all the sounds are clear and nice, except for the bass. So if you want a wholesome sound experience, then you might like to look elsewhere. But otherwise, you can't go wrong with these.

name: Param
title: Best neckband under 2k.
content: Its an awesome product from 1+.. Battery- i didn't charge it even once in a day and it is still going on straight out of the box. WARP charge is really doing good.. Connectivity- Again its best in its class no issues in 10 m range.. Comfort- It is quite comfortable in every situation.. Sound quality- BASS is just GREAT. Its neither less nor over emphasized.. Crystal clear vocals and instruments are delivered.. Twin device support- It connects with 2 devices at a time and can be seamlessly switched.. Before buying thing i had many devices in mind but now m totally satisfied since it costs only 2k.

name: Ashutosh Mishra
title: Nice product with worst service experience from Amazon
content: The sound quality is nice, although mic needs to adjusted sometimes. Not a bad product for the price range. Nice battery life(around 10 hours). Clear sound quality.. The product is good but the first time around, the defective product was sent without a charging cable and when returned the product, the pickup guy kept on insisting about the same. I described the same and the defective sound quality was the reason for return. The pickup guy kept on arguing upon the same for approx 30 minute. I realised that it was my fault that I purchased from Amazon. My friend ordered the same product from one plus site and there were no issues regarding the service while exchange.. So Amazon actually ruined my mood for the entire day. This was never expected from Amazon. Worst experience ever.

name: Utkarsh
title: Worth a buy!!
content: It is a balance product, don't know why people are making fuzz about its bass & all. Maybe in India people like to listen shadi wala bass where music go to hell, only the thumping... The JBL 200 something wired earphones have 9mm driver and this product has 9.2 mm driver.. So, according to me it sounds same as those jbl's earphones... Lasted 2 days without charging, attended 2-3 long calls, listened mysic, audiobook, watched 2 full movies.. and in the last left with 10% charge, and this is all when it came with full charge out of the box.. Saw review of samsung's fast charger charging this, didn't saw much advantage, but when I charged it with my Quick charger (18 Watt Nokia) (Qualcomm powered technology) results were great for charging.. sure dash charger will be charging way better...

name: Vidit
title: Worried about base - try bigger earbuds
content: The earphones are a perfect blend of sound, battery and budget. For those worried about lack of base, please try the bigger earbuds provided in the accessories pack, that will help.

name: NithinC
title: The best wireless Earphones ever. Recommended for balanced audio lovers
content: The features that you get for this price is enormous.. Not for thumping bass lovers. If you are interested in quality balanced audio, this is the one. The bass is still good. All the frequencies are greatly balanced.. The battery features adhere to the company specifications. I am not a full continuous earphone user, but I do use it for a good deal of time, like hearing music, podcasts, watching movies and YouTube. Testing in this scenario, the battery stood up for 4.5 days for me. The full charging time is about 45 min to 1 hr.. The switching feature is very usefull. It sometimes interferes with my wifi connection while using laptop. But this happens with every bluetooth device.

name: PANKAJ SINGH
title: Super earphone with amazing pairing speed.
content: It's an amazing product from Oneplus.. Pros:. 1. Lightening speed of pairing. You just have to separate both earphone from each other.. 2. The moment you again affix both earphones , power gets off for earphone. So no need to switch it on or off separately.. 3. Fitment of earphone with ear is very convenient.. 4. Long lasting battery.. 5. Warp charge gives 10 hrs back up with just 10 minutes charging. It's very useful feature.. 6. You can switch between two paired devices with single button.. Con:. 1. Sound quality could have been better.. 2. The neckband could have been more rigid. Soft neckband like this one needs regular adjustment around neck.

name: Anuj
title: Quality product.
content: Build: Great.. Battery: Not what's promised but lasts long enough for 2 days of use. Maybe around 12 to 15 hours on a full charge.. Type C charging port is one of the main reason I bought these. Charges rapidly. You can definitely watch a movie with 10 minutes of charge.. Sound: Not gonna talk about highs, mids and lows. For an average person, it sounds good. Don't expect audiophile level quality in this price range.. Yes, it does sound a bit harsh sometimes and yes the bass is not gonna blow your mind but it's definitely worth the price.. Passive noise cancellation is quite good, thanks to it's in-ear design.. Misc: Bluetooth range is good. The low latency mode is only for OnePlus phones; I believe.. Device switching is easy. You can pair it with 2 devices and switch between them by double pressing the 'quick switch' button.. Comfort: It's so light that you'll forget that you are using it. However, like all the in ear headphones, it gets a bit uncomfortable if used for longer sessions.. Overall, nice package.

name: Rahul Sheoran
title: Impressive
content: Well the most important point of these earphones is that you charge it and just forget for a week. Amazing battery life. The sound quality is pretty good but not awesome. The soundstage is ok, mids are crisp and highs are above average. The lows (base) are just right and not overpowering (unlike beats and boat).. If you like a balanced and neutral sound profile you'll definitely be satisfied by these. For the base lovers, well you can raise these somewhat by using equilizer but within limits.. The band material is soft and doesn't feel on your neck. The weight is also unnoticeable. Charging times are very less due to its support for fast charging.. The magnetic auto on /off feature works like a charms. You just take these out of ears and they'll snap together and turn off.. If you want a pair of earphones for use while riding a bike, don't consider these as they will be pressed by the helmet.. The cable seems to be of good quality and with time will get to know about it.. I'd definitely recommend these at under ₹2000.

name: SUDEEP
title: Not upto the mark, not a quality one!
content: After a continuous usage of 2 months, the gadget is dead and not working at all! And I have returned to my old Samsung Level U neckband (which was 3 year old and after purchasing the new one, I put the old one in my cupboard, thank god!).. The One Plus Bullet Z was working good for the two months. Battery back-up was also good since it works only when the magnetic earbuds detached from each other, and connectivity was also good, But the length of the wire is the main drawback of the product.. Anyway, there is no need to list out the pros and cons of this product, since most of the customers are facing the same problem I faced. I will never recommend for a OnePlus product in the future!

name: Vipin Baid
title: Best wireless earphone in market
content: After using it i can say its one of the best earphone flagship in the market.. The best thing is its specifications. General: In-ear audio. Weight: 28 g.. Battery life: Up to 20 hours, 10 minutes charge for 10 hours of audio. Battery charge method: USB Type-C.. Controls: Magnetic control. Button: Quick Switch, volume, skip track, phone calls, voice assistant.. Surely go for it.. Killer at 1999/- Love it

name: Utpal Patel
title: High Quality Product
content: It has been 5 days since I am using the product. Let's go straight to Pros and Cons.. Pros:. Product Design: 9/10. Material Quality: 9/10. Comfort: 9/10. Battery Life: 10/10 (20 hours, wow.. After 5 days of moderate use, still 30% left. Haven't charged for even once.). Cons:. Music: 8/10 (No extra bass. Compared to my wired boat earphones, slightly less fun with this one.). Noise cancellation: 7/10 (Not good. While testing call at home, echos came every time if within 10 meters of opposite person. People looking to use these earphones in traffic should avoid it.). Overall Value for Money: 8/10. Top quality product and design, easy to use functions like magnetic power off and on, but sound quality is not the best. Bass lovers can go with Boat Rockerz 255 Pro with compromise in only 6 hours of battery life and overall lesser quality product.

name: Vishnu Vinay
title: Value for money. Overall one of the best wireless earphones.
content: I loved it and was better than I expected. I was using a true wireless earbuds before this of Jbl and I must say Oneplus is better than that in every aspect. I am almost getting the feel of a wired earphones. Battery life is the main thing about it. With one charge, it can stay up to 1 and half day. If you have a fast charger, it charges within 1hr (am having a 18W fast charger of Samsung S9), if you have a faster charger it will charge more quickly like the 30W which you get with the Oneplus devices. You can use it for gaming also, but sometimes there is a lag in the sound like it takes a half a second to detect that sound. Also, I liked the way it can be turned on or off by the magnetic pull. Another thing is you can easily switch between devices by clicking the button twice (black button seen on the earphone), and that one works most of the time. You don't have disconnect from one device and then connect to another device, all you need to do is turn on the other device bluetooth and press the button twice present on the earphones. Overall it's a really good product, value for money, good sound quality and noise cancelation.

name: Bl@ckp3@rl
title: Best in 2000
content: Overall its terrific. Main thing in this wireless era was a bettery ,till one plus come others were giving fast charge 10 min charging gives 60 min or 100 mins etc etc but wolla one plus shot them all with the single bullete(bullete z) and m sure and also had searched internet lot of time ,about the wireless thing gives amaizing battery ,previusly using jabra but now after one plus came i m just madly in love with them ,. If ur normal users like me using ear phones for the music ,calls,gaming this is best u cant find alternative for this. Best things about this battery life it gives whole lot of battery in chargung for only 10 mins seriously. Thanks one plus this is my first purchase from one plus and its amaizing

name: L.V.SrinivasRao
title: Not worthy for in this price range
content: Quality wise its ok but not that much value for that price. Pro's:. 1. Good Matty type build. 2. Very fast to connect with paired device. 3. Less weight. 4. Easy to carry. 5. Best battery backup. Con's:. 1. Looking wise build quality was nice but it's very delicate for this price range we can expect adjustable strip all basic type neckbands provide adjustable strips. 2. It's is only connect at a time one device but 1200 range neck bands supports duel pairing.. 3. For every time if you want to switch one device to another paired device we need to stop and start again. 4. It took more time for connecting laptops. 5. For this con's we can expect price should be 1200 but it's 2000. 6. It's doesn't have vibration for call alert all basic neck bands have this feature.

name: Sandeep
title: Decent Product..Not so awesome
content: I searched many days before buying this. I am using Crossbeat Pulse and also having one Boat BT earphone too. With Crossbeat I am satisfied as it gives a good and louder voice. But the battery back up is just 3 hours..One thing I liked about the Pulse is that it fits well and volume is comfortable at 30%. But call quality is not upto mark. So I bought this One Plus Wireless. Sound quality is Okay and you can here it upto 80%. of Max Volume with out distortion. Call quality is much better than the one I do have. It gives proper noise cancellation during the phone call. For this budget it's decent buy. Can't compare with high end product like BOSS...

name: Ariyalla
title: Best in class below 2k !!
content: Was desperately waiting for this product since it was announced. And now that it is in my hands, I'm totally satisfied.. Pros :. - Amazing battery backup of 20 hours.. - Less charging time. 10 hours of listening with just 10 minutes of charge. (with OnePlus warp charge). - Once paired, connects automatically in just under 2 seconds.. - Sound from music & videos is loud and clear. - Call quality is good.. Cons :. - Occasionally the buds fall from either ear. (but not really an issue)

name: Amazon customer
title: Average earphones from Oneplus....
content: The overall build quality and material does not seem to be very nice. Sound is good with respect to the price offered by OnePlus. Some cool features however, like the power on/off is controlled by the ear plug's magnetic action. Which means the earphones are on when the earplugs are detached and vice versa. Also the call receive/dial functions are ergonomic to handle using the earphones. Need to check the battery performance. Overall and average earphones. May not be the first choice while buying earphones.

name: Rahul Pati
title: Probably the best device from Oneplus in 2020
content: Using it for a couple of days now. The earphones are lightweight and comfortable to wear for long durations. Bluetooth range is good if you pair it with recent devices but not very good if you connect it to older generation devices but that's because the older generation devices don't have Bluetooth 5. Sound quality is good enough for normal users. Bass is low but vocals and instruments are clear. The pairing process is fairly simple too.. Three areas where it shines are,. 1. There's no perceptible latency while playing games or watching videos.. 2. the mic quality is good. People on the other side can hear you clearly.. 3. The battery life is amazing. lasts more than a day easily and comes with fast charging which takes approx 15-20 minutes to charge the device.. At this price point, can't really see any cons. The sound signature can, of course, be better but that's nothing to scoff at. Its IP55 rated too! Great earphones Oneplus! The only thing left to see its durability.

name: Mehul Kumar Das
title: Best Product At This Price Range
content: Sound quality is good at vocals but less in bass but it's okay battery life is awesome flexibility is very good build quality is very nice smooth and primium look light weight and very comfortable in use its charge in 15w charger charge 0-100% in 45mins,18w charger charge 0-100% in 41mins,20w DASH charger charge 0-100% in 39mins

name: Sushil kolhatkar
title: Good product but think some imp points
content: One of the best earphone, value of money... better than others like realme and boat. Sound quality is much good and awesome bass quality but its looking ok ok, but not good for long term use, material quality is poor, it can be detected easily, we need to use carefully

name: Vishal
title: Best purchase but read the review
content: **Important** read till the end.. I am not gonna write the pros and cons of the product, everybody else covered most of them. But the most important aspect that I noticed is not covered on any website and YouTube.. These earphones support v5 Bluetooth which is decent but the problem is that if you connect them with phone Bluetooth version lower than v5 than you will gonna face some issues.. I have a 2-year-old Honor device which has v4.1 Bluetooth, when I listen on this device the earphones produce a low cracking sound constantly (which can't be ignored). Firstly I thought that I got a defective product, but when I tested them on other latest smartphones the problem is not there. I contacted OnePlus regarding this issue and they cleared my doubt.. So, if you facing the same issue plz check the earphones on other devices too. Don't just waste your time to replace the product.. OnePlus also replaces the product in the warranty period, so don't rush to get it replaced by Amazon.

name: CheTan Ravaiya
title: After one week of use from a OnePlus user.
content: Well I definitely suggest you to buy this earphone if you using OnePlus device and if can't afford to buy other OnePlus earphones like Bullet 1 & 2. With reducation in cost will make some reducation in performance too of this earphones too like Bass is compromised by OnePlus for providing bullet Z earphone at 2k cost. Thus, overall it is amazing product by OnePlus brand again.. Pro. *Quick charging with wrap charger in 30mins to Full charge and can easily survive two days without charging.. *Magnet play & pause another mindblowing feature in the earphone.. *Low latency feature performs good while playing PLUG. *Good build quality.. Con. *Bass not high or good - average. And as per price - Worth paying for OnePlus users.

name: Bhavya
title: Reverb Red -bass edition
content: Comfortable-4.5. Material-4.0. Weight-4.0. Sound-3.0. Decent Bluetooth earphones.. I bought for my cycling workout.. New bass edition too much bass you have to tune and balance your music via app.. Sound quality is not premium quality standards but good enough for price range.. Don’t compare with apple-beats / AKG-JBL / sony sound quality.. Best in class for sweat resistance.. Fast charging.. Works good with IOS and Samsung phone.. Material quality best in class looks premium.. Good enough for gym workout running.. Best music output for RnB Hiphop High tempo musics.. Not good performance for acoustic music.. No 3d sound. No quick switch feature in bass edition.. Quick connect to Bluetooth .. Button legged In play /next song

name: Amaljith
title: Best one
content: Product build quality and speaker quality is very good. I have been using this for almost 2 months. Battery back up is good.. Only problem I'm facing is lack of Noise cancellation. In outdoor calling it's difficult to speak. I have to keep mic near to mouth so that I'm audible than people around me.. Next problem is we can't switch off this device... For example if I keep this in my pocket (magnets attached) and if if magnet detached it will turn on and connect to phone... But anyway considering the fast connectivity .... This can be ignored.. My suggestion is if there is any other with noise cancellation go for it....If no, This one (bass edition) is the best in 2K range.

name: Sivashanmugam
title: Good Product expect bass
content: Based on the purchase experience. 1) Build quality is good. 2) Bass is low (I didn't expect from oneplus, they reduced according to price). 3) Sound quality is good. 4) Bluetooth Connectivity is fast when you disconnect the magnet it connects instantly and it pause the player when to connect the magnet.. 5) Battery backup is superb when compared to others. 6) People who loves bass and it is not suitable.

name: Anurag Chhabra
title: Best in this price range.
content: First thing first, prompt delivery by Amazon.. Now comes to review:. 1. Good packing by Oneplus. Better than Sony neckbad earphone packings.. 2. Sound quality is good for the price. In this price range not bad at all.. 3. Good bass. Not great for bass heads. But not bad at all for normal music and normal listeners. I am really satisfied with bass production.. 4. Call quality is clear. Mic is clear. No issue at all. Although not tested in busy or loud environments.. 5. I liked the color combination of Bullets Z Bass Edition and ofcourse bass would be better in Bass Edition, but there were 3 major cons in Bass Edition:. A. Lower battery backup. B. No quick switch option. C. Mic was installed in the collar section in Bass Edition instead of wire section in Normal Edition. When mic is in wire section, it stays more closer to mouth and call quality gets improved.. 6. Love the quick switch option and magnets in earplugs. It automatically disconnects the earphones on joing them.

name: Sanchit
title: not for you if you are fond of strong bass
content: In terms of comfort, they do a pretty good job however, the bass is not up to the mark. Although sound quality is quite clear mic quality is so-so. You can hear the voice clear but your voice won't go crystal clear until you put the microphone really close to your mouth.. Charging is really fast, in 10-15 minutes battery goes from 20 to 100%.. Overall a decent purchase if you aren't a big music freak and just need decent Bluetooth headphone that you don't mind wearing for long hours.

name: bhooma
title: Best in class and segment.. must read review before buying
content: Okay here I'm writing the review after one day of use.. 1. Build quality is way too good in this price segment. 2. Battery backup is wild like I have been using it from last 12 hours and battery went from 100 to 60%. And I have been using my warp charge and speed is tremendous I would say. 3. Call quality is also good other person could hear me clearly without any alteration with the sound quality. 4. Bass is not enough to satisfy your need with the Music if you are high end music lover than you won't find it worthy. 5. Coming to the point latency have to say I have been using this in my one plus 7T and it's ways too good no lag in sound quality I have faced so far.. 6. In terms of Comfort it's really good your ears won't pain or like you have anything out there. Disappointing that the cable for charging doesn't support fast dash charge or warp it's a simple cable for warp charge you need your own. Packing I found some flaw inside box doesn't come with never settle logo hope the product is genuine. Overall this is the best in class Bluetooth headset under RS.2000. You should go for it without hesitation

name: Rajiv P Rai
title: The Perfect VFM buy in entry level wireless headphones
content: Bought this for Mom who is into wired earphones but gets irritated by the tangling wires.. The sound is not at the level of Bose, Airpods or Sony, but if you have to choose between boat, leaf, tagg and other VFM brands, then these wireless earphones are overkill for the price.. Used these for Zoom Calls on my laptop as well and there were hardly any drops.. Microphone worked flawlessly and sound was also clear.. Bass is 4/5 but ears start paining after 2 hours of continuous usage, so one has to keep that in mind!. Overall Verdict: The best VFM in the sub-3k price range for wireless earphones.. Bass: 4/5. Comfort: 4/5. Treble: 3.5/5. Battery: 5/5. Connectivity: 4.5/5

name: KG
title: Got it for utility and it delivers!
content: This is my first bluetooth earphone and I am pleased with the functionality. Fully charges in 1 hour if completely drained, gives about 13-14 hours of juice. Bass is okay, music and video sound clarity is very good for the price and connectivity to multiple devices is quick and easy, switching devices is smooth. All buttons work well, mic is decent if not much noise around, otherwise not very good. Rest of the functions work as described.. In the box - Red type C charging cable, Warranty information, User manual with basic functionality explained and the earphones.

name: Murali Kannadhason
title: Mixed review.. Neither Bad nor awesome..
content: I wanted more for the music as my JBL just gave up after few months of use. Took a dive for this based of massive reviews. Let me give my honest opinion here. Not the best if your love listening to House or trance or dance music, as the lack bass is no joke. There lot of crispness to the sound and more details on the every instruments but more suitable for voice focused music.. Rock and old school music lovers will enjoy it more. Wanted to return the product and then I figured out tweaking the EQ setting you will be able to extract better results from the ear phones.. Come on, this is the best ear phones for the price, why? The bluetooth connection is bloody fast, charging time and battery back up is mind blowing and auto switch off feature is just too cool. Sits comfortably in the ear if you use the right insert, noise cancellation is good enough not suitable if you are expecting yourself to be in another world. Mixed reviews, definitely yes, go for it if you are not a fan of bass..

name: Alexander
title: Works well for calls. Excellent Battery Backup
content: Works well for calls. Good sound quality on both ends. Not sure about music - but should work okay there as well...nothing too fancy though. Battery back up is just too good as compared to other similar products.. Update - This was a gift for someone who was so impressed that I am upgrading the review to 5 stars and ordering more for family and friends. Update2: of 5 ordered one was defective, not turning on. Quality control folks, quality control. Getting a replacement so not taking away the rating. Update3: Got a new one hassle free. Working perfectly.

name: vijay
title: Best wireless earphones
content: The best in the best wireless earphones from one plus @2000 only. The best features of the earphones are. 1.its has a warp charge which charge the earphones 100% in under 60 minutes. 2.the battery backup is damn good it lasts long 4-5 days if u use 3- 4 hours daily. 3.the magnetic system of switching on/off is also a good and handy feature

name: YetAnotherGuy
title: Simple bluetooth earphones with good battery and average sound quality
content: Dont buy after reading positive reviews and star rating. Why? Because I did it already.. 1. Not made for gaming, my pubg mobile game starts to lags/delay ~1 second after connecting these headphones. Now back to wired earphone es.. 2. No bass. That's true. Even my 400 inr mi earphone have 10 times better sound than this set. Not for music fans.. 3. On phone call, mic unable to catch my voice, so callers unable to listen us properly. So not good for call purpose.. 4. Used for more than 5 hours now while watching movies, still showing 100% battery.. Didn't charged yet so no idea about charging speed.

name: Gagan Gupta
title: Premium neckband if you love balanced bass
content: First of all 5 stars for the packaging made by one plus! It was premium!. This stuff is just insane, has got everything, you will love it with premium build quality and design!. But despite of getting everything i have some basic issues in that.. First, i have talked about bass that is balanced. Second magnetic control - buds are magnetic but it will only turn off your music, won’t play songs automatically that you will have to do manually. Third, Type - C is there that is wow but it is open, don’t have anything to cover it!. Fourth, some offers should be there!

name: Praveen Behara
title: It's a very decent purchase
content: I have been using the headset for a month now. Following is the observation.. Bought it for 2k. Good. 1. It runs long.. I mean definitely more than 10 to 12 hrs.. 2. It recharges fully in about 40 mins (maybe).. but it was not 20 mins definitely. For me, that's quick enough.. 3. Can connect with only one device at a time. But, if you double press the button on the left side, you can connect to the previously connected device.. 4. The range is really good like they advertise is nearly 8-10 mts.. With my mobile, the range can cross 2 concrete walls (but barely).. but laptop, the sound through 2 walls is really clear.. 5. Earpieces have magnets, and If you join them... device goes into sleep mode.. Not so great. 1. Sometimes the mic is not so great across distances.. it begins to crack.. 2. Conference calls in Webex, and calls on mobile were mostly good.. but faltered in Zoom, not sure where the problem is.. but in few zoom calls, there was no issue. Basically, people used to convey that voice is crackling, or hearing a ticking sound.. 3. The headset doesn't have a polished feel, keeps on twisting etc., feels flimsy, spineless (but not that bad). But has that rubbery feel.. 4. Doesn't have a left and right indicator letters on the ear pieces, though I felt it would have made my life easy.. 5. Connecting with devices was bit tricky.. since it doesn't have a dedicated on-off button.. 6. Commands like Ok Google didn't work :(. 7. Doesn't give voice commands, and you have to get used to the sounds it generates.. Please note that my other headset is a boat rockerz 255. This is good in some areas (voice notifications, multiple device connection, voice commands), but lags in stamina (battery power) and range.

name: shahbaaz ansari
title: Good product but no noise cancellation
content: After use of 1 month am writing this review product is overall very good sound quality is excellent bass over all good packeging is very good but if you buy for noise cancellation product is poor earlier am using samsung level U noise cancellation is very good of that product as per that in this price is should be good but this one plus bullet in not upto mark 1 star is cuted for that😒. In the end battery is baap compare to other product

name: ebizair
title: Perfect for voice calls
content: I was looking for a good BT headset for attending conference calls from laptop (Zoom, webxex) and mobile. Tried quite a few before, but the common problem was with the other side not being able to hear my voice clearly at times. Decided to try this one after noticing that the microphone on this one is on the wire connecting the neckband to the earpiece (i.e nearer to the lips), contrary to it being on the neckband in most others. Works perfectly for voice calls, both sides can hear each other clearly. Quick charge and long battery life.. Had a bit of a problem connecting it to Windows 10 laptop over bluetooth, it kept connecting for music only - meaning the microphone did not work on the headset. Reinstalled the BT drivers on Windows and then it paired up properly, in both voice and audio mode.. I don't listen to music much, but I suggest music lovers to look elsewhere - maybe a over the head headset.

name: Anju Sharma
title: Just perfect...🥰
content: There is nothing in particular to dislike about these Earphones... Few things which I really like are... They automatically gets disconnected when we attach them together... And immidiately gets connected when detach them... Really saves battery... And saves you from unnecessary radiation... Very light weighted sound quality is very good... My kids didnt find the bass upto the mark... Which honestly doesn't affect me at all... Because I don't listen to music from these. They truly serve my purpose. Extremely Happy with the purchase. Always been a one plus fan. 😍

name: Rajat Shrivastav
title: Review in detail below.
content: Looking for knowing if it's good ?. I have found these earphones really really good. The sound quality is very good. If you're wondering about the Treble and Bass, yes the bass is slightly on the lower side and treble is more. Its more of a 2 : 3 ratio.. But if we look at it's price, this is probably the best buy under 2k. I don't need to mention much about the battery life, it's true as mentioned by OnePlus.. The controls work very well and the quick switch button is handy too. There's no need to power ON or power OFF for these earphones as that happens automatically which is great.. For people who love gaming, there's very less chance of you noticing the latency, it's there , but its very less.. However, noise cancellation could have been slightly more better, but it's still very good.. Overall, these are the best bluetooth earphones under 2k.

name: Prathamesh Tharwal
title: One of the best wireless neckband under 2k
content: One of the best you will get in this price tag ... From design, sound and latency all things are working great .. the sound signature is very similar to sonyXb. Just one thing they have not provided that they kept charging slot open,there is no cap protection.. always keep your mic clean and dry from sweat or any other liquid thing their mic is no that much capable.. Design: 3/5. Bass:4.5/5. Battery life:5/5. Vocals:4/5. Latency:5/5

name: Rakesh Aluvala
title: Simply Awesome - High on Battery Backup
content: it's definitely worthy . I've seen some reviews saying it's got such an amount of bass, but in reality it's a balanced earphones adequate amount of bass nothing much more.. Product quality is Ossum at this price range.. Magnetic ON/OFF will save battery and switching between paired devices is very fast .. Most importantly - Battery Backup is amazing and recharge time is very less with One Plus Dash charging.. Low Latency mode works with My One plus 6 is decent compared to Samsung M31 and Realme 6.(Only on gaming you will feel lag but with normal usage any device works fine)

name: Rutul Kasar
title: The best earphones I bought till date, that too in 2k 🌝
content: Booked them like 2 days ago, received them yesterday, and now they're unavailable 🌝 so you know they're the best.. Build quality is crazy. Unlike last bluetooth earphones I had from JBL (they died in 3 months). Sound quality is crazy I'd give 4/5 just becoz it does cancel unnecessary noise for sure but fails to cancel my father yelling on phone with his friends😂. plus the battery life is crazy 20 hours is like crazyyy.. Charging time is like 10mins for sure, as they claim.. And for the price I got them I'm really happy.. Last but not the least amazon delivered it in time ofc I'm prime member but still

name: Ayush Gupta
title: Overall package is best, but the bass is very low
content: Ok, So here is my honest review about these wireless earphones, also I will compare it to Realme buds wireless side by side because I have both the earphones.. Build quality:- Great!!!, considering this price point, Oneplus has provided the best build quality in this earphone, better than the Realme wireless.. Bluetooth connectivity:- Best, It connects instantly with the last connected device as soon as you detach those buds from each other which are connected through the magnet. Realme earphone also gets connected but the feature which is missing in Realme is Bluetooth switch, which you will miss a lot because sometimes I get annoyed, when Realme earphone connects with any device, and then I have to tell that person to switch off their Bluetooth.. Sound Quality and treble:- Best!!!, Crisp and clear sound, you can hear every word clearly, better than Realme in terms of sound quality. Bass:- A big no!!!, if you are a bass lover and love to hear 3d sound music or music with high base, then these earphones are surely not for you. Bass is pretty low, please don't take me wrong and think that I hate Oneplus, because I have seen a lot of earphones with better bass in this price range. Also, Realme earphone has better bass than these ones.. So, Overall package is good, 4/5 rating, but if you are bass lover don't go for these ones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Horrible for (long) calls
content: In one line - Maha ghatiya. I purchased this just for comfortable calling but this headphone is simply not suitable for calls. Can't return it either.. Battery life - 0 rating - Not even getting call time of 8 hours. I get it with my JBL headphone.. Mic quality - other person feels like you are alien.. Sound quality - low, very low. Controls - 1. the up and down button does not increase or decrease the phones volume however the volume will just increase or decrease but in phone the volume bar will be at the same level as it was.. 2. You can't pick WhatsApp call. 2k rupees Pani me.

name: Aradhana
title: GOAT
content: This OnePlus Bluetooth is a massive beast. I mean the battery backup is amazing. I played games continuously for hours, surfed Netflix and watched couple of videos on YouTube without charging it even once after I received them. However the noise cancellation isn't that great which doesn't matter to me. Latency is great too.. Absolute beast for the price.

name: Gautam Nayak
title: My first Bluetooth In ear
content: For me in ear, ear buds never worked. Hence, till date I didn't had that gut to purchase a Bluetooth in ear, cuz I never felt the thump sound from any buds which I used to get from my mx170. I always preferred over ear Sony XB450, or a normal earphone like Senheisser MX170, cuz those met my expectations. I'm pretty happy with this purchase cuz this has met my expectations cuz I generally looovvveeee to hear Loud music with extra bass in it. It met my expectations. 1+ rocks everywhere. Pretty happy. Thanks 😊. PROS - Battery, Charging time, Bass, Comfortable, sound quality.. CON - Still .5 sec approx delay in latency for PUBG ( not tested the low latency mode yet. I guess)

name: Shyam krishna
title: Great battery and design, Bass is Zilch!!
content: Battery backup is great and the design is also very ergonomic. However bass is almost non existent. I am only comparing the bass with the type C earphones which came in the one plus 6T box. If the usage is gonna be to listen to podcasts and take calls the earphones are absolutely fine, but if bass heavy music is your thing, look elsewhere. By the way call quality is decent, however the noise from your surroundings will be very much audible and in most cases annoying for the listener at the other end. The right sized ear tips do a pretty good job with the noise cancellation, hence we may be unaware of the noise in the surroundings while taking the call, but the person at the other end is gonna find it hard to decode our words.

name: Mahesh
title: Excellent Bluetooth headphones
content: Excellent product form one plus, I loved this product voice clearance is awsome while driving also and Battery will come so long time. Nice product to buy for one plus mobiles

name: shubham jain
title: bad experience
content: Battery life is good , sound quality is great , bass quality is average. The mic is only made for phone calls , you cannot operate the mic while recording voice or while making a video with the phone camera .. ALSO WHILE PLAYING PUBG , THERE IS A LATENCY ISSUE. SO IF YOU ARE BUYING SUCH WIRELESS EARPHONES FOR SUCH WORK , DO NOT GO FOR THESE .

name: Shankar
title: Great battery life
content: I was actually against buying this since its chinese maker, however I had no choice. I was looking for a Bluetooth headset which has good battery life. Earlier I was using Sony Wc400, its batter life was excellent, but its too pricey and also you can connect only one phone.. Coming to Oneplus Bullet z, I am not too bothered on sound quality as nothing can compromise other headphones such as Audiotechnica, Bose, Sony, etc, It is decent enough and for the most users, they willike the bass. This one has good battery life and also charges quickly your headset which is very nice feature.

name: Raj_advice
title: Super convenient with "Quick Switch"
content: I was looking for a quality wireless headphones which I can use both for my work calls (on laptop) and phone calls on my mobile. Other headphones (in this or even in higher price ranges) offer connectivity to only one device and switching between devices is not very easy. Oneplus bullets solve this issue with quick switch capability where I can just with the flip of a button switch between the laptop and phone, this works like a charm.. Other things:. Audio quality is quite good. Though this does not offer noise cancellation, the call quality is quite good.. Fits nicely into the ears.. Waterproof so sweat is not a problem.

name: harsh shah
title: Superb product with great sound and flexible to use
content: awesome sound quality, most I like is Charging. 1 hour charging = 4 days running. every day i attend 100 calls minimum. and feel so comfortable after purchasing one plus bullets.. fast pair with my mobile and laptop. water resistent, Quick switch between laptop and mobile is so good feature. On and off is very easy. 1999 rs is worth for this product

name: Kabir
title: BASS edition?? More like BASE edition
content: This headphone is pretty basic and surely overpriced. The non-bass edition has a physical switch tow toggle between paired devices. This one does not. The documentation for the device claims that we can go to the bluetooth settings of the paired devices to choose this headphone for switch. I have two problems with that:. 1. It is not "auto" switching.. 2. It does not work 75% of the time. The sound quality is "acceptable" at best. There's no bass. Call quality is okay.. I would not recommend this headphone at anything above 600 INR.

name: Himank yadav
title: This is for bass lovers !!!
content: Dont worry about the battery life it will last longer till a week if used 2..3 hrs a day,. The bass quality is mind blowing, if you are a bass lover thn this thing is made for you.. I was confused about the normal edition and the base addition previously.. •The normal addition has 20hrs of battery life.. And bass addition had 17hrs. •the normal addition has a physical quick switch but in base addition you can do it with ur phone.. •but the bass its giving is worth it all.. Its a bass beast. •calling is amazing.. •its splash and dust proof. • it takes around 45 min to full charge. But the first 10 min charge stays for 10 hrs.. • the quick connectivity helps alot while working on 2 devices.

name: Rishabh Dutta
title: Its worth for ur money
content: For its budget its works for you very good n satisfactory.. Good sound quality.... Noise cancelling is not good. Music playback is very good.. Soothing and balanced sound .. Best for music lovers.. Call quality is good.. Video latency is ok .. Bt game latency is not good .. Gaming latency only works in OnePlus devices with this Z.. Overall good.With one year warranty.. Worth for music and money .

name: Aashu
title: Terrific
content: SOUND QUALITY - Best . Way better than oppo enco. To the people comparing this with realme. Yes the sound is louder in realme headphones but the quality of sound is better in one plus.. BASS QUALITY - No doubt why it's named bass edition it's really powerful, thumpy and don't get distort even at full volume.. COMFORT : I find it less comfortable than oppo enco. If you can gave up on sound quality over comfort, go for oppo enco. Those are really comfortable not gonna lie.. BATTERY : Warp charging works really amazing and on full charge i think 3-4 days for me I listen almost 3-4 hours of music and calling for 1-2 hours daily.. CONNECTIVITY : REALLY FAST LITERALLY. Missing the quick switch though... DURABILITY : Feels durable, using all the time even sleeping with it.. Overall: 4/5 (1star reduced due to less Comfortable)

name: Himanshu Y.
title: Amazing product
content: Again great product from OnePlus, sound quality is good with clear vocals, bass quality gets much better when I pushed it little inside. Battery life is good. This is my first bluetooth head phone after a long time (around 10 years) which use to have very less battery life so I can't give comparison with current brands.. Looks very cool in neck. Magnetic controls is really a cool. I am using it with OnePlus 7 so no time latency is noticed in videos

name: Amazon Customer
title: Noise capture instead of noise cancellation
content: This earphone is one of the best right now. But people who use it know the pain. Like its good with the battery and connectivity but the noise cancellation is one of the worst. It will not cancel any noise instead capture all noises which are like on a distance and amplify them over call. I would be happy if they can fix this issue in next model.

name: Ankita Sharma
title: Highly disappointed. Please give a thought before buying it.
content: Worst earphone I have ever used. It stopped working in just 27th day from the day it got delivered to me.. And the most important thing is OnePlus is having worst after sales service I have ever experienced. They don't answer to the call, they don't reply back to your emails and what not. I tried calling the OnePlus customer care many times but they don't answer. When I get connected with them after waiting for millions of hours they said I have to go to the service center which is not in my city. I requested them to provide pick up facility and replace it. But they said its not possible, I have to go to the service center in this covid situation where whole city is lockdown. I don't expect this much poor service from such a big brand.. My brother is having boat earphone worth rs 600 only and it also stopped working in this lockdown. In only 1 request boat provided pickup facility and replaced his earphone. Boat is having much more great after sales service as compared to OnePlus.. Highly disappointed. Please give a thought before buying it.

name: Bakkya
title: Ok but not the quality expected
content: Cons. 1. The sound is too low even at the maximum set volume.. 2. When the buds are together (attached bcoz of magnet), it disconnects and when some call comes, we need to wait for the headset to connect to the Bluetooth again.. 3. The ear buds are comfortable to wear but are not fixing to ears properly. I have to fix them in ears quite often to make it stay there.. 4. Most important thing to note is the charging port is always open, making it vulnerable to get wet in case of water spills while drinking or during other activities, which should have been given a cover/cap.. Pro. Great battery backup & simplified design

name: Sai Krishna Kondayagunta
title: Just go for it 🤩
content: I am an audiophile, I don't know about other but for me these sound great. The mids and highs are so good especially the vocals are awesome. Instrument seperation is too good. Coming to the bass, I used realme buds wireless as well and I feel the bass is emphasized on realme according to our Indians taste but the bass seeps into vocals and highs on realme which isn't satisfying. On wireless z the bass is not good as realme but it's decent. Bass comes when it's required unless like realme. Call quality is same on both they're pretty good so no complaints.. Features:. ✓ Quick switch: It is a god sent, I am able to switch between my laptop and OnePlus 7 in less than 5 seconds and it's crazy fast.. ✓ Battery Life & Charging: I am using 5-6 hrs in a day at a stretch at 60% volume and I am charging them for once a week which is spectacular. Dash/Warp it can finish charging in an Hour or so.. ✓ Comfort: This is also a place where OnePlus goes ahead compared to Realme, these are tangable and easily you can keep it in your pocket without hesitation. Even after continues hrs of usage, I didn't even feel uncomfortable. Realme buds on the other hand aren't tangable, they weigh more and I felt uncomfortable after sometime.. Finally, for me for the price they are an excellent offering from OnePlus. Great sound, great battery life, fast charging, quick switch and comfort and Adequate bass. If these are your requirements, close your eyes and go with it. If you want bass, bass and bass go with Realme buds.

name: Shashank K
title: Good product. Detailed review below.
content: Pros:. * Loght weight. * Battery life. * Noise Cancellation. * Ease of switching between devices (Need to press pause / resume button for 3-4 seconds. It disconnectes and you will need to manually add it to alternative device). * Quick charge. Cons:. * Lack to dedicated sound control button near left ear. (This made control easier - this was included in the original OnePlus Bullets Wireless). But that is 2K costlier than OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition. So thats okay.. * Wire width is little less.

name: Nitish Yadav
title: Actually disappointed
content: This earphone is no way cheap. I am writing the review after 2 months of extensive use.. After 1 month of use the earphone has started malfunctioning. It gets disconnected every now and then and its very irritating.. Sound quality is OK ok.. Battery life is actually good.. Many a times, despite being connected to the phone, the sound gets played in the phone's speaker which can cause embarrassment 😐(if you know what I mean). The problem of disconnecting automatically is a huge 👎🏻. Its no cheap earphone. Its a branded one plus earphone.. After using this, I want to return to my wired earphones.. Edit: There's a new problem. The microphone has serious issues with noise cancellation

name: Shoaib S.
title: A Nirvana for your Ears...
content: Received sealed package in 2 Days.... Full Charged in 30 minutes using RealMe VOOC 18W fast Charger.. Using it with RealMe 5 Pro for Music, Videos and Skype Calls.. Researched alot before purchasing this one.. It has good bass so keep aside the negative reviews.. I hate huge bass.. I has excellent build quality, huge battery power, fastest connection and disconnection seen with my RealMe.. I have used Boat Rockerz 261 before this which is still working fine but they don't last 11 hours non stop which is my shift timing.. I bought this one as it will let me complete my complete Shift with Skype call for 11 hours straight without needing to charge it again.. Only a 10 min charge would make it ready for next 10 hours...

name: Vignesh Kumar R B
title: Best Bang for buck wireless earphones.
content: You can blindly buy these wireless earphones, I have used the Oneplus wireless Bullets, which lasted like ever. This is half its price and the built and sound quality is better than the wireless bullets. Sound quality is amazing for the price tag. It is one of the wireless earphones which has faster Bluetooth connectivity. As it has magnetic heads with auto on/off feature, it's easy to connect to phone effortlessly. Bass is in the comfort level and pleasing.. Conclusion OnePlus Wireless Z-Bass edition worth every penny.

name: At
title: Above average product, not for bass lover even though this is claimed to be bass version
content: Sturdy build quality, sound is clear but even though this is marketed as bass version, I cant feel much of bass. If the bass version is so light on bass, I wonder how the earlier models used to perform. But other wise this is good piece.. Moreover the bluetooth toggle button is not present in this model (my oversight while buying) which is not a good step. As ability to toggle between devices with press of a button is really very good feature. I would have paid some extra buck for that, but sadly thats not present

name: Vishnu K Balan
title: Wish I found a review remotely close to this before buying this.
content: You might wanna know why I gave this headphone a one star. Let me get to it, first all the good stuff, 5 stars for sound quality,3 stars for noise cancellation, 4 stars for bass quality and 5 stars for working hours (got upto 24hrs), now for the reason I'm writing this comment for, well I bought this headphone for its easy accessibility of on and off system and I gonna say this at first if it were any harder to connect it to my phone there wouldn't have been a headphone to connect with, I bought this headphone on October and it worked perfectly till December - 2 months that's it. That's what you are gonna get for the Rs.2000 you pay, right now it still isn't completely useless, it works perfectly with my laptop but when it comes to mobile phones you could happily watch a movie for 2 minutes and it disconnects and reconnects in another minute and disconnects in another 2 minutes and keeps on going. I searched far and wide for a solution ( quora, Reddit, forums even yahoo answers) and there isn't anything anywhere that's helps, that's it you're stuck with it. I know there is no reason for you to believe a stranger on a review section so before you buy this godawful creation i would recommend you Google any thing remotely close to this headphones name you would find the answers there. Stay safe

name: Chandler Bing
title: Balanced sound, excellent battery life, but not for audiophiles
content: Has a very balanced sound, but definitely not for the audiophiles. Don't go for it if you listen to bass-heavy music. Battery life is excellent, I had to charge it just once in 3 days with moderate to heavy use. Call quality is also satisfactory.. I wish the blinking led was a little less bright, it's kind of annoying if you're using it in the dark.. For people complaining about the missing "Never Settle" logo, I also faced the same issue, but as per OnePlus customer support, the logo was printed in the starting of the sale, but now the logo is not been mentioned in the box.

name: Anup Narvekar
title: Mic not working ! And uncomfortable fit
content: Just got my headphones yesterday, and I was pretty happy with it unti I found that the mic isn't working today. I researched to find a fix for this but couldn't find any solution and it needs to be replaced, that's the only way. I learnt that many users are facing this issue. I didn't expect this from OnePlus. Next, he comfort isn't that great. It feels so tight in the ears, as if a slightly bigger stone has been forcefully placed in the ears. It's not ment to be worn continueously for more than 30-40 mins.. Update: Finally got the replacement and it's working just fine.

name: HBR
title: Better to look any other one with 1k of price tag
content: This earphone is very basic and has some annoying feature like if both buds will stick using magnet then it will stop and disconnected. If your device to which it was connected need to approve the connection (in my case my samsung tv ask to connect every time it disconnect due to magnet buds sticking together), it will annoy you a lot.. Sound quality is very average, it should be little lauder for better calling experience. battery back up is around 4-5hrs, don't expect 10hrs or something. These are my experience so far.

name: LOTUS
title: Oneplus Bass edition is awesome.
content: Sound is awesome , specifically the bass .I was a fan of realme ,used that almost 7 months . But after using this ,I must say this is better than realme in sound . Needless to say I am a bass lover. I am using oneplus 6T so maybe that is also a factor.. CONS : -. 1. Noise cancellation should be little bit better.. 2. If you are listening music and suddenly you watch a video in YouTube then after end of the YouTube video you have to manually play the song. In realme it automatically play the song .. Pro :-. 1. Bass. 2. Latency is way better (Almost zero) than other. earphones under Rs 2000. ( I almost tried all). 3. Battery capacity : Nonstop music ,video. ....around 18 hours .. 4. Charging Capacity : Charged for exactly 10 mins.. Jumps from 20% to 90%. Thank you Amazon for oneday delivery.

name: Ajit Vishwanath
title: The best earphones you can purchase under 2k
