content: After going through multiple reviews, asking bunch of people and applying my own mind, i zeroed in on this one.. the highlights:. - excellent sound quality. - good call clarity includes a decent amount of noise cancellation. - fantastic colour combination. - minimalistic design. an important aspect was whether i need to take the one plus wireless edition (the normal one) or this one.. i can tell from experience that this one is definitely a better choice and that includes voice calling

name: UNICORN POOP
title: Review after 1 month of daily usage. Promising but not there yet.!
content: Great physical build quality. The buttons on the device feel great. The cables are a non tangling type. Premium rubberized feel overall. Packaging and unboxing is gteat as well.. The biggest problem is with the sound. There's a crackling noise that starts on both sides occasionally. Its especially annoying and noticeable when you watch a movie. The dialogues cause a heavy crackle sound that pierce your eardrums very painfully. Crackling sound also noticed when using the volume keys on the device. The crackling increases and decreases with the volume level.. Its a problem a lot of users are facing and oneplus has gone silent in the support forum.. The range is amazing. I can easily walk out of the house and it works through 2 doors/walls easily.. Call volume is extremely high so you can easily hear the other person. The mic, even though it's placed on the neck band, is very efficient. My voice is crystal clear on the other end even when I'm traveling by a motorcycle. I do have to talk at a slightly louder voice than normal due to the face mask and helmet but its not an inconvenience.. Bass is poor. They have really tried to deliver good punchy bass but its very rounded even after tweaking my equalizer. Very unsatisfactory.. However they do manage to isolate sound to an extent. Ive seen better but these aren't too bad. If its noises at home, it can easily handle it. But traffic noises, not so much!. Charge backup is incredible. And recharge rate even without a warp charger is amazing with the type C.. The in ear part is quite bulky so if you are planning on wearing it under a helmet or anything that hugs your ears, its going to take a lot of getting used to. They do stay snug in your ear tho.. Does not stay very well if you are running or even bending down. They tend to pop out. And ive owned sony, sennheiser, jbl, and a few tws earphones and they all managed to stay in without falling out. This one does fall out when disturbed even slightly.. For the price point tho they are great giving it an overall 3.

name: Josh
title: Honest review. Know your needs
content: The products build quality is good. Bought it for long battery life and quick charge.. Pros:. 1. Good battery life. 2. Quick charge. 3. Had no problems with mic on call. 4. Multi device connectivity and magnet controls.. Cons:. 1. Poor eartips quality, not very comfortable compared to other options. 2. Sound signature is flat. Strictly NOT RECOMMENDED for music. In fact I may call it poor for music.

name: divyansh aggarwal
title: Value for money product!!
content: Awesome product under 2000! The battery back up is soo good! It charges within 20minutes and gives a playtime of around 18 hours easily. The sound quality is also very clear you can hear every beat in the song plus the noise cancellation is also good. The only negative point is bass quality it's not that too much high but it's moderate so overall it's a very great product to buy(don't forget about low latency mode if you are a gaming player, it's awesome). Ps- the product is excellent but i didn't get the charging cable along with the box. Which is meant to be there.

name: Umair Shah
title: Being Never Settle
content: Exceptional earphones... I got it for 1850 in amazon sale...I am writing a review after 5 months usage...This earphone with one plus phone goes amazing....Bass experience is excellent. You will find lack of highs and lows in other phones but if you are a one plus user then go for it without any hesitation.. Seller. :- 5/5. Bass quality :- 4.7/5. Sound quality :- 4.5/5. Gaming experience with one plus finatic mode. :- 5/5. Noise cancellation :- 4.0/5. Durability :- 4.5/5. Build quality :- 4.0/5. Fast charging :- 5/5 (charge for 10 minutes enjoy for approx 8 hours on full volume). And when full charged it gives 13 hours backup on full volume when listening songs. Overall its worth buying. Go for bass version if you are a oneplus user.

name: stylistsafi
title: Something in the middle! 2.5*
content: I have been using these for a week now , and I guess can review it correctly unlike others who have just given 5 star for the sake but it isn't that good , niether that bad, it's ok.. So the claims of zero latency goes down the drain cause I'm using 1+6 device and have sony studio, Boult , boat and JBL bluetooth devices , of which boat is the best.. Sound quality wise cannot compare it to premium headsets but it does a good job.. The quality of the headset is nice as compared to others specially the battery is the usp and it stays alive for a relatively long time , so if ur a person isn't a frequent charger then go for it, but if you like to play pubg then you can try others cause it has about a 1sec delay which is good enough.. Music is good to the ears but as I've used OnePlus bullets , the it isn't as great as them.. So overall I've give 2.5 stars to it.

name: reuben
title: VALUE FOR MONEY + GREAT PRODUCT
content: I really wanted to give this neckband a 5 star rating. But there are some pros and cons. Pros. 1. Absolutely great material quality. 2. Nice and sturd design. 3. Magnetic on and off technology just kills the on off feature which other neckbands have.. 4. Dual pairing mode is heaven and quick connectivity feature is just like God mode. For me i use phone and laptop alternatively. So with just a double press and in 2 seconds it switches between the devices.. 5. Great Bluetooth range.. 6. Sound quality is average. Like the highs and lows are ok'ish. 7.best of all is the battery 10 mins charge for 10 hrs and 25 mins for 20hrs😍. Its like having a neckband connected to the wall socket forever.. 8. Weight and comfortability is great. Literally you wouldnt even feel you have something on ur next and in your ears🤣🤣. Its that sick.. 9. It comes with 1 year warrenty so no worries for anything whatsoever.. 10. OnePlus unboxing experience. Its something exquisite. Cant describe in words.. Cons. 1. It doesnt have any sort of active noise cancellation. Trust me... The person on the other side could hear your background noise even more clearer than your voice😂.. 2. Sometimes the Bluetooth disconnects and reconnects and at times the dual pairing feature doesnt work as expected. It irritates me at such times and finally i either try to turn the headset off and on or if this doesnt work.. I proceed with a reset and then pair again.. 3. When using the neck band paired to the laptop, the volume buttons do not control the system volume instead control the headphone volumes. I think its due to the incorrect driver config. But the volume buttons work great with android.. Overall, if you are in a calm enough room then you wouldnt face any issues with the backgroud noise and the noise cancellation issue would be sorted.. Since the neckband comes with an inline microphone, you could use your hand to pull tye microphone near to your mouth so as to clearly speak to the listener.. If you are a person who is not sooo sensitive to the greatest highs and lows of music and you do some ordinary listening and voice calling. This headset is for you. You cant expect 5000 rupee product in a 2000 rupee budget. So comparing with battery life, product quality, music quality, and features, it is indeed a recommended product. The product is great and is value for money. But one plus could work on the noise cancellation feature. But other than this this neckband is greater than value money.

name: raghavan
title: Connectivity is awesome. Battery King
content: Bluetooth range is between 7-8 metres inside home.. Pros:. 1. Battery backup - easily withstands 15hrs. 2. Controls - No power button. Turns off when the buds are attached and turns on when buds are separated. Turning off or on takes less thaan 2 seconds. Quick switch option is very useful to switch between current and last connected device. Volume buttons and play/pause works as expected.. 3. Pairing is very quick. Connects to last connected device instantly after buds are separated.. 4. USB Type c charging.. Cons:. 1. Sound quality is good.. 2. Bass is low but if you prefer bass edition, you will lose quick switch feature.. 3. Takes more than a hour to charge in charhers other thaan warp charger.

name: Ashish Chauhan
title: Just wow
content: Its amazing in wvery way. At this price you will not get anything better than this and pair it with OnePlus device and boom your experience enhanced to the next level. Battery life is good got around 22 hours of music playback in single charge and full charge was done in less than 30 minutes, so really can't complain about that. Overall my experience has been great with this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: It is really an amazing product
content: The sound quality is great and it is really great while you are playing games or listening to music and it helps in noise cancellation too. Overall it is an amazing wireless earphone and it has a good range. You can put your phone on charge and listen to music or use it while you are on call. Till now I didn't face any issues with this product and it's almost been 4 months since I am using this product and the best feature of these earphones is they have magnet over the earphone and when you bring them close they immediately get off so you don't have to switch it on and off you just put them in your earphone and that's it. I also have OnePlus buds and you can buy these as they are cheaper than buds and they can be used the same way and wireless earphone are comfortable too. Thankyou Amazon.

name: Roshan hp
title: Average bullet , no woww factor after using for a day
content: After seeing all the good reviews i purchased this.. Built quality: 4.5/5 for first look this can be changed after long use.. Sound quality: no woww factor in listening any high bass movies or instrumental songs.. Battery : it takes 1 hour 20 mins to charge full to give u 17hrs of usage time. Red light turn to white to indicate full charge. 10 min charge to 10hours is just a gimik.. Mic: better than previous version nothing like crystal clear.. Confirt: holds good and light.

name: MOURYA
title: Awesome earpiece by oneplus...
content: Oneplus bullets wireless z earpice is not just awesome but its amazing too...i ordered it on the day it was launched on amazon and got my delivery before time...i think it has a no of pros but negligible cons...bcoz many hv written it has no bass...but i dont think so...bass treble nd overall sound is balanced with crystal clear sound in this price range by one of d premium brand...i hv black color which looks sooo smartyyy...it has various latest specifications which has not been offered by other brands in this price ...u can definitely go 4 it...💝💥👌👍

name: raja mohapatra
title: Useful, Viable and Feasible Product..
content: It's the best for practical use for taking long calls, leisurely music and even watching movies.. Best battery life, practical feature like switching between 2 devices, effectiveness of the mic, charging time vs the usage time, convenience in carrying and not losing it - all these are great.. Only thing I am struggling with is the fitbi to the ear even with the smallest buds. But it's okay.. Go for it.. At this price point getting a OnePlus guarantee is awesome. Great design.

name: Mohan#Stanley
title: Awesome,wonderful product at this price range
content: OnePlus always superb product...wireless z super sound quality like Home theater...Battery backup Awesome...but it's not noice cancellation so call clarity is low...It is better than iball, Mi neckband,boat,Samsung level u,oppo Enco M31 and realme wireless earphone...but realme is good bass quality...OnePlus decent bass and woofer sound...like theatre sound quality

name: aditya
title: It has some Microphone Issues (Follow Smartprix on YT for the video)
content: Decent bassline, 9mm drivers work fine.. The real issue is the mic here you have to stick it close to your freaking mouth like some cheap ass earphones.. Also WIRELESS ARE SIMPLY NOT MEANT FOR PUBGin..!!. I'll try to get the item replaced or returned due to mic issues. Rest everything is fine, be it the battery back up or a 45min charging time (with a 1. 8W fast charger). UPDATE(4-3-21) I've got these are earphones replaced twice with zero additional fees, the first replacement worked fine for sometime but later it came up with same mic issues so I got it replaced again, the second replacement has been working fine it's been 2 weeks since I got these. Will continue to update if I face some issuedsagain.

name: Sandeep Ahuja
title: Good wireless headset
content: I am writing it after a month of use... Connectivity - less than a sec. Range - I roam into my house wearing this and keep on taking. Back up- I usually use them for my office use... So use them with either laptop or my One plus 7T. I am pretty impressed with the back up time for this headset. I charge it once in 2 days and use them during the whole 10 hours of my shift timings. Loud and clear voice, noise cancellation is good.. For other purposes movies and music I found them pretty ok.

name: Kedar Joshi
title: Do buy for only one reason
content: Well, let me begin by saying that I have Crossbeats TWS, Mi Wireless and Noise TWS headphones. The one feature which attracine for this headset is the feature of connecting 2 devices simultaneously and ease of switching these devices. That is one stand out feature. The sound quality is poor to Average. So if you are thiyof buying this for hearing songs, I would suggest buy MI or some other other headsets because sound output is not it's standout feature. However if you have 2 devices which you want to connect primarily for calling, then this headset shines. So choose wisely.

name: Nikhil
title: IMPRESSIVE. GO FOR IT .
content: "Impressive". Everyone is complaining about bass. I also worried a bit about bass before ordering, but after using for first time I can clearly say that every thing is perfect in this earphones. Bass is up to the mark. Yes ! Sound quality is superb at price point and fetures are pretty awesome. You may feel the bass little bit lower for particular music but you couldn't be disappointed for sure. DEFINITELY GO FOR IT 👍

name: IamReal
title: Annoyingly bright blinking LED
content: There is something that makes this really annoying. It's so bright. I wonder why they made it also bright and make it blink so frequently. Really a bad design for an otherwise great earphone. The could have at least made a lower power blue LED or something.. In my previous Samsung U flex headset, there was a small LED which was not so bright but could light up in RGB for various status.. This one is so annoying. I'm painting it with a permanent marker.. Never expected this from a brand who takes so much pride in their design!

name: Aditya s.
title: Veryy disappointed
content: I ordered 2 wireless z but both are defective first one doesn't have bass i can only here vocals and treble not even 1%bass. Then I replace it and ordered 2nd when I open the box it looks fresh untouched but when I press the button it didn't turn on then I think it's battery is dead I plug it to the charger and charge it full ( untill blue light glows up ) and I press the button in hope that it will turn on after all i have replace one damage piece and it is replacement and it didn't turn on mannn im soooo disappointed with the service .. First order didnt have bass or sound quality after paying 2000inr. Second even turning on 😤😤. ,. What are uh going to do for my inconvenience oneplus?

name: Ruchi
title: Good product
content: Pros: Sound quality, noise cancellation, battery life. Cons: ear pods are not comfortable. My ears start aching after an hour. I am used to iPhone earphone which I can wear all day without any discomfort.. Amazon offered a Rs 1000 discount and offered it for 1999. But the price on box is Rs 2190. Seller is just making fool of customers

name: Sanjit
title: Very Good
content: One of the best in this category.. + points. Voice quality is great while talking or watching TV. Music seems to be balanced but bass lovers may feel little low on bass. One touch button to swap between paired devices. Quick charge. Long battery life its just few days of use so lasts as promised.. - Points. Needs little improvement on Noise cancellation. Needs improvement on Bass. Needs improvement on ear buds as long usage it feels little pain should have some better ear cussion or holding mechanism.

name: yagnesh
title: Bang for a buck ! Best bluetooth earphones under 2000
content: The are nice for this prize and definitely better than realme buds. I bought the oat color ones its not the color to go with . it looks really dirty all my friends have been after me for the color, no body liked the color but if we look at the sound and performance that is really good.. Pros : fast battery charge, even if it was discharged and you need it urgently then just charge it for 2mins and you are good to use it for next 2 hours.. Sound : i didnt even turn it to max sound ! Its so loud. But the audio is crystal clear and there is no quality loss. Ya it do not have aptx support but that dosent make any diffrence if you have upgraded from a low budget 1000rupee earpeice to this one . but people with good earphone like bose or apple airbuds will definitely notice a magrinal diffrence.. Easy switch between laptop and phone calls: this is the best feature guys and i works as a video editor and wearing those over the ear headphones can be so sweety and hot sometime . so now i just connect these via bluetooth to my computer to work on my projects . and if i have a phone call to take i can just double tap and it connects to the phone in a second . so if you have a laptop then this can come really handy as you need to carry just one pair of earphones to work or anywhere .. Mic : i believe mic is good sometime people have complaint that they cant here me please speek louder . so i need to hold my mic to face sometimes. Cons : well the material used is not that good and it becomes quiet painfull to wear them at long periods like 8+hours straight . i do alot of editing work so yeh i need to pull them off . its design is quiet curvy to the ears so that could be the root cause.. Connectivity : i have faced a little range and conectivity issues sometime when i goo far from it like if there are 2 walls between my earphone and my phone the there is a little jitter and you need to come back to the range to get signals. Rest its a good product to go with . i actually have a oneplus 7t so the product might vary for the diffrent devices that are not oneplus phone. Let me know if you find this helpfull

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent. Insane Battery Life. Truly
content: 1 and a half days with quick switching from phone to laptop. Amazing. Plus, so comfortable. And the range is truly amazing. Also, if your laptop is connected but a call comes in on your phone, guess what? it switched automatically. So intelligent. So amazing.. Also, the sound is pretty amazing. So like you can keep it mid-level and make the battery last longer. Haven't ever been so happy with a purchase before. Absolutely worth it!. if you are a OnePlus phone user or not, go for it. GO FOR IT!

name: arvind
title: battery with connectivity probleme
content: The OnePlus Bullet Wireless Z (Black) was delivered from Amazon in July 2020 and is now running smoothly until November 2020. Bluetooth suddenly stopped connecting. When the battery is charged, it shows a red light, then a white light. White light but does not blink When it is charged again it shows red light again and after a few seconds it shows white light but Bluetooth does not connect. How will this problem be solved?

name: Subhra Bakali
title: Detailed experience new one
content: This one's not bass boosted But for the ones who love an Overall Better sound Experience it is for them...mine is the Oat colour its is elegant and extremely comfortable. Connects before wink of an eye As soon as the magnets are apart and Switches off when are attatched together saving battery . A half hr charge on my Samsung 15watt charger lasts for hrs without hesitation. Excellent battery life. Excellent calling and mic experience. Google assistant is highly responsive. Being not a gamer i havent noticed the slightest bit of latency issues. Its a great experience and ill rewrite my review after months again

name: Sagar Hiremath
title: Worth the price and gives the best sound quality performance....
content: I am reviewing after 10 days of buying it I used more than 6 hours a day it give a very good sound quality ,no pain for prolonged usage to the ear,water and sweat resistance also performs good,i have only charged 3 times in 10 days i.e it gives more battery power and enhanced usage can be done,my favourite thing about this is the quality and fast connectivity of the earphones the magnetic part of earphones work amazing within fraction of second ur in headphone/earphone mode in the device( if u hv oneplus devices dont know about other devices)...... Overall don't think much about the earphones this device serves the purpose and worth the price...I suggest u can buy the product without a second thought ......

name: XY01
title: Why should you buy this??
content: Cheap bt not best.. Can be use for running and workout.. No noise cancelation (It's like putting fingers in my ear). No bass.. Sound quality is average.. Battery backup- 12-13hrs nonstop.. Cheap looking.. Why should u buy this?. -for replacement of your old earphone to wireless earphone or if u r interested in oneplus products only.

name: dev
title: One Month Geniune Usage & Testing review.
content: First Not a fake review.. The headphone looks and feels good build quality is good.. That is one point for the headphones bluetooth connectivity is also normal whats expected from this range of earphones. Switching between device is also fine no issue with that.. The only bad things are. at this range they should have provided better bass and sound quality into it. and mic that too is not that good my voice echos the people from other end complains about voice every time when there is small noise around maily with phone calls the zoom call and hangout call works okay anyhow.. If you are thinking about these for listening music then I will suggest there will be better choice and if your are looking to calls and you have 2 devices which you connects and disconnects then this is good device.. P.S. Battery charges fast in just 15 min that part is good runs 2 days atleast. Again NO for music and yes for calls

name: sriram ravindran
title: Good Headphones for basic needs
content: This is a decent pair of budget headphone. The audio quality is good for its price. It has only 1 driver but it produces the sound stage as expected. I have the bullets 2 which has a different and advanced driver setup so the sound quality is obviously better. But don't compare it to headphones not it its league. The quick toggle in this is a boon if you are like me and switch devices often. I recommend this as a blind buy if you are looking for a reliable budget bluetooth headphone

name: Nishtha Sharma
title: Just loved it.. Must buy
content: I m loving it.. It's sooo good. The earphones that I bought previously and I m talking about Bluetooth ones obviously.. I always had problems while talking on phone as in the other person cudnt hear my voice clearly but there were no issues wid music though... So I specifically wanted one in which I cud talk comfortably without worrying about my voice clearly reaching the other side.. And I got one.. People actually recommended me this one.. Must say it's not that costly..design is so sleek, light weight and totally worth it!!

name: ROHIT
title: Perfect for binge watch. Loved it
content: Perfect for music lovers... Who loves meaningful lyrical songs..... Not for boom boom lovers.... Best things it is perfect for those love to binge watch.. No sudden increase in sound when action scene comes..and u r like let me decrease volume. It just go with the flow.... I hope u r understanding what i m trying to say.... Go for it if u love to watch movies and web series more on ur phone tv.... You will not feel pain in urs while watching whole series in one go.. Its light and balance music will come out of it.. Don't give it a negative remark just because of so called bass u need.. If u need bass go for other brands and listen music for 2 hrs and get ur ear pain...... Thats all my review.. Main things is... Just charge for 10 mins n u r ready to complete whole series in that 10 min charge.. Choice is urs now.. Sound quality is good for melody song.

name: ANJENY TIWARI
title: Best in price range.
content: I've received these neckbands yesterday. Came in good condition. Sound quality is good. Have a little low bass. Comfortable in ears and really flexible. It gave approx 14 hrs of backup since it came out of the box. It took 1hr for the complete charge from my realme-6 charger.. Only cons that I've have found is that they took 10 sec for connecting to my device for the first time. Also, sometimes it connects in seconds and sometimes they took 10sec but I am ok with it. Switching between devices takes approx 4-5 seconds.. At the end I'll say buy them without a single thought.

name: A.P.
title: Not as impressed
content: Overall the quality of the headphones is good. The best thing I liked about it is that they last for almost 2 full days with considerable use. I use them almost all day for office calls. Plus they get charged very quickly.. However I bought these for attending Teams calls through laptop since my wired headphones were causing lot of noise. This is where I was not very impressed. A lot of times the headphones are not even detected. I would disconnect from one call and when I join the other one they would not get detected. I would have to turn them off (by connecting both the ear buds) and then turn it on; then disconnect from laptop and connect it back and all that.. Same happened with my phone as well. Since I swap them between phone and laptop through the day, they sometimes dont connect properly.. Initial setup took some fiddling around. My dad has MI bluetooth and it took me less than a minute to get them working with my laptop and phone. These ones took me 10-15 minutes to understand how to connect and make them work.. I had better expectation from One Plus and hence I bought these. When they work, they work great. When they dont, they become a pain.

name: Sandip Jadhav
title: Awesome product. Most recommended.
content: Using it for 1 week. Battery 🔋 life is awesome. Never charged it since 7 days. I am not a music lover and not using continuesly. I use it only 1-2 hours daily still charging is 60% after using it for 7 days. Good connectivity. Using it with realme phone. Bass is little low. I use only for prime videos and YouTube learning. Good experience. Like it very much. Thanks oneplus and Flipkart ❤️. 1 thing i would like to tell, never buy a product which is on high discount offer. Always buy quality products even if it is costly.

name: Neeraj
title: Great battery.. Not for bass heads
content: Good mids and highs. Strictly not for bass lovers. Bass is good enough for those sound effects you need in a movie or drama/thriller webseries. But not enough for music.. Battery life is just amazing. I primarily use these for podcasts and for late night Netflix binging.. I'd recommend these over any other in this price range.

name: Rahul K
title: not for listening music best for long battery
content: if you want something for listening to music don't go for it. it gets irritating after like 10 mins of use. the only reason i bought it was for calling(good noise cancellation too) and huge battery life which is the best in this. the fast charging enables us to use it without hassle i have a 20W charger which charges it in minutes and it lasts days for me. 2-3 almost. i have no idea about the bass and tunes and all but i prefer brands like sony for them. the silicon or rubber strap was irritating for me in the starting cause i have sensitive skin but later its ignorable. Also, even after bluetooth 5.0 its range is at max 10 meters and if a wall comes in between then it gets laggy

name: Ravi Ranjan
title: Great... but not so great!!
content: Battery, as on the paper, is really awesome. Descent sound quality, not much bass (could only feel a bit at higher sound levels). Bluetooth range is good.. Connecting to the other devices using the quick switch feature is a bit trickier though, sometimes it works flawlessly, but sometimes it doesn't. And also, when the earphone is paired with more than single devices (two in my case), conneting to one of them is difficult sometimes (doesn't connect automatically many times), had to restart the phone's Bluetooth and reconnect the earphone.

name: Lipun abhishek
title: Noise cancelation is poor
content: Let me be honest, if you are buying this earphones for music, then it's music quality is great.. If you are going to use it for calls due to it's so called noise cancelation technique, then don't fall into the trap.. After using for more than a month, I can't use it for calls as the background noise is too much and many of my friends and colleagues have complained of hearing loud noise during calls. Turns out this problem is common in almost all the oneplus bluetooth devices.. Finally: if you can't use it for calls, then it doesn't make sense to buy such expensive earphone for music only, as much cheaper earphones can provide the same. Invest at some other earphones.

name: Parvathy Prasad
title: Best in class. Beast among the competitors
content: You know you can never go wrong with Oneplus. They maintain the standard right from the packaging to the product quality. So when this beauty came in, it was no surprise that it was packed exceptionally well and in a crisp and neat red and white box. And as for the product, it is some kind of sorcery. I have used boat and jbl bluetooth headphones before and must say that this is the best so far. Sleek, stylish and comfortable in the ears. Definitely worth the hype and money.

name: G.Vineeth Reddy
title: Love the OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z
content: The music is clear and nice even at 40% volume, call quality was great due to the accuarate microphone placement. I felt these convenient and better even when compared to that of the TWS earphones as we need not worry about them falling off the ear.. The bullets type c would cost us around 1500 INR, the bullets wireless Z at 2000 INR is a decent purchase given it supports Warp Charge and 20 hrs if endurance.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No brainer
content: You can't go wrong with these if you know what you're buying.. Pros:. - Excellent battery life. I use it extensively and the battery lasts me several days on a single charge.. - Insanely fast charging. My macbook-pro Type-C charger charges it fully in about 10 minutes flat! The oneplus warp charger charged it from 0 to 70% in 5 minutes (I measured it with a stop watch). - Seamless connectivity. The magnetic earpieces work like a charm. You stick the ear-pieces together and the music pauses, and earphones turn off. You pull the earpieces away from each other and the headphones instantly pair with the phone (I use a oneplus phone). - Seamless switch between devices. Double press the bluetooth button and the earphones instantly connect with the previously connected device.. - Sound quality: I was very impressed with the clarity. The high and mid tones are very clear. You would read in many reviews that the bass isn't very good. I would say that the base is sufficient. If you are a basshead then you'd be better off looking at over-the-ear headphones anyway. For 2k, the overall audio quality is top notch.. - Weight: Very light. You very quickly forget that these are hanging around your neck.. - Build: It's not super premium, but is not bad by any means. I have been using these for about a month and they look like they'll last long.. Cons:. - While the fit is nice and comfortable, with a good noise isolation, these aren't the best earphones for running because they tend to slip out of your ear when you are sweating and moving too much. I wish oneplus had added earplugs with more secure fit.. - This is pretty much a nitpick, but the earphones don't tell you how much charge is left. You'll have to look into your phone to find the battery status.. - While connecting to a device, the earphones don't announce the name of the device. Perhaps this is a nitpick too.

name: Archit Patel
title: Good sound quality,Great battery life at Excellent price
content: So the design is good the earbuds are angulated so it fits good in the ear canal.. Sound Quality:. Treble-It is excellent.. Vocals- The vocals are excellent.They are crystal clear.. Bass- The bass is good.It is not the best.. Battery:. The battery is excellent on this device.No other wireless earphones can compete with this.It is 5/5.I am using it for more than 15 days and had to charge only once!!!!. Mic quality:. The mic quality is excellent.. Connectivity:. Bluetooth range is excellent.it also connects to the phone instantly.. Features:. The quick switch button works excellently.It just take 2 to 3 seconds to switch from one device to other.

name: birinder
title: Things to look out for-
content: Here's a must read before you purchase them. They are a really good pair, but you must consider a few things beforehand. If you have a OnePlus phone, you must go to audio and the sound enhancement should be set to "General Enhancement" and not "Bullets Wireless". The former provides a richer sound while the latter gives a "hollow" sound (Try them on both settings, trust me it would be pretty hollow). And if you feel the bass is inadequate, trust me it is not, you have just not worn them properly. Insert them deep and snug into your ears rather than letting them linger on the outskirts. You can confirm the presence of pretty heavy bass if you slightly push them into your ears.. TL/DR-. 1. OnePlus users run them in General Enhancement mode in sound settings.. 2. Insert them deep and snug, or the bass wouldn't be audible.. 3. They are a bomb a*s pair of headphones.

name: Balavenkatesh
title: Good product! Could be even better if they work on sound quality!
content: Good product for the price. I've been using it for a while now. Love the magnetic turn on/off feature and the fast charging feature.. Pros - 10mins to full charge (bad in the long run but it's good for those who are in hurry). Magnetic turn on/off (saves you the trouble of battery being drained out.), IP certified for this price (that's definitely a pro), Connecting with TV is easy and fast.. Cons - Bass and sound quality could be better.

name: pavan srikar
title: Not comaprable to One plus wirelesss bullets 2
content: I have used One plus bullets 2 wireless for almost 6 months .but there is a lot of difference between these two , Build quality is very good in 5999/- variant , and also the earpiece doesn't look that premium in the 1999/- variant . Just an another budget variant where one plus decided to loot money simple. Bass is good compared to the 5999/- variant.. PS:- If you want a budget one and long battery life then go for it .

name: jaykaram
title: One of the Best In market
content: One Plus designed this of people like us. It's very nice headphones. It's very handy it gets switched off when you attach both of buds together. Its magnet is very powerful. You can use it for 3 days with one charge if you you just want to use it for answering calls. Let it hang on your neck and when you receive a call just separate earbuds and soon it is connected, as soon as it gets connected call is answered you don't have to take your phone out and once you finish talking just attach both of the earbuds together and again it switched off

name: chaitanya sk
title: All points covered!! ;)
content: I will be mentioning every thing I've experienced with the product.. Delivery- Took 6 days quite understandable due to the circumstances.. Packaging- Amazing as usual it's a one plus product.. First hands on experience- feels quite premium for plastic. The neck band and the wires are covered in silicon. Overall Feels smooth and premium.. Pairing- breezy. Easiest thing ever . If you want to pair it to another device make sure it's disconnected from all the devices.. Sound quality- Pretty nice not the best I've heard but definitely justifies the price range.. Bass- just exists. But trust me does not make much of a difference.. Latency- you would not even feel a bit of it. I've played CSGO Fortnite Pubg and what not on it they audio was bang on!. Microphone- was skeptical about it in the beginning but it works properly.....good input and output......but mind you I'm just taking about gaming or calls and not riding.. Colour- I chose the Oat looks fab and black is too mainstream anyways ;). Battery- does live up to the tag line 10 mins of charging really gives you 10 hrs but only if you are using a dash charger. I used a dash charger and an honor fast charger there was a difference of just 5 mins. Also it takes about 25-30 mins to charge completely. Overall review- A Bang for your Bucks!. Go for it without any hesitation :)

name: bhavesh
title: Go for it.
content: It's a very good headphone ur has some pros and cons:. Pros: Gets connected quickly and easily.. Bluetooth range is also good.. Switch mode for connecting to two alternate devices so no need to disconnect from one device to get connected to another.. Treble is extremely good. Bass is missing.. Extremely good for making and receiving calls. Voice is very clear. It is water resistant.. Very cheap in price just 2k with so many benefits. Gets charged very quickly. Battery backup is awesome.. Con's: Base is not good.. During calls the other person can hear background noise which gets amplified in some way creating frustration for them at times.. If you can live with the cons then you shud definitely go for it. It's a million times better than the other cheap products with similar qualities.

name: Ashok Murari
title: A beast in this price range 👊
content: Today I got my OnePlus bullets Z wireless from Amazon. This is the amazing and best earphones I have used till now. Below is my review for using it continuously for 12hrs .. -Unboxed earphones got 100% charged piece.. -Pairing is super quick with my OnePlus 8.. - Pair the magnet and it will be powered off. Unpair it simply to turn on. - can connect within fraction of seconds when bluetooth is already enabled in Phone.. - Turned on at 9.45am today morning and used till now continuously and reduced 40% of charge for 12+ hours usage and 60% remaining.. - Sound is awesome especially when u have a dynamic setting in Dolby Atmos. - coming to the bass, I saw many reviews stating bass is bad, but it's absolutely wrong. Bass is great without any issues. If you want an extra thump, change the intelligent style to Nuanced mode in sound setting and enable 'Adapt to OnePlus bullets Z wireless' else you can tune the equaliser to more thump. But normal one will be fine.. - I also saw reviews that there is latency in pubg game. I played pubg for an hour and didn't find any latency and it's smooth too... Overall it's a beast in this price range.. I have attached some photos of my device and settings for your understanding.

name: DR INDRAJIT
title: A very average piece of device in sound with awesome battery
content: Let me start by saying i have been using wireless year phones for 3-4 yrs now. I use them in the gym and to take calls while cooking or doing other household work. 1. Please do not buy this if u r a music enthusiast. You cannot get the feel and effect of whisky with nimbu paani. 2. Sound is very average trebble and base both very average. 3. Fairly loud, good noise cancellation. 4. Not very comfortable , you feel the need to remove them from the ear every 20-30mins for 5-7mins. 5. Look is very good, looks nice. 6. The magnetic is quite atrong and does its job well to hold both ear pieces. 7. In hard running it comes off from the ear every 5-7 mins. 8. Battery is awesome. Lasts a week with 1-1.5 hr music playback. Charges very quickly too.. 9. Fairly water resistant, havent faced any issues in having sweaty workouts with them, just wipe with a tissue post workout. 10. No carry case.. 11. Bluetooth range is 12-18feet. All in all for 2k they do the work of 2k earpieces.. Nothing fancy. Great battery.. Will only buy them again for the battery back up.. My recommendation TAGG Bluetooth earphones if looking for sound quality and comfort. For rugged gym use these one plus are good enough

name: Vishnu Teja Annamraju
title: Good 👍
content: Phone call Voice clarity is bit lagging and latency on mobile phones is clearly noticed and if rest hooks given would have been more than best in this price range. Till now I have done extreme workouts , except in some circumstances it does fall off and either of the ear bud loosens and comes out while doing workout. But the ip55 rating is really working that no sweat is damaging the product and doesn't give any irritation while using. Connection is instant. Full Charging max time 30-45min without warp charger ,10 min charge of is working with nokia 18w charger I used. Overall above average product in terms of sound,call, workout. Excellent product in terms of battery and ip rating, charging, connectivity

name: Manish Jain
title: After one whole week of use !!!
content: Okay so I have used boat rockerz 255 before, and compared to that it has a much lower bass. The first time I used it, I can notice the differences, noise cancellation is poor, and only at high volumes you can cancel the noises.. But the connectivity, battery life, additional features make it worth to buy.. But if you enjoy pick-ups and drops in music, then you should go for boat 255, and it is available at a much lower rate.. Update:. I bought these because of the factor of comfort. But I was wrong, I use earphones for 5-6 hours daily, and my ears start to pain a lot !!!. I felt more comfortable in boat earphones

name: Shoaib Sheikh
title: you don't need 5k earphones now
content: All are looking for bass, here is my review the bass is good If you know how to set eq and proper eartips according to ear canal thn you will get that rumble woofer effect while watching Hollywood movies. Dolby Atmos works fine on my OnePlus phone, low latency works fine as well, If you don't have a OnePlus device dont worry you can still play pubg. for the battery i would say its been two hours since i am testing this earphone and it still shows 100% no need to buy 5000 rupees earphones whn u have this one.

name: Indrani Das
title: Value For Money Product
content: Excellent product in the price range of 2K. Well balanced sound with adequate bass which makes music listening enjoyable. Microphone quality is also very good. Battery backup is great as I use 6 hours daily.

name: Arup Sutradhar
title: ONE DECENT PIECE OF AN EARPHONE.
content: This would be a review from a commoner like myself, who only understands the benefits he gets for what he paid for.. (Before proceeding, I'd like to mention that I'm using OnePlus 7T to pair with the OnePlus Bullet Z Wireless earphone, due to which the points mentioned below might be possible). The main attractive point of this earphone is it's experience. By experience I mean:. a). EASE OF USE.(which is exceptional! i would say. Just by connecting the two earpieces you can turn it off and turn it on by separating them). Everytime I recieve a call, I would just unplug the two earbuds and it would get connected to my phone and I can receive the call hence, through the earphone. I mean, can it get any easier than this?. b). BATTERY LIFE: For a user like me who listens to music for one hour approx everyday and receive calls the way I mentioned above, THE BATTERY LASTS ALMOST/MORE THAN A WEEK FOR ME!!!. c). CHARGING TIME: With the C-type cable provided with the earphones, and the Warp Charger of my phone it gets charged to 100% by 20 minutes.. d). Sound Quality: After I read the reviews on Amazon about users pointing out about the bass, I was confused whether or not to go ahead with this product. But after using it for more than a month, I would say it has the best balance of the sound levels. The mids are good, so is the bass! Trust me, any level of bass higher than will only result in a headache! Super impressed with the sound quality.. e). CONNECTIVITY: It takes less than 2 secs for the earphones to get connected to my device. Moreover when I'm using my laptop and want to switch the earphone connection from my phone to the laptop, I'd simply double tap and the connection will get switched without any hussle! How awesome is that!. The above mentioned points should summarise the the kind of experience I was talking about earlier.. I hope my review helps you while buying this amazing product :)

name: Kaustubh
title: A decent VFM purchase, ticks most of the boxes.
content: In terms of VFM proposition, it's hard to beat the bullets wireless Z. The decision on opting these as your go-to earphones can primarily hinge on three points:. 1. Excellent battery life - should easily last for the whole day (even 2) for the most demanding of stints.. 2. Usability - magnetic control, quick switch. 3. Decent sound quality: For their price, the bullets deliver great sound quality for majority of the genre spectrum. But the lack of range and sharpness is quite evident when you bring in classic rock or grunge music into the frame, especially when comparing these to my previous daily driver, Sennheiser CX 275s.. All in all, at this price, the bullets should serve you well. Audiophiles however, should look elsewhere for better performance.. Edit: If budget and availability permits, I would recommend going for the Wireless Bullets 2. They are far superior in sound quality than the Z.

name: Mamta M.
title: No noise cancellation
content: No noise cancellation, long distance noise sound high wrost headphone

name: shwetank
title: Only advantage is OF BATTER. NOTHING SPECIAL
content: THIS IS THE MOST OVERRATED NECKBAND I'VE EVER USED.. THE ONLY GOOD THING ABOUT THIS IS BATTERY.. POOR HIGH PITCHED SOUND. NORMAL MIC,. NORMAL VOLUME. NOTHING IS SPECIAL.. ITS LIGHT AND SOFT. BOULT CURVE HAS BETTER SOUND THAN THIS.. GO FOR OPPO ENCO M31.. THIS IS ABSOLUTELY WASTE OF MONEY.. REALME BUDS WIRELESS IS BETTER CHOICE IN LESSER PRICE,BASS IS THERE, QUALITY IS THERE ,BATTERY RUNS FOR ABOUT 10 HOURS.. FOR PUBG,ITS WORST 0.5 SEC SOUND LAG

name: JayP
title: Made for one plus lovers 😍
content: Awesome build, connectivity and switch to other device works perfectly.. Bad is ok... definitely not for music lovers , light weight and fast charging. Charged fully in 25 mins through my one plus 7 charger.. you can control all the features in the headphone itself. Long lasting battery life. God in noise cancellation not excellent. Sweat and water proof. Overall good at this price range , made for one plus lovers.. thanks to amazon for fast delivery and the packaging was awesome.. Go for it !!!

name: Shreyansh
title: One Plus Earphone || WFH
content: When i bought this product, i really tried so many times to get this color, finally got.. Packaging, no doubt Premium At this price range.. In starting 1-2 Days i was having issues with connecting laptop, some unwanted sound started happening whenever we do call in skype,teams ... Since for that issue, you can google. Control panel>Sound... Soundwise its good. No much bass. bt very okay wat you can expect.. Battery- Here let me tell you my working journey- 2 Days 9-9 Hrs shift . it will go on without issue... meanwhile if u dont use just off earphone.... Charging with normal charger 40-50Mins.. didnt tried with One plus charger.. Double tap the button, flawlessly if your recently connected device has Bluetooth on, it will connect with very ease even with laptop i have seen also... Overall 5/5...

name: Srijith.
title: Device died in just 2.5 months of moderate use
content: I bought this device on 6th Jan 2021, it died on 12th Feb 2021. It died during a morning video call abruptly, the last sound from it was apparently a screech that only my friend could hear and I couldn't. I didn't know at that time that it had died, thought a recharge was all it needed. Alas, that was the very end of it.. The two months it lasted, it did well. Many a podcast. audiobooks and songs from all genres were heard with it. And hence the 3 star rating for its features. The last few days of listening to Daft Punk and Gorillaz will be the memories I'll keep.. This sad, abrupt and early demise of it has shaken my confidence enough to not consider getting the same OnePlus Bullets or any of their headphones.. I will be reaching their service center to see if anything can be done, maybe a replacement that'd last for longer, hoping the service doesn't fall short just as the product did.

name: Satyam
title: You cannot get anything better than this at this price.
content: Pros:. 1. The sound quality is awesome! The highs are clear.. 2. I don't know why people here were reviewing it to have no bass, well I think the bass is very well balanced. If you have a OnePlus device you won't face any problems with it.. 3. That "switch between two devices with the push of a button" is like the best feature!. 4. Another great feature is the magnetic Power on-off. If you're lazy like me, you'll like it too :P.. 5. Battery life is great! If it's full charged, you can use it for like 2 days (if you use it like 9-10 hours a day). 6. Charging speed is phenomenal! It charges from 0 to 100 in 20 minutes! It's unbelievably fast!. Cons:. 1. Well, it's made in china. ;-;. 2. It's been like a week and to be honest I didn't find anything bad about this! (If I do I'll update this review.. Thanks!

name: Bhavishya Negi
title: Good one from 1+ at this price point, must buy if you are not a music lover
content: These are good but can be better much better. If you are in love with music 🎶 though these are also in the category of bad these are decent but if you more of a music lover go for oppo m31 wireless earphones.. What I feel is this is a good purchase these will serve you very well for work out sessions and runs.. The best thing is connectivity just detach the magnets and it is paired with your phone it can be a one plus device or anyone the connectivity is top notch.. You can pair 3 devices at a time though it does not have a connectivity switch button like the original one but still it does the work.. I am quite happy and relaxed with this purchase the battery backup is awesome listening from 3 days with like 4hrs of use everyday still it is not out of charge.

name: Tarun Soni
title: Awesome, Better then normal Ones
content: Review from an audio enthusiast, Used Sennheisers, AKG's, Audio Technica's for long time.. _______________________. Purchased the bass Edition.. Really great pair of earphones you can buy under 2K right now. (Bass Edition only). They really have improved the sound from their last generation earphones.. Bass has really improved quality wise it's improved, loudness remains the same (Great response from 25HZ - 35HZ). Mids and treble has also improved, less muddy mids now, more crisp and sharp (in a good way) trebles now.. You can hear other instruments too.. so its balanced not just boommyyy or anything with the bass.. Use Equalizer and turn up the low frequencies up, you will be amazed by the bass response.. Go ahead buy the bass edition only, you wont get any good under 2K.Cheers!!

name: Hardik Singh Parmar
title: OnePlus at it's best (cheap thrills)
content: First of all a big thank you to Amazon for delivering the product at this speed, I mean that is so amazing, got the product in 4 days (I live in a very remote area) after placing order, kudos to you guys.. Now talking about the Bullets Wireless Z, I can say it's true OnePlus product, OBWZ (OnePlus Bullet Wireless Z) looks so good, although this time it's all plastic around earbuds unlike metal which we had in OBW 1 and 2, but that makes it lightweight and the price ofcourse.. You can connect them to two sources at a time and can easily switch between them just by pressing the button twice and I was so surprised that it take only 1 or 1.5 seconds in doing so. That is so fantastic for me, as I can listen to music on laptop while working and can switch to my OnePlus 5t for calls.. Sound quality is superb, you'll start to feel all the instruments being played and plus they gets real loud. I received the OBWZ at 80% charged out of the box, and almost used it for 3 hours and they are still at 80%. I've not tested it for battery life yet, but I guess they will do good.. Now coming to the main point where I feel it's lacking a bit is the bass, there is bass but if you are basshead like me and have used sony's XB series than you'll surely feel the difference. But for regular users these will sound just awesome.. So final verdict, affordable, nicely build, IP55 water and sweat resistance, long battery, sounds so good.. Go for it you won't regret. Cheers 🤘🏻 stay safe.

name: Vishnu Rajeev
title: Definitely worth the money, but not the best
content: This review might be long, but it's honest. These are one of the best in ear wireless earphones for the price, out in the market right now. I purchased this for my brother, and later, I got the same earphones for my birthday. I also use a Sony WI-C400 (priced around Rs.3500) and Apple Airpods Pro, and I will be comparing the bullets wireless Z bass edition with these two.. Pros:. 1) This one charges very quickly, especially if you have a OnePlus Warp charger adapter. I use a OnePlus 8 and these earphones charges to a 100% in around 40 mins. The Sony on the other hand takes around 3 hours to get to full charge.. 2) It pairs instantly. As soon as you separate both the earpieces, it pairs with the phone in under 4 seconds. It is similar to what happens with an iPhone and Airpods/Airpods Pro. To pause the music or video, you just have to clip them both together, which also turns off the earphones, thus saving battery.. 3) Very lightweight and comfortable. The earphones weigh just 28 grams, and while wearing them, I don't actually feel it. It also looks good when one wears it. The Sony earphones were heavy and sometimes uncomfortable.. 4) The sound quality is very good. It is actually better than the Sony in terms of clarity and loudness. I rarely have to raise the volume to 50%. The bass is decent; I wouldn't say it's great, even with the bass edition. But considering the price, the bass is pretty good.. 5) IP55 water resistance means that I can use these earphones while working out or when I go out cycling.. Cons:-. 1) It has a noticeable amount of latency. Even though OnePlus advertises low latency of 100ms, you can actually feel the latency while watching videos or listening to music. The Sony WI-C400 is way better in terms of latency; it's almost non existent.. 2) While playing games and listening to music at the same time, the music seems to break every now and then. This did not happen with the Sony WI-C400, and this irritates me every time.. Final verdict: If your budget is around 2000-2500, then don't look for anything more, buy the OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition. If you are willing to spend more, then I would suggest you go for Sony. I have been a long time Sony user, and all Sony earphones I have used has lasted at least 3 years for me. Sony earphones are made in Vietnam, while OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition is made in China. For me, only time will tell how durable this earphone is, but I'll surely be updating this review is anything goes wrong.

name: Yash Sharma
title: AMAZING AT THIS PRICE POINT
content: Excellent Earphone for one plus users.And low latency mode for one plus user on fanatic mode works really great very negligible sound dely.Bass Is Ok,But vocals and sound balance is Excellent.. Battery Life Is Just Amazing No words abaout Battery life. People think it has 9.2MM driver but the optimization of driver is really great. And I think So For Thi price Point It Is Just Amazing and No One Is there to Compete. Yeah I have Just Tested it on my one plus 7Pro but for other device i dont Know hot it performs.But For One plus user just dont wait and Grab it

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome product
content: Its Awesome product. it is feature packed headphone. it has some great features like ease to switch between 2 devices by just click of button, magnetic power control, full charge indicator and super fast charging. battery back up is as mentioned of 20 hours and 10 mins charge gives 10 hour battery life to device. noise cancellation feature is also pretty good. sound quality is ok since u get same kind of sound quality in ₹1000 headphones of boat. i guess high price is for more features. but if u just want headphones with good sound quality and if u r ready to compromise with some features then boat can be good headphone.

name: Sam
title: It's a awesome headphone 🎧
content: I'm brought this Rs 2000/- from here....I really love this headphone 🎧...I'm a totally music 🎶 eater 😆 I eat too much music 🎶 everyday.... Honesty this is a very good product.... I have many headphones but in this price range this is a grate product.... Sound 🔊 quality is too good...crispy clare....bass overall best.... Clarity but one thing....if u ra bass lover it's don't disappointed u but don't accept bass like Sony... BOSS....In this price range awesome 👌 product..... Lastly, if u r buying. this headphone 🎧 u will love it.....specially it's battery 🔋 life....

name: Jagath C.C
title: Excellent product. Bass not a problem
content: Its a very good product. Have been using for a year now. The device switching feature is awesome. Sound quality is good. I heard many people say it has no bass. But in my opinion it has enough bass not extra bass. if u love only bass and bass heavy songs may be not for you. But if u like all kinds of songs like melody and like to experience the vocals mids and highs this is perfect can't ask for more... Didn't measure the battery life it could be 20 hrs its lasts for ever i even forget that i have to charge it sometimes. And in case the battery does run low just a few mins of charge will be enough for a few hours.

name: Abhinav Gupta
title: BEST BASS AND NOISE CANCELLATION! AWESOME EARPHONES UNDER 2K!
content: First of all i thought it was specifically for OnePlus products only. Somehow taking risks, i ordered it as i needed one badly as lock-down minimized. JUST PERFECT i must say, fits perfectly into the ears, gets fully charged in 10 mins, amazing sound quality, noise cancellation and the BASS EFFECT is heart-throbbing. Very sleek design, flexible material, too light weight & comfy (one cannot feel it on their ears or on neck). Thank you Amazon and One Plus for such quickest delivery & awesome product. No doubt one of the best earphones ever used. JUST GO FOR IT BLINDLY!!!

name: Dilip Kumar
title: Worst connectivity ever
content: Am writing this review at 4 in the morning. I am listening to songs on my galaxy A51. From 1 am till now I didn't hear one single song without connection interruptions. I got so frustrated with this product. Please don't buy one plus. Its connection is horrible. You will be frustrated and throw the headset. Go for Sony. Nothing can beat Sony even if the bass quality is less. Connection is important. Don't make a mistake in buying this. Please request you not to waste your time in reading reviews also.

name: Anoop Mathai Mathew
title: Honest Review after First 10 days of use!
content: Would give it 4 stars. Gives good battery and sound quality beyond my expectations. Bass is also good (not as good as audophile grade headphones). Charging time is also very less. It looks good and feels good to wear/use at both office/work. I even listen to music and sleep with it! Battery lasts entire day on 70% volume as advertised.. Only Con perhaps would be that the rubber neckband area can get a bit sticky if you tend to sweat or workout a lot, so keep that in mind.

name: N. Shah
title: Excellent quality... Best in class
content: Must go for it if wnat to use for office purpose.... Very good battery backup. Comfortable and good sound quality. Only missing bass (no matter for me). Light weight and ease on neck.. as it very less in bulck.. Realiable brand using with OnePlus mobile as well with Resmi MI A1. No issue of connectivity or swich over between devices.. one touch change over

name: Shiv Sharma
title: Awesome Purchased.
content: It is very nice neckband Headphone.. PROS. Sound :It has very loud voice. You can't listen songs in Full Volume. I am listening in 60 Percent.. Bass : Super Bass. Who loves bass then go for it.. Voice Clarity : Very Nice even with high bass.. Looks : Very nice looks.. Mic : Other side people can clearly listen the voice. It has Better mic than earlier edition.. CONS. Bluetooth Switch is not with there but that is not important feature as of now.. At the end i am happy with bass edition. But listen at low volume. Because in full volume you can listen.

name: Chandan B Shenoy
title: Don't have a second thought before purchasing this!
content: One of the best earphones in this segment. Type c. Fast charging. Upto 10-12 hours on-time. This doesn't feel that comfortable on longer run but have to say the rubber quality used is top notch..... Magnetic play pause system work real smooth (takes hardly two to three seconds to connect and disconnect). Microphone is okish unless you don't have much disturbed surrounding.

name: Kaivalya Ghongde
title: It's simply amazing
content: First thing is, it's comes with very nice and impressive packaging.. Earlier i was using JBL 110 BT, Boat wired earphones, but i would really like to say this one is the best one in this range BT in-ear headphones.. I really refer this to them, who really like top class music.. It has balanced bass, treble and very Swift sound. No out side noise audible as it has good in noice cancellation.. Very quickly connect.. Clear on call voice at both side. No disturbance at all.. I am using it with my Samsung Galaxy M31 and also with Vivo V5S.. Before ordering this i saw many of technical guru reviews on youtube and most of the review say's it doesn't have much bass, but as per my music listening experience, this one has the very polite and superb sound.. Everything is perfect. No extra cheap bass and gives the good bass experience as and when it is required while listening music or watching movies or online seriese.. If you are thinking to buy it, then please order it immediately and avoid cheap other brands 👍

name: Abu a.
title: amazing quality of sound
content: Overall the product is amazing awesome sound quality light weight no difficulty in wearing it for hours been a companion since the day i bought it and for the 2000 rupees price it actually outruns most of the 5-7k earphones out there. bass is on the lower side if that's what you have in mind go for the bullet wireless 2. and the way it connects to your phone is so fast it connects with in 2-3 secs of separating the earbuds. one charge lasts for a days continues use. the charging speed is very fast 10 mins gives you around 80% of charge and it can go for continues 10 hrs of usage. sound is loud. overall if you don't too much bass from your earphone just go for it. i personally loved the experience the one plus z had to offer

name: Samya S.
title: NOT GETTING CONNECTED TO LAPTOP
content: Today I received the earphones. They are good in sound quality and a good product if just used for smartphones. However, in spite of trying a lot to connect it to my laptop, I couldn't do it. During this pandemic, I usually have to work on laptops and have to attend a lot of online calls. So, connecting to a laptop is one of the most important priorities when I was searching for earphones. I thought the quick switch specs of One Plus Bullets would be incredibly handy for my work.. Unfortunately, the headset is remaining as an unspecified device on the laptop. I tried with different laptops and everything is the same. It is not detected as an audio device. It is really frustrating and I have no option other than returning it although the product looks great.

name: Gaurav
title: "Just go for it"
content: Simply four words at first glance.. "Just go for it"... without any hesitation... After using Razor headphones for gaming..Used JBL T500BT, Sony Extrabass for almost 4k price this one rocks in sound balancing department.. I am also a Bass lover.. And I feel good about it.. 90% satisfaction in bass quality.. mid level and highs are excellent.. Used with my OnePlus 7T.. found it a hefty deal under 2k .. Don't look for reviews in YouTube for bad bass non sense.. Try yourself .. You won't feel down... For super bass lover.. u have other choices.. can try seinheiser in 4k range... Tried one once and love that for endurance..will update my review after more usage

name: Neha
title: Sounds like you're using a lofi filter
content: Terrible midranges, too sharp trebles and too loud bass. Definitely not a fan of the sound. Using it with a OnePlus phone is easy though and there's a battery indicator. Will be using for audiobooks and calls primarily but using this for music is out of the question. Especially if you've used better quality headphones before and know what your music should sound like.. Edit: After using these all day - Good call quality, amazing battery life. Good enough for what I bought it for, though the sound quality is still a major disappointment. I haven't tried any other wireless earphones at this price range though, so maybe it's standard for a 2k wireless?

name: Rahul
title: Nice headphone at this price segment.
content: Build quality is good, though the ear buds are of plastic and very light.. Bass is very low if u r a bass lover than this is not for you.. Battery backup is very nice and i really liked the wrap charging technology which will charge within an hour.. Sound is balanced and if i talk about call quality i am really satisfied by it and also noice cancellation is quite good.. I am using it for calling and i am really satisfied with it as it gives nice battery backup and pretty good noice cancellation.. My conclusion is, at this price it offers almost everything u want.

name: Amit Aradhya
title: Not Really Happy With this Oneplus Headphone
content: I purchased this headphone just 1 month back because I already have OnePlus 7T and to make it more compatible, I went ahead for this Oneplus headphone .. For first 25 days it worked very well without any problems.. But now the performance is completely down. I am facing below issues.. 1. It disconnects automatically when switched on but not in use.. 2. After successful connection as well, when I get call, I can not hear anything in the headphone and I have to receive call on phone speaker.. 3. But if I reconnect it in middle of call then it starts with audio in headphone.. 4. Next person always get the disturbance on both the calls (normal and whatsapp call) and can not hear me properly.. 5. In middle of call it disconnect and reconnect after around 1 min, So I have to switch my phone output from Bluetooth to normal phone speaker and I am missing miss the conversation within that time period.. I am very disappointed with this Oneplus Bluetooth headset. Even now I cannot return the product as return policy period is only for 7 days which is over.😔😕😒

name: Sharon
title: Please Read
content: Stopped working in a months time. This is continuous white light displaying issue that most of them are facing.. *Edit : sent an email to one plus regarding the earphones not working. They responded promptly.. Told me to download the one plus care app from Google Play Store and put a request for the earphones to be picked up free of cost by a courier service. They sent to the nearest one Plus service center.. Within 2 days I got a brand new earphones sent to me absolutely free of cost through the same courier service.. Really appreciate the service provided by one plus.. I'll always vouch for one plus.. The 3 stars are given for the 1st experience I had with the earphones.

name: Sandeep
title: Superb
content: After using 3 month . It's mic got some problem. When I consulted one plus service at mysore they gave great service support. They checked and after 20 minutes they provided me a new box piece one plus headphone which I have got great service support from one plus headphone. Thank u Asian telecom service center mysore for gret service and also thank one plus for great support for the customer. I have recommend all my relative this headphone.. And now myself I have order three headphone to my family

name: Chanda Ramakrishna Reddy
title: I could not be happier without this
content: Frankly speaking my life has been changed since I brought these one plus earphones.what an amazing product.thanks to amazon and one plus. I have been trying to dry out the battery power out of it.still 80 percentage battery left after vigorous usage. Packing is extraordinary. Quality of material is superb.quick switch is an awesome feature it made my life easier to switch between laptop and mobile. Overall once again I bow to one plus and Amazon.

name: Nikhil Yadav
title: Good sound latency not good
content: Value for money sound quality 5 star bass was kind of okay 4 star the only thing I hated was the low latency which OnePlus claimed was not true for me. They claimed to have latency of 100-120ms and even lower for OnePlus devices with fnatic mode but i got 300ms latency even when i was using OnePlus device which was even higher than boat Rockerz 255 which i bought 2 years before it for a lot cheaper cost of 1000₹. I have claimed for refund will most likely buy again as hopefully it was a particular piece issue and would be fixed with other one which i will buy again.

name: Sampreeth
title: Really great wireless earphones - dual connectivity
content: Pros:. 1) Dual connectivity - connect to two devices at a time and switch between them at the click of a button. Seamlessly connects and switches from your phone to laptop and viceversa.. 2) Good battery life. 3) good sound quality and noice cancellation. 4) Comes with 3 sizes of earplugs - small, medium, large. Fits nicely in the ear. 5) Value for money. Not many Cons - I find the earplug drop/ slide from my left ear. Not always but around 50% of the time.

name: Ramanjot Singh
title: Astonished with the product ! Worth the price. (bass edition)
content: purchased it on 19 october 2020 , got it delivered on 25 october 2020 (as promised by amazon).. I have used it extensively for these 3-4 days and charged it once till now. (got it with 90% charge). based on the usage of this time frame. PROS-. 1. Adequate bass (youtube and inbuilt mi music player), superb bass with any equaliser (i used spotify). 2. connection is seamless.. but sometimes gets disconnected automatically ,, but very rare,, all i do all day is connect and disconnect so may be thats why it happens (once in 50 times ). 3. magnetic on off works perfect. 4. Battery life is magnificent , can last the whole day in most extensive usage. 5. Music quality is above par at full volume and full bass.. 6 call quality is too good , person on other side can hear properly without knowing that u r using any bluetooth device. 7. bluetooth range is 15-20m. , can place your phone in center of your house and will catch signals wherever you go in house. CONS:. 1. feels delicate , may break with little force (may , as i have not tried to break), so use carefully. 2. due to magnetic buds ,, size is too big ,, difficult to use more than 2 hours straight. 3. it looks so stylish and attractive ,so people may borrow most times ,lol :P

name: Muqthar Ahmed
title: Bang for buck!
content: What a delightful pair of earphones! Sound has plenty of energy, bass is nice, mids are pronounced, highs are sharp but not painful. And they pair with Oneplus phones like a charm. Build quality is top notch too! You could trust it to last for years. Battery life is excellent, you may need to charge it once in a week with moderate usage. You wont notice the lack of Aptx support unless you have ears of an audiophile. The competitors at this price range either fails you with poor battery life or fragile build quality. I am looking at you Oppo

name: Anis Emmanuel
title: Great quality 👌👍
content: Received the product today and one thing i must say the packaging of the one plus is just awesome. Sound quality is not great but good. Crisp and clear sound. Bass is average. If i would have to rate then i would give 4 out of 5. Pairing is just so simple. Magnetic control does the pairing very smoothly but that i guess only with one plus devices.

name: Shyam Sunder P K
title: Great battery life and Bluetooth range balanced sound experience
content: Great wiress earphone for the price range.. Highlight of the product is its battery capacity and connectivity.. Better Bluetooth range compared to the ones I used previously. The dual switching button is of great help especially if you are working on a laptop and using smart phone for ..I was able to switch easily between to for my calls on smartphone and laptop. Balanced sound quality will provide gud experience even if used for longer durations.. The quality of wire connecting the earphone could have been better. The neckband quality is excellent.

name: Santosh Kuwar
title: Mic Issues
content: The first unit I bought was having sound imbalance hence I replaced it and got a new one. Everything was going good for first 5-6 days then all of sudden mic issue started and the person on the other side was not able to hear my voice at all. I tried calling on different numbers with different phones just to confirm that the issue is with the headphones or my mobile but after testing it for a day it was clear that the headphones are having the problem. Even tried reaching OnePlus customer support to understand the problem but was not able to connect. Meanwhile I went to OnePlus customer forum and saw similar complaints from many users hence I made my mind to return the product and get the refund. I never expected OnePlus to bring such cheap quality earphones. I regret buying this product. Highly Disappointed !!

name: venugopal
title: hmm......i'm in a Conundrum
content: first of all, I've been using this for about 2 weeks now.. *the bass is of above average, it could have been better. *the sound quality is good, we can clearly differentiate the instruments. *the build quality is also good.. note-: there is a small problem with the mic because the audio that I sent is not audible, sometimes it's inaudible. and it's not clear while making calls.. After using it for a month. This mic has some issues (not audible even when volume is increased) while sending audio in WhatsApp, maybe a software update can make it good

name: Amazon Customer
title: No warranty card, no branding inside, i think it's fake
content: The product did not come with a warranty card inside, i did not receive an invoice and the 'never settle' branding that's supposed to be there inside the box is missing, the product does not look original due to these all issues and even after one replacement i received the same product...i geberated a refund on this item. It's better to buy this from Oneplus official website rather than here as the proces are same but quality is guaranteed

name: Siddharth bhaiji
title: Awesome budget earphones, that ticks all the basic requirements!
content: Here are list of pros and cons which I feel.. Pros:. 1. Battery backup - It can easily last 3 days with lots of calls.. 2. Connectivity - Range is good. You can easily walk around and just talk without taking your phone.. 3. Device switching - There is a dedicated button. We can tap the button to switch from a device to another device. It really does help when you work on a laptop and have to take calls in phone frequently.. 4. Mic - I'm impressed with the mic. It is really good. 2nd party never complains about my voice even when I'm sitting next to cooler.. 5. Sound quality - Sound quality is decent enough if you are switching from average earphones. Bass is nice but not too much. Some people like, some don't.. 6. Comfort - These earphones are very comfortable. I wear them all the time during my work. Also excluding the earbuds which comes assembled in the earphones, 3 earbuds are aslo included of different sizes.. Cons:. 1. Sometimes, when switching from Android MacOS, I need to reconnect it. But this very few times.. 2. Buttons are not very tactile. These are hard to press especially when you are not use to them.. 3. Build quality could have been better, but for the price, I think it's decent.. Conclusion: If you want a wireless earphones for office purposes, then these are must. Comfort, Call quality and mic, everything is great. If you are not a critic, you would love the sound signature also. And for the price these are mind-blowing.

name: Subhrajit pal
title: OnePlus says Never Settle but i'll settle with this ☺️
content: In one word Satisfaction. Probably the best package in 2k. The packaging and product quality is at OnePlus level.thats enough. I have shifted from realme buds 2 wired earphones and i have used earphones like sennheiser cx 180 street 2,audio techinica clr 100.and after these earphones i am rating bulltes wireless z. Bass -8.5/10(perfectly balanced as to my taste not for bassheads). Mids and vocals-9/10. Highs -9/10. Audio stage-9.5/10. Microphone-10/10. Build - 8.5/10. Battery -10/10. comfort-9.5/10. .. A complete Go Go from me 👍

name: Priya S Patil
title: Robust Bluetooth Connectivity with excellent music quality
content: I have been using it for more than a week now & I found this wireless earphones life saving.. Super fast connectivity with my new OP8 Pro.. No lag in PUBG sounds. Super coverage. Almost 6 meters area covered which consists of walls.. No distortion in sound.. No lack of sound quality even at the edge of the coverage area.. Best battery life, lasts around 3 days after I unboxing. With regular calls & series binge watching.. 100% charged when unboxed.. Took around 30 minutes with my 30T WARP charger.

name: Jaya
title: Disappointed
content: Bluetooth connectivity is excellent, but sound is poor, no match with a Philips wired 200 Rs head set in sound quality, there is no bass quality at all even at max volume, terrible sound , expected a good quality sound, looking at the price they charging,. 10 min charging is just saying it takes more than half an hour to one hour to charge battery 🔋. If battery lasts ,good let time to prove, other wise looks are just like those 300,400 priced head sets

name: Lathish pillai
title: Music is not only about bass .....there are other factors tooooo
