content: one-plus has maintained its built quality.look wise also pretty cool.Really comfortable to wear.inbuilt microphone is superior than any other model available at this price .bluetooth connectivity is also pretty good.now for music lover who focus on bass it might dissapoint you( not very much),but in mid tone and high tone it will never ever disappoint you.instrument sounds are clearly reproduced .fast charging and battery life makes it unique among other in market.people focusing on music only can go for realme neck band for 200 rs less or else go for bullet wireless z it is never going to dissapoint you.for me i received what i was waiting for........

name: komato
title: Except for some easily avoidable mistakes, an excellent headset
content: Over a month of use.. Excellent headset. Very clear vocals, pleasant listening experience for various music genres. Bass is not heavy, rather very nice. Clear voice and receiver of conversations have nothing to complain.. Haven't had connectivity issues so far.. Dislike 1: However, whenever connected with two devices (note: is not in parallel. It's either one at a time, and the switch is to disable one connection and enable the second. This is reasonably quick though), if the last device was say device X, and I turn off and turn on and device x is unavailable before turning on again, there is a sharp beep sound which is abnormally high and shrill which is very unpleasant.. Dislike 2: in the above situation, the quick switch does not seem to switch to the second device. I've noticed that I need to manually connect in the phone again. There is some pattern which I've not spent too much time trying to find, but it's there.

name: Praneet Kumar Singh
title: Another reason of being ONE PLUS FAN!
content: I am using One plus phones since 2 years now. They perform the same today as they did on Day 1. One Plus is THE BEST (Not bragging like iPhone users). However, before buying I was dicy about the earphones at first. But now after using it more than a month. I can proudly say, One plus never disappoints.. Reasons why I say so -. 1. The battery backup is SUPER AWESOME 🤩😊 A single full charge (About 20-25 mins) and 2 days continuous usage day and night (Including movies, music and videos.. 2. Bass is not the best but I can say it is pretty decent.. 3. Fitting in ears was problematic in starting. Now I think my ears adjusted according to them 😂 Now without any issue they gets into the ear and stays there. I binge my favourites even by lying in different angles. This is what I needed the most. 😜. 4. THE BEST REASON - No need to switch them OFF and ON again and again. Just stick the magnets of both earbuds together when not in use and they goes OFF. Separate them and they get ON and automatically connected to your device without selecting them again on your phone. This happens on my One Plus phones. Not sure if this feature is for other phones too.. 5. Another SUPER COOL feature which I never saw before in any headset - If you have connected them with Laptop and then you connect them to your phone. You can very easily switch connection just by pressing the circular button. This is very helpful while you are in a meeting and suddenly need to switch between laptop and phone instantly.. Overall, I can say in this price range, this is definitely a PRO!. GO FOR IT Dude. 🧡

name: Rahul
title: Not as good as JBL.
content: Bass is ok,battery is excellent,calling with mic is very good,not as good as JBL earphones.I have used before many earphones like- sony,samsung level,realme,sennheiser.. non of these are as good as JBL earphones..JBL earphones have great low latency,superb for pubg, and a very pleasant sound ,so that's my point of view.

name: Umesh Janardhanan
title: For the price, great earphones.
content: New to wireless earphones, but I do have quite a few studio grade earphones, headphones and speakers to compare the sound to. My use case is earphones for walks/runs. I don't need good bluetooth range, since my paired device (phone) is always nearby. I also didn't need studio grade sound profile, just something pleasant to the ears. I use an iPhone, and all button functionality work fine.. Pros:. - Great Form Design, batteries are on either side, keeps the headphones in place, balanced around your neck.. - Two device pairing and quick switch (Great feature, don't need it personally though). - Ear bud options in case. Earphones stay in place, and comfortable for 4-5 hours of continuous use.. - (So far) Battery life has been good, used for hours and not a lot of drain. - Mic/Call Quality was surprisingly very good.. - Price. Definitely value for money.. Cons:. - Sound profile, treble high & not enjoyable out of the box. I use Spotify, and had to up the lows on the equalizer to get something pleasant. But having done that, if your use case is just a pair of exercise earphones, sound profile is ok. Not suitable for home movie/music listening.. - Biggest ear bud gives the best sound profile/bass response, but they might not really fit for most people.. - Ridiculously short charging cable. 15cm or so!. - The volume buttons are a stiff, not very easy to press.

name: 29yr old -MH customer
title: Value for money-Superlong-Fast charge battery
content: Advantages::. -Great value for money product. -super long battery(get atleast >8 hours, atleast 2 days on moderate usage). -Quick charging. Cons::. -No water protection(even charging port is always open, no lid). -Very long uncomfortable wire(reaches almost until stomach). --no off button, earbuds must remain attached to eachother for keeping it off.( Can't even keep it entangled around ears when not in use). -At first it doesn't seem like "moisture wicking" ,. ---uncomfortable to wear on bare sweaty skin.(could be easily put around t shirt-collar)

name: Customer
title: Good Wireless Headphones
content: The headsets work well and easy to setup. Quick switch button allows to use with two devices at the same time. Can be used with a laptop for Microsoft Teams/Zoom/Jio Meet calls as well as with Smartphone for all calls, videos and music. However keep in mind if you intend to use with laptop, the drivers on the laptop need to be updated otherwise laptop will not recognise the mic, i.e. It will work only as speakers and not as a headset.

name: suyog bangad
title: For office use - Go grab it!!
content: Battery: Very good battery. Quick 10 min charge, will last you for day.. Connectivity & mic: I am using it for office calls and I am satisfied with it. Just bought one more for brother too for his office calls.. Double click on button auto switches between two devices. Very nice functionality. It gets slow after some time. But its ok. Can live with it.. Build Quality: Its awesome. Been using it to distract my young toddler while feeding. ;) He smashes it here n there and its still good. So thumbs up for it. Bass: Bass is not that great. If you want to hear music for workout or something, than its not for you.. Fitting: It perfectly fits in your ears. And doesn't slips.. Price point: I bought it for 2k 2 months back. Even in BBD sale, its priced at 2k. It may look 500 or 700 bucks extra than other products like Realme or boat, but few extra bucks gives you a quality product. So don't worry about it.. Just go for it.

name: Biswadeep D.
title: BEST under 2k. Hands Down..
content: I have been using this since June 9 and it has been my music/calls companion in every step of the way. Sound Quality - Very Good. Noise Cancellation is passive and good. Not like a Bose WCII or Sony high-ends but it's better than Boat Rockerz. Bass is so-so, Sony beats it to it. Perfect for Music listening and 3rd person shooter games. No latency as advertised. OnePlus device has a special low-latency mode which even enhances its basic mode. Overall, a good product to invest on, keeping aside all our nationalism sentiments. Kudos! :)

name: Rajkumar
title: Vangalam avlo than sola mudiyum
content: Sound quality good ,bass normal, magnetic play pause future supporting. I m a 1+ user

name: Aditya Biswas
title: MIND BLOWING SOUND QUALITY
content: AFTER 6 MONTHS REVIEW. this new reverb red version has more improved sound quality than normal bullets earphones...nice battery backup ..almost 14.6 hours at 100% volume..and 17 hours at 60% volume ...build quality is also awesome in this ..made by really good quality plastic material ..bass is awesome and the most important thing is this is ..at 100%volume there is no sound lag os no destortion .... IMPORTANT ..-THIS DEVICE IS NOT FOR PUBG PLAYERS ...IN PUBG OR IN ANY KIND OF SHOOTING MOBILE GAME...THERE IS HEAVY SOUND LAG ..IN PUBG SHOOTING SOUND GO TO YOUR EAR AFTER ALMOST 0.5 SEC AFTER YOU SHOOT ..SO ITS NOT FOR GAMERS ... OTHERWISE FOR VIDEO STREAMING ,WATCHING MOVIE OR LISTENING SONGS ITS A BEAST🔥🔥🔥🔥 ... SO IF YOU ARE A SONG LOVER JUST GO FOR IT. THANKS ❤️

name: Syed Tahir
title: Use this oly if u using ONE+ mobile, for other mobile it work just like 200Rs Headphone
content: 1st thing i purchased after seeing the reviews, after using this i came to know it has normal output same output i found in 200Rs headphones.. Use this oly if u using ONE+ mobile, for other mobile it work just like 200Rs Headphone.. No doubt battery is good, flexible next band,. but No Base, just a loud sound volume, i tried on Samsung, Nokia, Redme, Vivo and oppo same effect. Yes it works awesome on ONE+ mobiles.. FM wont work, When using PUBG mic setting wont work.

name: DM
title: Goot.
content: Not an audiophile, so don't know all the fancy terms. However the sound quality is richer than an IEM like KZ ZSTX Pro. Much much better and just all around more crisp. Connect speed is good. Charges pretty fast. Longevity is not an issue, it works for a long time, around 15 hours on full charge. Range is average. Gets disconnected if you leave your device circa 10 meters behind and the signal transmission gets obstructed if you're in a windy spot, idk if the wind is at play here but this I have observed. Go for em, pretty decent choice.

name: Subham Satapathy
title: ONEPLUS BULLETS WIRELESS Z BASS EDITION
content: A great deal i must say.I have ordered the one plus wireless bullets z bass edition on the day after it was lunched blindly trusting on the brand "ONE PLUS" and have to say it's worth it.. After using it for 2 days,i have some pros and cons.. --Pros--. 1)Great emerging sound quality especially bass as mentioned.. Bass will bring a smile on your face when you listen it for first time.. 2)Great build quality.. 3)Light weight.. 4) Stable Connection.. 5)Lower latency than previous version.. 6) Position of Mic on the band is not problematic at all.. --CONS--. 1)Having no device switch key and also the feature is missing.. 2)Battery life is lesser than previous version.. #GO FOR IT.

name: Ashish Negi
title: Awesome and best under 2k
content: Its super cool and awesome...till now i ordered 3 headsets in mtt family... Its good with lot of best features and in budget.. The only thing i think OnePlus should avoid is, instead of wasting money in packaging on headset, OnePlus can add one more feature in Product or can increase quality... Too much wastage on packaging which is only 1 time after that...its totat waste, no one is making packagit in hall of frame

name: Nikunj Dhameliya
title: Best product by one plus
content: One of the best product i have ever seen.. When it comes to music, each and every beat does matter. This product fulfilled all the criterias.. Long lasting battery backup with fast charging.. Also compatible with different laptops and mobile devices.. Same sound quality across all the devices.

name: VISHAL KUMAR TIWARI
title: Great bass, awesome sound quality and great battery backup go for it
content: This earphone is great in bass quality and battery backup but noise cancellation is very poor all over after one month the right side of my earphone just stopped working i have given to service center for replacement now i got new one so it is working good all over battery backup and the bass of the earphone is very good sound quality is excellent but noise cancellation is poor and yes again i don't know why my right side of earphone stopped working when i visited to service center with same issue 3 people already there so i think this is technically fault but i got replacement so working fine. Thumbsup to this earphone👍

name: krishnasai
title: i am DEAF 😂 fore a second in mid night
content: I got this product on june 24 from that day to till sep 12 the product is good like comfortable in everything but today at this time its like around 23 30 all of a sudden my right ear got deaf 😂 i thought this is my last day 🤣 i am using these earphones like any thing i thought my ears are gone deaf by god 🙏 grase all set okay that was my earphones time god i dont know why one speaker was not working the sound is a lot less like volume 4 or 5 after hard reseating them also it was like that and next it does misses a key feacher called google activation beep we need to hold the pause button and count 1 2 3 then it activates and this is with me happining in terms built quality and product packaging and life of materiales are good it worth buying even i got deaf 😂 of a second i recomend this bass is average it never be hard to your ears it is the only one earphones so gentle towards ears in this price point

name: Bob Barney
title: Good, but now for Windows 10
content: Generally a nice earphone for the money. The sound is acceptable. Noise cancellation is fair. Comfortable fit. The earphones pair and connect well with my android, both speakers and microphone work fine.. With Windows 10, it is terrible. I've spent hours trying to get the microphone to work. No luck. Getting the speakers to work if switching between devices means having to get into the control panel and manually enable and disable devices. Similar posts are found in various sites. Pairing and connecting with Windows 10 is cumbersome and it seems never ending.

name: Khushboo yadav
title: Genuine review after 1 month heavy use
content: When am finding the best wireless within the price range of 3000 i checkout realme buds q , realme neckband , oppo neckband , boats wireless earphone nd oneplus z nd after 1 week i decided to buy oneplus z after checking each nd every details of neckbnds. Those who r complaining abt bass of the earphones here am telling u the hacks go in equalizer nd full the bass surely u will get good bass as u wnt. Here am uploading the picture of bass hack. Nd if we talk abt its battery life i said these r really beast in battery. I hve daily average of 5 hr and am using it for a month nd hardly chrge 5 to 6 tym only. With charger of 10 watt i get full battery within 15 to 20 min only. So go for it md try to buy oat nd mint colour bcz they look morr attractive nd cool rather then blue nd black.. Thankuhh go for it without any hesitation.

name: Meet Dodeja
title: Awesome!
content: I’ve been using these bullets for 1 month now. The things I’ve noticed... just amazing! Well, if we talk about the specs this product comes with, there is no doubt it’s all correct! I especially like the battery life of these earphones. I sometimes go more than a week without charging and it’s just an awesome experience overall! Well, the sound quality is really soothing. There is one flaw that drags me behind from having a complete experience... it’s the comfort. If you’ve used one of those EarPods provided with an iPhone, you’ll experience a very strong discomfort while using these earphones. The eartips of the bullets are quite uncomfortable for a long term usage. Still, I’d say if you are experienced with using that specific type of eartips you’ll be just fine. If anyone asked me to rate this product out of 10 I’d give it like a 8.5/10.

name: Viraj V.
title: NO Nonsense buy for Oneplus owners
content: I'm using OP7T and with the new firmware update, the Dolby support is providing really crisp sound quality. The bass is there, not thumping but it's good for daily commute and casual listening. Love the battery life and charging speed. I used the provided cable and attached it to a standard USB charger and it charges the whole thing from 0 to 100 under an hour and life is approx 18 hours and wholly depends on your usage.. Normal videos don't have any latency and I don't have inclination to gaming so can't comment.. All in all, its a good bang for my buck and it's goes well with my OnePlus 7T.

name: Paul
title: Awesome product from Oneplus 👌👌
content: Its cheaper than expected by me. Guys if u have 2000 rupees and have a plan to purchase a wireless bluetooth headset. Buy it now if have the money and plan then go purchase it now. It has low latency mode i.e . Its perfect for playing games such as pubg or free fire. The bass is just amazing. Sound is just mind blowing. It's design is awesome. It can be used while doing exercise. It even has magnetic ends which makes the earbuds stick together and when it's seperated the bluetooth gets on and when it's made stick together the bluetooth disconnects. Once it's paired in the starting it's very easy. Bcoz if the bluetooth in the phone which was paired earlier and the magnetic earbuds are seperated they get connected automatically. It best suits with the latest one plus phones. All the phones can be connected but more features such as bass,sound and low latency mode can be seen .. It's worth the price

name: Reuben Robert
title: Lasted for a month
content: It lasted for a month, yeah you read that right.. One night as music was playing the music stopped coming to the left side. Pretty sure it's a loose connection, but still ! 2k for this is worth it if you consider what you get.. Sound quality, passive noise cancellation, low bass.. All the above are top notch. The build quality is top too. Materials used are fairly high quality.. I guess I got a defective product. Will have to go to the store to see if they would replace. If they do, I'll let you know.. If they don't replace, i don't think I would recommend it. Sennheiser provides replacement for their earphones which have loose connection.. TBH this is the last time I'm buying any headphones or earphones with wires on it.

name: Sohail
title: Amazing earphones
content: I've been using OnePlus for a long time and I've bought the 5,6,7T and I'm forever a OnePlus fan. So I'll leave an honest review about the wireless Z. The earphones are amazing with enough bass and the quality is amazing. I was a bit sceptical about the earphones but I wanted to give it a try and it's really good for the 2k.

name: VAMSI
title: Best BT neck band in most segments
content: Everything is awesome about these earphones.. 1. Battery was coming around 16-18 hrs. 2. Quick charge. 3. Double tap to switch between paired devices- trust me this feature is very handy. 4. Vocals, sound quality and sound separation was very good. 5. Magnetic buds that disconnect automatically- reduced the hassle of switching the headset on/off manually. Cons:. The only thing that i dislike about this product is the lack of punchy bass. Bass is low.

name: Jatin ✔️
title: PLEASE READ BEFORE BUY!!!
content: I'm posting this review after 1 month of purchase and use them and I want to say that. They charge with normal 18w charger in 50 minutes.. the claim of 10minute charge get 10 hours playback is fail for non OnePlus user.. they claim 18 hours of backup you get 17-18 hours on less than 70% volume.. Bass is not high but you enjoy them for long hours of uses.(I don't like high bass for long time). Pairing is very good for non OnePlus users also, fast switch function is working fine.. Low latency is not good for gaming even you have OnePlus device they reduce the latency but still have latency.. Build quality is ok but the quality of wire is bad they may get break easily as I guess!. Over-all is you can buy.

name: Ritesh
title: Major issues with call quality. Not for bass lovers.
content: Good battery life. If you're bass lover, stay away from this earphones.. Major issue is with call quality. No one has ever written a single word on that. The other person hears a lot of background noise and if you're in traffic, person on the other end will not be able to hear you due to high noise from the surroundings. Not sure what is the technical term to define this but the thing is, background noise is higher than the user's voice.

name: Rahul
title: Found issue while listening to music
content: I purchased this product 5 months back. I will describe my whole experience about this One plus.. No doubt, this product is durable in term of material they used however intermediately I feel some audio breaking experience while listening music. That:'s the temporary case I found. After sometime this is auto fix. We can't listen music on that particular time period. It's very annoying . I use to just turn it off and turn back on after few minutes. I use to play games and watch videos on YouTube and even take a call from my one plus earphone.i only face an issue with the music. I thought that this is an issue with the wink music app. But I tried multiple music apps. Having the same kind of issue. I think I need to change the earphone as this is in Warrenty.

name: GSB
title: Fantastic value for money!
content: This is a 3 day usage review. My old bluetooth headset was giving me problems and so I was looking for a new one. I use a op5 and so was keen to evaluate the newly released bullets wireless z and so ordered it.. Summary: I think it's totally worth it. As I wfh, I was looking for a hands-free headset which I could use with phone n pc(teams). The battery life is great but the connect function is just awesome. I have tried connecting it to my laptop and my TV. It connects quickly to the new device n the mic quality is quite good. In my opinion, these (long battery life and connect feature) features are the best. While connected to the TV, I didn't feel that there was a lag.. As far as sound quality is concerned, I read a lot of reviews that the bass is not very good and that is true. However, unless you are an audiophile, you won't see much of a difference. The volume level in general is on the lower side but that's ok. It also has voice assistant feature and that's an added advantage.. Overall, I there are improvement areas but for 2k it's a steal especially if you want to use it for calls and some music. Also, with the right size of ear tips, the sound quality is quite good. One point : on my one plus 5, the equalizer feature is grayed out for bluetooth headset. Although it's not a pricked of the headset, I just wanted to highlight. Hope this review helps you.

name: Somesh Kumar Srivastava
title: Go for it!!
content: Go for it without any second thought. I'm writing review after using for almost a month and believe me I charged it full for only 3 times, great battery. Sound quality is absolutely amazing. You get magnetic earpiece which is very useful when you want to pause any music, video to do any other stuff.

name: Kuldip Singh
title: Worth buying
content: This is the best earphone overall in this prize range i would say.. You can hear n identify each and every instrument/vocals in the music .. Sound is cristal clear .. Batterry level is just OMG..TOTALLY INSANE BATTERY i have never experienced such battery in any other earphone. Fully charged in just 25 mint from my samsung charger as i dont have oneplus. mobile and it took me 2 to 3 times cross checking the battery level to fully believe that yes it is actually fully charged .. And it took me again so many time cross checkings the battery % after heavy usage to believe the battery insanity.. I used earphone apprx 2 hrs continuesly and checked the battery % and its again 100%😲(somwhere bw 90-100% bt shows 100%) which is insane for a wireless earphone. Only lagg in bass, bass is not that good . If you are looking for a heavy bass boosted earphone than its not the one. Lastl words, go for it if you can compromise a little in bass, you will not regret

name: Upanishads Lover
title: cheap quality, not recommended
content: When connected to laptop, observing voice distortion while watching a video or playing music... intermittently observing issue when connected to mobile as well

name: KANCHAN CHAKRABORTY
title: THE BEST BLUETOOTH EARPHONE IN THIS RANGE
content: Reviewing it after 20 days of maximum usage.. Pros:. 1. Best in class sound quality. Not only bass, all the minimal sounds are very much clear.. 2. Noise cancellation is also very good.. 3. Very light weight. You'll just forget that u are carrying an extra gadget with you.. 4. Fits in ear properly.. 5. Sound is very loud and crisp in full volume too.. 6. Connectivity is awsome quick as well as range.. 7. Battery back up is awesome. 10 mints of charging provides more than 9 hrs of playback.. A full charge provides almost 12 hrs of playback.. Cons:. Sorry guys, no cons for me.... Go for it without hesitation..

name: Tushar
title: Go for it .. really great at this price point
content: The minute I started playing music on it, I fell in love with it .. This is so great... Even better than my like priced sony mdr xb450 and the range is also very good... It supports AAC audio too... The mids are good and has decent bass.. not the best bass but good... Would definitely recommend to anyone... And the battery life is insane... If you have a warp charge compatible charger at home than you can chatge it lightning fast through the type-c port which is another bonus as it is tedious to have different chargers for your phone and headphones

name: Vinaykumar
title: 👌🏻Best value !
content: Have received this package early morning....! One of the best value for money earphones I've bought ..well everything is crisp and clear ... bass lovers u gotta be disappointed a little bit other than that it's gd

name: Mohanram Baskaran
title: Good - Value for money
content: Very good audio quality. Bass could be a bit low compared to JBL wired headphones but that is fine with me. Battery back up is amazing. Switching between phone and laptop is also easy. Call quality is amazing. Owned a few bluetooth headphones earlier and folks on the other always complained that they couldn't hear me well. But with this one, no complaints as such. Seems to be a bit lengthy when hung over the neck. Also, indication of low battery could have been better. Not much of warning before it dies.

name: Anand
title: Nice
content: Pairing is very easy. If it's a one plus phone it may be even easier. If the buds are magnetically locked then they won't pair. If not they will pair automatically. Long battery life. Fast charging even in normal charger. 1 hour for full charge for normal charger. Loudness is enough and noise cancellation is not that bad.. as a music headphone not that much recommended. For General use and calls at this price range , build quality and charge capacity unmatched.

name: Thulasi
title: Having doubt on this product
content: NEVER SETTLE Logo was not present in the box. So having doubt whether the product is original or not

name: Gaurav Gupta
title: Poor battery life, not even close to 20 hours
content: I'm editing my review after using these for 1 week... everything with these are good except for the battery life...the battery life I'm getting out of these pairs is somewhere near 8-10 max....the company says that it's 20 hours...it's not even 15 hours, 20 hours is a long shot...if I use them for 2 hours a day without keeping them on standby i.e. the buds are off then I have to charge these earphones within 5 days of usage and that is max

name: SP
title: Awesome product
content: Awesome headsets. Sound quality crystal clear. Superb connectivity with mobile( I useOnePlus 6). Easy n faster switch between two connected devices approx less than 1 sec.(i switch between OnePlus 6 and window's os). Excellent battery life got around 15-16 hours. Haven't done a test as such but for sure 15 hour's. Charging time 40-60min ( OnePlus 6 charger, not a wrap charger). To all those who think bass is on lower side well no denying to that but try changing the ear buds so as to get perfect seal in ear n bass will be more than enough.

name: Abhishek J.
title: Relatively high quality headsets at a relatively low price
content: I cannot give a formal review as of now since I have only had the earpieces for almost a day but I can definitely compare my initial listening experience to the one I had with the earphones I was using previously. I have had 3 earphones in the past 2-3 months. The Beyerdynamics beat Byrds, the RHA MA390s and the iPhone earpieces. Each of them has their pros and cons but the one thing that differentiates the Zs from the aforementioned 3 (apart from obviously the wireless connectivity) is the loudness. Even at one point less than half the volume on my phone, the earphones are loud.. The bass is fairly good though not as good as you find on some similarly priced sony earphones.. The treble and mid sounds are fairly food as well.. The comfort levels are really good and so is the build quality.. overall I'd recommend these to anyone who is willing to spend 2-2.5k on a decent pair of wireless earpieces.. Kudos to Oneplus for achieving something so good at such as price.

name: Rahul Rudra
title: HONEST DESI REVIEWS
content: Hi Guys ,. Using this one plus wireless bullets z for past 1 month received very fast delivery from Amazon else about the headphones will say that it's got a battery that is non-comparable to any other wireless headphones is this price , I got it 100% charged and used it near 12 hours continues still the battery was 30% left I left to listen as long time and ear was paining, am not saying its uncomfortable but as it's in the ear type headphones so we can't hear it for a long time , for sound I must say each and every instrument tune is coming perfect and balanced and who says the bass is poor ? The bass is perfect for any normal person i loved its sound according to battery life, I switch to my laptop and phone with a second now by this quick switch option which is very happening very fast so that's awesome, wrap charge is great after 24 mints full charge through any 15w type-c charger its happening no need of only one plus wrap charger and once its 100% full you will have to use it hard to finish it to zero that's insane , according to me this is the best headphones if I compare the same with Oppo M31 or Realme buds 2 . Oneplus bullets wireless z is the best if you compare this 3 headphones in this price segment so and buy this blindly.. I have ordered two of them both are fab.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth every rupee
content: Posting this review after 2 weeks of usage.. Using this on my iPhone XR.. After my Airpods series 2 got damaged due to an accident was considering buying the pro version of it which was costing me approx 25K.. Since I did not want to spend that amount I had invested in 2-3 other wireless headphones within 2k.. None lasted more than a month and I finally realised that I need to go for AirPods Pro itself and came online to place the order.. At that time I saw these headphones and going by the brands name I placed the order.. I would say one plus has done a wonderful job with this product.. Excellent bass quality.. No lag while playing pubg that too on an iPhone.. Great range.. And the best part it’s battery. Never thought a wireless headphone can be fully charged in less than 20 mins and last me for 20 hours.. Absolutely amazing.. It’s a steal deal. Just Go for it 🤟🏼😎

name: Joodu
title: ONEPLUS THE BEST 🌟
content: ONEPLUS THE BEST 🌟. Crystal clear sound .. Treble & Bass are well balanced.. Bass is developed compared to OP Bullets 2 .. Massive Battery Backup within 10-15minutes of charging.. Built Quality is too good which gives premium feel .. Magnetic On/Off will be very much useful .. Finally , OnePlus gave us the best affordable wireless earphones 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟

name: Aritra Bhowmick
title: Excellent deal (but not sweat resistant)
content: The earphone is excellent and you'll get the bang for the bucks.. Pros :. Sound quality : Excellent. Clear and crisp sound.. Build : The rubber/plastic build feels and looks nice. And it is quite sturdy.. Battery life : Now this is where this earphone excels above everything else. The 10 hour in 10 minute charge is real deal and not a marketing gimmick. I used it constantly throughout the day and had to charge it for maybe 15min/day.. Connection : The bluetooth v5 is really good and can handle maybe 15feet of distance before starting to crack up. Also switching between multiple devices is a piece of cake.. Cons:. Bass : If you're a bass head, you'll be disappointed.. Sweat resistance : The device has no official IP rating. And I can assert that it is not even sweat resistant. I ran wearing it only once and the buttons stopped working completely! Had to return it. (Later found out that this was a persistent issue with Bullets wireless 1 as well).. Build : The joint where the device ends and the wires begin is a bit suspicious! Not sure if it can handle rough use. Also the rubbery casing gets dirty easily.. In the end, if you are going to use it in your home/office for mostly YouTube/podcast/not-bass-heavy-music, definitely go for it. But if you're really into bass or exercise a lot, then probably avoid it.

name: jithin
title: Excellent.. why bad reviews on amazon??
content: One of the excellent product you will get it for this price. When i received the box i unbox it and connected with my iphone 11 pro max and opened PUBG..Boom!!!!!!😇😇 . i am able to hear the breathing sound of my teammates which i never experienced on my 1st gen airpod. Their is minor latency which does not effect you much.with my iphone its works fine with Bluetooth 5.0 with very low latency and iam not sure with other android devices.. The sound quality i feel its bit more sharp and bass is average but believe me for this price its a excellent product.

name: Likhith
title: IT HAS NO QUICK SWITCH OPTION IN BASS EDITION
content: While the discription says it has quick switch, it doesn't. it's not fair of OnePlus to cheat users like this , manual doesn't explain anything about quick switch , but sound quality is good , now as mic has been moved to neckband call quality is a bit down.

name: Anwesh Kumar Nayak
title: Worth it under 2000 ( OMG )
content: OMG ! Seriously I loved it. One plus bluetooth earphone under 2000 is really worth it. Don't think so much just go for it, thank me later. I liked it so much.. My rating is 5/5 just because of it's quality in this price range.. Base - awesome. Build quality - good. Noise cancellation - too good. Price - worth it. Look - awesome. Thanks one plus for this one...Love you.

name: Shubham mishra
title: Amazing, superb ,value for money.
content: Totally Awesome bluetooth earphones. (REVIEW AFTER 8 DAYS OF USE WITH ONE PLUS 7T). *BASS: 8/10. YEP THE BASS IS GOOD BUT NOT GREAT , BUT CAN BE IMPROVED BY ADJUSTING EQUALIZER IN YOUR SETTINGS. *SOUND CLARITY : 10/10. WAO, THE SOUND IS SO CRISP & CLEAR.. *CHARGING AND BATTERY BACKUP :11/10. ITSSSSSS PHENOMENAL , 0-100% IN 10 MINUTES.. ACTUALLY CHARGED IT FOR ONLY 10 MINUTES ( by OP 30T WARP CHARGER) and it lasted 12 HOURS. the earphones were connected all this while ,played Music and call were made.. *CONNECTIVITY AND DEVICE SWITCHING: 10/10. Another great thing , just connect it one time with your device and from next time just unpair the magnetic buds and it will reconnect in seconds.. THERE IS NO ,ON & OFF SWITCH .. (NOTE : YOUR BLUETOOTH MUST BE ON ). IF YOU HAVE PAIRED IT WITH TWO DEVICES THEN JUST DOUBLE PRESS THE BUTTON PRESENT ON THE LEFT ARM OF THE EARPHONE AND IT WILL GET CONNECTED TO THE OTHER DEVICE JUST LIKE THIS 👉

name: yusuf
title: Voice issue in calling.
content: I'm extremely unhappy with this product.The day I received the product it was so nice,like nice built quality,nice specification s and good sound,after using for these for a10 days,I found some voice breaking issue while on call ,intially I thought that was a network issue ,then later I tried to check the voice quality in other wired headphones as well I checked it in the speaker phone also It is good.so finally I decided that there was an issue with the product,then I requested amazon to replace it ,still I'm not loosing the hope about OnePlus,now the new ones yet to come.

name: Sonu
title: Issues with charging - Doesn't work after a while
content: Writing this review to help others who might be thinking of buying this. Surprisingly I haven't found any negative ones here but I did see a lot in the OP community app since I use One Plus phone.. It has a great sound quality but a lot of users have dealt with a problem including me where it stops working after a few days. It just doesn't charge and a red light keeps blinking ( OP community page few had white light blinking) . Tried hard reset ( you can find how to do this online) but to no avail.. Eventually gave up. Just doesn't work. One plus needs to look into this. I'm a huge fan but disappointed with this product

name: Diwakar shukla
title: Best wireless earphones
content: When I ordered this, I was gonna use it for running purpose.. For few weeks, I'm using this in running , gym, office meetings and calling from phone.(almost for all). During pandemic , for people who are working from home, this product is a blessing.. 1.Quick switch b/w connected devices helping me a lot. (I use Macbook Pro and OnePlus 6t). 2. Calling dept. is superb. 3. Sound is good enough. 4. Comfort is awesom. For those who are confused b/w TWS and this wireless earphone - When not in use you can just hang this in your nech but that's not possible for TWS.

name: VIKAS
title: Bang for the Buck !! Monster Battery !! Practicality
content: Likable:. - The build quality of the product is really GOOD, feels good to hold.. - The neckband rests so comfortably that you wont realize you are wearing one.. - The sound quality is really good for this price point.. - The ability to switch between two paired devices comes in really handy and is a GREAT FEATURE.. I often switch between my PC and Mobile. Takes about 2+ second to switch.. - SUPER battery power, easily lasts for two days, using 6+ hours a day.. - You only need to connect the earbuds to Pause, Power Off or Power On.. Dislike:. - The bass could have been better I feel and yeah nothing else to dislike about this product.

name: Mohammed shayan
title: Read full review before going ahead
content: Best in class, better than regular bullets Z as it has high bass and even max volume is more than that of regular ones (Non bass edition). Best buy. I got it within a day n half thumbs up for Amazon packaging and delivery.. Overall these are the best earphones within this range and i think even better than many other costing around 2.7k ,3k..... Love this bass edition❤️. If you are a bass lover then definitely pick this but if you are a regular user then go for regular Z variant as it gives 20hrs battery pack up than 17hrs in bass edition.. Mic placement is also changed but it's not downside of having mic bit behind all though calls are perfectly audible for the caller nd receiver.

name: SomeRandomGuy.
title: Good for just casual listening.
content: Coming from Audio techina and Sennheiser, I have quiet some expectations from my music, these buds have good treble but next to nothing bass in them.. Also are comfortable for long duration usage. And the built quality seems good and premium for the price and thank goodness for no blinding blue or red LEDs.. I paired these up with ROG 3 and windows pc, didn't sound good on the phone even after fine tuning with the DIRAC but were good on pc with some tuning. I listen to Amazon Music and SoundCloud mostly.. The soundstage is quiet wide, mids and lows are clear though I didn't like the way it handles the highs. Sound isolation is okayish.. These pairs are just good for casual listening or on the go. Dont expect much.

name: Nikhil
title: Go for it,You will never ever Regret.
content: So I'm giving review for the 1st time for this OP earphones after using it for 4days just bcoz I love music and I know how much music means to anyone who really care about it. So I was in big big dilemma before and after ordering this product just bcoz of the mixed reviews of it on YouTube and Amazon, Flipkart reviews about the Sound quality,bass mostly. Let me clear you one thing sound quality is so good that no other earphones can come near this around 3-4k also and the most important The Bass,I guess everyone is saying bass is not there or very less in this..I guess they are used to those boom boom ear pain boat,realme earphones etc..let me clear you one thing if those earphones have 100% bass then these OP has 70% bass which is more than enough for anyone.. Tips:- Use right ear buds according to your ear shape. You will get proper sound quality,bass etc.. Thank you.

name: arun
title: review after 2-3 weeks of use
content: here is my review after 2-3 weeks of use-. battery🔋- ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. battery life is extremely good and long which is not available in any of the wireless headphones in this price range and approx 20 hr of standby and about fast charging 🔋⚡ at first i didn't believed before purchase but it works very well it took less then 10 mins to be full charge and it proved ✔ ☑ i am very happy about it.. sound - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. sound is not that louder like but descent and good sound quality that you will not get any headache or side effects for long use. deep bass works very well having decent amount of Bass.. build - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. quality is up to the mark like other products what oneplus have. very soft and premium quality of neck wire and buds are also comfortable.. comfort - ⭐⭐⭐⭐. comfortable buds can fitted Easley and neck wire is also good but not as comfortable for long use you may feel slightly heavy on neck and get heat 🔥 up on ears for continue use.. features - ⭐⭐⭐⭐. easy switch mode between two devices works very well. noice cancellation not works well. low latency mode is not works well.. overall - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. you can buy only for the reason of great battery🔋 life which is out of the Expectations in this price range and for fast charge with in 10 mins quick charge and good quality of build.

name: vinay
title: Bass is edition that don't have that much Bass
content: I have oneplus bullets z normal edition,But i order Bass edition for Best Bass Experience.. 1.But I am not satisfied with this product.. 2.Bass is not punche.. 3.And it's not feels like normal edition from box to neck band it's not feels good.. 4.just little bit bass not much expected.. 5.Also decrease Battery life.. 6.For Bass lovers it's not that product your looking for.

name: Kumar
title: Average bluetooth headphones
content: Amazon delivery was great, nicely packed!!. Product review:. ✓Average sound quality. ✓Average bass effect. ✓Good for regular calls. ✓Battery backup is good. ✓Connected seamlessly. The bad side of it:. ×Made in China. ×Over priced, should be around 1k. ×No dust cap cover for the charging port. ×Not Waterproof or Sweatproof.

name: Sreenath v
title: ONEPLUS IS ONEPLUS
content: OnePlus is OnePlus , mind blowing experience , in the budget sector by OnePlus , treble, bass , vocals almost perfectly balenced , Mic quality is normal , Built quality is amazing , 10 mins charge ,20hrs battery life is insane , water proof IP56 RATING , if you are on budget , go for this wireless z , ITS AMAZING

name: ashutosh
title: Reviewing after 3 days of use
content: Reviewing after 3 days... I got these earphones on 26 may 1 pm with full battery.. so mission start to drain the battery after so much Ananya Pandey struggle I found my battery dead 28 may 6 pm approach.. so u can imagine in this quarantine these earphones almost run for 2 days..and again for 1 hour charge u are ready to go for atleast 18 hours... BATTERY-- 5/5. COMFORT is too good.. with so much light weight .. sometimes u even can't recognise that u are wearing something... COMFORT--5/5. BUILD QUALITY is decent but there is only one con that when u are laying the warriors fall out sometimes... BUILD QUALITY-- 4/5. SOUND in this price range I think no other wired Bluetooth earphones can compete with these.. But these are not that good for base heads in my opinion.. but for me base is decent.. vocals are also decent.. treble are good as well...overall nice sound signature at this price point... SOUND--4/5. Overall with a great battery life and with mind blowing connectivity and some decent sound I found these earphones one of the best in this price segments of 3000... Thank u for reading 🙏

name: Amith Mohan
title: Superb battery backup and value for money
content: I have been using this for 3 months and I should say that this is an amazing product. The battery backup and the sound quality is very good. Moreover that the call quality and microphone quality is also very good. It is having good bass. The build quality is very premium. The only con that I found on this product is that it is having significant latency while gaming, maybe a fraction of a second but still it is noticable. The low latency mode is only available when only paired with an Oneplus mobile phone. I would not recommend for gaming but if you are into music or your purpose is calling, then I'll say this is a best buy at this price. Really value for money.

name: prabal l.
title: Yes, Charge for 10 mins, listen for 3 days
content: It's been 3 weeks I am using it.. - Charging:. 1. Charging through phone adapter takes less than 10 mins to full charge and lasts for 2 or 3 days depending on uses.( This is for me). 2. Charging from laptop takes 15-20 mins to full charge.. -Sound and bass:. You may have seen reviews telling bass is not that good. But, I say the bass and sound quality is perfect for me.. -The magnetic switch on off is good. It saves power. You will not find any other power button here. In this version there's no device switching button.. -For runners:. You may think it will fall from ears or not.. I assure you, it will not fall. Light weight. Wear it in correct way.

name: Harjot
title: Hollow
content: Worthless Earphones. The songs sound (hollow) and literally 0 bass. Bundled earphones do a better job than this. Forget making calls on it. I know they are priced at INR 2k, but omg do they do injustice to sound, and how! Not to mention the connectivity issues.. The only non- contention about these earphones is their perhaps satisfactory battery life. And packaging, if I'm honest.. Having been used Sony MDR XB50BS before, these are a tough keep. Returning them.

name: Haris
title: Decent Device
content: Decent Bluetooth Earphones... Pros. 1.Battery Backup is awsome. 2. Fast Charging. 3. Good quiality and connectivity.... 4. Phone calls are super smooth... Cons. Bass is bit low but enough for an average music lover.. Used it with my Mi note 5 pro and it was average. Then used it with my iPad and it was awsome..Waiting for my Nord..Hope it will be best with it...

name: Ck
title: Good for longstanding battery back up. Not for bass, sound quality & noise cancellation
content: Decent design. Early delivery by Amazon. It's good for battery back up. Don't expect for good sound quality, kreech sound will tear ur eardrums if opponents speaks loudly any sharp surrounding sound. Bass quality is very poor (no bass at all), have to download extra app like bass booster to increase bass quality. While on call the surrounding noise is irritating for both sides.. This headset is meant for only battery back up. Nothing special in this. I gave 3 star for only battery backup.

name: Jesna Jobin
title: Best bluetooth wireless earphones I have ever used !!
content: Amazing experience!! Sound clarity is awesome. The music lovers can blindly go for this earphones! It has an amazing bass and sound quality. The most important feature is the battery 👌. The battery will last for many days (depends on usage). We get experience of what the One plus claims about battery😉. Thanks to One plus and Amazon!

name: kannappan
title: Go for other options
content: I am disappointed. If you connect to laptop then the volume adjustment is not working.its always high voulme.. Second problem is connected to mobile for call,if the mobile is on then the voice is breaking. So during the call not able to access the mobile.. Actually I want to return this product but not able to return due to location change.. If you want to listen only songs then can buy else please go for someother brand.. My suggestion for readers, better to check other product.. Worst for money

name: Amazon Customer
title: Superrrrrrrrrrr
content: Execellent battery back up. I got this product on 16.07.20. I have watched seven movies and attended so many phone calls in five days. Still 48% battery is available. Comfortable fit and magnetic on/off system is great. Dual pairing is also awesome... must buy. Leave all other neck banda. Only buy oneplus bullets wireless z...

name: Dr Naqash
title: Good Buy!
content: Ordered the blue one. It's lightweight, elegant and has good audio. Bass could have been better! The device came fully charged out of the box which is a pleasant surprise. Connected to phone in short time and magnetic off works perfectly.. The charging cable is very short. The unboxing experience was bad. Need better packaging.

name: upen
title: Sound quality is bad otherwise good product
content: Sound quality is very bad, you won't be able to hear properly if the person on other side is speaking in fluently. He needs to speak slowly so that you can hear other wise sound will appear to blabber!. The charging is very fast and battery backup is very good it seems like in 2-3 days I was required to charge.. Build quality is also good at this price range.. The quick switch button between two device is also helpful.. The main issue is of sound quality.

name: Vivek Kaurav
title: Just wow!!
content: I received my order on monday(29 June) but the product had a manufacturing defect. The left side of the earphone wasn't working at all. The package seemed to be of already exchanged product because the plastic film around the box wasn't present when I first opened the package.. Anyway, I initiated the exchange and within two days I received the nee one ( Kudos to Amazon for that). Now these are working perfectly fine and the packaging is fresh. This is the first time I experienced such thing with amazon (Not annoyed about it but surely it's concerning).. Edit: These are are best wireless earphones out there. The battery backup and the fast charge ..wow!!!!!. Full paisa fasool.

name: FOR NEITHER EVER,NOR NEVER ,GUDBYE!!!
title: Bass non existence makes it unbearable to hear sometimes
content: A bit disappointing wud be my review! But dnt get me wrong.so heres y i dnt like d headphone. 1) i feel like there is no base at all. 2)range is okaish not great for a bluetooth 5.1 headphone. Pros:. 1) loud n crisp high,u can hear the lows too(treble is nice). 2) dang !the battery life is awesome i have used if continously for three days straight,still 40% left. 3) charging speed is fast even wid normal chargers although it takes a bit longer. 4) very light n the eartips snuck in perfectly (u have to twist the earpiece towards ur back a bit n dats it) also extra tips r a nice touch but the default one just did me fine. 5)easy connectivity and switching between devices. Now u may say dat the pros outweights the cons! But if u really start using it ,u wud notice the lack of bass ! N u may also say dat u dont mind having little to no bass at all but u'll feel where i come 4rm once u listen music on dis ! The sound doesnt seems balanced at all,the highs although clear ,just gets into ur head sometimes because of non existent of bass especially if u play fps games like pubg! The gunfires just strikes u in the head with dat treble dominated sound n u ears will hurt after sometimes!! But if u want someting that last u long n u dnt mind having little to no bass at all..go for it!! For music lovers i wud suggest oppo enco!

name: Subrat Panda
title: Good Product but Chinese
content: The product is worth for the price. For the fist time I enjoyed the earphone for continuously for 3 hours as it was so smooth to me. Backup is good. Bluetooth reach is decent . Got impressed to hear all the melody at one time. This price with this quality is appreciable. Need to see any alternate in this range with this quality which is non-Chinese.. May be JBL will be one option.

name: Guruprasad Shetty
title: Best Buy - Pretty Impressive
content: Range coverage from mobile to neckband is awesome! Slight lag if their is a wind while riding or driving. So, need to check the accuracy of NC mechanism. Quick switch varies from device to device. Build quality looks premium.. Con: charging socket is open, can't use in rain or people who sweat a lot! Because, salt water Will crank the ic units.. As of 1 day use.. Pretty impressive.. My POV neckbands are always better than ear buds..

name: Deepali Mistry
title: Worth the money
content: Uploading the review after 1 week of use.. Pros:. Light weight and comfortable around the neck. Approximately 14 hours of battery life with one full charge. Easy to use function. Comes with 3 types of ear buds to fit different sizes. Can easily connect to devices. Connectivity is good.. Mic quality while calling is clear.. There is no lagging in sound , so good to watch movies or series or play games on phone.. The switching between 2 devices is easy.. The magnetic switch off takes the crown.. Cons:. Sound quality is good, not great. Given the price range I will say it's good.. The volume is high, I usually listen at full volume. But with this 50 percent of volume is enough for me. I also felt the sound gets absurd if volume is above 90 percent.. I will definitely recommend the product at the price range it's a good product as compared to other companies.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review for headphones paired with Samsung phones- Working okay
content: I have used these headphones for almost a week now. The sound quality is good. The range of the bluetooth and clarity is nice.. The only major problem with this one is there is no noise cancellation. The person whom you are talking to can clearly listen your background conversation/noise. Also, it doesn't adjust the voice control, there is sudden spike in volume of slight change in tone.. Not aware whether these issues can be handled or not.. I did not face these issues with samsung bluetooth headphones.

name: Sarkars
title: oneplus genuine Feedback, buy if it's fit to your ear
content: Guys this is genuine Feedback.. After reaching a week I found two products , one is oneplus and another is oppo.. No doubts one plus good one, pros are build, backup, sound and quick switch option with multiple device. Major cons: device doest fit to my ear and just see if your ear fits small ear buds. The build of oneplus does not good who has problem with big ear buds. The build also feel big as compared to Oppo... @Amazon, mentioned that no return policy, I have keep at home without use, since problem with my Biological which can not be identified in any online order.. Disappointed from Amazon by seeing the statements.. Thanks you staty safe.

name: Tamil
title: Excellent product
content: I am writing this after usage of a month.. 1.Excellent battery backup and charging speed.. 2.Sound quality is awesome.. 3.priceworthy.. This is one of the best of it's kind.If you want to go for an wireless headset,as of now this is leading the market of it.

name: Shirish Kodagali
title: Stunning, beast..OnePlus bullet wireless z.
content: Just giving one star less for my purchased product is because the bullet wireless z was not charged at all.. I was surprised it did not power on, later after keeping for charging for 1 hour it powered on. (Had a Thought of returning the item if it would not have turned on ). After that there is no match to this product. Sound quality, build, battery backup, are all to the point for this price range. Now it's working absolutely fine.. I used this item for as long as 8 hours on heavy usage. Like played music, watched YT, Netflix, and played pubg for as nearly as 3 hours, On fnatic mode on OP6T. This worked like charm, as said in the box , very less latency (.01-.02 sec) which is absolutely fine if you are regular player. R L works fine.. after all this , charge on the the earbuds is like 78%... No cons till now . Hopefully my best buy this year.

name: KUNAL DAS
title: Dead on Arrival/Defective Product
content: The product was dead on arrival! It took me more than an hour to figure out that the battery wasn’t able to hold the charge in spite of connecting with 30 watts one plus charger. Never expected such a downgraded product from one plus company. Have ordered successfully for a replacement only because of Amazon’s promise n trustworthy customer service and have to see further how the product works. Will then review the product with additional details..

name: techDoc
title: Buy if Battery backup is priority, sound is average.
content: Pros... Battery backup is the only reason to buy this.. Can give 3 days on normal usage.. Fast charging is very good.. Can switch between two device easily.. Light weight.. Cons... sound quality is average,. Mic pick ups surrounding noise often.. The battery indicator shows inaccurate data.. Connect to only single device at a time, hv to switch each time.

name: Gurdeep
title: GOT DEFECTED IN LESS THAN A MONTH
content: I BOUGHT THEM THINKING THAT ONE PLUS IS A REPUTED BRAND BUT NEVER EXPECTED THIS. THEY GOT DEFECTED IN LESS THAN A MONTH USE (ONE SIDE START GIVING UNNECESSARY NOISES AND AFTER 2-3 DAYS MORE THE BATTERY ALSO GOT DEFECTED - NOT GIVING 30 MINS PLAYBACK AFTER FULL CHARGING). HOWEVER THE GOOD THING IS ONE PLUS AFTER SALES IS SO GOOD THAT YOU'LL HAVE TO WAIT FOR 15-20 MINS TO TALK TO A EXECUTIVE AND THEY ALSO DON'T HAVE PROPER INFORMATION EVEN CALL GOT DISCONNECTED WHEN THEY PLACE YOU ON HOLD AND AGAIN YOU'LL WAIT FOR ANOTHER 20 MINS TO TALK TO AN EXECUTIVE. WHOLE MESS. I CONTACTED SERVICE CENTRE AND THEY TOLD TO PROCESS MY REQUEST THROUGH ONE PLUS CARE APP TO AVAIL PICK AND DROP SERVICE, HOWEVER THERE IS NO OPTION IN THAT APP TO GET SERVICE FOR EARPHONES REPAIR. I SENT ONE PLUS 2 EMAILS BUT THEY NEVER REPLIED. LOSS OF 2K FROM A BAD BAD BRAND ONE PLUS.

name: SowjiBhanu
title: Genuine review
content: Take this as genuine review...I previously used boar rockerzz and realme buds too...I clearly say that I'm very disappointed with this product... sound quality is very bad when you go for many type of musics and beats... it'll sometimes give you some background disturbance when the song is playing...I never faced this with boat rockerzz and real me buds...trust me it's not worthy to buy it...it's just for brand...no performance

name: Arghodeep Das
title: Unbeatable For The Price....
content: I was Kinda Sceptical on How They Will be Considering That The Bullets Wireless 2 was launched at ₹5,999... But The One Plus Bullets Wireless Z is definitely The Best Option You Can Get.... Every Single Feature is Tested on My Redmi Note 7(4/64) which is a Budget Phone from Redmi of 2019. .. Build Quality:-The Build Quality is Good For The Price... Despite mainly Being Plastic its somewhat sturdy and the rubber neck band is very flexible and easy to carry. .. Comfort:-At First I was Able to Put on The Earphones for Long As It would start paining but after few hours i got used to it... Its just that the new design was not ok with me at first but after getting habituated its very good and i can use it for 2-3hrs in a strech but i will not recommend it coz the earbuds completely cover your ear passage thus blocking air passage which is not good... But As For Comfort its really good to wear. .. Sound Quality:-As Of Me Sound Quality is probably the Only Point which the One Plus Bullets Z is not As Strong as the other features of This... The Sound Quality is Good for an Average user... The Sound is Crisp and The Instrument Separation was Really On Point.. The Treble was nice but tends to get very slightly muffled at max volumes... The Bass is To Be Honest Not So Emphasised.. If you are a basshead(like me) you will feel like bass is almost not there... But By Applying The Largest Earbuds And Shifting Equalizer You can Get The Bass... After doing that The Sound Quality got kinda worse but The Bass was now Noticable and The Thump was there... All The Bollywood songs sounded nice on here... The Non-Lyrical songs are also good as well and you will feel its a Good Quality Earphones.... But Yes One Thing to Note :- The Sound Output While In YT or While In Call was like 10% Lower than It is suppose to be in my opinion. So In Terms of Sound :- If You Can Chnage a Couple of Things as i mentioned The Earphones can meet the expectation of a lot of Music Litseners out there. .. Call Quality:-The Call Quality is really good.. No Compliants The Other Person Can Hear Me Clearly so do i... But I felt that The Sound Output is marginally low as that what you would expect on a certaiy volume.... .. Battery Life and Charging:- This Earphones are literally awesome In Terms of battery life. I generally used these Earphones at 90%-80%. And it gave me 16-17hrs of battery life... (2.5hrs calling + 6hrs YT + 8hrs Music Playback) 3days of Usage time... In Terms of Charging... They Took Like 40mins to charge from 0 to 100 with my 5V-2A Charger which is incredibly fast for the battery life it offers.. And It Gave Me 8hrs of Battery(1hr call+3hrs YT+ 4hrs Music) after 10mins of Charging.. So I Guess a 18W fast Charger is enough To Meet The 10hr in 10mins claim. .. Important Note:-The Battery % of The Earphones are displayed wrong most of the time... I used it for 9hrs and it was still at 80% and after 12hrs of usage it was at 60%...but last 60% got used up in 4.5hrs which is incredibly wrong so don't think that 60% means it will last you like 10hrs or so... The representation of battery is incorrect and i don't whether it is my phone's problem or not...). .. Water Resistant:- Can't Comment coz i am not ready to try it coz if it gets damaged my father willl not buy me another one lol.... .. Bluetooth Range:-All I Can Say its Excellent... I Can Listen To Songs while being on The Ground Floor and My Phone While in The 1st Floor... .. Controls:-The Magnetic Controls and the Quick Switch Feature works flawlessly without any Problem so No Complaints..... .. Verdict:-This is So Far The Most Perfect and All Rounded Earphones you can Get at That Price... If Bass Quality Matters you The Most Plz Look For Other options as it might not make you fuly satisfied... But if you have no Problem with The Bass i Am Happy To Say This Earphones will not Let You down in any way.... They are awesome in every way. .. Hope I was Able To Help You With This Review.. .. (Plz don't mind if i made any grammatical error or error in sentence making as this was long and i am not too good an writing long paragraphs lol)

name: Kundan
title: Wouldn't recommend for PUBG
content: Product is decent for music however the audio lag is still there even if you use Fnatic Mode for gaming.. The sound is all messed up in PUBG (Wouldn't recommend this headphones for PUBG)

name: Jinka  Sai Ranga
title: Best wireless earphones under 1999
content: Sound Quality is excellent. Bluetooth range is good. Ones we charge fully it will come upto18hrs. Built quality is excellent. Bass is average

name: Jack patel
title: Iphone use stay away from this headphone...
content: If you are an iphone user like I’m;. Music listing in this: frustrating:. Why ?. Ans: when you play music in it you will listen glitch sound in every bit,. Im having spotify premium. Where they provide clear with beat quality music but i wont be able to enjoy such quality because of this negligence of product testing,. If you are planning to buy it only for call purposes then good to go but,. Hey its 2000 rs,. You should have your demands like i have ,. As i dont have any option as i dont know what to do,. I already return a product and get another one but same problem,. Look like manufacturing issue.. 1+ if you are reading this ,. Please work up on your testing team,. You can’t launch such product in market without proper premium quality testing.. Disappointed..🥺

name: NISHANT PARAKH
title: Value for money
content: I have been using Sennheiser cx180 which is one of the best earphones so far, but unfortunately, they are dead. So I was obvious to opt for Sennheiser one but when I saw bullets in a such a low price, I made my mind to get this yet confused how it will sound? Will my money is going to be wasted?. Well, it turns out to be an awesome one, near to cx180 yet can't beat that Lil devil 😈.. I used for 6 hrs.. Battery- after 6 hrs is 70%. Games played pubg/CoD- 1 sec lag in sound but it is feasible but for gamers, it's still a huge thing.. Songs- listen to tomorrowland music and the sound was coming good (4/5) Listen to some Tomorrowland music 😻 it was nice.. Netflix- no lag 👍. Call- its good. Besides, I have one plus 7T, so Fnatic mode helps in keeping low latency during games yet sometimes I see a lag in sound.. Note:- as there is no noise cancellation, I used large ear tips which indeed helps to reduce disturbance.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very good compainion for WFH
content: Although doesn't have best in class noise cancellation for calls, it is definitely value for money 2000 Rs.. - Long lasting batery, upto 15hrs plus easily. - Fast charging. - Can switch between two pre-paired devices ( laptop and mobile ) easily. This is a very handy and useful feature.

name: Arka
title: Best for Calling
content: My main purpose was to take office calls through this. Which is working out very good on this. The huge battery life is very good and quick charge is just awesome.. Giving 4 star because I think there is disconnection issue, which I'm not very sure of. As it happens rarely and not sure if that's laptop or mobile issue. Will try to claim warranty for this.

name: vishesh
title: Gread earphones but one glitch
content: After 4 hours of usage i realised there is one issue with the earphones i.e. Volume suddenly drops to zero every now and then wich is an issue idk what to do

name: Akshay
title: Great product but subjective to individual preference
content: Received this product on july 10th and have been using it since then. So i am going to share my 2 week experience with the OP buds.. Before buying, i read about the product and most of the users complained about the lack of bass but in my opinion these buds have a decent bass, that will be liked by normal people like me. So if you are a bass head skip buying.. PROS (only which i reaalllyy liked). 1. Light weight and very comfortable. 2. Battery life is really awesome and charges very quickly. 3. Connects quickly with the phone. Just detach from the magnets and it connects. CONS. 1. The drivers are a bit protruding outside the ears so sometimes feels discomfort while riding using a helmet.. 2. Lack of bass, that at times we miss. 3. Eartips provided within the cases doesn't fit in my ears. The purpose i bought the buds was for calling, social meadia and listening to music, for that this is gem of a product 💯. Don't hesitate and go for it if you use is something like mine.

name: ASWIN BHASKAR P E
title: average
content: Firstly the wires are loo long and handling issue especially while bending down.. in line mic- personally i did not like the design at all because first u have to search for the 3 button setup then again have to feel the buttons for any function while those which have buttons on the neckband itself is much easier to find. the earplug doesn't stay fit comes off (especially left one) due to in line mic weight.. the neck band is so light that when u r riding a bike and u forgot to join the two earpiece together the magnet thing it may fly off ( personal experience).. so design wise not good ,better when stationary not for activities.. sound is ok ok...avg not too good not too bad. noise cancellation slightly better ( compared with Samsung level U) and also mic quality. the best things are good battery life because of auto on off magnet join earpiece, specific button for dual connection change mode, just press the button the headset will connect to the next nearby paired device -great feature.

name: Rajendra Yadav
title: For Music say a Huge yes, For calling It's Complicated
content: Sound Quality : 4.5. Bass Quality : 4.5. Battery : 8/5 (Too Good). Call Quality (while Driving): over the speed of 50Kmph Forget about it, you can't talk while driving , the receiver will only hear the sound of air. The only con with this device is this that you can't talk while driving fast.. Call Quality (While Stable) : Great, No issues in this segment.. My Verdict : nobody can best the sound and bass Quality in this price range but if you use it heavily for calling while driving, then It's not for you.. Otherwise, there is no reason at all to ditch this premium device at 1899/-

name: Rahul S
title: Amazing!!  bullet wireless neckband
content: With the reasonable price and quality 🖤. Unbox - really great feel in Unboxing it!. Products included - C Type red cable and an extra pair of earplugs and manuals. Experience - One plus products are always amazing, and this earphone tho I really loved it.. The quality and the design is really excellent than the wireless 2 earphones!. It comes with the magnetic attach, where the song will be paused when u attach both earpieces, and I had a confusion in Turing ON the earphones, You need to separate the earplugs and automatically it will be ON and Pair instantly... Sound quality - a really great experience.

name: Aritro Bhowmick
title: Go for it ... truely amazing Neckbands
content: Bass is a little lower ......but it is more than sufficient for me who is a hardcore bass lover. Earlier i was using Sony MDR XB510AS which is truely a bass earphone with 12mm driver but OMG The OnePlus Z sounds not less than it. It is far better than the cheap Realme Neckbands.. If I have to rate the Sony on bass quality i shall rate 9.9999/10. And for the OnePlus i shall give 8.9999/10 ...... Don't think, just buy it....😀😀😀😀. Keep it up ONEPLUS 😉😉😉😀😀😃😃

name: A.BHUPESH CHOWDARY
title: never settle logo missing
content: * If never settle logi was missing in box it doesn’t mean it’s fake, it’s due to change in boxing. Sound quality is good. Bass is descent. Full charge in 30 mins with normal charger. Batterylife with 60-70% vol it’s 20-21hr and dead. Quality is good. Overall 9/10 for cost to quality

name: Vikram Chhetri
title: SCAM in the name of JBL! BEWARE
content: There were two options once buying brand new and one buying bought returned repaired. I chose and paid for brand new but when the item got delivered box was puffed and seal removed as is evident from the pictures. Also sound quality is not up to the mark just like a plain headphone no special features. Just a plain wireless bluetooth device, not of excellent quality as portrayed in the ads. JBL's name is used to grab attention or maybe JBL has become worse don't know but something is wrong with the product. Highly disappointed by this product, had brought it for my wife now she has one more reason to scold me. Bluetooth battery percentage also is not displayed when connected to a device. Bass quality 0 , sound quality 0. Wish could replace this item and by some other earphones as this is clearly bad. If there was an option would give 0 rating to this.

name: Rajesh kumar
title: Completely satisfied with its sound quality, Durability, Battery life ...Noise cancellations..etc
content: First of all... I am highly satisfied with the product. GOOD BATTERY LIFE....GOOD SOUND QUALITY (Bass Not so well but its good enough )...GOOD NOISE CANCELLATION... If you like Kind of music with high bass (Rocking dhep-dhap) then Dont go for this product...But if you want good battery life ..good vocal quality with other sound feautures (terrible..vocal etc) ..Then..this product is for you... My Recommendation!!... You will definitely like it...If it has 1 demerit..Redmi buds have more limitations... 👍👍👍👍👍

name: jiniyashahriar khan
title: Not up to the mark
content: I have been using this headphone for the past 6 months , here are the issues I found. 1) sound is good , but bass is low compared to other headphone in its segment. 2) it is having some transmission issue , if you are a pubg player like me , don't buy this product. 3) initially it will be good no problems , but after playing for 30 mins , some kind of "Chir Chir" noise comes all the time and it's very annoying , it will ruin you playing experience.. Good thing is. 1) battery life is really good. 2 ) charging is very fast.. 3) connectivity is fast also. Note : If you are not into games or not a bass lover , you may purchase this , otherwise don't .

name: Mehul Khator
title: The best neckband of this range!
content: The Oneplus Bullets Wireless Z is just awesome! Let’s rate the neckband in each department:. • Sound Quality: 9.5/10. • Build Quality: 9/10. • In-line Mic(when we speak on a call): 9/10. • Bass Quality: 7.5/10, I am little bit disappointed with the bass quality. It’s not bad,but,not great too!. • Noice Cancellation: 7/10, what more could you expect from a neckband of just 1999 rupees!. •CONCLUSION: I will give a honest review! If you really want to buy a Bluetooth earphones/buds under 4000. Then,without any hesitation,but this product! It’s the best neckband of this range.. Now a days,there is hype between Oneplus Wireless Z and Realme Wireless Buds! Believe me, if you really want “more features” and “sound quality” then go for Oneplus Wireless Z.. But,if you want more “bass quality” then go for Realme Wireless Buds... But,in my opinion, Oneplus Bullets Wireless Z is better!

name: Kiran
title: OnePlus finally does it with their Z bullets
content: I'm an oneplus user, I use op7 to be precise. I was sceptical about buying these Z bullets coz I already am adjusted to the sounds given out by Apple earpods, I was using since a year and half and had to buy it again in an apple store... So coming from the quality of apple earpods I was sceptical of how this Z would perform. Well I was really surprised, it was really good...except for the low bass everything was great!!!. I'm really impressed wit the battery and the magnetic buds when connected turns of the bullets while opening it activates and connects to the phone in a second... And switching between two devices was also easy!!. You can blindly go for it...don't worry abt the music quality, u can trust me cos I have been using apple earpods from 2yrs and I find the Z bullets to be a good competition. Go for it folks

name: Moirangthem Johnson Singh
title: Overall good
content: Quality of product is best, sound quality: there is a little bit low in Bass. But u can customise by using ur device equaliser and Earbuds need to be changed in Big one which is included inside the package. Then only u would get enough Bass.. There is a little bit of sound delay while playing COD on none oneplus device.. Battery life super than another bluetooth earphone.. It's very good all over in Low budget.

name: sivakumar
title: I would recommend this to all 80% ok. No demerits
content: Before buying itself I saw many YouTube videos and found the bass is very average.but after using Today I saw two movies and felt very comfortable with bass. I would give 80/100. bass allowance is opt to human ears.. But can't say a extra bass.. *Connectivity is ok.. conectivity range in side home is also awesome.. *Opponent side voice feedback was 75%ok. *Battery after watching 2 movies it is maintained 70%

name: Anand Reddy
title: Good for calls & battery backup is too good, but facing some lag issues with Laptop
content: Hi,. I writing this review after using it for 2 days. I bought this product only for my office calls and to listen to music. Coming to calls it is good, no distortion at other end as well. I was on continuous back 2 back calls for almost 3-4 hours, and found no issue. Coming to music the sound clarity is good, but only thing is the bass is not that good, but ok. Coming to batter backup, I charged full once I received the product, and am still using it.. Update: writing this after using for 10 days.. Good for phone calls, but I’m facing connectivity issues when I switch to my laptop to use Skype call (for this I decreased a star)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Must buy
content: This product really exceeded my expectations. I own a Bluetooth headset myself and the quailty of these don't come close to my own. Great sound quality and good volume too. It has good bass quailty too.. A feature that I really enjoyed on this headset was instead of a power button, you just have to connect the magentic ends of the earbuds to turn it off. Some bluetooth earphones end up rendering useless beacuse of the power button being pushed inside from pressing it so much. My grandfather had a pair, but beacuse of his shaky hands, the power button becomes a nuisance. Hence I bought these earphones for him. This really elimates that disadvantage.. For this price range don't hesitiate to but these. They are truely worth it.. The product also comes with a USB to C type adapter and the charging point is a C type.. It only needs to be charged for a short while and it will last for a really long time.

name: Krishna agrawal
title: Good for price but I suggest Sony sp510
content: I suggest to pay little more and buy Sony sp 510. It's made in India also. It's same and some provides a replacement of product if it has a problem. After warranty also it provide 70%-50% discount on new one if it stops working. One plus has not capped on the charging slot therefore it may penetrate dirt and water. I know it's really cheap and kinda fair but you want a product to last 5 years and would always want washable and water resistance one.

name: Parth Timani
title: Crystal clear voice calling with Fast Charging Support!
content: Sound quality is Average but voice calling is Superb, One Good Thing about Oneplus Bluetooth is Fast Charging support.. You’re not heavy bass lover than it is okay to go for this.

name: Thirunishath
title: Reply for negative reviews
content: I think that those were given negative reviews about this are expected this product as a high range 😅 level headset it is very amazing in this price range.. The sound quality was fair better for this price range it means there is no too much "bass" but the sound is clear. Noice cancellation is also good that it eliminates the surrounding medium level noices. I liked this product very much because we dont have a better alternative in this product range.. "Low latency" mode is for one plus mobile only. But i am there is no lips sync issues, while playing videos in any platform even i used this in my android TV also. For gaming people you may have a latency while shooting if you have other company mobiles in low rate.

name: ANURAG SHARMA
title: Best in its class ❤️
content: Overall these are the best in this price bracket.. In terms if overall plastic quality and fit and finish the product performs really well, these also comes with a C Type port for charging which is a great touch in this modern time , these one comes with water resistant coating to keep you tension free.. It also has long battery life with warp or fast charging feature of about 15+ hours of usage which is more than enough ..
