Some people are reviewing that these are not so good in the terms of bass quality as compared to other popular neck bands but talking about the real life scenario these neckband performs exellent in terms of bass quality, design, features, price point.

name: Rejin R S
title: Awesome great sound great battery backup!!
content: Awesome great sound great battery backup!!. Just brought the earphones n its awesome!!. Believe me i'm kinda person who invests a lot of money into good earphones n this is one of the best wireless earphones ever, so would totally recommend it to every1!. 1) Build quality is awesome. 2) Accessories provided are great.. 3) Sound quality is awesome.. 4) the magnetic control feature is awesome ...works as mentioned!. 5) Fits perfectly and call quality is awesome !. 6) Google Assistant works perfectly.. 7) Sound quality is jst AWESOME!!!! :D clear sound wit no outside disturbances. Good and deep Bass, even after using it for an hour i dont feel like taking it off!

name: Ashish Bahl
title: Great value including great sound and amazing battery life.
content: I am very much impressed especially with the battery life and charging speed. My previous earphones take 1 hour to charge and last only 6 hours, while these go on for 20 hours and charge up in 25 minutes. These are such a great value. The sound quality is good and offers a full sound stage along with okayish levels of bass. The sound isolation is also great. However, the quick pairing doesn't seem to work with OnePlus 7 series phones yet. The quick switch and join to stop features are great and unique to these earphones. Just go for these!

name: Hitesh
title: "NEVER SETTLE" tag missing??
content: Yeah, the earphones are pretty good,but most people are tensed missing of "NEVER SETTLE" tag inside the box,and the same happened with me, so I immediately took this issue to oneplus customer care, they said its a design change and nothing to worry only if u bought it from amazon, and if you are facing any issues with earphones exchange or return them within 10 days from ur purchase date.

name: Kuruvila
title: We pay 1999/- as just the value of brand nothing else inside
content: *Very poor sound and bass quality. *Noise cancellation is average. *Pairing is fast and connectivity range is pretty good. *Weight less and comfortable. *Not worth for 1999/-. it will be okay if the price is around 1200/-. i request the buyers to paste a genuine review

name: Aditya
title: Superb product for oneplus.....loved it❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
content: Base is superb at this price tag of 2k. It has a great treble and super awesome build ..I have used it intensively for nearly 2 days and it was worth it...the earbuds doesn't fall off easily...and I have nothing to say about the battery life... It is NEXT LEVEL.....the control buttons are a little bit small but that's okay ....you could not expect a better product at 2k... Go for these if you are not a total basehead as these have a little less base as compared to realme buds wireless but it's great for me..... Final verdict:- Go for it dude... You won't regret it

name: Rohit shrigadi
title: Best wireless earphone in 2k.
content: This is the best earphones under 2k.. I have oneplus 7 phone.. The sound quality is BEST in price range.. Bass quality is fine, and Bass is medium.. About bass so many users complaint low bass. Pls note it has same bass as Real me wireless buds.. But bass on realme buds 2 wired is high.. I have OP7, using earphone i felt some low bass so I increased bass equalizer in sound setting , Dolby atmos setting. Now bass is perfect .... If you have OP device just search for Dolby atmos setting and increase bass manually.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great product
content: I am glad I picked this one over the others. Great sound, comfortable neckband and nice flipping of devices. It does well with the iPhone XR.. Only one thing negative is that when you are connected to another Bluetooth device and the phone (which is connected) rings, you don’t get the ring on the earphones. Hence, you don’t come to know that your phone is ringing unless you have the phone right next to you.

name: Syed JD
title: My results after testing these beautiful earphones💘💘
content: Hi guys hope y'all are doing good.. I just want to give my review on these amazing earphones that I've been using from past 1 week.. It will be real quick and short to understand.. 1. These earphones are not meant for those people who love high bass on their eardrums, instead the bass to treble ratio is perfectly engineered to give you decent quality sound💘. 2. These earphones are a bit different in quality from that of OP Bullets 2 and the 1 as well but still in the range of 2000₹ it is a real flagship killer.. 3. When it comes to comfort I think no other brand's earphones or headphones can beat these earphones, you can use them all day and you won't even feel a little itchy or irritation on your skin, ( also I was troubled with MI Wireless Bass Headphones🤮). 4. Packing is as always super and a feast for your eyes, it is better packed than JBL and SkullCandy.. Overall to say these earphones are a good to go option for everyone who's looking for good sound along with ample quality

name: NsD
title: Good purchase
content: Pros:. 1. Sound quality is superb. 2. Mic is good. 3. Charging and battery backup is excellent. 4. Soft buds , never hurt your ears. 5. If you have a oneplus phone then bass is good (not boosted ). Cons:. 1. Other than oneplus phone bass is a little bit low. 2. Some times its disconnects and automatically recomnects within 30 seconds.. Its my review after 1 month of use.

name: Mikhail S.
title: Good but has one flaw.
content: Its a good pair of earphones for the price. That coupled with warp cahrge capability (only if you have the 30w brick that comes with all the new onplus phones). However as for small issues, the earphones' led light will blink a white light every five seconds WHENEVER it's connected. So if using at night you might wanna tape over the light.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Just Wow..........!!
content: This is the review I am writing after using realme buds and I found Oneplus far superior than other bluetooth earphones of this range...Just go for it !! Charges super quick in 10 minutes, gives fabulous sound quality and also has more lightweight and soft material...Can't get better for Oneplus users !! Also, ignore the low bass comments as I think if you are spending 2000 bucks, you want some audio quality and balanced output and not that the bass is overpowering all other effects all the time !! So just grab it !!!!!

name: Mithran
title: check out before u go for this best one//
content: Best in this is battery. 10 mins charge even in 2A charger gives 10 hours of playtime.. (Full charge takes 50 mins). Quality is good with nice flexibility, so that can be kept inside pocket easily.. The range of connectivity in a free ground in more than 10 meters,. inside home or if more walls are there it works better within 7 meters.. after using wired headphones, in this u can feel a little delay when using google assistant or alexa. after long press of button 2sec of delay is to given when we are saying commands for clear recognition.. otherwise there is no delay in song. i dont know about pubg coz i have not tried, but in utube i check review they say delay of 0.8 sec is there.( but this delay dose not increase with distance that i tried myself).,. Bass is little less when compared to other,but has no great difference in 70% of sound.

name: Yuvaraj
title: Best in class Battery Capacity
content: My specific requirements led to the purchase of OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z.. Requirements:. - Due work from home, I need to switch between Laptop to Mobile too often, whether attending meeting or personal call. With just a double press of function button, within 3 seconds I can switch between two paired devices, in my case Laptop and Mobile. - 20 hours of usage with full charge. It is enough for me run 2-3 days. Full charge takes 40 mins. - 10 minutes charge gives 10 hours of usage if very true. I tested my self it is working. But you need to use Oneplus Mobile Charger. - Magnetic Control is useful to put it in standby mode. - Sweat and water-resistant IP55. I am not much of an Audiophile so can’t comment much on Audio performance.One feature I missed was mute button. I had to rely on the mute on Laptop to Mobile

name: Jasleen
title: Amazing product. go for it.
content: It has been two days I am using this product and i am quite satisfied with its over all performance. In terms of sound quality i was confused as all the reviews voted for oppo enco m31 but this one is not that bad either.. Pros :. Battery life. way to turn it on and off is really cool.. sound quality is good in this range. premium build quality. Cons :. the battery capsules are a bit heavy.. the blutletooh connection swap button should be there like the bullet z.

name: Rakesh
title: Just perfect beast
content: Superb sound quality , vocals are clear,every instrument is hearable, and bass is too good , and its soo light earphone,the best part is u can hear music for sevral hour continuously and ur ear don't hurt at all, i hear 2-4 hour continues music and can still go on but after hearing for hour and more u feel headache . Overall this is my type of earphone on which bass is good and vocal are also clear, only thing i suggest is to increase the battery life, buy it you won't find better than this

name: Ramdhun Suthar
title: Love this bullets. best built and music quality.
content: its my first experience with wireless earphone. I can say this is amazing in terms of sound quality and built quality. its feel so premium and ergonomic to your ear. the range of its perfect you can't feel break in sound. as i have oneplus 7 pro so its perfect for it. best features of it is battery that log last for 10 hrs in 10 mint charge. and controlling between two devices by switching one click.. I have an Sony MDR-XB55AP also. as both are in same price segment. and sound quality is same in both but now I prefer bullets z more authentic. you get little less bass in bullets wireless z of course as its not specifically for bass but for overall balanced music experience. and you will enjoy it.. one thing is currently all discussing about the packaging that why the "Never Settle" tagline not there inside the box. in starting i also curious and searched everywhere about it why this happened. confused should i buy them or not. then i talked with one plus official person regarding this. he also confirms that there is no issue. now they changed their packaging and removed it by them self. so don't worry about it. whether you buy it from here or its website you will get the current packaging without tagline. so go ahead what you like with hesitation.

name: Arun
title: Not working
content: I bought it on 17th July but today it's not working. It's not even been a month. the return window has been closed on 24th, now what should I do.. when I last used I could see that it had 30% charge and after a while I kept it for charging but I noticed that it was not getting charged and when I tried connecting it's not happening .. had a great expectations from OnePlus but you guys lead me down..

name: Gaurav Singh
title: Must buy
content: Here is what I like-. 1) Sound is crisp.(9/10). 2) Battery backup is amazing (10/10). 3) Meterial used for construction is A+ (9/10). 4) Charging speed (10/10). 5) Dual pairing and switching between device (10/10). 6) Mic quantity while on call is best in class (9/10). 7) Water resistant (10/10) actually went swimming and forgot to remove and they worked great even after 40 minutes of session.. What I don't like-. 1) Bass is not that great. Even though there is other varient for bass model. I feel like little bit of more bas should have made this product the BEST EVER ROUND THE NECK WIRELESS EARPHONES.

name: Burhan
title: One of the finest bluetooth neckband earphones
content: I have purchased this for my day to day calls for company meetings and stand-up calls along with the regular mobile phones.. I'm surprised by the speed of the headset connecting with the laptop/mobile.. One thing I didn't like is this doesn't allow multiple connections at the same time though provides a way to switch from one device to another using just two taps on the button and the switch timing is super fast and efficiently getting connected to mobile or computer or laptop which supports Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Good Bluetooth Head Phones with less bass
content: Pros:. - Good Music Audio Quality. - Good Phone Audio Quality. - Mic quality is good. - Easy & quick Bluetooth connectivity. - Bluetooth range is around 12 feet with 1 Wall in-between. - Good design, the buds hold on to ears while walking, didn't check while running though.. - Earbuds comfort is good. - Magnetic ON/OFF is a comfort. - Double press connect to previous paired device is a blessing.. Cons:. - Less Bass. Verdict: If you are a music enthusiastic with heavy bass then this is not yours, otherwise go for it.

name: Rushabh M.
title: Best headphones under 2000
content: Honest Review. Under 2000 rs, I think this is the most suitable wireless headphones you can ever get as of now. Many handy features, very good battery backup, good looking design and comfortable to use. Pros. Best feature is switching between 2 paired devices. Use it and you will fall in love how handy it is. Specially in today's WFH situation.. Good battery backup. Good bass, not great but you can always use phone's equalizer. Noise cancellation is good. LED indicator for full charge. Cons. It's not really a con, but The only thing i found not good here is the time taken for full charge, it almost takes 45 minutes to full charge from 0-100. Considering using a OnePlus dash or warp charger, it should have been less.

name: Rohan Bais
title: Great Sound coupled with niche features
content: First thing first the build of this one is very premium then all the the features that it comes with are cherry on top.. The sound quality is fine ,if you are not into extra bass music then you will not even feel the difference between it and other competitors in the market.. I generally use it for calls and for movies and some light music,and it performes well in all of those aspects.. Thereafter comes the battery life which is just niche in this price range.(special mention to quick charge feature). I experienced only one problem with regards to the comfort of them ,because It starts paining on my upper part of ear after few hours of continuous usage.. Pros-. - Build quality. - Battery. - features. - great mic. Cons -. - Not for Bass lovers. - uncomfortable after few hours of use. - lack of noise cancellation

name: Prayash Kumar Singh
title: 100%recommended
content: Audio Quality - excellent Audio Quality. No complain for audio Quality. Better than JBL and boat. Rating of Audio Quality -5/5. Bass - bass is deep and medium but not loud than boat. For medium bass sound destoration is not happen.3/5. Battery- battery backup is excellent and it's fast charging is excellent . I am using realme vooc charger, it fully charges the OnePlus wirless z 40minutes. 5/5. Build quality and comfort- excellent no complain about build quality and comfort. Rating for comfort-4/5.. Latency test- yes it's have latency issue but ok.itna bhi jyada latency nahi hai thik thak hai. Rating of latency-3.7/5

name: Alchoccy Films
title: Bad bandwidth. Dont handle parrallel calls, gaming
content: Reduced 2 star for bandwidth of the earphones. You cant play games and simultaneously attend call. Its like call audio is good but game audio becomes not audible or in a very far away volume. Same goes for zoom call and normal call. When on zoom call, audio disconnects when any normal call comes. Bad bandwidth of product that doesn't happen with normal iqoo3 audio earphones.

name: Rohit Jamadar
title: Good sound quality but the Quick-Switch feature is a useless.
content: Sound quality is good but bass quality is not the best(adequate) would not recommend for truly bass lovers.. Cons: Quick switch feature is completely useless as it is only available for OnePlus phones, also the earphones does not have any physical button as a quick switch. Disappointed for this one.. Build Quality is average.. Pros: Bluetooth connectivity is very good. It connects instantly and has a good feature of auto turn on/off via magnets.. Overall sound quality is good if the average bass is neglected.

name: Kartik rahamatkar
title: Could have been a bit better.
content: First off, I'm a pro pubg player, after having used focal wired earphones, I can say that there is a slight lag on Ipad and also on oneplus fanatic mode. It's not instant. I oneplus, I think it's time you offered the premium metal ones for 2k. Sound and all is great but I'd still prefer a premium metal finish earbud over this plastic one after have owned the op bullets v2.

name: Soumya
title: What an awesome product no one can guess!!!!
content: I was. VEry confused between realme and one plus ..but i finally decided to go with one plus if u are a true music lover ,and need every thing in balance u gonna love it but if u are addicted to very much punchy bass then its not for u for sure,but it does not mean it doesn't have base ,one plus have truley justiced for a good base it is anyhow very proper and accurate ,every thing is on its place where it meant to be ,if u love the feel of song thats really for u guys,in my opinion its amazing product. It have JBl quality sound

name: Tharun
title: There was no bass..felt like am listening to a mono audio
content: After reading lot of good reviews. went head and bought one plus wireless Z blue color. used it with iPhone 7 and Samsung m51 for day. The sound was so flat and felt like am listening to a 100 rs wired headset. The levels where so flat. I own few Sony wired headsets, The kind of bass comes out it gives a theatre experience. But one plus was super flat. Tried all sound effects , settings and third party booster apps. still flat.. Built quality was really good. Whatever bud size we change. its not study on your ears, it keeps falling. No comments about the charge as I had it only for one day and returned it.. Not sure about the BASS EDITION .. Next time always check in store and then buy online.

name: Akunuri Sai Chaitanya
title: Wow Product from OnePlus 👌
content: I Might not suggest this for Bass Lovers,. But you'll be completely satisfied by the Rich sound quality.. Impressive Battery life, For regular usage this can last 3days. Though you were an Heavy user this can last 2days.. In terms of charging it supports warp charge.. So Full charge takes less than about 45mins, Surprise element is that a 10min charge gives you 10hrs use. So regular users can expect a full day.. Better build Quality,sweat & water-resistance, Quick Switch,Low latency for OnePlus users.. All these makes Oneplus Bullets Wireless Z a superb bang for bucks products & that's for sure.. I would rate these 4.5 ⭐

name: Deep D.
title: SUPER INVESTMENT RS2000
content: Reviewing it after 2 weeks of usage.. 1) Battery life as claimed by the company, it's marvelous I am getting almost 3 days of complete usage on a single charge. ( MOVIES, VIDEOS, SONGS, SERIES, REGULAR USAGE ). 2) 10 mins of charge and bang 100% easily.. 3) Super Comfortable, Very convenient. I run daily 5 Kms and neither it falls from ears nor any sign of discomfort.. 6) The quick switch is the super feature, I switch between my laptop and mobile often and its very very helpful and fast.. 7) Build quality is superb, feels sturdy and premium too.. 8) It's super fast in connection, just separate the buds and put in ears it gets connected and just stick them back and disconnects easily.. 9) NO LAGS WHILE WATCHING MOVIES OR VIDEOS FROM LAPTOP OR MOBILE.

name: Rajit
title: Fuckedup bass and lowa...greatest battery life
content: I have used oppo enco m31(returned only for poor battery life),and now oneplus,so i confirm that oneplus has inferior sound quality in contrast of enco,1+ has spr fuckedup bass,sound stage is clear bt not as enco,Z's sound is vocal centric,bass is thear but hard to separate...but greatst battery life,build is normal not flashy nor excellent.. I wonder why the charging port is exposed..how will it help to be waterproof?and thear is negligible mili second delay in youtube.. If i didn't used enco i could have rate it normally..or never complaint about it's build or sound..but in battery section its unbeatable.

name: Shameem5566
title: Best among entry level Bluetooth Earphones
content: I am using this headset for a couple of months.. Pros. -Sound Quality is good.. -Can pair up to 2 devices, swap the devices using a physical button.. -Long-lasting battery, Truly Charge for 10 minutes, enjoy for 10 hours.. Cons. -Mic is too bad and you will have to speak into the mic. If you planned to use this for phone calls, don't buy this.. - Charge for 10 minutes, enjoy for 10 hours. Only if you own a one plus charger.. - Only pairs with 2 devices and No Multipoint Connectivity. There will be a delay in switching between devices.

name: Arhita D.
title: Awesome purchase
content: Best earphones under 2000 rupees. I have tried cheap brands like boult and boat, no one nears the specs and quality of these earphones. If your budget is tight and you are planning to buy some cheap bluetooth earphones, wait for a few days save some bucks and buy this.. Build quality is superb, sound is crisp with balanced bass.. NOTE: Battery backup is just awesome. In my regular day to day usage it lasted for me near 2 days with still 20% battery remaining.. Charging it with normal chargers take around 40 minutes from 0 to 100. But a 10 minutes charge will get you a whole day going.

name: forgottenlegend
title: Bad fit and doesn't stay in place
content: All the excitement of a new ear piece was dead in no time as the fit totally sucks and none of the 3 pairs of ear buds don't stick in place. Should have bought the real me ear phones may be as they were extremely comfortable for me. Bought one plus as this as a newer model with more battery time.

name: Vikas
title: Good Battery No Bass
content: My review -. Pros. 1.insane battery couldn't find what is the real back or stand by time ... There are times when I fully charged it then used after months stil the battery was alive !!!. 2.clear and refined voice. Cones ... 1. Bass is missing and that is the major cone ... If you use it for music you won't like it.. 2. The wire used connecting buds is too thin ... And seems delicate. Overall battery makes it outstanding same time music lovers are not suggested to go for it because of missing BASS

name: Hasha
title: Value for money
content: Value for money. Bought it for 1899 and I think it's unbeatable in this segment. The battery life of 17hrs gets you through the day without needing to charge. I've owned both Z as well as Z Bass edition and the bass is quite a lot more significant in the bass edition, making music a lot more enjoyable. The connectivity aspect can get annoying but I don't mind it as much.. Edit: Recently the media was dropping and a constant random beep sounds, which had me confused. Requested amazon to replace and they did it without any hassle. Got a new pair the next day. Thanks Amazon! :)

name: Shivani
title: Loved it ❤️
content: I love this earphone currently I'm using it with my one plus7 pro and it gives amazing result . It really gives battery backup of 20 hours . I don't use earphones that much so I charge it once in 2 days . Bass is also good but it's not best . It works good with other phones but best with one plus mobiles

name: Amazon Customer
title: A good value for money
content: A pretty descent earphones. A great value for money. Good build quality. Bass is good and doesn't drown the music. Comfortable to wear long hours. Personally I got a battery life of 14 hours which included gaming calling movies music. For OnePlus phone users which has fnatic game mode the Bluetooth delay is very much reduced and good to play games like COD etc. Noise cancellation is good since it's in-ear and block most of the ambient noise, buy not like any ANC. Pairing is very quick. Overall a great buy.

name: Nidheesh
title: Love this one ❤️
content: Got this within 3 days from the day I ordered. It was my upgrade from the boat rockers . Only negative point for this headphone is it's bass will be low when compared with others at this price range.but it's sound is very clear and good and battery is excellent and I don't think any headphones have this much charging speed with a great battery backup.even though the build is plastic you won't observe any issue in premium look.its also light weight and worth for it's price🖤

name: Murali
title: Gud but no vibration
content: It's not good not bad we can tel it optimum .... And the battery was super but the main problem is if the phone. Ne comes while driving ... We can't notice because it's doesn't have vibration in this . This is the main drawback other wise nice , value of money . I am writing this review after use 2weeks

name: PREMKUMAR R M
title: Active noise cancellation
content: It doesnt have active noise cancellation... You cant talk even if you sit in front of pedestal fan, mind it i didnt sit too close to fan ... Even lovely breeze can bring the noise to receiver... Worst.. Its indoor headset... Not out door head set, Dont buy this if you are related to Civil people, manufacturing and markering, horrible experience while travelling by bus and train..

name: Sagar A.
title: Best in class
content: Sound quality: Clear sound. Crisp and soothing. No disturbance. No loss of sound. The notes are mostly clear. Music is enjoyable.. Bass is balanced. Not for bassheads.. Battery: Lasts for lifetime. One of the longest battery backup among the wireless earphones.. Pairing: Supports quick pairing for One plus Nord. Not sure of other phones. Just separate the buds from the magnet lock and it is power on. Similarly join them again to switch off.. It has a brilliant 'switch over' option that allows to connect to the last two paired devices interchangeably with just a press of the pairing button.. Have used Infinity glide 120 which had much better music quality. Undoubtedly. But one plus is far more user friendly.

name: vijay
title: Good earphone
content: I am writing this review after one week of purchase here we go. Sound quality is crisp clear when you heard in Spotify with very high quality streaming quality I was amused and bass well they are different types of bass so for me it's good I had senhesiser hd 4.40 I can compared to sound quality but bass wise it's different because it is in ear headphone it's little less bass not like some reviews are saying it has high volume I mean very high volume in iPhone it's excellent. Noise cancellation in some reviews people are saying there is no noise cancellation it's wrong when you start your music it will do the rest this earphone it avoids most of the noise outside environment. Battery quality I used for 11 to 12 hours when I bought this earphone then didn't uses for 6 days but there is still 20% battery left . So best way to last long battery is to hear the music in 80% less it will last longer. So overall a great earphone but i give four stars it's because they sacrificed switch buttons and no on off buttons magnetic technology is good but if on off buttons is there means it will be good ..

name: Hitesh Kantharia
title: Works well with smart phone and laptop
content: Good product. I specially wanted to get Bluetooth earphones for taking Voice calls in my office laptop. This one serves the purpose. The other side can listen to my voice clearly too. Dual paring helps to switch from laptop to phone and back. Good for work from home.. Music on the phone while workout is not that good but that my view coz I use AirPods too.

name: DWAYNE
title: Best product in range as compared to other competitors. Sound is good!
content: I'm a musician and earphones are part of the journey now since 12 years.. I really loved the bluetooth connectivity on this, its super fast.. The build quality of the buttons and overall asthetics of these earphones are crazy good! Its OnePlus afterall.. Talking about the audio. Firstly, don't expect everything in this price range. Build is good. The call microphone is damn clear on the otherside of the receiver while on calls. But there's no noise cancellation feature while hearing music. The in-ear earbuds do a decent job isolating you from the atmosphere.. Connectivity is amazing. Sound is clear and not too screechy on the high end. It's crisp enough.. Sound quality overall is really nice.. Not a fan of the bass boosted earphones anyways. Thankfully these earphones have decent bass. They have kind of dropped the bass by a little in the hardware equalization.. For wireless earphones with such good quality music and price range its really worth it!. Don't think much pick it up, you're not going to regret this one

name: NP
title: Best handsfree in <5k
content: Am some way not comfortable with single ear BT devices or ear pods for long calls even though I use then for short calls. Wired hands free are good but pick up too much of ambient noise which is a pain for the other person. Randomly picked this up but was surprised at the noise cancellation... Cuts out most of the regular noises like a bike passing by or a loud fan and the regular kitchen noises. Pairs seemlessly with BT devices and love the way the call switches back to the original device when you keep both the ear pieces together (ends are magnetic). For the price a definite buy.. Cons: Doesn't have a mute/umute button and you need to be around the system/phone to do so.

name: amazon4rkb
title: It RANDOMLY Disconnects!
content: These Earphones sound good and you won't be able to find any flaws when they are connected, the Base is impressive but not the best, and the noise cancellation is Nice. But the problem I have is, it sometimes Randomly disconnects from my OnePlus 7 Pro, and then it's almost impossible to get it connected, initially it was fine, I thought it was a glitch or something, But now it's getting on my nerves.

name: Sai Teja
title: Recomended
content: 👉This is the honest review what you are looking for ...... I am making this review after fully used for about 3 months .... This is recomended product for every one as the quality and performance of product is very well. If you start using this it becomes like necklace as you will use this all the time. # Sound quality is crystal clear we can feel every instrument sound, and trebels also well controlled ,but in extra bass we should compromise for some. # Mainly its battery working very well and after full charge it lasts for more than 20 hours of continuous use. # i love the magnetic switch on/off( when you put them together they switch off to save battery power ,then when you need them , you just pull them apart and they're on and connected to your device within one second... And also quick switch option is very helpful to switch between two different devices simply in very less time .. 👉highly recommend for music lovers who loved to feel music not for extra bass Likers. ............... Tq...............

name: Prasad Rode
title: Fabulous
content: Best headphones writing review after a month. Bass : bass is average but not the low. I don't know why some peoples are blaming it .. Battery backup: gives 19 and half hours and more backup I tested it by my new stopwatch .. 10min charging for 10hrs is for OnePlus chargers but for ordinary chargers like I have it takes 50 min for the full charge. Magnetic on/off: very very fast it works. Connects very fast when seperated. Music quality : it has very nice music quality .it has clear music. Noise cancellation : not so good but not so bad. Bulid quality: strong and durable it is. Overall nice headphones. Blue colour is nice but it seems to be bad in photos. So if you are blue colour lover just go for it

name: Hari Prasad
title: a good product for basic audio and calls
content: I have been using this for 2 months now and I am overall satisfied with this product. I use mostly for calls all the time and occasionally songs. Bass is not that good and won't get that much feel when listening to songs.. Call quality is good.. Pros:. 1. Battery backup - getting 3 days for almost 5 hrs talking and 30 hrs standby. 2. Call quality - i keep the very low volume and yet it's very loud and clear. Cons:. 1. Bass quality is not that much good. note: most important thing is when you remove the buds from ears they might get attached accidentally and so it will switch off... and you have to separate them for turning on again( it happens most of the time for me). coz...due to this when you get a phone call, it will be in switched off mode...u have to answer the call with phone earpiece and then separate the buds.. it will turn on and gets connected after 4 seconds and so then the calls can be answered with buds.

name: Roshan kumar
title: Overall good neckband. 4 stars only because *nothing is perfect.*
content: If you haven't used any one before, then you don't feel comfortable wearing first time. But after 2-3 days you will get used to it and if really feels very comfortable.. It claims 20hrs battery life but if you don't hear music and even if you hear but at low volume then it will last for 2-3 days easily.. Charging is very fast even with a 20watt charger.. You can see the battery remaining but with gap of 20%only i.e. if you are left with 90% then also it will show 100% but when you reach 79% then it will show 80%.. Quick switch I don't use that much.. If you are thinking that you will use that much often then that's wrong. It only suits in paper. ( That works preety great actually).. I had also purchased to use with my pc and phone but PC's sound doesn't come although was connected.

name: K.Manohar kumar
title: Don't go for blue if u like keep a low profile..black does a better job
content: Everything's good ..so far ... I haven't used many Bluetooth earphones before ...so don't know sound quality. ..but they definitely sound much better than .. standard samsung in the box wired earphones. As for colour ...i went for blue even though i never liked blue .. don't get me wrong ... earphones look good ..it just isn't my taste...if u like to blend in and not stand out ..go for black... otherwise u will be fine with these as well.... 4star ... I don't feel comfortable with these in ears.... Update: there is significant delay (1-2sec) with pause and play button during videos. Review down by 1🌟

name: Ashish Sreevatsav
title: Crystal and clear:)
content: A good product at this range from OnePlus. This a review after 4months of my experience with these wireless Bullets Z from OnePlus .. 1)Build Quality : Very nice and strong enough.. 2) battery : i would say fantastic because i'm a very rough users and i use this earphones to attend online classes , music and for watching films and i got 1 and half working time . If you're a simple your you will upto 2 days of battery life with single charge.. 3) sound quality : It's so pleasure and sweet to listen mids , high, vocals clearly and the base will not be that much loud and good division levels of music (as you can hear all kind of insturmental sounds clearly).

name: Yash kumar
title: Op headset
content: Its a good wireless earphone its sound quality is inpresive but its noise cancellation is not so good and it is good for a medium bass lover it has bluetooth 5.0 and has a good range the company says that it has 10 metres of range but i will say it has 8 metres range but that is also very good and now the thing for that only i buyed it and that is its charging speed it is true that in 10 min it charges for around 10 hrs and in 20 mins it gets full charge but the company say when it is fully charge it can be used till 20 hrs but i will say when i countinueslly use it lasts till 18 hrs and. Thats also a good time and depending on its low price it is very good.

name: Sourav Dokania
title: Overrated, not for me
content: Well, firstly the magnetic lock in highly overrated as it does not lock in place most of the time. Yiu will have to manually lock them, as the magnets are not very strong. And secondly, OnePlus has a really bad bug where it does not allow you to change bluetooth audio when connected. I don't like these earphones which go deep into the ears, it feels quite uncomfortable wearing it when no music is playing.. I used Samsung's level U before this and I really loved that earpiece since it had vibration feedback, simple connection and gentle on the ears. I wish to buy something like that again.

name: Ezio Velez
title: Nice Headphones
content: Is the first time using this kind of headphones, I was looking something that can be no so expensive and please my expectations, this product did it.. This first impression was an awesome bass, very cool, not at all disturbing.. Sound quality is very good.. Where I live is quite loud, and when I use this headphones are doing a nice job to forget about what's going out there.. The comfort I can say that in not 100 % cause is little bit no so nice in your ear after 3 hours of use.. The product is coming in nice pack, with USB cord(is quite short, but don't matter to me), 3 rubber S,M, L for the head phones and the manual.

name: Abhishek Sachan
title: Wired headphones > Bluetooth headphones
content: If you are used to wired headphones and are looking for a replacement with this one, you will likely not be satisfied with its quality. Turns out, compared to wired headphones, not only this one but almost no bluetooth headphone is better in quality since data rate is limited (some of you may already know that but it was new to me).. However, if you are looking for an additional headphone just for its utility in workout, running etc., you may find it useful since it has got best battery life out there in under 2k price range and also some useful features like 'one tap device switch' etc.

name: Rajat
title: Earache! that will cost you ₹2000.
content: Key points are-. 1. Discomfort after a certain period of use.. 2. The produced sound may trigger a migraine at higher volume.. 3. Lacks the crispness.. 4. Superb build quality.. 5. Ease of usage.. 6. Poor noise isolation.. 7. The mic input is great.. 8. Not recommended for prolonged music listeners.

name: Saket Nimbargi
title: Quality Budget Wireless Headphone
content: The headphone is really good. Connects seamlessly to mobile or laptop via Bluetooth. The sound quality is also good given the price point, the audio quality is clear no disturbance as such. The biggest take for me is its battery life. With a single charge, one can get up to 5 hours but it depends on your use case for me its mostly attending calls or listening to music. One problem I face is while I'm on call it sometimes gets disconnected in between, I don't know if this is a common problem or not. Overall it's the best buy for the price.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great noise calcelling!
content: I tested this out in traffic. I drove with this in my motorcycle and it works great. The noise cancelling was too too good in traffic but I don't recommend you drive when wearing this for safety issues, sometimes I couldn't hear the horn noises.. The quality is just great for the price point and the fit is comfortable too, very sturdy in the ear but no pressure. Great job!

name: Danny Simon
title: Watch out for volume control buttons not working!
content: Used it for 3 months...everything is great! The sound clarity, battery back up is amazing, bass is sufficient for a 2k budget BT headset.. Only issue after 3 months, the volume controls stop working completely. The mic has also stopped working, so can't answer calls anymore, can simply use to listen to music and podcasts now.. It seems this is quite common on the oneplus forums. I still have to take to the service centre to see what they are saying about this, it still comes under the 1 year warranty period.

name: Nishant Mishra
title: Great Sound, Comfort and Controls
content: Sound Is crystal clear. The Bass is good. Don't know if it has preamp or not but, the loudest sound is very loud, which I feel is a good thing as you have a wide range of loudness. As expected from OnePlus, battery life is great. On one full charge, I can use it for a week (max 5 hrs per day). The quick charging actually works. These are light and comfortable. The controls are pretty simple and intuitive. Ear fitting is impressive, not too tight and not too loose.

name: PranS
title: Found it not bad but not good enough either.
content: It has good bass but the problem is that it's not deep and is somewhat on the sharper side. And that spoils the overall sound quality. The piece I received sometimes doesn't turn on after it switches off and I do not know how to get that taken care of.

name: Pratik
title: The (almost) perfect budget in-ear wireless earphones.
content: TLDR: At this price, its either this one or Realme neckband.. Pros:. 1. Terrific battery life. (It actually lasts 20 hours). 2. Can switch between two devices on a single button press.. 3. Pretty lightweight.. Cons:. 1. Base lacks punch.. 2. Max volume tends to crack the sound.. 3. At times, connecting can be a hit/miss.

name: Himankan
title: No complaints
content: Been using it since more than 3 months, haven't found any noticeable issue, the sound quality is as good as any premium headphones out there. The only thing missing is aptX support. Butvit does support AAC. I'm pretty sure its not noticeable unless you test it side by side with another headset with aptX in an acoustically sealed room or very silent environment.

name: Abhishek
title: Best earphones in the 2k range
content: Purchased this for my Galaxy M30s for Rs 2000. My review is based on the product's value for the amount paid.. Pros:. Great battery life. A single 15-20 min charges gives me hours of playback time.. Good sound quality with decent bass.. Magnetic on/off feature for optimal battery use.. Comes with 3 different earbud sizes with the packing.. Packaging was great.. Cons:. Fragile material.. 5/5 definetly worth my money.. The wireless earphones that comes a close second to this under the 2k range is definitely Boat Rockerz 255 Pro.

name: Dora
title: Not great support for non OnePlus devices
content: The earphones themselves are very well built and sturdy with a long lasting battery that charges very fast, however support for my Samsung device seems to shaky, there are scratchy sounds that occur occasionally (much like the slight distortion that comes out of speakers that have been playing at high volumes for too long). Initially I assumed it was a problem with the particular unit and not the product as a whole, but after the same issue persisted in my second pair I called up Amazon customer care and returned it immediately.. I do not like the fact that OnePlus would market earphones to all brands that have issued with all other brands except their own.

name: Amit G.
title: Good wireless earphone under ₹2000
content: I am using the earphone for around 15 days. It is really a good earphone . The sound is really crisp and clarity is superb. Using it for zoom and phone calls gives a good result. The battery is very good so the magnet on the earpiece. The Vocals in are really superb and the mid and the high are too smooth and enjoyable. The bass is only the negative point in the earphone. The sound clarity and connectivity are the 2 positive points.

name: Dinesh Bhat
title: VFM - Value for Money
content: Edit after 4 months of usage:. Highly buggy earphones, if u connect when call has already started, you head the voice in earphones but mic is taken from phone. Sometimes just doesn't start when unplugged. Noise cancellation is very poor, you've to be in a really silent room to speak on call, else other person on call can hear even you swallowing your saliva. Review after 1 week of usage:. Pros:. Audio quality 4.5/5 (best esp for Base lovers). Speed 4/5 (response time is decent on clicks). Battery 5/5 (gives what they promise, best part is, if you have a OnePlus phone no headache of carrying multiple chargers. Range: 4/5 (Stays connected when you keep phone in one room and go around all other rooms too in a 3BHK). Cons:. Noise cancellation 2/5 (No use when outdoors and want to talk on call, outside noise and wind noise is easily picked up). The mouthpiece is placed in such way that you can't hide it inside the shirt collar nor it goes inside helmet (while riding) so it easily picks up wind noise and person on the other end of the call can't hear anything

name: Amazon Customer
title: Auto Disconnect and connect issue
content: i bought this earphone and its start facing issue after 4 day after that its connectinue disconnect automatic and then connect after few second . so i replace earphone but in new product again facing same issue . very disappointed with oneplus . then downgrade their quality day by day . even facing issue with my oneplus 6 . one i battery is plus point of this earphone but if earphone keep disconnect again n again what u do with battery :P

name: Chaitanay
title: Don't buy it. I repeat, don't.
content: After seeing so many positive reviews about this product, I bought it.. I made a mistake.. The volume and play/pause controls are strange. Either none of those buttons will work, or the volume will be increased to maximum on its own.. I replaced it once and the problem is still there.. (There's no return option for this btw). Forget about bass, its not there.

name: Leela
title: It's really nice...... Good sound quality and good charge backup....
content: It's really nice....... Good sound quality and good charge backup..... Bass livel lightly slow.....!. Overall earphones wa verry and verry verry nice.....best budget branded and quality Earphones...definately buying this price ...1999

name: kushal g.
title: Not expected in bad way.
content: I am unable to provide a proper review as I couldn't spend much time and had to sent as the unit I received were faulty. I feel they are not at all suitable for gym.. As after a sweat session my volume automatically rose till 100 percent and then a painfully beep was crying in my ear to disconnect them.. Next replacement set, after gym session, my micophone and device switch button is not working.. This is ever in my life the the earphone couldn't get through a week also.

name: Molly Dhasmana
title: Worth the price
content: Just got it, the battery life seems superb and the best part is dash charging... Don't buy if you are looking to play games like PUBG on this one.. even with the low latency there is a noticeable lag.. e.g. lag in bullet sounds, footsteps etc. better stick to a wired headset for gaming, however other than this the music is decent and overall the product is worth the price!

name: ashish
title: Disappointed (from a oneplus fan)! 😔
content: I had one plus bullets wireless 1st generation before this and they were working perfectly fine. I bought the wireless z earphones because of the quick switch feature as I have to take lot of calls from my laptop and I usually listen to music from my phone.. The only great thing about the earphones is the ability to switch between 2 devices and the battery life.. The sound quality feels like 100 rupees earphones you buy from the street vendors. And the build quality is very cheap.. This is the first time I am disappointed with a oneplus product. I expected better from them.

name: VMSULTHAN
title: Best earphones for ONEPLUS Device Users. using other brand devices?then read below [Review by VM]
content: [Review After 4 Days usage] (Will update if I found any other issues). ---IN BRIEF---. -Very Low Bass. -Slight latency for non-oneplus devices (am using Moto g5s +). - No latency issue with Oneplus devices. - 5% more (from smartphone) latency while using with Computer/mac. - Not waterProof, it is only Water-resistant and sweat resistant. - No pouch, Charging cable is very short and includes 2 pairs extra ear tip. - Easy switching between two connected devices. - Flexible band and cable. - 16 to 19 hours of usable battery backup. - Can use Regular charger adapter (do provides same speed that of Oneplus adaptor). - 10 mins charging = 10 hrs playback (any changing adapter with 5v and above works). - Great Comfort, Great Sound signature, Great Mic quality. -Simple Design. [ Does this review Helped you..? show your answer by using helpful vote :) ]. ---FULL DETAILS---. ABOUT SELLER / PACKAGING. 1. Ordered the product on 25 - June - 2020 & Received it on 28 - June - 2020 (3 days). 2. came in an Amazon Plastic cover. for some reason, cover (Amazon Ash cover) was opened by someone. Don't know who.... 3. there was no damage to both the box and product. The box was sealed one, No issue with that.. 4. I was not happy seeing that someone already checked the product inside the package, as there is no visible damage to the box or to the product, am satisfied by the package.. ABOUT THE PRODUCT. 1. using it for 4 days now [OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z with Moto g5 s Plus device ]. 2. In the box - Bluetooth earphones itself, with 2 pairs of extra ear tip (3 pairs in total), Type-c Cable, and some paper works. (NO Pouch included). CONS (Defects). 1. Very Low Bass, If you are a Bass lover, Don't buy it, you will be disappointed.. 2 Latency Issue (Audio sync with video), slight latency issue (very slight on smartphones) especially when it is used with other smartphones other than oneplus.. 2.1. there are no such issues when using with Oneplus Devices.. 3. in Laptop the latency issue increases by 5% - 10% more, than that on smartphones. only experienced it at times, especially while watching Youtube videos.. 4. not WaterProof, it is only water-resistant and sweat-resistant.. 5. While not using it, the wire reaches just below our chest and at the time, it gets hooked in the table, so every time when I don't use it, I hide it under my shirts.. 5.1. Have no place to hold the earphones at rest, just a small wire holder could have done the job. 6. No pouch included. 7. The charging cable is very short. just around 15 cm.. PROS (Advantages). 1. Amazing Battery backup, Out of the box it has 100% charge and used it for 3 days (more than 16 hours usage time). 1.1. Done the first charge only after 3 days, took only 52 minutes to charge from 0% to 100% (with 5v regular charger). 2. You do not need Oneplus Charger Adapter for it, Just regular 5v charger is enough (I used a 5v charger), 10 mins charger = 10 hours playback also works with regular 5v charger adaptor.. 3. Great comfort earpiece. not experienced any pain, (Continuously used for 4+ hours). 3.1. Do fit well on ears (for me, and I has used for cycling). 4. Has a great grip, over the neck, will not slip that quickly. 5. Amazing sound signature can distinguish each instrument. 6. Great Mic Quality.. 6.1. The mic can also be used as an input device for PC/MAC too, (for Desktop Whatsapp and other social apps). 7. Easy Switchable between 2 connected devices, Just double-tap the connecting button to switch.. 8. The band and wire is flexible, making it easy to carry around. CONCLUSION. if you are a high bass lover, don't buy it, the bass is below average, but still enjoyable, I personally not a bass lover but still I think the bass is on a lower side. But the sound signature is awesome and so am loving it.. If you own any oneplus device, then go ahead and buy it, there is no better option at this price.. owns any other brands..? well watch some video reviews from youtube, about this earphone latency and decide it.. HOW SATISFIED I AM as a USER. 1. Package-Wise - 80% Satisfied. 2. Functionally - 90% Satisfied. 3. Design / By its look - 95% Satisfied. I Bought This product for 1999rs.

name: Aditya Prakash
title: The budget listener's dream
content: Was a bit skeptical at first because I was apprehensive about the fact that a bluetooth earphone can outperform a standard over-the-ear headphone with significantly big speakers. Boy was I wrong.. I've had this for a short while but it's been a delight. Pairing and connecting is like cutting through butter, especially if you use a OnePlus device. Even if you don't, doesn't make much of a difference.. Sound quality is far better than I expected with a balanced sound system. It's not very bass-heavy that muffles all the other frequencies, but enough bass to feel that sweet beat you hear in EDM songs.. Tl;dr, you won't feel like you're listening to music muffled by a pillow, that's characteristic of other bass-focused earphones out there.. The price is justified. It's incredibly light weight and the ear buds are comfortable and don't fall off easily. Noise cancellation is impressive too.

name: Roo H
title: A steal!
content: In terms of sound quality it is rather average, but for its price all its other features makes it a steal!. 1) Though all my devices are Apple products, its quick pair & quick switch features work seamlessly with them.. 2) The magnetic turn off feature comes very handy in many situations.. 3) The battery life is most impressive!. 4) The neckband is comfortable & flexible unlike most other brands. Would definitely recommend.

name: Kiran_Chittimalla
title: Not at all satisfied
content: There is no 0star rating so I'm giving it as 1.. the only better thing with this product is that charging with type c cable. Only for namesake it's a bass edition, very unhappy with the sound, it's just gives a loud sound that's it. .. I already have far better product than this at 1500 price range.. My regret here is it doesn't have return options, only accepting a replacement..that's very discouraging for any user.. Very much disappointed ☹️

name: Lucky Ansari
title: Worth the cost... and some more
content: I have an old lenovo K4 which i use for listening to podcasts & Audiobooks and these work best with that device. So if you are in for a first time buy of your wireless plugs go for it as a trial run, they wont bit you in the behind like some other brands.. The best thing i like about them is the sound notifications for full volume, disconnect, connection and other stuff.. There is a bit of connection drop issue but i thing thats because i am using an old 2017 device with these and it must be the backward compatability issue. If some one else could confirm that will be a huge time saver.

name: Surya
title: Connection and audio stuttering problems
content: The sound quality is good. The bass isn't that good but it's ok.. The real problem is, connectivity. Sometimes it just connects and disconnects every second. It's so annoying. It also has audio stuttering problems and latency issues. While gaming, the audio is almost half a sec late and it affects gameplay entirely. Hard to adjust. They claimed low latency in fnatic mode but that didn't work at all.. It's just stupid. None of the YouTubers are talking about this. Maybe I got a defective device or something. I'm gonna apply for replacement and if the second one does the same, I'm gonna go for refund.

name: Rohit Mishra
title: Best one
content: First i was little skpetical about the purchase. Before buying this one i ordered many Bluetooth earphones but was not satisfied with anyone of them. Many of the reviewes says that they do not have much bass in them but to be honest these are perfect with full of features. Device switch button is a game changer and work flawlessly. Base is sufficient not over powered and the battery life is the best part. I charged them on Monday and today is Thursday. M31 may sound bassy but cant get the quality these earphones have. One word go for it

name: Imran Malik
title: OnePlus has done a very good job
content: These are really good earphone in terms of build quality or design they look very premium or comfortable. And there are some smart features as well like quick pairing mode, low legacy mode, multi device support, so these features are really helpful in day to day life..and if I talk about sound quality so overall these earphone sounds good. They are not best in terms of sound quality but if I consider the price of this earphone then they perform very well. Vocals are very clear high's are good and lows are also very well balanced so overall sound quality is good. But if you're a bass lover then you should go with boat 255 pro. But if you want a good and balanced sound quality then these earphone is for you.

name: Anurag Trivedi
title: Frequent Disconnection
content: GOOD (Pros): Sound Quality, Battery Life, Charging Speed, Call Connectivity & Call Quality.. BAD (Cons): If the music or video is playing, it stays connected. The moment I press 'pause' on phone, or start searching for the next music or video to play, it disconnects. Once it disconnects due to pressing pause or search for next music/video, I have to switch 'off' and 'on' the BlueTooth on my phone again & again, pull the earphones from the ear and join them together again and again to connect it. In short, "irritating".. Does anyone has a solution to this problem?

name: karthik
title: Value for money with Best battery
content: Best Battery ever in an Bluetooth headset from a trusted brand. So far the devices works awesome, no issues. Build quality is above average if your compare to opponent like Boat. As you might know, bass is lesser than other headsets in the market. Fast pair works great with OnePlus. Fast charging helps to pump up to 100% in even less than 20min.

name: Shreshth
title: It's ok
content: I got this because i wanted a great battery back up.. Plus I keep losing my headphones every 5 months and didnt want to spend too much on them.. Pls I had a onePlus phone so i thought it'll work well.. It doesnt switch between my laptop and phone too easily. It can switch from the laptop to phone with a button.. However, it doesn't switch from my phone to the laptop easily, i need to select it in the bluetooth options each time.

name: manish
title: ALART PLZ
content: Dear comrades. I DON'T KNOW WHAT U WANT BUT IF U LIKE BASS,SOUND ,POWER OF BASS, DEPTH OF BASS REALLY U WILL BE VERY DISAPPOINTED.. IT'S SOUNDS LIKE 50 RUPES EARPHONES LIKE PURCHASED FROM SLEPAR COAH OF TRAIN WITHOUT RESERVATION.

name: sreejith
title: Very convenient to use
content: I bought this headphones to use for my phone calls and zoom video conferences via my laptop. I found to be very convenient for these uses. The features I liked are: easy to pair with multiple devices, easy switching between them (there is a button to switch between paired devices. Battery life is good too. In all these days, I may have charged it once or twice and it is going on without giving any issues.. I would rate it 5stars if it was being used exclusively for attending phone calls/conference calls. 4 stars for overall performance when considering quality of music listening as well.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Buy only for calls and meetings not for music
content: Buy this only if you have to attend lot of calls and meetings through the day. The battery life is excellent as well as charging is superfast. You can connect two devices and switch between them. On a single charge it will last for more than two days.. However the sound quality is not at all good for listening to music, the bass is bit low and during travelling other person will not be able to hear you properly due to microphone noise.. The earbuds are made of hard plastic and if you have sensitive ears you might get headache after using through the day.

name: Priyanka
title: Not good
content: 2 stars are only for battery and build quality.. Battery: very long lasting battery, charges quickly.. Build: very good. Smooth Matt finish with flexible neck band. Nice color options.. Sound quality: sharp sounds causing ear ache. No bass, plane sound. Sometimes I could hear low buzzing sound when it is standby. Couldn’t use continuously due to those sharp sounds at certain frequencies.

name: Sanjeev Kumar K.S
content: It's definitely one of the best earphones in this price range.. I've been using it for a while with my1+ 8T.. It's very easy to connect and switch between different devices. But the battery is not as good as they say and it's not the most comfortable earphones to wear for long time.. The buttons don't feel very solid and their response time is just awful.. But oerall the sound quality is amazing and bass is comparatively improved from its previous version. The range is good aswell.. Fast charging is a cherry on the cake.

name: Aniruddha
title: Great Bluetooth Headset for Price
content: I have been using the Bullets Wireless Z since a month and have been quite satisfied.. Definitely recommend for OnePlus users looking for a cheap Bluetooth headset.. Pros:. 1) Easy to switch between two saved devices. 2) Connects quickly to OnePlus phones. 3) Turning them on and off is amazingly simple and quick.. Just need to pull them apart (Turn On) or put them back together (Turn Off). 4) Battery life is terrific. 5) Charges super fast. 6) Build quality seems solid. 7) Light-weight: Don't even notice I'm wearing the headset when not using it. Cons:. 1) The sound quality is average, not great but not bad. Definitely lack of bass for those looking specifically for it. 2) I have trouble sometimes when switching between the two saved devices but not sure if it's because of the earphones or the devices. 3) For my ears it isn't comfortable to wear for extended usage but this will vary from person to person. 4) Mic is too sensitive, picks up a lot of background noises. This is quite bad in my experience and the other person can barely hear my voice.. I would recommend to anyone looking for a relatively cheap Bluetooth headset for casual usage. It's extremely convenient and love all the features. Audiophiles should stay away. Also, if you plan to do a lot of voice calls, I suggest you look elsewhere, in my experience the mic picking up background noises will be a big problem but maybe it's just my headset.

name: Armaan Ali
title: Amazing, but bass overloaded! 🥶
content: Bass composition with other freqs is good but not best as you can see in Sony or JBL. So 4 stars for audio quality.. Connectivity speed is superbb plus! It gets connected within the time required to separate ear-buds & put then into your ears. Latency is not even noticable & so 5 star for latency & connectivity!. Battery backup is also amazing my usage is just 4-5 hrs a day, so I need to charge it after 3 or sometimes 4 days. So again 5 stars for battery!

name: shaik zaffar
title: Good for battery life and support wrap charging
content: I had eagerly waited for the product sale in amazon .so after using this ear for a week I am writing a review. First go with pros:. 1) Battery: so one charge can give you a battery life of approximately 18.5 hrs.It take around 40 min for full charge.The most interesting part here is,as company said that 10 min charge will give you 10 hrs battery life(Note:you need to charge with wrap charger). 2) Build quality: So built quality is good.You can easily fit this in your tight pocket by folding. Coming to earpiece which is not made up metal.but thanks to magnet which holds the both earphones in your neck as well as it will pause your song when they are attached automatically. Cons:. 1)Bass: So at this price range you can get better base because this come with 9.2 mm drivers only.. 2) Connectivity: so I found the connectivity issue while placing a call with Google meet app.As well as switching from one device to another device also a pretty slow. CONCLUSION: whether you want to buy headset for long battery life and support fast charging just go for it. Else if you need a good base and better sound quality just go with Realme wireless headset which is available for around Rs.1700.Here you will get 11.2 mm drivers and build quality is also good. If you like this review hit like button

name: Ranjodh singh
title: Amazing
content: Good product for music ...I like OnePlus z sound quality ... everything is on right in this earphones....overall great deal ...thanks amazon ....in battery no comparison ...sound wise oppo m31 is better then OnePlus z...realme buds have good bass...I have these 3 earphones...overall good realme buds..in sound quality oppo enco m31 is best ...in battery backup and casual listner one plus z is best.. and one more thing in this earphones bass is good better then irritated boat 255 ..

name: shopper
title: Good specs with bad audio for music
content: Using it for some time now over meetings, music and video. Pros: bluetooth range is very good, charging is fast. Cons: Sound is muted. Its alright for meetings. For music and videos its complete cheap headset quality audio. Was hoping for better from oneplus.

name: Kasirajan
title: Perfect wireless if you have one plus phone
content: It's worth it and very light weight with perfect sound quality. Battery backup is just awesome with seamless connectivity if you have one plus phone. Noise cancellation is not upto the mark, in fact that option is not there in this model. Hopefully we must get it in the future. One plus rocks and I'm also expecting a watch or fitnessband from one Plus. Overall it's worth the price. Go for it without second thought if you have one plus phones

name: Ashwin Saji
title: Don't Buy this headset from Amazon !!!!!!!!!!! Fakeeeee
content: Don't buy this one coz the ones that are given by amazon is fake ones...... I realised it after these many days. !. If you buy this one check if there is a round button other than the volume buttons on the headset if it's their it will be original if it's not it will be a fake one .... You can call customer service of oneplus and ask.. I was having issue with whatsapp audio message recording , rest everything is fine good battery backup , sound is good but this problem made me realized that its a fake one.

name: Mihir patel
title: Don't think twice
content: Packaging was quite attractive, earphones came already in finding to pair condition , the light was already blinking, I don't know if that's the case with everyone or not. Magnet works smoothly as it can. And automatically even pairs in 6-7 seconds again. Neckband is also of good quality amd you can get the gentle touch of neckband , best thing about it is designed such a way that microphone comes very near to mouth so you don't have to use pin or doesn't have to hold by hand to keep it close to mouth during meeting or call.. Charging and two devices pair features are yet to review. But seems Worthy of 2000.

name: Prajwal G
title: Not for me (too much bass)
content: After viewing too many reviews on youtube I think that op bullets wireless Z will have very little bass that's why I ordered the bass edition but after trying the bass edition I found very heavy bass in this version. but as I Iove flat sound signature I feel the bass is over boosted and I am getting headaches after using it for a long time. So I decided to replace the bass edition with a regular one. People who love heavy bass can definitely go with bass edition. I love rich vocals and instruments with proper balance bass so this bass version definitely not for me. Hope the people who are confused between regular vs bass edition will get an idea from my review.

name: Joker
title: Don't Buy...!!
content: I just brought it ten days back and it wasn't working properly from day 1(battery backup) ..I thought it was because I wasn't charging it properly or noticing it ..but later on the back up was only upto 1r2 hours max...even if it was in 100% charge it wouldn't switch in back.i have to charge it back. Then it didn't switch on atal. When I went to the service cente I was handed over a token that had the checkup scheduled 20 days later from today. And one more thing I noticed is that out of 10 in the queue 7 were with this product having the same complaint. So I suggest you guys not to fall for this product. pls don't waste your money. This series of OnePlus is a uttter failure.

name: Yashwant Patidar
title: Battery life
content: This one plus bullets z is best in its class segment with more than 15 hours of music playback time..... And requires only just 10-15 minutes for full charging....also it's sound quality is best with balanced sound..you may feel low bass if you are a bass lover... Because thesw earphones are balanced in all sound frequencies.....One of the best feature is that it get poweroff when the earphones are attached with each other by the magnets... And again connects within 1-2 seconds when you pull out the earphones and put in your ears... this feature increase the battery backup too much

name: Azhar
title: Superb battery backup 👌with good and decent sound quality
content: After a lot of research and watching reviews I thought of buying this , to my surprise it turned out to be one of the best bluetooth headphones that I have used so far earlier used back beat go 2 , boat and real me .. sound quality is decent for me atleast whos not really a bass lover but it's decent more than enough , Battery backup is the just awesome its way far better than any other headset in the market if u use it sensibly .. m someone whos on the con calls mostly approx 6-7 hrs/day and with all that watching web series listening to songs and other miscellaneous stuff it gives me 2 days of battery backup (with OnePlus charger)..If u were you to take my advice go for it without a second thought . Good luck !

name: Dinesh
title: Oneplus killed it, Superb product 👌
content: This is my honest opinion.. Product is great, good quality, light weight, friendly use, no ear pain after using long time.. Sound quality is perfect, bass is great, decent sound, no cracking sound, connects within sec.. Many complaining about BASS, but trust me bass is prefect in this earphone. You get true sound feeling.. Battery life is perfect, if you using oneplus charger then oly u get 10hrs battery after charging 10mins.. Noise cancellation not avialable, major problem.. Voice calling sound decent.. I give 9.5/10. If u using oneplus phone, then this perfect budget earphone for u.

name: Sunil
title: Disappointed : Naam Bade Aur Dharshan Chote
content: Don't buy if you want headphone for consuming multimedia or music.. High/Treble: 7/10. Mid/vocals: 7/10. Low/Bass:1/10 :(. Noise cancellation: 6/10(passive). Bluetooth range : Good. Battery : Good. Fast charge : Good. Primary purpose of any earphone is to give good sound quality signature but in this area one plus wireless z is huge disappointing it produces flat / loaud sound without depth and very very poor bass. While paying almost double of mid range bluetooth earphones one Plus Wireless z does not justify worth of 2k.. I fill these ear phone not suitable for Indian music. Try at least ones before buying this and Don't waste your hard earned money on this average earphone.

name: Soumya
title: Awesome Headphones..  Just go for it
content: Awesome Headphones, Works without any glitch with Mac Book Pro.. Best Features:. 1. Quick Switch between connected devices. 2. Magnetic control to switch off the Headphones. 3. Auto-connect with Devices.. 4. Sound quality is really good.. 5. Best headphones within 2k Range.. 6. Lightweight & easy to Use. Improvements:. 1. Bass could have been better.

name: Pranab
title: Volume issue
content: This product i was using with my iPhones & windows laptops because it support dual pea-ring & i am writing this review after 3days by using this product below are the issue which i was facing while using this earphone.. 1. Volume of music is automatically getting decreased & become 0 & this is one of the biggest demerits of this product which i observed in both windows laptop & iPhone.. 2. Voice call is also not clear when i was calling any one the other person is not able to hear my voice clearly .. 3.Base & volume is good not bad u can survive it.. 4.Battery backup is good. I had to return this product & get my refund back.

name: Akhil Vishnu
title: Best headset ever used in life... Super duper product... I recommend
content: Super duper product... Used 6 headsets similar but best response from oneplus bullets... Super basssuper noise cancellation, auto off if we remove from ear.. And when replace it autoconnects.. Material super and best thing is battery... Not seen such a battery capacity before... It last me for 5 days after extreme use... Gets charged within 2 hrs... I really appreciate oneplus for this product.... Worth buying

name: Malay Bangal
title: Oneplus - The Name Suggests it
content: Oneplus - The Name Suggests its quality.. Brilliant Wireless Headset Within 2000 budget.. Pros:-. 1. AAC high quality codec supported. 2. Excellent Battery Backup.Just 10% Drop in 12 hour. I think it will last for 4 to 5 days if continuously used.. 3. Punchy Bass. 4. Treble Balanced. 5. Magnetic Off on. If The Two Speakers are attached, The headphone is switched off. If its been separated, The headset gets turned on.. 6. Matte Finish look. No chances of getting dirty or Scratch.. 7. Super Flexible Neckband and Ultra light. You Won't Feel its there.. 8. Super Fast Charging:- Fully Charged in 30 min with my Realme X2 Pro 50W SuperVOOC charger.. 9. Low Latency Mode:- It actually works. Tested In PUBG, No Latency in Voice.. Cons:-. Found Nothing So far.. If Your Budget is 2000 and You are looking for a Decent Headphone, Go for it. 👍

name: Manjunath
title: Overall great excellent k...
content: I like this product very much and genuine product by Amazon just want to say best experience.. thank you Amazon and one plus always great brand and attractive price...

name: Anukul
title: Surely the best Wireless earphones for OnePlus
content: A bit better Bass would have helped the ratings. But this is a very good wireless neck band earphone. And it goes very well with One plus phones, because of its multi-function magnetic attachment. It Plays & Pause audio, when earphones are magnetically detached and attached respectively. The Play doesn't work when buds are disconnected on a non One Plus phones.

name: Ram Singh Choudhary
title: Good battery, but sound not up to the expectations
content: Pros: battery backup, bulid quality. Cons: low bass( even after increased bass from settings) , sound quality not up to the mark. This is my first Bluetooth earphone so I won't be able to judge much. As per sound, a 500 rs boat wired headphone has better sound than this. I was using sennehieser cx 275 before it(it was broken so I tried these wireless) it is nowhere half of the sennehieser cx 275. Did not try any other bluetooth earphone so can't say where it stands in segment

name: azhar
title: Uncomfortable fit, good sound but not in calls and good battery life but takes long to charge.
content: The earphones are really uncomfortable in my ears due to their dysfunctional design. The way they protrude out of my ears make it really difficult to use them in bed. The audio quality is good but it is not good for taking calls as it amplifies the background noises and is really annoying. Another con is that they get really loud but the sound level at the minimum is also too loud and if you want to hear something at low volume than they will surely give you a hard time.. Overall the battery life is amazing but with my 25 Watt Samsung charger it takes more than an hour to charge. Not everyone owns a oneplus device and spending a thousand bucks just for a charger is a foolish call. So the battery charging claims of 20 min are just for the oneplus users, rest everyone can easily anticipate around 1 to 1.5 hrs of charging time.. So to sum up my review,. Pros:. Good battery life. Good sound stage. Cons:. Fit is really uncomfortable in ears, especially if you use them in bed. Audio quality in calls is not good as the earphone amplifies every background noise it catches. Takes really long to charge if you don't own a oneplus charger

name: Rahul
title: Despite the cons it's worth buying it.
content: The design is well thought out. I switch a lot between my laptop and phone so the dedicated button to switch between paired devices is genius. Coupled with the warp charging this is probably the most feature loaded pair on the market.. Cons - 1) Slightly overpriced.. 2) The cable seems very delicate but haven't seen any other earphones with a sturdier cable. Nevertheless, this is a con.. 3) Calls aren't very good. Lots of times the other person can't hear what I'm saying.

name: Sagar Mistry
title: Battery 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 Bass 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻Sound
content: Returned the received unit because of issue I will mention in the review ahead. Basic points for the earphones:. Sound Quality : Sound quality of the earphones nis good, but not worthy of the price. There is mind blasting available, and I did love that, but that is not the only thing I would look for in a pair of earphones. Surely the USP of the earphones isn't the sound quality but still when my old Leaf Ear have better sound quality and soundstage when compared to this, it says a lot about the OnePlus Bullets Z.. Battery life: Top notch. If this is a preference, then this is the absolute best I believe out there. Came fully charged out of the box, and I used it extensively for the next 4 days before being charged again.. Call quality : The limited calls that I took with it, were fine, no complaints on the other side.. Connectivity : The earphones used to get disconnected at random, and also the connection feature by simple joining and separating the earbuds was lackluster at best. This was the reason of returning the earphones as I didn't know if that was the issue with my unit or the earphones in general. itself

name: Ameyakumar
title: Fabulous battery life
content: Very good earphones. So far I have tried Blaupunkt, Jabra, JayZ. One plus are the best so far. The magnetic earphones switch off as soon as the are connected by magnets and are connected to the phone in less than a second when you take the magnets apart. The charging is super fast. Battery life is awesome. The sound quality is very good.

name: Gulshan Thakur
title: Not a heavy bass version its just like normal earphone
content: Bass is not as you expect instead at same price you can get tws from boult audio and they’ll give you more bass than these . Although in gaming it give low latency which helps but there is somelatency unlike skullcandy’s .. for the prices its not justified it should not cost more that 1400₹ but its just a brand tag to give it this price .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good headphones for office calls during lock down
content: Really good headphones for calling, my search of good BT headphones for calling ends here. I am mainly using them for office calls on MS teams while Working from home. Battery backup is really good it lasts for 16 hours which is enough to cover 2 work days. Sometimes users at the other end complained about echoing sound, but reconnecting headphones from computer solved the problem. Switching between two devices (laptop and mobile) is very quick. Sound quality is very good (I mostly listen to soft music).. Worth it..

name: Avishek Kumar
title: Good premium headphones but low bass!
content: Good headphones but the bass is low! The built quality of the headphone is good,looks premium. The best feature is fast charge. 5 mins charge with fast charge and you are done for 2 days(all day use). Good for calling. If you are a bass lover then go for something else.
