I have normal MI headphones of 399 which has better bass than this. Judge what you want first! Lot of features available here to ignore the bass issue.

name: Jyotika goswami
title: using for game, then please dont waste your money
content: if u are a really true music lover then of course this is the best thing u get. but for gaming purpose plz dont buy, it dosent support blutooth codec of Aptx so it doesn't make any sense, the latency is too much while gaming and of course in call of duty, your team mates cant heare you while in game, and i m telling you this bcz i m using oneplus 5. if u

name: Siddharth Divakaruni
title: Quite Surprised
content: I expected this to be average and bought it as a temporary measure until the One Plus Buds Z are available. That aside I'm genuinely surprised by the sound quality right out of the box. The volume levels are also pretty high with no distortion and a few equaliser tweaks give it a very balanced sound.

name: Akash Nigudse
title: All the confusion Solved Pubg, Bass, Build, Sound, Battery and my story for buying
content: People have shouted lot about product.. Here the doubts get clear. Bass - yes this the main factor which impact bass is not as compared with HD Quality but yes its normal. This not for bass lover.. Sound Quality - its better to listen that great sound comes out.. Latency - Oneplus have great latency control, But what about others phone if you have phone with Bluetooth Version 5.0 the latency will not noticable i use it with Bluetooth 5.0 phone for pubg its work fine not getting problem yes all Bluetooth earphone will get short letancy beacuse its wireless but this will not matter alot i play pubg without any delay.. Build - boss its oneplus as always best in market.. Battery - No word such small device and you getting such long bettery back with 20 hours + there cherry in the cake quick charge in 10 min for 10 hours. I loveee it, i was really worried before buying this for pubg use because people have told negative about latency still i made hard decision to get and test it beacuse i was having positive 5.0 Version works fine, when i get my hand on it i was shock ! 0 noticable latency.. Guys go for it if ur bass lover do not please other wise this beast.

name: Ashish
title: Need help from OnePlus
content: I need help from OnePlus.. Fisrt few days the product worked really well but After few days of purchasing this product,. The sound suddenly stops while listening music, calls, watching movies for almost 2-3 seconds and comes back, I don't know if it's software or hardware issue, and I don't even know where to complain about this issue, so I wrote this review, I hope OnePlus team will contact me ASAP coz the toll free no 18001028411 on OnePlus website doesn't pick up any calls, I almost waited for 22mins but no response, even the OnePlus care app doesn't have 'OnePlus bullet wireless z' to it.. PS I called this morning 9.10am

name: mercyboy
title: Very Disappointing
content: The product is very very disappointing. It doesn't stay connected to my OnePlus phone at all. It disconnects every now and then. Sometimes it just stops working completely and I can't connect it at all. I thought maybe only mine was faulty but it happened with my friend's OnePlus bullets as well. Also, the sound quality is bad when I use it with devices that are not from OnePlus

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good one. I recommend it.
content: Ok product for the price.. Ear flugs are comfortable, can use them for long hours and there is no pain. Time taken to charge is very fast. Over all a good buy for WFH long conf calls due to good battery life and as it takes very less time to charge. Connectivity is good does not disconnect if I move to another room. However had problem with switching from one device to another. I had to do it manually. Magnet poweroff features very good. Over all servers the porpose. I recommend this.

name: muhammed aslam
title: Though the mention 1 year warrenty I didnt get any sort of information along with the package
content: I am okay with the product, though they mentioned 1 year warrenty I didnt get any warrenty card or something relating the warrenty along with the package, so if i dont get any solution for this am planing to return it

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Wireless Earphones
content: This is my review after using it for two weeks.. The sound quality is decent and yes, the bass is not much, but there is just enough ( at least for my liking). I purchased this headphone mostly because I needed one with a good call quality, this has so far met my expectations, microphone works well, clear to the other side, even if you are on the bike. So far I did not have anyone complaining about poor voice quality.. Controls could be better,. instant pairing with my OnePlus,. Battery life lasts me about 3 days and charges with warp charge to full in 10 minutes.. Fitting is fine, doesn't fall of frequently.. Overall satisfactory purchase.

name: Selwyn
title: Excellent Product and Amazing battery life. Value for Money
content: First 2 Days Review:. My first Oneplus product and it has NOT disappointed. Kudos to Amazon for bang on delivery and service.. Have been using the device for 2 days now, and the battery has only drained 50% with decent amount of calling and some music and youtube thrown in(2 hours), where the on/off feature comes in very handy( join the magnetic heads together for on/off).. Call quality is superb indoors, where voice is sharp and clear and the opposite person gets clear voice with minimum background disturbance. Oneplus has done a good job with the build quality, the product has an almost premium feeling to it and the toggle feature between 2 devices is absolutely amazing.. When it comes to music quality, here is where I was a slightly let down, where the bass is not that great, but the highs and mids are good. So if you are into hardcore thumping music, u might be a bit disappointed.. But overall, a great product and value for the buck.

name: s.khanna
title: Not quite One plus.
content: Decent build quality but sound definitely lacks depth and bass.Did not return the item because of respect for the Company that gave us the first real flagship phone without the flagship price tags.Oneplus could have given us at a higher price band but without compromising on sound quality.Ordered the Realme buds and they are a real game changer.Decent price and flagship quality sound and build.

name: sudipt123
title: Got a Renewed OP wireless Headset!!!
content: Amazon sent me renewed OnePlus bullets Z, only for me the package had been opened and had no sealing also no spare silicone ear tips. Why Amazon? why on the earth would you do that? The renewed sells for less than half the price! Better to buy from onplus store and save the pain. The Massive reputation setback in my mind for Amazon.

name: Varshith
title: Nice product
content: Pros:. *Battery life is excellent. *sweatproof. *Excellent sound quality. *Magnetic mode works well. *Sound Equalizer is good. *Comfortable and perfect fit In ears. *Button function is good. *Nice product for calls. *Finally excellent product in this price range. Cons:. *Base quality is just decent not excellent can sufficient to listen to songs. *No notice cancellation. *low lantency mode works only in oneplus mobiles so the players get lags when they play in phones other than oneplus mobiles but it not big lags only very pro players can notice it

name: Rajkanth
title: Just go for it!
content: On this budget, I guess it ticks all the points. Good sound clarity, seamless bluetooth connection, good range of bluetooth, excellent battery life, fast charging, dedicated button for switching between devices, good quality material, best fit into the ears, excellent call quality(both sides), etc.. Best in its segment. VFM product!

name: abhishek singh
title: Good product
content: Pros - Mids and highs. Battery life. Charging time is small. Quality is good. Cons - Bass is average , base is. approximately 60 percent of what. boat 255 offers. So, if you are moderate user and love listening songs with base then go for boat 255/ 255 pro. And if you are heavy user and dont mind average bass and use earphones for calling more, then go for this earphone.

name: Bhautik Sutariya
title: Short, Up to point review after 8 days of usage
content: - If you want to buy something for enjoying 😌 music 🎵🎶 don't go for it. - Go for it if your use case if focus 🎯 or work since there's no competition 🥋 to it in that case. - The quick switch and auto 🤖 turn on-off by magnets 🧲 is 🔥. - While WFH i easily and quickly swicth between laptop 💻/phone📱for meeting and calls. - And at last, yes the bass is a little low, but since my primary use case is WORK+music I'm satisfied. A tip: i bought it for 1999 from amazon but you can get same for 1900 from official oneplus store

name: Burhan Abid
title: MISSING ACCESSORIES
content: Got the earphones which are amazing but Amazon is so pathetic that it didn't give the contents mentioned silicon earbuds and the charging cable. Disappointed!

name: Vistrit
title: Good for Gaming on OnePlus devices
content: It is very good. If you are considering it to use for gaming, then only buy if you have OnePlus 8 series(don't know about other phones). With the Fnatic mode on( only on Oneplus), then the latency is very low. It's battery life is also very good,and the type-c charging makes it more easy to charge with the same charger that we use to charge our phone. But for some reason Alexa is not working on it. Anyways don't care about it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: In Budget and good battery life Bluetooth earphones but works with only mobile phone not with laptop
content: After using this earphones for 3 months, below are the review point:. 1. Sound quality is good, as compared to boat better sound. As compared to JBL, not that good.. 2. Charging withing 10min, battery lives upto 1.5 days. With 20 min charging 3 days.. 3. Earphones works with android mobile(I have redmi 7 pro). Calls, video calls, Music, Videos works good.. 4. Earphones with Video calls on Laptop(Win 10) have issues like lagging & sometimes voice gets modulated sound.. 5. Not good with Laptop for video calls as per my experience.

name: Vaibhav
title: Good buy, except for bud size no complaint
content: Good wireless headphones in this range, connects well with one plus phones and with others too and have really long battery life..the only thing that i dislike is the ear bud size, they are too big for my ear and doesnt adjust in ear well..dont know if thats just with me or with everyone, otherwise good earphones, using them while walking,cooking..etc

name: Sanketik Pradhan
title: Feels like a part of my mobile .
content: Reviewing after using OnePlus Bullet wireless Z (OPBWZ) with my OnePlus 7T (OP7T) for 2 week. I have checked the audio quality with Mi note 5 pro also.. Pros :. 1- Battery life (18-19hr nattery backup with 25-30 mins charge. But you must use 30W charger supporting Dash charging). 2- Type C charger (No need to carry separate charging cable for my OPBWZ and OP7T). 3- Low latency mode improves your gaming experience (Low latency mode is available only in OnePlus devices enabling Fnatic mode). 4- Magnetic controls are awesome . Connecting two earpieces turns off your OPBWZ and after unconnecting it automatically turns on and connects with your phone within 3sec. (No need to go to Bluetooth section and to connect it manually. Thats why it feels like its a part of my mobile.). Cons:. 1-Sound quality not best . Bass and noise cancellation can be improved . (Only if you are non OnePlus mobile user). 2- Build quality is not that much premium. It is made up of totally Rubber and plastic material.But for this price range it is best.. 3- The charging port is open. I doubt if it is relally water resistant. There is no warrenty if by chance liquid goes inside your OPBWZ.. Finally I would like to say if you are using OnePlus device then its the best deal for you . You will get audio quality like 5-6k earphones . It is optimized for Oneplus devices (integrated for Dolby Atmos for better sound quality). You have to manually turn the option on in "sound and vibration" section.. Now if you use with other midranged mobile phones (like Mi note 5 pro or Realme phones) the audio quality is very poor as it is not optimized .

name: Sunu F.
title: Great battery life, bad bass (Old version) Meh bass - Bass edition
content: Bass edition review:. It does not support quick switch - so buyer beware. Apart from that the "Bass Edition" just means you get normal bass. Its slightly better than the normal edition - but at the sacrifice of the quick switch which was the main attraction of the Bullet. I would suggest using the normal version and an app to tweak equalizer settings. This version is not worth it... The modified 2 star rating is for the false advertising by Oneplus as they advertise the quick switch on their website.. Old model review:. I looked at reviews over the internet before picking these up. While most reviewers said the bass was adequate in my experience it was really really really poor. I don't really need thumping bass - but this was more of a tin can unless you listen at really high volume levels.. I sorted the issue on my android phone with an app called "Bass Boost" which allowed me to tweak the bass to acceptable standards. The iPad/iOS, because of Apples crazy policies, is not possible without Jailbreaking though.. Battery life is great and you can easily get a week of use at a couple of hours a day. If you can get an EQ app to tweak the sound its a great headset.

name: Sanathoi
title: Annoying blinking light
content: I just got mine today. Packaging was done well. Sound quality is good but the volume is very less. I can deal with all the features as it is good for the price range but i found an annoying feature that i cannot deal with. The white blinking light that keeps on blinking as long as the device is on and connected, it is ok in day time bit when i am watching videos or listening to music in the dark it gets really annoying. It keeps blinking every few seconds. I have read some forums on this issue and there seem to be no fix for this. They are recommending people to stick a black tape on it but who wants to do that when you have paid 2k expecting a good quality product. This is such a minor issue but it is really annoying like an itch on your back that u just cannot reach with your hand. I am thinking of returning it or else i think i will chuck it out of the window someday when my patience is running low.

name: uday
title: Oneplus bullets z
content: I am using this earphones since more then 10days frankly I am not satisfied , mostly for small ear they did not fit Very slippy, and charging cmg hardly 2 days , connectivity fast in for income call, and its very bad in design I did not expert for oneplus team , may some ear came be fit they can feels bass and all try it ur wish. Promisingly I like sony very much best in sound fit superb I have wic200, wic600 ,wic400 all models I post u my purchase dates and my pics

name: Urvi Singhal
title: Great Deal 💯👍🏻
content: Low-Latency. Works well with videos and songs. Doesn't helps in gaming like pubg,latency is there!. Sound (Balanced). Bass is quite balanced. Clear sound. No issues of cracking in sound. No noise cancellation as such. But when you play music with 50 percent volume most of the noises around you seems to disappear. Overall sound is balanced 💯. Very light weight and can be carried easily. Neckband is comfortable doesn't seems like you are wearing something heavy. Built-Quality is Amazing in this price. Fits perfectly in your ears, earbuds doesn't jumps out as like most of the earphones. IP 55 rating sweat and water resistant. Quick switch works good. Battery-yet to be tested. 2000 mai isse better nai milega. If you like balanced sounds and bass then just go for it.

name: sanker
title: Disappointed with noice cancellation and bass
content: I bought oneplus expecting a lot....its audio is amazing good to listen...battery backup and charging of the headphones is also worth mentioning.. but noice cancellation too bad hearing noices from my surroundings even when i send audios on whatsapp....this is totally unfair ...i bought this product mainly for business purpose ...if i cant use it so well because of its noice cancellatiob faults!!and also bass is too bad for gamers i dont think its an ideal product...its bass is even lower than my mi 399 headset😣

name: Achirangshu Patra
title: Good product
content: Good sound quality, but lacks the punchy bass which we Indians love...but overall it's a good experience...battery life is around 18 hrs...noise cancellation is good...while watching movie or listining to audio your experience will be good overall...good instrument seperation, vocals and descent bass ...No lag experienced as of now...this is my 15 days review...Go for it worth your money...good for those who listen to classical or hisdustani type songs

name: vicky
title: Loosing connection continuesly
content: Earphones are good, but I don't have that one plus logo in side the box. While using Amazon Prime videos and sometimes even while using normally, earphones gets disconnected..Majorly while using Amazon Prime. It's says "Something went wrong with the bluetooth devices". Frustrated now. Are you guys facing same issue?. Batter back up is good, right ear fits proper but not same with the left ear.. I replaced earphone, it was nice for 1 week but now it's worst than old one. While listening voice is breaking like alot.. Even bluetooth connection is continuously going off. I have heard only one plus earphones are good for one plus phone but can't help it now.

name: Private
title: Stay away from these if you care for your ears
content: I had very high hopes for these Bluetooth earphones. Especially after watching the reviews and the ratings it has got.. Pros - 1. Build quality is decent as per the price. 2. Option to switch between 2 devices is a handy feature that every Bluetooth earphone should have.. 3. Battery life.. Cons - 1. Pathetic sound quality (It is not about the base but the overall sound output you get is very bad).. 2. Call quality issues(fluctuation in the volume during the call).. 3. I did not like the fitting of these in-ear types which is very uncomfortable during long calls/meetings and it hurts the ears. (I tried all the size of earbuds but it’s just that I ear types are not good for my ears). Conclusion - I am really shocked that how can such a cheap-sounding(both for music and calls) earphones get such a good rating. Now I strongly believe it’s due to PR. One plus does market their products nicely and their packaging is great too, but it does not justify the primary use case I.e listening to music or calling. Having a good battery with additional features is a secondary thing.. I tried paring with android and iPhone both and it had the same issues. For eg. If there is an incoming call, it will start ringing in your ears at the highest volumes for a couple of seconds before it becomes normal, but the damage to your ears has already been done. The same thing happens when the call disconnect sound comes. And the quality of the audio is pathetic. When it comes to music, ₹250 Philips wired earphones sound better.. Don’t go for it if you want to avoid any damage to your ears.. The better option would be to invest in a good wired earphone such as apple or Sennheiser at the same price range.. Sad to see companies(especially Chinese) copying each other and putting all resources towards branding.. And we as a customer should not fall under these gimics.. Anyways, I have returned my one plus bullets wireless z.

name: Blase Abraham
title: Not for bass lovers you will be disappointed
content: If your a bass lover you will be 100% disappointed not two thought on the same.. But if your some one who gives more preference to vocals , battery life , quick charging , switch between device features then don't think twice you can definitely buy this.. Else go for real me it's amazing in terms of bass and has decent battery life

name: Venu
title: One of the best earphone. . .
content: Before I knew about one plus earphone, I was waiting to get a perfect earphone. At last found one. Awesome features, battery backup and sound quality... worth investing 2k for oneplus.. In my years of experience of electronics products with Sony and Philips, I would add Oneplus in the list and is The Best in Class Products like Sony and Philips.

name: Vignesh
title: Good for this price range.
content: Sound quality is good.. Bass quality is also good but not thumping bass.. Excellent battery backup.. Call quality is ok because there is no noise cancellation and coming noise from speaker when speaking to someone.. Noticeable noise coming from speaker when listening some type of songs(old songs). Voice is clear but noticeable noise is there.. I was tested 3 one plus headset all are having same noise problem.. I don't know why i notice noise here and there. Is this one plus headset problem or something else. Tell me your suggestions.. Overall quality good for this price range (except some noise).

name: Bhupendra Kumhare
title: One day review
content: Hands down. Its the best one in this price category, which fitted according to my convenience.. First of all, i am pretty clumsy person, who tends to loose things, thats why i opted for these, instead of TWS earphones, of which there are plenty of good options available.. Secondly, my choice of music is rock, and i generally do not prefer a bass heavy device, so that too fitted in my checklist.. Now, coming to review, any many people would say, its bass is not dat good, I would say it is above average, and woth some minor adjustments in your music player's equaliser, a far better output can be expected.. Build quality a one.. Battery life, i received the earphones in fully charged condition, it was showing 100% battery, and i have been using it for 4 hrs straight, and still listening, while writing this review, and right now it has 94% of battery left.. The pause n play feature, does wonders.. And, the quality of calls is mashallah, such clarity.. Bluetooth has very good range too, i had kept my phone on charging, and have been roaming around my house, doing kitchen work, workout, even have been to roof, the signal was never lost.. The only, thing which is tweaking me out, is non availability of active noise cancellation, so a person on another side of the call will listen to every single detail around you.

name: Md Shahbaz
title: No Bass At All.
content: I Thought One Plus Bullet Z Will Be Good As Watch On You Tube.. When I Bought It I Was So Happy. The Packing Was Beautiful And Connectivity Timing Is Awesome. And Battery Life Is Also Wonderful. But The Problem Is That There Is No Bass At All.. If You Are A Base Lover Then You Can Skip It And Go For Real me Bud 2 Wireless.. And If You Are A Office Going Person And Used To Call Everytime Then One-Plus Bullet G Will Be Good For You. For Calling Purpose It Is Absolutely Fine.. But Don't Expect For Base... Thanks!

name: Avinash Sawant
title: Headphone at its best...
content: Before I bought this product, I searched for a lot of headphones at a lower price. But every headphone had something missing. Then later I saw the reviews of this headphone. In every review, there was a good saying about this headphone.. I finally bought this headhphone at Rs. 1,999/-. It's been a month now I am using this headphone. I am quiet happy with this product.. The sound quality and built up quality is very good. The functioning of pause with magnets on back of headphone is very cool.. The bluetooth connectivity is good. I have a One Plus 7 mobile. Once you paired this with mobile, it connects very fastly with the phone.. When I opened the package, it's packing quality was at its best.. It takes only 10 minutes to charge fully at 100%.. The battery backup is awesome. It lasts upto 15-16 hours.. Overall it is best headphone among all of others to buy.......

name: Niharika Nayak
title: A Great Set Of Budget Wireless Earphones
content: Pros. • Insane battery life. • Comfortable to wear. • Can handle rainfall. • Works prefectly with OnePlus phones. • Stylish (in my personal opinion). Cons. • Average build quality (should have had more metal). • Bass isn't that great. • Doesn't fully drown out street noises. I recently upgraded from a OnePlus 5 (which had a headphone port) to a OnePlus 8 Pro. Although, I preferred wired earphones simply because I tend to drop my phone often, I absolutely adore these ones. They're perfect for when I go jogging and they stay out of your way. The battery life is pretty good too and I get at least a full day with heavy usage. If you're a OnePlus user then these earphones are the best you can get within this price range. The bass and volume are not as impressive as I expected them to be but other than that, these are a great set of earphones.

name: Manoj Kunjwal
title: Worth if you are budget oriented.
content: Pros.. 1. Quick charge and battery backup.. 2. Sound quality is good in treble.. 3. Latency depends on bluetooth version of connected device. ( I didn't face any on my POCO F1) but on Honor 6 yes during PUBG.. 4. Neck band is good.. 5. Connectivity is good.. Cons.. 1. No voice interaction at all to tell battery and On/Off status.. 2. Indicator light always blinking which gets annoying during night while in dark room.. 3. Wire quality feels cheap compared to neckband which is odd.. 4. Bass is okay okay.. Overall with respect to price its a very good product and would recommend everyone if my given cons doesn't matter to you much.. Note.. I bought this for my lil brother for calling purpose while I use Sony WI-XB400 which provides good bass and sound quality in his price segment.. Thank you,. Manoj Kunjwal

name: gowshick
title: Monster batter life but need to compromise on Bass
content: Pros. No need to charge repeatedly ,Very good battery life. Comfort is good but not better than oppo enco m31. Dedicated button for switching device. Automatic Paring performs pretty good once u attach detach heads to turn on and off. Bluetooth range is good. No audio sinc lag on netflix,YouTube OTT platforms. Bulit looks good. Packing box looks premium. Cons. Latency in gaming ,Need to use OnePlus phones ,No other option for top games without lag. Gives decent sound but no dedicated button for bass ,Many wanted to feel beats and bass in Songs. Noise cancellation Ok. Led blinks on side of headphone continuosly,quite bad during night. While controlling volume the change in volume can't be seen in graphical so you won't be able to know the percent of volume reduced or increased using earphone,Tried this in different brand mobiles same result.. Overall. If you are a person who just wants to hear music with decent quality and long battery life you can choose this one defenitely. Incase you can compromise on battery somewhat and prefer quality of sound to be more precious you can try other earphones like oppo enco m31

name: Saransh Malik
title: Best under 2K though choose variant wisely
content: I was looking for a wireless option under 2K and since I had a OnePlus device, I thought of going for this. Now one very important thing if you guys use multiple devices PLEASE DON'T BUY THE BASS EDITION, since the normal version has a physical switch device button which make switching devices super easy, in bass edition you have to do it manually via the device which makes no sense. Apart from that everything is perfect, for me the best is quick charge since I don't like charging a lot of devices each day. Call quality is good enough inside, didn't test a lot in noisy environment but I feel it should be decent enough. So to sum up go for these and choose variant based on your needs. If you use multiple devices just go for the normal version else the bass edition

name: Sourabh Sharma
title: VFM wireless earphones from OnePlus!
content: Earphones with good sound quality, decent bass, average noise cancellation ( only when outdoors though) , and great battery backup!! I was facing an issue while trying to connect, as the phone was not able to detect the them, and sometimes the earphones got disconnected automatically when I didn't play anything. The brother complained about severe latency issues while playing PUBG. Rest assured, you will enjoy watching movies and music with them. :)

name: Kirtan Dave
title: Overall a great product
content: Sound quality is good for the price, not as good as bullets 2. Bass is surprisingly better than bullets 2 thou, built quality is good, again not as good as bullets 2, battery is supremely good(upto 20 hours on full charge) and very fast charging.. Latency great IF YOU HAVE A ONEPLUS PHONE.. Love the magnetice on/off feature, no connection issues, great mic quality.. The only cons i can think of in this price point is, its not for bass lovers (although i don't get why people have such a fetish for bass).

name: Arjun C.
title: Best for the PRICE 🔥
content: Using this for almost 3 months now. Excellent product for the price!. Pros:. Good sound quality. Good noise isolation. Excellent battery backup. Flat sound profile with sharp bass. Feels comfy for 3-4 hours plugged on ear. No latency issues, good for media consumption. Cons:. Not meant for bass heads. Note:. I never gamed on this so im not sure about that.. OnePlus 7 users will get Dolby Atmos.. Note for advanced users:. I used this with a Redmi Note 7 Pro running custom ROM and there was problems when taking calls, you can answer the calls but wont be able to hear anything. This is due to the custom ROM and might be common to all similar neck bands. Then i switched to stock ROM and everything is fine.. Alternate option:. If you want more audio quality then you can check the Oppo Enco M31

name: Anoop Harilal
title: Balanced sounding Bluetooth headphone with comfort and long lasting battery
content: Nice product in this price range.. the build quality is nice and overall it is a great product to carry. At this price the sound quality is pretty good... I felt a balanced sounding experience.. also there is adequate amount of base. but not enough for baseheads. It is sutable for a normal guy who watch videos and listen some music.. I don't feel any latency issue in this product. it will be an awesome product for guys who take phone calls with earphones. and the mic is also very nice... crystal clear voice recording.. The battery life of this headphone is also good. I got almost 18 hours of play time in a single charge.. it's ear piece is very comfortable and I don't feel any fatigue for wearing it for a long sessions.

name: Pj
title: Good sound quality but return next day I received headsets.
content: I got the product and decided to return it next day. Why? Read below... 1. But main prob for me is mic. Mic is I thing extra sensitive for calling.. It picks up every background sound along with speaker's voice. And if you are planing to attend calls on bike, just forget it. It will vanish your voice and deliver only air noise to other person. I use oppo enco m31 and under same condition (on bike), it delivers way better voice and cancel 80-90% air noice.. Also in quite room, mic produces some base heavy voice which get muffeled so other person can't hear you clearly.. 2. It's comfort is not for me I guess. Within half an hour, it start hurting my ears so I have to remove them.. Rest is all good. Battery life is super. Sound is balanced and great.. If someone is not planning it for calling purpose then I guess it will be fine for him/her.

name: yash jain
title: Premium earphones in lowest possible price
content: I love the fact that it gets charged in 10 minutes. USB Type-C was the biggest advantage. I no longer drop my phones and always keep in pocket when outside with headphones on for the majority of purposes. Noise cancellation is soo freaking good that I can't even sometimes hear if someone is speaking directly to me. Bass is superb.. Cons. Initially there was frequent disconnection and range is quite low if I move around in the house. The disconnection issue was resolved after a phone software update.

name: Siddhesh Chavan
title: Incredible
content: There's no other wireless earphone which you could get at this price. Totally worth it.. Been almost a month using it and so far I haven't faced any issues regarding the quality or battery life.. Sound quality is Great, The bass and treble quality is quite impressive and the best thing I consider about the earphones is the battery life! I can use my earphones for 2 days with normal usage if I charge it for 20 mins! That's something I wanted.. Toally worth it, If you're thinking of buying it. Just go for it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: An superb buy!
content: Bought this bluetooth earphones after reviewing extensively since it's launch, and I must say this is the best buy in this range.. Sound quality- great.. Battery backup - awesome. A recharge of 10-15 mins and u r good to go for approximately 9-10 hours.. Bluetooth range is also good.. Design is great and stylish. I bough a blue colour and it's awesome.. When u r not using it, and magnet attaches the ear pieces and Bluetooth connection is cut and saves battery. And when u separate the ear pieces, it automatically connects to ur phone/laptop.. Volume control is easy.. No disruption/noise during calls.. Cons-. Doesn't automatically switch between two connected devices.. Noise cancellation not up to the mark.. Bass not so great.. Overall, a great experience and an awesome buy!! Thanks Amazon!!

name: Girish Parthasarathy
title: Fantastic product for Official calls
content: Was looking for a wireless headset with good mic quality.. This one ticked all of my requirements:. - wireless headset with fantastic battery life(1 complete week for my usage). - mic near the mouth to avoid picking up more noise. Cons:. - Sound quality not great(especially if you are a music lover). I won't hear music during work.. I'm currently very happy as it's suiting my work from home requirements :)

name: priyajit adhikari
title: Its good except those problem
content: 3 drawback i have seen .. 1> i specially chose this headphone for quick on off, just touch two burds. But it's the main drawback when i traveling and my earphone is not in my ear and came a call ,to hear or spoke i have to connect every time. 2> there is no vibrate mode ..but 899 boat has. When call come it vibrate not ringing the phone. Thats where we were it.. connect and call come phone and it ringing horrible on class.. 3>when i share my hotspot to others and my onepluse headphone connect and i use to listen music or other the noise of headphone is breaking.. it is very badly embarrassing... 4>my headphone is not want to connect with my laptop .. but it can be laptop problem .. but my Bluetooth speaker is connected very easily. How it can.. Otherwise headphone is good. About sound and battery has no complain..

name: Vineet
title: A good buy
content: As someone mentioned, after using one plus bullets 2, it's paling in some aspects.. The crisp sound quality that you expect will not be there but very satisfying in comparison to the products available in this range.. Quick charge is a boon.. Bass quality is better than one plus bullets 2.. Extremely lightweight, stays put on the ears easily for a long duration. Especially mentioning this because bullets 2 has a bit of heavier buds which trends to slip from my ears.. Noise cancellation is superb. No latency noticeable and connects easily with laptops as well.. Switching feature works better in one plus bullets z than in bullets 2. Its a Good buy.

name: NIYAD HASHIM
title: No connection with phone when an incoming call connectivity problems when take a call
content: This review is after 3 moths use, Some issues have the product call answer key is not visible when stick two Budds automatically power and Bluetooth cut off so I cannot know handset is nearby, no vibration on call, looks like good and for calling use not for music not user friendly, when need to call takes some time for connect with phone

name: JASIR
title: Perfect in many ways
content: I am writing this review after using this product for 10 days and still has 30% battery left without charging , and I used it minimum 1.30 hours for 7days. Product is quite good .If you are music lover and love that extra bass or you looking for earphone for gaming it can disappoint you .But if u listen music like me with least bass then this offer is steal go for it.. I am a runner and Love to listen to music while running and I do sweat much and it has not effected earphones even a 1%.Batrery life is awesome and noise cancellation is more than satisfactory. Personally I will highly recommend this product to others.

name: Manish Joshi
title: Excitement of the earphone leads to many disappointments
content: Here are my observation and thoughts.. Pros :. 1. light weight. 2. Easy pairing (switching between two device is much easy with the help of a button). 3. Sound quality is decent but....Bass 😴 yes we can say that we should not bass like sony XB series, JBL kinda bass but should not be such low comapre to other like mi, potronics, BOAT, zebronics etc.. 4. Built quality seems fine. Weight is less.. 5. No complains with battery life it's insanely good.. Cons :. 1. 10 min charge 10 hours playback features is available is only applied to Oneplus phone user means to say that charging with Oneplus proprietary charger supplied with 1+ phones.. 2. Bass already mentioned with pros.. 3. Physical on/off switch 👎🏻. U have to use the magnetic feature to turn this off and on.. 4. Supplied User manual lacks many details (Not that much problem right most of us don't read that). 5. I found little bit uncomfortable after using for long hours continuously ear antihelix, tringular fossa starts paining.

name: ARJUN
title: not good as per my experience as per budget cost taken.
content: this head phones are not that good in this budget. there are many good headphones. as I am a one plus uses oneplus 3T from 3-years I thought one plus headphones maybe good for me but my experience did not come that good.. 1.- L given good remark that it have a very good battery.. 2.- compered to features it doesn't have button double click calling directly from headphones button.. which disappoint me a lot as features gone and every headphones we get this feature but as oneplus wireless bullet z headphone give other feature but taken main feature of double click calling last calls taken away.

name: Rakshith N
title: One of the best earphones
content: I must say i am pretty much impressed with sound quality 👌 and battery backup is superb. Charging is fantastic with warp charge and bass is also good compared to bullets z old earphone.. Cons : when we put back the earphones to magnet earphone disconnects and will be in standby and when u open it connects back which usually will not happen with other bluetooth earphones rest all is nice

name: yash sahu
title: Not worth it
content: The product is average overall. Review after using for 1 week. Although it has following pros and cons:. Pros:. bluetooth range. Turns off automatically when both buds are stuck together (with magnets).. Can get very loud if needed.. Cons:. 10min charge = 10 hr battery is complete hoax. I charged for 25 min (it already had 20-30% battery) still it played only 4-5 hrs. (this was their first ever charge btw.. The buttons and functions are unnecessarily complex.. Need to be unpaired from the earphones too. Unpairing from device is not sufficient in order to connect to an other device.. Bass is bad. Sound quality sounds shallow.. The earbuds don't fit properly. For me none of the sizes fit even though I always find the small ones best fitting. These fit, but somehow pop out automatically in some time. The silicone pushes too hard in your ear maybe, pushing itself out of ear as a result.. Overpriced imo.

name: hubert satheesh
title: Design Hurts
content: Instead of sticking to minimalistic design like Oppo Enco, unfortunatley the oneplus team has implemented an eye catching design which hurts the ear when you wear for longer than 20 minutes. The issue is the backside of the earcup are hardened plastic with sharp edges and not curved design. Theres also a very minor projection which hurts the ear. Other than this issue the silicones are very comfortable. The sound is just ok for the price. I expected a better design from oneplus and unfortunately they decided to settle for hype rather than comfort!

name: Vamsi K.
title: Bang for bucks for me
content: It's bang for bucks. I don't think that just for because of bass going for other earphones it gives you a decent bass. As well as greater battery life. I have realme buds wireless too as many of them says it has a greater bass. I didn't find any notice untill i compared both on high volumes. As in my opinion most of the users doesn't have to go for others. Because realme ones won't last for long as compared with these. Even these gets charges fully in 25 min. I think you better go for it if you are a decent music lover not a bass lover. Hope you guys got an idea of this product which will help you buying a fair one for you

name: Shankar
title: Average and strictly NOT for music lovers.
content: Strictly not for music lovers. Bass is too low. This is not for ppl who enjoy music. Vocals are better. You can take calls/meetings and noise cancellation is a joke. Your surroundings are very much heard by other party on calls !! Charging is fast and backup is good.

name: Sanjay Goel
title: Not good for making calls
content: Bought these because I own a Oneplus 6T, on 9th June.. First impressions were great, sound quality was good. Calling from inside the house was good. Great initial experience.. Then when I went out for a walk then the other party complained of wind sound, like driving a bike. These earphones have only 1 internal mic and hence the mic doesn't cancel noise.. Now after a few months, the other party complains of disturbance even when inside the house. Now I have completely stopped using them for calls, use only for music. Kinda defeats the purpose as I bought them specifically for calls.. Most earphones do not mention anything about mic quality, and noise cancellation of mic. Please be aware before buying.

name: Girish N
title: Very Good product from OnePlus
content: Using this earphones for 10 days.. Perfect for those who are looking for daily office calls doing work from home.. Better noise cancellation as compared to other earphones.. Very good build quality.. Perfectly fits to ears.. No bluetooth disconnections observed. Always stay connected.. Perfect Magnetic earpiece.. Highly recommended.

name: Anil Kumar
title: Value for Money Superb Quality
content: Product is just amazing!!. With the reasonable price and quality 🖤. Unbox - really great feel in Unboxing it!. Products included - C Type red cable and extra pair of earplugs and manuals. Experience - One plus products are always amazing, and this earphone tho I really loved it... The quality and the design is really excellent than other wireless earphones at this price range !. It comes with the magnetic attach, where song will be paused when u attach both ear piece, and I had a confusion in Turing ON the earphones, You need to separate the earplugs and automatically it will be ON and Pair instantly... Sound quality - really great experience. And bass is not that good!. Volume control will different in this , i.e., when you increase or decrease the volume through earphones ,it doesn't impact on your mobile volume control.... Battery capacity very good. Nd build Quality is awesome. Love it ❤️👍

name: Ayush
title: Good one in this price segment
content: Purchase for daily use , build quality and sound quality is pretty good bass is also Good but not as much as in boat 255 , used in public places and noice cancellation worked well.. Previously purchased boat 255 pro but there was a buzz sound coming out of it during low volume so returned it and then purchased OPZBE for 2k and they really work well so according to me you can purchase them for 2k or if u dont want to spend 2k then u should go for 255 pro only.

name: Raju
title: Confused with original and duplicate Never settle logo
content: 1st time purchase- there is no Never settle logo inside the box and there is no seal. when i checked the same product retail outlet there is a seal. anyhow I purchased the same. yet to deliver. I will review again after it gets delivered. 2nd-time purchase there is no never settle logo again. i requested to exchange this time again i found there is no Logo.. 3rd time there is no logo and the mic is not working properly i am confused and i am planning to buy from the authorized showroom. I will update once I purchase outside.. Thanks

name: Rakesh Bhatnagar
title: Very good earphones for One Plus mobiles
content: Ordered this to use with my OnePlus 7t.. Very good earphones and connects quickly to my phone.. It's already known that the bass is not too loud, however it's really sufficient to the overall sound quality.. I have used Mi, infinity and senheiser earphones (all wired) and this doesn't fail to impress with the lot.

name: S Reddy
title: Disappointed with Product..
content: Not satisfied with Oneplus Bullets Z other people get an eco, what's app calls face a serious audio issues while you move away from phone, No Bass for music not even clear. seems mic has a serious issue it people can't hear you whn you movie little far probably a 10 feet.. When you are on what's app call & got a phone which you disconnect then bluetooth wil not automatically paired or connected you should stop & start again with magnatic ear buds... Never expected such product from OnePlus. rather than comprising on quality they can stop releasing product on low price... Only Battery life & switch between devices is the only useful in this product thus given 3Star

name: Dhivakar
title: Big Battery... Looks Cheap.... Decent Sound Quality....
content: This one is best inthis proce range with superb battery backup. Pros. One Plus Brand Value. 10 mins charge lasts for 10hrs. 20 mins for full charging. 20 hrs battery backup, even with HD audio on it lasts for 12 to 13 hrs (80 % Volume). Decent sound quality. Cons. Sound quality is not good as Oppo Enco M31 which is also of same price. Finish is not premium (I bought a blue colored one, which looks like cheap headphones of 200rs)

name: Mohsin Shaikh
title: Does the job!!!
content: Was confused on which budget bluetooth earphones should I buy, Picked the right one.. Pros. - Decent quality build. - Decent audio for videos and music(not the best though). - Great audio for calls and great microphone. - Switches off and on by simply using the magnetic feature. - Great battery life(Don't hv to worry for atleast 2 days with slightly extensive usage). - Does'nt tangle. - Switches between 2 devices using a button. Cons. - Audio quality can be better since it is OnePlus. - Should warn when battery is low may be using a voice like how boat rockerzz does.. Overall, I feel it's a good buy if you are not primarily buying it for music. For movies, calls and a long battery life with easy to use features, this product is great.

name: Chiranjib Ghosh
title: OK product
content: Sound quality: Flat sound, similar like 400rs wired head phones, extremely hyped by reviewers.. Mic: very good, serves my purpose of calls well.. Comfort: Do not buy if you are planning to use in long meetings, it will pain due to weight and unbalanced design.. Battery: Good. Fit: Not for girls or gym workouts.. Verdict: Useful for day to day office calls but not for music. Expected at least some quality sound at this price point from Brand like one plus.

name: Venkatesh
title: Definitely not worth the price
content: Edit: The left earcups are already degraded after 1 month of use. (See pictures). Yeah, I am as surprised as you for writing this review. I always trusted OnePlus to deliver top quality products, and they did, most of the time, but not on this one. I would say the wireless z are average at best even if they sell it for 50% off, but with a 2k price tag, they are definitely not worth it.. "BUT WHAT ABOUT THE BATTERY LIFE? YOU ARE JUST COMPLAINING NEEDLESSLY". I agree the battery life of the earphones are one of a kind in the market. You do get (almost)10hrs playtime for 10 mins of charge . But having a 20hr battery won't make up for all the other aspects which are moderately adequate at best.. "THE BASS IS VERY LOUD AND GOOD, THOUGH". Let me tell you a secret. With a little help from a top-secret tool called an equaliser, you can get "loud" bass from a 600rs earphone (Thank you, technology). I will get a lot of flak for this, but you really won't see a (major) difference in bass quality.. "THE EARPHONE QUALITY FEELS PREMIUM". I really don't know how a "premium" earphone "feels". Most earphones are made of plastic compounds and so is this. If you really care about the external quality, the Wireless Z are above average of a typical 600rs earphone. But if you don't have the habit of throwing your earphones often, you should be fine with a cheaper one.. "THEY ARE EASY TO WEAR AND COMFORTABLE". Comfortable, resounding no. The wireless Z has two (heavy) battery packs on either side. So if you plan to wear this for more than 2 hrs straight, expect moderate pain or discomfort in your ears because the battery packs will weigh your ears down. The weight is so much that if you bend backwards, the earphones will fall right off (Thank you, 20hrs battery life). I guess you could wear it the prescribed way, wherein you loop the wire around your ears and then plug them, but no one does that and it's too much.. "THE SOUND QUALITY IS TOP-NOTCH THOUGH". Sound quality is definitely not above average. If you want to watch movies, the audio is on par to that of cheaper earphones. If you listen to music, the difference in quality is barely noticeable. If you wear them while gaming, don't expect crisp audio like headsets.. "THE EARPHONES SWITCH ON WHEN YOU SEPARATE THE EARPODS. HOW INNOVATIVE.". I don't get it, really. It does save 3 seconds while switching on, but to switch it off you have to bring the pods together. Why not just make a button for that? The wireless z does have 3 buttons. But counter intuitively, the middle one is for pause, next song and previous song, all functioned into one button, and the other two are solely for volume. There's another on the left battery pack which is for "pairing with the last device and resetting" but I've not used it once.. OnePlus has really dropped the ball on this. Maybe, they had the utter confidence that consumers would buy this product if they leveraged just one aspect-the battery life-and it worked. We were so excited about the battery that we didn't question the price and by doing so we validated every other average feature the Wireless Z offered for a more than average price tag.

name: Suhas G.
title: Had a Worst Experience
content: I trusted OnePlus brand but it let me down. The connectivity is a joke. device disconnects without reason. Quick change between is worst about this device. It doesn't have the power button to switch quickly between devices. Earbuds are little better than wireless buds 2. apart from that everything else is worst.

name: Shekhar Veerabathini
title: Right side ear phone is not working
content: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition (Bass Blue) product we received on 08th Jan 2021, from 2days 15th Jan the product right side ear phone is not working. Today 17th Jan I approached Amazon Customer Service regards the issue, they are don't help me on the issue.. The product is bought with the suggestion of Amazon Customer Service. On the product they highlighted as Amazon's Choise. Please need help me regards return the product or replace the product.

name: Shantanu U.
title: FAKE PRODUCT, DO NOT BUY FROM AMAZON!
content: I'm not the only one who has faced this fraud!. There are many reviews, but I thought why I shouldn't buy. Maybe those people were exceptions. Also, I've some cashbacks on amazonpay, why not utilising it. Afterall it is festive season.. But now, I'm too in this "exceptions" category.. Pic 1: no "Never Settle" logo. Pic 2: imperfection, which is impossible from company like OnePlus. Pic 3: confirmation of imperfection. How to check whether this product is FAKE:. ∆ No "Never Settle" logo,. ∆ Extremely poor bass and treble,. ∆ Pathethic connectivity,. ∆ Unable to switch audio from phone to computer. NEVER BUY FROM AMAZON!. RATHER, go to official OnePlus website, purchase from there. Price has always been same, even in this festive season.. FAKE PRODUCT!. DO NOT BUY THIS FROM AMAZON!

name: Rounak Sahu
title: Worst sound and connectivity
content: Didnt like these earphones, sound is worst like the 100 or 200 rs earphone. Cant connect properly to laptop there is sound lag, also not working well in online meetings.. Only good thing us battery and its soft wire.. Boat 255 have good sound quality and better connectivity than it.. For rs 2000, it is not good.

name: Dinesh Ch
title: Best Bluetooth neckband under Rs.2000
content: I have been using this product for the last 2 months. The overall build quality and look & feel of this BW is flawless considering the price point. The main highlights of this product are call quality, battery back up, crystal clear vocals and build quality.. When it comes to sound quality, some are complaining about its low bass. Yes, it is true. However, for one plus mobile devices, this issue was being fixed with sound enhancement feature in the June month update. Further, you can also enhance the sound/bass quality by tweaking the equalizer settings. With different equalizer settings based on the music you are listening to, the overall sound quality could be improved significantly. With respect to Vocals / Mids / Highs, it is really good.. Overall this is the best neckband BW under 2K. If you are using 1+ mobile, go for it blindly. Even the users of other mobiles could enjoy the rich sound experience if you are not a bass lover.

name: AKSHAY BUSA
title: Pros, Cons and Okais
content: I am using it form last 1 week. I will simple list down the pros, cons and okais. Pros :-. Best battery life. - It works as long as written in the description may be 1 hour less but it depends on your usage so even if you use it for morning 10 to night 12 it won't need to charge during that.. Mic Quality. - Microphone quality is really good. I use it for professional meetings and it works pretty good.. Cons :-. It would have been better if they have provided quick switch button same as they provided in normal edition I need to manually switch between my laptop and mobile.. May be shape could have been better. It does not fit perfectly in my ears it's kind of loose and fell off many time.. Okais :-. Sound quality it ok. It doesn't feel like premium one but the loudness is good. Bass is good. Sound Clearity can be improved.. Overall Its best for the work from home usage as it gets you through the day and good moc quality for virtual meetings and call but If you are looking only for listening to music only than it's ok but don't expect premiumness but for this price it's definitely a great buy.

name: tauqir
title: Extremely easy.
content: OnePlus made headlines back in 2014 with a flagship killer phone that outperforms the competition in its category with the OnePlus one which had mind-blowing specs for the price tag it came with. Now after almost 6 years they have delivered the same promise that they had given in 2014 with the OnePlus bullets wireless z it has all the latest tech inside with a charing claim for 10 min for 10 hours of playback time which is quite impressive the build is of silicone which a high-quality one. the earbuds are light as they are made from plastic which does not feel cheap at all it also has magnetic functions which means that join the buds together to play/pause the video or music, it also acts as a power switch. Everybody's worry "Hey is that sweatproof or waterproof? " well coming to that note there is a difference between water resistance and proof, resistance is just a measure till what range the device can handle the water and proof is the device was made to use underwater, for example, an underwater camera well the bullet z is IP55 that means its ability to handle a splash of water or your workout sweat. The technical stuff is the best stuff here this has a 9.2mm dynamic driver and super bass tone fitted in each earbud, Bluetooth 5.0, quick switch, aptx & SBC codec the quick switch is one of my favorite feature of all I just de-attach and voila connected within a second its the same experience when you use the fingerprint scanner to unlock your OnePlus phones the base quality is powerful but not equally powerful to rip your eardrums apart, the volume is powerful and the connection remains stable when I am 10 meters apart or in another room which is what I need to answer all my zoom calls with a breeze this also have a memory function it only connects to the last know connected device but you can override and click on the quick switch button to go to the 2nd last known device. The build quality is quite good the silicone is soft the plastics are good I wish the buttons had more click to it and the media control buttons could have a textured feel to raised play button to distinguish between volume and play because at times I mistake the quick switch toggle to be the play pause button we could see metal earbuds but the tech stuff made it an overall well built earphones on a scale of 1 to 10 I would give this a solid 8 bang for your buck well if you want your life to be easy that would be a yes.

name: Siddharth g.
title: Overall very nice headphones
content: I would start with the bass since that is the most complained quality of this headphone i would put the bass quality in one sentence "if you don't want to go deaf the bass of these headphones is perfect. For people who want the bass to be more better perhaps they want to damage their ears.". Coming to the sound quality it's very nice an i have used sony and JBL headphones as well so when i say it's nice i am comparing it to them.. Call quality is also nice and noise cancellation is also pretty decent i never had any complaints from the other side even with the television on.. Connectivity: I have one plus 6T so connectivity with that phone is like super snappy as soon as you separate the two earbuds it seamlessly connects to the phone , also the double tap to switch between devices is also super nice.The range is also pretty decent and i could connect them to the phone across rooms.

name: Varsha Nagaraj
title: Not a good product to recommend....
content: I have purchased this product around 3 months ago. In the first 3 months, the performance was quite good. later it starts echoing while calling and also getting some unnecessary noise during the call. Really disappointed with this product.. Meanwhile, I had also bought realme bud 2 wireless earphone 6 months ago. and performance and sound quality are better than this one. Go for realme bud 2 instead of one plus. Don't blindly go with one-plus bullet earphones because of its brand name.

name: DIPAK
title: Its all about the Need.
content: Its over all a nice product with really good Connection switching on and off when off to just plugging back to your ears. Good built quality and excellent battery life and charging speed.. The bass dose not have the punch for Bass-heads.( Including myself ). But it's all about the mood and usage, I have the XM3s to just get lost into the songs which are really great with bass you can actually feel them rumble over your ears, the at times listing to the songs with IEMs is entirely diff. you can feel the song coming to life then there's these with good Sound and Portability the Convenience.

name: Anirudh Ani
title: Please read this before buying......
content: Please don't go for this product. It is not even 1 month old, microphone stopped working. Before buying this product just type in Google "OnePlus bullets wireless Z microphone is not working" you will get to know how many members and how much intense this issue is. No solution is working. Manufacturer is not at all responding in any means

name: Krishanu Chakraborty
title: Great Headphones 👍
content: Great ear phones. Specially when you use it with a OnePlus device. Loud and clear audio quality . Bass is slightly in the lower side but overall a very good earphone at this price range. It's very light weighted and flexible.Very easy and quick to connect with the device.. Battery back up is amazing. If you use it at 60-70 volume it surely last for 16-18 hours. And 60-70 volume is loud and clear in this headphone , we hardly need to use it in maximum volume.. For games like PubG , it really gives very clear audio of each and every movement but the gun shots would be very loud if you use it in maximum volume which is sometimes very uncomfortable for hears... With one plus devices the low latency mode is available which is again good great for playing games..

name: Masum Jangid
title: Best Under 2000
content: Straight to the point:-. Pros:-. 1).Bass Quality is Overwhelmed and superior.. 2). Loud Enough for Indian audience.. It's also loud and it's loudness don't hurt you ears like RealMe Wireless buds.. 3). Connectivity Is top class, you wil not face any issue.. 4).Charging lasts for a long time even if you listen on hugh volume it gives decent battery backup.. Cons:-. 1).Fittig is awesome for me but may not be for others as everyone has a different ear shape but I think it'll fit easily.. 2). No other point for it.. It's just awesome in every way.. Conclusion:-. You can go for it blindly, just trust on me.. I've searched and tried all of the brands in this price range like SONY, BOAT, REALME,NOISE,MIVI but found this one best.

name: Pushkar Gulkari
title: Best headphones price wise and feature wise
content: Very y comfortable in ears. Connectivity is Awesome, even I got the seamless connectivity across two rooms. Sound is perfect not too boosted nor too trebalish. Balanced sound quality I must say. The switch for changing devices is cool feature that I use a lot to switch between phone and laptop. Sometimes it is unable you switch but rest of the time it works smoothly. It does remember the last device connected so won't give you problem due to over switching the devices. Loved it overall.

name: Customer
title: Best sound quality earphones
content: I have used sony, JBL, synheiser earphones before this one. No one yet completed with synheisers sound quality and battery life. I was hesitant in purchasing one plus earphones as it was not a known brand in audio. But based on the reviews and internet research, convinced me that this earphone is good. Hence purchased it.. 1. Excellent sound quality.. 2. Excellent bass.. 3. Great battery life. 2 days usage on single charge.. 4. Good Bluetooth connectivity. Remain connected if you are in some room which is far away from you device.. 5. Best earphones in this price range

name: Jay
title: Adjustment not good
content: Even though I have tried all 3 sizes of ear buds and big size is the closest it comes to comfortable but still it is not comfortable and requires frequent adjustment or else little bit ear pain occurs.. I was previously using Sony wired earphones and it was always comfortable even if I wear for 10 hours and never needed an adjustment in between.. Sound quality otherwise is superb.

name: vishnu g
title: Affordable Earphone Priced at Rs. 1,999
content: Its good earphone under the price range.Battery backup is good, sound quality good for calls.I also like the switch button where we can connect other device easily.Build quality is tough.I like the switch button where we can connect other device easily.Worst part is grip in ear they come out while walking normally n can't workout because these neck rubber part is heavy.Ear fitting is painful after an hour.

name: Niranjan kumar
title: "Ultra high latency when gaming"
content: I bought this product since I am one of the OnePlus brand fan.Got it delivered one day earlier and I thank Amazon for this. Now let me tell something about this product.. Pros: First of all its design, as usual it is superb. Sound quality is good and I would recommend all if you are looking for a head phone just for music, videos, and call,it will give you best performace.. Cons: This device is not good for gaming. I would insist you not to buy this product if you are looking for a gaming headset. They have mentioned Ultra Low Latency mode (with fanatic mode on) for gaming, but let me tell you one thing, I am using OnePlus 5T and this headset making a audio latency of 300ms and too much sound lag while playing games especially PUBG.. So guys this is a great product for music and videos only. If you are looking for gaming headset then I would recommend you to go for other brand bcoz of this audio latency isuue.

name: kalash mahajan
title: Amazing product
content: Recieved today. Worth for 2k. But I had one plus wireless bullets 2. This one comes no where near that in build quality and premium feeling and sound Quality. But again this product is 4k less.. Very light weight to wear. Bass is good and better that bullets 2.. If you have not used bullets 2 then you will be very much satisfied with wireless Z.. But anyways I'll use this whole day and if I don't get satisfied then I'm going again for bullets wireless 2 only. Edit:- after 2 days of extensive use and comparing z with wireless 2 I've come to conclusion that "Z" is a steal deal. I'm very much satisfied with it. Nothing is in the market that comes close to "Z" in under 2k.. You can definitely buy this with your eyes closed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Choose wisely.
content: Well a decent choice among 2k segment wireless earphones. The sound quality is excellent, all the music it produces is quite good. Yes, it lacks that bass boosting but you know whether you need it or not. I use the equalizer in my phone to adjust the bass if needed. The call quality on the headset is marvelous, not only the sound you listen to is good but also the microphone quality is also great and there were no complaints from the people listening to my calls about the microphone.. The Quick switch button for me is a blessing, I use it quite a lot to switch it between my laptop and my phone.. Since it uses Bluetooth v5.0 there is minimal lag and the range is also excellent.. Regarding the battery the claims about 20hrs is not very accurate, but it still has one of the best battery backup in its business. I easily get around 14-15 hrs easily and it takes about 45-50 min on a usual 30watt charger but it does charge rapidly on OnePlus 30T charger (I checked it on my friend's OnePlus charger).. So overall it's a great buy and the best choice if you don't listen to music much. If you are thinking about buying it for online meetings or for taking calls and listening to little music then it definitely serves the purpose.

name: Sheeja
title: Worth the money
content: The quality of sound is very good. And the charging also is good. Stays on charge for full day usage. Also it gets charged soon as mentioned. The only thing I found is, when I am on a whatsap cal and if I get a normal call same time, the mode changes to loudspeaker automatically.not sure if it's happened to other customers too. Please let me know

name: akhilesh tamrakar
title: At this price what more can you expect but much better than other Chinese brand.
content: Packaging- Premium feel having type C cable but very small and 3 size ear tips.. Sound quality- Perfect while calls even while riding but with some air noise. No bass not for music lovers.. Functions- having 4 buttons, volume up/down, play/pause/call accept/reject/Google asistant, switch on/off bluetooth/switching to other devices.. -when earphones are on a white light always blinks. -while charging red light starts.. Features- connection is really fast although it won't work in some apps like in MX player next track doesn't not work but in Jiosavan it works perfectly.. - you can make call without unlocking the phone using assistant but it won't work all the time. - range is quite good works upto 20ft if some bigger object won't come in between and vertically can goes upto one floor only. Battery. - battery is insane lasts upto 4days watched 3 movies listen songs, YouTube, call for more than 3 hours.. - earphone battery won't drop easily but your phone's battery will start draining mostly while calls. - charging goes down like 100,80,60,30,10% then the white blinking light turns to red.. - charged it with oneplus 6t charger for 10min now showing 100% charged. Quality- made of plastic but feels premium,. - ear tips are soft but you can't wear them for long because you can't here anything.. - Magnetic effect is good helps to lock it on the neck.. - I bought mint colour, don't know for how long the colour will stay and I think water resistant works fine.. - wire is quite flexible turns to any side don't know for how long it will last

name: Aman
title: Pretty Decent
content: Both the Sound & Bass and The Build quality was beyond my expectations for any earphones fallimg within the price range of 2000 INR.. First of all the Build quality is top notch which was again beyond my expectations from the Brand One Plus as I've been using their device too which is very promising for the price range for any android smartphone available in the Indian Market.. Secondly, the bass quality is decent.. Third and the most important feature is its battery life. I can only imagine one word "Wonderful".. The only thing the brand should work on is its below good sound quality as in thus price range and point a slight improvement will be an excellent upgrade.

name: Abhirama
title: Good Earphones, But......
content: Pros:. Battery Backup & Charging Speed. Sound Quality. Bluetooth Connectivity. Cons:. Base is not Good as it should be in this price range. Earfit sometimes starts to pain after few hours. If You want More Base you can go for Boat Rockerzz 255f Its has a good base, But not good Sound quality as Oneplus Z.. This is Better Than Realme Wireless Earphones & Other Wireless Earphones Below Rs 2000.

name: Manu S
title: Sound quality not great.
content: Sound quality is not great. Bass is low. Only good thing I noticed was the battery backup. Again not 20hrs as mentioned but near to that. This is good as most wireless headsets don't give this kind of backup. I also liked the ability to pair simultaneously and switch between two devices example between a laptop and mobile etc.

name: gurpreet singh
title: Not a Wholesome Package !
content: Let me start by saying it has a decent built Quality - Not Premium but decent. Magnetic On & Off works fine & Sound Quality Is decent. If that's your Prime requirements - Go for it. Period.. However, if you are also looking to make calls ( as i do , alot ) this might not be the right fit. I bought this last month or so & within the period the mic apparently stopped working however - I can somehow manage to make calls via internet ( Home Wi-Fi) but that's not a very common medium in business world. It might be because of my Network Provider Vodafone ( which is pathetic anyways) or Some technical snag with my Redmi Note 7 Pro ( some Chinese rivalry may be ) but all in all the experience has been bad. I have tried every trick that anybfirun has recommended but of no avail, called up customer care they want me to visit one of their store & get it checked.. I didn't expect this.So, Kindly mind this fact. Hope this helps.

name: Rahul singh
title: Bang for the buck!!
content: These pair of headphones are giving more value than the price and i am saying this after using some JBL, Sony, Skullcandy & MI earphones.. Of course sound quality is not as good as you get from JBL and Sony but you need to consider the price of this product before judging it.. My reason for choosing this earphone was the battery backup & quick switch option between the two devices which is really very good.. Also if you are buying these pairs after using basic headphones you will not disappoint even with the sound quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: AFTER TWO MONTHS USAGE
content: Pros. it has top notch battery life. I charge it once evry 4 days, considering that i use it for online classes atleast 6 hrs a day. The low latency in fnatic mode is completely mind blowing and the earphones are perfect for workout, although would bot recommend wearing it in heavy rains. The 10 min charge 10hr playback{i use warp charge 30T} is totally true. good connectivity range, no lag between separating the buds and 0utting them in your ears. easy device switch. cons. poor bass. when the device to which bullets are connected is inactive/off it is difficult to switch to another device. we have to switch on the former device and the. switch ghe device. poor build quality

name: Nishant_Ramteke
title: Satisfied purchase
content: Build Quality is good, overall experience is better than the other products under 2000. Sound quality is good bass ( not too heavy ) treble vocal well managed. Got it for 1799. From oneplus store it is available for 1563/-. But delivery time is 1 week, Amazon is best in terms of delivery of products.

name: Mohit
title: Thumbs up to OnePlus team
content: A smart solution as an option for your earphone. Nice build but can be improved in wire quality, sleek small good looking medium range above average smart wireless earphone with different colour options makes it a good choice to buy . Using it personally for mobile laptop and smart tv .. bluetooth range is also very good can be easily used with in 5 meters of range... A great buy below 2k price range ... Thumbs up to OnePlus team

name: Barshan Pal
title: Best in this price segment
content: Product is just amazing!!. With the reasonable price and quality 🖤. Unbox - really great feel in Unboxing it!. Products included - C Type red cable and extra pair of earplugs and manuals. Experience - One plus products are always amazing, and this earphone tho I really loved it... The quality and the design is really excellent than the wireless 2 earphones!. It comes with the magnetic attach, where song will be paused when u attach both ear piece, and I had a confusion in Turing ON the earphones, You need to separate the earplugs and automatically it will be ON and Pair instantly... Sound quality - really great experience. And bass is not that good!. Volume control will different in this , i.e., when you increase or decrease the volume through earphones ,it doesn't impact on your mobile volume control...

name: Abuzar Shaikh
title: It's a pretty useless device for the long term use.
content: DO NOT BUY THIS DEVICE!!!!. There's nothing exceptional about the earphone to be honest with you, I've been using the earphones for a month now and it was working exceptionally well when it came down to battery in the start but after a month it shows true colors, the earphones barely gives 8 hrs on full charge, it takes about 50 mins to fully charge, and when I tried to contact OnePlus they just ignored the calls and mails. Honestly don't buy it, better go with a Boat or Realme alternative Frankly speaking they are cheaper and better than this and much durable on the long term

name: Jebin Jolly Abraham
title: Great pair of headphones with some caviat .
content: Im not gonna bore you guys with the spec sheet, here is my actual review.. After extensive rough use i have been using the bullet wireless z for 12 days now,. It has been a reliable headset with good to great sound quality, the Bass is on the neutral side but thats only to reduce strain on the ears.. Pros. 1. Quick switch (10/10). The first time i paired with the phone was a breez but i. had slight problems with connecting to my Dell G3, In. bluetooth there will be 2 devices for Bullet wireless Z. Buy pairing with the audio only will work, (it took me. a while to figure that out ). 2. Batter Backup and charge time (10/10). Batter backup is great i have only charged the. headphones 3 times in the last 12 days and only took. 15 mins to full charge with my wrap charger .. 3. Durability and Quality (9/10). The quality of the headphones are really good. And it. can stay snug during physical activitys, i was on call the. entire day and had the device paired with the phone. and laptop. ,. 4. Call Sound Quantity (8/10). The call quality is great amd had no issues since i. recived the headphones, the person on the other end. had no issues hearing me .. Cons -. 1. I wish while i paired with my lap and phone , if auto. switch was enabled when audio was coming from my. lap and a call is comming from my phone so that i. could attendd it without hassle, you can press the. button , but i wish that was there.. 2. They said an animation would come while pairing, but. non was there ,. 3. While i was using the headphone and move or run. without any audio there was wierd warp ambience.. 4. The magnetic could be stronger.. 5. When your watching media and close the headphone. and aith the magnet and re open it there is no. autoplay. 6. Buttons are a bit mushy

name: SK.DHANA PRASAD
title: All in one product just rocked
content: All in product Iam reviewing after 1 month this is my honest review. 1.This product is second bluetooth earphones for me first I buyed boat rockerz 450 and I didn't saw any difference between them and. This earphones are more comfortable than that .2.bass in this earphones bass 🔊 is some less than my boat rockerz 450 headphones 🎧. 3.charging in this product is awesome 👌 10 mon charge is giving maximum 20 hours play back time 😀 this product box provides only c type pin charger cable and many products but adapter we can use what ever adapter in 🏠 house.4. Box includes --1charging cable, 4 more 👂 ear buds,warranty cards and oneplus earphones.5.sound quality 👌 is super than headphones this product has 9.2mm drives. 6.Google assistant and all the switches are working awesome 👌. 7.ear buds are comfortable and neck band is flexible. 8.gaming mode sounds are coming late .9.valueble for money 💰. 10.best wireless earphones i have earned. 11. Iam reviewing after 1 month and this is my honest review .. Totally 👌 nice product

name: Grace
title: Bass- less comfy headset
content: The headset was a shocker for me because of its very low bass. The noise cancellation is no beetter than a normal wired headset.. On call quality when paired to Laptop was not as good as expected since the other person complained of being able to hear everything around me rather than my voice and not to mention the echo.. The Bluetooth pairing with 2 devices laptop and phone is bit tricky sometimes as it does not get detected after doible clicking the button.. Pros :-. 1. the massive battery!!. I was listening to songs and watching movie for the whole day yet the charge remained 100%. 2. Super comfortable earbuds :-. The soft silicone ear buds don't cause any irritation. After listening to long hours you won't feel you are wearing a headset.. On the whole i did expect lot from the product due to the reviews everywhere. But if this was the best in the category i can imagine how the rest would be!

name: Kunal Thakkar
title: Regular are better than reverb edition
