content: I have both ,OnePlus wireless Z reverb edition and OnePlus wireless Z .Normal edition has a between which is super useful to change between device whereas this new reverb edition doesn't has the button.Plus company mentions that quick change can be done but was not working in my case ,so returning to buy previous gen .. And also the fit was also different (idky) and was lighter which gave me a feeling of cheapness also .

name: Ahammed sinan c
title: I used for 3 months iam sharing my experience read this for more details..................
content: It been 3 months with me and I am sharing my experience. It good and so flexible and I like it most. If you are buying it you will not be disappointed by oneplus. It has a long battery life and you will get absolute 20 hours play back. Boat has launched a new neckband 30 hours play back u can also check that one. It one and of is by magnetic control so is easy. And it has a switch option from recently paired devices. That is very helpfull. When I get a calling when I use it in laptop I can easily took call in my phone by switching devices. I surely recoment this for a oneplus device. If you are using a deffrent phone u will find a lag small lag. It is a best neck band. Liked it. I brought black ire comment black colour

name: NG
title: Good, but not value for money
content: Likes. 1. Technology. 2. Sound. Dislike. 1. Charging port could have been covered, so that when we go out it could have protected from rain. 2. Call answering is not working properly. 3. Voice over a call is not clear.. 4. Light keeps on blinking, it might disturb other.. 5. Bass quality is not that great.

name: Mustafa
title: Best quality and features
content: This is one of the best one plus earphones in this chip rate, quality is best, I also have bullet 2 and it is much expensive from Z, it's a price difference but quality is mostly same and features are also same so this earphones are nice and best to buy in this rate.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth buying nice product
content: hey people who are looking to buy this.. i would highly recommend this to buy for music lovers and non music lovers' as well.. the only complaint i have with earphones is that its too loud when played in full volume the person next to you need not to wear one or buy one to listen to music ") hahahahah..... other than that noise cancellation could have been much better.. bass is not that great but it is very good.. balance is good. voice calls are amazing, no complaints from the person talking on the other side because they cant make it that your on Bluetooth connected. Overall I would say its 4/5 so if your looking for paisa vasool deal ... just without any second thought you may go for it.. Music lovers who like to be always on Bluetooth connected for long time its the item not to miss.

name: Pooja Bhatnagar
title: Amazing Affordable Oneplus Wireless earphones
content: Got my Oneplus 8 and I decided to go with these. I was earlier using a 10mm driver wireless earphones from which i switched to these. To be honest, at this price range the headphones delivers!! With a charge of 10 min, it can last for 10 hours which is crazy. Moreover, 2 devices could be connected and switched with a dedicated button.. Coming to the sound, like I said its 9.2mm driver does the job. I'm not a fond of hardcore base so I found these headphones really worth my spent. The sound clarity is top notch.. It's Low latency mode also helps in gaming as you can barely note any delay in sound while playing Pubg.. Oneplus Users better get this!! 🙂

name: Amar Abrar
title: A Wow product for common man
content: This review is posted after using OnePlus wireless earphone for more than a month. Initially I was apprehending to buy based on price but the product is worth every penny. The battery backup last for two days or even more (based on usage). Even if you charged it for 15 minutes, it will last one day. Bluetooth range is very good. Product is very sturdy and high built. Sound quality is excellent. While telephonic call I hardly use 50% volume and same is worthwhile. The best part is when magnetic ear plug are plugged together, the device is switched off and when you unplug it's switched on, it saves lot of battery. Once switch on it will reconnect within few seconds. You can reshuffle connection between two devices by a single button press.. The best part is even using for hours together my ear does not pain at all.. I will rate the product 5 star and based on the performance I bought one more piece for my wife. Product is available in different colours. Please note this is my independent unbiased review based on usage. Worth for adults and children during lockdown or otherwise.

name: Shrinath Shanbhag
title: not so great earphones
content: not a great product. compatible with oneplus mobile phone with good quality of sound & bass, however when you connect to Macbook Pro, sound & bass quality drops. even restarting the laptop and earphones does not help.. one of the features claimed by the product - switch between multiple devices is not as smooth as claimed. Sometimes it does not work. and when switched from phone to laptop, there is distorted sound coming out. broken/ discontinuous audio output that one experiences in this case.. not worth the money paid.

name: Sumit Shrivastava
title: Good for the price!
content: Really good when it comes to Bluetooth Earphones. Exceptional Battery life. Went on a trip to Dehradun from Delhi and ended the day with 20% left over after a full days of use.. Sound Quality is Good. Decently loud and perfect for calls and watching YouTube videos and Shows.. Bass is decent. Nothing extraordinary. Would be great for any casual music listener.. Comfortable, and quick switch between devices is great. Fully charges on warp charge in about 15-17minutes. Lovely Build quality. Expected from 1+. Easy Recommend. Go for it.

name: रजत कांत
title: Fitting is not upto the mark
content: The overall sound quality and balance of bass and treble is very good. The only thing that I found not good was the fitting. I've been using samsung corded earphones and in comparison to them the fitting is way too poor. Although thats my personal opinion about the fitting, majority of the people will find it comfortable and eventually I'll also develop the habit of the new shape.

name: Rajas pawar
title: Is there a way to stop the blinking white light????
content: The bullets z are really annoying. They have a white led blinking twice every 5 seconds that just irritates you, especially when you are listening or watching something at night or in a dark environment. Please fix.

name: NEIL
title: Average Music, superior charging, comfort and gaming performance
content: Music is pretty average for the price range. Microphone quality is above average. This headphone is mainly recommended for heavy gamers who doesn't like wired headphones and for those who love listening to casual music for longer periods of time.. Another big con is that some of its features like low latency works best with 1+ devices only. So keep that in mind. Since I have a 1+ device I've rated it 4* otherwise it would have been a 3*.

name: Kshitij Sapra
title: OnePlus Bullets Z - Need I say more?
content: These earphones are a bang for the buck!. - The quality is perfect. The purely technical reviews would talk a lot about Treble/Bass etc but to me, as a user, these are superb.. - The quality is top-notch. This is something OnePlus has always been on top of.. - The battery backup is superb. I bought these last week and am still using it without any charge.. It's a must buy!

name: sidhant Mahajan
title: High latency average sound quality
content: The latency is very bad even on my oneplus phone. My oneplus 6 even on fnatic mode gets latency in the range of 400 to 500ms and thus makes playing games a dreadful experience. Checked on the community page, many people are facing the same problem where the latency is very high even on fnatic mode. No response from oneplus on community posts though.. Only plus point being the fast charging.

name: Pravin Sharma
title: Good Battery Life! But Not Comfortable.
content: The Battery life is what it is claimed, but the buds are not at all comfortable. after wearing them for a complete day, the next day my ears were hurting and got a headache.. Rating:. Quick Switch - 5/5. Battery - 5/5. Connectivity - 4.5/5. Build Quality - 4/5. Range - 5/5. Charging Time - 5/5. Comfort - 2/5(Depends upon the individual). Sound - 3/5. Bass - 3/5. Mic - 3/5. Gaming - 3/5 (Not using Oneplus device)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good earphone
content: Overall product quality is excellent.. Best part is that you can toggle between two dvice by double click with a single.. At Corona time I am working from home and used to receive call on laptop as well on mobile.. I can use this to attend the call from both the device without any hassle by doub le click on the button.. If you are buying this to listen music than please do not go for it.. Battery is very very good, I used it for full day and still it has 80% battery.. Connectivity is very very good. It gets connect instantly.

name: S Patra
title: Disappointed
content: Although the product is well built and ergonomic, it gives a dismal performance. Bass is non-existent, and the sound quality is worse. At normal volume setting of phone, it doesn't sound clear. By the point you increase volume to get better base, it becomes too loud for your ears. Even 300rs generic Samsung earphones sound better. At first, I had to return the product thinking that the one I received was faulty, but then the same results repeated on my replacement. At this price point, I would suggest other brands like boat. But if you want premium wireless earphones, you will have to shell extra cash..

name: Sandy-Mahi
title: Extraordinary bass and sound Quality
content: Without any doubt you can buy this if you are a bass lover.... My experience rating. "Sound quality 4/5". "Bass quality 4.5/5". "Vocals 3.5/5". "Highs and mids 4/5". "Microphone 5/5". "Design 3/5"(bcz of colors). "Battery 4.5/5". Best value for money products.go for it.. It is better than other band Bluetooth earphones

name: jasveen
title: awesome product by one plus
content: I am satisfied with performance of on pluz z neck band.. battery backup is awesome. sound quality is good. connectivity is fast and range of 10m u will get easily.. although I belive wires could have been made more sturdy but not bad.. build quality is also fine.. sound quality is pretty good and you should properly insert and lock ear buds as per design given.. and I don't feel any strain on the ears and design is pretty comfortable 👌.. overall best neck band in this price range and value for money.

name: Akash Tikhe
title: Good product
content: Using since last one month and found to be good product. I will not say great due to some limitations of design such as when you connect both the earbuds together it gets disconnected from phone for more battery life but at the same time you get any call and you are away from your phone you will not able to know from your band. Also you do not get facility to get call connect and disconnect from ear buds stick together and move apart. Hence there should be feature to think on thelat you can choose either to disconnect the band from phone when u stick the buds together or keep it on to pick up and disconnect your phone calls. Otherwise good product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Battery didn't last as claimed 17 hours.
content: Disappointed with this piece by one plus.. They claim 17 hours after the bass boost whtever they have done.. I had the normal bullets one of one plus too before. This one just doesn't last that long. It will drain in 12 hours with a full charge of constant use. The price is the same as the previous one. But I think they have saved some money on this one.. Quality of cable is good. Build quality is good. But go for the normal bullets one. Is what I will suggest. Those are way way better and they last 18-19 hours too of usage. ( Claims 20) still fine.

name: Sohan
title: Amazing Product.....just go for it!!!!
content: I want to share an experice with you guys which will help you identify the product and it's quality.. I gifted my wife Infinity glide by JBL and it was the worst product in bluetooth headset category. Bad sound, cheap build and earplugs that always falls off.. Then I bought this product. In one word...it's an AMAZING product. I personally use Bose True Sports worth 19K and belive me, this product can easily compete with it. Fantastic sound quality and fabulous build quality.. Just go for this one.....it's truly worth it.. Also amazing delivery by Amazon.....got itnin less than 22 hours.

name: Sagar Kapoor
title: Not good for this price point.
content: If you are music listener then this is not for you! If you are casual song listener, movie and videos watcher and take lots of calls then this can be for you. It has good battery backup, good and fast connections, magnetic on and off feature (works very well) as soon as you attch them they off. But lets come to the main point. The music quality. I would say 3/5. Sounds decent soothing sound, bass is missing, its not very loud, and not meant for music lovers who listen to different Juandré like pop, rock, bass, bollywood, bass, edm etc.

name: Sujith
title: Very good product
content: Did lot of research before buying this earphones...I am a Apple user and used AirPods in past and now adding this to my collection...lot of people review I saw was they all were complaining about the BASS..let me tell you being a user of AirPods..BOSE sound sport..this is the best wireless earphones for the this price range...bass on this device is pretty good when volume is at 60-70 ...built is too good and the battery is also excellent...overall money is not wasted...

name: Rajat Menon
title: Good product with features but still lacks few things
content: I read alll the reviews good and bad , both of em , I'll try to be honest :. >People complaining about sound quality , well guys the quality of sound is less but well for the price point it's really decent ,much better than any other competitiors , the only issue is they're not bass heavy , still decent though .. >The call quality is alright , but it does sometime picks up background noise , I'm blaming the network since they don't have active noise cancellation .. >The switch toggle is a really cool feature , the only reason I bought it for , but it's a hit or a miss sometimes ,. and well I have to manually connect to my lap , auto pair is irresponisve (works fine on my phone though (90% of the times)). Maybe a driver issues ,, I don't know. >the in avialibility of a physical on/off button is a con (or auto on/off), because at time I often forget to connect the buds magneticall to turn it off , and the batter keeps on draining .. >The battery life is a really amazing , I can easily use it for 2-3 days on a single charge (guys I am a heavy user).. So all in all , other than receiving damaged product , the products are worth it , you get what u pay for ,, so good luck!

name: kirtish k.
title: Bass is weak Everything else  is good
content: Everything is perfect. • Good Battery life. • Small Form factor. • Lower Latency. • Comfortable. EXCEPT. Bass is weak, and it's noticable even if you are not a bass lover.. I owned wired headphones Sennheiser CX180 (₹ 800), when compared the sound quality with OnePlus Z wireless, the audio from oneplus is clearer, but lack of base is noticable.. I am returning it as I don't want to pay extra to degrade in sound quality.

name: Faizan
title: A brief review - 4/5 pros and cons
content: I absolutely love the earphones for its raw bass and sound quality..... Sound profile is dynamic and also the highs mids and lows are clear. Bass = bomb. But only 2 things that bummed me out to give only 4/5 is the battery life and noise cancelation.. Battery with 100% volume used only for office meetings consumes around 75% of the charge within 9 and a half hours so approx I can guess a full 100% battery would last approx 13 to 14 hrs tops..... Also the mic its good but not great, sometimes there are a bit disturbance (not much but a little) while speaking but that can be overlooked cuz it's not always.. Also overall I would say its a great buy specially if you love bass

name: Saad Asif
title: Great for its price but misses the top spot
content: The product is great, it does what it claims. Good sound, above average bass. The best feature which putsahead of its competition is the ease with which the headphones turn off by simply putting the earpieces together. This makes sure the headphones doesn't drain battery while not in use, hence longer battery life. The big minus for me was the weight of middle section of the headphones which is supposed to sit around the neck. It's not heavy it's just discomforting and when in off condition, it's not comfortable to have a rubber wire at the back of your neck. The finish of the product is premium. I also have a 3k wireless headphones from Sony and it does doesn't feel that premium at all. If they they could rethink that weight in the middle, it would be a bang for the buck headphones.

name: Mathew V.
title: Good product under 2k
content: Was using the Realme wireless buds previously and had to switch as it got damaged just after 6 months of usage. Initial impressions are on the battery backup which is really awesome. Sound quality is also really good in terms of noise cancellation and bass quality. Nothing to complain on that aspect... The most useful feature for me was the dedicated button to switch between connected devices... Really useful especially in the WFH situation to switch between calls...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Go for it  !
content: Overall satisfied. The earphones provides descent bass, superb audio clarity, awesome battery and good built quality. Quick switch function is really helpful as I can easily switch between my laptop and mobile during work time.. Bass issue - I really dont feel there is a lack of bass as this earphones provides very descent bass, but maybe if we listen in low volume levels (1-2), yeah there is slight low bass but at high volume levels (3-5) there is enough bass and audio clarity.. Noise cancellation - The mic given separately on wires makes our calls easy but the same time it catches each and every bit of noise happening around you which was not really expected.. Overall rating 4/5

name: TS
title: Connectivity issues.
content: There is some serious issue with the wireless connection. The earphones disconnect and start to beep as soon as you close the app you were using it foe. I have repaired the earphones to my phone i.e. oneplus 6 many a times but the problem persists. I have even factory reset them a couple of times.. Whenever i switch between apps the earphones starts to beep and disconnects automatically. If I even try to connect them manually it takes many attempts or i have to repair them.. These earphones are working better on my apple ipad.. They even disconnect while using them or even when are on a call. They are not reliable.. I regret buying oneplus earphones due to major connectivity usses.

name: krishna
title: Personal review after use.
content: First impressions was nice. But after use. 1.Sound quality good. Bass is very less.. 2. Call clarity very poor in Skype call. Others are nice. I personally bought for my office calls as its has switche mode between mobile and laptop.But didn't meet because of poor voice clarity special on skype.. 3. Overall nice headphone according to the cost.. 4. Battery back up not tested yet but for music guarantee back will be good. I think for the meeting and call may last for 4-5 max.. #Never Settle

name: AnKur
title: Unchi dukan file pakwan
content: Though I am a fan of One plus, yet this product disappointed barely.. After all the hype and various reviews I thought its a best in class. But No you will get an average quality of Specelaly sound. And that's an main objective of having earphone.. On best side..Build quality, feature and battery life are at par. But lacks in BASS and clear sound while listening to music or phone purpose.. If you can compromise on sound quality , yes you can go for it

name: T.joto
title: Battery backup good but nor sure the product would last for long
content: I bought this on expectation that this earphone may last longer as its of one plus.. I got this product on 4th aug 2020 started to use it.. The battery power was superb,sound was too good,. the main thing is abt the battery backup.I had to charge only on the 3rd day after charging it fully.. The time to charge it full takes abt half an hour.. On aug 24 the product suddenly stopped working. There was a white light on it everytime and whatever i did the product was not working. i tried to reboot it and tried all ways given in the manual but didn't work.. As it had warranty of 1 year i send it to Bangalore service center and due to corona issues it took about 2 weeks to reach there. They contacted me saying that by the time product reached their hands the battery had drained and when they put it for charge and it was working smoothly then.. They told as the product is in working condition they will send this back.. I waited for 1 week and i called them to enquire abt my product. they told they cant send this to my address ( that is in kerala) give them other address other than kerala(seemed like i should have houses in all states of india. lol😂😂). I askes whether they could send through India post for which they told they dont have provisions. I contacted customer care service and they told the same even though in every chats they were extremely sorry about my situation😂😂.. Somehow i managed to get a friend of my friend in Bangalore and they had delivered it there and he had send it fron there on today. So as a total its been two and half months since i had lost track of my product.. But my other 3..4 friends had bought the same item and they are using it and all are happy abt them till now.But i could see my same same type of complaint in this rating section

name: shravya
title: Best buy for OnePlus Users and for Medium usage
content: So the Product reached me within a few days of ordering - for which, Kudos Amazon. The packaging is great but on closer examination you understand that it has flaws.. Moving on, after a day's use (I will update this in a month's time). Pros:. - Fit is decent - it takes some time to get used to but once you get it, you get it.. - I own a OnePlus 7T so pairing was like magic.. - Switching between iPad Air 3 and OnePlus 7T again was super easy.. - Music volume and quality is pretty decent (if you are an audiophile - please raise your budget).. - Charges really quick. It's all true.. - Latency is literally negligible (Streaming Netflix, Spotify etc). - You can sleep wearing it (I Did, and it was comfortable).. - Under recommended volume it should be great.. Cons:. - The fit within my ear is not all that great. I think the buds are harder than they may seem. Nothing beats Sennheiser comfort in that department.. - The mint is nothing like the pictures. It's slightly dull and faded. It's alright because it's bound to get dirty - but I was expecting something brighter. Slightly let down, to be honest.. - storage is going to be an issue. Despite reviews (which are mostly paid I feel) - the wires don't look too strong to me - I think they can be damaged easily.. - while running you might want to make sure the neckband does not slip too far behind - the whole thing might come off.. For OnePlus 6 and above users - Go for it. Good in this budget and the charging speed is the real USP for me. And the sound is good despite what reviews say. Comfort wise I think it's not an all-day use earphone (I'll let you know if I get used to it in a subsequent edit).. Non OnePlus Users I'm not sure if the sound quality will seamlessly match for you.

name: Vimal Verma
title: Bang for the buck!!
content: I have an I-phone 7 plus and the lighting to 3.5 mm adapter was giving me a nightmare, I recently purchased the sennheiser CX 275s but it was not really compatible with the phone so i ordered these neckband earphones.. Pros. 1) The sound quality is really good and the bass is also on the upper side, infact the sound signature is a bit similar to the Sony XB-55 AP i had earlier.. 2) Loudness is optimal not to loud and there is no sound distortion at the max volume,. 3) This earphones doesn't come with active noise cancelling but the passive noise cancelling is pretty good you wouldn't hear any noise once you plug these in. 4) The battery backup is insane, I pretty much used them all day long for my office callings and entertainment use and these neckband last me 2 whole days.. 5) My favorite feature of these earphones is there ability to switch instantly to your last paired device, you just click the button twice and it will switch back to the other device. A really time saver features if you want to use these earphones with your laptop while still plugged in your phone.. Cons. 1) I feel the loudness could have been a little more.. 2) The plastic build is a bit off putting.. 3) Being a Bluetooth earphone it has a major disadvantage of high latency, even though these pairs are designed to give low latency, I can still pick some slight audio delays while watching movies.. 4) It would have been great if the sound signature could be a little better.. Overall these are a great pair of neckband earphones if you are looking for a sturdy good sounding bluetooth headphones.

name: Madhusudhanan
title: Classy but less bass
content: Bullets Z headphones has a bass effect. But I feel there's no bass boost. so the bass quality is kinda flat. There is bass, but not that score. However, if you are not a bass lover, you can go for it. With WARP charge support, you can charge the device for 10 min and can use for 10 hrs. As mentioned in the specification, I could able to get 18 to 19 hrs overall battery usage. It is powerful one. Noice cancellation is also good. Overall for this budget, a good one.

name: Tushant Khanna
title: Best wireless earphone for the price.
content: For the price tag it comes with, this is hands down the best wireless earphone with superb mic quality ( non bass version ). The bass version have the mic placed on the colar band and for some reason the call quality takes a beating because of that. That's why i preferred going with the non bass version which have the mic placed on the wire leading to the ear.. The piece is really light and the wires are real steardy.. The battery backup and charging speed is second to none for the price this comes at. Really a good product from OnePlus.

name: Pranav Sharma
title: Best buy better than boat rokerz 335
content: OnePlus' approach with the Bullets Wireless Z is interesting, and points to what we can expect from the electronics manufacturer in the coming weeks with its smartphones and televisions – more affordable alternatives. The OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z is exactly that for the company's audio product range.. This headset looks and feels like the excellent Bullets Wireless 2. Features such as USB Type-C port, fast charging, very good battery life, and Quick Switch are impressive given the Rs. 1,999 price. When it comes to sound quality, OnePlus hasn't pushed any boundaries with the Bullets Wireless Z; you get what you expect with these earphones. However, the overall package is still good enough to call this our new favourite wireless headset priced at under Rs. 2,000, giving other capable options such as the Realme Buds Wireless and Mi Neckband Bluetooth Earphones some strong competition.. Price: Rs. 1,999. Pros. Looks good. USB Type-C, fast charging, excellent battery life. Useful Quick Switch feature. Decent sound for the price. Cons. No aptX support. Sound isn't very detailed. Ratings (out of 5). Design/ comfort: 4. Audio quality: 3.5. Battery life: 5. Value for money: 4. Overall: 4

name: Vishnu vm
title: Very good wireless z
content: Bulid quality. Built quality is very good and it's look premium in 2k.also it's very comfortable to use.put it in your neck after few min totally forgot the headset.its very eassy to fit in your pocket.its a watter resistant headphone. Eartip. Wireless z eartip very comfortable to use.there is any discomfort ididint face.make sure you are selected the right earbud for the eartip.there is any outdoor noice not coming into ear.. Wire. I think the wire hardned day by day that 1day to this day.the wire not give any discomfort.. Sound quality. I feel good to hear music and movies with wireless z. (More I like the sound that coming from my sony ht iv300😂). Wireless z give feel of the movies and songs.bass comparatively low but that not too much it's acceptable... Magnet. The magnet are the switch ..After few days the magnetic power is going less compared to 1st day. Easy to switch button. There is a tiny button on the left side of the neck position it help to switch between 2 devices...I use wireless z with my laptop and phone.some time using in the laptop class coming in phone that time I double tap the switch button boom instantly connected (it's change device models but that not a huge change acceptable change ). Charge. It's my first neck Bluetooth headphone..It's last 3 day minimum.2 , 3 movies , some calls , online class .And it's it's very fast to charge so iam satisfied..

name: Sarthak
title: Good with a lack of bass.
content: It's a good pair of wireless earphones. I will briefly describe the pros and the cons:-. Pros:-. 1) The Quick Switch feature is just like a dream come true. I switch between my phone and laptop throughout the day and its extremely handy.. 2) Battery Life and charging speed:- I got the earphones fully charged and just to check the battery life I tried to drain the battery to 0 and it lasted for me 3 consecutive days(It might be because I use them at around 20% volume). I guess I used more than 20 hours and then it took around 25mins to full charge. That's great. 3) Build quality of wires, soft wires are always great and it comes with that. Also, I never faced any skin irritation even after wearing it throughout the day.. 4) Fit:- In my ears they fit perfectly, I also used them during cycling and jogging(even in covid times, lol) and they never fell off.. Cons. 1) The biggest:- The white light keeps flashing in every 5 seconds and if you use them during lights off, lol, you are going to make 'Ek kahani aisi bhi' in your mind. I checked for solutions on forums, but found none.. 2) Bass:- Though I am not a bass head, I felt it lacked the punch. Vocals are excellent in my opinion( I usually listen to the show Ek kahani aisi Bhi and listen Pop music and they felt excellent.. 3) Made in China(though I dont have any problem with that) your friends gonna text you or say to you when they see it's from a chinese manufacturer. 😂😂😂

name: Balaji J
title: Worth buying
content: This is my first wireless headset, actually after looking all review at net I've decided to buy this on the sale and received the product with in 12 hrs.. Band looks nice, flexible, weightless, call quality is also good and music is mind blowing with the new Bass effect addition. You will feel the real true experience of the sound quality this time on this.

name: Abdul
title: Worth of a Money
content: I have buy this product with lot of expectations bcoz I have one plus 7T mobile and I buy more than 3 headphones that not satisfied me. Atlast I have buy this product, this headphone has fulfilled my expectations.. I have use this for more than 2 weeks and now I came to review this product.. Sound Quality. The sound Quality of a headphone is very much good.. bass is little bit less but it doesn't matter at all when we use this that u will never feel that... Noise cancellation. Noise cancellation is also much better. One plus has nailed the product on this price segment.. Battery life. The battery life of a headphone is also very much good I have used this watch a full film that a duration of 2 nd half hours and still it is on 100% charge... Quality. The quality of a product is still good and worth to a money... Magnetic on/off is much impressed and useful.. automatic connection to a recent device is very much useful to me to use this with my mobile and during the call it is very easy to use during the travel and as well as on a work.. One and only negative. One plus doesn't give any charger for this headphone. It supports a dash charger, type C charger. So, think about it before u buy.. Finally its a very good great product from a one plus

name: Saurabh
title: One of the best earphones I have
content: I have a different types of earphones, headphones and earbuds. But talking about Oneplus Z bullets, these are just awesome. These earphones come with 12 to 14 hours of battery backup, fast charging, easy to use and handy.. Contain everything that a earphone should have.. Only the problem is, its has long wire, which bothers me.

name: Lijo John
title: A Good product
content: I have been using this headphones for 2 months now and bought this one after a long review checks and watching videos of some good tech gurus on YouTube and reading people's reviews on amazon and some other shopping sites. Let's come to the likes and dislike.. Likes:. - Sound Quality is good clean and clear. bass is well balanced👌.. - No surrounding sound will hinder. while listening to music/ watching. movies😎.. - Light weight🎈.. - Length of the cables and the band is. adequate.. - Fits properly in ears and. comfortable during long uses🎧.. - Battery Backup is wonderful, I use it. for 2 days in a single charge (8 hrs. per day more or less)⌛.. - Fast charging🚀.. - Shows battery levels in phone which. makes it easy to keep a track of. charge🌡.. - Box included charging cable, ear buds. of different sizes 🚛.. Dislikes:. - Latency/Delay in sound is quite. Noticable while using Maps (all time),. YouTube/Netflix while charge is. around 50%😴.. - Buzzing/interference sound at times. after two months of usage 😫.. - No noice cancelation 😓.. - Control Buttons (Should have been. on the band) on the left side does. hinder the jackets chain which creates. a fear of breaking it😱.. Over all verdict:. A good product in this price rage for regular use, with balanced in ear sound quality.✌😊😎

name: Hitesh Verma
title: Feeling Cheated & Disappointed at price Rs 2,000
content: Pro:. We can pair the neckband with 3 devices in the BASS edition while in the REGULAR edition we can do the same with 2 devices only.. Cons:. 1. Mic location is over neckband in BASS edition.. 2. At the price of 2k there is NO quick switch physical button in the BASS edition while it is available in the regular edition, we need to switch manually by going into the Bluetooth setting of the device each time we need to connect.

name: Srikanth
title: The most valuable 2k youd spend.
content: Its worth every single rupee you pay for it.. In terms of functionality i find it more convineint than the OP buds z that i have. Because with Bullets z , you can charge it for 20-30 mins and then forget about battery for the next 24 hrs. If you absolutely binge then its 12 hrs. Dont worry just put in on charge for 5 mins between your binge sessions it will go in for hours.. Unlike the buds z which needs recharge every 2-3 hours.

name: Anil Swarna
title: Overall average sound quality for the price
content: These Bluetooth earphones are an average offering from OnePlus considering the sound quality. I've listened to these for one month till now and putting my experience under Pros and Cons... Pros: Overall Audio Clarity,. Treble. Build quality. Connectivity. Cons: Below average bass

name: Abhishek Lingayat
title: unbelievably great for activities
content: i was in double mi d, looking at all reviews and clash in oppo enco and one plus, but i finally went with one plus for battery, as i was earlier using apple ear pods, which battery doesnt last long...and with work from home...watching web series on phine and takingcall on laptop was a big task...but with one plus quick switch options he worked like a gem..i use to quickly swtch from phone to laptop. in secs...and battery really last for 17-18 hrs...which is blessing in lockdown..as u k ow iphone need to charge continuous..and tired of charging all devices..this things gets fully charged in less then 45 min....and last for 2 days for me..with work and music and calling..the Mic is perfectly at place no issues in connection....with iphone is works fine...people complain about bass and sound quality not that grt...i am suggesting..just go for it..u wont regret it...

name: Sonu Suresh S
title: Good Product
content: Battery backup seems great. Love to have wrap charging support and type c port becomes so handy. Connectivity is so fast and strong. Doesn't feel latency issue. Plastic build feels okay. Performance is average. Bass is so low. Didn't recommend this for listening music. Call quality is good. Audio is so clear and microphone is good. I believe its resistant to sweat. Worth for 2k. Glad they launched this at this price point.

name: Anshuman Pandey
title: Good for music, bad for voice calls.
content: I used these oneplus earphones for answering calls and the person on the other end always complained of a lot of disturbance in the call. I was answering the call from my room where the ambient noise level is very low and signal quality is good, so I will not blame the conditions.. The problem could be the position of mic as it might be rubbing against my shirt or maybe it was catching the sound of me breathing. But I have stopped using this for taking calls, and I only use it for listening to music.

name: Dilshad Jahagirdar
title: Not for long meeting calls from laptop
content: Bass, noise cancellation and everything is similar to JBL SI200 only difference is this is wireless .. Magetic control is awesome feature , batterybackup is also good, switching between devices is cool but sometime it fails.. Most important thing , if you are looking this for conference calls on zoom,meet or team from laptop it, get auto disconnect and then will not connect until you remove it from paired devices and pair it again.. I specially ordered this to help me in work from home but it is not being useful for my work so it is only helping me while running.

name: Dr. Hardik
title: Awsome Headphones
content: Previously i was using the most popular headphone realme wireless headphone but in just 4-5 month it stopped working in one side. then bought this one and using it since last 2-3 month. Seriously amazing product due in connectivity, sound quality, battery backup and charging speed. In every compartment its winner. Go for it blindly.

name: ramu nimmala
title: Oppo enco m31 beter then OnePlus z oppo was awsome
content: This headset beter for OnePlus mobiles not good for other brand when I connected to mik20pro many prblms I noticed but I changed my mobile recently Iam taken OnePlus 8 it's working good but oppo enco m31 also iam using that is best headset iam already use many headset boat jbl and samsung but oppo was awesome.

name: Madhav
title: Steal Deal
content: Just received the product hence I would tell the first impressions of these.As per my music taste I feel these have a complete balanced sound.It offers sound which would not cause headache unlike those bass heads.Mic quality was good I talked to a couple of people and they told they couldn't differentiate whether I was using earphones or it was my mobile's microphone.Currently I am using this with my OnePlus 7t and feel these are a good partner for it

name: Gowtham
title: Good Quality Product with no match
content: It's best wireless neck band in the price range of 1400 to 2000,. Having good features like. Quick switch. Quick charge. Quick auto connect. Low latency. 20 hrs battery which I can easy use for 3 days in normal use. Call quality is awesome. Built quality is very nice. There is no other headphones match these features in this price range clear winner and go for it........

name: Mohit chandra halder
title: Excellent headphone at this price.
content: Writting this review after 2 weeks of usage.. Sound quality I'd good but not so clear, as I have been using Skullcandy inld wireless headphone for 2 years now, Skullcandy has the good sound quality and bass whereas OnePlus has little less quality of sound but it's good to go with at this price point.. And now coming to battery life which is the main thing in any electronic device.. I personally tested this in real lofe.. 10 min of charge gave me nearly 10 hours and 16 min of continue play back of music, and with full charge it gave me almost 17 hours of non stop play back of music. And with 18 watt charger it took me 45 minutes to fully charge it.

name: Saurabh Hirlekar
title: Quality Headphones with affordable price
content: Quality Headphones from one plus.. affordable price... Build Quality - ear pods are made of plastic, so sometimes they will feel very cheap or sound may crank with the metal. Sound may get additional sound of metal as well.. Sound Quality - crystal clear sound, bass effect is not that great since it's earlier version. One plus bought new bass edition which will be advance than this. Sound driver is different so not great bass quality.. Connectivity - Pair immediately, pause immediately and play immediately.. that sums up everything. One plus did wonderful job on this front. Connectivity is superb.. Call quality - no noise cancellation, Mic position is little odd so sometimes your voice may be at highest levels.. Overall they are good headphones at this price.. if you want bass then go for new release headphones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good BT earphones if you have BT 5.0.
content: Important Note : Buy these BT earphones only if your phone supports bluetooth 5.0 and AAC codec(Check your phone model in gsmarena.com).The sound quality difference is drastic between my phone(BT 5.0 and AAC) compared to Dad's phone which doesn't have it.. Coming to my phone which has BT 5.0 and AAC codec.. Pros:. >Good battery life and super fast charging speed.Charges fully in 20mins with a fast charger.. >Magnetic buds which turn on/off works as expected.. >Quick switch works flawlessly between multiple devices.I frequently switch between my work laptop and phone.. >Great mic quality , used for Skype/Zoom and normal calls without any issue.. >Good sound stage.mids and highs are great.low end is good.. >Sufficient bass(I don't like too much bass).. >Good range(again for BT 5.0 only). Cons:. Earbuds could have been more comfortable(I have small ears which might be a reason.). Overall these are a safe choice of BT earphones with great battery life ,mic quality and pretty good sound quality.

name: Achilles
title: Pretty good
content: The product is pretty good as expected, but the wire is a bit lengthy and since the wire starts from the end of the band and is lengthy it doesn't look good while using. Performance wise it's good. Where as the samsung level u's cord startts from around the middle of the band and so the wire doesn't look bad while using, but doesn't provide such sound experience

name: Vikram
title: Middle Button Functions Faulty
content: The three tap on middle button does not go to previous played song but goes to the next song and pauses it. Thought the device i got was faulty. Requested for replacement. Got new device. Same problem in this too. Also find that the call accept and disconnect functions also not working. Software problem it appears.

name: MG Ekart
title: bass lovers love this good back up
content: Hai friends today i would like show you one plus bullets wireless Z unboxing , I been using this since 20 days I would like share even review & my experience on this product. this product i was purchased from amazon prime sale day price is Rs.1999/-.. according to me its really amazing product , warp charging working really good , if charge this getting 20 hrs back up, we already tested same , who loved bass music its very use full to them . who are working in sales they are getting calls often its every time difficult to handle daily activities while we are driving , i am not encouraging drive calls but comfort when we are even driving . audio quality is good.. * warp charging good *****. *long battery life *****. *magnetic control*****. *water proof*****. *quick switch***. *latency mode*****. product is value for money while pairing device it will take time for connect ,gaming latency mode is very accurate .its coming with water & sweat resistant mode ip55 protection is good.. simple value for money.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good sound with ease of use.
content: Easy to use. Good sound, but does not sit firmly inside the ear. Other issue is if it's connected to 2 devices then you need to reconnect every time to the 2nd device. Pairs very easily with 1+ phones. Perhaps the best feature of this is the connection and disconnection by the magnetic ear buds.

name: VISHAL
title: Be careful if you are using macOS along with bluetooth keyboard/mouse
content: If you are using bluetooth mouse and keyboard on mac then this headset is not for you.. 1. Audio gets scrambled/distorted because of wireless inference.. 2. I read and tried several options to reduce the inference thinking it would reduce the distortion but none of that helped.. 3. I even tried replacing this headset with a new one to check if the one i received was faulty. However the new piece as well had the same problem.. So I wouldn't recommend this to anyone who is on mac platform and is using bluetooth mouse/keyboard

name: Hanish
title: Almost a good earphone..Almost !!
content: Build quality and ausio quality is good, compared to the price.. Good Battery life.. No noise cancellation.. Magnetic controls work 1 way..let me explain...the audio pauses when magnets are connected but auto resume does not work on my Redmi K20 Pro.. I think that is only for newer version of Oneplus phones.

name: Saurabh
title: Best in its segment !❤️
content: Initially I was bit confused between Oneplus wireless Z and Realme wireless buds but I choose OP wireless Z looking at the the brand image of Oneplus and the battery backup.. Build quality - 9/10 no regrets believe me.. Bass - 8.5/10 it is adequate enough.. I hesitated to buy these bcoz many customers said that Bass is none but honestly Bass is present and enough to enjoy the music and yes its little bit low compared to BoAt and Realme.. Treble and instrument separation is awesome.. Mic Quality - almost same as wired earphones but it does miss active noise cancellation.. Bluetooth Range - 30 mtrs it doesn't disappoint at all.. Audio output is very crisp, loud and clear.. Overall its a must buy earphones under 2K....

name: Anuj Anand
title: Punchy Bass but Misleading Multi Pair
content: I bought the Reverb Red Bass Edition and it is fabulous and way better than my Bullets Wireless 1 . The bass is just exceptional just don't think anything and buy the Bass Boost edition. Only problem is Multi Pair , the Amazon page doesn't says anything about a quick switch button not being there on the earphones instead you have to switch by using the devices as the earphones will not change devices on their own . Buyer discretion advised .

name: Gokul Krishna J
title: BEST FOR 2K *BATTERY BACKUP* *GOOD QUALITY*
content: "Great product". This neck band has good sound quality and normal bass quality. This product is not suitable for "bass lovers" . Fabulous calling audio quality. It ia suitable for all like, students for online classes, professionals and etc. Im not suggesting for gamers. I bought for 2k, doesn't needed to tell about brand because "one plus". Good delivery from Amazon , i got it within 2days. Great!. *IMPORTANT* GREAT BATTERY BACK UP 20MINS CHANRGE 20HRS BACKUP.

name: Ganesh
title: Overall all good headset
content: I am adding this review after 4day usage of headsets, i feel that earphone build quality is good and there is no complaint,. Pros : Overall good sound quality. Connectivity is also good and battery backup is good too, i got headset with 100% battery charged. After usage of 4 day's (arround 10 to 11 hrs of usage) it is still on 30% battery remaining and i guess i could be get arround another 3 to 4 hrs of usage so it is possible to get arround 15 hrs of battery backup in single charge. Deep bass is also good.. Cons:. 1.Some time connection losses for second while roaming in house, probably because of wall arround.. 2.Bass highs are not so good.(still good enough to hear the music but don't expect so much from it if you like heavy bass music). 3.headset are loud enough but you may not want to hear about 60% of volume level because after that u will feel noise in your head but if you listen below that it will give you very good sound experience.. And thanks to Amazon for quick delivery.

name: Shashank Sutar
title: Bluetooth disconnects and reconnects automatically during voice/video calls
content: Just brought Bullets Z, a day ago, but during calls the Bluetooth automatically disconnects and reconnects within 1-2 seconds and frequently over time during voice or video calls (that lasts up to 1 hour). I find it very difficult to measure the frequency of this issue because it occurs more randomly.. I even get distorted noise during ongoing calls.. This is not the first time I am dealing with this problem, initially I had brought the same product offline from an authorised OnePlus dealer but same problem occurred, so I returned it and got refunded. Now I purchased it online just to find out if I initially got a faulty product but that is not the case, all products are having some programming issue that needs to be resolved by the manufacturer.. Overall product is good, design is good, excellent battery backup, but the Bluetooth operation sucks during calls.. Hence I am returning this product once again.. Update 1 Aug 2020. After return and replacement, same issue persists.

name: AMAN KM
title: Wonderful....except the noise cancellation microphone
content: Its wonderful product...the battery backup is amazing..overall nice product...the only problem is the microphone its not that perfect in noise cancellation...if you are recording voice the microphone pick allmost everything happened in the background....so its not ideal for recording voices.. but the sound quality, bluetooth connectivity and battery backup all are wonderful...the neck cable is little too lengthy if you are not using it and keep it in the neck its feels a little too much lenght for a normal neck band earphone....overall nice product....once you found the proper eartips the bass is perfect...its fitt nicely in your ear...if the noice cancellation is not a big issue for you..you should go for it....they also provide Type C cahrging cable with oneplus brand its a nice thing....and it charges pretty much very fast...and definitely long for one day easily..even you are a heavy user...there is little latency issue with some games...but i didn't test it with any oneplus divices..so

name: Kaushik Hazarika
title: Received an used product.
content: The delivery was very fast. Infact faster ever from Amazon in just 2 days. But the box I received was not sealed. And the earphone itself had deep marks on it. Looks like some used it and then returned the item. This is very disappointing from Amazon and Appario retailers. Have requested for a replacement already. Let's see what happens.. Edit:. Okay so got the replacement headphones today. And thank heavens it was a sealed package. So on to the actual "review" of this headphone. The sound quality is definitely quite good, which is quite expected(have you seen their phones). Certainly not the best there is but it's up there. I would give 4.5 stars out of 5. Call quality is also good which was a top priority for me and I am satisfied with it. The Bluetooth switch function is also very handy and works as advertised. Build quality also seems quite sturdy but lets see how it copes up with my daily usage. Hence, I would would definitely say it is worth the 2k bucks it cost.

name: manish singh thakur
title: Don't think too much Go for it. It's the best Under 2000rs price bracket
content: Review After using 15 days & many other Earphones in this price range. Pros-. 1- Built is Goodquality (see cons). 2- Bass is good & it's not overlapping the Vocals & instruments (see cons). 3- Battery- it says 17 hrs but actual time is 12 hrs with High usage. 4- The best thing is it's Magnetic on/off which is Fast & Accurate & saves a lot of Battery. 5- It has the Best range in this price 10 feet. Cons. 1- Built quality is Plastic so it's good but not upto the mark but it's not a big issue you can go for it. 2- If you are a very High Bass lover nd don't care about vocals & Instruments then this is not for you. 3- NO DUAL PAIRING. It means you can't connect it with 2 devices at the same time. It's previous version had this feature but Sadly they removed it in this one

name: ADITHYA TARUN
title: Value for money
content: Review after 2 weeks.. It does its job pretty decently. The good quality plastic build feels premium and promising longevity. Sound quality is really good if you are a regular user. Taking calls with this is comfortable and the other party never complained about the sound quality.. The "switch" button works all the time I use it to switch the connection between my phone and laptop. The connection stays stable.. The battery is amazing in this device. They say it gives 20 hours of battery life but in practical usage, I get about 18 hours, which is very good. I charge it once in 4-5 days as I am a casual user. Using the OnePlus warp charger, I could charge it to the full in about 30 minutes.. The neckband is made of rubber and is not uncomfortable wearing. It doesn't get spoiled by sweat. Good to use on a morning run or exercise.. Go for it, if you're on a tight budget and cannot afford expensive earphones, this is the one for you.

name: hkillada
title: Okok product..not that great
content: When we talk about the build quality this is perfect.. But according to me, I don't feel more comfortable for a long time like more than 2-3hrs..my ears are getting pain. (Comparing: Before I used Apple earpods I never felt this issue). And noise cancellation tho worst. Most of the time I'm stopping the Bluetooth I'm using the phone directly for call

name: Ishan
title: Great battery life with decent sound quality
content: Best part is the battery life, worst part is the sound quality. Don't get me wrong sound quality is decent but not as good as other competitors in below 2000 price point. I currently have oppo enco neckband and its sound quality is way better than this. I have stopped using this to listen to music, this is only used for taking calls during this work from home time and the battery life is hands down the best. So buy this if you primary requirement is talking phone or zoom calls. Not recommended for music lovers, there are better options at 2000 price point.

name: harsh kalal
title: How's the voice quality
content: This product is looks good but I don't know there is issue in voice of you hear there is some voice cranky ness is there. You will definitely notice after use of a day or 2.. I have got replaced item then also in replaced one also same problem is there don't now this issue with my product only or others also noticing this?. I suggest go for wired one if wireless is not that much useful for you.

name: Sainath kurule
title: Some issue with software...
content: Using this product from last two days without charging wirking fine. Some software issues is thr may be, whenever i am getting misscall when z bass is connected after miss call z bass sound decrease dramatically even on 100% volume, sound is very low so to get back to normal sound i have to reconnect it again.. Have any one facing the same issue please let me know or try giving miss call and check

name: Viveck Rajput
title: Grab before OUT OF STOCK 😬
content: Let me clear your air of confusion to buy it or not... -U will not find the features this one offers, switching between devices in one press.awesome. -Amazing battery life, full charge and a day with high usage will spend only 40 % and leave you with 60 for the next day. Loonng battery life.. - 10 min charge, 10 hrs backup.. -audio is in well balance, not bad, but not meant for those who listen too loud.. balanced so perfectly u will notice some sounds you didn't noticed earlier in the song 😉.. - handle water /sweat sprinkles easily. - good mic placement and response for long callers.. -build quality is awesome. Light, sturdy , handy controls, premium feel.. - no issues in connectivity, tried roaming in ground floor placing the device in 1st.. -missing case or pouch but..😔. But what else u want..Deepika 😂😂.. Grab before its out of stock. Nothing better in this range along with the features it offers.

name: ParmanandSeth
title: Best battery backup
content: Ordered on 5th June 2020 and received on 14th June 2020 during lockdown. Has a very good sound quality but bass is not that good not for bass lovers, but the battery is awesome it gets fully charged from 0-100% in 1hr. 20min. Approx. with my 22.5 watt charger,charging speed varies with the charger if u r using one plus charger it will charge very fast. Good product in 2000rs.

name: rohit b.
title: RUGGED AND DURABLE SUITABLE FOR DAILY USES
content: Sound quality could have been better, it's quite average sound quality at this price point, but got some useful features as warp charging, low latency mode (could have been better while Playing pubg when connected to OnePlus device) , switchable pairing to other device, mega battery. Built to last and can withstand heavy daily usage under rough conditions if you can compromise a bit in sound quality.

name: Likith
title: Returned it coz of too much of audio delay on OnePlus phones
content: Good for music but coz of the latency mode it doesn't suit for OnePlus while it does good for other brands. The audio delay is damn high and that too in gaming it's worst ... Gamers never ever go for this... Even at first there was audio lag while playing videos on youtube.. I ordered for refund and others don't waste time by doing the same.

name: Shubham Priyadarshi
title: Product Overview
content: PACKAGING:. So, let's start from the packaging, packaging is 'A typical OnePlus neat packaging' which is very good. In the box you will have a neckband as soon as you open the box, beneath it there is a accessories cum user manual box.. In accessories, you are provided with a type c charging 'red cable' which is OnePlus style statement and pair different size ear buds.. CONNECTIVITY:. *(Only for OnePlus device). Now, if you have OnePlus smartphone the pairing will be hassle free as soon as you switch on your neckband a pairing message will pop up on your OnePlus device asking to pair with your neckband.. (For other smartphone). You have to do the conventional steps to pair your neckband.. SOUND QUALITY:. You have a decent sound quality no missing of sound clarity but if you are a bass lover it can disappoint you a bit coz Noise Tune Flex have a better bass quality within the same price range. But, overall the sound quality is good including the call quality.. FEATURES:. 1) MAGNETIC ON/OFF: Once, your both the earbuds and attached magnetically to each other your neckband automatically switches off and when detached it switches on. (So, for first switch on attach the earbuds and then detach then, your earbuds will power on). 2) WARP CHARGE: If you have a OnePlus adapter or any other fast chareger your neckband will provide you a 10 hr battery backup with a 10 min charge and 20 hr backup on full charge.. 3) DEVICE SWITCHING BUTTON: There is a button on left side of the neckband which allows you to switch your connectivity from one device to another if you have done multiple pairings. 4) SEPARATE MIC AND VOLUME CONTROLS: it provides you with a better call quality.. 5) LOW-LATENCY MODE(For OnePlus smartphone only): It comes with low latency mode which works with OnePlus smartphone only while gaming you can set your OnePlus smartphone to fnatic mode and get a low latency.. But, for other smartphone you may face a typical wireless lag.. CONCLUSION:. You can opt for this neckband as they provide a decent set of features in this price range.. Hope this helps you! Have a great day!

name: rhishabh s.
title: Best in class,spend extra and buy it over realme ,oppo and Boat.But  at times its unbearably laggy.
content: Used it extensively for a month+ on One Plus 7 Pro with latest OS update.. Pros. Product is best in the class.. Has additive features like quick connect and switch devices.. Has notification Indicator led.. Sound,noise Cancellation is good. Build quality is very strong.. Very comfortable and stylish. Superb Battery backup and Charging Time,you can believe what OnePlus has mentioned.. Best for One Plus users. Very good for managing office calls. Good for gaming on one plus phones. Cons. Best mike placement but very very bad capturing capability.. No Vibration motor(like Samsung level U). Does not connect to Bluetooth while charging.. Low bass. Connection should have been faster. Biggest con is the Lag,it's evident while using YouTube or watching video(try pausing and playing a video you will feel the lag), everytime while watching a video you will feel the lag, which will many time make you use an alternate headphone.If one plus can't do it I am not sure whether other brands can do it.

name: Prateek Soni
title: One plus is settling in sound Quality #neversettle
content: Sound quality is okayish. I was using Sennheiser cx 180 Before this so that was my basis for comparison.. Bass is 3/5.. Battery life is superb. I have one plus phone so for me, it is very convenient and fast to connect with the earphones.. It is very light weight and comfortable around the neck. It has matte finish. Overall 7/10.

name: Niranjan Krishnakumar
title: Best in price range of 2k and go for it if you have OnePlus device
content: Writing this review after using for 1 month.. - Sound quality is awesome and noice cancellation is also pretty good.. - Bass is less as it has 9.2mm dynamic driver but you won't recognise while using.. - Weight is very less (28g) and you won't feel it's presence at your neck.. - The best part is it's awesome battery life and it's very less charging time. If you are an OnePlus user, this earphone supports warp charging and it's very easy to use with OnePlus device as you can use it with Dolby Atmos and it also supports low latency mode while gaming with Fnatic mode in OnePlus device.. - Features like magnetic control for play & pause and quick switch between 2 recently paired device is very useful to quickly pair between mobile and laptop.. Unable to find any cons and everything works fine as I use OnePlus 7T.. Go for it if your price range is 2k and it works smoothly with OnePlus devices.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good but have been facing mic issues
content: Bought it in the month of June. The audio quality is good. I did not find that much issues with the bass as most had mentioned, rather i found the vocals to be not very clear and more on the treble side. I have been facing issues with the mic wherein the mic stopped worked all of a sudden. I tried with multiple devices and had the same issue. Then after a few days it started working again. I am not sure what was the issue really. Also, the earbuds are very fragile and i broke one while changing, so you need to be careful while changing the buds. Otherwise it has a good battery life, charging time with a oneplus charger and fast connectivity.

name: Vishwanatha Reddy
title: Good call quality, good sound quality for music
content: My main requirement was for calls and call quality is very good, both voice transmission and reception. Music also sounds very crisp, bass is just enough, not too high or too low. A good quality audio file will sound really good using one plus bullet z bt ear phones. The best thing you can keep it connected to two devices without having to unpaid. I am realizing this is the best in terms of quality.

name: Swadesh Parasher
title: Value for money
content: It is ok for it's price. Nothing special.. Everything works reliably.. Good for music and watching videos.. However, there is significant lag if you want to play games, even on OnePlus device with fnatic mode. Better to stick with wired headphones for gaming.. If you are looking for a wireless headphones for media consumption, go for it.

name: Parth Chaudhary
title: Best buy under 2K
content: I've was so confused after seeing all the reviews about the one plus bullet z , as most of 'em talked about the bass which was absent and also the sound quality which wasn't upto the mark , but my purpose for buying the same was to attend my online classes and trust me it is the best buy for 2k , I seamlessly switch between devices with an 17 hour battery back-up with a good sound quality and also there's bass not the punchy one tho which comes with the other brands in this range but it works , the built is reliable .Also just check if your non one plus device is AAC compatible cause if it's not you'll have to do with the SBC which is also fine , but if you're buying these for the sole purpose of listening music then I would not recommend them , you'll be disappointed no doubt .

name: Raman
title: Cool and Feasible
content: Everything is good except battery backup, company assured 10 mins charge for 10 hours backup but it's not. It's upto 6-7 hours.. Sound quality is best you never feel like you are using wireless headphones.. It's very much reliable for talk.. Easily connected or disconnected, magnetic control saves too much energy and provide better feasibility.. It's wire is little thick that given assurance for non breakable.. So overall I found everything. If you have budget Go for it.. Thanks

name: soham bera
title: Think before you buy
content: All are good except battery....this product cant retain battery...suppose after using its battery for 25% you kept it aside for tomorrow...what will you expect ?. Remaing 75% ?....Its a Big "NO "..... Next day you will find battery is 0% ...you have to charge it again..... Lets consider there is some amont of battery remained for that day....and you are trying to connect it again , it will not connect easily....I have faced that problem....I had to plug in the charger for a while then it connect ..... My brother also has a same device and he is also facing the same problem....

name: Vinod Kumar Bhaskaran
title: Quick Switch function missing
content: Bought this wireless z edition assuming this one will have the quick-switch function. I found the quick switch quite useful in their previous version. But without the quick switch, it was a major disappointment. The previous version was much better in functionality. Sound quality and ear-fit is good.

name: Elamvazhuthi P
title: Not worth of money don't by it....
content: Sound quality is not good not clear the instrumental music sounds.... Noise cancellation OK for it. Bass is there but not clearly punching bass...i am reccemented for music, calls purposes OK but mic fitting in the neckband so speak the in the loudly. Or else not listening to opponent...i have pairing issues everyday in the morning I connect the neckband it will be take more then 10 mins.. One I resart the Bluetooth after that we can able to connect.... Not worth of money too much of amount... Don't buy it...some good neckband in the platform below 800 or 1000 for good sound quality and music, calls... I recommend for ptron neckband tangent beats it's good for everything price 800....

name: yogesh
title: Great value for money!
content: I have used these headsets for more that 6 months now.. pros -. - really great battery life, with a normal day to day use it lasts me more than a week.. - very easy to setup and connects quickly with the device.. - It has a very good range. cons -. - sometimes there are connection issue, but just switching off using magnets and then trying again usually solves any problem. conclusion -. If you are a normal user and are looking for good bluetooth headsets with a long battery life, go for it.. I had tried bluetooth headsets, boat rockerz before, these are far better from them!

name: Hasan Khan
title: Not for long use or music lovers.
content: Pros:. - Excellent battery backup: no other earphone can beat it. Hands down.. - Noise cancellation works fine. Zoom meetings or personal calls can be handled well.. Cons:. - Not at all comfortable for long use. - Sound quality is average: not recommended for music lovers. - A white light keeps blinking every 4/5 seconds which is so frustrating; especially in the dark. I couldn't find an option to disable it.. Conclusion:. The Oppo Enco M31 is better than the Wireless Z in everything except the battery life.

name: Utsab Roy
title: Long term review (After 3 months)
content: I have been using the one plus bullets wireless z for almost 3 months now.. I would like to point out few points:. Sound quality: Sound quality is really really good. I had lots of faith on One Plus and they did an amazing job in that. Noise Cancellation: There is enough noice cancellation, to block off all chitter chatter around you while you are listening to music. Very loud noises can still be heard. Don't expect special noise cancellation at this price point, but its decent enough on these earphones.. Bass Quality: Bass is really a very main point for choosing our headphones and earphones nowadays. Even though while I was having a dilemma reading the rest of the reviews, that the one plus bullets wireless z lacks in bass, I would like to go ahead and say confidently that, it's bass is just perfect, and you will love it. It's thump has been optimised so that you can hear for longer time. But I am pretty sure there are equalizers available in almost all smartphones and music apps, and with a slight twitch you will be able to get back the thump you want. When connected with laptops, the bass is just perfect. Don't worry about it just go for it.. Mic Quality: I am just amazed at the microphone quality of the earphones, they are just awesome. From the moment I have started wearing these earphones I always prefer receiving calls over these only. Sound is just clear.. Water resistant: Yes, it is sweat and dust resistant and I use it daily for sprinting (and workout), and I out of all people, sweat very much, and I have not yet seen any problems in the earphones because of coming in contact with my sweat.. Overall: It is just an amazing product, you will love it, just go for it

name: Krishna
title: Best Wireless Earphone
content: Love Amazon service, delivered next day at my doorstep after my order.. Oneplus brand name is enough for quality product.. Well it's a One of the best wireless earphone at Rs 2000. It really worth overall.. 1.Good battery backup, gives you full week charge without charging even you use daily 3-4hr.. Fast charging in 45min gives you 100% charge.. 2.Better sound quality with balanced tuned that won't effect your eardrum.. First time using you have to do setting by clicking + volume more until you won't hear bell kind of sound when it is in max volume.. Wana feel real theatre effect Dolby Atmos sound? Try Dolby Atmos demo video in youtube. It will give you real feeling of Dolby surrounding sound. I really love that, While watching movies feel like watching in theatre coz of sound effect.. 3.Very light weight design that it won't feel you are carrying earphone.. 4.Fast connectivity. Best feature from other is that you can connect between two phone or laptop & phone either any1 by switch mode, within a second it connect from one device to other.. 5. Nice powerfull magnetic earphone design coz wen u leave it hanging when not using, it will automatically stick together to get disconnect from device and save power.. And as soon as u saparate them it will immediately connect to device.. 6. Nice 15meter wireless covering range. You can keep your device in center and enjoy listening by freely roaming within surrounding radius.. Bad things. 1. Earphone don't have nice ear grip. Keep falling from your ear. Coz of long battery design in front and also may be coz of mic design. Change the earbud to smaller given one or from shop for better grip earbud.

name: Shivam
title: Worst customer service from oneplus ,
content: I buy it on 4 june 2020 ,and it stop working in just 6 month ,firsty bluetooth connectivity problem starts from december (i.e. continously switching on off on off with high frequency ,and now in january 1st week it get off totally ,and stop working ...,........and oneplus service is not like boat service (i.e. oneplus service is not like boat customer service is if for service they take it from home and after that they again home deliver it), and problem is that ,the nearest oneplus service center is 82 km far from me......😞

name: vishal
title: Go for it...
content: -long lasting build quality.. -fittings are good...but cannot lean sideways with it over pillows it may cause discomfort but its subjective.. -connectivity is superb (i used it in android), the magnets in the buds are super responsive.. -In terms of music - thumping bass is missing but you will get enough bass if you are casual listener, can try some of the sound effects in equalizer according to your need.. - for call - its good but dont expect noise cancellation over mic ... however its good for indoor calling purposes according to my use. (call taken in android). -Battery will make you smile and amaze as its the best part of the neckband. I enjoy day and night listening music for hours, watching series and movies for hours. Here hours define more than 15 hours of use in single charge and it can go ahead too.. Charging - I charges it with 10w 2amp charger of android device which took about 45 minutes.. -Quick switch device is good. can be handy for those who use multpile devices during work.. -Long time use will not cause pain to ears, not annoying over your neck, can sleep with it, the blinking light is not annoying but its subjective, charging with normal charger like with 10w charger works good. music sound is good with good bass but dont expect thumping bass like boom boom... no distortion in high volume...can listen in 50 to 60% volume where as during call need to raise the volume to 70 - 80%.... mic could have been better however good for indoor ...outdoor with noise will make the responder annoy.... OVERALL its a must purchase product as with 1999 price is giving you almost best of a neckband can give. So go for it.

name: Súraj verma
title: DO READ BEFORE BUYING [SONY WI-C200 X OP WIRELESS Z]
content: I use Sony WI-C200 & I purchased OP Wireless Z headset Blue one on 17th July. It looked great. Build quality was damn awesome. But as usual, bass & treble was absent. So as usual, I used EQFY (Viper4a for Rooted users) and after using EQFY I increased the bass & treble and then the headset sounded damn good. Deep bass, crystal clear audio & what not.. Coming to call experience: It's not good. There's clarity BUT alot of environmental noises. In comparison, the WI-C200 was alot better.. BUT the big BUT, I noticed one thing that, the right eartip lacked 5-10% bass as compared to the left one. I mean, you can clearly notice it while playing 'Rockstar by DaBaby or The Box by Roddy Ricch or Animals by Martin Garrix' I mentioned these songs because these songs are bass heavy & do use EQFY for actual BASS TEST. So this was a major issue, due to which I have placed an return for this product.. ALSO, the build or structure of the model is quite weird. Tbh I didn't liked it that well.. CONNECTIVITY: It's fabulous in OP Z & much better than SONY WI-C200.. BATTERY: Again, OP Wins.. OVERALL SOUND: OP Z (After using it for 3 days). Overall: SONY WI-C200 is a better product than OP WZ. I agree, C200 lacks more bass than WZ but EQFY rocks!. I am thinking to get refund asap so that I could place order for black WZ just to verify that, my ears ain't faulty but the headset is.. Edit: After further testing, I have ordered an replacement of OP Z just to make sure that, I got damaged pair. Cuz OP Z sounds really well & better than C200.. Edit 2: Same issue :/ More bass on left eartip.. Edit 3: I am just done with these earphones. Design is idiotic. Pains in ear. Also I started to making an misconception that I hear less with my right ear. Designers should be fired.

name: jithin
title: Best deal..!!!
content: I have used 3-4 different brands bluetooth earphones before. I can confidently say this is the best choice in all the aspects. Sound quality us awesome. Battery backup is long. Connectivity is smooth. I am using one plus 7t and it connects in half second once bluetooth is activated. Design is nice. Those who need to be on call continuously throughout the day, this is most convenient. Even though price is slightly more as compared to other brands, it's totally worth it. I am totally satisfied with my purchase.

name: Rajat
title: Worth investing 2k for this earphone!!!!!!!
content: Colour: Black. Product is just amazing!!. With the reasonable price and quality. Unbox - really great feel in Unboxing it!. Products included - C Type red cable and extra pair of earplugs and some paper work. Quality - It's good and is made of good quality material.. Experience - The quality and the design is really excellent than the wireless 2 earphones!. It comes with the magnetic attach, where song will be paused when u attach both ear piece, and I had a confusion in Turing ON the earphones, You need to separate the earplugs and automatically it will be ON and Pair instantly... Sound quality - really great experience. Bass is not that good!. Volume control : Volume can easily be increased and decreased.. I usually use my laptop and phone side by side. Was easily be switched be to devices with just two taps of button. And it just takes 2-3 seconds to switch.. Range : Approximately 50-60 ft.

name: Nelson k kuriakose
title: QUALITY AT FAIR PRICE
content: The Bullets Wireless Z are the cheapest wireless set from OnePlus so far, with the US pricing being half what the Bullets Wireless 2 cost. In India, the Bullets Wireless Z costs a third of the Bullets Wireless 2 and half of the original Bullets Wireless. In fact, the INR1,999 price is the lowest anywhere in the world and makes the Bullets Wireless Z a particularly enticing purchase.. And it's not just price reductions either as the Bullets Wireless Z also improves upon a few things compared to the models that came before them. They have the longest battery life, proper water-resistance, and a low-latency mode designed to work specifically with OnePlus phones.. We will be getting into all of the features and also all of the compromises that come with such drastic price reductions, so if you're interested in getting a pair of these, make sure you read on before you click purchase.

name: Vikrant Singh
title: first worst product by oneplus
content: I purchased these headphone. I allready have oneplus 7t mobile. quality was nice not perfect. and the worst part is I purchased this lead on 28 may and on 15 june its button of song change stop working. i was not able to change song with the button. and after 3 days stopped working of its play paused button. its horrible.
