Oneplus launch nice headphone with quite nice battery backup but quality is worst. sorry to post this comment. But i'm hurt.

name: Plato
title: Amazing bluetooth earphones....!
content: Got this....and I quite like this! No complaints....worth the buck and I'm a oneplus fan.. If you are looking for a quality bluetooth earphone for music....look no further. Just love the sound quality.. If you are on calls too much, note that this does not have noise cancelling microphone and will pick up noise, though what you hear crystal clear, but may not be the same for the person at the other end.

name: Pranav
title: Bang for your buck, at 2000 Rs!
content: I don't think you're gonna find anything better than the Bullets Wireless Z at this price point.. Bought this beauty on August, and thought I'd reserve my judgement after a couple of months of usage.. Crisp clear audio and amazing noise cancellation, OnePlus has yet again delivered a pretty decent product.. Bluetooth connectivity is very good especially if you own a OnePlus phone, although at times, I've noticed that it doesn't connect automatically, and I have to do it manually. Nothing to be concerned about tho, probably has happened only around 4-5 times in these 2 months of usage.. Bass quality, I'd give it a 6/10. But after tuning my Equalizer according to my preferences on my 7T, the bass sounds pretty good, more like a 7/10. So my suggestion is, if you're a bass lover like me, you can get decent bass out of this by adjusting your Equalizer settings.. Quite handy when it comes to using them while working out as well, as they don't slip off your ears that easily. I'm a person who sweats a lot as well, so I'm pretty impressed with how it has coped with that, too.. Call quality is alright for me, the position of the mic could make it difficult for the person on the other end to hear what we're saying at times, so I literally have to remove my left ear piece while making calls, and keep the mic next to my mouth so that the other person can listen to me talking.. Built quality is very good, and like I said, it's pretty sweat resistant too. Battery life is awesome too, and comfortably lasts for around 16-18 hours for me.. All in all, it's an amazing piece of technology available at such an affordable price. I'd suggest you potential buyers to go for it without further hesitation, especially if you own a OnePlus phone.

name: Avi Raj
title: Sound quality has dampend after 5 months of usage.
content: I brought this earphones 5 months ago, it was working perfectly well. After 2 months of buying it occasionally troubled me with ghrr ghrr sounds, but I could still live with it, no biggie. Besides, it was temporarily. But now, the sound quality has dropped by sudden and it is behaving the same as improperly connected headphones ( wired one ). I want to know if it is something only I am experiencing, or is it common, and how to fix it? I have tried to reset by pressing volumes keys simultaneously, but it isn't working!!

name: Suryakant Mishra
title: Go for it
content: Ok this is my second purchase on music accessories after Flipkart Smartbuy Headphone and here is a honest feedback.. Sound Quality- Best. Noise Cancellation- Best. Bass Quality- Better (if you are looking for good bass, you should spend a big amount on speakers or something which is made for bass). Charging Capacity- More than 24 hours on single charge (they mean it, they say charge for 10 minutes and use it for 10 hours, trust me they mean it). Very quick charging. I'm working as a sales executive and I have to speak with customers all the day,so I'm using it to speak with customers. On day 1 when I got it, I charged it to 100% and started using it from 11 AM, today is day 2 and it's 2:30 PM now, still it has 60% battery.

name: Hiren Ladva
title: Disappointed with connectivity issues
content: Very disappointed with the product, and the first product from OnePlus family that I didn't like at all. Issues:. 1. Sound breaks even when connected to a One Plus phone that is kept at a hand's length away.. 2. Its battery indicator on the phone/iPad is totally useless, as it keeps showing 100% all the time and suddenly gets disconnected. To reconnect, it needs to be recharged. This was not the case with my prev headset.. 3. Mic isn't great. People listening to me on the other side have complained I'm not audible, till I move to the speaker mode on my phone.. 4. Connects to only one device at a time. There are good branded BT headsets at half the price that have this feature.. Overall, not at all worth the price it commands..

name: Harshal
title: Awesome products
content: This is very good product, I am looking for something like that after using Boat headphone. It's new kind of on/off me mechanism is attractive, that may confuse for new user. Sound quality is awesome. I been using since last 15 days and didn't found any issues. Bluetooth is very powerful can't even loose connectivity when I am at different corners of my house. Good job One Plus 👍

name: SHANKAR SINGH
title: Chinese means Chinese only
content: Those who are saying excellent bass, might be they problem with their ear. Bass quality is avarage. Battery life is little bit good not 20hrs as committed. Not easy switching between two device. Length must need to be larger by 1". Operating switches are on left side when 90% people's are using cell phone in their left hand the placement of switches are wrong it should be on right side.

name: Sulakshana Bhattacharya
title: Best purchase in this price range
content: I was immediately in love with the packaging when the product arrived. Unboxing was both fun and easy. Everything was neatly packed.. Pros:. • Ease of use - it was very intuitive and I did not. really need to refer to the manual. • Comfortable earbuds for someone who has small ears and always avoided in-ear buds. • Comfortable neck strap, not heavy or irritating. • I did not really buy it for music, more for calls so great sound quality for now. • Quick and automatic on and off and immediate connection to phone. No need for reconnecting. Cons:. • I have only had the product for a day so haven’t used it much. The points above are critical for me so I will write an update if any of them start bothering me

name: Harshad P.
title: Bass lover and online games don't keep any exceptions
content: For the price-range Boat is providing more features and option but price for the brand and the trust is genuine.. Call Of Duty Mobile (Tested on Redmi Note 5 Pro (6 gb + 64 gb)).:. I am genuine CODM gamer and there is 1 sec delay while playing BR matches <Legendary Rank>.. and because of the delay i couldn't figure out where the enemy is coming and from which side.. and if you have ping 60+ the audio delay will also increase.. PUBG Mobile (Tested on Redmi Note 5 Pro (6 gb + 64 gb)).:. Audio delay is little low compare to CODM and can use this earphones for TDM sessions.. Cons :. Bass is super low ( For Android users : Change audio codec for little improvement). Audio delay in Input online gaming (COD mobille and PUBGM). Battery percentage % is shown in 10% basis (eg. 80% then after usage it will show directly 70%). No IP ratings mentioned .. No Housing for charging port.. No Noise cancellation (But call quality is ok). Pros :. Bluetooth 5.0. Light Weight. Supports Fast Charging. Dedicated button to switch between Bluetooth devices. Magnetic eart-ip helps alot. Tangle free cables

name: Danish
title: Every thing is alright but the connectivity issues
content: Sound quality and bass quality was upto the mark. And the battery backup is 10/10. But still there's one thing about this product which doesn't give me any choice but to return this product. The problem is connection issues with the devices. There's a very high chance this device may suddenly disconnect with your device and then you might have to waste your time in hours and hours in order to reconnect to your device. I have already read so many reviews related to connectivity issues and yet oneplus still haven't manage to solve this issue yet.

name: Pranit
title: The best partner you'll have 🤘🏼
content: Its been over a month and I am absolutely loving this product...... X: The only thing I would say is that the micro phone is not that great. √ other than that sound quality, comfort and clarity is just awesome. √ The best part, it is very convenient to use.. √ Recieved it in perfect condition too. √ Really good quality for the price range... 100% value for money ✊🏼

name: Jaskaran
title: Great battery life, quick charge available, but sound quality sucks
content: I have been sing these earphones for over 3 months now. And I am using these earphones for ~ 10 hours day for entertainment as well as taking office calls. They can easily give ~11 hours of battery backup after just 15 minutes of charges which is quite surprising and amazing. However, the sound lacks flavor and texture. Using this for 10 hours a day you don't realize what you are missing on, but as soon as you wear something premium, you really notice the gap in the sound quality. Even the One Plus Wireless Buds, a cheaper earbuds compared to other deliver a wholesome sound.. VERDICT: Sturdy, great battery life, however the sound quality is not up to the mark.

name: Dheeraj Kumar
title: Not so good product for the price of Rs. 1900.
content: Very low bass. At high volume, songs begin to seem prickly and uncomfortable. Can't listen songs on high volume for longer times on this one.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Thanks for Oneplus for making this bullets Z 👏
content: Major thing regarding Bluetooth head sets are pairing between the devices, which Oneplus made it simple and stubborn connectivity, there is no lag once you connect to any device and also dual pairing is available which made switching between the devices very easy ! And really good for the people doing WFH for attending meetings !. In simple word I love the this head phones for below reasons !. - good connectivity (pairing devices). -quality made. -comfort wear in ears. - sound/music/bass/call quality. 😍👍

name: Manasi
title: Damaged
content: Worst product ever delivered faulty I ordered it as I required this for meetings and now the replacement will be delivered on 22 July i.e. after 5 days worst service ever.. waste of time and money dint expect this from one plus... Also this can not be refunded what a shame...

name: Akshay Tiwari
title: Better then other neckbands in this price range!
content: Pros :- 1. Rich in built quality premium feel. 2. Good battery life (i charge for once 2days of use). 3. Light weight comfortable for doing workouts. 4. Good sound quality balanced sound. 5. Value for money. 6. Megnate lock (On/off). 7. Quick switch button for using multiple device on just one press. Corns:- 1. In my case bill was missing. 2. Oneplus striker is missing in the packaging box i don't know why!. Conclusion :- In this price range this is the best budget deal i've used sony neck band before but they are not that comfortable so i switch to oneplus lastly if you're looking for a neckband from a good brand with good battery life then go for it!... Good wishes. Thanks for reading :)

name: manasi
title: Not getting switched on 🙁
content: I was overwhelmed seeing the packing...I started loving it till I switch it off and kept it in my bag after one use.. when I tried to switch it on again it did not happen.. tried all possible ways but all in vein.. I thought it has no battery so put that again into charger .then only the red and then the white light started blinking..I was hopeful that the earphone got switched on..When I tried to connect with my iPhone it said connection is unsuccessful make sure that the Bluetooth device is switched on.. I face the same issue every time I want to use the earphone.. I couldn’t return it even just because I had thrown away the bills..it’s a very ugly experience I have right now.. does anyone facing the same issue..??

name: Sudheer Illipilli
title: No Quick Switch on Bass Edition
content: There is no quick switch, unable to switch between devices using these earphones. We have to switch by selecting oneplus bullets on the device's Bluetooth settings. Very disappointed. I bought this product, particularly for a quick switch. Oneplus and Amazon cheating customers.

name: Om KULKARNI
title: Really good product for 2k.
content: Product is just amazing!!. With the reasonable price and quality 🖤. Unbox - really great feel in unboxing it!. The case in which the earphones are kept also felt a lot premium.. Products included - C Type red cable and extra pair of earplugs and manuals. Experience - One plus products are always amazing, and this earphone, I really loved it.. These earphones are really good. It has been 1 week since i am using these and did not experience any problem. For 2k you can get an excellent package. They also provide u with ear buds of 3 sizes, which i liked a lot. It has a amazing battery life. I have listened to songs and played games for a whole night and day just by charing for around 20 min.It also has great features like quick pair which is really use full. Over all this is a good package price if u are looking for good earphones near and around 2k. For gaming, if u don’t have a one plus mode for low latency mode, I would not recommend it. It is ok and manageable for playing games at home but it has minute latency which can only be experienced during gaming E.g.- while playing Pubg.

name: Sidharth PS
title: Best earphones for 2k if you are a bass lover
content: If you want a thumping bass to listen EDM and bass boosted song go for this bass edition. but I faced a bit lack of sound quality in mid and treble part due to more bass as mid and treble are slightly down in this bass edition . But you can use the equalizer to adjust the mid and treble of your choice and you can get the best sound quality from this bass edition. if you want a crystal clear sound to listen normal music and to listen every instruments in the song I would suggest to go for one plus bullets normal edition it has better sound quality but lacks a bit base for me when I used the normal edition. Build quality is very good. Latency is also good enough to watch movies but i didn't play pubg with these earphones. but I didn't faced latency issue in this earphone. Call quality was also very good at this price point. Note. These is no quick switch function in the bass edition which makes slightly disappointed for those who are using laptop and mobile at the same time . if you want these function go for normal edition.. Final. Go for it if you are a bass lover

name: joseph reddy sagili
title: WORTH IT!
content: Im reviewing this after using it for a month. iam using an android device. and not a 1+ one.. pros-. 1) battery = i charge for 10 min with my fast charger and its gets 100%. yeah, it lasts 20 hrs.. 2) quick switch = it works as it's mentioned. never faced any issues with it. it takes 2.5 secs for switching.. 3) Design = it is super flexible and solid. you can fold it and keep it in your pocket.. 4)mic quality = just awesome. the opposite person will still think that you are talking on your mobile.. cons-. 1)latency = if you dont have a one plus device and you want this for gaming, just dont buy it. the latency is like. almost a second for devices other than one plus. if you have one plus devices you can use the low. latency mode and its not an issue.. 2) Bass = It has bass. yeah it has. but it dont have enhanced bass because it is mainly focused on vocals. you. can only experience it on high volume. totally i'm very much satisfied with this product. if you have one plus device. close your eyes and just take it :)

name: SUMIT SINGH
title: Amazing product forr calling and great bass too
content: I purchased these headphones for calling purpose mostly and it works amazingly superb.. quickly shuts down while you attach the magnets of both side, connects very fast while you detach.. When phone rings, I quickly detach the magnets and it connects in 2 seconds and becomes ready to talk..

name: Amazon Customer
title: AVERAGE AT BEST
content: The product has got a very plastic finish which feels very cheap .. The sound quality as well is average with barely any bass . But the fnatic mode on it is brilliant and as good as a wired earphone with barely any delay.. The most irritating thing in this device is the WHITE LED light which BLINKS brightly every 5 seconds . Especially in the dark this is a headache cause it's quite bright . The white light also makes no sense to flicker every 5 seconds just to show that the device is paired I hope OnePlus does something to fix this .. Overall except for battery it's really average I would suggest you buy other earphones if you want for music like realme wireless or oppo enco m31

name: Nitin
title: Absolutely Perfect one than Realme and Sony
content: Guys this is really a honest review.. Note : I own a OnePlus device. (Not sure about other devices). I was forced not to buy a OnePlus Wireless Z based on the review comments shown in YouTube and Amazon and Flipkart.. So I initially bought Realme Wireless. Realme was good in only bass but latency was too high.. Then Based on OnePlus Wireless Z review, I thought of compromising Bass and Get a battery durable one. So I recieved OnePlus Wireless Z today.. Guys seriously, you can seriously identify each instrument and vocal separately and Bass is really good. In fact I liked the bass in OnePlus more than Realme.. My advice is get both and you itself compare both, and return the bad one. I done the same. Nothing to lose. Bass is really good guys. I don't feel it is low.. Note:. No lag while playing PUBG in both Fnatic mode and Non-Fnatic.. I'm playing in Non Fnatic mode.. In simple words, "U WILL FEEL THE DOLBY DIGITAL THEATER EXPERIENCE". Please don't follow YouTube reviews. You people review on own.. Thanks for your time.

name: Rakesh prajapati
title: Some Pros / Cons
content: ✓Pros:-. --------------------------------------------------. #Best battery last upto 18 hrs at 80% volume. #Quick switch work very fast. #Best built quality. #Highly flexible. #Fast charging work fabulous. #Fit in ears very well. #Overall no competition of any neckband around this price range except for sound.. ✓Cons:-. ----------------------------------------------. #Only passive noise cancellation present. #Not for bass centric users. #Latency seen in gaming except oneplus mobile. #Look this only happened with me that " whenever i switch it from mobile to laptop then its sounds bitrate goes down to 64kbps type and when i restart the laptop then it comes to original sound" but as i said it only happened with me, and i asked many of my friend , they haven't found this issue.

name: prasad waghmode
title: Must Buy for Long Calls
content: 1. Superb Battery Back up for long calls. 2. One Plus Fast Charging with few minutes its charges upto 80%. 2. Ear Fit is comfortable , can adjust with 3 ear bud tips.. 3. Sound Quality is not satisfactory compared to Sennisher , but for calls its good.. 4. Unique on-off mechanism is awesome

name: Sk
title: Good product for the price !
content: For the price, this is a good stuff.. The connectivity is very good, fast and extends to good range.. Sometimes I encountered automatic disconnection and reconnection - may be to refresh the connection.. Also sometime the clarity of the microphone is doubtfull with the call recepient getting some disturbance.. Overall it's good. The low latency while gaming is nice. Build quality is good.. Thanks.

name: Rishabh Rai
title: Value for money
content: Excellent product!! Worth the price.. Sound quality is amazing. Crystal clear vocals.. Best part about is its so fast in connecting and disconnecting to device.. Also it is a comfort to my ear, very light weight and soft.. I must say sound is pretty balanced which is my preference. (Niether too mich bass nor too much treble).. Happy with the product.

name: Paona Hijam
title: Worried for battery? Tired of changing devices? Buy this.
content: Battery king of all neck band earpieces.. 10 min charge will give you 80% of power.. Switch button is super helpful if you use multiple devices.. Sound wise JUST GOOD, there are better ones if you care about sound quality. But for battery and switch feature this is the one.

name: Rahul Das
title: Review after usage of 2 months - Fully satisfied
content: I'm writing this review after a usage of 2 months.. First about the build quality. The build quality is quite good considering the price . The neckband is made up of rubber and good plastic. Secondly the microphone. The microphone quality is also very good I'd say . I've taken a lot of calls by wearing these, and the other party never complained that you're not sounding clear or you're voice is quite muddy .. At last about the sound quality. As considering the price of 2000 Rs these are quite good in sound quality.. I'd say this is not for the people who likes the bass the most . There is decent base in this earphone not much , so if you're a sort of Bassheads you'll not like it. Now the mids and vocals are also very clear and. I'd have to say OnePlus has done a great job regarding the latency on this one.. The highs and the trebles are quite not that much loud. But considering the price these do a quite good job .. Fully recommended. If you've a OnePlus device you can enjoy gaming on this earphone.

name: Rahit
title: Returning the headphones
content: 1)Sound quality is not good..If u want nice sound quality then go for realme buds wireless..I m using realme buds wireless from past 5 months and the sound quality is far better than this.. 2)It is not comfortable for long usage period because it hurts in the lower ear. 3) Blinking Light is a irritating problem in this headphones specially in the dark.After connecting it will blink continuosly after 1-2 sec and it is annoying in the night.

name: S S Kartheek Adivi
title: Simply Awesome for Everything.
content: This is 4th time I'm ordering the same product for my sister, friend, dad and myself(1 blue and 3 black).. I use this wherever I go and never got disappointed.. I get a battery backup of approx 20 hours just as mentioned.. I charge it once for every two days of heavy usage.. I tried using it in shower rains and no issue at all. Never tried in heavy rain and will not even try either :P. I use it with my laptop and mobile simultaneously with the quick switch button which is a fantastic idea to have on such a device. Useful for those who attend meetings or watch movies on laptop and need to switch to mobile to attend a call immediately.. Overall this is an awesome product at such an affordable price.

name: Sathya
title: Very good product
content: Oneplus Bullets wireless Z is good. Receiving capacity is good. Bluetooth Receiver 10meter strong performance. Quality is good, sound quality also good. If you want bass, install the bass app or in Samsung phone on the Dolby mode. then the bass is okay. I really like this product because battery stamina is ultimate, I watch movies in mobile, 3 to 4days stamina. Then the important thing is ear phones back Side magnets. when this magnets attach, bluetooth receiving automatically cut off, and neck band is super flexible. Thank u Amazon.

name: Manish
title: Feeling Cheated
content: Sound quality and build is okay. But feeling cheated by Amazon and One Plus as there is no physical quick switch button in this, the much required feature. Also, there is no return only replacement is possible. Looks like Amazon and One Plus are already aware of this and that is why not return is there.. Didn't expected this from Amazon and One Plus.

name: AmazonUser007
title: Can't review the original product because the one I received is not genuine
content: Item received is not genuine. The box is different compared to original box I saw on OnePlus website for these earphones. I also did not receive USB cable, silicone earbuds in the box. They do not work properly and have connectivity issues. The on/off light is not in sync with the state of the bluetooth connectivity. I am highly disappointed with the delivery of this product as I have never received a compromised product from Amazon. Though I have placed a replacement order but the one that I received, turns out to be a fake/copy product, I will never be able to trust Amazon again. Highly disappointed!

name: Pooja Mahapatra
title: Refund only
content: I bought this product product on 10th of March and I have given to my sister as a gift ,so she open after 3 days back, after using the wireless she is facing connectivity issue so she told me you take it back the earphones, because it's giving me the problem now I got the earphones and I used for a one day 18th of March and I found there is a connectivity issue, she also went the service centre for the refund but they told contact to Amazon support so I don't need this product and I don't want to keep it so give me the refund if me

name: Chandramouli R
title: Could've been better!
content: Not for music!. Pros:. 1. Light weight. 2. Quick Connect/Disconnect by attaching/detaching magnets back of ear buds. 3. Good battery with fast charge. 4. During calls, receiver is able to hear me clearly. Cons:. 1. No bass whatsoever. 2. Sound is bland. It's just plain and sometimes distorted at a higher volume. 3. Disconnects from phone in middle of a call and connects back even if there's no movement. 4. Edge of the wire connecting to the ear bud is likely to come out early. Careful handling is required

name: Amazon Customer
title: Battery, sound, noise cancellation & how to use other features 😉.
content: With this price range this is good but company may improve eartips plastic to metal.. Ear tips are plastic, magnetic Bluetooth off on features work, if you play something and magnetic eartips assembled, then it pause, after detach its not playing you have to press middle button.. There have no Bluetooth on / off switch, when eartips detach oneplus bullet wireless bass edition blue colour headphone, automatically on after attached it is off / standby.. Noise cancellation is good, when I ride a bike with helmet and talk with others receiver not feel ousider sound. Without helmet you have to cruise the bike on 25 to 30 km/hr then it is okay.. Battery back up is good.. Last but important thing is sound is more pronounced, and clear, no extra bass or treble are there.

name: abhimanyu
title: Ticks all the requirements. Just perfect.
content: I bought it mainly for office meetings, personal calls and music ofcourse. so if you are reading this review for call quality, you are reading the right review. the call quality is very close to perfect. encountered no issues with connectivity and microsoft teams calls on my lenovo. music is also perfectly balanced. I like listening to music in the raw nature of it without adding any artificial bass to it, so these are again good for my needs. I also run while keeping these on so again no issues. the size of the buds however is on the bigger size a little as compared to apple pods. rest every feature is good ( magnetic on off and one click device change). Overall, very good keeping the price in mind. Thanks

name: Anonymous
title: You'll be Disappointed !!! with this product.
content: Sound Quality is Not that good. I was expecting a better sound quality from it as it comes under Oneplus Branding, the company on which I use to Trust a Lot. But it turned out to be a great Disappointment for me.. Bass Quality is Really Poor.. Please Don't even think to buy this Earphone if you are a Bass Lover.. Passive Noise Cancellation is somewhat Good, Thanks to that soft silicon tip and good fit and finish of the earphone.. There was something worng with the Charging Indicator (LED), it never turned White after a Full Charge, it always showed Red light.. And there was some glitch while connecting to my phone or any other device via Bluetooth.. It always showed some lag and produced some glitchy sound, whenever I connect it after a while.(It got alright evertime after reconnecting tho'.). And I don't know if this problem was just with my Unit. But it is what it is. That's why I returned it after 2 Days.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not given an original brand new product
content: I would just like to bring to your notice that when we received the 1st piece, it was a damaged one and we had to ask for a replacement. It's only when we got the replacement that we realised that the 1st piece was not an original new product but probably someone's replacement package. The difference between the 2 were:. 1st piece had no seal proof wrapping. No charging cord. Whereas when we got the replacement we could immediately see that this product was a brand new product.. It's sad that something like was done. I sincerely hope that others dont get duped with old products. Just because there was physical damage which was noticeable that we returned the product else we would probably not have realised that we had not been given the original new piece for which we had paid.

name: raju
title: Disappointing Purchase
content: Worked only for 2 months after that buttons not working, automatic volume increasing and frustrating beep sound continuously. Went to Service Center they said it will take 15 days to resolve. Seriously 15 days what for? i have to purchase another headset for 15 days don't know when it will resolve.

name: Vaijanath M. Basangi
title: WatchOut for used product
content: i got a used headphones the tag way crushed, there was no usb cable, there was no plastic taps on buds (which i saw in YouTube Unboxing). Headphones has scratches on band sides and specks of dust on volume and mic module.. headphone placement in the box was upside-down.. And During call people complained me about my voice was not clear as if i am speaking from a distance.. Headphones are great (i have another of these headphones ). If u truly love bass then you can use equilizer, or if u use Jio Saavan apk in that you can boost Bass, but vocals may get unbalanced.

name: T D LAMA
title: Good headphones for the price with high end performance.
content: Its a good quality headphones with alot of high end features. All of it's functions work well and the charging is super fast as mentioned by the company. The LED on the earphones flicker constantly when used and while charging there is no direct indicator when it completely finished charging. The light goes from red to white only if you charge for a long time, but that is unnecessary as it really charges in 10-20 mins. Once charged I've used this upto two days and still haven't reached 0% battery yet. Very convient to connect to different devices and easy to manipulate the on and off function with the magnetic attachment of the heads. The sound quality could be better but at this price the sound quality is good enough while it's additional functionas are high end. Good one from one plus.

name: Rohit
title: Perfect pair for one plus devices
content: Just received the product today and packing is great. Unboxing experience is great too. Reverb red is perfect for my one plus 7t pro McLaren edition. Sound quality and bazz is amazing. Nice cancellation is average on calls. And charging time is roughly about 30 minutes to charge full. However 10 minutes charging from my warp charger will do the needful for 10 hours as promised. Amazingly awesome experience. Just go for it!!

name: Rohit Saha
title: Not Suitable for POCO X2 (Read my review)
content: 1)There is some compatibility issue with my poco x2.... No issue with audio but when u will play video one after another there is some mumbled voice issue.... sound lacks for 3-4 sec after each play and pause..... 2)High range with phone but very less range for PC/Laptop Bluetooth..... 3)1st I have replaced it but seen same issue with both products then I return it..... 4) This product is only for oneplus mobile user....

name: Nikhil
title: Amazing product
content: Amazing product and packing. The earphone comes in a beautiful box with charging cable and extra earbuds. The charging of earphone was almost 100% so that I could test it quickly.. Pros:. 1) Sound quality top class. 2) Range is very good. 3) Ultra fast charging (10 min charge to 10 hrs music play). 4) Noise cancellation. 5) Sweat proof (so you can use it in gym). 6) Connectivity is very fast (from the very first time). 7) Almost 18-20 hrs battery backup. 8) Can connect to two devices quickly and can switch in between. There are couple of cons which I will mention further:. 1) Charging cable is too short (you can use oneplus mobile charging cable if you have one). 2) I’m using it with iPhone - I found the response time on the click is little bit slow (may be different for different models). You can definitely go for it if you love to use quality products for long term.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Lengthy but helpful
content: Everything thing is super but,. When the magnets in headset connected together the connection between the mobile and the headset will turned off. Most of the people think it's useful but in a daily routine purpose it won't be an advantage. By this method the battery life extend from 12-14hrs.. When you get a call you need to seprate it to get the connection then the call function get activated. Sometimes it won't work properly. We need to cut the call reconnect it and then we need to make call and speak. While in traffic or in an emergency situation this will irritates you.I previously used boAt Rockerz 510 over the ear headphone from last year till today it doesn't have any connection problem whenever I get call or in between the call it connects perfectly.. In the OnePlus wireless z bass edition, in my case it is a big problem for me.. Other than that this was an amazing product from OnePlus.. Hope it helps :-)

name: Uvesh Shelat
title: Noice cancellation technology is a bit weird but just okay
content: It's much handy and compact to use, doesn't cause pain in the ears. Pretty good amount of bass(i prefer sony wi-c300 for bass and sound quality). What i didn't like about it was it's noice cancellation technology. Along with the background noice it also eliminates my noice(person with heavy voice tone). If the background voice is sharp and thin, them it'll pass through its noice cancellation and my sister's voice came just fine even if she was talking at same volume as of mine. That's the thing you should keep in mind else the product's excellent in sound, recharge time, playback, no connection/disconnection error. So guess I'm having a pretty good time having this around and also if you're a gamer having a OnePlus device, then fnatic mode is worth trying. It's really impressive.

name: Yash Verma
title: It's not authentic.Do Not Buy
content: I ordered this OnePlus bullet wireless z for my OnePlus 8 pro with a lot of hope as this is my first flagship phone.The ear phones which I got are cleary a replica or some other brand's product.i didn't expect This obnoxious way of handeling by OnePlusand by Amazon too.im really disappointed as I waited 6 days just for a fake product.the charging cable I got too is of Android charger.This is Completely A fake Product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not a bad one. battery beast.....
content: Not a bad Bluetooth earphone in general.. Find some connection issues between my windows 10 laptop and my phone. My 3 star primarily due to its connection issues. it connects and reconnects many times when connections are interchanging. It consists of a bad quality mic and good quality speakers. Bad choice for video conferencing and a good choice for the audio experience. I appreciate for its battery performance. more than 20 hrs ... More than enough. A small delay in sound when compared with my wired skulkandy headphone, which is acceptable.

name: kishan narote
title: Review
content: advantages:. 1.sound quality is good, noise cancellation is good , gaming, calling ,handling, battery backup is very very good, some extra features like switch to devices, automattically connection, warp charge features are advantages.. Cons:. 1.bass quality is not good, if u r music lover then personally i don't recommend it .. 2. it doesnt fit in ear as compared to boat rockerz or realme bud 2 or mi neckband.. 3.while doing exercise it come out of ear.

name: anurag mishra
title: Beast of all qualities
content: First impression after 2 hours of receiving. (Will update later too). 1 Excellent packaging. 2 Bass too gud. 3 Sound quality perfect clearly audible each. instrumentss ,vocals. 4 Audio quality a little compressed low is. heard on call even on full voice I don't. know why It occurred. 5 I spend over a month in researching for a. Better earpeice among boat 441 ,realme. Q buds,mivi dupods m40 but all had some. or the other problem either connectivity. or bass or sound quality( I wanted earbuds. but 2k budget is less for it if they are. giving then you are compromising with. one or the other thing). I think I got the best of them thanks one plus .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Buy the one with extra bass at same Price (Review after 1 Month of use)
content: I liked the sound quality, battery, and build quality however, there is a major drawback of this product.. 1) You cannot Pair this headset with Multiple devices which is common these days.. 2) It will not auto-connect to a previously connected device even if you have paired this in the past.. 3) Every-time you want to use this you have to long-press the button and only then you can connect.. 4) Even though it's an Oneplus product, you will not find this headset in the list of the paired devices on Oneplus 7T, Oneplus 8, and Oneplus7T Pro.. The recommendation is to buy the one without the button/extra bass.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not good for long time
content: The ear phones keep falling out of ears, not do comfortable to wear for longer dureation as ear lobes start paining, better products from other bands are available than this

name: Sangeetha
title: Worst.. Duplicate product
content: Please don't buy the product. First time I received same and even I charged for hours it didn't work and I returned it. This image is the product I got in return evn this is defective and doesn't have any logo . LOOKS LIKE DUPLICATE product. Am returning it back . Highly disappointed

name: LoL
title: Awsome battery backup and phone connectivity features
content: Review on the basis of month use!!!. Worth buying this product for following reasons.. 1. Excellent connectivity and disconnecting features (it you magnetise both buds together it will be disconnected from your phone, as soon as you separate the buds it will get connected in 2 3 sec). 2. Volume control features, sound intensity are awsome. Noise cancellation are relatively better at this cost (2k).. 3. Battery backup is the utmost best thing in this, a quick charging with warp charger (10 to 20 min is enough to use it for 9 to 10 hours as claimed by company). Something which is poor in this.. 1. Design or look of this earphone are not much compelling. 2. Not much comfortable for long time carrying it on neck, or blocking your ears.. Overall worth buying. (I reviewed this product using it with One plus phone, so not sure if it's performing similar with other brands phone)

name: Jubin Gupta
title: Good but ignorable
content: There is one irritating thing in the earphone and that is... Continuous white light blinking whenver the earphone is on..

name: Frequent Buyer
title: Do not buy it. Even if you are there's no guarantee how long will it last.
content: Pathetic build quality. For one or two days it was working fine. But then, suddenly connectivity issues started.I had to replace the earphones the next day. Connectivity buttons wasn't working properly. I couldn't connect with my phone. Even The power on light and charging light wasn't working. Got a defective item. Huge disappointment. Thumbs down to the seller.

name: Drogba
title: Good for movies n music but not calling
content: Purchased this few months back and found no issue in calling or connectivity.Never used it on windows 10.But,now i have observed that connectivity with win10 is a huge issue.Once it gets disconnected will have to restart pc to reconnect.Other important thing is during a call person infront cannot clearly or can but very low from mic even on full volume of headset.

name: Prashik Umare
title: Not much impressive but it's good battery and it charge quickly
content: Sound quality of earphone is decent not anything extraordinary but I've to say it has good battery life and it's charge in no time. I'm facing one problem with this earphone whenever I use them after taking call it lag. There is mismatch between audio and video. Then I've to disconnect and reconnect again after that it's work fine but it is annoying. The build quality is good. But I recommend if one find better option in this price range then just go for it because this one has not the best sound quality experience.

name: Paratyaksh Singh
title: If you don't have a One plus phone , there is no need to buy it!!
content: The form factor or build quality of the earphones is quite good. The noise cancellation is also great but the problem lies in its utter lack of music experience, there are other earphone sets under 2000 which provide better music experience than the Bullet Z. It may be because of a compatibility issue between the Redmi Note 9 Pro and the Bullet Z but the sounds are not as comprehensive as they come in the Realme Bluetooth earphones or in Boat as a matter of fact. They both outperformed Bullet Z in terms of music experience. I had to buy a wired earphone after it. My suggestion is not to buy below ₹4000 in the Bluetooth earphones segment instead go for wired sets like Sennheiser Cx275 or Sony. One Plus is an amazing brand I have no hard feelings towards them but as desperately as people want to join the "Red Cable Club", don't join it through Bullet Z. Buy their best in the class phone.

name: Mohit G.
title: Go for it guys!
content: Got it today. First of all sound quality is crystal clear.. Bass is good but not great like a good wired earphone. But still it has thumping bass. Middle and highs are clear.. Fast charging is 🤯. You should definitely go for it. It has really 18,19 hours playback and this bt earphone is really loud. Sound doesn't distort at all even at max volume.. It supports 2 codec AAc and SBC.. Call quality is good. Other party was hearing my voice clearly.

name: Adrian Rodrigues
title: Worth every rupee!
content: Definitely the best BT headphones that I have used. Earlier had JBL ones and this comes at a cheaper price and is totally worth the money. Sound quality is really good and the materials also are nice. Connects fast as I use a Oneplus phone but its the same when I Switch to my PC bluetooth

name: Shadan Arif
title: Extra points not there in any review.
content: I have well researched on YouTube and read many reviews on amazon and flipkart before buying this.. Therefore, I have taken efforts just to highlight things I haven't found elsewhere.. 1. If you switch on the voice recorder then you could find that the voice of the surroundings is really considerable....even if you are a short distance away from the road a lots lots lots of voice can be heard if the traffic....which is negligible in even duplicate wired headset....though I know that this is wireless, even then noise should be low.. On call other can notice the disturbances very large even it is slight one from our side like kids playing etc.. 2. In the game like PUBG if you can watch the footsteps on the map and play then there isn't any problem, I didn't found any considerable lag in training.. But in a game like Traffic Racer you could notice a huge lag even MORE THAN PUBG in the flash of the headlight of the car and crashing of the car.. 3. It takes 30-40 mins for full charge from 2A-5v charger...though I know it should be charged with warp charger...I have just written for the normal user. I have found it to be the best on the basis of ultra battery life.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Overall good & bass is also decent.
content: Overall product is good.. I was worry about bass according to reviews.. but I will say guys bass is decent.. not that much high . But in point of battery backup its upto the mark. My friend buy a jebronics headphone with same features in 1500.. if you want you can consider it..or if you are like me as I prefer to some well known brand .. then go for it.

name: Abhishek Y.
title: Genuine Review
content: something which one plus should give is bass. Bass is little less in this earphones but the other features are really gud even better than anyone in this price segment.. Now battery backup ,no one can beat oneplus 10 min charge and 10 hours battery life its really amazing. if u are a bass lover u will dislike this , bjut if u need good vocals, treble and sounds You blindly go for it. Dont forget same earphones is launched in Rs 3600 outside the India globally. so go for it guys.

name: Rajiv Rajagopalan
title: Great value for money. Office call workhorse
content: I purchased the earphones on Amazon.. Pros:. 1. Clear voice and audio quality for calls. 2. Reasonable audio for youtube, Netflix and media consumption. 3. Really strong battery life. I'm able to go through a good 2 days+ of heavy office call and media consumption usage. 4. Able to switch seamlessly between two devices using double tap feature (eg. Between your phone and laptop). 5. Fast charging - Able to get juice quickly when low on battery. Quick 10 mins charge gets you 2 hours. 6. Material quality is durable. Haven't tested in harsh environment like rains etc.. Cons:. 1. If you are an audiophile, expecting amazing sound quality, look for other options. 2. Limited to zero noise cancellation. Not the best if you are looking for this feature. All in all great value purchase for day to day needs for Rs. 2000/-

name: Sai Tharun
title: Points to read before buying......
content: 1. Packaging is very good.. 2. When comes to build quality no one surpassed OnePlus.. 3. Battery backup is awesome if you have 30W charger then sone pe suhaga... 4. No one talking about warranty. It gives 1 year whereas it's competitor realme wireless buds gives 6 months warranty.. 5. Now comes to main point .. As it offers 9 mm driver bass is some how low than realme buds wireless (11.2 mm ). But trible, mid tone and high tone is very good.. 6. Other features like low latency mode, quick switch, water resistance is given. Comfort is at next level.. So above points may help you to choose between OnePlus and realme wireless buds. I will definitely choose OnePlus over realme .. But if you want only bass then .....

name: Noble J.
title: its complicated, pls read till end
content: well, i have a bit to say.. had given 2 star, now editing.. bought on aug. 1st month impression- avg sound quality, as much as a 500rs, non bluetooth earphone. but greater issue was, the ear piece kept droping down, not stable in ear. tried different bud sizes, no improvement.. but then one side stopped working one fine morning.. my greater issue got changed.. contacted amazon, they told to contact oneplus.. tried to do so, on third day of continuous attempt, could talk to oneplus service centre.. told to bring to service centre (nb: for boat n all they pick up home).. 3 service centre altogether in my state. nearby one is 300km away.. all hope lost.. n after 1 week of 'one side inactivity' today it started working normally. no idea what happened.. anyway, now, im happy.. yes, its still not stable on ear, avg sound quality, still im happy, coz i could hear voice from both sides- thats something to celebrate with.. hmm thats my story.. 5 star cos im happy.

name: Faraaz
title: Best for work from home guys
content: 1. It's best for those people who do not love louder bass.. 2. Pairing is really fast.. 3. the feature of switching between two devices is a very handy feature for software employees who work from home and do their meetings on laptop and phones .. 4. call quality is superb didn't find any problem with that.. 5. Its built quality is like you can put ur headset even in your pocket.. 6. fits perfectly in your ear even in the workouts.. 7. Charging is the fastest. I do charge it in between the meeting and continue using this after charge in the same meeting.

name: pratikbelote
title: Good for calling but confusingly frustrated function
content: Quick read: If you don't interested in bass go for it. The product function is good but If you like bass music this is not for you.. Liked. 1. Good for calling. 2. Has good function ( double-clicking on main round button twice wireless z will connect automatically last 2 devices.) Attaching both earbuds it will go stand by or it turns off. 3. Crystal clear Sound ( if you are listening to music which has strings you hear it very clearly.). Disliked. I thought it was easy and best for my dad who doesn't much into gadgets and stuff but those functions sometimes make him frustrated and he never uses them sometimes.. It's not worth 2000/-.

name: arkajeet chakravorty
title: Blindly go for this. Don't buy true wireless ones. This is great
content: I own almost most of the bluetooth headphones to earbuds. This is by far the most convenient to use and best sound quality. The best part is its battery and charging speed with the type c charging. Best bass with great sound quality that you can get. This earphone is easily a 5000 rs plus quality at this price. Just go for it. But get the bass version.

name: MANUPURI RAMU
title: Good product to buy
content: hello everyone. i am writing this review to help people who wants to purchase this product,. i am using one plus wireless headphones with mic for more than 3 months i observed some plus points and some negative points. coming to plus points. 1>Sound quality is too good. 2>noise cancellation is very nice while talking on call. 3>worth for money. negative points :. 1>wires are soo delicate ,poor quality,,,. 2>no bass. if you want more bass then go for oneplus bullets ,,cost is same but there is no mic ,,,. thats it no other issues i found. my final conclusion is ,it is a very good product under this budget,,i surely recommand you to buy this product ,definitely this product is worth for your money

name: Praveen Kumar Maywad
title: Read this before you buy
content: My rating:. Sound quality: 3.5/5. Bass : 3.5/5. Connectivity: 4/5. Battery life : 4.5/5. Bulid quality : 4/5. Sound quality is good but not great.. Soundstage is not wise and it sounds muddy or mushy when you play a heavy track.. Bass is good enough but it lacks the punch and tightness that you find in sony and JBL.. Bluetooth connectivity and range is very good.. Battery life is also very good.

name: Prabhat Kumar
title: Superb...
content: Earlier I was using Sony mdr Xb55 whose sound quality was exceptional but that was a wired one. Coming to oneplus bullets wireless z, its sound quality is good. Bass is also there. I don't know why people say that it doesn't have bass. Sound is balanced and coming from a bass head earphones this one didn't make me feel much disappointed as its a wireless one. Overall, I am pretty much satisfied with the product for its build quality, sound output and connectivity features and most importantly its battery backup.

name: Ashish ghutke
title: Excellent product!
content: I love it and gave 5 stars. Although it works totally fine just 20 minutes of charge gives u 90% of charging and that 90% charging will last for approximately 9-10 hours(if continuous use). But if i wanted to make it 100% charge it is written in booklet that light turns something different colour i don't remember but when i keep it for charging it doesn't give any indication if it is fully charged. There's no light indicator change. U yourself have to check timing of for how much time u r charging it. Like i only charge it for like 20 minutes and took it off. Then connects to the mobile it shows 90% charging. I don't know if only I facing this problem but its fine for me it is not giving me any headache, besides this I'm facing no problem.

name: Meena
title: Good battery backup with low latency.
content: Received it next day of order(Aug 6th received on 7th). It good till now. Low the low latency connection and bass is good not the best when compared with my soundpeats force headset which is way expensive. I can say this is best within 2k if u want long battery and low latency wireless headset.

name: Devansh singh
title: Amazing Buy It without any Hesitation
content: 🔴 One of the Best Earphone , If You are Still very Confused so I would like to tell you that stop thinking of another earphones just buy it without any questions , some says that its baas is less but nothing like that I have experienced as I am using it since 15 days buyed 2 weeks before from Amazon ,. I Suggest You Again that without any confusion buy it . BATTERY LIFE is also Good As I use them Daily approx 6 hours a Day and I have to charge it after 4-5 days as I experienced . Really Onr Plus Bullet Wireless Z Earphones is Amazing with its Built Quality is Ossum ! Weight us also Seems negligible after sometime seems nothing in nech . Design is also so Good to Show Off 👌 .. At Last I would says No Another is Comparable to this .. Any Queries regarding this or any other question ask me in comment .. Thank You Amazon and OnePlus ♥️

name: Suyog Dhokane
title: Sound quality 100/100, noise cancellation 100/100, battery backup 100/100
content: These are the best Bluetooth earphones I have used so far. The battery backup is just over the mark. The 10 min 10 hrs battery backup thing really works. I charge these earphones once and then I dont need to charge them for the next 2-3 days. Also the sound quality is mesmerizing. It gives 90% noise cancellation which is awesome. If you are thinking of buying such earphones just go ahead and order them without any hesitation.

name: Deepa
title: Sturdy and awesome headset
content: Writing this review after 6 months of purchase. These headsets are extremely sturdy and have been extensively used by my teenage son. He has been using them to attend his online classes. Blue toon connection is very seamless and does not require frequent charging. Has very good battery life. We charge it for not more than 10-15 minutes.

name: Mukul Sharma
title: Best earphones from Oneplus
content: Best earphones from Oneplus. Sound quality is really good. Noise cancellation is satisfactory(can reduce background noise up to a certain level,but don't expect much) and bass is not that good , but at this price range, this is the best earphones to buy if someone wants to listen to music and watch movies.. Note : If you are a bass lover , then that would be a disappointment for you, I would recommend you to try other earphones.. Microphone is good. Other person can hear your voice clearly. Best thing which I liked about these earphones is Long battery life: you get 20 hours of listening time on full charge.. I personally used it for more than 3 hours and I hardly felt the need to charge it.. In fact, after using for few hours you will forget that you are wearing these earphones since they are very light weight. You also get 3 earcups of different sizes.. Only thing that i didn't liked is ,charging cable provided is very small. You would have to put the charger at a charging point which is near to the surface.. I would definitely recommend to buy these earphones if bass is not your priority.

name: SRINIVASA REDDY VEMPADA
title: REVIEW 6MONTHS
content: GOOD, BUT NOT TO MARK PRICE, EXPECT HIGH, NO NOICE CANCELLATION, AFTER MANY USES NEARLY 6 MONTHS, MAGNET WILL LOOSE POWER, CONNECTION WILL BE SLOW, DISTRIBUNCE IS HIGH, NO NEXT OR PREVIOUS SONG PLAY, NO BASIC NOICE CANCELLATION, IF FAN RUNNING, OTHER PERSON CAN LISTEN FAN SOUND, AND NO WATER/SWEAT RESISTANCE, CHARGING POSITION IS IN WRONG PLACE AS THE SWEAT GOES INSIDE THE POWER SOCKET AND GETS EARPHONE DESTROYS.

name: Deny mathew
title: One plus Bluetooth Bullets Z just Amazing ❤️
content: One plus Bluetooth Bullets Z is an amazing product. I just loved it ❤️❤️❤️. Advantages : Good sound quality , getting a good Battery back up , Appearance wise it gives a premium look , easily gets connected while the bullets are detached and also it is budget rate.. Disadvantages : I only found a disadvantage that when the bullets are connected , a led white light blinkles. It is somewhat annoying during dark . Can be adjusted at day times.. But it is Not a big problem .. Iam not a one plus mobile user. but using this headphones i am really happy about it.. Thank you One plus ❤️. Thank you amazon for the quick delivery. 😍

name: Nishant
title: Left earbud sounds louder
content: Received the product today and found that the left earbud sounds louder then the right earbud. At the frist place i thought its problem with this particular unit but guess what its manufacturing defect from this big brand all of its bass edition units sounds louder on the left then the right.. Altgough its sounds goods when plugged both together but it is not acceptable from the brand like this.

name: Ajit
title: Quick switch is not working
content: Generally this is not expected from One+. They are just fooling people. quick switch doesn't works except the One+ devices.. update after 2 days of usage: this a junk product from One plus. if you have connected to laptop and then you are switching to mobile then the sound quality is getting crapped. Note: Mobile is on Andorid 10. One plus guys needs to fix these major issues..

name: Awadhesh singh
title: Realme buds is better than oneplus z bass edition. Don't buy this one
content: I have realme buds and oneplus bullets z bass edition.. So comparing with realme. I found realme is better here. Realme has better bass, better magnet.. Both have good battery backup.. In bass edition, you will not get the one touch switch to connect to other devices. It is available in normal edition only. I and my fried bought OnePlus headphone at same time. I have some problem with mic when i am using it for long time. So I need to disconnect the bluetooth for 5 min then it works fine. Even I am using oneplus 7 pro.. it is working as fine as i was expecting. Strogly suggest go with realme one.

name: Abhishek
title: OnePlus keep on improving the great products
content: OnePlus Bullets wireless z Unbox - Really great feel in Unboxing it!. Products included - C Type red cable and extra pair of earplugs.. Experience - One plus products are always amazing, and this earphone... The quality and the design is really excellent than the wireless 2 earphones!. It comes with the magnetic attach, where song will be paused when u attach both ear piece, and You need to separate the earplugs and automatically it will be ON and Pair instantly... Sound quality - really great experience. And bass is not that good!. Volume control will different in this , i.e., when you increase or decrease the volume through earphones ,it doesn't impact on your mobile volume control.... Takes 40mins to charge (On a OnePlus 7 Warp charger). • The battery life of the Neckband is Near 20h.

name: faiz
title: Review from ex-realme buds wireless user(7months)
content: Sound-It's clear...Thats what pops in my mind thinking about it...it balances between vocal and instruments so well you can literally feel every single instrument in the background. Ps-That balanced sound is better than over-whelming bass. Build-Its sturdy and premium but not more than buds wireless(realme),But its light on the other hand!. Battery-The type C port and it's speed is too good no mentions here.... Connectivity-Its so quick (3 secs approx)even before wearing it it connects the connection speed is far far better than buds wirless(realme). Features-Dual connection is great i tried it in tv and my phone it worked flawlessly. The ip rating is also assuring!. Latency-It's so less compared to realme...(even lesser on one plus devices). Overall-Go for it without doubt totally worth the money!

name: Lucky Verma
title: NOT FOR BASS LOVERS!!! 👀
content: So after using it for a week, i am writing this review. I Switched to one plus wireless z from boat bassheads, although the sound quality is impressive and very clear but there is less bass compared to my bassheads.. Charging speed is also very good. So all n all an average product considering the price range.. I Have returned the product and now i am switching to Redmi earbuds S which are far better than this.

name: preeti
title: Not good, stopped working after 15 days
content: Its been only 15 days since i bought this earphone. I got this delivered on 31st may. After 15 days i dont see its working for 10 hrs as per the given specification.. Also it takes much longer to get charged compared to given in specs.. Sound quality is nice. Initially there was no issue with charging also, but after 15 days it actually started working like a chinese product.it has completely stopped working now.. I bought this considering we have a good reviews about one plus phones.. Return window for me is also closed.so have to deal with this piece now.

name: S K N T
title: Best in class
content: And i vlll say nothing to backup, its Ultimate,. Build quality - 5. Sound quality - 4. Bass quality - 5. Noice cancellation - 3. Battery backup - 5+. Connectivity - 5+. Price - 5+. Comfort - 5. Everything is next level,. Just buy blindly, U vill never regrade of it

name: Tejas Kumar
title: For Gym geeks
content: Absolutely very good product from OnePlus in budget works fine and perfect one for gym freaks who are searching for wireless headset perfectly designed for workout it won't fall fits firmly on your ears but after continious usage of morethan 1hr your ears will pain but that happens with most of the devices apart from that all functions are insane and charging easily for a normal usage guy like for 2-3hrs in a day it lasts for 3 days and 10 mins of charge can use for 1&half day 50% will get charged just go for it in current market this best in class

name: Vivek Gupta
title: Just what you need with your hard earned money
content: One of the best wireless earphone under ₹5000. Done so much research on wireless earphones, settled with this, and everything is beyond my expectations.. I have realme wireless earphone also but this z one is above and beyond in battery life, build quality (both awesome), sound quality (both good, believe me bass is also optimum just what you require to listen the music hole day long without hurting your ears), bluetooth range is exceptionally good ( phone left on sofa in drawing room with music on, roamed in all rooms and bluetooth never flickered for a bit).. So go for it, I am fully satisfied with this product........though short usage review......will update as the time pases.........har har mahadev🙏

name: RSC
title: Certainly not the best available option
content: Well, its been about ten days of usage and initially i was very impressed with the product. But, yesterday i had a webex call and it used to go silent after 2-3 mins of the call everytime. So i had to disconnect and reconnect everytime. All i hope is its just a glitch and if not, its probably an over hyped product thats certainly not suited for working professionals.

name: babu yadav
title: After 1 month use Review
content: Ok , calue for money , first i thought it will be same like earbuds but the bass qualoty and microphone quality blown my mind.. When calling the opposite persons hears your true and fluent voice .. Go for it it even if u half of budget get emi option oo other but don't buy any other than this .

name: shubham wanle
title: Bass is up to the mark
content: Using the product from past three months the bass quality is really up to the mark and sound quality is really great.Noise cancellation also works fine with the build in quality. It's really light weight and doesn't feel any kind of pressure on neck.. But the voice quality is bit lower as we think of one plus product other than that the product is worth it and you should go for it .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Notorious for not pairing
content: I've ordered this product and after it arrived I charged it for an hour. After detaching the magnetically stuck earphones the blue light started blinking which indicates that the device is ready to pair. But it was not appearing under available devices under any phone, be it Samsung or Redmi. Then I searched for this particular defect and it's trouble shooting steps. After trying all the suggestions I realized that nothing is gonna work and it would be sensible to return and replace. While searching I found several people complaining about the same issue. INFACT, it is a KNOWN issue and I am really disappointed that at this price range the Quality Testing is not the priority for Oneplus. I am hoping that the replacement should be disappointing in anyway. Else, I am never gonna buy this Chinese brand products.

name: Sachin S
title: Product is better but cable is missing from Amazon delivery, which is not so good
content: My brother's already bought it for me, so I did add the return request for this earphone, but before I returned it, I have unboxed the product and recorded video for safer side to just making sure everything will be there, but after unboxing the product it looks that Amazon did not provide charging cable in the box, and it's loooks like product is already usable, bcoz their internal packaging seems to be loosed. And I wanted to add more details while return request, but it is not editable, so this is my first experience from Amazon that was not expected. I wanted to upload recorded video but video size is too big, so rest of this if you look for earphone quality which is better overall, sounds quality is good and low, not laudable, call quality is also good but they pick up all persons sound from nearby you and the person in opposite side of you, can't hear our voice properly.. So bcoz this type of amzon delivery, I am giving ot less stars.

name: Amanullah khan
title: Awesome. Best in 2k price.
content: Thank u amazon for fast and quick delivery. I got my item on time and packing quality is good. And product is also good. Sound is also loud. Overall best product in 2k. And another think is this product is oneplus this is good. Battery life is also good backup time is aprox 15 to 18 hour. And charging time is 40 to 50 mint. I love this product.

name: Hareesh
title: Worth the money
content: The product is working better than expected. We cannot use it while riding bikes. But it ok. The pairing is faster. Am usimg it with samsung S9. Working similar to Airpods.. Standby Wonderful. Pairing perfect. Sound quality awesome. Hardware quality good. Worth the money I would say.

name: SHUBHAM DEB BARMAN
title: Good one for regular use, not for audiophile
content: I am a bass head and audiophile.. yet bought this only because of it's good connectivity.. ipx55 rating and battery.. i use oneplus mobile.. and specially that on off feature which is helpful is day to day life use... For my test of music i have another one.. sony xb400.. So overall i give this headphone 4*. Bass = 1*... minimal bass. Music =3*, decent.. but certain songs like heavy metals become very noisy. Noise cancellation= acceptable 3/4*. Call quality= good 3/4*. Connectivity= 5*. Battery= 5*. Switching between devices= fair 4*. Will edit further, if any

name: Gaurav Bhatikare
title: voice breaks when you are on call .
content: i have been using this headphones for a month now and only problem is when you talk to someone on call through OnePlus bulletz then it doesn't work properly . sound really breaks to hell . it's like you can't hear other person clearly . otherwise sound quality for music is decent . you won't be having pain after hearing music for long time . battery backup is really good . OnePlus only needs to rectify this calling problem.

name: Vivek
title: Best for OnePlus smartphones
content: Trust me, I'm editing my review after using for 3 weeks. Initially I disliked saying 2k is not worth but was completely wrong. It is very good with OnePlus smartphones. Sound quality is awesome,. Bass is bit low but I'm ok with it. 10 mins charge 10 hrs backup is 100% true. Full charge is 1hr which will last upto 20hrs. Buy it if you have OnePlus smartphones above 7 series without any dout.

name: Siddharth
title: TOO MUCH COST AND LESS QUALITY, NO BASS
content: DON'T GO FOR THIS PRODUCT UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF RATINGS. IF YOU WANT GOOD BASS AND GOOD SOUND QUALITY THIS ONE ISN'T FOR YOU. THIS ONE IS JUST FOR GOOD BATTERY BACKUP. BASS IS SO BAD THAT YOU DON'T EVEN FEEL IT ON MAX VOLUME. I HAVE A WIRED JBL EARPHONE WHICH IS LESS COSTLIER THAN THIS BUT HAVE MORE DEEP BASS AND GOOD SOUND QUALITY. AT THIS MUCH COST YOU SHOULD GO FOR JBL OR SONY FOR SOUND QUALITY AND BASS.

name: Akash Choudhary
title: All in One
content: Amazing Bluetooth earphones. Especially I'd give it 5 stars for its. a) Quick charging (10 minutes and you're done). b) Long battery Life (13 to 17 hours). c) Flexi and sturdy design (wear it, sleep with it on your neck, throw it, rubberized feel is great and soft on skin). d) Sweat resistant (wear it, jog and walk with it). e) Sound Quality ( the way it mends in with one plus phones ). f) Light weight ( it feels as a part of body )

name: T ravali
title: Sound quality is on a par
content: Im also using sony mdr xb 55ap wired earphones. If you compare both, the sound quality is way lot better in sony.... I didn't expect much quality in Oneplus but wasn't so much satisfied either.. When i put to max volume almost most of the songs has too much noise, which my ears can bear. I had to tune with the equaliser, even with the dobly Atmos settings tuning up, im not satisfied. I use poweramp player though, finally got the settings adjustable.. I dont use oneplus phone.. I get more sound and even more quality with sony.. I just wanted a wireless earphones.. Charging backup and quick switch pairing is most satisfying in this earphones.. Overall a good product, satisfied.... But please dont expect much quality of sound in it..

name: Sourav
title: Super earphones. Must buy.
content: OnePlus is worth it. Sound quality is decent, even on calls the voice is very clear. Range is great. Bass is okay okay. I am using one plus 7 and the earphones connects very easily. The body is very flexible and easy foldable to keep in pocket or any pouch.. In short .. worth buying.

name: Serious Buyer
title: Very high price for this chinese earphones
content: Based on price its not worth for buying it because i got many times disturbance in listening music even in 20cm of range from my laptop to me. and same with mobile oneplus 8 pro problem comes in listiing music it intruptes most of the time like my song is corrupted. These earphones must have cost 500 rs not more than of it.

name: Soumya Pratim Akuli
title: Best Cord Bluetooth headset in 2000 if U want a Balanced & good sound with battery
content: Sound is terribly well balanced.Some extra bass would probably start aching ur head.Battery lasts for 18-20 hrs if not used in full volume + fast charging.Has a premium feel to it.Totally tangle free.But if U start to work out they may some times get dislodged...coz they don't have over ear strap..u know!? But u ain't gonna use it only during workouts 😂 so it's the best product u can buy.Most importantly they don't hurt your ears even for during long durations !! The NON-BASS edition has 2hrs more to battery life..But I 'guess' This is worth the sacrifice 🤷

name: sajeer v.
title: A valuable product from one plus
content: I am using this earphone for past two days , the most important thing i like from this earphone is its user friendly, its switching to two devices is very heplful for people who needs to use earphone both for laptops and mobile phones . The sound quality is very good and fast chargins battery back up is excellent. One of the cons i have observed is the bass quality it was good but not much that good , overall it was value for money , if you are a person who needs to use earphones during travelling and for contionus calling and also a music lover not much that a bass lover , you can definitely try this earphone , it will never dissappoints you .

name: Sandilya M
title: Excellent earphone with some catches
content: It's undoubtedly a great product at 2k but one must be aware of these things:. 1. This is perhaps the most irritating thing, it doesn't have a dedicated on/off button and the magnets control everything. I am not sure about the reliability of magnets.. 2. The lag in earphones is so significant when connected to my PC, when i pause and play videos lag is clearly observed.. 3. I have experienced connectivity issues multiple times. In general Bluetooth connectivity for a audio device has call, media options. After connecting sometimes either of the options miss and reconnecting/reset will resolve it.. 4. The earphones won't flush with ears and sometimes when i lie down on pillow, earphones will come out. It's not the fitment issue but something related to design.

name: Rajat Sharda
title: Superb
content: Initially i was very disappointed and angry when i got to knpw that bass variant doesn't have quick switch button and they did not mentioned on product page. As Quick switch meant to me so much as i switch between my laptop and phone very much.. But using it for two days i feel satisfied as despite lacking quick switch button its quick switch function works really well you just need to select manually in your bluetooth settings. Apart from that bass, sound quality everything is superb just use bigger buds for extreme bass

name: Devayu Rastogi
title: An awesome buy !
content: The earphones are very good.. 1. The mids and lows and highs are really very good, like one of the best. The earphones are exceptionally clear at the highest volume.. 2. The bass is not very much but just about right for a good listening experience. Less than Sennheiser cx180 but not that less.. 3. The fit is awesome and doesn't fall off the ears even during a jog.. 4. Charging speed is really very good and backup is upto 16 hours.. 5. It gets connected with my phone and laptop at a great speed. Also the button on the left side seamlessly switches between my laptop and phone.

name: Siddhaarth
title: Value for money earphones, perfect for light users
content: The earphones are a great value for money for those looking for a quality neckband wireless earphones for less than 2000. The sound quality is very good. Noise cancellation is pretty average in my opinion. However, it's decent enough that in most situations, the noise cancellation works fairly well.. The bass is good, but isn't as good as that offered by some of the pricier earphones.. Connection to bluetooth is pretty good. In my 1 week so far, I have faced a couple of drops but that was when I was about 5-6 meters away from the laptop.

name: sai m.
title: My Genuine Review
content: Pro:. Very Very Fast Charging, even 20seconds of Charging will last for 50min, 2min of Charging will last for 6hours straight. Good for Pubg - No latency, detail sounding. Very Cheap. Build quilty is good, i use them while sleeping sometimes roll over .. but still good.. The way it connect to phone vert smoothing. Cons. Audio Quality not that great. Volume not too high

name: snowleopard
title: Instead of boat 335 i chhoose this
content: Build quality good. Spalsh and sweat proof. 20 hours battery backup. 10 hours in 10 minute best part. Low latency. Good for calling exercising. Yes bass is not there but if you put more dipper in ear bass will come i thing buds are big repalce it with small one and you will get bass and yes noise cancellation is also good. In 2000 rs this the best. I dont use tws airpods anymore. This is the best now

name: javvaji satish
title: Not recommended to buy
content: Bought this product to use it for my office meetings in Laptop and from mobile. Connectivity is good. we can switch between Laptop ad Mobile whenever required. But audio quality is not at all good. volume is very less. even after setting full volume in zoom, not able to hear the voice properly.. buds also not that much comfort to put in ears for longer time.. Totally it is not at all worthy to buy this product with 1999/-

name: Sarthak Chandola
title: Quite good
content: They are above average. I have Jabra 75T as well and the sound quality difference is noticeable but that comparison is just stupid. For the price they are a great buy. The connect between devices is easy. Battery life is very good and I'm certain they can be used for running, outdoor activities etc. because they don't move around when you run. I free returned a JBL active series because they were moving all over the place when I ran, these stay stable for a good moment. Apart from that base is not heavy but above average for sure. It's just a good overall earphone for the price. I did a lot of research and I found these to be the best in price.

name: Baku
title: Best under ₹1999
content: I'm writing this review after one month +. I used it with my redmi not 5 pro. Positive's-. •Best @₹1999. •Sound quality is superb. •No defects even after rough usage and continues 30days usage.. • 10mints charge gives 8-9hrs playback time.. •Take 1.45hrs to charge full. •magnetic on/off Reconnecting speed is awesome.. Negatives-. • When you play a video or view status in insta or whtspp during a whtspp call / normal call you cannot control the volume.. • Sonetimes the whtspp call volume could not be heard even after raising the volume to maximum

name: Murali
title: Earphones stopped working
content: Earphones were working for seamlessly for the first 6 months...post which below ear peice section of the earphone i started observing the plastice over wire is getting detiorated and eventually i started seeing wires from the gap which got created because of detioration and also all of a sudden 9 months from the date of purchase earphones stopped working all of a sudden. Intially i thought it may be because of some hardware issues and i charged it for a while and disconnected from charging after they were full charged and then tried connecting to my phone, the earphones were not connecting and i could see red light with a minute and could never connect them to my phone. It is such a shame on Rs. 2000/- product from the so called one plus brand who is branding themselves as flagship killer

name: Abin Varghesio
title: Worth it. U have oneplus phone ? Buy it
content: If your oneplus user and looking for a bluetooth wireless earphones in the price range of 2000 rupees just buy this product. Premium quality. If you are an bass boosted enthusiast don't buy this. Product only have decent bass enough.. Totally happy with this.. Phone OP5t

name: akhil
title: when iam in traffic other caller unable to understand my words they are telling very noise is coming
content: Noise cancellation was not good I recently used realmi noise cancellation is very worst in it and then i changed to one plus but there is no change at all both are same there is no noise cancellation, when iam in traffic other caller unable to understand my words they are telling very noise is coming, iam soo disappointed 😤

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best budget headphones one can get for this price
content: It's been more than six months I have been using them for calls, games, videos and streaming.. While the mic quality isn't the best but it's worth for Rs. 2000/-.
