And they charge up way to quick, what has been told in description is wrong.. It takes more than half an hour for it to fully charge and it lasts at least two days.. The only issue is I never got it to connect to multiple devices at the same time.

name: Aditya
title: Beauty
content: This is a beauty product. Works like a charm. Multiple connectivity and switch button is a relief.. Earbuds make you dumb and noise cancellation works good for music. But mic noise cancellation is not available. I'm using for work calls and simultaneously connect it with my phone for any calls. Good option to go for if you are looking for lag free BT headsets

name: Afzal
title: Not reliable
content: This is the best wireless device, in terms of connectivity and battery power. Haven't charged it in couple of days, battery status is still around 80%. Amazing. Magnet based connectivity is on another level. Quick response and sound quality is at par with the most of the costly devices offered.. This was my initial feedback of the product, and I am writing this another feedback after 30 days of use. These earphones have stopped working all of a sudden, a white light is glowing continuously and I see this product have some serious issues.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mic not work during calling
content: Product is look wise good but you can't use it for making phone calls. It doesn't support any brands for its mic operation accept OnePlus phone. So if you have extra bucks then spend it for your music listening. You can't talk to any one. Mic doesn't pair /operate to your phone. Other side donot hear you...

name: nikita
title: Amazing battery and clartiy and great bluetooth connectivity
content: Its been a month since i am using op z wireless bullets.. Pros:. sound clarity. battery. quick charge. sturdy and durable. Cons:. Bass is not that great. Loudness is less than what you see on boat earphones. I compared it to the oppo encore however i chose to go with this because it has got clarity, good call connectivity and long battery life. The sound is good but not extremely loud.. if your using it for purely music purpose ex to watch movie and listen songs go for oppo but if you need for zoom call and watch media for long definately this. The bass plays good on ganna .com channel

name: kushal
title: Bad product buy something else available in same price
content: First it's take a long time to connect then it's goes on & off in connection. Secondly the worst problem is switching in. After a sometime when put your buds to play they will not be connected then somehow will show connected no phone media active or vice versa suppose a call comes you were your buds and try to pick up it will take time from there you want to play music it will show no media so replug again then from songs you switch to YouTube again it's goes off no media or any call come it's goes off again replug it's very irritating and even your videos get paused during this. Better to buy some other product rather than these one.

name: Savio Paul
title: Over prized don't Keep High Hopes
content: Oneplus Z BT earphones are just like any other normal earphones in the range of 800 - 1400 rupees. You will have to live with frequent disconnections and also while switching between devices its a hit or miss case. Even though I have a Oneplus 7T pro i am having so many issues.

name: Shiv
title: Premium feel....Thumping Bass👌
content: Go for it....Don't think just buy it if you are searching for a nice gadget.. I have bought reverb red version.. Feel is premium and sound is awesome.. You won't regret once you listen any song from this device.. Bass =5/5. Calling Voice = 5/5. And yes don't trust on negative feedback

name: Sonal
title: Disappointing Sound Quality
content: I'll be direct. It does have all the pros you might have read. So yeah, in short it is a good choice.. But I want to talk about SOUND QUALITY. I have been using Sony XB 550 AP Wired since the last year and as soon as I put on OnePlus Bullets Z, I realised that it is lifeless as compared to the Sony one.. The bass is very minimal and it offers almost zero noise cancellation.. If you are buying this (OnePlus Bullets Z) for *music listening experience* then I would suggest not to waste 2000₹ on it.. However, since it's light weight and has a beast battery, it is a good choice in the "bluetooth headset" category.. Just remember that listening to music won't feel even half as good as what you could feel with on-ear headphones of Sony/Sennheiser or even Boat.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Product, Price is little high in this segment,
content: Sound Quality is Okay but still need some improvement as OnePlus declared this is a base edition. Wire is so thin, seems normal quality, wire Density and durability play most important role. Rest ok. Price is little high ,it should be around ,₹1500 only

name: Abhisek Mishra
title: Best in the range
content: Long term review:. 1. Very durable. 2. Battery life is exceptional ( easy 18-20 hours). 3. Can be used for light workouts. 4. Fits very well and sits around the neck without causing troubles.. 5. Amazing sound quality and easily adaptable to your personal equaliser settings.. 6. Does not crack at high volumes.. 7. Colour holds up well , no spots or discolouring.. 8. Multiple devices support and switching between them is seamless.. 9. Quick charge support (10-15 mins for a full charge)

name: Shailesh Moolya
title: Almost neutral sound signature
content: This has slight emphasis on base. not enough for an average user if interested in a almost neutral song signature then you can buy this. Are if you are interested in hearing songs this is not for you this is people who want to watch movies and YouTube and other videos.

name: SDC
title: Value for Money 👌🏻👍🏻
content: Does not have the greatest sound quality or decent bass, but you could up the bass quality by using a good quality player with a built-in equalizer. Decent noise cancellation. Happy with the magnetic switch on/off, instant connectivity with your phone & longer cords than the Mi earphones.

name: Sahil
title: Not worth it buying. Better options are available.
content: I bought this few days ago for its features and stuff. There is no such noise cancellation as the company claims. There is literally no bass but the sound is very clear and soft. The connectivity is strong and has a long battery life that's no doubt. While calling, the listener at the other end complains about low voice and talking about the earphone while gaming.. it works pretty decent there was always a problem of low voice( my teamates always complain about it) so I have to restart the phone again in next match in pubg but I didn't face this issue while using other Bluetooth earphones. While playing songs in youtube or a video in Instagram there is always a 2sec gap, I tried restart the earphones and connect again but it happens again. It didn't stand up to the mark.

name: Arjuun Sahay
title: Best in the segment
content: Well, best functionality is that when the magnetic tops are attached. The headset switches off. No need for pressing any buttons and best of all with my one plus it takes just 2 Seconds to connect. Most of the time they are around my shoulders, and I don't even notice. Battery backup is also great.. Overall best headset till now.

name: Honest reviewer
title: Mic is utter garbage! Not for calls 👎
content: Bought this earphones for 2 purposes. Binge watching tv series using my laptop and phone. It is flawless in this and connectivity department. No lags.. Second was to take work calls fron laptop. And this thing is utterly Garbage. The microphone sucks and pics up every small noise at your end.. Highly discourage if you are buying it for the purpose of calls.

name: Bhagath
title: Worthy for 2K
content: LONG BUT READ..... Oneplus Bullets Wireless Z is one of the best at 2K segment.. Pros:-. 1, Comfort and perfectly sitting in ear. 2, Sound quality is perfect and Lows,Mids and Highs are very well. The singer's voice is crystal clear.. 3, Battery at its best. I have tested it, nearly 19 hrs 20 min. Charges to quickly if you have 30W charger.. 4, Built Quality of band is rubber finished and soo good.. 5, Mic works good.. 6, Quick Switch is the best ever option on these earphones.. Cons:-. 1, Bass lacks. Need to boost bass more 30%.. 2, Built quality of buds is plastic. Expected metallic.. 3, Don't use these earphones with 4.2 bluetooth mobiles. Connectivity and calling issues occurs.. Finally, Bass lovers better skip this and goto Oppo m31 or Realme Wireless.. Who wants longer battery and best sound quality choose this one.

name: Mohasin C
title: No Switch button in Bass edition
content: One plus said , bass edition supports switch. Then later the same updated the description saying that you can swith between devices from the Bluetooth settings which is same as having no switch. Such a farce by one plus. Atlease give a firmware update to do so via the available buttons.

name: Divyesh Patel
title: Honest review!! read before you buy!!
content: I never write reviews but this thing just gave me enough reason to do so. The sound that it produces with such high treble. It just hurts my ears while the sound is 70-80%+. You can enjoy litsening to music for a while. The bass is not quite bad but it seems the sound is just turned itself into bass with the frequency of music. Its really not recommended for movies at all but its good for call.. and battery backup i dont know about that.. i just litsened to it for an hour then returned it.. for music lovers and movie watchers i will recommend boat 255.. only battery backup is not the key point to buy this... Why we buy earphones ? Just to listen to music and watch movies.. and low latency is just they used to say...but its nothing there is no button to activate it but you can do so on oneplus with fnatic mode, which is just an advertisement to sell..its disappointment for oneplus to have such bad product made... Hope its helpful..

name: Roydan Dsouza
title: Quality product , Value for Money
content: This is my review after one month of usage . . Amazing sound and build quality . . Sound signature is amazing and can be improved by using equalizer (using Poweramp player) . Worth ₹1799 /- . . The earphones disconnect when the magnets attach and connect quickly to ur device when separated . . . Good bass . . However battery life is okay compared to 20hrs on the non bass edition . . Quick charging available . . Miss the quick switch button , you need to put earphones in pairing mode everytime u connect it to another device , cannot quick switch between frequently used devices. .

name: Tirupatipati Gopi Chand
title: Excellent battery backup, but very bad bass
content: As per the battery backup, it's excellent. But, when you consider the bass, it's so bad. I am a person who give preference to battery backup, but don't bother much about bass. Still, the earphones disappointed me a lot as per the bass. You can feel that the bass is so bad, even without trying to observe. I previously used Mi wired earphones, which are far better than these, while considering the bass. But, as per the battery backup, these are so good. I get enough for 2 days normal usage for one full charge and it just takes 20 minutes for full charge with one plus wrap charger. The earphones are stylish, so good to wear. Yes, they are sweat resistant. The bluetooth coverage is also good i.e., the earphones gets connected to phone from a fair far distance.

name: chandan m.
title: Not for gaming...
content: The headphones really last long... I mean the juice on this thing doesn't run out so easily. But a huge disappointment for me is the lag i experience during gaming.. when im using a wired headphone the ping is 48-56 ms.. with this headphones its 60-90. Im not sure if tat realy coz of the headphones... But the difference is unavoidable

name: Amit Kumar
title: Would not suggest
content: One plus always enthrills with its products but it goes dead without any reason. Happened with this earphone, it stopped working in less than 1.5months time (is not charging any more). Can not go to a service centre cause of this lockdown and get it checked.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product makes sense for the price point.
content: Sound clarity is phenomenal with very balanced sound.. Bass is on the lower side and so is the volume. Leaves you wishing if you could turn up the volume just a tad bit more.. Form factor is excellent along with the material used.bthe neck band is rubberised and the earphone cables are pretty good.. Magnets are pretty strong in the earphones buds.. Fast charging with my OnePlus dash is a + point and so is the quick switch button.

name: Devender Malhotra
title: Top quality!!! Noice cancellation is 10/10 in this price range.
content: Top quality!!! Every thing is just so perfect. 10/10 stars.. Just bass is in line. No extra and power bass. (Rock lovers will love it and EDM lovers will not). And the most best and the lit thing about this is noise cancellation. Its just 10/10 at this price range.. There are many reviews which says bass is not good. I'll say those who prefer over bass, this is not for them. But those who love to hear what actual music was recorded in studio, this is the perfect treat for you all.

name: Yashvardhan Srivastava
title: It just works!
content: It's brilliant. It does what you want it to do and it does it better than any bluetooth earphones out there.. I have tried about 4-5 top brands in this case but the ease of use the OnePlus provides is amazing.. Biggest Pro: 2 devices get connected simultaneously and you can switch by a dedicated button. It might sound like a small benefit but let me tell you it isn't. For people working from home, its a godsend. I find myself switching 20 times a day. Even the connectivity and automatic connection when you separate the earbuds is quite magical, something that was a hassle in all the previous top brands earphones I had tried.. Batteries, charging, microphone and bluetooth range is best in class. Sound Quality is brilliant for calls. Okayish for music. Its definitely not for audiophiles. Its for people who want an earphone that just works - a quality that you've come to expect only from the products from Apple.

name: Thomas Alfred
title: NOT FOR CALLS BUT GOOD FOR MUSIC
content: Sound quality for audio and video files are very good. But these series of headphones are poor in call quality. Static disturbance and the other side cannot hear well. The internet has similar complaints but no FIX from the OnePlus team. DO NOT BUY IF U ARE LOOKING TO USE IT FOR CALLS. BUT if it's for audio and video usage, then perfect.

name: Suraj chothave
title: Best buy in 2000 compared to others in the same price segment
content: Overall product is a great deal in 2000. 1. Battery : is best ( used a 5V 3A charger ) charged from 10% to 100% in 25 min.. 2. Sound clarity : is also great, I can hear each and every muscial instrument used in the song. 3. Voice calls : I was talking to a friend sitting by the window and it was raining outside, my friend told me that he did not hear anything related to the rain,. 4. Bass is very little existent, there comes some sound where bass is expected in the song but its not top-notch.. Conclusion:- every thing exceeds expectations except the bass.

name: Nived
title: -One negative.
content: Well!,. 1. Good built quality. 2. Sound - same as other ones. 3. And everything is as mentioned in website. 4 . But this problem, that a person sitting beside you can also here what you are hearing 😅 Don't know! May be my piece is faulty let's see.. for few more days. 5 . Well it was marketed that it is sweat proof and etc... but one see in user manual it was mentioned that if liquid or foreign substances goes into it warranty doesn't work.

name: Lakhan Pisal
title: Confirm your need before buy
content: I write review after use of 1 months. This product looks good and comfortable. Sound quality is good and charged very fast as given in product discription. There are no battery low indicators, incoming call only ringing not sayin number of incoming call. Connectivity is so fast and also switch between device is also fast but some times atomatically disconnect voice of incoming call even connected, there are not connect at a time two different devices. This device is useful for single device and listening music

name: Amrit
title: Good
content: The product is quite good, but the magnet of the earphones which actually work as the power buttons for these earphones become quite loose, and don't work properly.. Sometimes the magnets get separated automatically due to low level of magnetic power of the backs of the buds.. Although the sound quality is great & bass is ok.. Noise cancellation is awesome.. And design is quite good.. Battery is amazing.. But charging takes a little extra than expected even with a fast charger. It also depends on the power of the charger.

name: S.B.
title: Background noise at receiving end
content: The main issue with the earphone is the party at the receiving end can hear everything clearly, including the surrounding sounds. This often results in unpleasant speaking experience. Apart from this these are really good earphones. Bass is not for those who like to beat it. For me it felt balanced.

name: Rajiv Roy
title: Unlucky one.
content: I know I know. It's one plus with 2 rating only. I've bought this product only for his brand name, it even worked as per its name. But after 3-4 weeks the sounds started to fall, it couldn't cancel the noise plus bass quality fell too. I have to take it to the nearest service centre possible. Let's see how they treat the problem I'm having right now. I've also seen the reviews before buying the product. They told it to be a perfect Bluetooth device to have. Maybe I'm the unlucky one.

name: Suhas
title: Best in class
content: Best in class product for the price , worth it for a 2k price and it does justify the price ,but I'm not able to understand shifting btwn 2 devices more instructions related to that could be provided. But the audio quality is crisp and clear and the mic to is very clear , I can whisper and even the person on the other end can hear it .. All in all best experience for the price

name: GK Tamil Nadu
title: Sony is Sony. None can replace. I missed Sony.
content: Sony is Sony. No one can replace. I missed it. I trusted OnePlus just because of superior brand name. Bass is not at all equal to the 500 bucks headphone. But clearity is enough. Noise cancellation also good provided using the opt buds.. But apart from sound experience handling is very very easy. Just switch bluetooth on your phone then just separate the buds then automatically it connects to phone. Hastle free.. Built quality also good.. If u r a person travel often it will be good. But if u r a damn music guy go for other better established brands. OnePlus brand name itself can't satisfy you.

name: Jaison
title: Great value for its price
content: Strong points for Bullets Wireless Z are. +Clarity in sound. +Comfortable to use. +Excellent battery life. +Quickly connects to device. Magnets on the buds are really strong. When attached it pauses anything playing and disconnects and when separated it quickly connects and resumes playing. But these aren't bass heavy earphones. If you are looking for bass heavy ones, go for Realme Buds Wireless

name: Asavari A.
title: Great sound quality for music as well as calls. Durable
content: Pros-. -Lightweight, sweatproof- comfortable for long hours. -Durable- using since June 2020. -Decent bluetooth range. -Excellent for voice calls/zoom meetings. -Excellent battery- lasts for 3-4 days easily. Fast charging. Cons-. -Doesn't get easily paired with 2 devices simultaneously. Need to remove pairing with one device, then only it gets connected to the other.. -Earplug comes out at times for impact based exercises. Overall very happy with the purchase and would surely recommend.

name: sagar
title: Base Edition do not have quick switch feature
content: I bought this for main quick switch feature and I know it is working well in normal version but do not know that quick switch is not available on BASS EDITION though it mentioned on description. I did not expect such a thing from OnePlus.. I will surely return it and go with normal edition as such it do have quick switch .

name: Francis George
title: Happy with it except for noise cancellation aspect
content: Very convenient to use. The headset turns off automatically when you put the 2 magnetic ear buds together, and turns on when you pull them apart.. Sound quality is good. However, noise cancellation is poor. When I record a voice message in WhatsApp and play it back to myself, I hear even the noise of the traffic on the nearby road.. I have been using it formore then 3 months now.

name: VB
title: good product but how to connect initially , is  aproblem
content: It gets conmnected, when it likes. No OFF button in the wireless equipment. If we have to disconnect , we have to OFF the bluetooth in the phone. or else cannot. Again when we switch on phone bluetooth next day, this wirelss does not connect instantly when required. sometime later in the dat get automatically connected or whole day it does not get connected, inspite of charging. Overall, No switch off and swithc on button is a minus point and still dont know how to get it connected to phone when ew want. If we long press the given button in the wirelss BT, it gets depaired from phone. again neeed to pair as fresh. Any cust care from one plus if can call and advice.

name: Rahul Murari
title: Worth of money.
content: I am big fan of 3.5mm earphones but recently switched to oneplus device so was looking for wireless earphones so I choose this one after watching lots of reviews. so here is my I want to share some experience.. 1. Sound clearity is good.. 2. noise cancellation is good.. 3. highs and mids are good, vocals are clear.. 4. bass is average but good for ears and nice in music.. 5. gaming - working good in pubgs, you can easily play thia game, I mean you can go for it.. This is my first experience so will update later what I will experience.

name: Tribhuvan
title: Bass edition. But.....
content: Very impressive play time. Although the headset comes with a "bass edition" tag, I would tell one not to expect a thumping bass from this and hence 1 star less for the bass. Also I felt that the ear tips are on the bit of a harder side which makes it kind of uncomfortable for longer usage periods (if watching a movie of 2+ hours, might need to take a break and then continue), so may be this can be improved.

name: SPARSH.LM10
title: Bohot OP neckband Bolte
content: If your budget is 2k and you want to buy them, jus go for it man. These are damn and way to good. You will love it and I have loved them too. They are magnetic from the plugs and when you will attach them they will be Turned off and when you will unattach them, they will be Started. They are literally noise cancellation, once you will start using it and hear music, you won't hear a thing from the outside world. I will just say but them with no further queries

name: Bishal Karia
title: Awesome Product
content: Using this device from last 5 months. No such problems till now. The best part is you can transfer connection from Laptop to Mobile or Mobile to Laptop within 1 click.. Multiple Devices can be connected (3-4 Devices).. The Magnetic Touch will help you out the save the battery. You can't find any better product in this Price other than OnePlus. & Yes its waterproof as well.

name: Ashish n.
title: Sound quality doesn't worth for 2000 , don't buy if u are a music lover .bass my foot
content: Seriously dont buy this just bcz it has more battery than 225+ pro ,its sound quality is less than a 200 rupees gionee earphones .And if this is bass edition of this product then how bad it is in other models.. For 2000 its bass quality and sound quality is not good .build quality is good tho .. And u can't change songs with the help of volume buttons seriously man. Why the hell peoeple are rating 4-5 stars.. I bought this bcz of those ratings .. If u are a good music lover don't buy .

name: Prakash R
title: Frequent bluetooth disconnect
content: It's slim handsfree, but it disconnects even when we are in the call. Zoom in the laptop is not working. When I talk in whatsapp, if some other call comes microphone disrupts, need to reconnect to make it work. Overall average product from one plus. All these issues I'm facing in one plus 5T. Not sure about other models.

name: Rehan
title: Best quality
content: The cell phones are pretty good three seconds to connect to mobile it works with Samsung oppo Vivo all phones in my house it collects which laptops with very good quality best for gaming and for music headphones are so silent behind people cannot listen what we are listening very good headphones I like it worth the money oneplus best headphones

name: Joel Joe Varghese
title: A decent pair of bluetooth earphones for 2000
content: I own a pair of OnePlus Bullets Z and I easily recommend it to anyone who is looking for a decent pair in ear style bluetooth earphones. What I like about this earphones is the mainly the battery backup. Secondly the sound quality is good but not the best. The bass performance is average but not bad. If you want these earphones to sound a little bass heavy, you can tweak it in your equaliser settings. I own a OnePlus device hence this earphone works perfectly with it. I tweaked the sound equaliser of my smartphone and I am now impressed with this. It can handle bass if you tweak it the right way. Trust me, you will gradually fall in love with these earphones.

name: iamporosh
title: Buy once, you won't regret!🔥
content: Best wireless earphone at this price range🔥🔥🔥. Excellent for gaming coz it doesn't feel any sound latency or sound lage... Just amazing wireless earphone I used under Rs. 2000! I am giving it 4stars because iam not satisfied with it's noise cancellation technology and my ears started painting after using it for 3 continuous hours but ot maynot give you this problem coz my ears are a bit smaller😅lol!!! You can also see it's review in my youtube channel " iamporosh " which was unboxed along with Oneplus 8 and other Oneplus accessories. Edited on[ 4th August ] After using it for a couple of months it satated giving sound lage sometimes.

name: Ragav Barathwaj S
title: Quick pairing...better range...everythin else is average
content: Sound Quality- This headset can get loud but the bad kinda loud, like you would not be able to listen to clear loud music without noise. 3/5. Bass quality - barely makes it feel the bass..1/5 for me. Noise cancellation - a little better than previous one plus wearables but still a pain 2/5. It gets u everything that a 2k bluetooth headset can offer. And if u wanna buy u wannay buy🤷‍♂️ have a go at it... can't have ur mind blown by the quality but it can make ur mind keep throbbin at a steady pace🖖

name: amol
title: Not satisfied with this product.
content: I am using this wireless headphone with OnePlus Nord phone. I heard this headphone having more features while connecting with oneplus phones. I am disappointed with this headphone. I have observed some points.. 1. Sometimes it's got disconnected even though call is running.. 2. If phone is connected with headphone & incoming call is coming then it should auto connect without using phone. This feature not working. Need to disconnect headphone n need to reconnect.. 3. Whenever WhatsApp call is coming then call need to receive from phone. Even though headphone is connected to phone.. I am not sure this wireless headphone is working is this way. But same features will get in lowest price also in other brand too.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No noise cancellation poor quality
content: Noise cancellation is not there. The quality seems to be a question not even an year its been the rubber started to worn out near the bud. When enquired with the team they say get it.repaired outside we don't do this. The glue used to stick these seems to be of low quality

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth every penny
content: Worth every penny, using this since the past 3 months and I must say I'm impressed charges in 10 mins and lasts upto approx 2 - 3 days, with few hours usage everyday atleast. Pros -. Fast charge. Auto connect. Good sound quality. Buttons for volume. Button to pause or play. Cons -. Bass is decent ( but at this price cannot complain ). Go for it, it's a steal at this price. PS - I bought it for 2k

name: Shuham Govardhan
title: Great build good sound at awesome price!!
content: I have been using these for past couple of weeks and here are my thoughts on these earphones.I will be camparing these with my Sony MDR-EX150AP earphones.. Sound - The sound quality is good and crisp and the only fault is its low bass, which is fine by me but some people will be disappointed other than that the overall sound quality and sound satge is very good. It's as good as Sony but fall short in balanced sound of Sony which provides best quality.. Build - build quality is awesome very confortable my only problem is THE FLICKERING LIGHT WHEN THE DEVICE IS CONNECTED, IT'S FINE IN DAYTIME BUT IN DARKNESS THE FLIKERING LIGHT IS ANNOYING. But you can just tape something on it. Other than that its build quality is good and should last atleast year easily.. These are the best wireless earphone you can buy at the moment, so just go with it.

name: O.T.
title: Quality Product
content: Battery Life - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. Fast Charging -. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. Ear comfirt - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. Noise Cancelation - ⭐⭐⭐. Build Quality -. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. Connectivity - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. Overall Nice headphones after one months moderate use.. After 2 month update- working like new one.

name: Nikhil s.
title: Not Worthy..
content: These earphones are just an average earphone. I am not criticizing it but the actual thing is it is not that good if you are using it for calls and meetings.. Appearance is good and attractive.. NO ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION.(you will definitely get a lot of noise from background). Battery life is pretty good.. Connectivity is also pretty good.. Sometimes the voice and the scenes have delays but most of the time it was good.. CONCLUSION: Keep in mind these earphones are for those who enjoy only media and if you use them for calls they will catch a lot of background noise and the worst thing is that noise is louder than your voice.

name: Namandeep
title: Its dead on 11th day of purchase.
content: My earplugs stopped working on 11th day, it is not turning on and now I can not replace it.. I checked on OnePlus community mazority of people mentioned similar problems...few users said the problem started after one month...but for me it is dead on 11th day of purchase.

name: Ambadi
title: Good battery life REALLY POOR CALL QUALITY
content: battery charge is simply superb and sound quality is really good. However microphone quality is really bad as the person on other side will not get to know a single word if ur sitting beneath a fan or while ur riding a bike. Am really disappointed with this. We buy headphones mainly for talking but this is not the earphone for talking . I am using boat 955. They r really amazing in regard on call quality.

name: Vaishnav
title: Product for a life time!!
content: Best one under 2k if you are not much a bass lover. It's battery life is AMAZING( surely more than 18+ hours of playback- best in this segment). SOUND QUALITY is awesome, but if you are looking for a neck band with a high bass this is not the one. You can buy this if you like to enjoy music, heavy games(low latency mode is awesome), like to go on calls for a long time( BEST CALL QUALITY).Its NOISE CANCELLATION is also very good. It comes with warp charging but if you use a normal charger it takes about 1hour to get fully charged and also 10minutes charge gives around 8 hours playback time.connectivity is also very good..just seperate the magnetic earpiece and put in ear ..it's connected..also gives good range in case of distance. it also claims IP55 rating which allows to use under light rains and workout sweats.

name: Abhishek G
title: Stopped Working in less than a Month
content: I thought it was Value for money earphones and were working exceptionally well. Good sound quality and awesome connectivity with my Oneplus 6T.. Until it stopped working in less than a month. There is a Steady White Led just above the Quick Switch button. I tried resetting it by pressing the +/- buttons together and nothing. Pictures are attached herewith. Contacted the customer care and I was instructed to go to the service center where they may or may not replace which is located at the way in Vasai (60km from where i stay in Mumbai), so basically my commuting cost will be more than the cost of these Bullets Wireless Z. Very disappointed in Oneplus.

name: Rajitha
title: Good wireless z
content: Actually bass is low comparing to other compaines who r providing at the price of 1000-1500 earphones are giving better bass but if we use Equalizer I am very much satisfied with bass and sound quality is good before using Equalizer and after using Equalizer also it shines more and coming to build quality it's too good and packing also great with OnePlus and battery backup is also good and features also good but the problem with features is while we join together magnets it's disconnecting and after releasing magnets it's not playing songs automatically that the only problem I have faced and again coming to low latency I didn't tested because I am not a gamer so I don't bother about it and thanks to Amazon for faster delivery in lockdown time also keep going like this Amazon and appreciate OnePlus company for providing quality bullets wireless z neckband .

name: Umed Soni
title: One of the best result product in this range
content: What i like is the fast charging and battery backup. and what i dislike is magnetic on off options and the shape of this product.. One of the best shape bluetooth is samsung level U. Not to much long not short. long bluetooths looks like two cobra side by side is on our neck.😂

name: Anmol Shankar
title: Loose on left ear. Keeps falling.
content: The earphone audio and built quality is really good no doubt on that.. However, the product fails on ease of usage grounds. The fact that microphone is mounted on hanging wire makes the entire weight of microphone to be shifted on the left earphone.. As result left earphone keep on dropping from the ear, while working out or running or fast walking.. Do not recommend the product if you are planning to carry this to your gym or while running.. Bought it and returned it for the same reason.

name: TOMS KURIAN
title: For Bass Lovers
content: I have ordered the headphones and the first one delivered was a damanged piece.. I raised the complainant and Amazon replaced a new one.. Happy about the Amazon support. The product is very good especially if you are a bass lover

name: Ragurajan. A.R
title: Good product..value for money
content: I recently bought the bullets wireless, and have been using since 4+hours with my OnePlus 7 but the "battery percentage" of the Bullets Wireless, as shown on the OnePlus 7, is not dropping below 100% and then it suddenly "battery dropped" to 80%, 60%,30%, skipping all numbers in between.... There is definitely some problem, is the battery percentage just a gimmick?

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste of Money for Me
content: Poor quality control. The device was not pairing easily only after the use of 4 months, yet I thought it was my fault. Later the circuit on off system stopped working. Though the magnets worked but the device didn't get off when I wanted it to by joining the magnets.. Sent to the company as it was in the warranty period but the company refused to entertain the complaint sighting in minor wear and tear developed on the body of the device. All in all a loss of valuable money.. I have pledged to myself to never use OnePlus products in the future and will discourage people in my circle to do the same.. Very disappointed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review after one month usage
content: I have purchased this one month back. As per my experience, bass is low, sound quality is good. Noise cancellation is not that great. Only good feature is battery. It gives almost 15-19hrs (depends on usage) after one charging. Full charge takes almost 50min. Call quality is good and I never heard any complaint from the other person on voice call clarity. I suggest to purchase those who need to attend more calls. For listening songs or watching movies I don't suggest this to be purchased.

name: Goutham Kumar
title: Worst Product || Except Battery rest all bad || China means China only
content: Android Mobile Red MI Not connected... Connected to Apple MAC Book Pro. Last 4 days of my usage ntng much clear voice. Playing Youtube video bit noise, not clear audio, bit time difference, even though if u play 1080P video also not much clear n not original audio, 10m distance range fine (only straight) proved this as cheap n China product.

name: Mridul Nigam
title: Best in it's range
content: Sound Quality - 4.5/5- Overall best in its range.. Bass Quality - 3.8/5 - not a heavy bass but good balance b/w Bass and treble. Noise Cancellation- 4/5 - no any specifically tech support but good due to eartips design.. Quick Switch option is the best tech. provided. Bluetooth Connectivity- 4.8/5. Battery and Charging- 5/5. Low Latency supported on Oneplus devices i.e. smooth af for pubg.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Use it for 1 month
content: I thought it is sweat proof.....but the controller stop working just on my sweat.... What type of product is this.. At first i thought this is very good and worth buying.. But now, i am very unsatisfied with this.

name: Jeet
title: Do not buy
content: I have the worst experience with these headphones. 1. It does not catch signal even within 10 meters.. 2. Sound quality is not good, i have used other bluetooth devices where sound quality is much better. Your music experience will be BAD.. 3. Can not connect 2 devices parallelly and switch between them as needed.

name: Neelesh Kumar
title: I do not recommend. Better go for Infinity Glide 500!
content: It’s good. But it might not fix on your ears. It’s heavy. I bought this then regretted. As it slips off my ears. Then I bought Infinity Glide 500. It’s amazing. Infinity headphone is far better than any senheiser-Sony-Philips-JBL-SkullCandy-Noise-OnePlus headphone! I do not recommend buying this HEAVY Bullets. They will slip/fall of your ears. I can bet on that! You cannot use it for gyming-Running-Walking. You cannot move if you wear this Bullets otherwise it will fall or sure!

name: Mr. Ooppss
title: Ok product, good battery back up.
content: Not soo good. It's Ok product and the mick is not placed in the neck band. So when you drive a bike Mick will be floating. Noise will be at the receiver end. Bass is not that much. when compared to sennheiser brand this one is not up to mark. Good battery back up.

name: anand singh
title: Not satisfy with product
content: Ordered the product by using Amazon voucher but first time received faulty product, return the product and get the another one.. But replaced product having few issue. i.e every second call voice disturbance created. So, every each call needs to disconnect the head phone and reconnect then call will be clear. Re submit the replacement request. But one plus not replacing the product they are aggree to refund the amount, but i was used amazon voucher which is one time used so if refund comes which will not be use full for me . As i'll get only 1k which i was payed by my credit card, rest ok 1k voucher will be finished. Same thing happened with me few months back. So i am rejecting cancellation of order.

name: Lovepreet
title: Value for money at this price
content: These are my first Bluetooth earphones and i wanted these as my phone's headphone jack got damaged. So coming to the design, the material is great you'll not feel the band on your neck until you are not in a hot place, but the earbuds are slighty hard for me you have to kinda adjust with those.. audio quality is clean and loud and don't expect for high bass there is adequate amount of bass present.. Call quality is great.. now the best thing about these is battery, after opening the box it was 100% charged nd i used it for about two and a half days to 0% then it got charged to 100% in 30 mins now thats mind-blowing for me.. So if battery life is priority for you and you are a casual music listener then go for these.

name: Manoj bunny
title: Audiophile grade music
content: I have already owned great pair of headphones eg-> realme buds wireless, sony extrabass ap55, mivi thunderbits, boat rocker 255, but let me say ,these one has the best sound quality.. perfect thick bass but not overlapping vocals . The mids and highs are crisp . And one more thing i am using these earphones from 4 days from the delivery still having around 60% of charge so you can understand whats i am talking about. But the realme buds has most powerful sound and a slight better build quality. If your preference is pure music then forget about the rest .. these are pure gems ❤️

name: Rahul Rakhonde
title: Excellent budget bluetooth headphones
content: I am giving feedback after using more than a month. This headphone battery backup is excellent and it's charge even with normal charge, not needed fast charger. Sometimes at high level sound and at high volume speaker feel weird but at normal sound and volume it's feel great. Voice call experience is also good.. Recommend if you are most of times at outdoor and can't charge your headphones multiple times.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Will work till replacement window is over.
content: My headphones stopped working in a month. The led stays on forever and it wont connect to any phone and is not detecable either. That bit is fine, what's annoying is that their customer care just doesnt respond. I gave up after I found 40 more users with similar issues on the oneplus forum. Buy a Sony instead. Even if it has fewer features, it will last long enough to make it worth it.

name: Bhavin Patel
title: Worst product ever
content: The product sucks. Highly dissapointed, even 1 star rating is not worth it. It is damaged, and now there is no replacement for the same. I feel extremely cheated as it wasn't charging and the battery drainage is real bad. I sent it to oneplus service centre, and they are saying that we cannot do anything about it as it is physically damaged. Not even a month of this product. DO NOT BUY!!

name: Varun S
title: Good product
content: Good product.. but i would not recommend for calling purpose from outside... Could hear everything in the background for the other person on the call.. No noise clearance... The Battery backup is good.. Fast charging is great.. Auto reconnect option and multiple device change as well is smooth.

name: Nandy S.
title: Good product BUT
content: The one plus bullet z bass edition earphones are almost same to the one plus bullet z BUT the difference is the one plus bullet z Bass edition does not have the double click quick switch option i.e one cannot switch between two devices instantly which i felt was one awesome feature. I own the One plus bullet 2 and one plus bullet z as well and have no complaints about sound quality or build quality.

name: Vishnu
title: Very good value for money!
content: This is a beautiful product. I like the simplicity and the beautiful way it switches on/off. I earlier bought SoundCore and that is a crappy product. I was so angry. And I now bought and have been using the Oneplus buds since a week. Absolutely amazing product. I wasted 3000 bucks on SoundCore. Should've relied on Oneplus straightaway.

name: Vijaylathiya
title: No warranty card
content: I didn't got a warranty card with the box

name: Rishabh Puri
title: Good use expt
content: Pros: usb-c charging, so charges quickly.. Attaches to one plus phones very quickly. Magnetic action of disconnection is very good .. Good battery life a, at least 12 hrs.. Call sound quality is great. Microphone is great. Looks quite durable with sturdy build.. Negligible lag while gaming. Cons: very avg music sound quality compared to sebheisserr, but then its price is quite less

name: Kaustubh Mavle
title: Outstanding product for low budget audiophiles
content: Great deal for the price paid. Amazing sound. It's toned, doesn't hurt eat while hearing heavy metal like songs. Bass is overall ok. It's not a thumping bass that Indians mostly like. Noise cancellation is ok. It's not having ANC. What's surprising is lag/latency while playing PUBG is almost negligible. Rookies or intermediate won't even feel it. I use it while playing PUBG mobile. Magnetic control works great. The control keys are responsible. Mic is just amazing. It even captures minor surrounding noise while talking with phone. Also, it pairs very quickly, rapidly shifts devices (if 2 devices are connected) & battery backup is great, too. Charges 100% in 20-30 with 10W charger. I'd strongly recommend it to those who are looking to buy great wireless earphones for budget under Rs. 2000. Thumbs up to OnePlus👍

name: Parvesh Jangid
title: Very good voice calls quality and battery life
content: Nice build quality and very good battery life.. As far as mobile calls or zoom or Skype calls are concerned, I really liked the earphones. Sound quality is very good.. Regarding music, they are good not great.. Overall, I recommend these for voice calls, virtual office meetings and for great battery life.

name: Chandranath Bhattacharya
title: Good quality earphone can be used in office Teams, skype, phone etc.
content: Good quality earphone can be used in office Teams, skype, phone etc.. If your room is quite then its OK, else during calls it will pick background noise which is obvious.. Sound quality is good to average. I needed mostly for light music and office calls (wireless) which it servers its purpose.. Easy switch between two devices Laptop + Oneplus phone. Quality is good, received today and have been using it since last 3 hours, all good so far.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not for Music lovers
content: If you are music lover and hear lot of music, then you will disappoint for sure and I'm disappointed too. Perhaps go for any wireless earphones which are good for music. The bass is pretty disappointing as if you are hearing music in cheap earphones.. The neck band slips out often during work outs especially with crunch exercises where you lay down on the floor.. I had Bluetooth connectivity issues in the first week itself where I have to reset couple of time to make it working however no problems after that.. One major plus point is changing, battery last long and can charge really fast which is good.

name: Kevin
title: Simply better
content: Reliability & comfort is this all about. Battery last loong & charges quickly. So You don't need to worry about battery %. It's comfortable also. The magnetic pair & quick switch takes it way ahead of others in reliability. The only issue is, if you want to get punchy sound, you must have to use equaliser. But this fix everything & you'll get great sound from phone. But sound from laptop is poor. Again equaliser will fix it to a certain extent. Overall it's a awesome stuff. It'll give you more freedom as its wireless, comfy, lightweight & big battery.

name: Ramaprasad A
title: To list to earphone in phone or laptop please bring back of earbud (magnet) near to each other
content: I tried to list the this earphone in my mobile for full day, but unsuccessful. I wanted to return, but at the end I saw some reviews and comments from other users on same problem they faced in some other urls and solution suggested from other users too. The solution is below for fixing this problem.. To list to earphone in phone or laptop/TV please bring back of the earbud (where magnet is) near to each other then white light glows/blinks. then suddenly this earphone lists in phone/laptop/TV then try to connect. It works!!!!. But I am disappointed that this technique is not given in any of the other official sites of Amazon/Oneplus. I wasted almost full day listing and connecting this earphone, so I have given 4* otherwise I would have given 5*. Hope this helps!!!

name: Vikram Thakur
title: Perfect Sub-2000 earphones
content: Been using these for months now and they do full justice to their price. Double click to connect a different device is a little buggy but maybe thats just me, it has worked well for others. Sound is good, just about right. Great for taking calls as well.

name: Ajith Kumar
title: Don't buy this if you don't have oneplus mobile
content: Cons:. 1. Mic is the biggest issue, it works on some apps and doesn't work on a few. I couldn't record my voice using the mic. I couldn't even use google assistant. It is only optimized for oneplus phones... This product is not for all (actually not only me many other mobile users are facing the sams issue, so check and buy). 2.low bass. 3. Worst customer support. Pros:. 1. Amazing battery life. 2. Low latency (not for gaming). 3. Nice build. 4. Sound quality is good (except bass). 5. Buds felt comfortable

name: Anurag
title: Background Noise & Latency in PUBG.
content: Guys... while talking on Oneplus Wireless Z the other side person will hear the fan sound in background, the TV sound in other room, birds chirping far around 200 feet & everything. It will ruin your experience of high quality noise cancellation experience. It has high latency in PUBG. If you just want to listen to songs then go ahead otherwise please check other brands.

name: Anirudh Joshi
title: Value For Money Product
content: It's a value for money product mic quality is good( not great) but what would you expect at this price point. Bass is good not too much not too less it's just perfect depends on the user's choice, connectivity is the best part, very comfortable the material is very good and it doesn't itches even if you wear it for 4-5 hours coming to the battery backup if you're a moderate user then you can easily go for a day with a single charge, not specifically made for gaming ( specially not for pubg) you can play pc games using it there won't be a problem.

name: Sanjeev
title: I don't know if something is wrong with my unit but..
content: The worst sound quality i could expect! the sound is more low pitch which kills my year's! not even a decent base to begin with 😖 Iam honestly not happy with this purchase as it had so good build and connectivity the more the sound quality is bad! felt cheated maybe defective drivers but not something good

name: ANSHUL BALYAN
title: Good overall
content: Overall good product but bass quality is not that good else battery life is amazing and best part is I can connect two handset at a time. It get disconnected if any call comes in between then you need to connect again using your handset and it's not doesn't work if we want to pick a call or to disconnect the call from the handsfree.

name: shyam sunder
title: Please replace my last order
content: Respected sir or mam,. I bought a 1+ wireless bluetooth bass edition red and black a month ago it was good at the beginning I had a trip from Coimbatore to chennai through two wheeler I was hearing songs from the left end and the other end was just hanging over the shirt when I reached chennai and went to my apartment I noticed the right end of my headphone got shrunk from the heat I think I never thought it'll shrink from the heat at all can I have a replacement please I also remember it said 1 year warrenty so for that atleast please replace my headphone sir or mam. I hear songs a lot so headphone is something so important to me can you please replace my item.. Thank you.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Device hangs and becomes unresponsive
content: After one month of usage the device started to hang while using. It will remain unresponsive untill the battery drains out which takes even more than one week if it was fully charged. I tried resetting the device also. Even after discharging the battery, upon reuse it again went unresponsive. So disappointed. I didn't expect such a thing from oneplus products. Dont know what to do now.

name: Abhisek
title: Good balanced headphone and works flawlessly with oneplus phones
content: A very good product. Specially of you are using a one plus phone. It pairs very fast and the band is very flexible and easy to store. Bass and treble is balanced. Not a bass thumping headphone. Only con I think it's the size of the earphones, it remains a little portruded.

name: deepmissen
title: Value for money product.
content: Well I'm using this OnePlus bullets Z from last 3 days. I use it regularly for about 8-9 hours a day at decent volume of 60-80%. The battery lasted for about 19 hours, so, yes it gives a decent battery backup according to the price range. The audio quality is amazing and very clear but the bass is not upto mark. According to Bluetooth devices the bass feels little bit on the lower side. The mic is very cool and works perfectly. It has a best noise cancellation mic. It feels like you're using your phone's noice cancellation mic. The overall product is amazing if you can manage with lower bass although it's gives a decent low amount of bass. It's totally value for money product and reliable too.

name: Vishnu Easwaran E
title: Not an exact iteration of Bullet Wireless Z
content: The design and build have departed from the original Wireless Z, now the tip of the band has all the volume and play/pause control buttons. Meanwhile they took a u-turn with the quick-switch button and removed it altogether. Oneplus claims quick-switch in their product description, but with a footnote saying you need to select the device from the paired devices list in each device for switching between them-- outright stupid I would say. In my experience it hasn't worked as mentioned even once.. So those of you buying for the sole feature better stay away, their software solution is terrible and I don't see it improving.

name: Balakrishna Devisetti
title: A product worths 1999rs gone dumb in 3 days
content: Terrible experience with this device from one plus, in the second day of using the device, it is lagging at some points while listening music, later on 3rd day it was completely gone dumb, does not playing audio even the status showing was connected. But thanks to Amazon I have returned it, but didn't expect this from one plus company. #OneplusBulletsWirelessZ #badexperiance. #AmazonCheers

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very Close To Perfection 💯
content: Better than my last Senhieser Cx275. Very Awesome Quality. The bass is high, but treble seems lil down if compared to bass. A lil unbalance. If i talk about crystal clear music, then Senhieser wins. But still this one is more fun listening than my last one. Very Good Price for these product, totally deserve it. If your phone have only one jack for Charging and Headset. Then you must go for these one Bluetooth headset. Hence, i just received this product, can't say about Battery Life 🔋. Totally Satisfied though.

name: Dushyant
title: Complete value for money
content: Many people says that the boxes in which the never settle is not written they are fake one. Actually the answer is no, it was also not written in mine but the build quality of neckband and the box is excellent. Many peoples also says bad audio quality or average bass, actually the output also depends upon the device which you are using. I used it with redmi note 7 which miui 11 dosen't support AAC HD audio format so the sound was poor, Now i'm using this with Oneplus 7 I only say one word "Beast". Atleast for me the bass and audio and build quality is excellent.. edit- within a month they stopped working, i visited cp oneplus care then they provided me the replacement not its working fine. onw star deducted because of this.

name: Sarthak B.
title: These SUCK!!!
content: These are the worst headphones. They do not switch off. And there battery runs out as you can't switch it off.. They never start without charging for atleast 2 hours.. Worst investment, absolutely hate it.. Will pawn it for an ice popsicle

name: Avinash chandra
title: Superb bass & sound quality.
content: Well. Today I have received it.. It's bass quality is very good. U will defiantly feel it's bass..sound quality is also very good even in high volume u don't feel irrigation..for music and call purpose in indoors it's really one of the best bluetooth earphone. But yes this is not good for gaming purpose if u don't have one plus phone. But if u really want to enjoy music without any doubt u can definitely buy it. Battery back up is also good. It has fast charge . I bought it in sale for 1800 rs. So I can it's totally worth it for me .thank you amazon for fast delivery

name: Kiran s
title: Great purchase for the cost
content: Great for binge-watching.. This guy doesn't get tired.. Great battery backup.. Could use it for two days continuously.. Great latency, compared to other brands.. Could listen with my phone in one room and me being two rooms away. (4 concrete walls in between)

name: Loyalist
title: Keep your eyes open when receiving tech items.
content: Received a previously returned/ tampered/ duplicate product. Instead of the usual plastic wrapping around the box, there was just ordinary tape over the seams. I did not even bother to unbox the item. It looked so fishy. I saw a few unboxings on YouTube and it was evident to me that the packaging was not appropriate. This particular item they sent me has some history while I paid full dollar for a new, fresh off the line product.. Was just shocking to see Appario Retail (an Amazon owned seller) indulge in this. I'm an Amazon loyalist, and trust Appario heavily. Doesn't mean I will just sit and get duped. Where is your quality control Amazon?. Disappointed.

name: jithinrkoshy
title: Value for money
content: I have been using it for more than a month and it is working perfectly. It easily gets connected to the dell laptop, redmi 8a and a tplink bluetooth 4.0 dongle. It can switch between paired devices using the button provided. Actually it is my second purchase. Before this i had the same product. But after a few days, its mic stopped working. So i had to replace that with the current one. The sound quality is amazing. And it got a great battery capacity. The bass is perfect but it may not meet the expectation of bass lovers.

name: Ravi Chandra Reddy
title: Bass edition is the best!
content: There's so much difference between the normal and bass editions. If you are a bass lover you can definitely go for bass edition anyway the balanced sound is not comprised in bass edition, the sound quality in bass edition is as good as the original version and on the top bass is an added advantage. You just have to compromise with not having quick switch, a separate volume and control button.

name: Anirudh
title: Absolutely Perfect pair of Headsets
content: In the beginning i saw some reviews saying that the Bass is not soo good, even Tech Review Channels as well said the same. Completely Disagreed..... 1. Go to Settings > Sounds and Vibrations > Audio tuner > Sound Enhancement > select Oneplus Wireless. This above process will completely change the whole game and all the reviews.. Yes charging speed is around 25 mins for full charge and works for around 2-3 days depending on use around 18-20 hours of playback.. Really liked the magnetic controller option to switch on and off.. Overall the best bluetooth headset anyone and get at 1999 budget.

name: Mukesh Yadav
title: Distortion while playing game and music
content: I just purchased new ONEPLUS BULLET Z wireless Neckband. But I'm very disappointed with this. Magnetic play/Pause system doesn't work properly whenever I attached both earbuds, music is paused but whet i separated it automatic PLAY didn't work.. I'm facing one another problem and that is sound distraction. I don't know why but it is producing some extra noise which was not related to the content absolutely.

name: anupam bose
title: Versatile. Change your ear tip for the BASS(preferably large one)
content: This is an all rounder when it comes to sound and usability. Crisp and clear mids and highs.. Now speaking about bass. I could see different YouTubers giving different review regarding the bass.. Well, let me share my experience now. When I used the medium sized ear tips which comes pre-installed, I was quite disappointed with the bass.. But as soon as I shifted to the larger buds which comes inside the box. The bass quality went to a whole new level. It all depends on the size of your ear canal. The right fit can change your experience of the bass. Also, This idiot charges so rapidly. Gets connected seamlessly.. Conclusion- Guys just go for it. Just change the ear tips according to your ear canal ( Try the largest one once) You'll get the bass perfectly.

name: ARUN PANCHAL
title: Easy Connectivity
content: I am a guy who needed earphones more for the usability. Bullet Z has super smooth connectivity. I am working from home and mostly on laptop and my phone. It is super easy for me to switch between both connection real smooth. I like this plug for the light weight and the design features. I listen to some music before going to sleep. the wire or the hardware doesnt bother even a bit.. I am using it for my workout as well. I am bit worried since the charging port is wide open and no seal is provided for that. so idk if my sweat goes in. it might damage or not.. SOund quality is good or i would say decent. I am not a music addict. They are hence fine for me.. Another best thing is LONG BATTERY LIFE and QUICK CHARGE.. WRiting this review after 10 days of intensive using

name: Prince $
title: Not satisfied with the product for this price range
content: It does not have the bass for the price my Mi sports bluetooth had a great bass but i wanted a even good battery so i picked this but the sound is not rich even my samsung wired earphone has good sound than this one frankly speaking but the other specs are good like on and off automatically when de-attching magnetic earphone that is good

name: PixieDust
title: Not at all worthy of 2k
content: Sound is breaking frequently, getting disconnected time and again even on 100% charged, never settle logo also missing. Either damaged or not an original one by oneplus. Totally dissatisfied, returned it on the same day. Check 1 star reviews before investing 2k on a Earphone that can't serve the basic features of an Earphone properly.

name: Okay
title: Do not buy not wokring with in 3 day
content: Onle plus bullet battery is worst unfortunately its not working after 3 day use sound is not clear.Quality is not worth 1899 Inr.If you are planning buy wireless bluetooth i suggest go other headphone on same range.They are doing paid marketing thats y blogger showing them good.

name: Aditya Nandakumar
title: A good quality product that's definitely worth its price
content: This product is definitely worth its price.It's battery life is brilliant and it charges (full charge) within 23 minutes approx.Although, I'm using it with a One Plus 7T phone so the connectivity and sound quality are enhanced with One Plus system updates,I feel that it's sound quality and connectivity with non-One Plus phones is pretty good as well.It's noise cancellation is good and it's water resistant too. The only minor problem I'm facing is that I'm not audible enough sometimes when I'm talking on call.. I'm very happy with this product overall.Have been using it for 2 months now and it's quality is excellent.

name: Adalricus
title: Really good earphones with good connectivity.
content: Bought it after a buddy had used these for over a year. The headphones sound good. The bass is pretty good as well. Loved the battery life so far. Packaging was good. Loved the connectivity. Still connected over 10m of distance. Comes with different size earbuds. The colour is really beautiful. Connects to my laptop, phone, and my iPad.

name: Rahul Rajeev
title: Best in class.
content: The best Bluetooth earphone I've tried so far. Best fit, battery backup is at its best, ive only have to charge ones in every 2 day. Becouse im not using every time due to my job. Sound quality is ok, bass is descent, not so punchy. Material quality is perfect. Bluetooth range is good. A small disappointment is left earphone has a small irritating noice. I've tried 2 earphone both has the problem. Otherwise im satisfied

name: dinesh
title: Good product at good price
content: Good but never settle logo missing in the box. But contacted one plus store and the product was verified and it was original.This review was given after 2months of purchase

name: Falguni
title: Better Wireless headphones than others in this price range... Till now
content: *Battery is superb, I've to charge once in 2 days... *And that is for 20 mins for full charge(20hrs playback).... *Connectivity is superb, connects within 3 seconds. *Build quality is also superb,. *Earbuds are little bulky... One can't sleep with it.... *Sound quality-. 9/10 for highs. 9/10 for mids. 6/10 for bass, bass is average for indian bass lovers. *No clearification about Warrenty though.... *Noise isolation is best. *Noise cancellation is good. *Call quality is average. *Range - not more than 10 m. *Sad that no case included

name: Sivakumar
title: Not a perfect and worth for price
content: Sound quality was good but fails in noise cancellation. Bass is not upto the mark.. Battery backup is good but as per their campaign 10 minutes charge for 10 hrs playback is fake. It gives maximum for 9 hours on 100% charge( 16 hrs is their campaign). No vibration mode when incoming calls (I think can enable only in oneplus mobiles). No charging port cover, even small brand headphones are having it.. Bluetooth range is too low, within 2 to 3 meters sounds are not audible.. There is no automatic on/off option, you have to touch nd free the buds magnet.. Neck band is flexible but not sits properly.. So this is not a good product from Oneplus.

name: Vinay
title: GOD 1999 CASH BACK THIS MORNING 🥰
content: Awesome product for 1999. Thank you so much Amazon for refunding me 1999. I got 100% cash back today morning and I was shocked. I prepaid amount of 1999 on last Friday night and got oneplus earphones on Monday and also got 1999 refund this morning. It means they gave me this earphones for free. Really really awesome. Sound is good and clear. Bass is also good. Especially charging is out of my mind. Once charge for 20 minutes and use it for 2 days. Finally it's a worth for 1999. And an excellent cashback I got. I want to say that I'm lucky. I never got 100% cashback ever before. Thank you Amazing Amazon 😊❤️

name: Amazon Customer
title: Why there is no dual device paring?
content: I was using Boat rockers before, then i switched to OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition,. Everything was good with these earphones, even sound quality, bass, and long battery life,. The only thing which keeps irritating me was switching from one device to another manually, which i did not use to because i was using Boat Rockets with dual paring feature, I just had to return OnePlus bullets because of this reason, as i usually connects with 2 devices while working, otherwise, these headphones are very good in this budget.

name: Allwyn
title: Not for people who listen to music with high bass effects.
content: Bought this headphones a week back. Packaging was good and nice.. Pros :. Quality is good. Good bluetooth connectivity. Mic is good , don't have to shout during calls. Single charge gives me 3days , although i use it for calls, max 2-3 hours a day.. Cons :. Volume is on lower side, you have to keep it at full volume for calls and still it feels less at times.. Bass levels are very less. If you are looking for headphone to listen to music then don't go for this .

name: Alok
title: Just like any another Bluetooth earphone
content: 0. Received few days ago. Liked the awesome OnePlus packing.. 1. The battery backup seems to be fine, goes on for about 10 hours before recharge.. 2. Initially found it connecting to mac pro a bit difficult. After switching on off, it connected. No seamless connection.. 3. Bass quality is not good. I have an off the shelf earphone where bass is much better than that of OnePlus. So, if you want to enjoy bass heavy songs/items, then this is not the earphone for you.. 4. Voice quality seems to be fine.. 5. It does not fit very well in my ear, comes off very easily.

name: Umang kataruka
title: best earphone under 2k
content: i was also skeptical while ordering this wireless earphone but trust me guys its one of the best product i ever purchased through Amazon.. this is the first i have ever purchased a wireless earphone i must say it sounds very good.sound signature, sound stage, instrument separation are incredible.mid and highs are crystal clear and the bass is also descent enough and the best thing about this wireless earphone is the battery got me through whole 2 days without having to charge. and also the build quality is very good.. i would say just go for it you will not regret buying it.. and best thing about it was my friends did confused this with bullets wireless 2 which is like around 6k 😉.

name: Sharath
title: Disappointed
content: Really disappointed with Oneplus Bullets Wireless Z. It doesn't work with my laptop (Dell I-13 with Ubuntu 16.04 LTS). Cannot switch between the devices smoothly. Though it's connected to my Oneplus 6t sound comes out from the speaker. Sometimes I have to disconnect and pair again. Sound output is also average. There are tens of earphones available for the same price which given better output than this. Only happy about the charging part. For the first time really disappointed with OnePlus product. Still using my type-c bullet earphones and it works like a charm. Not really worth 2k

name: Chinmay
title: A well balanced package , everything is above average but not great but not bad either
content: I use them for my online lectures and they are just awesome I can switch between my phone and laptop by double tapping the button seemlessly... And they do get connected within a second ... Sound quality is also above average like the student who scores 75% not very good but not bad at all. The experience is seemlessly fluid. The build quality is also average . The neck band is made of thick silicon and the main wire is a seems a bit low quality , the main ear buds are made of plastic but are of very good quality and light weight , the provided eartips are soft and don't hurt in my ears they do not fall out of my ears while running but you see I am a chubby guy so when I give a large smile they tend to pop out of my ears🤣🤣

name: Sandeeep
title: Please don't buy, fake product
content: I bought this earphone on the month of August. It had few problems like bluetooth disconnection and bad noise cancellation.. Suddenly this morning the earphone circuit crashed and it continuously displayed blue light. I tried charging, factory reset and connect to multiple devices. But this device seems complete dead now.. I request other buyers to increase your budget a little more and find some good rated earphone. Really disappointed with this fake Chinese product.

name: akash
title: Calling sound is not upto mark
content: Pros:. 1. Sound quality is good. 2. I can quickly switch between 2 devices at one time with this headphone.. Cons:. 1. calling mic is not upto marks, my voice is very low heard to caller.. 2. Overpriced , you can buy such headphones at 1000-1200 also.. Amazon delivered it in 3 days but when i received it the packing box was opened but inside my earphone box was there.

name: Vikrant Satpute
title: Worst product at this price
content: Worst product at this point, realme buds are better at sound quality compared to this oneplus bass edition. Even the battery says 40% but my phone doesn't play on the earphone but realme at same time did. This is the worst product I bought for such price point

name: Samir Nanavati
title: Try both versions before buying
content: OnePlus Bullets (Bass Edition) are value for money headphones. Superb battery. Comfortable design. As the name suggests, they are quiet punchy in the bass department. Actually, over punchy for my liking... If you really like heavy bass while listening to music then go for these. Whereas, like me, if you like a more balanced sound then I suggest you go for regular edition OnePlus Bullets Z rather than Bass edition, for the same price.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bass lovers stay away from it
content: There's literally zero bass. If you are someone who loves that thumping bass sound then this earphone is not for you.. Even if you are expected a balanced bass and treble you would still be disappointed as there is no bass.. The sound quality is crisp and clear and there's no distortion even at high level but the absence of bass just makes the music feel incomplete, be it any kind of music.. Battery powet,charging time and low latency are the only things it's good at, I guess they have compromised on sound quality to add all these features.. If you are interested in buying a earphone that offers crisp and clear sound, has no bass then go for it.

name: Karthik
title: Dear Bass heads
content: Alright, me being a jbl c200si user, I have no far expectations on these bullets, but Boi oh Boi it will completely change your experience, these are so premium denying the fact, sound quality is absolutely beautiful, highs and miss are well put together! The crucial question, will the bass kick in, me being a bass head, I use n7 player so I tune my own pitch, I see bass is not an issue here, u can get the bass, which is sufficient enough, use n7 player to set your pitch! And the most important thing is the battery, it's humongous man, I have been using it for almost an hour, switched on and off serveral times but the battery ain't gonna get tired very soon!, noise cancelation is okayish! And the sound signature is absolutely phenomenal!..

name: Ram Chandra Murmu
title: Below average mic, Good sound quality
content: I have been using this product since more than two months .... Pros. Good sound quality. Livable bass. Pause and play with magnets works seamless. Superfast charging. Cons. Mic does not work most of the time, so be ready on call to hear from other end "could you please be louder!!", It is just annoying. Verdict : if you can bear with below average mic ,then go for it, else there is no dearth of products having good mic in that price range

name: Shishir Goyal
title: Best product under 2000
content: One of the best product by one plus in the category of earphones. In terms of sound quality, build quality, comfort and connectivity, this product is best in its category and price range.. The only reason to give it 4 start is because of its bass quality and latency( even on my 6t). If you are a basshead and are planning to use oneplus z for gaming, then this is not for you.. But if you use it for conference calls, low bass music and you frequently switch between your laptop and mobile, then this is the best product you can get for 1999.. Thanks to amazon for their fast delivery.

name: Manoj
title: Not good for people's looking for WFH calls
content: If you are specifically looking to have laptop calls like WebEx, Skype or Teams while doing WFH then these headphones are BIG no. Don't go for this as noise cancellation is not present at all in these headphones. You won't listen other party voice clearly over VoIP calls. Better to go for Oppo Enco M31 as these support noise cancellation and calls are clear at both ends. Coming to One plus bullet's, build quality, fit, finish & feel is certainly very good and normal listeners won't be having issues with sound quality for music.

name: Balakrishnan
title: good but not good
content: this is the best for the battery.but it does makes some issues when you connect it to a laptop or computer. first time it fails to connect.second time it connects. so each and every time you have to connect it two times.. also it has some issues while playing songs, movies or whatever. it gets stuck at times so you need to replay the last one or two seconds. the mic is pretty good. but you will not get 20 hrs and all. it is somewhere around 17 to 18 hrs.and does not have noise cancellation, could have been better if they included a pouch inside the package.

name: Tejas Kotecha
title: For Oneplus phones👍. For others 👎
content: Quick Review. For Gamers : Good if you are a oneplus user otherwise worst. Latency is high for non oneplus users.. For Travellers : Best. Gives decent battery life and charges 100% within 10 min.. For Music Lovers : Above Average. Good within price range. Clear audio. Tip : Change ear tips to bigger size for bass improvement. Default eartips are not good for bass. Microphone is good but not the best. Noice cancellation is mediocre. Wind may cause immence effect in your call.. Hope you found it helpful. I returned it because I can't stand high latency.

name: Doga
title: Got defected piece.
content: Got defected piece. Bought this headphone on 11th jan 2020 and on 24 Jan 2020 the headphone stopped charging which eventually led them to die,out of battery.. Also at the same time i'am unable to return this product to amazon because the return policy got obsoleted on 18th of Jan 2020.. Sound quality is good but brand realibility and build quality is not upto the mark.Therefore I recommend everyone to go for other less expensive brands.

name: dharani
title: Review after 24 hours
content: Yesterday I received the product. After 24 hours of extensive usage, I would like to recommend this product to those whose major requirements for attending calls and mild music. Noise cancellation is awesome. The biggest advantage of this oneplus is the battery backup. Even after such a heavy use I have more than 70 percentage of juice still pending. Even listening to music is also still not as good as the premium headset. My final verdict. If you have a tight budget and you are in compulsory need of a Bluetooth headset, just go for this, provided listening to music with high bass is your second option.

name: SAHIL MOUDGILL
title: Base little less, but sound better than realme band
content: Base is less, you can set it at a good level using equilizer but you won't find anything like a good sound quality at a good level with wireless features and at this price point, sony is also good (2000) rs band but don't go for realme they are shitty rather realme but oneplus. I have returned them because i wanted earphones for music. And they are not that good for base focused music, for calling best workout wearing them, they won't fall.

name: kirubakar
title: Value for Money product
content: Pros:. 1. Type C charger. 2. Battery life not 20 hours as it claims but seemlessly 13-15 hours. 3. Quick switch mode between two devices works seemlessly well. 4. Ip55 water and sweat resistent is another added bonus. Cons:. 1. The earphone wires are not flat and flexible like other normal earphone in its price range which will increase the durability of the earphones

name: Arpit
title: Beast battery backup....
