content: It's sound is quality is good but it is quite low when outside. If you are a bass lover then this is not for you but I doesn't prefer bass that much so good for me. It's mic catches lots of background noise, so sometimes the person on call may complain about that. I personally like the quick change button, it helps me quickly switch between my phone and laptop. And the main thing is battery it is beast. It take approx 1 hr to fully charge and you get 2 days backup on it on medium to heavy usage.

name: Rachit
title: Sounds quality decreases after some months
content: I am using it from last 2months .In starting it sounds and connectivity is very good. Its sound is totally balance .you don't so much high base or high sounds...but you will totally statisfy with sounds quality.....but after using of 2months I found some sounds quality issues now sounds decrease and it's really disappointing😤😤 that it's sounds don't stable for at least 2months ....now I facing low sounds as compare the sound I get in starting 😡😡....I very annoyed with OnePlus 😡😡 please don't buy it ...you definitely feels issue in sound quality...

name: Pritikanta
title: Awesome one 👍
content: One of the best under 2k price range, sound quality is very good ,those who are complaining about bass try to change the rubber ear tips and see the chabge, at first I'm also disappointed with bass and after changed to large eartip the bass came to play.. Battery backup is awesome it goes around 16hr almost continuous uses.. Low Latency checked with PUBG Mobile it works absolutely fine, I'm using OP 7T with fnatic mode it works nice. Compared with realme buds with PUBG their is 1sec delay.. Overall a nice product for listening music and gaming.

name: Soumo Banerjee
title: Excellent product
content: I am a singer and composer and very much particul about music( search YouTube- Soumo Banerjee).I was a little apprehensive whether to go for it or not after seeing some comparisons with Oppo encoM31 but finally I thought of going with one plus because of the battery backup on offer and finally I think I made the correct choice.Especially on long journeys one needs battery back where a minor compromise on music quality might be made.But in this case, almost no compromise required on music quality.. No lag, wireless range excellent,mic 🎤 excellent , no issues in connecting with my Asus phone.

name: Brez
title: White light problem..
content: Bought this item by reading many positive reviews from Amazon.. But we're very disappointed.. There is a dim white light which can be seen randomly.. and when it appears the headsets can't be connected.. I've to discharge it fully, which takes 15 to 20 days and then the dim white light finally disappears. Then I am able to charge and its working normally... I've encountered this problem two times already and it's very annoying... Please think twice before buying it.

name: Anurag
title: Bad sound quality. Not for audiophiles.
content: Don't buy if you're a music lover. Really bad sound output. OnePlus should understand that only features does not make a good earphones, the basic feature of providing a good musical experience should be highest priority.

name: Rachit
title: Bad experience with first Oneplus product
content: Bass edition has charging issues, in mobile phone it shows 100% but earphone never shows white light. So earphone never shows full charge itself..I replaced two times finally decided to return.

name: Manjunath
title: Good for Call and average for music.
content: Quality Earphone with following drawbacks.. 1. Connectivity issue. I am not sure if this is happening with me. You need to keep the phone paired all the time even not in use. If you disconnect.. connecting back again is little difficult. I try hard in that case.. 2. Phone is not for music lovers. sound quality and bass is average. It's good for call. I took for that purpose and satisfied.

name: MAYANK MAUSAM
title: Connectivity issue
content: The day I received my delivery, it got connected to my Samsung M30s phone for 1 hour and after disconnecting the earphone was continuously having its white light ON.. It was not getting connected with any of my devices. Even after disengaging the magnetic earbuds no change in the light colour was there.... Very much disappointed with OnePlus... Didn't expect this kind of flawed product from them

name: Anil Radadiya
title: This is an amazing and Best Bluetooth Earphone i have ever used.
content: I am really surprised by the quality of this OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z in-Ear Bluetooth Earphones. Battery. I have to say that the Battery time is really impressive, Charge for 15-20 minutes, enjoy for 2-3 days minimum. Bluetooth Quick Switch - Quick Pair feature works amazingly and very useful for those who keep their Bluetooth connected with more than 1 device, you can easily switch devices by just pressing the button. Magnetic Control is also good.

name: Dk baisla
title: i hate this product quilty
content: Worst product ever can not talk properly while riding on bike. Mic is defective as the other end can not hear while I can hear him. Can't auto connect again if pair with another device, it took long time and had to go to settings and tap to connect. U can't waste 2k only for fast charging and long battery life. Boat 255f is far good as I have it too but I have oneplus 7(my 5th oneplus device) so thought that it will work good for my device but disappointed with oneplus for this reason. Requested to return immediately within 36 hours. Don't buy this is waste of money. Read less......i will never again shoping here

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice earphone
content: Nice earphones.. built quality, battery back up, fast charging, auto connect everything is awesome about this earphone.. sound quality is not at par with Bose but then again look at the price. Most importantly it feels light on the neck and the neck band feels very comfortable. I am happy with the earphones.

name: Rahul Verma
content: NEVER SETTLE LOGO IS MISSING IN BOX.. 🎧Sound Quality🔹 4/5. 🎧Bass🔹4/5. (Not For Bass Lovers.). 🎧Noise Cancellation🔹 3/5. (Neither Good Or Neither Bad It's Average). 🎧Build quality🔹 3/5. (Could have been a bit better, the wire is a bit thinner.). 🔋 Battery🔹 5/5. (Up to 25 hours of backup.). From this price point, earphones are very good & fast charging is good.

name: Vivek
title: Poor Sound Quality... No Bass...
content: I'm using OnePlus 7T & thought it would be a perfect match for my phone. As soon as I received bullets wireless z, within 15 minutes I have requested for my refund. Sound quality is very poor, no Bass at all.. Also there was no Never Settle branding inside the box. just working like local earphones.. Boat Rockerz 255 was damn good which I was using earlier.. Received refund within 24 hrs. Thanks to Amazon !!

name: Aman kumar
title: The best for the price
content: It's pretty good for the price you are paying.. You can easily get it for around 1799 inr on sale or on OnePlus official site by applying 200 inr off cupon.. 1. These buds offer great sound quality for the price. 2. You can charge it for 10 minutes and these buds will last you for about 7-10 hrs.. 3. Has great mic quality.. 4. No active noise cancellation it's Passive Noise Cancellation.. 5. It works best with OnePlus smartphones.. If you are looking to buy wireless earbuds then these are one of the best for the price.

name: akshay
title: Worth the money you give
content: Brought this and the boat rockers 410 together, i felt the quality of music prodced by both the drivers as tooo different . I am happy with this product, dont expect a JBL or boss level headphones but this is worth the money you spend, battery life is superb, warp charge is amazing as usual, the quick switch feature may be useful for you even though i havent tried it myself. Built quality is amazing.

name: AKK
title: Love in 4-5 days working n thinking to buy again whenever need
content: This is more than expectation n justify price .. Very easy to use and I love it's on n off is just through earbuds magnets . So it does not need any settings change when u want ur phone use in direct or with this head phone .. I recommend this product.

name: saurabh bhatt
title: Best at this price-point. It's a Buy! Buy!
content: I brought the OnePlus Bullet Z Bass Edition.. And i was very impressed by the sound quality as well as the build quality.. And the super-fast charging on this earphones is just phenomenal (20-25min 0-100% full charge).. And the batter backup is amazing too.. Overall Sound quality and bass is good.. But the noise cancellation is where it loses points.. This is the best you can get at this price point.. It's a buy! buy!. Seriously impressed by OnePlus.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not disappointed
content: Just what you need to listen to music. Not so much for calls but it does the job. It is easy to set up and pairing was almost immediate. Really nice quality and fits well. Only thing I thought was the wires are a bit longer than I am used to, but that is okay and I can live with it. Magnetic off is also really helpful.

name: Pinaki
title: Worst in terms of noise-cancellation
content: After using it for 14days--- honest feedback is that. 1) It doesn't cancel-noise (people will be able to hear the sound of your ceiling-fan :( ). 2) Time and often gets disconnected automatically (while on-call) , and then it automatically re-connects back (after 10secs) :(. Better to get some other headphones at this cost...

name: Devang Kothari
title: Decent for Colling, not for Bass Lovers
content: This is really a great earphone for those who wants to use it for Calling Purpose. Battery Life is astonishing. Using it for the 4th day now, still 30% Battery remaining. Never needed to charge it yet. Noice Cancellation is not that good, but still not that bad too. Even in high Traffic while riding the Two Wheeler, the person on the other side never complains about not being able to understand me. For Music Lovers, the Bass is really very low, at times No Bass at all. So choose wisely. For me, I bought for Calling Purpose, & I am 100% Satisfied.

name: Chandrashekhar Singh
title: Best buy under 2000
content: The build quality is superb and premium. Double tap to switch feature is very useful and I use it a lot. The audio quality is fantastic and so clear. it has bass but it is not a bass centric earphones which I prefer personally. Overall great buy as there are no alternatives under 2000.

name: BinSha
title: Perfect gadget addition - Great Value for money
content: These wireless One+ bullets are a great addition to my ever growing phone accessory universe! Perfect fit and great sound quality. Build quality in this price is good. If you for a studier construction go for a higher level earphones from One+

name: Suresh
title: Just average
content: In the looks department oneplus did well. When it comes to sound... I can say it gives you average performance. If you are a music lover... there is no second thought, just skip this one. Go for other brands like sony, Jbl.. etc. I read on some reviews... Bass is Ok. MId tones were good, high tones good bla bla bla. Believe me guys... there is no bass at all. Even I try to increase the levels with some third party music booster apps too. But, no use. Finally, I'm using for only for calls. Battery backup is pretty decent.

name: kunal maheshwari
title: Decent, not so epic
content: The earphones are nice and build is fine. Sometimes the earphones fails to connect but moat of the time they connects real quick. i use a oneplus device so that might be the case for my.devoce only. sound quality is decent. There have been a battery standby issue though. it doesn't last long as stated. I use it most of the time for the meetings and songs and calls and it last a day can say around atmost 10hours. and it always shows 100-80-60-30 and switchs off so you will never know how long it gonna last. it stays at 100-80 for a looooong time but drops then quick. but 10min-10hours is real i think. need to mention the wuick toggle to connected devices works like fine and it is life saver switching back and forth between laptop and mobile. without switching off the bluetooth. works best if you have a oneplus device. works normal with other devices

name: Vishnu Pratap Singh
title: A decent buy, highly recommended for Oneplus users!
content: I got these keeping in mind that Buds Z simple edition had slightly less bass as told by everyone. So, my reaction of the new Buds Z Bass edition is obviously better considering Simple ones were just too stock. Sound is slightly less whereas bass is good enough. I really like the blue colour considering black and red on bass edition and In general is just too common.. Overall : A decent set, I'd particularly suggest only oneplus users to buy this as it has a subset of additional advantages like dash charge, longer cable length and future updates, If any!

name: Anant Shah
title: Worth for money
content: It's being 5 day of daily usage, I am very much satisfied, before purchasing I watched so many reviews, all were having different views. I was watching review to know the call and music quality.. Many customer said the music bass is not good... And the call quality is some how ok-ok. But I purchased considering the brand and trust me, my decision was correct.. For me the main purpose to purchase neckband was for call handling and in free time movie and music listening.. Call quality is simply superb, music quality is also very good, no low bass complaint from my side.. If you are thinking for any neckband >2K just go for it. No need to watch any review.

name: Amazon Customer
title: A perfect product for bass lovers!
content: The sound quality is just sooo good! I coupled it with my Nord and BOOM!. Bass is super punchy. (On the bass edition). Call quality is good if not great.. Charging is super fast. (Supports Warp Charging!) Charging cable is provided in the box.. Battery backup is amazing. I have been using it for 4 days straight without changing it. Moreover, charging for 1 minute fills the battery upto 10%!!. Build is really good.. I highly recommend this product to everyone.

name: Pratik Punjabi
title: Brilliant for Bass Heads!! Best in Range! 5 ⭐️
content: I’m a bass-head and I was looking for a good pair of BT headphones under 2000 with punchy bass. This one has the best audio and bass. Also the call audio is crystal clear and the ear grip is solid and battery life is solid. I also ordered JBL 215BT bass edition but its no where close to oneplus. Go for it. Brilliant product by oneplus.

name: Vaibhav Agrawal
title: Good sound but high latency.
content: Well bought them besides reading a lot negative reviews about bass but be assured bass is good if u tweak it with sound equaliser , one plus phones got inbuilt sound equaliser, but have to return these as they are not working fine for gaming don't know why the company is wrong advertising about "ultra low latency" rest these are a good pair of bluetooth earphones.

name: Priti Biswas
title: Love this very much.
content: Just love this one. The sound quality is very good. I'm not a BASS person so I like music on it. The battery life is very good than other bluetooth headphones. I use it mainly for calls. And the microphone is good. Other person can hear me very clearly. I will recommend it.

name: Nikhil
title: Good quality earphone with great battery life
content: Good quality earphone with great battery life and quick connectivity and quick switching as well.. It supports both AAC and LDAP to give great sound quality. Battery life is amazing easily get thought a day and more with heavy usage - calls, video, songs etc. Plus charging is also quick. Great product and definitely best in this price range

name: Giridhar Krishnagiri
title: Battery is excellent. Speaker and mic is above average.
content: After trying out Zebronics, Samsung, Blaupunkt headsets now bought Oneplus headset. Build quality seems good. Sound quality is above average. Mic is good. Battery appears excellent. It is still early days. Will provide more feedback after 2 to 3 months.

name: yogesh
title: Just go for it
content: I have gone through a lot of reviews before buying it and heard everywhere the bass is just okay but believe me the bass is adequate with excellent sound quality. Used it for more than 4 hours and still 80% of the battery left. The toggling feature between devices is a great feature to switch between my work laptop and mobile. The buds sit perfectly in the ear with no sound loss. Played pubg for sometime and there is no noticeable latency. The only thing is the buttons are not that tactile.. Final verdict: If you are planning to buy a bluetooth earphones around 2k, this is the best deal to opt.

name: Prince
title: Amazing Product.. Very Happy
content: This earphone worth every penny. Last month I bought this product (Black color) not expecting much (just went for an average price).. but after using it, I was very much blown away with its performance, specially battery. Just need 3-4 charges for a month use. And Every call is crystal clear. And u wn't feel any lack of essence in music quality or (if u r just a listener , not a sound engineer or a music critic)... So I bought a new one for my Dad yesterday.

name: Saurabh batham
title: My gf gifted me and ...
content: Omg! What an amazing product my gf she gifted me this and i must say this is the best base Bluetooth I've ever heard in this price range and sound quality is lovely see OnePlus is doing an amazing job and best thing is charging. Just plugin for 10min and you're good to go for an entire day if heavy use if not then 2 day max but 10min of charging if you have OnePlus adapter.. Guys if you're looking within 2k don't think twice just purchase it this is bang onn.

name: Harshil Pandya
title: Amazing masterpiece by Oneplus. Lovin it 😍😍😍
content: This is a beast..... This is an amazing product by Oneplus as comoared to other earphones in same price range segment.. I read many reviews regarding low bass and all that but believe me after tuning your equilizer you will not have that complaint regarding bass.. Also, if you are using OnePlus phone which is higher than oneplus 5 then this is a must go masterpiece by Oneplus. Battery life is surprisingly higher than any other available buds.. Ease of connect:- 5/5. Balance of sound:- 5/5. Battery:- 10/5. Durability:- 5/5. Noice cancellation:- 4/5. Fast charging:- 5/5. At the end will just say "a must go for it piece in this segment"

name: abhishek
title: It's the best bluetooth earphones that i have used under this price segment... Totally satisfied.
content: I would say it is the best bluetooth earphones under 2k.After using around 10 days here is my honest review... Pros. 1.feels premium. 2.easy to carry. 3.light weight. 4.Good sound (mids and highs are good). 5.balanced bass(no extra bass like sony Xtrabass series delivers but not bad). 6.easy connectivity. 7.value for money. 8.last one Great battery life. Cons. 1.extra plastic material used(could have been better). 2.wire is little bit thin (not a big issue). 3.earphones case is not given in box

name: sugandha a.
title: FAKE PRODUCT ALERT
content: As usual Amazon is serving people unethically.. 1. The product doesn't have oneplus "Never settle" tagline, which the brand claims to be present on all its original products. 2. There is no warranty details inside the packaging. 3. If you match the product packaging with the original packaging on oneplus website, there are small deviations which clearly reflect this is a copy of the product. Since the brand follows standardized manufacturing and packaging protocols.. Oneplus should definitely check into this since Amazon doing more damage than good to the brand

name: Sheheen kn
title: Happy
content: i am perfectly happy with the product, earlier i have bought boat airdopes 441 and Boult trubass airbuds but they didn't fit in my ears.This is perfect and when i ride my bike i can wear it in my ear for using gps.(perfect with helmet) went for around 6 hrs on bike for 250km on a stretch and my ears never pained.

name: Arun Kumar G
title: Not a good product
content: Very poor design and not working properly. Pros:-. 1. Connecting automatically when we plug in the ear. 2. Good battery life. Cons:-. 1. Not at all getting connected when we required the most, fed up of it. Most of the time not connecting. Mannual power switch is not at all working to switch it on.. 2. Very poor button designs. Not easily accessible and not at all user friendly to press the buttons.. Waste of money and getting headaches most of the time when using it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great futures but NO great sound
content: Excellent in futures. 1. Touching both magnetic earbuds will switch off the device and removing is enough to switch on. 2. Can connect with 2 devices (I have connected with my mobile and office laptop so both I can use as hands free). 3. easy switching between the paired device. 4. Mic is working good compare o others. Bad in Sound. listening songs with this BT head set is not great.. I would say it is decent, but not great, especially BASE is not at all good.. If you are a hard core music lover and want to hear the songs in full swing, then this is not your option.

name: Laxit b.
title: Awesome product from oneplus
content: Writing this after using it for more than 24 hrs everything is fine with this earphone.the sound quality was clear and loud no issue bass was also good but u will feel slightly lower if you have used a good quality wired earphone before.i am putting an screenshot for oneplus users to improve bass overall the product was soo good.battery life and charging time just awesome looks and feel also good. best in under 2k just go for it....!!

name: ravikumar
title: Good product
content: Bass was too much for my liking.Because of that i think vocals felt lower. I like to focus more on vocals more in general.Everything else is great. I returned it and bought the normal edition altough.Also,note that Bass edition ones sound louder than the normal ones and has that thumping bass.That's the only difference in sound.. Also i noticed that they were not as comfortable as my old anker earphones but I feel for the price, they deliver a lot more. I use them througout the day

name: George sunny t
title: Good pair of earphones.
content: For people who feel bass is less, change ear tips size to large. Go to Equalizer settings(For OnePlus devices, sound-->Dolby Atmos and change setting to nuance, and drag the left most bar to max) This has put the bass to almost par with my JBL E25BT.. For this price, you can purchase this product blindly.

name: Mohammad Sabir Khan
title: Very honest review is here
content: Day 1 : I was very excited for this as I was reading reviews of this product from past 4 months. And now after using for more than 2-3 hours I'm giving an honest review _. Sound quality is awesome. When I received it I charged it to 100% and to my surprise nearly 3 hours has passed and my 🔋 % is still 100.. If you're a fan of pubg or cod then the latency is (70/100) even I'm also upset with this. But I've not played much. Will update it soon after playing more. Sounds are great on call.. In 2k this is the best you'll get. Will update soon after using it for sometime. Till now it's a (4.7/5) product.

name: Sinan Fadi
title: Do hear me out!!
content: I bought this on 17 july 2020 and today is November 1. Last week the right earpiece volume got so low that I can barely hear anything(slightly audible in max volume so still works somehow but then u can't wear the left since volume is too high and it hurts). I emailed oneplus and thay asked to visit their centre but there's none nearby.. I really liked the product. Mic is good enough for nearly everyone, decent sound quality, easy to connect, really comfortable to ear and an impressive battery life(they claim 20 hours and I do get around 18 hours easily). But yeah one downside for me is that right side is inaudible

name: Aneesh Kalarikkal
title: Average product, but doesn't make upto expectations
content: The product is just fine. 3.5/10 score.. The only speciality is u can use approximately 10 hours with 10 min wrap charging. Battery is 10/10. But overall it's not upto mark.. OnePlus has disappointed me.. I'm writing this after 3 month usage. I brought this on 15 May,2020. Now on July it started showing abnormal microphone issues. I'm not audible while making phone calls and whatsapp call. The service is very poor. They doesn't even respond to the same. Seeing 1999₹ doesn't matches the expectation.

name: Vivek
title: Best Headphone
content: The OnePlus is Always Rock. 1. Best Blutooth Connectivity Upto 15 Meter No issues. 2. Best Mice Quality No Any issues when Calling Better Clear Voice. 3. Best Battery Backup I like. 4. New Features Magnetic Connectivity when each other earptip is connect with magnet The Phone is auto Disconnect. 5. Extra Added Volume Control button. 6. The Headphone Bass Quality Nothing Special

name: ajith
title: Comparing to realme buds
content: If you are looking for all latest features packed earphones then don't think go for it.. Comparing to realme buds. Build quality - realme best. Bass quality - realme best. Mid and lows - one plus best. Latency - one plus best. Battery - one plus. Usb C - one plus. Water resistant - one plus. Comfort - one plus for my ear type. Noise cancelling - Both doesn't have active NC but one plus sealed ear better than realme buds.. I have both realme and oneplus but honestly I like one plus for its low latency and balanced sound. Only thing I don't like is low bass and wire quality.

name: Srini
title: Getting too much noise in the call
content: I dont recommend to go for this if you're really needed for calls, it was working for few days after started the making noise in ongoing call. I just searched for resolutions in the one plus community and found so many people facing the similar issue. Also I did troubleshoot as suggested but issue is not resolved.. But the sound quality is good, my requirement is only for calls that too it supports noise cancellation

name: Akshay shukla
title: Budget, performance, connectivity,sound (all in one)
content: I am reviewing it after 5 days of use.. From so many days I was looking for a wireless earphone which is good in all the point like better backup, sound quality,built quality,andbluetooth connectivity and then I found one plus wireless bullet z and after using sometime I found that it is an awesome product , I thing it is better than realme buds and trust me this earphone are so good ,and guys I have no complaints about bass because it's base is normal not so high ,which gives you a better music experience, I enjoyed music a lot using it.. So guys if you looking for a good budget earphone so go ahead for one plus.

name: abhiram
title: Excellent earphones
content: Perfect earphones, didn't face any issues so far.. 1. Didn't face any audio latency issues while playing pubg.. 2. Microphone is good, didn't face any issues while making calls.. 3. Bluetooth is range is good, better than my ₹6.5k audio technica headphones.. 4. Quick switch feature is helpful.. 5. Battery recharges very very fast.. 6. I don't know much about sound quality, but its not bad. I'm satisfied with the sound quality.. Please note I'm using this with my OnePlus phone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good earphones but the mic quality is low!!
content: This earphone is good if you want to listen , for those who want to use the mic feature for attending calls from laptop or phone this is not good. Voice is not crisp and clear...it feels you are at some distance from the mic.... I would recommend it for those who want to enjoy songs and videos or watching movie/series. For that purpose the charge and battery life is way too good.. NOT Recommended for professionals who want to use it for important professional calls.

name: shreyash lavangale
title: The only gripe i have else full 5 starts for this awesom product
content: The only disappointment is when on voice call via Bluetooth the phone looses wifi connectivity as well as mobile data internet slowdown to the extreme. I guess this might have been happening because of frequency interference of this bluetooth and wifi or other radio channel. I also have Anker Bluetooth earphones which dont have this issue at all except that kts battery backup is not as good as oneplus z.

name: iftikar alam
title: Average kind of product.
content: There is issue regarding connectivity with different phones. It connects well with my OnePlus 5T but gives problems while connecting with my Vivo V5.. Ear buds are little slippery that tends to come out sometimes. Sound quality is okay kind of. Good for taking call but no good experience of music. Battery back is very good. Charging is fast & packaging is best in its class.. After using it for more than a week, I give give a rating of 3/5.

name: Deepak J
title: Good product
content: I use this primarily for office zoom calls. Haven't checked bass etc.. Good connectivity. Mic is good and am clearly audible in the meetings. Audio quality is excellent for meetings.. Extremely easy to switch between phone and laptop with a double press of a button.. Have been using for a few hours now. Haven't got discharged yet. Am happy with the battery life. Haven't tried recharging yet.

name: Verified
title: Best noise cancellation earphones!!!!
content: Reviewing after 48 hours of use. It’s a very good product at this price range as there is no point trying to save 200-300 bucks and regretting it later. The best part is it’s noise cancellation. It literally cuts off any surrounding sound. Call quality is crystal. This fit might be subjected adjustment of the spare buds that comes with earphones. Overall it’s winner

name: Srimon
title: Awesome product
content: I am a BOSE headset user.Obviously the sound quality is cannot be compared to Bose but for a headphone of this cost range is definitely worth buying.The bass quality could have been more better.. Best features :. 1.Batter life : Insane battery life.Charged for 20 mins and I am using it for 3-4 days with 3-5hrs use per day.. 2.magnetic on/off option is really cool.All you need to do is attach the two buds if you are not using.If you detatch them, the device automatically gets turned on.. 3.Quality during calls is really High

name: Nishant
title: Worth Buying.
content: So I recently purchased this product for my grandfather as he was always watching YouTube and WhatsApp videos on loud 🤪 Buying this product is one of the best decision of my life. The battery backup to sound quality it's just perfect. The system of switching on and off of the earphone is amazing it's very easy to use not only for us but as well as for the older generation too. It take only 15 to 20 minutes to get fully charged and he'll be using all day this earphone without any interruption.. And now I've ordered this for myself too and it is working amazingly and smoothly. Will surely recommend this to everyone.

name: SHUBHANKAR
title: DO NOT BUY THEM
content: One Plus Bullets Wireless Bass edition lacks everything.. 1. Battery :- they claim that the battery lasts for 10-12 hours, but in reality it only lasts upto 5 -6 hours. So if you are planning to buy them you will have to charge it repetitively. Also videos/songs don't play smoothly when the charging is low.. 2. Sound quality :- considering the amount you will be investing in buying these earphones, the sound quality is not so good.. noise cancellation is normal could have been better.. If the return window was still open, i would have chosen to return them.

name: jigyasa
title: Worth buying
content: After researching so many wireless earphones n reading all those reviews cz didn't know much about earphones I finally choose this to buy..n it really is a good deal for me at this price. + points-- fast charging, on n off by the earplug magnets (u can easily on n off it by it's magnets on earplugs, that is good for saving it's battery) good look, light weight, sound quality is good, sweat proof n I think splash proof too!! M using it since 1 week n I don't find anything wrong with the product till now n I hope it ll work nicely even after. I bought one for my friend too, he's also satisfied with it. Thank you Amazon.

name: Sahil S.
title: LOW LATENCY MODE IS NOT UPTO EXPECTATIONS
content: BEEN USING FOR STRAIGHT FOR 4-5 Hrs CONSTANT N YES IT IS HAVING A VERY GUD BACKUP ITS BEEN 24hrs N BATTERY IS STILL KICKING ABOUT SOUND ITS PRETTY GUD TO ME FOR A MUSIC & MOVIE STUFF WITH DECENT BASS. FOR GAMING M NOT SURE CAUZ THE VERY FIRST DAY I TRIED PUBG ON MY ONE PLUS 5 ITS LOW LATENCY MODE IS NOT UPTO THE MARK AS THE LATENCY GOES WAY HIGH N U CAN EASILY CATCH THAT. I ACTUALLY WENT TO SEE THE ONE PLUS COMMUNITY EVERY GUY IS FACING ISSUE WITH GAMING THOUGH THERE IS NO UPDATE TILL NOW BUT HOPE SO ONE PLUS GET IT SOLVED CAUZ HAVING A FEATURE WHICH DOESN'T WORK IS JUST USELESS

name: Avinash
title: My review will help for bike riders
content: OnePlus is good with the battery performance. But the reason I gave 3 star is that the ear tip of the earphones falls out from our ear and doesn't fit very good and when on bike if we keep the helmet the sound quality is not as much expected as it doesn't fit properly even if we use different all sizes of ear tip.

name: rahul unni
title: Amazing wireless earphones
content: This is the best earphones hand down at this price range, with amazing sound quality and an okayish bass but the noise cancelling is amazing, even when the device and headset volume is at around 60-70 % you won't be able to hear what's happening around you until someone makes a loud bang. The most amazing aspect of this earphone is the battery life, I charged it the first day and kept on using it every now and then and only had to charge it on the third day and yes it supports warp (fast) charging just 10 minutes will give you *10 hours based on your power consumption. 🤩✌️

name: Rajnish
title: Poor and harsh sound quality:  may damage hearing
content: The sound quality is simply unacceptable. Its pathetic. I am not even complaining about bass which is non existsent anyway. The sound is flat and harsh . My ears started paining in about 15 minutes usage and i could not wear it anymore.. The only good thing is connectivity speed . Connects within 0.5 seconds of decoupling tge magnetic earbuds..but sound is just unacceptable..

name: Rakesh
title: Good earphone with minor bug
content: Even though after full charge by OnePlus charger, it never shows the white light. Always red light is shown during and post 100% charging.. If we remove the power plug anf connect again it will show whilte light... Looks like a hardware issue.

name: Kedar Desai
title: Most reliable Headphones
content: I have already recommended this headphones to my friends and colleagues. These are best in the market at the price segment it is offered. The sound & bass quality is excellent. The best about these headphones is the battery life & charging time. I am using these headphones for past 5 days for strech of 10hrs & I have practically charged the headphones 3 times for just 10 to 15mins. I have never heard the message of battery low till now.

name: Jo
title: Call clarity and audio is worst can't hear a thing even with full volume.
content: The product i received was having a defects even with full volume for call. I can barely hear a thing what the person is speaking but the sound quality for song is ok. Compared to OnePlus old model worst product. I have returned the product still received a product which have the same defect bot sure if it's model defect itself. Worst experience. We are using for official purpose. But cant even use for any meetings or anything. Worst product and worst experience. I have tried connecting the same headset with different Mobile same problem i faced. So it's a product defect.

name: Pushkar Dingankar
title: IT'S SO GOOD
content: Thank you so much One plus for such lovely Wireless earphones..Bass is so deep ..Noice cancellation is amazing..one more thing i want to add don't use Bluetooth earphones for gaming (PUBGM CODM) becz if someone is firing on ur back or from other side u can't locate ur enemy location ..the sound u will hear it will be different..so use wire earphones or headphones during gaming ..else for listening music and for other use these earphones are best of best ..i am saying this becz i have seen many gaming streamers on PC or mobile they also even use Wire headphones or earphones

name: Kakarot
title: One plus do not give a damn about bass and comfort:(
content: Let me be very clear if u r going for it as it has a brand One Plus and the warp charging u would b a very much fool just like me. This useless earpiece has no bass ,sound signature is pretty decent though ,middleS are good ,at high sound it gets mixed up....Pretty uncomfortably for long time use ,battery life is more than u imagine but overall sound quality is not up to One Plus level.... If u confused find oppo enco m31 I assure u won’t regret ...

name: gurmit
title: No noice filter
content: Sound quality is good. Bass quality is also good. Battrey backup is very good. But there is no noice filter. When you in room then voice goes clear. But when you go to outside then listner listen only noice of traffic and other sound. You have to speak loud to clear talk in open area. Thats not good.. There is no cover on charging port.. If you are only music listner then this headset is wonderfull.. Its my request to oneplus company that improve noice cancelation. And if possible call me and change my headset.

name: akram sahabaz
title: Worth buying under 2K budget
content: This is one of the best ergonomic and power pack wireless earphone I have used in recent times.. Sound quality is better when compared to other wireless earphons under this budget and it provides a good noise cancellation feature.. The battery backup is absolute beast and with minimum 10 min charge, it goes for another day.. Connectivity on devices is smooth.. I have been using this for a month now and it's worth buying .. Either if you want it to attend calls during work from home or for entertainment purposes, it's an all rounder.

name: krishan meena
title: Powerful Bass and Premium Build Quality
content: I received My OnePlus Bullet Z Wireless Courier 8 hrs ago and in last 8 hrs i use it almost 5 hrs (Song listening in high volume ) and now battery is 80% so as per this calculation it will provide 20 hrs battery easily.as OnePlus Claims. Sound is Very Good and Bass is balanced So they provide the smooth experience as OnePlus Claims,I give 4.5 rating of 5.0. Build quality they come with plastic material not Mattel anywhere but look awesome and premium.. Low latency is not work in my Realme X, shooter sound comes late in camera app.. And Mostly I like to tell the connectivity of this OnePlus bullet z wireless which is very fast and easy to pare to any device................ I like it

name: Shreya
title: Okay :/
content: It's a nice try by one plus and I will say that they have succeeded quite a bit in it but I had to replace this product and after replacement I got a good one,with the mic working properly, although it's not very clear, sometimes the headset faces connectivity problems ....overall clear vocals but less bass, but a good deal if u like soothing music and stuff, battery life is a great pro.. Okay update: mic stopped working after a month but like everything else is fine...

name: AKASH
title: Ok for that price
content: Product is good for it's price but don't expect much from it. Build quality is good. Battery life is amazing I have never seen anything like this before. Talking about audio quality it is ok. Bass is there but not much. Don't go for brand name choose wisely.

name: Darpan Yashlaha
title: Very good product at this price
content: This is one of the best wireless earphones I have used. I mostly use 4-5 hrs a day and it works 4 days for me with a single charge. The sound quality is good however bass is not that good. If you like higher sounds, you might not like this product. Noise cancellation is good, however didn't get a chance to use it in crowded and noisy places.. It's an overall very good product at this price range. Worth buying it.

name: Mayank Gupta
title: Left earbud crackling...but overall is perfect
content: The right earbud of this was making crackling sound when u use it....in rock or party music u can't tell..but when u hear calm music....or a video of someone speaking.....then u can hear crackling sound... which is quite irritating. ..but overall...sound quality, bass and connectivity was top notch.......I got the defective one...it doesn't mean these r bad....NOOO... these are amazing..just waiting for new one .

name: Megha
title: Value for Money
content: I am using this earphone more than 1 week and its working perfectly the sound quality and bass is amazing. Ia ma using this earphone in redmi phones such as redmi note 4 and it's working good in redmi phones.. I am searching earphone 2 -3 months I found boat rockerz 255 but I little bit confuse then ilI found one plus headphone bass edition. I am using this earphone for online class and the battery backup is amaing and it takes charge in 30 - 40 minutes.. Without thing go for it if you bass lover and you need battery backup.

name: Jayalakshmi
title: Pocket friendly and punch bass
content: I bought this primarily to listen to music. And, it does a fantastic job at that.. 1. Loud volume. 2. Punchy bass (Maybe a bit much for some). 3. Excellent charge staying duration. 4. Fits the ear splendidly well. Can run with it.. 5. Pocket friendly. 6. User friendly buttons to pause, skip ahead, rewind back. I've taken very few calls using this. No latency issues so far.. If you are not too technical or particular about how the music should sound, and just want something good for listening to music, then this is a great buy.

name: Prachi jagtap
title: Good
content: I had charged it for 20-25min and its been 2 weeks now it’s still working on the same charge ..the battery is good.. For the shape of the earphone i din’t like personally I feel uncomfortable in the ear after wearing.. But overall good!

name: Demin
title: Connectivity issue
content: After going through good reviews I bought this but facing connectivity issues.. Very poor connectivity and uncomfortable to wear.. Look for better quality one even boat is better but I am feeling cheated lost my 2k money on Chinese brand..

name: Jyoti
title: Good package for the price
content: Overall its a good package. Lot of reviews are around bass being less ... but as per my view its just right ...... Pros. Battery life .....close to 18.5hrs on 1 full charge....charging time is 20mins on vooc charger. Cons. Lot of background noise when used for voice calls....there is noise cancellation but doesn't seem that effective.....

name: nikhil patekar
title: Really GREAT earphones at this price....One Plus has done far more BETTER job in this category!
content: If you are a casual user, who does multitasking and other day to day normal stuff and "if you are not a Sound Quality freak", then you can go for this earphones...with your eyes closed.. looking at the price range it's really great & worth it!. Overall performance is great. Terrific Battery. Good bass. instant device switching. fast charging. sweat proof. well I m not a gamer so havent used the low latency mode.... but its also available.... Overall this earphone is beast, all in one.... Go for it...& leave yours feedback aswell, after purchasing it...

name: Gazal G.
title: Just order it. Play pubg/receive calls/watch movies
content: Previously I buy skull candy wireless ear phones of rupees 3600 and now This around 2000 rupees. This is much better than skull candy and I love the magnetic connect disconnect function it will save both the batteries ear phones as well as your mobiles.. Simply I love these earphone

name: Ben Joshua
title: accesibility / handsfree experience use to be improved
content: Sound Quality: 4/5. Need to improve Bass and on highs.. Performance: 3/5. When separated gets connected within seconds. Switching between devices on double tap takes time to switch might take around 10-20 seconds. when connected to laptop, accessibility is very bad. can’t control the volume using function keys / laptop volume where we need to control volume using buttons that are there on the neckband. Thus, it is not a hand – free experience.. microphone doesn't work properly. Calls are horrible.. low latency functions are also good. When it comes to the cost.

name: srinathreddy
title: nt up to mark
content: Product: 3.5/5. first of all i almost used every earphnes as far ....in 2k budget there are lot more better than this one....as they mentioned bass its nt upto my mark when compared to others noise cancellation no way it doesnt have such thing as they mentioned, nd connectivity wz pretty good nd power on nd off wz good,. while call, if yu wearing skinny tight jeans nd riding bike yu may nt get clear voice while riding nd can hear disturbance more than yua voice....dats clear nd clean review. Delivery:. missed redcable bt later they replaced it 3.5/5

name: Meet soni
title: One of the best bluetooth earphone under 2k.
content: The overall sound quality is just amazing, vocals, music, bass everything is perfectly balanced, yeah the bass is not as thumping as in boat earphones in this price range but it is pretty decent.. The mic in it is good and no problem listening other side, so if want to take it for voice calls go for it.. Battery life is also very good, and quick charging is cherry on top.. Reviewing after 4-5 days so can't say much about durability but build quality is pretty good so hoping it lasts long.. So overall an amazing bluetooth earphone under 2k price range.

name: battineni gopi krishna
title: GO FOR IT
content: Sound quality is good don't expect to much bass, bass is decent. Quality of the band is good and comfortable. Quick switch and touch controls are working fine. Worth the price,. If u have 2000 price point go for it. Latency is very good. Battery life is humongous as one plus mentioned u get standby time of 20 hrs on a single charge👍👍

name: Neeraj
title: I m facing Sound problems
content: I m using this product from last 4 months n now its left earbud gives less soung as compared to the other one which is very disturbing . This product is still in warranty as I bought it in the month of august 2020 and today it’s 19th December , 2020 . Plzz help me I m very disappointed with this product . Every thing is good but within four months my earphones started giving me problems. It’s left earbud sounds very less as compared to the other one n I don’t know what should I do now . 2000/- ki cheez 4 months me hi kharaab hogai

name: Deepansh
title: Absolute steal for this price!
content: Have to say these earphones are as loud as my sennheiser Cx213 ans CX275s. •They are pretty loud with very good bass and are very comfortable with flexible neck strap.. • Battery life is so so good . Even a 5 min charge will have you go through the entire day.. •Switching between your laptop and phone is very easy with just 2 taps on the button.. •There are even better than the other earphones within the 3k 4k segment.. •Low latency mode in one plus fnatic mode will let you play pubg in a fairly easy way. You won't even notice any major latency .. Just go for it. It's no brainer!

name: hari g.
title: Decent Headphones, great battery, bad mic
content: Including this one I've purchased 3 of these in total , I'm sharing my honest opinion. This headset is a workhorse with ample amount of battery backup , quick charging and decent audio clarity, it is always around my neck and it connects quickly to the phone upon seperating the buds, the only drawback i could see is call clarity, it simply is bad. Indoors it's fine , outdoors it not very good. Overall we can manage with it. If you are looking for a headset for full time travelling use and casual music go for it. If you're primary looking to attend meetings and conference calls please check for other options.

name: Kumar K.V.
title: Clarity and Battery life superb, but Bass is average.
content: Sound clarity is superb.. suitable for making calls.. but not enough Bass to listen to music.. Bass is just as any earphones priced for Rs. 600... Battery life is also excellent.. with 10 minutes charge, you get 10 hours life... Buy this one for calls , but not for music.

name: Dhiraj Singh
title: Best bluetooth earphones in this range.
content: This is undoubtedly the best bluetooth earphones in this range..battery life and superfast charging makes it stand out,and i don't understand why people are reviewing that the bas is low, guys how much bass do you need..The sound on this earphone is very well balanced. I was doubtful about buying this after reading reviews telling bass is low but i am glad i went for it. Its awesome!

name: Vikramw
title: Good product in the price range.
content: My purpose of buying those headsets was mainly for attending meetings from home. And it is serving the purpose perfectly. Switching feature between last 2 paired devices is awesome. I can switch easily between phone and laptop. I am not much aware about notes, bass treble in music but overall music is also not bad. You can pay more for other options if you cannot compromise on those aspects in music.

name: Tapanish Goswami
title: Good budget headphone
content: The product is of good quality, however, there is some issues in the microphone. Until the you bring the mouth piece near your mouth, the other party could not hear you clearly. Or else you have to shout so that they can hear you clearly. The battery back up is the best, and also take a minimum amount time to charge up.

name: Satish Kr. Upadhyay
title: Good product at this price range
content: I got this product 2 days ago, was 80% charged and after using is around 2 day (6 to 7 hrs) it is showing 60%.. 1. Battery life is awesome. 2. Sound quality is good, don't expect more bass.. 3. Build quality is great at this price. 4. Pairing is simple and easy, I am using it with my oneplus phone.. 5. Microphone quality is good, don't expect noise cancellation.. In summary, good product at this price range.

name: kumar
title: It's the confusion burster review
content: I'm using it from 4 days and to be honest I'm very much satisfied by the battery backup of it. Build quality is average. Bass is not satisfying. Overall sound quality is good crisp instrumental vocals are so clear. Battery will last you about 15 hrs. But boom if you charge it with any of your charger for 10mins it will easily give u backup of minimum y hours. I used Xiaomi 10watt charger nd took me about 90-120mins to full charge but after full charge i can easily use it for 2 days. If you are confused in buying decision then you can ask me about your any queries on telegram @heyy2020. Hope this review will help you in making decision🤗

name: Syed Mohammad Ali
title: Value for money bullets 👌
content: The magnetic on and off feature is just amazing and the overall build quality is of good quality rubber. They can be easily carried in pockets too.. The sound quality is really excellent and clear and the call quality through these bullets is also Amazing.. The only con i feel is the bass is not upto the mark..but the crystal clear sound while listening music does the job done and covers the minor con.. It takes only around 20-25minutes to get fully charged and the backup it provides is just amazing.. the battery backup is 10-12 hrs on continues usage.

name: Paddy
title: Functions equals the form
content: It's battery just keeps going..! It never ends! And when you least expect, it's drained. But then, a 10 mins break from your show or movie or youtube video and you're good to go for another binge watch of whatever the heck you wanna watch!

name: Sonali
title: Worst ever
content: Worst product ever used in my life returning it third time in one week. Very big brand and doing these worst blunders in making thing. And not taking any actions on it as well. Very disgusting not acceptable. This was not expected from one plus

name: Pourav
title: Worth it!
content: Very good battery life like I never had a low battery signal an believe me when I say that I rarely charge my devices.... The sound quality was a big 8.5/10 not the best that I HV heard propably better quality one available but this is not a bad one it's totally a good quality. It's worth the 2000rs price tag as it offers great connectivity (not good for pubg or basic shooting games there is ofc a weird noise lag but if u HV a one plus phone.

name: Vipin Yadav
title: Disconnect automatically...
content: Today is my 4th day of using this wireless earphone... sometimes it gets disconnect automatically and i have to reconnect it manually.... If possible please arrange replacement of this product

name: AVISHEK MANNA
title: A Perfect Wireless Companion
content: The most lucrative deals are the smart features such as Fast Pairing, Switch Pair, Low Latency etc.... Battery is just beyond the expectation in terms of music as well as call, nothing less than 18 hrs. If i have to review about sound then i would say people who loves signature sound should go for One Plus Bullets wireless Z without hesitation, equally balanced and no distortion at high peak. Bass lovers shouldn't like the music experience as there is no punchy bass effect, but trust me that wont affect your music experience as the headset is equipped with 9.2mm audio driver.

name: Shubham
title: Battery good, Control malfunctioning within a month.
content: I have been using this product for one month now.. The best part was the battery no doubt.. However since past week the earphone is malfunctioning. For example my switching between device function is not working, Google assistant is opening randomly, volume is getting reduced.. Completely frustrating experience. Now i am being asked to go to customer service center but my nearest one is 150 km away and during this pandemic and lockdown it is a real trouble.. Won't be purchasing any OnePlus device anytime soon.

name: Anilkumar
title: Powerbutton flaw
content: This bluetooth is everything good no issues only issue is power button which is used to turn oon bluetooth that is the worst design the power button won't work properly and we have to press long time still won't start sometimes we have put charge and then turn on ideaign sound every thing good but only powerbutton issues I thrower box unable to replace it

name: visakh j nambiar
title: The worst customer service ever.
content: Keeps disconnecting from my one plus device. Recieved a defective item and have ordered for replacement like 5 times. But the delivery station keeps cancelling it. Now Iam stuck with a defective pair and loss of 2000rs.

name: Shubhneet
title: It is DEVINE
content: I rarely write reviews ... But this one has made me write one (using OP7). 1. Sound quality - 5/5. 2. Bass - 4/5 (it has that classy kind of base). 3. Noise cancellation - 4/5. 4. Comfort - 5/5. 5. Battery - 6/5 (yeh i know). 6. Instrument separation - 5/5. Verdict i had realme and oppo neck band bluetooth and compared to them this is DEVINE again i am using it with one plus 7 phone !!

name: Akhil
title: Best for this price point but lots to improve
content: Always been a oneplus admirer and user. Was using the first OnePlus bullets wireless before moving to wireless z.. 1. Feels build quality is cheap compared to previous bullets, maybe coz plastics are used instead of metal near earplug area.. 2. Many a times, when I switch to bluetooth while on call, I was not audible to the other person. Never faced such an issue in previous OnePlus.. 3. Call quality has definitely improved compared to previous bullets.. 4. The biggest reason I still would suggest this one is the battery backup. With full charge, I even got more than 20hours of usage.. 5. Long way to go in terms of audio quality. But still the best for this price point.

name: Karan Mantry
title: Not good in Google assistant
content: Mic is not that good. Google assistant doesn't work properly. If you are looking for use of Google assistant then spending 2k is a worthless decision. Wired samsung headfone provides better results in terms using Google assistant compare to this 2k worth OnePlus . Magnetic switch on off work too smart and accurate with no delay of time, bettery is a major pro of this stylish Black headfone. Type C port charging port charge it very efficiently with lesser charging time and more on backup time.. Mic is a bit issue one needs to think upon before rushing into the decision of have this 2k headfone

name: SURAJ
title: Good buy but not perfect
content: Sound Quality : Awesome .You get each beat clearly .. 2 weeks review :. Noise cancellation is also perfect .You hardly get disturbed by others while playing music .. Bass is also as expectations .. pr. Problem is with microphone ,. If microphone is little away from mouth then recepient is hardly able to hear you ,you have to kiss microphone and talk which noone would like to do .. Also it is quite bendy ,there should be a firmness ,this is one drawback I have noticed about ergonomic

name: Amazon Customer
title: The best wireless earphone for Oneplus Ecosystem!
content: I have tested the first bullet earphone from oneplus. I was not happy and not sure about v2. But this one is the best wireless earphone in 2k price range right now. There are mixed reviews regarding Bass. But it just great. You have many options to choose in the settings as per your requirement. Just started using it. It's very Comfortable to wear and it's very lite weighted. Regarding charging everone knows its great. 10Min- 10Hr is just insane. Extremely happy with the purchase. If you have OnePlus mobile just go for it. You won't be disappointed.

name: nakul
title: Worst product from OnePlus
content: I've been using phones since one plus one, and now on one plus 7t. Got these headphones from one plus 2 months back - sound quality was below par from the start, and now the battery also has given up. Charge doesn't last for more than an hour and it's a major struggle to connect bluetooth to a different device. Base models of seinheiser have much better sound and much longer life than this junk.

name: Nimish Hardikar
title: It's really Z utterly!
content: Just look at from a price point of view, it's so comfortable so the material they used it's really good and the build quality even!. Major thing is that the battery. It's really a damn big. Yeah this is if u look at the price.. Now let's talk about other things like a connectivity and sound quality. It's super connective with Bluetooth 5.0. You can pair 2 devices side by side and switch easily.. Now look at the sound quality! If ur a base lover this is not a good idea. Yupp base is midium bit low and high tones are really good.. Even mid tones are okaiysh.. So overall I am happy what I got. I won't tell u buy this unless u want it. 😁

name: Yogiraj G.
title: Best in the given price range.
content: I am really happy with this earphone. Works really well.. Pros:. -Super Fast charging with oneplus chargers.. -Switching between devices is very easy and fast.. -Excellent sound stage. -Sound quality is really nice. -Very low latency while playing games on oneplus phones. -Microphone quality is also very nice. -Range is good. I could use it flawlessly even from other room.. Cons:. -The bass is not very very strong. There is enough bass and can be improved using equilizer of phone.

name: Sudhir
title: Best bluetooth earphones in this budget...
content: Before buying this, I was little sceptical about the sound quality. As most of the reviews I saw said the bass is very low. But I had gone for it considering its compatibility with the OP device. Working seemlessly with my OP7. Sound quality and battery backup is excellent so far. The quick switch between the devices is a lifesaver for me as I use it with my laptop and mobile. If you are looking for a decent bluetooth earphones in the price range... Just go for it, you won't regret. And finally, thank you Amazon for delivering it way earlier than expected.

name: ARVIND KUMAR
title: Know before you buy.
content: It is a okay okay product not very good one for the following reasons:-. 1.voice legs a bit even in simple YouTube videos that too in a one plus phone.. 2.battry life is not as good as claimed by 1+.. 3.sometimes some problem occur in the connection.. 4. Connection range is not very good. For good connection you have to be in a room.. Other than this sound quality is nice.

name: Biswajit Giri
title: Best for oneplus devices, for other devices it may be a just another wireless earphone
content: What I liked: excellent pairing on oneplus devices. Low latency even it doesn't support aptx codecs. Connection was strong, never had any disconnection.. Battery life- insane two day battery. Ipx-55 rating.. Magnetic switch on and off. What is disliked. Sometime after prolong usage i have to take it off to give my ear some rest.. The buds tend to be little bit outward so while sleeping it it's uncomfortable to use.. Latency is seen in non oneplus device even my other device support AAC still there is latency.

name: suman
title: Good enough but bass is quite low
content: Everything is super cool, the earphone on off feature is very innovative but takes getting used to it.. Only thing I am very disappointed about and hence returning this product is the bass which is very2 low, my xiaomi Rs 399 earphones have better sound quality than this one, bass was a major deal brealer for me.

name: santosh singh
title: Totally waste of money, you are not gonna get any special feature in it.
content: This is totally waste of money..please don't buy this product. Let me tell you why;. 1.It doesn't start without completely charged.. 2. It has the worst range quality, it starts fluctuating even within a 3 meter or distance.. 3. It has nothing like a specialized bass quality.. 4.Noise cancellation is just okay.. 5. It takes more than an hour to completely charge and you have to wait for it untill its fully charged because it's not gonna work without it.... I ordered it after seeing many reviews but it's so much disappointing that most of them says that it's the best.

name: Anees Ct
title: Oneplus for 2k?????
content: Let me get straight in to the point .. You are buying a product under 2k so please don't expect out of the world bass.you get what you pay for.. So for a wireless headset at 2k price its got this Premium magnetic buds which connect (automatically if you have a Oneplus device) automatically after the manual connection.. That premium feel is felt in the build quality and the spund Quality .. You can hear every notes of the music.. For a daily driver i think its just Perfect.. I recommend on buying it if your don't give primary importance to bass.If you do so,Kindly stop looking here and Go Find Another Product.

name: Aanchal arora
title: Stoped working in three days. Not powering on
content: It not powering on. At first I thought batter issue but I had already charged it fully. It was working fine untill now all of sudden it stopped working. Disappointed with one plus. M using one plus 7 t mobile and it's amazing but headphones are cheap and worthless. We can't get refund also they just send another replacement. I have opted for replacement as I don't have choice. M an honest buyer so pls check reviews while buying. It's been three days only till I bought this

name: Mohit Tyagi
title: Great connectivity ,good sound but not for bass lovers
content: 1. Build quality is good.. 2. Connectivity is best it connects to laptop/phone with in 1,2 sec.. 3. Battery life is also good as it got off after connecting both earbuds.. 4. Sound Quality is also good.. 5. but but the bass is not enhanced as per my opinion.. 6. I am a bass lover and used boat rockerz 255 which gives great bass, it's bass cannot be compared with boat bass.. 7. Finally I returned it and bought boat rockerz 335 for great bass.

name: Chandan Kumar
title: Best neckband in 2k
content: Oneplus always keep thier brand value... Great product than i expected.. Last 4 years i really happy with oneplus family and this wireless z is great product and unbelievable battery life and value for money. If someone seeking for a bluetooth earphone, go for oneplus bullet wireless z... Good quality and its very easy to use and magnetic control function very nice... Thanks for this product and very good packing superfast delivery even during this situation.. hats off oneplus and Amazon... Cheers

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good one.
content: After so much research I decided to go with this earphone. I can tell you that I am not disappointed. Good battery back up almost two days of 12 hours a day use. Sound quality is also good. People are giving negative review because of low bass but for me the bass is quiet ok. Due to extra long mic the voice receiving is also good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: A long time awaited dream product for me!
content: I have been using it for connecting it in two devices, my laptop and mobile.. * Produces a seamless transition while switching between two devices. * Many people reviewed that the bass effect could have improved, but in my point of view it seems to be good enough. * Quick charging facility & viewing battery status are some awesome added advantage for this product. * Switching device on & off is really easy!

name: Divyansh
title: Amazing enough to make a lazy person write a review
content: This has been my first review for any product, I have been using these earphones for past 18 days. I couldn't be more happier with these earphones. The details about the battery backup are absolutely true. I have been putting these things on test everyday by binge watching series and pc games. Also, there were reviews regarding the sound clarity so just to clarify I will make a point. The quality is upto the mark for a normal user(person not too much into feeling every features of sound like bass, treble, etc in a song). They do lack some bass crunch as I tested on bass boasted songs but otherwise they are perfect for any normal user.

name: RG
title: Super quality awesome pricing
content: Product is good. Mic quality is also good. I am using for mobile and teams calls both and person at other end is comfortable and is not getting distortion or noise.. To switch between multiple mobiles or mobile + laptop just double tap the button on neckband.

name: Johny Pittappillil
title: Best product in the range with best in class battery
content: The product is one of the best in the price range. Pros. Light Weight. Battery Life. Fast Charging. Comfortable. Can easily switch between two connected devices by tapping one switch. Magnetic Switch on/off. Cons. Noise reduction is not good at all

name: Aniket R. Walekar
title: Superb headphones 🎧
content: Its a very good quality product bye one plus... All sections of music 🎶 ..it manages all of them very cleverly.. bass, treble, lows highs all are so smooth,,, noise cancellation is perfect... Connectivity is just beyond limits.. it remember ur device.. as soon as u free the buds it gets connected automatically.. nd u r going to use to fot this feature... Its really easy nd helpful feature... Battery life is so good... Fully charged ? U dont care about where u r nd have u got the charger or not.. its that longer...

name: Shankar
title: Worth for money
content: I bought this especially to connect with my laptop and mobile in parallel and it works like a peach.. Just double clicking the button would do thejob for me.. Connectivity with my oneplus 6 is lightning fast.. The sound is decent for the price and the product looks durable.. Overall it satisfies my need.

name: Rahul Chandra
title: Excellent product 👍 in medium budget
content: Excellent I have been using since 3 days, charging was really good👍 sound quality is ok compare to others, with in 10 minutes 100% charging it's really awesome, I loved♥️this product with medium budget,don't compare with hight budget headphones, In mid-range it's really good go for it.. noise distrubance is not up to mark, bass quality is ok.

name: Utkarsh Jaiswal
title: Awesome wireless earphones with great battery life!!!
content: Got the blue version, great look. The wires quality are okay...okayy...but the sound quality is awesome with a great battery life. Battery life also depends on which song you listen. But they are best for gaming at this price.. Comfortable design.. Must buy if you are using a OnePlus phone!!!

name: Sejal Arora
title: Just wow
content: Hi guys i bought this earphone in july 2020 and i am writing this review after using it for one month.. I am no expert on earphones i only needed it for day to day tasks like watching movies playing games or calling. From the above mentioned tasks i think they are the best earphone you can buy for 2000 bucks.. The best thing about these bluetooth earphones is it's battery performance. You will just love it,Its the best in this segment. Sound quality seems very nice (as i am no audio expert) great design and type c port. Overall rating would be 10/10

name: VenkateshChandra A
title: MIC Stopped working after 20 days of use
content: it's been 20 days, since i got this product(one Plus bullets wireless z) and today the mic stopped working. the quality of the sound is ok, battery is also good. but there seems to be an issue with the mic. i have gone through online forums there are many people who are facing the same issue bare this in mind while taking this product.

name: Arulmurugan
title: Awesome product from OnePlus
content: Awesome product by OnePlus.. I don't know why many people are complaining about low base .. I never felt that low base issue .. Sound clarity was so good with very good base effect.. just go for it without having second thought.. I think people complaining about low base issue may be due to they are not increase volume level in the headphone .. initially I am also think that low base problem when the volume is full in the Mobile .. once I increased the volume level in the headphone to the maximum till the warning beap sound came no problem noticed with the base.. overall decent product from OnePlus ..

name: Tinkesh
title: Quality Issue....
content: I am a loyal customer of 1+ mobiles and that is the reason I was inclined to buying this earphones. To my surprise the quality of the product was not as expected. The 1st pc that was delivered to me had mic issue which was then replaced by another pc which had connectivity issue. And finally I had to return the pc back and plan to go for some other brand. Very disappointed with the brand and hope it take cares of quality issue in future...

name: JitendraNathGuptha
title: Not at the range of one+,OK quality
content: Sound quality is good up to70%, beyond it causes severe headache. Tangle buds are not at all working in my Bluetooth, even it is not connecting to mobile when buds get separated and not working for call answering too, this the worst thing in this device, you click answer from the mobile. Bass is good but not pleasent. Clarity is average

name: Makarand
title: Great product but Poor Microphone!
content: Excellent Battery life! Great Sound Experience but a very poor microphone. Maybe I have a defective product which needs to be replaced or maybe it "it is" what "it is". The whole deal is what I took this headphone for microphone and battery life but with microphone issues really left a bad taste. I really hope I get either refund or a replacement.

name: rohith
title: Awsome products
content: ONEplus was amazing brand. The bullets was awesome. I purchased both OnePlus 8 and OnePlus bullets total the cost is 52k. The product was really good . Sound quality also super bass and phone call everything is good. In this main features is ... When the speakers was attached automatically it will trun off again u remove it will power on and if u have OnePlus device this earphone was perfect with in 2sec it connect to ur OnePlus phone. Guys the product was awesome good

name: veer
title: Not best buy for music Lovers
content: It's been three weeks after using these wireless earphones. What I want to tell u is that the build quality and design are great. The bluetooth connectivity is also hassle free without any effort. The only problem lies in audio quality.. U will be dissappointed while listening songs, it feels like u are listening song by a cheap road side earphone.. It can be best used for wireless calling. I won't recommend you if you are looking for a quality sound earphone.. Either go for wired one or some other earphone.

name: Satish Kumar
title: 10 Minutes charge is all we need
content: What a product. Good quality, great sound and really like the fast charging feature. Its very light and all the features are superb. One should definitely buy this over other HeadPhones. Battery life is awesome and recommend for this alone. Sound is decent, but bass could have been improved.

name: Grishma
title: Best in its class
content: Great all purpose all day long headphones. Battery is so good that I forget when I charged them last. Sound is loud and clear, so much that I use it while vaccuming and can't hear a sound. Best part is my husband owns the 6,000 Rs headsets by OnePlus and these perform better than those. It's nice to see look on his face when he uses these headphones and compares to the ones he owns.

name: Nikhil
title: Best in market
content: Disclaimer : using it on my oneplus phone. Writing this after 1 month use. This headsets works pretty cool with music , game , calling.. Bass is not soo good but not so bad.. Comfortable as hell , no irritation for long use.. Gaming is best with oneplus device.. But size is big as i feel , neckband could have been lill shorten.. Go ahead if u r confused with others in this range.

name: Sri Sourya
title: Don't make a mistake like me!!
content: The sound clarity was excellent when I heard it on high volume but when the volume bar is midway or low we can't hear soft trebles or low basses like background music while watching a film which is frustrating. If we hear high volumes for long periods severally causes hearing loss. So if you wanna get an earphones go for bullets 2(around 5k) or something from other brands which are exclusively audio equipment manufacturers not like one plus. But if you are seriously okay to listen at high volumes(that's only when they work perfectly) and get hearing loss, then go ahead and buy. Between I'm an one plus 7 user.

name: KD
title: Must buy for regular user
content: If you want earphones for regular use this is it.. I dont have much knowledge about bass and high and lows or other terms of music.. If you are like me then you will like this product.. Fulfills basic needs plus high quality material used. Plus point battery life . Within 10 min it charges and goes on 4-5 days with 2-3 hrs of daily use.

name: Rohan Sharma
title: Just needs Equalizer adjustment
content: I was really disappointed with the sound quality. I am an ardent oneplus fan, I have 4 OnePlus devices, I couldn't believe OnePlus headphones can be such crap.. So I went to the settings>sound and vibration>Dolby Atmos> Equalizer. Increased the first bar to max and second bar to medium. Then the sound quality became amazing!. If you have any doubts, do this, you will return and thank me

name: Amogh
title: Decent earphones
content: Received it today. Thanks to Amazon for one day delivery. The sound quality is very good. Bass is good but not too high. If you're a bass lover you need to look for other earphones. I'm impressed with the battery backup and sound quality (supports AAC). The latency is very low in pubg Mobile, as good as wired (My phone supports BT 5.0). I felt OnePlus could've used better quality for the wires. Anyway, overall my experience is satisfying.. I'll update my review after few days of usage.

name: Sonal
title: Great product
content: Excellent product. Very light weight with clear audio. Excellent for use both during workouts and meetings. Quick bluetooth connectivity and mobile phone compatibility, especially if you're also using a OnePlus phone.. Only drawback is that the cables are a little too long and dangle a bit. Value for money and overall it's worth it.

name: Mapre
title: Annoying Product
content: Worst quality.. Frequently disconnected.. Extra noise always heard during calls.. I have replaced 2 headset and both of them are so bad.. Initially I thought it was a defective product but the replacement also had the same issue.. now I finally requested for refund..

name: Ruqaiya
title: If you love music and love games, don't buy this!
content: I have been using it for 7 days and below are my reviews:. 1. The battery backup is amazing, you can use it for 2-3 days straight all the time, and it gets charged very very fast.. 2. Look and feel is really good. Stylish design and soft.. 3. Latency mode is the worst here. You get a delay of around 300-400 ms while playing Pubg or Ludo in One plus devices. You can think about non one plus devices now. Don't buy it if you are a pro gamer.. 4. Sound quality is pretty good and it is loud. But base is 0, the worst base i have seen in my life.. 5. Noise cancellation is nice in these earphones.

name: Sandeep
title: Great but not as wired CX 270
content: Well it's definitely a great wireless earphone. Great sound & easy to use. But if u r confused between CX 270 or this one then CX 270 wired set is better at least in Mi devices. Because Mi devices has this build in awesome sound effects system which can only be used by Wired headsets. So wireless not supported. Overall it's definitely bass heavy.

name: Srinivasa Rao Doddapaneni
title: Amazing battery backup and sound quality.
content: One of the best earphones I used. Good work OnePlus. At 2000rs this is the best earphones ever. You will get several new features where you can switch from one device to other device easily. Coming to battery backup, OnePlus Z earphones has amazing "battery backup" in the history of earphones ever. For total charge user can experience 20Hrs of non stop playback. Very well satisfied 👍.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good but compatibility issue on redmi note 4
content: There was problem over voice calls on my redmi note 4.. the voice on the calls kept fluctuating and breaking ... even afer resetting my bluetooth connection I faced the issue... At the end I had to return....

name: Mahesh Deshmukh
title: Do not buy
content: Listen to me, please donot buy, it had proved how china make product are. Within 10 days my earphones stop pairing with mobile, now unable to use, it is loss of money.

name: Hemant Shah
title: Good product
content: I am iphone user.. I had used airpods too.. In wireless buds things I observed.. : Bluetooth range is good. : battery backup. : fast charge. : 2-3 time it got bit wet also in rain. With working.. Ya sound is not being compared with airpods but not bad also. I am happy to use it.

name: Sana a.
title: BEWARE OF FRAUDULENT ACTIVITIES
content: The first time i ordered i have got nonsealed and damaged incorrect cheap product..i was very annoyed..later i ordered replacement and got the sealed one which is quite decent...check the seal and product aswell before accepting coz the box was original but the inside product was wrong and cheaap quality..
