BEWARE OF FRAUDULENT ACTIVITIES

name: Preetham
title: Please don't buy
content: Guys I used it for 4 days and I can't believe it's mic not working people from other side barely hear anything and the buttons stopped working can't pick the call can't increase or decrease the volume and I don't think it's a genuine products I am asking for a refund as I don't want to do anything with OnePlus anymore just go for better bluetooth like samsung u flex or something else please don't buy it even it is not worth the money

name: pratik macwan
title: Misleading, Not completely sweat resistant, I don't recommend to use while running.
content: My product stopped working on 20 th day. This is not sweat resistant at all. This is completely misleading. It may be resist the water to certain extent but not sweat. If you're a runner, I just don't recommend to use it while running. It is just matter of time for it to stop working. You could use it while walking or maybe in the gym as well. But i don't recommend it for runners!

name: Yogendra
title: Stop working in 24 hour
content: This is my first OnePlus buy. All sound, build quality ok but stop working with in 24hour🤔.. Amazed! My bad luck or manufacturing quality issue. Hope replacement pic will work atleast one year.. So far I am using Sony bluetooth earphones for last 2yr no complain. Even no wear tear.

name: Vishal Tambekar
title: Go for it!!!!
content: I was planning for realme buds q but I came across this and its way more worth than that.. The connectivity, product quality is too good.. Please dont look for that 2K tru wireless buds they will not give u a full long day battery as compared to this as it promises to give 3-4 days full backup. So satisfied with the sound quality and who is saying the bass is insufficient, its totally balanced. Whoever looking for too much bass go buy the 400 Rs boat...

name: Bhomick Chouhan
title: Highly Recommended, worth it.
content: Writing this review after 15 days of usage.. Crystal Clear Sound.. Treble and Bass were balanced.. Good Bluetooth range and no connectivity issues at all.. Massive battery backup with in 10 -15 mins of charging.. Magnetic switch is fabulous, switch over time is 3 seconds.. Calling quality is excellent, no disturbance on the other side of calls.. Various attractive colours specially this mint one has something uniqueness.. Built quality is too good which gives us premium quality and great experience.. I would say it is the best earphone to go with and I guarantee you will not regret it.

name: CHIDAMBAR JOSHI
title: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z! Best buy for overall build and quality but compromise on bass!
content: No bass at any level of sound volume!. Disappointed with the one plus!. Disconnecting on conference calls frequently!. That's a one day review!. Returning on second day!

name: jismon T.J
title: Battery back up and fast charging and sound clarity
content: Amazing product at a rate of 1999, The main thing is it's battery backup one plus is true to its word , i dot the 20 hrs battery backup after the first full charging this earphone came to zero percent charge only after the 4th day of using and the charging time is also an important factor it charges from 0 to 100 % in around 45 mins of time and the sound clarity is excellent and noise cancellation is superb There is latency in this earphone i don't recommend it for gamers the sound is coming late like half of a second after the actual sound happening in games. That is the only negative point I've encountered after one weeks usage

name: Vinayak Vashistha
title: Good for everyday use just a bit lacking in voice quality for good music.
content: One plus bulletz is a nice value for money wireless earphones. It has good aesthetics, good backup, fast charging, very easy switching between devices. And, it's magnetic on/off feature is also very convenient as you are not wasting battery when you are not actually using it but have it connected to your device.. There is one con as well though, voice quality is not as amazing. It's good for calls and even for watching videos but you might find it lacking when it is about deeply enjoying music and movies with good sound.. But overall it's a nice buy.

name: Abhishek
title: For good bass go with realme
content: Although the package was good delivery was in time but when opened the box the earphone was not properly in its mould the wires were bent(,zigzag) sound quality was not so good compared to my realme buds which I use now .in this price segment now competitors are more OnePlus have to work more on bass.i want to buy another model of real me after using this wireless Z .just for information OnePlus use 11mm drive unit so that more bass and sound is generated because I can hear the outside sounds at full volume although service of Amazon is good . hope refund will be quick.

name: AMAAN KHAN
title: Very Good Battery life..
content: First off all... 1. Good Battery.. Very long life.. have only charged 2 to 3 times since purchase. 2.No Noise Cancellation.. 3.Latency issues (lag) if you are using devices other than ONEPLUS... 4. Balanced Bass Not to high Not to low... Personally i don't feel any bass very less bass in my experience. OVERALL ----- easy fit...very good material easy to wear no pain or discomfort ... only thing i love about it is battery life.. long Battery

name: abhijit
title: Awesome deal.🔥
content: Excellent product....saw some reviews regarding bass quality...it is a bit on the lower side but not a big deal I personally like good bass and I am quite satisfied with it's base quality but yes it could have been more...audio quality is extremely good for the price point...build quality is also great...no latency issues....overall it is a great product definitely recommended...☺️

name: onkar
title: not happy with the sound quality
content: I am giving it a low rating because of its sound quality. The kind of quality we expect from 1+ product is very high. its lacking bass and little clarity too. Although the battery backup and fast charging features will amaze you and so is the range of connectivity, else its a nice product with much needed enhancements with its sound quality.. p.s. For those who may contradict the above fact and quote that it works great with 1+ phones must need to know that i am using one plus 3t and the review is on the basis of what i have experienced.

name: Ekagra
title: Quick Review
content: : Magnetic switch for turning on and off is really cool and easy.. : Battery life is really really good.. : Low latency mode is awesome (works on OnePlus phones with fnatic mode only) even without low latency mode latency while gaming is really low.. : Build quality is Good.. : sound quality is OK but if you are a basshead then you u should not probably go for these as bass is not very high but its Ok for daily usage.. I have a OnePlus 7T and it works like a charm with with it🔥🔥

name: Niral
title: Good product. Can go for it.
content: Good sound quality. Bluetooth reaching is also good. I liked the product. Soft rubber material so it is not heavy on my shoulder. Not a perfect product to hear songs because the bass is very low. Otherwise, it is good to use. Added qualities like fast charging and quick device switching are there and I am yet to check on these qualties. Overall I will give 8/10 rating

name: Prakhar
title: Good for Regular Purpose...!!!
content: Product built quality is excellent so don't worry about it.. Battery & charging is exactly same as claimed by OnePlus hence it adds up to its plus points.. Connectivity is also hassle-free and very smooth.. Mic is BEST among all the earphones available in this price range.. Bass is little bit low side.. For pro music listeners.... The natural sound may be felt overcome by the music.. Overall if you need it for regular purpose, it's a sure shot GO by my side as OnePlus is giving maximum what one can purchase in such price...!!!

name: Vikas Tamakuwala
title: Good Product
content: Overall good product. Battery life is good and easy to connect option between device is really helpful. If you are working through laptop and mobile simultaneously. Sound quality overall ok. And connectivity is also fine, One can easily hear from other room so no connectivity loss.

name: sanket
title: Battery life is not 17 hours
content: i like this earphones due to its looks,light weight,C type charging port,good battery life than real me buds etc.. but i think in case of battery life i am not quite satisfied with what thay have written in specifications,they say battery life is 17 hours but as far as i counted with my redmi y3 phone( by playing video and audio both )which has bluetooth 4.2 it was around 10 hours but not 17 hours,so i am totally disappointed with that 17 hours specifications.although 10 hours is not bad but remove that specifications that is has 17 hours of battery backup.

name: LIBIN THOMAS
title: Another one plus masterpiece
content: Absolutely amazing.Great battery backup and as an embellishment to it, it gets fully charged within 30 minutes. Good for calls and watching media..though bass is a bit low..Apart from that, everything is perfect.

name: Sagar
title: Nice backup it average quality sound
content: I have been using since a month... Backup is very nice.. Sound quality is just fair, not very good.. Built quality is good.. TypeC charging isvery nice.. Quick charge is really good. Gives nice backup for just 5min charge.. Sound quality is low and bass is very very less.. When the device isturned on, the sound is tooohighwhich is irritating.

name: Sayantan M.
title: You can't get better choice than this at this price point
content: Very good product, Sound quality is great, well balanced, vocals clarity nice, loudness great, and all mids, lows and highs are also well balanced.., build quality very good and charging time is just 20 mons and back up is also great,. Cons- There is no as such cons in this device but one thing that I feel that it's not comfortably fit in ears, the size of the ear-cup a little bit bigger but the weight is not heavy its light weight, but not very comfortable at all... At last, it is a must buy product at this price point...

name: Amrit kumar
title: Best Bluetooth earphone in the price range
content: I haven't used many Bluetooth earphones but i have to say OnePlus bullet wireless z is one of the best. I paired it with my OnePlus 7 Pro and it works flawlessly. Battery life is mind-blowing. I have been using the earphone for like 4 hours now and still it is showing 80% remaining. Music quality to is quite good at least much better than my wired Seinheisher earphone. Bass quality is good too for an earphone. Noise cancellation is ok. Conclusion: absolutely fantastic buy for money i paid. And thanks to Amazon for a great delivery

name: VIJIN
title: Change Bud size, you can feel the wonderful bass and details
content: Excellent product. Was little worried on reading reviews here about not so good bass. But it is not true at all. By default, the bud size is one less than the normal size. But if you change the whole story changes.. Excellent bass. good low and mid-tones. It's worth buying. The battery back up is also good. Quick charge is superb for daily use.. Excellent product for this price. I am using this for more than a month. Really satisfied with the experience.

name: Akshay Goel
title: Good product. Only issue is the mic
content: Been using this product for over 2 months now. As a whole it's an awesome product. Only issue is the mic sensitivity. The mic is too sensitive. If you are driving or in open environment the mic picks up the background voices too much. Some time it becomes difficult for the person on the otherside to listen to your voice.

name: Hitendra Singh Baghe
title: Buy it but don't buy it from Amazon.
content: The product is very good but don't order it from Amazon as they have been fooling you all around... I've ordered one plus z bullets wireless.. Initially it was very good but after 1 month it's not working any more..Now it's unable to connect via bluetooth..I tried to contact Amazon customer care about this issue they are literary the worst customer care service I ever had they just told me that can't do anything about this problem..So I would guide you all from my personal experience that buy this product it's very good,but don't buy this product from Amazon...

name: Sisir Kattempudi
title: "Bass" Edition?
content: Can't imagine what the bass is like on the regular, non-bass edition. I can hear the bass on these, but only faintly. Slightly disappointed. The drums are kind of annoying and in-your-face; so, watch out for that. If you are sound-sensitive, you may not like loud drums too much. Of course, there is always an equalizer option.. Okay, technology-wise, it's great! It connects pretty quickly to devices. Although, the LACK OF QUICK CONNECT BUTTON is also disappointing.

name: Manish Kumar Chaudhary
title: Satisfactory
content: A decent budget earphone..with a long battery if ur expecting a powerful punchy bass then might get disappointed.. Mids and high r decent..not painful to ear even after continuing for several hours..easy to connect .... Overall..far better than other wireless earphones in this price range..go for it without any doubt if u r okay normal bass

name: peer mowhid mustafa
title: Common man's Review
content: It has a good bass,sound quality is awesome,battery life is Awesome,Mic is working properly even at noise places too,Build up quality is pretty good.. You get a tune when you gt a call but not vibration,so you need to keep them in. Magnetic on,off.. Cons:-. No vibration when you recieve a call on your Phone like in Samsung Level , Light blinks all the time when it is connected so it will b lil bit irritated at night but by putting a small strap of tape on that it can b resolved .

name: Selvaganesh
title: Worthy for 1899 rs, Good bass, battery back up , fast charging and design. Go for it.
content: Earlier I used boat rockers. In boat, bass and sound quality was too good. Call quality also good. Approx 2 year , I used. The only negative is charging time, boat will take 2+ hours and only 6-8 hours in medium volume we can use.(time depends upon volume).. Now let's come to one plus, firstly charging is awesome. Next Bass quality is excellent. Battery backup also good. After 2 months of usage, it will last minimum 10-12 hours.. And finally , the comfortable fitting in the ear and design is soo good.. For 1899 rs, this one is worthy.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No words just wonderful
content: WOW. Just Wonderful i loved it At the very sight of the packing The content is wonderful.. Sound quality is excellent. Feel of the product is Nice. I liked the small charging cable given along. Thanks Amazon for a early delivery .

name: VIJAYAKUMAR N
title: Bass could've been better
content: For the price you pay 2k this headphones 🎧 is pretty decent. The driver used here is aroud 9.2 mm instead OnePlus could have offered 10 or 11 mm for better bass so that for music lovers it could've been satisfactory.. Call connectivity is good and switching between the devices using the tap button on the left side works well. Bluetooth range is pretty decent. It's a good one in this price range.. This bullets z is not for all but people who need hands free calling during work from home and gamers it's good.. Overall 3.5 / 5

name: Rahul Mehta
title: Mice issues otherwise Ok Ok simple 🎧...
content: sound is good.. but mic is very bad quality output always u have to talk much louder otherwise our friend have to use 🎧......😢😰 it's not comfortable if u put it for more than 2 hours because of weight, size and structure near to ear.. two months before i perched this handset for call (office purpose) now again I'm using wire earphones. 1. good paints are good battery backup and fast pairing. 2. sound is good but batter then sony wire earphones. 3. i used realme also there mic quality is good and bass is very good but vocal sound is not clear. 4. After using this product I'm not much exited about 1+

name: Yogendra S.
title: honest review from a music lover
content: first of all i want to tell u before order it i m very confused to buy it or not becoz everyone said that it has no bass nd i m music lover so i want to make my decision carefully.. but i finally orderd it becoz as of now no earphone available in this prize range with this kind of batery backup.. now i m listening songs in this earphone nd believe me bass is almost perfect guyz u would not get dissapointed guaranted.. nd this earphone is so sterdy its well built so it can last long too.. u can buy it go ahead..

name: Vikas Rohilla
title: Amazing Purchase
content: This review i was posted after 1 week using this 1+ bass editions neckband. It's sound quality is awesome bass effect also awesom then call audio quality also super when i receive this project it was 100% changed i was used more then 4 days in this neckband using audio and video player per day i am used 3 hrs approximately after 4 days i god 40% of remaining charger. i changed this neckband with in 10 minutes its fully charged. its worth for money.

name: Argha Kamal Ghosh
title: OnePlus value for money Bullets Z🔥🔥
content: Pros.. 1. Nice Build quality. 2. Nice Sound clarity. 3. Noise cancellation. 4. Light weight. 5. Good amount of battery backup. 6. Fast charging system. Cons.. 1. Plastic built. 2. I expect a little bit more bass(Thogh It varies person to person)

name: Sandeep A
title: Worth the cost
content: Works well with Android 9/10 and PC. Toggling between devices can be cumbersome sometimes, especially when switching to a "non android" devices/PC. Good to excellent sound quality. Comfortable when jogging or walking.. Battery life and time to full charge are the best features. Overall good value for money.

name: Sai Sandeep
title: Microphone is not working properly when connected to laptop and proceed in calls.
content: Not satisfied with mic functionality in the device. When connected to laptop and participate in a Skype call, exactly after 15mins microphone in the earphones set is getting disabled.Even though I am able to listen to what others are saying, the other person is notable to hear my voice after 15 minutes of the call... Not sure why itbis happening though.

name: Ayush
title: connectivity issue
content: Get it on september 5 2020.. use it almost 15 hour a day since 5 sep to 8 sep,sound quality is average and noise cancellation is outstanding but many time around 20-25 it disconnected automatically with. out any warning and also some time no sound come at all. left side produce slightly more sound than right one.. .charging speed and battery power are outstanding.. bluetooth connectivity isnot that good and some time it struggle to connect so have to reset it.. in my opinion instead of it go to real me wireless earphone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: my honest review of this product
content: i dont generally review any product bt this product is truly remarkable in the budget.. 1- sound quality is good,bass could be better.. 2- battery back-up is really awesome. 3- no problem in connectivity. 4- latency- i hardly noticed any latency u can actually play pubg with these.. 5-built qulity is good.. these are the best headphones undert 2-3k hands-down.

name: Varun Sharma
title: Unreliable bluetooth connectivity
content: Doesn't connect reliably. I tried this with multiple devices at my home, unfortunately the device has poor bluetooth connectivity and we have to be really lucky for it to work.. We tried calling the customer support, unfortunately not able to connect to them as well :). Stay away from this product, both the product and technical support and unreliable and cannot be trusted.

name: George Eapen
title: Functional Bullets.
content: Good product just a couple of days old. Time will tell of it will maintain It's performance. Bought the "Bullets" because I am a contented user of 1+ Two Mobile for the last 5 years, despite the rough handling.. The purpose of this earphone is more for speaking than listening to music. It switches between phones also seamlessly. The music is enhanced but seems to lack the bass punch, which for a middle aged person may be appropriate and therefore no complaints.

name: Ahamed jalaldeen
title: Good built quality and connectivity..
content: Fast delivery. Good product at this range of price. Sound quality is good. Long hours battery life also good.. But. Never settle logo is missing at package inside the box.. Important:. After using 3 days left ear is paining. Right side is okay. Left side not fitting to ears also..

name: Sachu
title: Mind blown
content: I was stuck between Realme Buds Wireless and Oneplus Bullets Z. There were a lot of videos about how great Realme was in case of bass. But i still preferred OnePlus because of the battery life. Turns out the bass of this one is pretty great and has amazing sound quality for the price. Definitely recommend this to my anyone who has a budget of 2k. Trust me you will not be disappointed.

name: RAVINDRA JAIN
title: Good
content: The quality of the microphone is too good and battery life is also very good with magnetic controls and fast connectivity. But I am disappointed because the colour(Oat) is chose looks like white in pics but when received , it was dirty white which was looking too bad...(returning it). Otherwise the quality, price, comfort is the best...

name: Soumya
title: Spectacular!!
content: This is what a value for device look like.. 1.Brilliant looks(mint color). 2.Awesome sound(don't compare with higher priced sony/jbl or one plus bullet itself). 3.Brilliant battery life. Charging speed is insane.... At 2k,buy it!

name: himmatlal bhanushali
title: Best for calling, not for music lovers
content: Good product for calling, noise cancellation is better, bass is avarage,build quality is excellent, batter drains fast, if you want for only listen music than don't buy this product

name: Vinay Prajapati
title: Good Product but facing some connection issue during calls. Rest all is good.
content: Using it for almost 3 weeks now. No issue faced. Oneplus should have had given 2 devices connection or a toggle switch to do the same.. Also my bluetooth gets disconnected whenever i am on call for a few seconds and then connects again. Similar thing happened once when i was listening to music on Wynk app. Do not yet know what can be the possible issue as it has never happened while watching a video or youtube or while playing games.. Does anyone else has faced this issue?

name: Akshay Sinha
title: Perfect!
content: This are super amazing earphones. Crystal clear sound quality, noise cancellation perfect. The battery backup is another awesome feature. Literally 20 hours as promised. Bass quality is descent not too high neither too low. Overall Perfect .

name: Bikash kumar
title: Excellent product under 2k
content: I didn't expect this type of sound quality because it's comes with 9.2mm driver but it's amazing sound quality with excellent bass.. In 60% of volume I hear some outer sound but it not the major problem for noise cancellation, we have extra 40% of volume to increase sound 😁 and avoid the noise cancellation.. Excellent battery backup. I buy this product for this reason.. Quick switch fetecher is work properly.. I have samsung galaxy A50 and I have no issues to quick pair.. This product is really value for money, if any one want to buy then without any doubt u can buying this product...

name: Saurav Halder
title: Best headphone in this price range
content: Best product in this price range.The texture of the headphone is rubber thats hands on filling is very good like premium headphone.also the head phone is light weight so thats why in ear experience is good. in this product they provide type c port for charging and warp charge tecnology for fast charging thats quite good in daily life use.and this headphone battery backup are very good.overall best product.

name: SNithyan2
title: Don't hesitate...
content: Best headset used, hands down... Ease to shift connection between 2 devices is so simple and by click of a button it just takes 2 second to shift between connection... Awesome happy.... Pros. 1. Simple design and easily sits in my neck. 2. Magnetic headset off to save battery both on phone n headset. 3. Just seconds to shift between connections like from mobile to laptop. 4. Battery is sufficient. Cons. Non so far... Will update after a month of use for detailed review...

name: Anand Sitlani
title: JUST AN ABOVE AVERAGE PRODUCT
content: It's not a nice product if you like to play high end games like CALL OF DUTY MOBILE.... THE VOICE ALWAYS GLITCHES and is cringy.... The only thing I liked was battery backup.... There's an another issue too. The earphones come out v easily.... Their size is also bigger than other earphones...

name: AbhieShinde
title: Premium Feel
content: Lowest latency in wireless headphones, PUBG sounds perfect!. Moderate bass.. Sound quality is great!. Connecting to 2 devices seamlessly!. Quick connection!. Fitting could be better by having some tips above like Releme buds wireless!. Control buttons are well organised better than realme buds wireless. Easy to recognise!

name: Hemakesh
title: Incredibly amazing ❤️
content: Hands down. These are the best earphones under 2k, i have used a lot of Bluetooth earphones from boat to mivi , jbl etc. But these one plus *earphones* are best in segment. Battery life is just amazing 🙌 , used for 3-4 hours still the battery was 80% .. Charging speed is tremendous. Ps: i use wrap charger from one Plus. I really like the way it connects wid phone , no buttons for that just pull away the eartips and boom u r connected. I can asure you that if u will buy it , then u wont regret it ever. 🙌🔥

name: gokul krishna
title: Don't buy, Cheap sound quality, Totally disappointed.
content: The sound quality of this earphones are pathetic.. No base/bass. my 700 rupees 'pTron tangent evo' better than this one. The only thing i liked with this earphone is the charging and battery life. In 20-30 minutes it will get charged completely and lasts for 2 - 3 days based on the usage.. If you want to listen music don't waste your money for this earphone, go for JBL Infinity glide 120 (Rs. 1200) sounds far better than this OR Sony WI-C200 which supports quick charge with type c and good sound quality.

name: Samshad Pathan
title: Latency Problem
content: Every single thing is too perfect. But in gaming on other devices it's not perfect. It has 1.5 sec sound delay in pubg mobile or any action games. Rest these thing is amazing in under ₹2000/-. If you are gymholic and traveler then for sure you must but. But if you are a professional gamer with other devices then OnePlus than please don't but it. Your mood will be off after trying it.

name: Nowfal
title: Best quality neckband ever
content: I am writing review after 1 month of usage, Oneplus wireless bulletz is the best neckband I have ever seen. Looking nice build quality with fast charging in 10 mins and long last upto 1 week. Magnetic power on and off is easy to use. Best sound and bass quality ever in this range. Totally worth for the money and simply awesome

name: Roydon JP
title: Decent Sound Quality
content: Sound Quality is excellent in this price range except the bass. Bass is lacking in Bass-heavy songs. Personally, this bass is enough for me. Vocals are excellent. I did not get complaints from callers regarding the microphone. As for Low Latency. after latest update on OnePlus 7/7 Pro (OOS 10.3.3). Bluetooth Latency on Bullets Z is reduced to 100-150ms in both Gaming and Fnatic Modes. But in normal mode (AAC codec) latency is around 200-300 ms.

name: Akash Roy
title: Loved this bass edition
content: No doubt bass is awesome in this earphone and the vocal quality is also clear. Voice capturing through the mic is perfect. And the best part is charge for 10 mins you can use it for 10 hours nonstop . Magnetic control is plus point in this. I like the color combination too. Go for it .

name: Sudhakar Arya
title: Worth every penny.. Far far better than realme earbuds in every aspect..
content: This Bluetooth earphone is undoubtedly best in class. It has no match with realme.. I have used both nd Oneplus is far better than realme.. I don't know how people are telling about its weak bass.. Bass is awesome. Sound clarity is mind boggling.. With average usage of u can get 2 to 3 days of backup in a single charge. And the 20 min of charge nd boom u r ready to rock again. Don't go on negative review. Don't be in confused state, just buy this oneplus wireless z.. It works awesome in all phones. Oneplus 7 and above users will get extra software benefits.. Bt it worth every penny for all ..

name: Aashwin Makwana
title: Amazing Headphone
content: 1 week Review. 1. Built Quality is good.. 2. sound quality is good. Bass quality is also good. 3. Bluetooth range is impressive.. 4. Quick connect ON/OFF option works very fast even with none OnePlus Device.. 5. Battery backup is amazing. 6. Charging speed is very fast. 7. Noise cancellation i dont think available but call quality is amazing.. THANKS ONEPLUS. Must buy in this price range.. 2 rating to Amazon for delay Delivery.

name: Vinit Nair
title: Good wireless earphones
content: It's good in everything.. Battery Life is around 15 hours with 30 mins charging.. Sound quality is good.. No connection problem even with 2 closed wooden doors.. Build quality is great.. Overall good one at 2000rs

name: AmitD
title: buy if you love battery life more than sound quality
content: Overall a decent product but somewhat disappointing with the product carrying oneplus brand name. Sound quality is ok but it has very minimal or no base.. PC: Having problem connecting with my windows 10 pc (but it connects somehow). It detects audio after 3 seconds. experienced little gaps in between songs.. Mobile: works better with mobile device. I was able to make voice calls but while gaming or recording audio, mic does not work (mobile mic is selected).. I would give 3 stars only because of battery life, water resistance, quick switch feature and good build quality.

name: KISHORE D.
title: Decent sound with monstrous battery backup.
content: It's a good product. But if you compare it with other headphones you will get an advantage in battery life. If you are a field worker or a marketing/sales person then it's the best choice for you. If you travel a lot by using public transport, then only you will face some issue with the sound because in our traffic you need more sound to enjoy a movie on your mobile. And if you are a Bass lover, then don't go for this. This is the perfect option for guys like me, who need some decent sound with monstrous battery backup.

name: Akrisa
title: Almost there!!
content: OnePlus has pretty much nailed it with these earphones, the sound quality is top notch the details in the sound as well as base is what it is supposed to be because going any further would've overshadowed the highs and mids. Further, the battery life is best in class and the earphones are comfortable. Call quality is good but the mic catches too much noise so an AI based noise cancellation technology could've placed this as the undisputed champion in Budget neckband earphones category.

name: bheemaraju
title: Good product
content: The product was delivered to me within a day. Packing of the product is very good, stylishly packed by oneplus. Sound quality is good, noise cancellation is good, but when it comes to Bass quality it should have been improved. Easily got paired with my oneplus device. Switching of devices is very good. Automatic turn off & on is very helpful. Battery packup is excellent...

name: NIKHIL SONAWANE (Social Ruffian)
title: Best earphones under 2k
content: Probably the best Bluetooth earphone under 2k. Best sound quality & most important feature of this is fast charging. It literally takes 15min to get fully charge also the battery last for good amount of time. Only problem is its just to long in neck but it's OK.

name: Siddharth
title: Not water resistant
content: They said it's water resistant but it's not just after one day of running it's mic stops working and the volume down button also later got ok by itself but same problem everytime,the mic and button stops working after a workout session and later got ok by itself I ordered an replacement but same happened with another one so it's not water resistant. Btw other features are crazy and worth buying for music,calling,fittingg while running with small earbuds it's battery everything is just amazing except water resistant. Just go for it if you are not going to workout with this

name: Atharva Raut
title: Worth every bit!!
content: M not a extra bass fan. So in my view these headphones are just perfectly tuned for my type the trebble and vocal are so pure. I used them for Pubg and youtbe for 3 days straight without charging mybusage was likewise everyday notg experimental, all i can say is that these wireless are perfect. I even comapred realme wireless they dont come any close to the one plus(unless u are a extra bass lover) and dont get me wrong one plus has actually pretty good bass too bt in other departments i would say one plus is a overkill at 2k price range just fabulous!!

name: Manish
title: Avoid if you can. Stopped working after 4 months
content: Absolute poor quality. Stopped working after 4 months. Check Oneplus forums which are full of complaints.. In my case, the unit stopped charging. No buttons responded. None of workaround like battery drain etc worked.

name: Karan Pradhan
title: Connectivity issues
content: No problem with the sound but connecting it everytime is a problem. Keeps disconnecting all of a sudden, difficult to reconnect after disconnecting or charging. And when it finally connects, the sound still plays from the phone even after continuous trying to switch it to headphones. Half the time is spent trying to connect the damn thing. Very frustrating.

name: Sailesh Mahapatra
title: No bass but comes with clear sound
content: Simply it has no bass. If you want bass or like to enjoy music go for BWZ bass versions. It is best for talking only. Clarity of speaking and listening is the unique feature. Charge also remains long time as written. It's very comfortable and healthy for ear- this feature is the most important in one plus, you can't feel the weight of the buds it's so light.

name: Vyas Shaunak Agastya
title: I just love this little evils
content: The sound quality, noise cancellation and bass quality are up to the mark as far as its price is concerned. The best part of it is that it's very easily paired and connected. Even I did not have to put effort to connect it to my Laptop having Linux Ubuntu 16.04. The magnets disconnect and reconnect it to the paired device immediately based on their connection/disconnection with each other respectively. I consider this product as one of the best ones that I have purchased from Amazon in terms of delivery and price.

name: Gautam Goud KE
title: OnePlus wireless Z
content: You can go with this product, who think,to get brand products with less bugs..But when comes to sound quality it's not upto mark that what I assumed on OnePlus,bass also ok,where we can go with bass on "Boat","JBL",etc and very important is no noise cancellation in this product.. but when comes to battery life it's awesome their are no flaws..in battery..u can use easily in full volume for almost 4hours without dropping single %.. But think about noise cancellation and bass,the ppul who wan'ts to go with good sound quality and noise cancellation.

name: Gaurav
title: Got the defective piece!!
content: I got the defective piece as after using for a while it suddenly starts making sounds like crackers exploding in my ear my right ear is getting hurt now i am really upset as i am so kuch excited about this product. From the first day the pace is slow but now i am facing it at faster pace and for making it work normal i have to reset the headset and sometime i used to switch it on and off if oneplus is able to contact me please contact me and resolve my problem.

name: Manish kumar
title: Nice Neckband 👌👌👌👌
content: I Used 15 Days. 1. Build Quality - 5 🌟. 2.Sound Quality- 4.2 🌟. 3. Noise Cancellation- 4🌟. 4. Bass Quality - 3.9🌟. 5. Bettery - 5🌟. 6. Mic Quality 4.1🌟. 7. Locking - 5🌟

name: Ankit Anand
title: Value for money wireless earphones.
content: Works best if you have OnePlus phone, I tried with both Poco F1 and OnePlus 8 and noticed improved performance on OnePlus in terms of latency in gaming. Bass is ok , mids are good. Charges to 100% in 30-35 minutes, lasts around 12-14 hours of continued use. One great feature is double click to switch device which let's you switch between your phone and laptop seamlessly.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent product by OnePlus 🤩 Go for it...
content: Hello, everyone.(I am using Asus 5z)My opinion about this device are. -Decent sound quality.. -Very low latency during video playback and PUBG.. -Voice call mic quality is very good (quality in both the end depend upon service provider obvious). -Range is excellent.. -Very convenient feature is switch between two devices by pressing two time the feature button.(used it in between laptop and my mobile phone). -Very excellent Battery backup.. -Fast charge with my 18w charger.(will give proper charging time 0-100 soon).. -Very nice design and build quality.. Go for it guys.

name: Lakshya
title: Does the job perfectly and very convenient, not for audiophiles.
content: An excellent product from Oneplus. Have been using it for a month now. I am very impressed with the Battery life and the ease of accessibility it offers. I use a Samsung S9 and the connection is flawless with good range. The only feature I miss on these headsets is the lack of notification vibration or indication if you get a call since it disconnects from your device as soon as both the earpieces stick to each other magnetically. I used to enjoy this feature on my Jabra Sports. Rest all is flawless till now. Would suggest to someone looking for no-frills basic BlueTooth earphones in a budget of 2k.

name: Shafic
title: Good Enough To Listen Music..
content: I am so with the purchase, I have been using Skullcandy for more than five years, sound quality of one plus is better than Skullcandy, but i think Google assist is not activated on 1+, whereas on Skullcandy I can easily use Google assist to do many things without touching my phone.overall I am 100% happy with 1+ than Skullcandy. worth Buying it.

name: Ashutosh
title: Build quality
content: Quality is good but build is cheap.. Talking about its build i am a workout freek person after running 5km its button stopped working only I can power it on and play music through my phone

name: Ratnakar
title: Best quality bluetooth headset at the budget
content: Trust me I used almost all brands and none of the blutooth earphones are so good in quality of sound and power backup 10 min charge for 10 hours it's a great invention ever. And I'm a music lover each instrument is heard very clearly along with vocals don't even give a second thought get it one it is compactable with every phone not only OnePlus. But if you know a OnePlus you can experience Dolby Atmos too.

name: Rangu Leo
title: Great sound but Bad receiver
content: Built is good for the price, Battery backup is insane, sound is decent but receiver is too bad it only concentrate on ambiance noise than the voice. best buy for music and long time listen but not recommended for calling.

name: Sanoop Karakkat
title: Ended up getting cheated by Amazon as well as OnePlus
content: I have ordered the bullets Z and got the delivery in specified time limits. Right after 9 days, the headset ended up being not working. It has the white led which got turned on forever and not getting paired.. When I try to return the product, it is showing the return period is already ended. This is the worst sort of service which is offered from Amazon as well as OP.. I have gone through couple of OP forums where I came to know lot of people are already facing the same issues and being cheated. Didn't expect this sort of worst services from OP and Amazon.

name: pradeep
title: Worth every penny..Go for it..
content: Genuine product. Remarkable quality. Charge time 10 min, it last close to 10hr. Have to charge only once a week only. Magnetic on and off works like charm and saves battery. Got USB Type C cable which is compatible with mobile too. Sound quality is good. Gaming experience is not so good. It lags 1-1.5 second. Bass is ok ok.

name: Ashish Raj
title: Not worthy at all and useless for calling
content: Nothing to like in this product. Frequently disconnection, other side person doesn't get clear sound, too much of noise. Useless in zoom calls as auto connection doesn't happen once disconnected and have reconnect call even because of it. Worst experience with a headphone. I do not recommend for one plus headphone now. Note: I am using it with one plus 5T. And had expected smooth connectivity and sound. Cheap product.

name: RaviSingh
title: Poor Sound Quality
content: Giving One Star to OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition(Reverb Red) because when I'm using this headphone to listening video songs, lectures, and voice calls too, I'm getting very poor quality of sound, continuously unexpected disturbance sound coming through the speaker and its hearting my ear. I am fed up with this product. That's why I'm returning my headphone.. Hope everything will be right when I get back after the replacement.. Thanks! Amazon for fast delivery.

name: Durga
title: GREAT product...will reccomend as per the price and features!!
content: OP Mobile user - I am not an audiophile. So the balance sound quality works for me.. 20 hours back-up with fast charging support makes this product work for me. More than 3 days on average use....ofc hours to take calls and 3-4 hours media consumption daily.. Water(sweat) resistance makes this product more useful along with its magnetic control.. Connectivity switch between 2 different device (not connected to both at a time) makes this product more lucrative.. Missed a quality pouch though, but at 2k it's OK.

name: Aravind
title: Great buy for gamers . These are not for music lovers
content: The battery is soo good on this earphones. If you are into bass kinda person dont go for it. The bass is not that great but the vocals are so clear and treble is also good. Connecting my oneplus 7t is very convenient. And in FNATIC mode the low latency mode is automatically applied.

name: Vikas
title: Not genuine. Earbuds hurts a lot.
content: "Never Settle" tag line missing. Not sure whether this is genuine.. Sound : 2/4. Bass: 1/5. Battery: 4/5. Connectivity: 4/5. Comfort: 1/5. Earbuds hurts a lot. Can't use it continuously for more than 30 mins.

name: Himanshu Jobanputra
title: Overall very satisfied with One plus bullet Z
content: After doing lots of research for buying a bluetooth handsfree near around 2,000, one plus bullet Z, definitely wins,. (1Excellent battery life. (2)Quick chargeing. (3)Sound quality up the mark. Overall very satisfied with the product,. Before this I was using Samsung level u, which totally waste of money, Overall very satisfied with product at this price

name: Jaydip
title: Need to improve Quality
content: Sound & bass quality is excellent & very Dinamic look...But the Megnet of left Earplug is faulty & disable to autmatic connection functionality ..& it happened within couple of days ..But I liked the product systems & operations so I have recorded it..Same product... & I will return the re-order as well if I found Similar defect in that also... I have attached clear footage of product's misbehaving... Thanks, hope I won't get it again..!

name: Mohit A.
title: Great product. Perfect for long calls. Bass could be better.
content: Great product. I needed it because i have to be on call for hours. Crisp clarity in voice, mic works perfectly. Bass not good and that us the only flaw, but then i did not buy it for bass. I use it for calls and need it to be comfortable, clear and have good battery life. It ticks those boxes. Have used for 2 hours at a stretch and no pain.

name: Ameesh Bisaria
title: For long usage, attending calls n meetings not for song lovers, sound quality ok
content: Pros: Comfortable in ears, not much bass and balanced sound stage helps you to use for long hours, perfect for attending calls, meetings, for long usage. Quick charge is really helpfu with good battery backupl, low latency, quick shift button is very useful if you use multiple device... Cons: Absolutely not for listening songs as mentioned not much bass, though a balanced sound stage enables it to be used more and does not hurt ears. Sound quality is ok.

name: Shadaab
title: Flagship buds
content: This is simply one plus excellent buds I will choose them over oppo enco and realme buds and I am happy I sa e battery life superb sound brilliant connectivity..

name: Anoop
title: Poor sound quality
content: I got this product today,I did a lot of comparison by checking reviews and finally decided to choose this over Sony wi XB400.. But the only thing that disappointed me is the sound clarity,It doesn't even match my philips wires earphone worth 499,The bass is not up to the mark and quite noisy on high volumes ans treble is high.. It looks good and is comfortable,but I love to listen to a lot of music and sound clarity is very important for me,I knew sony was better but still felt that this one could be somewhere around but i was wrong.

name: shweshah
title: Good sound quality but poor microphone
content: Good when it is paired with one+ devices but for other devices or laptops this is pathetic. noise cancellation works good with oneplue phones but if you connect other devices it is very poor and also audio volume drops drastically. micophone is not impressive as other side does not hear very clear voice.

name: Roshan Gowtham
title: Sound quality
content: Dislike, bad sound quality.... Don't buy it. If you want a battery life only, you don't want a sound quality or ok with any sound. Then you buy it...... ............. If you want a best experience. Oppo enco m31 is best in this price....... battery life also good.... It's just have 10 to 12 hours battery life. But you have grate sound........ Experience is 🔥

name: SK
title: Best in its price
content: I was not too sure if this was the perfect product when I ordered, but have been using it for 10 days and am impressed. Very good battery backup, super quick charging. I take most of my calls on this and it has been smooth. The best part is a spl key that makes the earphones connect to the last used device. Which means if I am watching a movie on my laptop and I get a call, I can just click that button twice and take the call on my earphones.

name: Sareen Shah
title: Excellent battery life, good sound quality and handy features!
content: Main things which I would love to talk about are -. 1. Insane battery life. I get atleast 15 hours of battery life in normal usage.. 2. Sound quality is good enough. It can get pretty loud.. 3. I loved the quick switch feature, lets me change my earphones from my desktop to smartphone very fast and easily.. All in all, you might find earphones with better 'sound' in this range, but the features and battery life combined make this worth the money in this price range.

name: kranthi chaithanya
title: I can give 3.5 out of 5
content: Worth the price. When OnePlus announced this earphones for such low price,everyone had doubts whether earphones would be good or not. But OnePlus has launched good piece of earphones with average price. Works too good with OnePlus phones. Average when connected to other phones. Noise cancellation is not really good, but you cannot expect much for such price, sound quality is good, bass quality is okay ( you get used to it) Overall a good piece of earphones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Right side not working after15 days
content: Just been 15 days, was working fine now right side ear piece sound is merely noticeable, it would disappear in few days and return window is closed, I am not the kind of guy who would visit service center and waste my time.. Proper check should been done before sending it.

name: NIKHIL P R
title: Below Average Performance In Non One Plus Mobiles
content: My Mobile is Realme 5pro.. Sound quality was below average... Very Disappointed bass... Battery Backup was awesome... Noice cancellation was good.. Quality mic give clear vocal sound.. I Recommended only for melody lovers. Bass lovers please step back.. I checked this neckband in 1+ 7pro. Better performance than non 1+ mobiles.

name: Sk.Anish
title: Don't go for Brands like ONEPLUS.
content: Battery back up is worse than boat rokerz series. Bass is good and smooth sound as expected from ONEPLUS Ltd.. But please try to improve the battery it is giving only 6 hrs backup and I have mic issues. This review has been written after 1 day of purchase.. Moral of the story : Dont go for Brands. Go for quality.

name: Mohan B.
title: Got a used product..
content: Got a used totally dirty box don't know about the sound quality because didn't even try the product as there was ear wax on the product😨.... Bought the blue colour one. But when tried to return it only had option for replace.. bit Amazon customer care quickly returned it ..

name: Banuchand Kandukuri
title: Good
content: Bass is excellent, battery life is good, a bit confusing with operations at the beginning, my other wireless earphones gives a voice at on/off, but this gives just a sound, that too a bit confusing whether it is on/off

name: Joshua Patrick Selvam
title: Noice Cancellation Issues
content: I use this headset with a One Plus 6 and even then there are a lot of issues for the caller and me on calls. We here a lot of ambient noices on the call it becomes difficult for them and me to have a smooth conversation!

name: Amazon Customer
title: the msot adorable comfortable and efficient earphone you can ever get in this price range
content: its been 1 week since i ahve used these earphones and trust me i haven't charged them yet with the daily...with the daily usage of 1.30-2 hours and still battery is half. now comes the sound quality i will say the sound quality is remarkable and every thing mids,lows and bass are perfect as they should be.... at the end i would say if your budget is between 1500 or 2000 you must add extra 500 because they will be worth:)

name: Vinodh
title: Really good product.
content: Now I can use the same charger as my phone. That is a big relief. Good sound. Long lasting battery. Only downside the buttons are not on the collar battery pack, and hang separately, this is done probably to add extra battery for longer usage time but made this look a little awkward. If you don't find it like so, then it is really good product.. All in all, a five star product.

name: Ismail Noor Basha
title: I have fall in love with this OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z product
content: This is an awesome product the sound quality of this product is very superb noise cancellation is also works very well the bass is also good for this range budget product we can't say any disadvantages in this budget product. It is worth for Rs.1999 and the magnetic play and pause is awesome smart control it works well and the package of amazon delivered is VV Good I can't able to say any demerits in this product I love it for using I always prefer only neckband type earphones I will suggest you to buy the OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z if your planning to buy any true wireless earphones

name: Dipali singh
title: Its a bass edition white doesn't has bass at all
content: I bought bass edition thinking bass would be good. Although they have good features and work perfectly with my oneplus 7 but what is the use if sound quality is low and bass isn't good. Didn't expect this from oneplus

name: harsh kantibhai patel
title: Not good for calling purpose
content: Quality is good and charging backup and charging speed is too owesom but problem is at the other end person while calling lots of background voice.. it's not good for calling. It's only gaming and movie and all that.. While i bought for attend call but whenever i pickup calls at the other end person always tell me where r u lots of background voice. They can't hear me properly what i speak evenafter they r literally irritating by background voices.. For me waste of my money to buy this product for calling purpose

name: Dhairyasheel Kalekar
title: Amazing Battery Life!
content: The battery life on this earphones is unlike anything I've ever seen!. One charge lasts me almost 2 days with moderate usage!. Plus, it even supports fast charging!. It takes around 20minutes to charge it from 30 to 100%. With around 10 to 15 minutes of charging it lasted me a whole day!

name: Momo
title: Good product, but poor bass
content: The battery life is the best feature.. Pairs with my phone instantly when I put it on.. The sound clarity is really good.. The bass is not that powerful enough, especially while listening to music one could feel the lack of powerful bass.. Otherwise this product is perfect.

name: Sanjib
title: Good product from oneplus
content: Using this with OnePlus nord mobile, inbuilt Dirac tuner really helps. HD sound quality. I'm not a sound engineer but I like the music played through this headset. Best part is battery life. It is long lasting, it even charges very quick. Overall happy with the product

name: Dark phoenix
title: Satisfied
content: Product packing is not good.. But the Bluetooth earphones are awesome and it has very good battery backup. And the sound quality, bass , comfort very good I will give (4.7/5) I am using ti for 5 days and I don't had any problem with it and it is ok for playing pubg for me it has very less letency in sound while playing pubg but I not got any problems of sound in pubg with this earphone. And the quality of product is very good . New Bluetooth earphones user will definitely fully satisfy with this it worth of money. Just go for it...

name: PUNITH KUMAR
title: WORTHFULL & TERIFIC PRODUCT BY ONE+
content: THIS IS MY GENUINE REVIEW AFTER USAGE OF FEW DAYS ...HOPE USEFUL TO U FRIENDS. SOUND QUALITY -5/5. BUILT QUALITY - 5/5. BASS - 3.5/5. BATTERY BACKUP - 10/5. CONNECTIVITY - 5/5. COMFORT - 4.7/5. I HAVE NO NEGATIVE POINTS TO SAY ABOUT THIS PRODUCT FRIENDS ,BECAUSE IT IS A WORTHFULL PRODUCT .. BUT IF U ARE INTERESTED IN GOOD BASS ,THEN GO FOR BASS EDITION..👍

name: Arsh Arora
title: Awesome Product😍😍
content: Good choice for OnePlus devices only.. I have my OnePlus 7t which I bought some time ago.. The pair works awesome with OnePlus devices and musicolet application. The bass is present wherever necessary so,did not find any issues in sound quality..... For battery the product is a total beast for which I bought it.. I have my online classes and the product has awesome battery life.. Also thumbs up for Amazon one day delivery... Go for it if you have a OnePlus device. Better than oppo enco.

name: Aiswarya
title: Worth the money spent.
content: The design of the headphones is sturdy and it looks really great.. Comfortable wearing it.. Switching between devices is very seamless.. Sound quality could have been better.. It is a very basic headphones that will fulfill the basic needs.. Using it for calls ,meetings , music.. Gudos.

name: Arvind
title: Depends upon your priority .
content: Sound is good and super high bass but sound quality of Oppo Enco M31 is better . great battery backup .. Final conclusion - If u want great battery backup and listen to very volume with lot of bass then go for it .. If u want a great experience in music with a slight less battery backup and bass , then go for Oppo enco m31 as i have used both the products .

name: Pankaj Sangoi
title: Not upto the Mark
content: I brought the product few days back. However the price is bit more, it should be around 1500. The battery is good. The sound is bit low and bass quality is ordinary. The ear buds are very large and is uncomfortable if you use it for long. Noise reduction is also good. The material is good and thick, sweat free. The cable length is bit less, should be slightly more. Overall an average product. I brought one another one from NOISE at 900 from Amazon and I felt that's much better.

name: Abhijeet
title: Overall a Good Earphones at this price range
content: Overall the product is wonderful and battery backup is excellent. Sound quality is also excellent, I personally like little less bass compared to others hence I personally like the sound quality which is a plus point me. However the wire quality is cheap, and it might won't last long. And after wearing this headphones for a while like say for 1 or 1n half hours it start getting lil uncomfortable for me, it might differ from person to person.

name: Ameya Lokhande
title: Go for it, Just don't even think twice...!!
content: Just go for it...!. Best wireless earphones under 2k....!!. Sound quality amazing..!. Bass... Just the perfect...!. Instrument seperation just perfect...!. Nd what can i say about battery... Just mind blowing...!!!. Cons: Made in China...!!

name: Hemant Sharma
title: Bass quality is very poor😠😠
content: If you want a balanced sound with decent bass quality, then go for it. But if you are a bass lover, you want thumpy and punchy bass then don't buy, Boat earphones are far better as compare to this in terms of bass. I am returning this because bass quality is not like that bass which Indian users like.

name: Shuvom Prakash
title: The best wireless earphones: smart and convenient buy
content: The best thing about this is its battery. On a regular use, I have to charge this neck band once every 3-4 days. And the sound quality is also nice. I have taken the jio javn pro and the music and sound quality of the songs are felt even better, while using this earphones. And apart from that, it's waterproof also. Yesterday I was standing in the rain, with these earphones on, and it was working perfectly fine in rain also. And if you already own a OnePlus device like me, then no doubt this earphones will be the best option for you.

name: SOURABH MEENA
title: Best Neckband style Bluetooth Earphones
content: The sound quality is way above average and great at this particular price point. The bass is little lacking but perfectly adequate for average users, also it can get pretty loud so no complaint there, there's also no sound distortion at high volume.. The bluetooth connectivity is among the best with amazing bluetooth range and quite low latency that's great for gaming purpose and watching videos. The best part is battery life and charging time, I'm getting close to18-19 hrs of battery life and quick charge of 10 minutes actually provide nearly 10 hrs of top up, that is just insane.

name: Akash pawar
title: Please give a good quality till the end but not for just a while 🙄very disappointing.
content: When I brought this earphone on 18 November it was working good till past 2 weeks but now it is giving a lot of problems. It gets disconnected automatically while listening to songs . The audio will go for 2 or 3 seconds .and the volume has become a little low now ..I am just getting irritated and disturbed because of this problem. I was a big fan of OnePlus but because of this problem I feel like I should change my brand from OnePlus to different one 🙄it's very disappointing when you save and buy and you get this type of prblm..

name: sajal sahay
title: Battery awesome but quality of Earbuds need to improve
content: Sound quality is good ,. Bass is lil bit less as compare with realme but you can adjust this from your equilizer.. Magnet effect & earbuds quality need to improve alot .. Battery backup awesome. 10 min charge 8-10 hrs backup. Overall Good for professionals

name: Vaseem P.
title: Best neckband under 2000..
content: Good product.. Battery back-up is the best .. I get two days playback time for my apl time usage.. Good sound quality.. Bass is good in normal mode . But u can boost the bass using an equaliser. I'm using Spotify equaliser and I got a much better bass than normal . So anyone who buys keep this in mind.. There is a notable latency while gaming if you're using older Bluetooth version. For Bluetooth 5.0 I hope there will be no problem .. Charges very fastly . Full charge in less-than 30 minutes vif you are using a warp charger 30W.

name: SOUMYARANJAN NAYAK
title: Recommended for normal use, not for music. If you want it for only music then don't go for it...
content: Just received the product...Here are some points which i observed..... 1. Call sound is clear and high volume.. 2. Bass quality is low, if you are music lover and want it for music, then don't go. It will disappoint you. Normal bass.. 3. Connectivity range is approximately 10 mtr. If you go beyond this limit it will disconnect.. 4. Cable quality is good.. 5. Comfortable while using in ear.. 6. In the package you will get Bluetooth earphone, user manual, charging cable usb C type, 1 pair earphone cover.

name: praful mule
title: Just read this and buy
content: Sound clarity is one of the best among many companies ....also switching between devices is the best feature ..... Battery is Awesome ..... But only one place it lacks is .... The bass ....like bass is present but a little lesss as compared to the normal ones .....but you should definitely goo for this product ..... Really LOVED IT!!!! ; )

name: Ananya Bera
title: Microphone is not working.
content: Sound quality and everything is so good. But I am not happy with the call connection. Microphone is not working while calling.I am using OnePlus 7 and still its not working.I tried with other devices but no use. I actually loved the earphone.but just because of these problem I'm going to return this.

name: Manash Sarkar
title: Good quality..
content: This is really good earphone. Noise cancellation is also good.. I purchased it today.... Awesome sound experience & mic quality is amazing & battery life just unbelievable.. It's auto play-pause feature is lovely (auto play only work in OnePlus device)...👌👌. Bass is decent..... But, if you're a specially bass lover...then it's not for you...😊😊

name: ShopTherapy
title: Needs more treble.
content: Range is good. I wish it was more treble heavy though. I listen to a lot of podcast and the spoken words just don't feel that crisp. Great for listening to music. Also, could've been a bit more louder and no way to determine battery health.

name: Gayatri mannesha
title: GOOD PERFECT BALANCED
content: After trying so many products i simply loved this, super fast charge, interchangeable connectivity of the headset with another mobile or laptop at press of button, bass is not that good as in mt previous Skullcandy Inkd which had incredibly perfect bass but had a lot of disturbances while using it for talking. Coming back to OPBZ noise cancellation and battery back up is also good. Over all a very balanced bluetooth earphone and for this price point its a grab on.

name: Sriharsha Polisetty
title: Excellent mic placement
content: Best part is the mic placement. Unlike other headphones the mic is placed on the wire, so in real life usage mic comes near to mouth. So call quality is amazing for office meetings.. Music is good but not comparable to sony

name: Riju
title: Disappointed product quality
content: Disappointed.. Bought this on 18-6-2020 and on 4-7-2020 all the buttons except volume down stopped working. There is still sound but I cant increase the sound nor pause the music nor skip to previous or next track nor attend the calls using the earphone. Very much disappointed with the product quality from a tech giant company, Oneplus.

name: Anup Pandey
title: Best wireless earphone in this price
content: Best wireless earphone in this price . I have returned my 1st purchase because of some issues in the product like it was disconnecting after some time . The battery backup is very good, charging like pro, in the viewing angle in one shot you can not identify between buttet wireless 2 and z.. Go for it....

name: pankaj katre
title: Very Very wonderful item. Definitely buy.All Are perfect.😊😊😊
content: 1.Sound Quality is best.10 out of 10. 2. Noice cancellation is avarage.10 out of 8. 3. Bass quality is awsome..10 out of 11. 4. Magnetic on/off control and fast pair with 5.0 bt.. 5. Dual pair is not support.10 out of 0. 6.battry life is good and support c type charger charge within 50 mintus.. 7. Standby time upto 3 days or base on our uses.. OVER ALL...PRODUCT IS BEST. This review is on the basis of 1 week uses..

name: Pradeep
title: Stopped working.
content: It worked fine for 1 month. And then it stopped working. I reseted it. Then it won't even turn on. Tried every method according to the manual. But, couldn't turn this thing on. It frequently had connection issues. For rs.2000, i expected a good product. Disappointed.

name: Reena j.
title: Don't waste a single more minute and just buy it!
content: You may think that it's a little expensive and people say that it's not worth it. But sorry my friend I am here to tell you that you cannot be more wrong! It's written in the description that it takes only 10 minutes to charge but it is wrong, mine takes even less time(I mean to say approx 7-8 min) and it sustains for almost two days. You cannot compare it's audio quality with any other earphones. You just buy it and see for yourself. It could not be any more perfect!!

name: Sonal P Sunil
title: One of the best excellent  wireless earphones under 2000.
content: One of the best wireless earphones under 2000. Sound quality is great, built quality is topnotch, midtones are great, call quality is great, fast Bluetooth pairing , excellent battery life and fast charging. Call quality is great. If bass is you main concern you will get some little more bass in Realme Buds. I do own RealmeBuds but i prefer Oneplus Bullets Wireless Z over Realme Buds.. Its actually a worthy product to buy under this price and you won't regret buying it !

name: Parimugilan
title: Weightless,quick charge,easy to connect between 2 device
content: Merits:. it's wieghtless and I had heard for about 4. hours still it's 90 percent. love it's quick charge and its bass is also good.... Noise cancellation was also good.... Connect between two devices seamlessly.. Demerits:. The button was brittle and seems to be broken

name: Ashok Kumar
title: Premium OnePlus Audio feature at affordable price
content: What i really liked about the headphones:. 1. Amazing Battery ( goes on and on ) + Fast charging. 2. Exceptional quality audio output. 3. Bass is sufficient unless you hate your ears. 4. Quick connect/disconnect. 5. Earphone mode (OnePlus exclusive). 6. Build Quality. What can be improved:. 1. Noise Cancellation ( satisfactory as of now but can be improved). 2. Buttons could be more tactile. Effort should be minimal when pressing.. Overall, you couldn't get a better deal at 2k.

name: shubh chaudhary
title: paisa vasool product.
content: these new bullet earphones are pretty good, considering the price.. Audio could have been a little better compared to other models.. A big plus for the battery, keeps going on and on.. and only need a 20 min charge, and boom you are good to go!. feels very good and light and quite heavy-duty material have been used.. Over all, a very good product to get at this price range.

name: Shaurya
title: Best earphones on the given price range
content: Pros -. - Great sound quality. - Clear, but not too high, bass - the way I like 'em. - Auto connects on wearing. - Auto starting of music after reconnection. - Decent passive noise cancellation. Cons -. - Them keep falling off the ear. Takes a little bit of practice to keep them intact without having to push them in every now and then.. - The volume panel and its placement could've been better.. All in all, opt for these if you're contemplating with Boat Rockerz.

name: Vishal Chauhan
title: Sound quality
content: Listening to Inside My Head by Riton, we liked how crisp and to-the-point the sound was, and the bass had some character to it despite not being quite as pronounced as on the original Bullets Wireless earphones. Some of the background details could be heard clearly enough, but the busy nature of the track meant that the faintest elements of the track felt distant and dull.

name: jaya kumar
title: Worthless investment, better go for other alternatives
content: Absolute poor sound quality, zero bass....can't turn up the volume above 50%, it turns in to noise... Poor build for the price is understandable but such poor sound ?. Worthless buy. And I ve been using OP WIRELESS BULLETS 1 since their launch..poor poor poor

name: Firdaus Photographer
title: Amazing headphone experience / wish the volume controls were functional when connected to laptop
content: Amazing headphones. Worth every Penny!!! Sound quality is awesome, bass is fantastic, very comfortable. Super flexible, making it more durable. Excellent finishing.. Con: Can't control volume with headphones controls (+/-) when connected to a laptop. You'll have to use the laptop volume control.

name: Honest Reviewer ☑️
title: A Good Product by OnePlus
content: Sound Quality is very good.. Bass Quality is little bit low but still it is very good. ( Not good for extra bass lovers ). Bluetooth connectivity is Superb.. Battery backup is tremendous. Charging is very fast. No issues found.. *** Overall an excellent product at this price point.

name: PRITVISH MANDAL
title: I was doubtful like you, but now I'm just happy !
content: I was heavily sceptical before buying this but I took the leap of faith and bought it.. I heard many people complaining over the bass but believe me, for any average music lover it delivers good amount of bass.. Although the bass can be enhanced by using equilizer setting in a 'V' pattern to derive more bass.. To sum it up, I would say, it's a pretty decent earphone with good amount of battery life, comfortable in the ear for long sessions and deliver good quality of music.

name: Ashlyn
title: Awesome purchase decision - perfect companion for a Oneplus phone
content: Really like the BT earphone. The feature I like the most is the quick switch button, so happy its a Physical button. Just addicted to this device. The ear buds are comfortable and do not strain my ears for long usage. Highly recommend it.

name: Aswin V.
title: Review after testing it for 3 days
content: As I'm using a oneplus device , the experience has been flawless.The device connects to phone with-in seconds and has impressive usage time,During my use it lasted me around 17 hrsof mixed use.. It has a normal sound stage, the bass is present but not overwhelming. Overall a good product.. "@Will update after a month"

name: sairam
title: no bass, very flat sound
content: not for bass lovers this dosent have any bass at all but the vocals are critical clear even at high volumes, battery life is extremely good, it also dosent have a good in-ear fit and leaks in the outside noise very badly.. it's only good for calls,. not for music listening it's very flat

name: Shivam s
title: Read this before you buy(worst product)
content: Plz read this before buying-. I can assure you, you will face the same problem as i have two of this headset.. Worst headset ever,one of the worst product of one plus. Don't buy it guys it has zero noise cancellation rather it add more surrounding sounds people in call can hear the horn of vehicle of nebouring states too.. Samsung level u is way much better then this. I regret buying the product. I gets disconnected automatically.

name: Rahul Dhakad
title: Not as Expected
content: Good for battery life. Bass is not upto mark. Sound quality is ok I also have realme buds I think in sound quality realme buds is better. I only ordered because I have Oneplus5t. If you have any oneplus device then go for it otherwise go to realme buds. It's not supporting low latency mode I tried in both mode Fantic and Gaming mode.

name: dr Jyoti gaur
title: A good investment !
content: My son is a Youtuber by the name "what the dude" & Vineet Gaur , he loves gadget and he wanted to get a new earphone for gym channel where he can test it and even goto his runs etc , but he was confused I saw this on sale and bought it for him as a surprise , he was very happy he loved the earphone the sound quality is great. maybe the neck material is too soft that can be an issue for few but over all it was who buying it for him. he was so happy that he made a complete video on it

name: Rahul Pandey
title: Excellent Product
content: Great product with amazing sound quality and build. Quite light in weight and material of product is also smooth on your skin.. The neck band is strong which avoids the unwanted movement of the earphones.. Coming to sound quality, OnePlus Bass Edition earphones have a very balanced sound quality with pure bass.. In one line, excellent product for music as well as daily basis like calling etc.

name: Aditya
title: Buy them without thinking a bit.
content: The best budget Wireless Earphones according to me.. Battery life is almost about 20hrs.. Charges rapidly.. Sound quality is good, lived the clarity, just lacks a bit of bass but overall the best deal at a 2K price margin.

name: Aadil
title: Best in all department ultimate one Plus
content: Honestly one of the best earphone I have used. Sound quality ultimate. Very fast charging. Ultimate battery backup. And I love one Plus products because they. Provide quality this product is worth it. I am using one Plus 7 from more than 1 year and it feels like new. And also this earphone is worth it believe me buy it. Review for one Plus bullet wireless z (bass edition)

name: Ruben
title: Amazing !!! Value For Money Product.
content: Amazing pair or wireless earphones. Overall value for money.. After using it for a month.. Best battery life ( 18 hours on a 25 minute charge using the OnePlus Dash charger ). Amazing vocal and bass balance..Mic quality is excellent for calls too.. And zero delay while playing high intensity games too... No cons found so far..

name: jaimin
title: Bass in OnePlus bullet wireless z is superbb and clear.
content: I was using Sony xb550ap the extra bass and good quality headphones. I ordered oneplus nord and I know that I didn't get headphone jack so rather than going for adaptor I ordered this headphone.. After adjusting sound in Equalizer I get superbbb bass and sound quality which is already best and clear.. If you are using OnePlus phone then u should simple use Equalizer and get the superd bass.. You can go for it. It is the premium product for less price. Thanks OnePlus for giving best products at lower price.

name: Jyoti Salankar
title: Absolutely Mind-boggling 😍. Go for it!!!
content: Best wireless earphones under 2K. Just go for it!! Sound quality absolutely mind-boggling! Don't think of price just go for it! The audio quality is so good use a premium touch and premium link wireless unboxing and using them also they are much which are loaded than other any earphones at rupees 2000 also they are very comfortable also the battery backup is good if charges in 10 minutes and gives the battery backup of 10 hours and in and 30 minutes full charge should give reason battery backup of 20 hours I used them more than 5 days still they are working!!!

name: Bert
title: loved it
content: 360 is awesome. the base is awesome, very lightweight, worth of money. moreover, when u play it we will feel that are we playing in huge speakers around you. bass hit is 3of 5. don't even feel that is there, clarity and minority sounds are even clear. u won't feel its a headphones. waterproof

name: Giridhar
title: 4th Month Review 🤓
content: Just like a one plus headphone should be!

name: xyz
title: Oppo Wireless Bullets Z
content: The Sound Quality and Bass are better in Oppo Enco M31. So, this might not go great with astute audiophiles and Music Lovers. Nevertheless, if Battery Life and Build Quality are top preferences then one can have a look at this product. Even if you’re person who listens to music while working out or to relax, this product offers a great value for money.

name: SIYA
title: Not good for audio calls.
content: Was brought to use in Office Calls (WebEx). Unfortunately the experience was very bad. It feels like I am speaking from inside a box. Had to buy Jabra 25e and it works well but that cost double that this.. Its good for casual listening but not for serious business use.

name: Akash Biswas
title: Overall Good but some compromise with bass
content: Be honest after using 1 month headphone sound quality above average. But you have to compromise with bass if you are diehard music fans. otherwise built quality & fittings in ear is more than perfect. you can make your suitable bass settings in equalizer it will make nearly 90% to perfect.. i will give rating according to. Built quality and ear fittings- 10/10. sound clarity- 9/10. bass- 6/10. tribal- 8/10. if you want perfect bass go for the jbl series or realme.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good for calling and music
content: These are the best bluetooth earphones suitable for call bcz in other bluetooth earphones i experience that the receiver doesn't listen my voice clearly while driving. But these are better.. Not good for games

name: Rajendra
title: Buy If ur device supports EQ with wireless headphones
content: Great buy.. one thing to note here is that it has good high's, good mid's but a little less low's range hence if your device supports EQ for wireless headphone ( which is not the case for all the phone), you are good to go. I am using this with Samsung Galaxy M30s, it has Dolby EQ and these headphone sounds great with it. I dont like heavy bass. So this one is perfect for me.. Crisp audio for the price. Loving it.

name: AADITYA GUPTA
title: Overall quality of headphones
content: The sound quality is good but bass is less and when we check the tremble test it fails around 15000 Hz where the good earphones are able to produce sound till 20000 Hz as this is the human earing upper limit. But overall experience is good so if anyone wants to have a good earphone with good features can buy this one.. Moreover shipping is slow for this product.

name: Nishant Kumar
title: Nice product in this price range.
content: Writing the review after 5days of usage:. Pros:. Built quality is very good.. Its good for calls and music both.. Battery backup is also very good.. Magnetic buds to turn off and on is also nice, it also helps to extend battery life.. Cons:. I found its fitting is up to the mark, there is some scope of improvement.. Earphones are falling when you are running.. Overall, this is very nice product in this price range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Dolby Atmos update is fantastic!
content: This is just the best earphones i have ever used, whether you talk about battery or you talk about sound quality! Everything is on Point! Just after the Dolby Atmos update on my OnePlus 7 pro for wireless z, this has made an earphone a beast!!! Every base problem is being resolved!. P.S. only for OnePlus users

name: ROSE MEDICAL STORE
title: Didn't felt good
content: I used this last 7days as my primary earphones. It is really good in this segment but the bass is not much expect from this and left earphone is not perfect fit to our comfort bcos of the presence of Audio controller in the wire unless placing in wire they may place in neck itself.
