The major negative is when we place it in our ear and didn't play audio we feel much of air passing and it makes me discomfort. Great selling point of this bullets is battery capacity and charging time period

name: ZenithCorporation
title: Amazing battery life
content: I tried a lot of bluetooth headsets, both earbuds and headphones, but this one stands out remarkably better in terms of battery life. The magnet sticking-headphone off feature helps the battery performance much more. With the pretty good use, 3-4 hours a day use, I am able to run without recharge for 3-4 days on a full charge. In case of emergency the quick charge feature is very handy. build quality is premium and rubberised texture gives a good feel. Overall a great piece of neckband.

name: Parth
title: Magnet Stopped working after 4 months
content: Honestly speaking it's the best wireless earphones in this range although if your budget is around 3k you should definitely go for One Pluz buds Z .. Battery Life is really awesome and not to forget about quick 10 minutes charge which can last upto 10 hr. However the Magnet stopped working after 4 months of usage ,Not able to disconnect the bluetooth without actually turning it off manually..

name: Dipankr
title: BEST WIRELESS EARPHONES
content: These are the best wireless earphones i have ever used. Don't go for MIVI and NOISE. Spend a little more money and buy these.. The battery really lasts 20hrs which is amazing.. The sound is amazing.. Call quality is great.. And the audio during Zoom calls is surprisingly great.. The best earphones at this price💯💯.. I don't care much about the bass.. But for a normal user and even for gaming these are GREAT!

name: Deepak singh
title: Good buy at 2000
content: Very good battery life. I am charging it alternate days after using daily for online meetings, music and movies. Easy to switch between laptop and mobile.. No noise cancellation. Use for call only if in quite place .

name: Ritwick Dey
title: Don't buy Bass edition if you use MacBook Pro 15" (BigSur)
content: The headphone is good & it's working fine with my OnePlus 8T. But if you pair it with Macbook Pro 15" (BigSur) you'll hear constant background noises. Replaced one time. Same problem. Now I'm returning the product, thanks to amazon.... If you spend most of the time in front of MacBook Pro (developer maybe?), don’t buy the bass edition.... Note: there is no such issue in the non-bass edition and You'll not face any problem if you connect with any other devices for both bass and non-bass editions.

name: VJ
title: Great features but uncomfortable
content: Everything is generally good, my biggest problem is that it is very uncomfortable in the ears. I have relatively large ears and yet it starts paining within an hour or so. I also tried using them during exercise and they keep falling off, not a good buy for those situations. Rest everything is awesome, great battery, great for phone calls, very fast and stable connectivity, etc.

name: Nevil
title: I just want to return it. While on call the other person voice doesn't come in earphone.
content: I just want to return it back. I got this product on 15th July 2020. And they are saying return window closed on 22nd July 2020. And today 24th July 2020. They are not even providing product return facility within 10 days. While buying this product there was clearly mentioned that product can be returned within 10 days. Problem I'm facing now is while on call the other person's voice doesn't come in earphone. It is juz 9 days since I bought this product. Sound quality was amazing. But what about quality while on call ???????????? Voice doesn't come clearly.

name: Sukhjinder Singh
title: Go for it with close eyes
content: I am using this neckband from last one week. I am from punjab and usually we like baas in music... Earphones are very well tuned. Specially for vocals and deep music. I have boat's wireless earphone also with big bass then OP wireless but i cannot listen boat's earphone more than half an hour... That's the reason one plus is best in sound, in comfort and if u want to buy for calling purpose then OP is best in the market battery backup is insane... Charge it once and forget for next 2-3 days.. So Go for it with close eyes

name: narinder
title: Sound is ok and not at all comfortable.
content: I have used mi neck band and the quality is awesome as compared to bullet where 1hr of use makes ear pain.Its noy at all comfortable, sound is also only ok, battery is quoted best but it doesn't have power off button moreover the magnets also goes off too early.

name: Kavish
title: Value for money.
content: Amazing quality, look and feel.. It's been over a month using this product, till date nothing is a let down.. Battery backup is super I usually get 2.5 days run-time. Mic is perfect noise cancellation is working fine, and the only set back is the bass, which is due to a lower end audio driver, me being not a huge fan of bass, works good for me as the mids- lows and highs aur totally on point.. The audio quality is crisp and earphones are sturdy. In total value for money.

name: SuBBu
title: Great product in this price range
content: Good quality, nice sound, great battery life, ok ok types noise cancellation. Full Charge in like 30mins, use for min. 2 days. Pairs super easily with your OnePlus phones, also can connect and switch to two different devices easily.. Great product in this price range

name: Saksham Bhagat
title: Best under 2K as of August2020
content: These are really good for the price they are offered on. The connectivity is good and are really fast in connecting and switching b/w devices. If you like good music and a good battery life go ahead 👍. I literally chanrge them once in 3days. But if you are a bass head i would say stop and search for something better than this because the bass is exact zero. No bass. But i like the earphones as they offer good stuff in 2K.. Sound-8/10. Bass-2/10. Price-8/10. Connectivity-9/10. Should you buy- Yes

name: Ashutosh Upadhyay
title: Not Satisfactory.Bad sound quality in this price range.
content: This earphone is not worth at all.. Though its technology of switching the device and wrap charging it has a very poor sound quality.Also if you have the one plus than you can get better quality but not the satisfactory.. Also,it has the water splash or sweat proof but it doesn't seems in practical world.. I would not suggest you to buy this for the intrest of music,but you can go for this if you need its technology like switching devices or instant connect or wrap charging but sound is not good at all.

name: Deepshikha Singh
title: Best Speaker at this price
content: Just received the in-ear earphone today. Delivery was super quick( within 24 hours). Well done Amazon.. Using it for a few hours to watch movies, attend calls, connects to phone and laptop. Must say that the product is amazing.. Pros:. Connects seamlessly with my Samsung Note 8 and Macbook air. Product Quality is premium & excellent. Noise cancellation is very impressive. Voice clarity is superb. Packaging was impressive. Cons:. Bass is good but not amazing

name: sandeep kumar
title: The real best and beast from Oneplus
content: Pros:. 1)Bass is really re-engineered, vocals, trebles are very well maintained.. 2) Built quality is good with silicon and plastic material.. 3) Charging is lasting long.. Cons:. It is not a con but, it would be better if the wire is some more sturdy.. Suggestions:. 1) Turn on the mobile/laptop bluetooth always for better connectivity. 2) Adjust earbuds to fit perfectly into ears to experience real sound quality.

name: Dr.Rajarajan
title: Go for it. Worth the money
content: I'm saying this on day one. So can't say about long term quality or battery life.. Pros: Great sound. Great bass and vocals too we're crystal clear. Very ergonomic ear bud design. Good shielding from outside noise. Call quality was also fair. Though microphone could have been better.. Cons: magnetic on/off seems weird though useful.

name: Abhi
title: Worthy product
content: I like the ear phones since they are compact, powerful and last long.. Charging time is hardly 15 minutes and it will lasts up to 10 hours.. Battery backup is excellent.. Ear phones are so lite and easy to wear.

name: Gaurav
title: Everything perfect but not for gamer
content: Everything supper. Problem is earphone can not make difference in left and right sound, not good for gamer, if you play pubg, and if enemy in right side of your then you can’t hear their footsteps in right earpiece, sound comes in both pieces is almost same, you have to very n all focused on just sounds to get it,. So only cons is this,. Neither all over is perfect. Battery backup 25 min - 19 hours. 10 min to 9-10 hours is right. Design is awesome. Packing is great. Worth it in 1999 with oneplus

name: BINIT KUMAR
title: Battery life, bass , noise cancellation all are so poor in comparison to as told by company
content: Battery life is less than half . As told that it gives 20 hrs battery life but my earphone works not more than 7 to 8 hrs . Why ? ?. What should be done ? Where should i get it resolved?. Also there is not at all noise cancellation. Even a whisper or little noise that also 50 ft far away can be heard on the other side of calling person.. Again , there is noooooo bass !! Not even 10 %.. Very much disappointed from one plus for this product.

name: Priya Mishra
title: Good product with a great bass...
content: I am writing this review after using this product over a week. Nice product with a great bass... It fits the ear properly and mic is very good during calls.. Noise cancellation is VERY good... It takes 15 mins to charge from 0-80%..Thanks to the warp charging technology.. The battery lasts upto 8 hours on a single 100% charge..

name: RAJESH KUMAR KUSHAVAHA
title: Quick charge ....all the best bro
content: I am writing a review of one plus bullets wireless earphone.... Its name is same as this given products its take charge time 10 to 20 mins and last upto 30 hrs because its well design .... When I m out of ear than both earphone are tough in each other and automatically off so charge less consume. 2nd it when I m out in ear than so fast connect that you can not imagine. Sound quality is very fine. Over all I am saying to u no any earphone near about this1+🤩🤩🤩🤩

name: Divya
title: Loved it😍
content: I liked it. Does the job. Can't say that it has the best sound quality out there. But, for me it works fine. The best part is the charging time. With 10 minutes charging you can use for 10 hours is not just an advertisement tagline. It actually works😊

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Product for Phone calls but Not great for Music Lovers
content: The sound quality is decent, probably it will suit who are used to moving around, having more calls but not a great product fr Music lovers.. Pros. Great Bluetooth range you can move around at a distance and connectivity still stays. battery life is great. Cons. Bass quality is very poor some lower frequencies get cancelled, also sound is bit harsh. Sometimes there is a delay if you are recording your voice on some apps like Voice recorder etc.

name: Nikita
title: music lovers dont buy, you will be disappointed.
content: fast charge is very very important for me.. its a average gear for continuous conference call and lazy people like me who forget to charge.. "one plus" I give you "5 minis" for sound quality like this, I don't recommend it for listening songs.

name: Pranay Sawant
title: Value for money
content: Good product for sound clarity and battery life in terms of fast charge and durability. But don't buy if you are looking for a music compliant where you pay attention to every Nord as this doesn't differentiate and bass is not as good as other category earphones. But you can buy if you ought to use for calling and rather chirpy casual use

name: yunus shah
title: does not stick to ears
content: moves out of ear pretty easily, difficult to manage, a cable organizer or clip is better to prevent annoying hanging

name: PRASUN SANNIGRAHI
title: Bought it on 1999 and it valued the brand
content: Sound quality : Better. My opinion : If you have budget then go for it , I can give it 4 star ratings .. Price : 1999/-. Bass quality : Better. Charge Capacity : Good / Normal use 2-3 days .. Charging Time : Less than half hour to full charge from zero. Colour & Design : Easy to hold

name: Vivek Timothy
title: Battery.Sound quality
content: Excellent bluetooth earphones at a very reasonable price.Battery full charge gives you 3-4 days based on your normal usage.Sound quality is amazing and it has latency but it's very low.. that's not an issue but it is the best bluetooth earphones at market which has a lot of features and advantages.

name: BALA VIGNESHWARAN
title: Worth buying
content: I have been used one week It will fantabulous for this price segment.....if u are a bass lover may be its not u r s choice but bass level is normally ok range only. PROS. 1.CHARGING SPEED. 2.CONNECTION BETWEEN ONE DEVICE TO ANOTHER DEVICES. 3.19 HOURS BATTERY LIFE ONCE U FULLY CHARGED. 4 . 10 minutes charge it can be longlast upto 10 hrs. 5.Ultra low latency in PUBG (using fanatic mode only). Cons:. 1.according to me bass is not that much of worth.but in this price of segment it ll be worth of it

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review after 2 weeks
content: After using for 2 weeks, here's my review.. Pro's : Battery backup as claimed , Does not pain even after straight 2-3 hours use , Superfast connectivity, Does not fall even on running, passive noise cancellation works good, Sound quality good. Con's : Minimal bass , no active noise cancellation, sound volume little low. Overall : It does not provide you a great music experience but if you are looking for good budget wireless earphones for your daily work with basic requirements, go for it.

name: Gopika P Vinod
title: Cheating 10 day return policy...coz product went wrong on the 15 th day
content: They cheated me....the product is no longer working... It had gone unworthy on the 15 th day after purchase ...so trapped can't replace... Do buy it from one plus sites ....Amazon is no longer preferred.

name: Rishika Shah
title: Battery draining fast within one month.
content: The battery started draining within 5 minutes after one month of use. No bass. Using it on one Plus 7pro. Bought it because of good reviews. I think other in ear headphones are much better. Cannot return or exchange after one week. Wasted my money. Please think and buy.

name: Ravi Teja Gande
title: Good for the price range.
content: Battery life is just outstanding. The sound quality was clear but the bass was not that good even though I bought the (bass edition). For bass I would rate 3.5. In bass edition we would expect more than this. The pause and play option takes 1.5 second to act. My recent earphones were jbl endurance run bluetooth. It has a bit more bass compared to bullet wireless but the quality of sound is better in oneplus bullet wireless. But never the less for 2000.

name: Tarique Anwar
title: Value for money or we say ab jo agya to use krte 😂
content: The headfone is good in quality wise and also in sound but while gaming we feel the latency and I paired this one with a one plus device bt feels a latency in it over al it is best for out door activities and in game it's ok in it and the mic is not tht wel u should have to speak a bitter loud for the good experience to the opposite person on the cal

name: Guru
title: Disappointed being a OnePlus fan
content: Used, realme earphones before using this oneplus. Liked realme's experienced of noise cancellation and better bass. With realme I had travelled on bike and spoke on phone freely. But OnePlus is very tivial in noise cancellation and except for battery backup, it is waste of money. It can be priced in China terms at 600 to 1000

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not Original. Received Duplicate item.
content: Just received this item 10 minutes ago. After unboxing it became clear that I have received a duplicate oneplus product as never settle logo is absent on the red box. After reading reviews I came to know of similar cases. On the other hand, some users have received the original product with the never settle logo. Unsatisfied.

name: Ayush Vatsal
title: Great build quality, underwhelming sound quality
content: Excellent build quality, great in-ear feel and comfort. The sound quality and bass wasn't as expected, it sure could be better than other wireless earphone in its class but there are over a handful of wired headphones that sound a lot better and cost less.. I'm not a big bass guy, but still I could have more bass on this one.. I have not used a lot of wireless headphones so I might be prejudiced, but I sure can say that the wired ones sound a lot better than this one.

name: Shankar Sharan Omi ✔
title: Cheap Chinese quality ever in my life.
content: The phones of this brand are superb(flagship) at a budget range but when I use these earphones I was in shock the quality of these earphones the sound quality was of the cheap wired earphones. The sound was muffering at 56℅ volume.

name: Priyesh Sonavane
title: Amazing product by OnePlus at affordable price...
content: Sound Quality is good for this price range. Bluetooth Range is pretty good. And Bass is low but still is good for everyday use. It is really light weight and really comfortable to wear for hours. Battery life is awesome. Besides Latency while game is very low. Microphone is also Clear while calling.Quick switch is really a handy feature and i loved it.Overall its a great product for this price range.Hope OnePlus brings more product around this price range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good and Value for money only if you are lucky to get the product in the Working Condition.
content: I had ordered these during the Republic Sale. It has great features like Bluetooth 5.0 and Quick Charge. Bass is good too. The main issue that I had was that the bluetooth did not Turn On after the first charge. Tried resetting but to no avail. Hence, ordered a replacement.. The replacement suffered the same issue. The earphones do not turn on at all even at the full battery and I am returning the replacement as well.. If you get lucky with a good pair, its a good product otherwise.

name: shinas
title: Got my earphones delivered finally!
content: I got the earphones delivered 9 hrs earlier which is cool,and when i put in the earphones and played a music,it wasnt loud at all....but,when i increased the volume from the earphone button,the sound just increased to next level dude,i gotta tell this earphone sticks to ur ears so well and the music is really good,really Loud music output and u even get a free ear cusion pair which is cool,and most importantly the battery is just soooo insane.tension not,i highly recommend u guys its an amazing product

name: Jeffin K John
title: Superb buy for 2k
content: Most probably thus may be one of the first reviews for bullets wireless z 'bass edition'.like everyone I've also done many researches before buying this.i saw many youtubers and others complaining about the bass.in my opinion the bass is absolutely pure and its perfect, for a common listner.I think they all are reviewing from the perspective of a music director or something.The sound quality is absolutely pure.We can hear every single sound in detail.If your budget is 2k i highly recommend this product

name: Sanjay
title: Not compatible with all phone
content: Connectivity with my Redmi note 3 is not possible. At first, it connects and then it disconnects and then connects again but I can only listen to music using my ear phones. I am not able to use this for calling and this really sucks as the main purpose of buying this was for my calls and now I don't have an option but to return it. Please read through in q and a and check if your phone is compatible with this else is a waste of time and money

name: Lelen
title: Possibly the best mid budget wireless earphone.
content: Fast delivery in just two working days.. It's super easy connect to phone.. Listened to Metallica's the unforgiven right after unpackaging and the first impression was mind-blowing. Will update after a week regarding battery life and other aspects of any that requires mentioning.

name: Pushkar jain
title: Superb!!
content: This is an amazing neckband to consider when your budget is less than 4000 . Though it costs only 1999 it gets a variety of flagship functions. The sound is crystal clear with a nice bass. It has a balanced sound. The red and black colour combination too flaunts in itself. I am loving it.

name: V M ISMAIL
title: POOR BASS,
content: I like the phones from one plus so i bought this Headset,after two days of usage i returned back the same to amazon seller. Built quality ,fast charging ,noise cancellation and battery life is awesome,. sound quality is not that good ,poor bass (very light ) compared to other low end headsets,I also tried with some equalizer modifications on my one plus phone but very poor sound quality with settings i feeled,we need atleast a good bass to hear music to feel the same,otherwise i love the same.

name: A. K Chaudhary
title: Superb battery backup , premium build with superb sound qwality just go ahead n buy it guy's.
content: Guy's , just go ahead n buy it blindly I always do lots of research n then use to buy any products. After lots of research, watching YouTube videos I bought this one. It has mind blowing battery back-up no need to charge for 3 to 4 days with normal use. Call qwality build qwality both r very good. Looks very premium & light wait. Nice fitting in ears sound qwality also good. I detected 1 🌟 only for bass. It's not bad it's good but not for the bass lovers. But u won't regret to buy this. Best in class

name: Kaustubh
title: Descent product
content: It is ok but not too good. You can use it just for casual. Sound quality is also ok ok but is not upto the mark. It has only great battery of 20min which also charges very fast otherwise sound and base not upto the mark. You can get more options under 1500/- I think go for truely wireless buds of any good company.

name: Ricky Gupta
title: Quite Good package at this price point!!
content: To be honest, it's not as bad in the bass as people say and is a great device as the battery backup is more than expected, it stays 100 percent even after 3hours of consecutive usage, the treble is however slightly dominating but still the sound output is balanced and bass is a little low but is apt for a product from One Plus at this price point. To sum up, it's not only a great device but for me it is amongst top 3 bluetooth earphones in neckband/TWS type within the range of 2500.. P.S.- The unboxing experience is Amazing!!. 🔥💯♥️

name: Niranjan
title: Refurbished /repackaged returned products delivered
content: The retailer was appario retail .The first time I ordered these earphones ,the charging cable was missing and the box looked it was repacked .. I opted for a replacement and it was very obvious that a returned item was delivered. The eartips on the earphones were swapped with different size ones and the earphones itself were placed the other way around (left placed on the right and vice versa) .. If you're opting for online payment ,better order from OnePlus store .

name: Sushant Bilgi
title: Overall good earphones
content: Battery life is good but sound quality is clear with little bass.. Realme wireless has better bass and oppo series is also good.. Low latency while using on OnePlus devices is additional advantage.. Good for this price range but these earphones are not for bass lovers.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst ever product from oneplus!
content: Worst ever product from oneplus totally disappointing I bought this a month ago after using 20 days it's not working anymore, not able to pair devices the led is lightning forever I don't know what is. this for, even local headphones could work up to 3 months it would never stand for long time, please do not buy this product if you are looking to buy a wireless earphones with go for some other product my 2000 Rs completely wasted on this product

name: Dattaprasad Vaze
title: Best of the best
content: In short.... If you are casual listener of the music and if u are into lot of calls.. Then it's a perfect choice of BT earphones for you.. Bass is not good not bad. It's avg.. The one coolest thing is dat if you are OnePlus mobile user then it charges quickly in ½ an hour. And the batter back up is monstrous.. I usually get 4 days battery backup. And sometimes more then 4 days

name: Arun b
title: Duplicate products,
content: First time I got duplicate products and I return it. Again this supplier's given same issue products. Logo was missing. Mic not working. Cables rubber get dent Mark. Please don't buy this supplier's. And if you given complaint on Amazon they will never take care.. please don't buy from Amazon. They customer service person told me if you require original product then have to buy offline.

name: Jaseel NS
title: Bass Edition is my pick any day
content: Loudness blew me..... never expected from a bt device. That too 9 mm. Excellent sound quality and exceptional battery life even with improved bass..... upto 15 16 hrs in 60 % volume. Call quality and mic quality deserves special mention..... if you love the wireless ease and is a not so hardcore bass fan..... this will blow you..... by any means better than the normal edition... the slack in battery is worth the bump in bassy tones.... trust me💯👌

name: Tisa Banerjee
title: An honest review .
content: TBH , I don't like it that much . After 6 4 months , my headset started making that irritating beeping sound. I tried several methods , followed all the regulation . But that didn't help that much . Every time I ' switch on ' , it just started beeping all the time . But y'all know one thing that after I push one random button , it stops . So I'll advise you to go for the redmi one . It is far better. And if you know about the solution of my problem , please let me know .

name: ding tonsing
title: Not for gaming
content: Perfect for music, calls,videos except gaming like pubg.. This is definitely not for gaming purpose.. the surround sound while gaming is not perfect at all. Also there is sound lag while gaming.

name: chaitanya.Guntupalli
title: latency isnt for all op devices ...
content: i loved the conept of low latency when i heard of it but , when it comes to working this latency needs an update for the oneplus servers which lets the latency go down down. i'm using op 5 and is yet to get that update while most of my friends devices which are 0p7 and further are good to go with least possible latency. so ensure about the update and go for it ..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very satisfied
content: Very good product. Easy to connect and switch devices. Battery backup is amazing. Easily we can get 2 to 3 days for heavy users as well. Sound quality is very good. You may disappointed if you are a high bass lovers. It is adequate enough for sure. Very very satisfied in terms of daily use.

name: jonthan
title: The best neckband under 2000 rupees!
content: Sound quality is AMAZING! It had extremely clear highs, lows, mids, trebles and even vocals!. This neckband is perfect for workouts and the ear buds don't fall out.. The build quality is also amazing. It was very comfortable too! The mic quality was bad but other than that, I loved this product!!!

name: Harish Khairnar
title: Good for normal user and someone who wants better battery backup
content: Insane battery life (almost 20 hrs as specified on the box) that's better than any other bluetooth earphone. Quick switch feature is awesome, call clarity is also good (didn't experience noice that much), range is also good, charges pretty quickly even with other charger, in 3 days I had to charge only once (used for about 20-25 hrs), latency is low as expected on other phones as well, some lag if you use performance intensive app, doesn't support Qualcomm aptx hd codec , but for normal user it shouldn't make any difference, wire is pretty thick so it won't cut early, all in all very good purchase

name: JP
title: [Battery Life] and [Sound Quality] - Very Well Balanced!
content: Bullets Wireless Z(Bass edition Red) - Excellent product which strikes a fine balance between battery life and sound quality. Practically, this is almost close to a wired headset. Never ran out of battery in the middle of something important which is uncommon for a wireless headset considering my bitter experiences in the past. Thumbs Up👍! With OnePlus warp charger, time to charge is minimal too. Not sure how this fares without a warp charger. Sound quality is decent(if not great). Worth buying!

name: Tuhin Chandra
title: Best under 2000
content: I am basically a high school student.. My basic need is listening to musics, doing online classes and calling.... So these earphones are perfect for me as it provides us with a huge battery life that is 20 hours and also it has a good my quality and a very little bit of noise cancellation with the high sound quality.... I don't need bass that much because I am not a heavy user and don't listen much to the bass songs ..... According to me this earphones are the best earphones under 2000 rupees

name: biswajit sahu
title: Linking for this item depends on how you want to use it.
content: This item is great if you want a wireless earphone for the purpose of talking for hours. It is comfortable and goes inside helmet also, so it is very nice to hear directions from google maps while riding a bike.. For music lovers this is not a good buy, simple and plain beats and bass dont give a punch. You won't like it.. Overall its a great purchase for me as I normally use it while travelling and it gives OK music for travelling.

name: Sunil Khanna
title: Disappointed
content: Worked well for 3 months without a hitch. Suddenly stopped working during use. Never started again. No power, its not charging. Oneplus support is the worst customer service in the entire technology industry. Customer care does not know what to do. If you dont have a oneplus dealer in your city, I recommend not to buy. They look like great value for money in the first look but actually it is nothing but a cheap Chinese Scam. Audio calling quality is good. There is no bass (but to be fair, can't expect any base at this price).

name: Arun Thomas
title: Hands down the best pair of wireless earphones for this price range!
content: The Sound Quality is pretty good. Worth every penny. Pretty comfortable for workouts and has enhanced sound quality for movie/music sound effects. Noise cancelling is really good. Won’t here a thing after wearing. The volume goes up very high. Really Good for this price point!

name: Bhupendra
title: पैसे की बर्बादी
content: आप सब से निवेदन है ये ईर्फ़ोन ना ख़रीदें, ये घटिया headphone कुछ दिन सही चला उसके बाद इसने अपनी औक़ाद दिखा दी, बहुत घटिया क्वालिटी का है जिसका आपको सर्विस सेंटर भी नहीं मिलेगा । चायनीज़ माल है घटिया प्रोडक्ट ।. मैं बहुत परेशान हुआ इसे लेने के बाद. पैसे की बर्बादी है ये ।

name: Akshata
title: Worth buying
content: Been using for a week now. Battery life is excellent. Sound quality too good. Fast charging, Easy connectivity, good range. Bass is average, but I'm not a bass fan so still good for me.. Considering the price range, I don't think there is anything better than this.

name: ArindamGhosal
title: Awesome 👍 neckband for 2k
content: I have bought this today. In a single word it makes me feel just wow.... Soft, comfortable, premium finishing, great fitting in ear ....buid quality is great.. Come to the audio section....great sound...bass is somuch improved compared to the previous version... loudness is quite good ... microphone is quite impressive, battery back up just awesome. Apart this there are so many interesting features like fast charging...multiswitching ..etc. Just grab it.. it's great deal for this price range

name: Vamsee Mohan
title: Genuine
content: Sound quality is good at this price range and battery life. Using it for longer durations cause irritation in ears(may vary from person to person), that's the major con I observed. If you charge the battery for more time than required, it will produce a buzz noise for the first 10min after immediate charging. So, charge it only for 30-40min.

name: Ajinkya J.
title: Must buy other as compared to its competitors.
content: If you using a one plus device, then definitely I mean definitely go for this for a seamless experience. Sounds are pretty good if compared as per the price. If you want budget wireless earphones then this is the best suggestion as compared to other.

name: vishal
title: Connection issues with laptop
content: The sound quality is good. It's also great for call of duty I'm getting no latency issue. I don't play pubg so don't know what really kills me is that you can't connect it to laptop I've seen n numbers of videos where people are complaining about connecting issues. Please one plus fix this.

name: MGM
title: Great Product. You will be happy to have it
content: Great Product from One Plus. I would say the quality is intact. Sound quality and clarity is really wow. Noise cancellation is good. Many have said that the bass quality is not that great. It's true to some extent. But you can easily overcome that with already existing apps in playstore. Use a good music player that provides custom Equalizer. I am using Jetaudio and the bass is coming out nice and good, without any impact to the sound quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome wireless headphones.
content: The product is very good and have pretty good sound quality and you will definitely enjoy music as well the call quality sound also good. It's magnetic on-off function good and easily coonected with phone.. Overall recommend for the buy.

name: Gurkirat Singh
title: Best sound quality and bass🔥🔥
content: In first view i was very much excited to unbox it i just love the oneplus and the packaging was also good in the first look. I checked the sound quality it was very clear and the bass is mind blowing im really surprised that in the price range of 2000 it is provides best sound quality and with good bass highs mids and lows are very clear you can listen songs with upto 80 to 85 % of volume which is i think sufficient to bliss your ears.. one of the best earphones available in market under 2K.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Voice is getting broken in between
content: After using for two weeks, I am writing this review on the product. During the conversation over phone or Teams communicator on laptop or watching any video, most of the time I feel voice is being broken for few seconds in between. This is drawback. Noise cancellation is okay okay as per the price. And bass quality is not that great. Battery back up is good. Fast chariging. Switching from different devices is good functionality that I like.

name: Punit Mendon
title: Worth the money
content: Not as perfect in sound when compared to one plus bullet 2..but it is like comparing apples with oranges.. Very handy and good sounding earphone in the market. Battery back up is good. 10 min quick charge is great function

name: Ankit Shukla
title: A very good Earphone with unique and better functionalities.
content: The earphone is fantastic. A very unique feature is quick connect to two devices. Many earphones have dual pairing that is sometimes an issue when you want to work and answer calls. For me switching quickly to my choice of device is more flexible.. Those who are complaining of bass, i am not sure what is missing. This has balanced frequencies and quality sound.. Rest all the pros in other reviews are correct. Cons are very relative.

name: Manit Ahuja
title: Feature rich but sound quality average.
content: Average sound quality. Good Features, battery life awesome, light weight as well. Expected some good quality of sound but i am disappointed. I am already using mivi thunder beats. They have far better sound quality than this. One plus could have done better.

name: Sanskar S.
title: Not worth
content: Simple breakdown. 1. Mediocre sound.. 2. Mediocre bass.. 3. Don't buy if you don't own a oneplus device.. 4. If purchased for any other device you can only use spotify for better sound because any spotify has a decent enough equaliser to tweak out maximum sound quality out of it.. 5. Don't buy if you plan it to use it for PUBG (applicable for oneplus devices too).

name: Varshneyo Roy
title: Excellent but FAKE.
content: Excellent product,. Bass, noise cancellation, mic, functions and build quality is good.. Though didn't function properly with my laptop (play/pause button) rest everything was OK. At 50%a good sound quality was received. More of mobile type thing. Battery backup was same as described.. BUT THE MAIN PROBLEM IS"WHERE IS THE NEVER SETTLE LOGO" in the entire box there was no such logo as shown by many youtubers.. THINKING IT TO BE A FAKE PRODUCT.. but quantity was expecting.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great earphones
content: This pair of earphones is not for the bassheads. If you like thumping bass, look elsewhere. Otherwise the overall sound quality is great and clear. The connection quality and range is great. Battery life is phenomenal. Charging speed with OnePlus charger is great. The call quality is superb.10/10 recommended.

name: Gadgetholic
title: Superb Product....Thanks Amazon.
content: Better quality and very nice Bluetooth.. Improved functions with decreased price.. Better than oneplus bullets 2.. Buds are lighter and better on ear.. Charging in 10 min rocking function.

name: sagar Trivedi
title: Awesome but Mike are not clear voice everything is 5 of 4 ⭐ but Mike 5 of 1 ⭐
content: Wonderful product first thing is battery are so wonderful because 10 to 20 minutes charging and running more then 2 days ,but some problems in noise voice and Mike are not good quality because voice not clear others side.

name: Praveen Kumar R
title: Fast charging and battery backup is super, sound quality is good.
content: Battery backup is very good, 15minutes charging enough for entire day.. Sound quality is good.But bass volume low. Boss lover will get disappointed.. For zoom call and google meet, perfect one for office use.Within seconds can connect to the phone.. Best one under 2000/- because of battery backup and fast charging.

name: Sidhant sahoo
title: Not upto mark but still good
content: The earphones r packed nicely nd came ......the sound quality is not that much good howuch i thought...but still good than other earphones at this price...i have tried a bunch oof wireless nd truer wireless earphones..but both of them doesn't have that much of good sound quality and bass like the wired earphones...so if u r a wired user and trying to switch into wireless...then u may not be satisfied....the best earphones i used till date at a good price point is boats bassheads

name: manish kumar singh
title: Great for office and personal use
content: Wat an earphone... So comfortable and massive battery backup. Connects like a butter and so convenient in using for long hours... Trust me... U would nt feel a single itch while uding these... Must buy... Great for personal and official use... Awesome awesome awesome product.

name: Rajprasad Ravichandran
title: A good product from OnePlus again #oneplus
content: Good and best headset for the price , good sound quality , more than a medium quality in bass , water resistant is superb for my workouts in rain . good material finish , best in class charging and battery life , light weight , perfect fit , good connectivity , nice switch off/on with recent connection switching. Classy package made it a premium by just getting box itself . To say in one line one again a good product from OnePlus . Good work OnePlus . #oneplus #amazonindia

name: Shuvajit Nandi
title: Why R U Weast The Money on OnePlus, Go On Realme Buds.
content: Im highly expected on this earphone,But The sound quality ans bass is not good, my expectations,i have a realme buds earphone, but this valuable money i suggest u go on Realme Buds Wearless Earphone & sounds &Bass Quality is more then better OnePlus Z.. I am really weast the money.

name: Megha Gupta
title: Technical Issue with earphones
content: I found an issue with these headphones and little disappointed with one plus. If you are one what's app video call and you are using your bullets; then incase if you receive a normal call and disconnects that normal call. The bullets also get disconnected and you start getting the sound you were getting earlier on your earphones on to your phone.. Just disconnect a normal call while already running a video call using bullets.. I am going to return this product for sure.

name: nagendra
title: Good product but need more bass
content: Today received the product.Battery wise and charging wise superb. Sound quality is good not excellent need more bass otherwise excellent product.

name: Sandesh
title: Great sound quality and provides awesome sound experience
content: This is awesome. Its been a week I have been using and it is still having around 30% charge(not a heavy user). If I enable Flight mode and disable it, has some problem in reconnecting otherwise it is fine.

name: Teenagers Post
title: OnePlus is Awesome
content: Ordered on 20th May and got delivery in 3 days. It's Awesome as expected. 1. Light Weight 5/5. 2. Sound Quality is very good - 5/5 Use of Audio tuner recommended, change the tuner and experience more good Sound quality. 3. Bass - 4/5. 4. Best part is charging time - it last for 20 hours in one charge. Rest design and look wise it is great. Just Go for it. Thankyou Amazon for early delivery. Thankyou OnePlus for launching earphones under budget

name: Nowman
title: Noisy mic
content: Worst decision that I bought these.. The item that I received was having connection problems, then I got the replacement of the same, the replaced item has mic issue. Mic is not working properly and creating alot of noise.

name: shyam
title: Not up to the mark
content: Writing after using this morethan a month. Sound is really not as expected. Bass is really low. And not so comfortable wearing it. But takes 100% charging in just 10mins as mentioned. Better for daily just listening music without wired to our devices.

name: irfan ramjaan
title: The build quality is cheap as Chinese product.
content: Overall the sound is decent,but build quality is worst after using 45 days,the mic and volume buttons didn't work properly also left side earpiece is damage,I am so disappointed 😞☹️ by build quality.. After all of this the warranty couldn't be satisfied you they didn't replace the item but they are saying they will repair it.. What kind of repair is this.if products is damage by internally issue.. So I will suggest you not to buying this type of quality.. Thanks 👍.

name: Abishek
title: Very Cheap Sound Quality
content: Sound quality is very bad, there is no depth and the vocals are sharp on your ears. Sound is narrow like it's on cheap earphones. No bass watsoever.. Built quality is good and Bluetooth connectivity is also good but I did experience few Bluetooth disconnects on the first day itself. Im sure it is bound to have some issues in just few months.. Mic is good and If it is just for a lot of calls then it's ok.. NOT FOR MUSIC lovers, don't buy. Try wired alternatives.

name: sai abhishek
title: Not powerful it's ear friendly
content: If previously you were using jbl or sony which produces that loud boom type bass, you may feel the bass is lacking but the bass is good on this but not that boom type or loud. If you're a bass lover, you can adjust or control output level in the equalizer in your phone especially 'oneplus users'.. The sound stage is perfect. Ear friendly. It's worth 2k. Very light that after wearing it for some time you'll forget that you're wearing it. And yeah no never settle logo inside the box 🙄

name: Amazon Customer
title: Decent product at fair price
content: Product build quality is good.. Used for some hours and found sound quality is fair not that much great if I compared with jbl which I was using before.. Bass punch is not that much great but yes it gives decent balanced sound of music.. Btry backup yet to check as I just received the product and reviwed it.. Switching feature works perfectly..

name: Mannu k.
title: Not fit to my expectations
content: Problem with this when you are driving... The mic is out side totally.. so you can't talk while driving. Rest you wan to use you can.. The design is too bad.. the wire come in front of the cheeck... It look so bad..... Sound and battery are good.. But the fitting of but was not that good.. As it not fulfill my desires i had to return it.

name: Vivek Sharma
title: Good
content: Noise cancelation is pathetic, other party on the call will hear everything from your background. Otherwise your own voice will go crystal clear.. Latency on gaming is High. During gaming bullet would have already hit when sound comes to your ear.. Best part of this earphone is battery life and charging speed. It does last 20 hours on a single speed as one plus claims.

name: Sai Dhanush
title: Check thoroughly for 9days with charging and using it with music , watching movies and making calls.
content: I liked the bass and build quality of the product, the connectivity is superb , but sometimes during calls switching from blietooth to speaker disconnects the Bluetooth and we should reconnect again. Buy this product and check it thoroughly 9 days and don't throw the box after unboxing it pls save for atleast 10 days ,so if get some problems u can return it. Pls dont do the mistake i did that throwing the box. Noice cancellation is okok..

name: Jebin Jose
title: Great first impression!!!
content: It's a clear winner when it comes to battery life and audio clarity. Bass is not punchy as the other rivalries in this price category but for me, the bass seems to be pretty good. The quick switch button is very helpful while switching from one phone to another. Audio latency might spike up time to time but while gaming and Fanatic mode enabled, it's competitors are no match for the Bullet Wireless Z when it comes to the latency. Overall brilliant product at an affordable price.. Cheers

name: Avijit Chakraborty
title: Value For Money 💰
content: Super Fast delivery of Amazon,Great Unboxing Experience of OnePlus product.... Sound:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐( Loud n clear ). Bass: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ ( proffesional and Balanced ). Charging speed :⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 10 min. 10 hr. ( Even with 18watt mi charger). Ergonomics:⭐⭐⭐ Earbuds could've been lil bit smaller...but it's fine.. Latency:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (Fantastic). Overall Verdict: ⭐⭐⭐⭐½ ( Brilliant Product ). ** If you're fond of balanced sound,and you're in ₹2000 price bracket... You're good to go !!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality is good, but quick switch feature is meaningless on the bass edition
content: The headphones are very good with good sound quality and comfort of wearing the headphones for a long time. But what made the manufacturer think to remove the hardware button for the quick switch feature to switch between the connected devices. The normal edition of the OnePlus Bullets Z has the hardware button to switch between two devices that work seamlessly. I returned the Bass edition and bought the normal one. The quick switch feature works well in that.

name: Sharan
title: Best in budget!!
content: Received within 24hrs of ordering the product. Excellent service from Amazon. Talking about the product boy oh boy!! Didn't expect this quality at this price point from OP. Previously I was using realme wirless and I would definitely say that this product is very good when compared to realme in all segments. No problem faced in call reception. Bass is good at this price point. If you're looking for a Bluetooth at this price point then this is highly recommended. Just go for it!! Cheers!

name: Parth Sahasrabuddhe
title: Simply Amazing !!!
content: Writing this review after 24 hrs of opening the box.. The sound quality is brilliant and bass is quite good.. The built quality is also good.. I received the earphones with 100% battery and I have used it for more than 10-12 hrs , still battery shows 80% of the power remaining.. So battery backup wise it is doing a very good job.. If you are looking for a earphones which are wireless and your budget is ₹2000 just close your eyes and go for it !! It will not disappoint you .

name: Buyer
title: I would still go for regular edition
content: I don't know why One plus decided to remove the quick switch button and the inline mic button controls. Just for cost cutting?. Since i have been habitual of using quick switch button while switching in between different devices, i find it irritating to go do it in every devices bluetooth settings.. Sound quality is a good value for money no doubt.. Be careful with the wire as it tends to break with time.

name: Safwan
title: Value for money 💵
content: For the price its a good product! There to super low latency even without fanatic mode enabled. And the quick switch is super helpful . And the the type c charging port mark its easy to charge with any phone charger unlike other products which still uses micro usb.. Overall a good product, can't comment on battery life as of now but charging is super quick and magnetic on/off is useful.

name: Aditya
title: Just Go For It
content: I have tried lot of neckbands and can definitely tell you that these are the best in the price segment they fall. Amazing battery life amazing performance. The sound is well balanced I didnt even had to use equalizer to set the sound.. I had been in love with these earphones from the time I heard normal edition ones. There are few better features on the normal edition like the quick switch, +3hours of battery and a closer microphone.But honestly both are decent sounding earphones.

name: avinash kumar
title: I love it ❤️
content: Before purchase i was slightly confused 😇 about to take decisions 😃 that it is good or not.?. But believe me it's awesome ❤️ sound quality is so impressive and the bass is fabulous. (While using "mi music player" the bass is quite low) But Don't worry i found a solution for it. 😉. Please use "mx player" and go to settings (mx player setting) and turn on the Equalizer (see the pic. Above) and adjust your bass and virtualizer. Enjoy it 🥰🤗 Hope this information helps you 😊

name: Akash Chauhan
title: Nice
content: This is a second pair of one plus headphones I ordered.. happy with the product but one plus logo missing inside of the box. Ordered my first headphone from one plus official website and there was a login inside the box but when ordered from Amazon the logo is missing. It looks genuine

name: Ajay Devre
title: Very poor
content: Not expect for this from one plus, while driving vehicle opposite side they can't hear my voice, I want to stop my vehicle. And main problem most of they are not connected after I separated them and take so much time to connecting. I buy this after seen Amazon choice. Very disappointed product.

name: Oxygen
title: Only for bass
content: Its good for bass songs only. Normal conversation, movies, videos etc. will also be slightly heard with bass effect. If you are willing to customize equalizer setting in your phone,, your purpose will not be 100% solved. Because you know for classical songs you set equalizer on classical mode,, it won't sound like classic it'll have bass majorly.. If you're bass lover it's perfect for you.. If Amazon is giving me refund I'm ready to cancel the order.

name: Shalz
title: Good Battery Life- *BAD* Mic quality. Mic stopped working in less than 3months
content: Its just been less than 3 months of moderate use and the mic already stopped functioning. The issue happened around after a month's use. But resolved itself. Now again it happened and the caller at the other end cannot hear us. Rather they can hear the ambience noise at times. I'm trying for replacement.. Pros: Battery back up is nice. Not good for music lovers and bass lovers. Just battery back up and quick to charge.

name: Rocky Singh
title: after 3 month of use
content: Fast connectivity, well sound quality and buildup quality , as well as easy to handle light weight water resistance it really good for all rounder use. and delivery was also fast though i am not prime member user but still fast delivery i like the way they deal as well as if u got any kind of problem they replace your product hassle free over all it is a good product under 2000. after 3 month of use i can say that it is a worth buying.

name: Rais Ahmad
title: Best product with good price
content: Profuct is very good and i am always a Fan of Oneplus and this product is absolutely Amazing..... Easy to connect.

name: Sumukha
title: Good product
content: My honest review. If your are a rough user just don't even touch it 😂 I repeat don't even touch it. Sound quality. 8/10. DURABILITY. 7/10. Bass 8/10. Battery. 10/10. As claimed by oneplus. Weight 10/10. Very lightweight. Rubber quality 10/10. I REPEAT IF YOUR A ROUGH USER DONT EVEN PRESS THE BUTTON (BUY NOW)😂😂. OK THNX GUYS NICE PRODUCT. THIS MY REVIEW

name: SARAB
title: Good sound but.....
content: See the quality in hand is not as great but sound and all are good not great... It does not have aptX support and u will feel a little cheap and light buds when u hold it in ur hands....

name: chetan
title: Go for it...best buy for 2000
content: Quite good for 2000 rs...bass is good..sound quality is also really good.. it doesn't provide full noise cancellation but you can almost hear nothing..just a little bit of sound but that's fine!! One small issue is that when you try to balance a high bass, the sound of guitar becomes a little bit blunt..sharp guitar sound + good bass is always loveable...but that's not the case...but I'm happy with the purchase !!

name: Manoj Patil
title: Need help on ear buds ruber.
content: Product is ok... But I don't know after using 20 days some how it started peeling the ear buds ruber.. please let me know how we can fix this one... Or can I get this one exchanged... * Press button is not that great while riding in bike we can't quickly receive the calls we have to get used to it*. Overall product is ok I need this one to be fixed ASAP... I am giving one star for not responding on ear buds problem. No contact so far.. Thanks

name: Saqlain Siddiqui
title: Go for it
content: An overall package with everything above average. Excellent ease of use, can switch between laptop and mobile quickly.. Great battery life. Good call quality. Good music quality (If you're an audiophile or nitpicker then maybe you'll find some places where this lacks). Buttons are great, volume as well as play pause skip option and assistant summoning as well. Better than TWS earphones since you wont be worried about battery, losing it in crowd etc. Better than most of the earphones in this range.

name: Prateek Sonny
title: Crisp & clear sound. Terrific battery life
content: For office and general usage it's amazing. Battery life is truly great and it switches smoothly between paired devices. For a OnePlus user this is a perfect add-on. If you're looking for powerful bass, this probably isn't for you.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent for casual and descent use
content: It's good clarity of song is excellent but bass and noise cancelations is not good, not the worst but not up to the mark, It is only suitable for descent pleasant songs, not for heavy base songs, but yes it fits best in ears, and gives good theater like environment.

name: priyanka rathore
title: no guarantee and warranty provided for the sound issue
content: after a month of purchase its started creating problem in sound... the sound is not properly functioning...there is no guarantee or waranty card or policy given in it... else at every store the guarantee and warranty is always provided for an year on branded product we purchase... stongly disappointed

name: Venkatesa Kumar
title: OnePlus bulletz wireless z
content: This earphones is really good for fit and good battery backup and also it comes with fast charging support but you want to experience a good bass and good music quality means you can better go with boat rockers 510

name: Vivek
title: No quick switch feature in this bass edition headset
content: Please do not buy this bass edition headset. It does not have the quick switch option as mentioned in the description. It is false advertising. They changed the feature at the last moment as confirmed by the one plus customer care. Please don't buy this headset if u looking for quick switch option in this

name: shopping freak
title: Worthless.
content: Worthless . Absolutely worthless. No bass. No clarity when calling. The only plus point is within 5 minutes you can charge the headset to 💯 percent. That's all. My sonny c310 is far far better in every aspect.

name: Prashant
title: Great. Go for it.
content: It is worth the price. Buy it. Do not look any further. It looks premium and works premium. And this is coming from apple freak. I have all the apple products. So go for it.

name: MVS Pavan
title: Nice Product. Longest Battery Life under 2k
content: Sound Quality is good. Not much bass but very well balanced. I use for youtube video watching and Zoom calls. Mic just does its job quiet well. For me it's perfect. Battery Life is a huge stand out. Charging easily lasts 3 days even with good usage. If quality music/bass is your highest priority then do check the oppo enco with hi-res, if you are ready to compromise on battery life.

name: jayesh gor
title: Worst Quality build quality as well sound
content: sound quality is worst it is not worth of 1899/- so kindly go for another brand ear buds plastic looks cheap only thing Battery back up is good but quality is not good so kindly think twice and buy this ear phone

name: biswajoy
title: NICE PRODUCT
content: List of features i like :. 1) sleek design. 2) Quick connect to multiple devices ( A BIG GO , i wasn't sure if this feature would work on apple products but it. did.). 3) Nice packaging. 4) considerable bass. Things i didn't like :. 1) i lean towards a truly wireless design. 2) would have been easier to interact with if it had been placed in the bottom case. 3) not sure if it will last a year or two. Final :. It's a nice product worth buying if you don't have the cash for AirPods or may be looking for an auxiliary pair of earphones .

name: Piyush
title: Worth purchasing...
content: I have used this for 2 days and here is my experience. Sound quality is very smooth and clear. Bass quality is decent not too good not too bad it's good. Battery life is amazing I used for 4-5 hrs it only used 20% of battery. Latency is also decent not the best. It's one of the best you can buy under 2k. If you are a gamer or love high bass then you should not buy it, but if you listen to music, YouTube, movies etc for logs hours then it's perfect. Fit and desing are also very good

name: Tarini Mengle
title: Not too happy with the Fit
content: Decently priced for a one plus product, lovely color. Not very happy with the over all fit of these earphones.. Battery life is great though, but the ear buds keep falling off and the neck band is too snug for the neck. Also the wires are a bit short which can restrict the movement of your head.. Mic reception is poor. But the noise cancellation is fine.

name: DEBOJYOTI
title: Most value-for-money Bluetooth wireless earbuds available on the market right now.
content: This new wireless neckband earbuds retain some of the key features of the more premium Bullets Wireless 2 while also bringing improvements of its own. Priced at just ₹1,999, the Bullets Wireless Z are among the most value-for-money Bluetooth wireless earbuds available on the market right now. Sound quality and build quality is not as good as BW2, but with a slight bass oriented, good mid and lack of high it does hold it's position.

name: Kislay Rajhans
title: Great great great great product 👍👍👍👍
content: Such a great product under 2000. JUST AMAZING. Surely, go for it. Such a great sound quality . It' amazing. ONEPLUS ROCKS. IT's base just amazing. I have no words for it. What a charging technology 😱. 10 mins of charging gives 10 hours of battery backup .. I have my OnePlus mobile , so I played games by turning Fnatic Mode 'ON' , It doesn't fell like I'm using a Bluetooth earphone , latency reduced so much that I can't explain .. Amazing

name: Kaustav Manna
title: Good Bluetooth Headset Under 2K
content: The sound quality is good and the bass is also good. Battery life is excellent. Packaging was also nice. The range of the headset is okay but if there are multiple walls in between it may create some problem. Otherwise, it is a nice product.. The product comes with three different sizes of earbuds which is also nice as the size of the earbuds will vary for the users. One should fit the right sized earbuds in the headset to get the best output.

name: ANKITA DAS
title: Sound that you can feel 😎
content: Bass quality at its best.. batter life is incredible and charged in only 15min fully...I just tell one line that sound that you can feel,😎🤓

name: YUVARAJU P R
title: If you really need you  can Buy
content: scince last two days I am using this ....with single charge still shows 60% battery pack up and comfortable to wear made up with good material but due to my ear structure deformity it is slight discomfort to wear...other than this everything is good

name: prakash nainwal
title: First experience worst experience with one plus
content: Highly disappointed by Bluetooth range within 2 m distance it gives trouble. I think just for battery life I paid 2k.. If my mobile just abt 2 m away and I tilt my head little bit or the left module go just below my Coller it stops. What the hell this is Bluetooth 5.O. Comfort wise also it is bulky and we feel like wearing something boat 400 rs earphones give better comfort they are small and fits well. .... My experience is bad

name: Ayush Mahajan
title: MADE IN CHINA ,Uncomfortable , Poor Audio quality
content: The signs are here.. 2.5 months of use and it has started to malfunction...Very very Uncomfortable . I was using Sennheiser earphones earlier which had a great audio quality but these are cheap , Chinese pieces there to ruin the audio experience... Please avoid if not necessity.

name: Shubham गाणार
title: Go for mint color
content: I have sony wireless headphones, but after using one plus Bullets Wireless Z for one month I would surely say that Bullets Wireless Z in-Ear Bluetooth is way better than sony. and go for MINT color, it looks cool.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality is nice and bass too
content: Sound quality, battery backup is nice. Many have posted review about poor bass so i initially hesitated to buy this product. But the bass is very good if we apply largest ear cap on. Seems like with the small ear cap the bass is not able generate the effect. But no complain about bass when i have large caps on. The bass is same as realme buds wireless and feature wise better than realme. I personally used realme buds wireless as my sister have it. Felt oneplus z is superior

name: Ramesh
title: It is Original or Fake Confusing
content: I think dis original or duplicate i dnt kwn bcz .. i marked the arrow symbl on that place there is no "NEVER SHETTLE" caption so .. i already saw that in YouTube review vidio so ...bt that caption not in this box so...

name: kumaran
title: I have Oneplus 7T and this headphone is rubbish.
content: Ordered it seeing many reviews suggesting tht ''if u own oneplus phone then bullets wireless z is a must have''. Poor Bass quality. sound quality is not as much as Oppo Enco M31 which is competitor in this price range(My friend owns oppo enco m31 and it's jus awesome). You can buy Oppo enco m31 instead of this one, regardless which phone yu have.

name: SUBHASISH MAJUMDER
title: Best for me. And easily go for this range of budget
content: I am using it morr than 5 months, Best for the amount, bass also good when i used the volume in 10 or 9 or 6. Its a fast charged technology, battery 🔋 also best quality, more than 4-5 days continue if reguler use it. Noice cancellation is also good. Easily go for it. Overall good.

name: Thamizh Sinti
title: Not good enough for games -DELAY and LAG
content: For music and videos it's good ...more than enough. But for games there is clear delay. I played pubg ..but had a delay and it was disturbing. U shoot first and hear the bullet firing sound later. ... Immediately returned.. Great service by Amazon .. accepted the return and refund.

name: Radhakanta Sahoo
title: Worst in connecting and pairing.
content: The item frequently getting disconnected .I purchased a patron bluetooth which far better than this. A big and big issue is it's connectivity. Had not imagined this much quality issue from OnePlus item.

name: Pritam Varma
title: during call sound is not upto the mark
content: when u play music then ok but during call audiable voice is not upto the mark and after 2 month use duning call sound is not good

name: dinesh kumar
title: Just a common man's review
content: Call quality is realy good, sound quality is good when compared to other bands in this segment and price range, bass is medium u can feel it but if u are bass lover this not for you and for listening to tamil songs this really good at this price point, Battery backup is really good and finally most asked question can we use mobile charger YES you can i used my MI 33w fast charger and it took 45min to fully charge and it has more features compare to other bands at this price point overall quality is good

name: Sumeet
title: Very good pair
content: Amazing pair of headphones. I have used almost all brands and at the price point that it is at, they are the best. Dont go for negative reviews. Ignore them. Good that I ignored them while buying it.

name: Pranay
title: Really Good Bluetooth Earphones
content: These earphones are great, they are loud, last very long and the bass is good but they don't have multiple applications support means if you are playing the game on a laptop you can't talk or listen to the discord app at all. This needs to be improved but overall these are great earphones for phones but for laptop, you might wanna stick to wired or better Bluetooth earphones

name: Amazon Customer
title: Stopped working after 2 months
content: The product has stopped working in 2 months use only. The white light is continously on and its not connecting to my phone suddenly since morning. I called customer care and they are asking for the box for checking it and the box i left at home as i am in hostel now. I dont know what to do know or how to claim a replacement. Didnot expect this from a brand like oneplus. Really disappointed.

name: Arun K.
title: Not worthy for calling purpose
content: Disappointed with background noise and other side person can't hear anything while we use on driving... Not usefull... Okay to listen music and use for calls on calm areas.not great product..not servicing basic need ..

name: avinash yogi
title: Best you can have under ₹2000.
content: The overall build and sound quality is amazing, but if you are looking for a deep bass earphones this might not be your best pick.. But the features you can have with these bullet wireless Z other than bass are worth compromising bass. Such as fast charge,quick pairing,low latency if you are into pubg or any other game.. If your budget is ₹2000 and you are looking for a balanced sound earphones just go for the bullet wireless Z.

name: Vivek
title: Best for Music lovers
content: I'm writing this after 1 month of usage, totally satisfied with OP wireless Z, it is value for money product, perfect highs and lows no heavy Bass ,if you are a bass lover than go for Boat Rockerz or Oppo Enco ,Battery life is Mind-blowing, for me100% in 15 minutes only and lasts for more than 15hrs Don't buy this for Gaming like Pubg.. Positive reviews 90%. Negative reviews 10%. Go for it, if you're a music lover.. Don't see negative reviews.

name: Prakhar Saxena
title: Better Backup and Sound Quality!
content: Product is good. Backup and sound quality is better than other premium brands. The only issue I see here is the white light blinks everytime when its connected to a bluetooth device and it is annoying and irritating a lot while watching a video.

name: Kavitha M S
title: Good but better options available
content: I didn’t like the sound quality personality. Bought it just for the battery life and quick switch between the phones and iPads.. Also there was no never settle print and I have no time to replace this.

name: Rushikesh Pawar
title: Amazing earphones
content: Very good sound quality. Without/ intermittent use, the battery lasts more than a week. Consumes less battery from the phone. Provides good battery backup and very easy to use, connect and disconnecting

name: Sudhanshu
title: Best battery in this price range
content: Great quality product, been using it for 2 days now.. Sound quality: 5/5 sound is crisp with enough detail. Loudness: 4/5: it is now loud enough. Base 4/5: the base is low as compared to other earphones of the same price.. Battery 5/5: battery lasts easily for 2 days with heavy usage.. Charging speed: 5/5. Connectivity: 5/5 seamless connection with 2 devices. Connects within 2 seconds with the press of a button. Absolutely worth the money. I just hope it was a bit more loud

name: SIMSAN PK
title: Value for money..
content: Review after one month... 1. Sound quality and bass is good with OnePlus... 2. Battery is a Hulk... 3. Good for work out... 4. Built quality is excellent... 5. Value for money..

name: Customer
title: You will love the experience!
content: One more device added to my OnePlus collection after OnePlus 7. Its just the best. OnePlus is all about experience and it will not disappoint you.. Love the design. Love the matt finish black colour. Love the audio quality. Love the fast charging and battery. Love the mic quality. Love the way it switches connection between 2 paired device within a click.. Lastly love their packaging. I wish they had given the pouch also with the headset. But anyway its amazing experience.

name: Sabhar
title: Good Quality Bad Fit.
content: The quality of sound is great, audio levels are also good. But the important issue i faced is that i am unable to wear them for long time and they dont fit ears well, also the band is very flexible and not equally weighed both sides, which causes it to fall from one side more and also the earpieces doesn't fit very well.. Not at all recommended for Exercising or Sports.

name: Asif Abdullah
title: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z 👂 phones
content: The OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z 👂 phones were very nice in texchure & looks like a premium brand.. It's sound quality is good.. Battery backup is also very nice & charging speed is way beyond that.. OnePlus is a very premium brand & at this price point it should have given the carry case also.

name: Sree Harsha
title: Continuous Beep noise, call not audible to other party
content: It's getting high beep sound while talking on phone or listening to audio and while on call my voice was not audible to the party on receiving end of the call. This isbthe second device I initiated for return. Expected to be the best headphones- bluetooth in this price range. Big disappointment from one plus

name: aditya verma
title: Low latency mode doesn't work..
content: Low latency mode doesn't work in my one plus 7T..

name: Arun l.
title: Quality product from OnePlus
content: Simply the best wireless headset product in the market presently at this range. There are lots of products like realme and mi but no way near this OnePlus wireless bullets. A balanced and quality sound with mosnter battery back up and not to forget the superfast charge which allow you 10hr of non stop usage at just 10 minutes of charge. Easy to pair and switch between devices and ofcourse the magnetic on and off switch mode is really impressive.

name: Debajyoti Ghosh
title: Good for 6 month
content: Does after just using it for 6 month it half died the magnet on of stop working used to turn off on regularly very irrating ! It does not switch off now I have just bought realme buds air Pro for few weeks (1-21.5weeks)

name: VIKAS IZARDAR
title: Good for Call but not for Music
content: Not good for music lovers. Though very useful for people who are on call throughout. Battery back up is awesome. Its been 3rd day and i am still using it though not using it continuously. But the it last longer than u expect. Bluetooth range is also very good woth OP mobile.

name: Harish ac
title: Worst product from OnePlus
content: I av bought this bullets 10 days before. I was using it normally lyk 4 5 hrs/day. Suddenly it stopped working and now no replacement also, I can't connect to new device cannot connect to old device also. No charging response no led response, I have tried every possibilities to solve the issue but couldn't do anything. So please don't buy this bullets. Please check the OnePlus forum regarding this issue. Every1 facing the same issue and even servicing and replacement is also not sure from OnePlus. Go for any other wireless.

name: RASHEDHA FARVEEN
title: Good
content: The sound quality so clear. But does have noise cancellation opponent can hear everything happen around me clearly. Base is good . Ears are paining while I'm wearing for more than an hour.. ears buds are not so comfortable

name: Utsab D.
title: Very impressive
content: This headphone does not have "thumping bass" but every frequency is clearly audible at medium volumes. At high volumes, the bass quality is a little less distinguished but audible nonetheless. The sound quality is unexpectedly good for wireless headphones. The soundstage is also VERY good. I would totally recommend this headphone if you are on a budget of rs 2000. The battery life is best in category, the device is simple to use and it has a very sturdy build quality.

name: Saptarsi Masanta
title: OnePlus nailed it!!‼️
content: One plus has again a great job and made this oneplus wireless z...it's good because the price is very much cheaper than the wireless 2, sound quality is very good... But noice cancellation is not upto it!!... But looking after the price in Oneplus product... 💯 Recommended ‼️

name: Souransu
title: Don't buy these
content: Don't buy these earphones. The mic is of very poor quality. It picks up so much ambient noise that it becomes very irritating for the person on the other side of the call. It's just not possible to make calls with this earphone...total waste of money. The sound quality is decent but lacks bass. The only positive thing about these earphones is the massive battery life and quick charging times. But other than that its a very poor quality product.

name: Vikram
title: Decent but not up to the mark
content: Bass is not up to the mark. I have tried OnePlus buds it has better bass than Oneplus bullets but happened to stick with bullets due to fit and comfort which it offers (better bluetooth connectivity, better battery backup, cost and latency). I hope I will have a better experience with this. Will post an update after few days/weeks

name: saddam hossain
title: Long backup upto 18 hours
content: This is best wireless headphones, i am this headphones almost 6 months running. Now it's taking 30 minutes for full charge. And it will deliver upto 19 hours. Without any problem. Best for listen song sounds quality very good. I am doing job in call centre. And i bought this for taking calls daily minimum 10 hours everyday. Awesome service i am getting here

name: Pradeep Nireekshan
title: Go for Normal edition over bass edition
content: Go for normal edition over bass edition. You can feel the bass in normal edition too. I felt very little different difference in terms of bass quality. Bass is just a little bit higher than normal edition...just a little bit. I'm a bass lover yet I go for normal edition beacuse quick switch is missing in bass edition. Quick switch is very helpful to switch between devices very quickly.

name: Arogya Painuly
title: Exceptional
content: The only drawback of the bass edition is that it doesn't have any quick switch button as mentioned in the details. Apart from this, everything about thid product is perfect. The quick connect tech that ensures a connection in merely 4-5 seconds, magnetic controlled on/off mode, sound quality, noise cancellation etc are everything perfect. The bass output is exceptional. If you have 2k in your pocket, then this is for you.

name: Amzz
title: Bad mic and there is no bass
content: I don't know if the product I received was defected or not but I had returned it because the mic was really bad with low voice and no noise cancellation.. The overall functionality of the product was good, from magnets to quick connectivity. The sound quality was also fine except the bass was almost non-existent.. If they improved these issues related to mic, noise cancellation and bass, then I would buy it again.

name: Chandu
title: poor backup
content: item is good but poor backup,lasts only for 5 to 8 hours.very disappointed.moreover not useful when you are driving 2 wheeler.

name: Hriday Pradhan
title: Not for bass lovers
content: It’s a good wireless earphones for the price. The connectivity is very good. The sounds is clear. It’s very comfortable. The only thing I don’t like about this earphones is That I doesn’t have much bass. The sounds are very thinnn. So I won’t recommend these for people who like thumping bass🥸

name: mithun
title: great value for money product
content: ok for the price. sound quality is above average. no connectivity issue.. great battery life.. overall recommend product for the price.

name: Vijay
title: Made in China
content: Made in China product with least bass. Connectivity issues while switching to another paired device

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bass edition will be the sensible choice than normal if u want  good sound.
content: Genuine Review: Below Average Sound. Buy only if you want battery backup and features.. Better go for the BASS Edition.. Bass edition wireless has better sound.. Though bass is not punchy but atleast it has some amount of base.

name: mohammad jafar
title: Changing speed depends on Charger
content: Nothing can beat this, its a snach in 2k.. I made a video on this "bullet wireless z charging with normal charger" you can check on that. Its a awesome super strong and long battery backup make it top of all, just charging speed is very depends on chargers. But backup amazing

name: Smita s.
title: Excellent product
content: The earphones are superb 1. Sound quality you can not listen in full volume best for pubg and gaming and listening music. 2. Connectivity : is best you just have to remove magnetic earohones and your earphones are connected very fast for all devices. 3.latency : low latentcy for gaming. Iam using oneplus device so it gave me some benifits and when some one calls your voice assistant call the name for OnePlus and non OnePlus devices

name: Ashwin Hiremath
title: Awesome earphones with great battery.
content: I am definitely in for the fast charge. I had truly wireless earbuds already. Main problem with them is if they are down, they need at least 30 mins to charge. Not in case of these earphones. charge 10 mins .. use for 10 hours.

name: Rajkumar
title: Strongly recommend if you are not bass lover.
