content: Very good product at this price segment.. Sound quality : not soo good due to bass is very minimum compare to other products at this price segment.. Battery : fantastic for this price. Calls & noise cancellation : 5 star. Material quality : looks very premium and quality very good.. Over all : 4 star. Blindly for it, if you are not bass lover. Others all are very good for 2K.

name: sandeep tivari
title: Not so good.. go for realme buds wireless for pubg
content: Actually I bought this for pubg for "oneplus7" but believe me realme buds wireless is best compared to oneplus-z bluetooth.. sound quality is low in pubg game other YouTube and songs purpose its ok not wonderful or something

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste of Money
content: I got the delivery of product on 26-05-2020 and after use of a week they start showing connection problem. The haedphone got itself dead and not showing any bluetooth signal. Most interesting after some hour they start showing the signal and problem still exists. Try to connect to one plus customer care but no one is bother to pick-up the phone........... Earlier I had a good experience with one plus phone but this recent experience force me to reconsider the future with one plus product...

name: Uttam Bishwakarma
title: If you anyone wants descent dound go for it
content: It's really amazing product I have purchased, I'm amazed to see it's connecting speed between one device to another, you just need to press twice a batton.. And I like it's on and off system you just need to separate earphones from megnet it will automatically on and connect with paired device.

name: Mustafa Hussain
title: OnePlus Bullet wireless Z
content: According to its price it's a good option if you are looking for a good neckband headphones in chip price sound quality is quite good, you don't get any noise cancellation feature, it supports fast charging which is a plus point, and it's also support fast pairing which is very fast you just have to separate ear buds, it will automatically pairing with your device. Build material is soft rubber type material which makes it very flexible, that's all

name: Smitha
title: Poor battery life
content: I'm wondering whether anything wrong with the product I received. It's battery isn't lasting. I charged it in the morning. When I plugged in a red light indicator was on and whne it turned white I removed it from the charger. But didn't use it after that.. Now no battery. Even though it's used, after some grand it's battery is zero

name: Kamran khan
title: Perfect and worth purchasing
content: If I talk from starting. Packaging is awesome by one plus.. Most important is sound quality is perfect, absolutely perfect, perfect in terms of bass and quality.. Also very comfortable and premium.. Everything is just perfect, be it connectivity, sound quality, range, features and all.. I am fully satisfied with this product and it's worth purchasing. But there is one problem noise cancellation is not that good but still best earphone overall.

name: Anoop Karuthedath
title: Definite purchase for anyone looking for a holistic wireless headset
content: Excellent purchase. The packing that the product had come in was good. The sound quality is more towards clarity than bass or treble boost. Charge has been good and have gotten over 15 hrs of charge and the red light has not started blinking. Very much satisfied with the product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good battery backup, sound but low on bass,should be around 1700
content: Headphone is good and comfortable. Bass is not that high as ul find in jbl or anyother good company. It has a strong battery backup. Playing online games like pubg or call of duty with these is tricky as there is delay in sound. The one i got from has a little damage though it came in a sealed pack.

name: santhosh R
title: Worst noise cancellation.
content: Buyers pls don't buy this bluetooth wireless z if u want to use for calls while driving. Utter flop noise cancellation. Very worst opposite one cannot hear a single word while driving. So much of disturbance. But music connectivity battery life is really great.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Beast In The Market!!!!
content: It is the best product in the following terms:-. #Sound Quality. #Noise Cencellation. #Bass. #Battery Life. #Comfort. :)It is excellent in all aspects..... &Also it's better is about 10 days to me for 1 hour usage daily...

name: Swapnil S.
title: Comfortable, Low Latency, Good Sound Quality
content: Comfortable even if you wear for whole day. It won't give you any irritation or headache. It's lightweight. Besides, it has lower latency than the regular version. I've been playing PUBG on my ipad since the day I bought not better than some good quality earphones when comes to gaming. But best it neckbands, you can even try oppo enco but it has some latency but better sound quality.. Low latency works nicely with iOS and OnePlus devices.

name: Dr. Harshit Varma
title: Worth it!
content: Definitely one of the best in this price range. If you attach proper buds according to your ear size and tune a good equalizer, you'll experience the best sound, bass, and a perfect noise cancellation... Recommended for use with OnePlus Device for the best result ..

name: saket khatavkar
title: Everything in the description is true
content: It does what is promises. I used earbuds earlier if I compare wireless earphones vs wireless earbuds. In my experience, I lost one end of earbud I am feared to buy another whole set of new one and later if the charging case accidentally falls, it stops charging your earbud in few days. This wireless z is fast charging, good bass, excellent quality, affordable below 2k with premium features. I recommend to purchase it with absolute no fear.

name: jahan uddin ahmed
title: It's worth buying ..
content: The quality of the product is very good. It's very easy to use. It takes around 10-15 minutes for full charge and the battery is outstanding. After full charge I could constantly use it for 15-16 hours. The sound quality is very good and I have not faced any call drop or bluetooth disconnection issue. However, I have not used it outdoor or in noisy areas and so I am not fully tested the quality of noise cancellation.

name: Dakshata Gavand
title: Pretty Good
content: I am writing this review after two days of usage. If you want good battery life go for it. Sound is quite nice. Features are good. I bought these earphones for one plus 7 pro. It hardly takes time to charge. Too good earphones even I have suggested these to one of my colleagues, he was very much satisfied with the product. Delivery was quick than expected date. Thank you Amazon for quick delivery

name: DK
title: Super
content: Superbbb battery life....I'm enjoying itttt... I'm a moderate user.. hardly weekly once I'm charging.. bluetooth connectivity is superb..

name: Glen George Sunil
title: Badass Oneplus Z
content: I like the overall design, it's lightweight body and excellent battery life, easy to use and carry and the sound quality is okkeish but only the vocals was excellent . I does not like the bass quality as I was expected more from it and as my usage I feel like comfort should have been improved because after 2 hours usage my ear nodes felt slight pain. Overall I liked the earphones every much because when we compare this to the other products in the market it is a fully packed product.

name: Bharath Mohan
title: Shockingly poor build quality from One Plus
content: I'm no stranger to One Plus' products. Love them, stand by their quality. But not this one. At this price point they have cut corners. One week into sparing use, the magnets that hold the ear pieces together came off their casing. Luckily I didn't lose the contacts(being magnets) altogether.. Don't have the patience to go for a replacement either.. This is how great companies fall from grace.. Shame, shame, shame on you One Plus.

name: Suyash A
title: Not worth 2K till it has competition like Boat 335.
content: This bass edition product lacks nice codecs like AptX or Ldac and we only get SBC/AAC low quality codecs. Additionally, mic is unsatisfactory to use. A little distance between phone and neckband will let no audio to get captured. Sound quality and range is good and works great at some distances. Hope this helps. Try getting better neckband like boat 335 or like that cuz it also has 10mm driver unlike this neckband which has 9.2mm driver.

name: Mohammed Aman
title: Again and again gets Disconnect automatically
content: Not able to judge the sound quality because it was not connecting in my phone although I have Bluetooth v5.0 in my phone .. This oneplus earphones always say couldn't connect and when get connected it automatically gets disconnected within 10 -12 seconds by the time I on my wifi and play any video to listen it sound some blink and gets disconnected so how can I live with such earphones with so much inconvenience to use every time

name: Abhishek salunke
title: Don't buy
content: The headphone is very good. I just had a problem. My mic had dust in it. So I went to the service center. The service center people said no replacement. No repair. Then this earphone.. Why don't you pay a little more but make good product purches

name: Ayyappareddy
title: Premium flexible comfort  in budget
content: Battery backup is really great. One thing I liked so much is no need to switch off or on the device. Just dettach or attach the both magnets to on or off. Switching between two devices very quickly

name: kaustubh singh
title: Good battery life , better sound quality with minimum bass!!!!
content: Sound quality of earphone is very good, and base of earphone were decent , but if you want bass like sony, boat then this is not for you, battery life is good , lag in sound in pubg gameplay.. Conclusion- if you want good battery life, better sound quality with minimum base then bought this immediately, but if you want better sound quality with base and lag free game experience then sony wired earphones is best choice , because realme wireless buds are also useless in front of oneplus.

name: Arihant Jain
title: Mic not working after 15 days. problem. Don't buy.
content: Sound quality, okayish, sounds are clear but could bave been better. A big NO for bassheads as it has negligible bass. Noise cancellation is not there. Also, the mic stops working after 10-15 days. You can look at OnePlus forums where people complained of mic. So, as of now, don't buy it!!

name: Vish Melwani
title: One of the best earphones under 2000
content: Pro's. 1. It connects to one plus devices in less than 2-3 Seconds. 2. Sound quality is Asum , bass is also good if you prefer hearing it up to 70% volume. 3. One of the best earphones under ₹2000 for the battery life , it's awesome. 4. Call quality is pretty good. Cons. 1. Noise cancellation is not good , but yea you can expect activitie noise cancellation from a pair of earphones under ₹2000, Still it serves your purpose of phone calls to a great extend

name: rlogendhiran
title: Don't buy this Product and very bad
content: I won't recommend anyone. Very worst headphone. Earbuds are cheap and very painful to use. Noise canceling ZERO. Those who using headphones for Calls purpose for them ok. For music lovers and bass liking person for them not ok. Calls sound quality ok. Battery life 16 to 18 hrs

name: Rhushal
title: Mic doesn't work
content: Don't buy it if you are going to use it for calling or recording audio or for playing games on your mobile. The mic never works. It will use your phone's inbuilt mic to record your audio and the same happens when you play a game it will send the audio from your phone instead of using the headphone's mic. Returning it straight away.

name: Imran Ebrahim
title: Charges rapidly, Good choice clarity
content: Sound quality is good for both voice calls & music. Charges rapidly and ready to use in 10 mins.. Love the ability to quick switch between two paired devices via power button double click.

name: prakhar
title: Best in the Price Range
content: I rarely review a product but this one is amazing. I ordered two of these the black and the green one. I've use it for almost 6 hours and the battery is on 80%. And the the Warp charing support is awesome. I've had TWS earphones which give 3-4 hours off battery although they are fully wireless but for a heavy user like me I'll prefer these Bullet wireless earphones any day.

name: Ratna
title: MUST BUY AT THE PRICE RANGE OF RS.1999 AND ITS ALL ROUNDER.
content: The product is awesome.. Sound quality is loud and very clear to hear.. The bass quality is average but not bad..noise cancellation is also above average.. Mainly the battery backup is very good and its supports up to 30 watt chargrer.. I tested with normal charger(5v).. it takes 50 min to charge from 0%-100% is really awesome.. I also done the battery drain test .. it takes 16hours15minutes to discharge from 100%-0%.. SUPER.. 1+ Bullets Wireless Z is perfect at the price range of ₹1999...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent product...worth it
content: Excellent product.. Great access... Sound quality is too good.. Porduct quality is excellent.. I had taken Noise earbuds which was total mess but then broght this bullets.. Excellent.... The connection is too compatible.. when it is in ears it will directly connect with the device if not its saves the battery very well.. Moreover,the battery life is very good.. instant chargeble.

name: RAAVI BHASKAR TEZZ
title: Best Wireless Earphones
content: One of the best wireless earphones with great features like connect & disconnect bluetooth through joining both sides buds, no interruptions during calls or while listening 🎧 Music and built quality was great as per viewer expectations.. Positive - built quality, connectivity, low price & best sound quality for normal or business users. Negative - low bass and no noise cancellation. As per price bass and noise cancellation are negotiable.....

name: Dani J.
title: About the microphone
content: The sound quality and connectivity speed of the product is good when comparing to other products of this price range. However, sometimes while sending a voice note through whatsapp the quality of the recording is very poor and often i felt these difficulty in calling also. I think this product is not compatible to other devices except oneplus for this particular fault. Even though, it's overall performance is good.

name: Arshad
title: Happy with OnePlus wireless Z
content: Have been using over a month. Battery backup is very good.. Haven't not worried about batter even once.. Charges zero to 100 in 15 mins. But actually charges full in around 40-45 mins.. Pubg latency not noticeable at all on OnePlus 7.. Connects like a charm every single time.. Make you forget that your phone doesn't have a headphone jack.. Don't expect too much bass from a budget headphone.

name: Harshan
title: Less bass coupled with trash of a mic
content: I'm used to OnePlus earphone having low bass. But with this earphones the main issue is the mic.. While calling it's fine, it's when ur playing games with ur friends or senting whatsapp audio that the mic becomes trash.. Literally everyone said this " feels like u dropped the mic and ran.". U hear the first word then your son's gets faded. Brought because I have a 7t.. Returning nto gets alternate which doesn't have much features 😔😟

name: Aditya Roy
title: HONEST REVIEW.
content: Without any hesitation go and buy it😊. Best earphone in this price.. Crystal and clear sound quality.. Bass is bostted in this, Bass problem is cleared in this wireless neckband.. Noise cancellation and call quality is so good .. 🔋 Battery backup - 10/10.. Gaming performance is good in oneplus device but some small lag in pubg in Android device.. Overall performance is good as compare to normal edition.. Cons- no quick switch button👆.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Jst an normal feel.
content: Average, for best base experience go for boat.... One plus is jst normal efforts.... Only for battery backup u can go for this. Best music experience JBL. best base boat..... One plus is jst a normal feel.. 2k is too much.

name: Vijendra patel
title: Worth of money
content: As expected good product by one plus , but I would suggest you to buy air dopes of one plus or realme you just need to add 2 thousand ruppes for them . Talking about these hand free as I said I m satisfied with everything , but important note low latency mode (gaming mode) does not support any mobile insist of one plus mobile which is a drawback for you if you are a gamer , it will give you a delayed sound in pubg but it is not in a case of one plus mobiles

name: Shabnashoukath
title: Major issue with your product
content: I am facing issue with my product, it's getting high beep sound while making col, the listener can hear only high beep sound, I really stuck with this, I am a iphone lover and changed to android because of oneplus, but it's product is really useless , could't use it , i stuck with this now, I am using one plus 6 mobile and I contacted with OnePlus customer care, they answered as mobile is compatible and problem with headset, so plz sort out this issue ASAP

name: Srikar Paul
title: A Good product from OnePlus 😍
content: After using a month -. Pros -. *Battery -is main asset. *Design - Mint colour is jus osm. *Noise cancellation. *Easy switch to device to device is unique feature. *Sound quality - Superb even small detail is hearable suggested for long using for watching web series Nd all. Cons -. *Bass is not that much. Only one I noticed. Overall superb to my experience!

name: rosydew
title: Not upto the mark
content: The wire is heavy and pulling down the ear phones. This caused ear pain in just 10 minutes of usage. There is zero noise cancellation. I could hear the sound of air from my fan echoing in the ear phones. A bad buy :(

name: Vipul Mehta
title: Don't just waste money on new features
content: Switching sucks and magnetic off mechanism doesn't work always. Headsets wasn't connected with laptop even after turning it off.. Sometimes had to pair twice to get these headsets work. Switching b/w devices doens't work always and sometimes you need to manually connect. I raised complaint to Amazon next day of my return policy and explained the situation but they didn't help me.. Amazon service is really bad, didn't expect this.

name: Nikhil Dalvi
title: Connection Problem.
content: I'm connecting this with my oneplus 7 device but getting problem every time when I try to pair... It's not getting pair quickly I have to connect it 2 or 3 times after then it get connected,. When this blutooth is attached and I'm listening songs it get disconnected automatically... I don't know what the plbm.... Sonud quality is good... Noise cancellation is also good.. But while getting pair with my device I'm suffering some issue..

name: Prem
title: Overall review
content: Pros:-. light weighted. Fst chrging. Clear sound. Bluetooth range is also good. Cons:-. Lack of bass.. Build quality is of plastic.. Sometimes sound gets distrbed maybe due to some reason.. If u are buying this for gaming thn don't waste money for this earphone unless u r one plus user, there is latency.. Overall for normal use it's perfect earphone mainly it's battery backup tht's amazing.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boom and kind OnePlus Bullet Z
content: Sound quality - wow... amazing.... Noise cancellation - need to test further. Bass quality - boooom. Just received it.. Excellent packaging by OnePlus......... How to switch off in package????. Nevertheless, wonderful product

name: AKSHAY
title: Buy right away!
content: If you're not a music freak, good! These earphones will make you crazy with its battery life and comfort in the ear. For 2,000 it can't get any better I believe. Bass is not best in class and the build quality might be a problem 5 months later after rough use.

name: Francis gomes
title: Quality Product Value for money 💸
content: Best bluetooth neckband under 2000. After using more than 10 days there is nothing to complaint about worth each an every penny. Its really got light weight for great comfort. On normal use it runs fir 2 to 3 days thtz pretty decent battery. Connectivity fast connects in 3 second. Last i am really satisfied with the bass. Go for it guyz.... 🔥🔥🔥

name: rahul gupta
title: Best Bluetooth Head Phone Under 2K
content: Pros:. 1) Light Weight easy for long hours use. 2) Fast Charging with One-plus Adapter. 3) Controls are great (Switching different Devices..Pause..Play..Connect..Disconnect). 4) Good sound quality for calling.. 5) Good Battery Back up. Cons:. 1) Sound Quality for listening to the music is not that great. 2) Bluetooth range is 15 feet.. Over all this is the best product you grab right now in the market at lowest cost.

name: Sanjeev
title: Very fast charging with poor connectivity for calls.
content: I have used it for more than 2 months now and giving candid feedback.. Good with minimum charging time, really very fast.. Poor with connecting to calls as it automatically gets disconnected for 30 sec and again get reconnected I don't no how. So truly shocking experience. Obviously not for office use in this current covid situations where work from home needs proper connectivity.. Will not recommend to others

name: MOHAMMAD DANISH
title: Battery, Clarity, budget
content: One thing for sure, one plus never compromise with quality wheather it's phone or earphone. This wireless earphone is just amazing with no vaccum while using & proper noice cancellation.. If you are looking for high sounds quality such as bass then don't this of oneplus, Sennheiser & JBL are master in that but if you are looking for reliable earphone with good batter backup aswell in budget one is good

name: Prasad
title: Good Build Quality but Average Sound Quality...
content: The product is well built but the sound quality is average and is no where closer to the big brands.. If you use it for long hours then the sound creates irritation in the ear (I felt the sound is too sharp feels like hissing sound).

name: Priyanka Sinha
title: Good
content: Perfect headphones for Indoor calling.. Bluetooth Connectivity is very good.. Gets connected automatically as magnets get separated. The only con is noise cancellation. Though it does its job properly but there is need of lot improvement

name: Sudhansu
title: Ordered 2 earphones..Same Problem!!! MIC issue while riding!!!
content: Being a hug OnePlus fan i had so much expectations from this like everybody else and was literally feelin the flagship vibes from this one but apparently i was so disappointed with only one thing and one thing only..THE MIC.. It has a big mic issue that nobody is talking about like when riding bikes the other person can't listen a word u r saying and it's because it just attracts outside sounds more than the voice..It's just so disappointing from this brand that it's frustrating.

name: Amazon customer
title: Good Quality bluetooth air phone
content: Good quality of Air phone, Batetry life super, Sound and noise cancelation 4 star out of 5, air bud silicon quality good and comfortable for long time use, 2 bluetooth pair with easy switch so an a average it's good

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not satisfied with my investment 1999 Not working even it is a standard company item.
content: It is not working from first day after full charge. White light is not glowing and no sound is observed. As I requested to refund after the date. They didn’t replaced or refund. So totally for testing I invested 1999.00.

name: Mridul Panwar
title: Honest Review!!!!
content: Now I'm typing this review after using it for 3 months... I'm a teacher by profession, so while taking online classes its a blessing with fast charging and long battery backup!!! I'm giving it 4 out of 5 bcoz base and sound can be more better... its rival realme is not giving this much battery backup but they are offering good sound.... So, in the end yes this is value for money product... :)

name: Sanjay
title: Not worth money
content: 1. No noise cancellation. 2. No bass. 3. Battery back up is ok. 3. Switches is not convenient to press, have to find each time. Please don't buy this product. Not worth 1,999

name: George
title: Good product
content: Good product to listen to songs and attent meetings. 🔋 Is great, connection to 2 devices works great and the swapping. Only drawback is the noice cancelling the microphone is very sensitive catch all the sounds but does the work in quite rooms.. All over a great product for the price.

name: Ashish r.
title: Not better then realme buds wireless
content: Buzz is created for th same. But realme buds wireless are far better then this. Even in battery also. Ear fit is better on realme buds wireless. Sound quality also and more sturdy and equal battery backup then OnePlus wireless z. And realme buds wireless are 200 cheaper also

name: Razim
title: Buy to switch on and switch off bluetooth rsther than listening to music from this
content: Absolute piss poor product. Bluetooth keeps disconnecting. Deosnt switch on at times. Switching off and switching on bluetooth time is more than listening to anything from it. Being a OnePlus user for years and this being the 3rd earphone device I'm owning - tbis is just sad quality. I can't even return sucha poor product. Please don't buy!! Let down product.

name: Nikesh
title: Balanced Base and Travel nice headphone
content: If like to listen clear music, It’s has very clear sound quality. I have given 5 star rating to this product. I am using this headphone since July and today is Aug 21. Base and travel combination is very clear and balanced. So I would recommend to this product to everyone.. Regards

name: linda
title: Poor Sound Quality / Phone call issues
content: If the purpose is making phone calls, this is not definitely a good choice. The background noises seems to be clearer than your voice. Also, the sound quality is basic on playing music. Normal boat wired headset is better when compared with oneplus. If you google the oneplus community site, there you could find many issues reported related to call/sound quality and none of these seems to be fixed. Battery backup and fast charging is a plus.

name: Ankit Singh
title: You have to compromise wifi connection...
content: Pros:. Excellent battery life, perfect & comfortable fitting, magnetic off & on very useful, noise cancellation is good.. Negatives :. When the same device (mobile or laptop) is connected to wifi & OP wireless earphone, then wifi doesn't work on that device.. Switching device is complicated & takes long time to connect to other device while connected to one.

name: Shabbir Dhaman
title: TOO LOW VOLUME WHILE RECIEVING AUDIO CALLSSS
content: THE THING IS, SEE I AM USING ONEPLUS 7T 8 GB RAM 256 GB STORAGE WHICH HAS SNAPDRAGON 855 PLUS, WITH CAMERA 48+16+12 MP TRIPLE CAMERA, 90 HZ FLUID AMOLED DISPLAY 6.55" DISPLAY WHICH HAS ANDROID 10 WITH OXYGEN OS 10.3.6.. THE MIC OF THE EARPHONE GETS TOO LOW WHILE RECIEVING.

name: Pooja
title: Best earphones under 2000
content: Superb quality headphones the build quality the box and its content evertying is very premium. Especially the battery life is awesome n also the charging speed the 10 mins 10 hrs battery is a true fact. Especially the bass variant looks so rich. Made up of high quality material. I love the sound. A percent loss on vocal as compared to normal one but the bass . Best for movie watching n especially for music. The best in the class . Absolute buy

name: Swastik
title: Excellent product but with mic issue
content: Sound is excellent with heavy bass. Absolutely value for money but the mic issue started after like days. I can't clearly hear anything during call. Cracking & rattling sounds all the time during call. Otherwise during listing to music it's enjoyable.

name: Sudip Sadhukha
title: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Review
content: The product quality is really good. Overall sound quality just fantastic, sound clearty is one of the important point of this headphone. Bass is good but not so punchy. Call quality is very good, I have tested it over an hour and no complain from the caller. Magnetic controller is running also very nicely. It's has a quick swith to use between two devices. I have tested the charge quality and it's really gives 10 mins of charge and which gives 9.5-10hrs battery life. It can be carry anywhere even in your pocket.

name: pratik
title: Not worth it
content: The sound quality is poor there is breaking of sound and lot of static. More to that if you dont have a one plus device then please dont buy as you will face connect / disconnect issue with other devices.. Cannot connect to multiple devices which is a big no.. Please get a better headphone

name: Rohit Dighepatil
title: Poor build quality.
content: Guys don't trust these earphones as their sound quality is good but their built quality is too poor.. Earphone just got separate from right ear.. Red wire got separated form black joint.. Such poor build quality i have never seen anywhere at huge price.. Please don't buy those.. I genuinely request you it will waste of your money and they will not provide any warranty as they will call it as physical damage.

name: Vijay Navik
title: You can buy it with no doubt
content: grt product. Easy to swith btwn devices. Automatically gets switched on when you connect the buds to your ear. Comfortable great battery life and good mic

name: Naveen
title: Works well with Dolby atmos
content: This earphone works well with my oneplus 7 which has Dolby pre installed. If you prefer balanced audio with clear vocals and instruments, default sound out of these will not satisfy you.. Since I like the balanced audio with punchier base wherever needed, I configured Dolby as attached. Take a look at it if you have oneplus above 6t.

name: SHYAMKUMAR R
title: No switching option
content: I'm returning the product, due to not able pair 2 mobile and description mentioned pair n switch options is there.. Product is good and sound bass quality also.. Only one draw back in not able to switch with multi mobile, I've checked multiple reviews in YouTube there is no option

name: Aditya
title: Didn't expected this from one plus
content: Didn't expected this from one plus.I received the earphones and tried to turn them on but they didn't.After plugging the charger red light did apear but as soon I disconnected the charger the earphones goes into the dead state.Nothing happens after that only thing that I am able to enjoy is seeing the red light when I plug in the charger.. Same thing happened with the replacement pair.

name: Suryaprakash
title: Don't waste 2K
content: Worthless. Bass quality is very poor. Also the treble is very high. Any songs I play ... It is like i am listening to it via a phone call. The clarity is very bad. It gives you a headache after some 30 mins.. This headphones made me realise that i am bass lover. Realme wireless buds are much better.

name: Ajay sharma
title: Amazing product
content: Best blutooth earphones....build quality and the Sound quality of the product is really amazing...Noise cancelation pretty decent...This earphone never disappoint you and fulfill all yours expectations.....In last simply superb and also thanks amazon family for the delivery of this product in just 3 days...

name: SK Singh
title: Very Good in the Price Range
content: 1.Battery Backup Superb. 2.Normal Mob Charger Takes 1 hr to get fully charged. 3.10 min charge for 10hr funda not feasible with 5V charger. 3.Device connectivity is fast. 4.Range on Bluetooth v 5 is enhanced. 5.Superb for Movie 🎥 and music 🎶..

name: Sanskriti Chauhan
title: Works on smartphones and laptops as well
content: Best wireless earphones in this range. Connects to android devices easily. But don't worry for laptop. Many people say that it cannot be connected, I was also worried for the same, but it connects to laptop as well. Just make sure as soon as you switch the earphones on, click add new device on laptop instantly. Till now, satisfied with sound quality. Will check mic if working properly on laptop too and let you know.

name: Rodericks John
title: Bass quality disappointing
content: Disappointed with the bass quality. My JBL headphones, 70% less than this product's price perform far better in bass. Otherwise, voice and other aspects are good. Product packaging was excellent. At 2k, OnePlus could have given a thought for the base. Music lovers wouldn't appreciate if bass is too low

name: Abhi k
title: Not to buy
content: Buyed this product on December 2020 and its not even been 2 months... And today while i was talking in a call i suddenly gone off.. and its not getting on.. even if i keep it on charge its not showing the indicator (led light).. complete waste of money. I didn't even rough use it.. nd it doesn't even have a scratch on it... I buyed it from all my pocket money and Amazon putted it in water😡😡.. i need refund/replacement or atleast repair 😡

name: Arun Mathew
title: A decent priced bluetooth earphones
content: A decent earphones but the older model had the microphone closer to the mouth. This model makes one speak louder than necessary to be heard. It misses the button to switch between two phones which I was looking for. Would suggest this as a first bluetooth earphones for beginners who look for a decent bass boost while listening to songs/video.

name: Satyendra
title: Mic may malfunction any time!
content: Product Design is good. But Mic may stop working within 4 weeks. Beyond that is your pure luck. I have checked with local support as well, as this malfunction of Mic is quiet common. since this purchase does not fall into support, so you have to purchase new one.

name: Faiza khan
title: It’s a fine product
content: What I really liked about the earphones is the battery back up it lasts very well. Secondly, the voice is clear for calls but I don’t find noise cancellation. sometimes the background sound comes too harsh than the primary sound especially when you’re out. So it’s not recommended for outside use of calls. For music it blocks your ear so you need to be cautious when someone calls out your name! Finally, the color mint is cool.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No Quick Device Switch mode in Bass Edition
content: It stated that there is a Quick device switch mode in the bass edition. Product description misguided me. I ordered BWS bass edition but there is no quick device switch mode.

name: Alfiya gajdhar
title: Very good product....
content: Writing review after one day use... Must buy product... Sound quality is too good.... Mic delivers actual sound .... No issue with mic... I read some reviews in which there is mic related problem... But nothing seems like that.... Magnet auto on/off works very well ... Bluetooth connects suddenly without any delay.... No doubt that this is very good product from one plus

name: Ankit Sinha
title: They messed up something...
content: Everything good but .... The Biggest Con.... The mic is placed inline with the volume buttons given.. And the wire is too short..As a result the mic could not be brought near to the mouth ..So on call if I speak slowly my voice won't be clear at the other side.. Other than that feels premium. Sound Quality is decent enough.

name: Ganesh B S
title: Audio issue
content: 2 months worked well, but now audio balance issue, left earphone sound volume is less to the right side.... Chcked with multiple devices but same issue, called oneplus, asking me to visit service center bangalore, not providing pickup and drop in this covid19 times, very disappointed with oneplus service.... First oneplus product I brought and planning to get oneplus upcoming 8t, now I decided not to opt for oneplus devices from now on😞

name: King
title: Very good sound quality and rich bass
content: Very good sound quality and rich Bass..u can feel the bass of sound..it's not having aptxHD audio but AAC hd audio is not less than that..if you're using OnePlus smartphone u can even use it for gaming..no sound delay when using finatic mode(OnePlus device only)

name: Guna
title: Too much bass. No chillness
content: The earphone is too loud. High bass. No chillness at all. With any equiliser settings. Not good for normal music. It's only for bass. You'll miss the chillness of instruments in songs.

name: sachin chaudhary
title: Overall a great product for daily use
content: Build quality: great. Sound: good for the price they are asking. Connectivity: great , it connects quickly with my one plus and ability to remember the previously connected devices is a great option here.. You can double click to connect to the previously connected device.. Battery: great, best product for those who don't have time to charge their device

name: PRASHANT KUMAR SINGH
title: Wireless bluetooth headphones
content: Best wireless bluethooth headphone in this range sound quality and battery backup is also good.... But if you use in your home and cross multiple wall and door the range was fetching for bluetooth connection...

name: SHAMI TURKI
title: No doubts 😍🔥
content: Who said it is not good for bade please don't go to review's and don't change your mind please buy this it has premium quality don't see any review people's are reviewing without buying this and giving 1 star they all are haters even I'm saying don't see any YouTube videos it's one plus brand I'm using don't think so much I'm saying this product have no doubts queries nothing close your eyes and order this if you want this don't go here and there and thank me later 💖

name: vignesh
title: My honest review about oneplus bullets wireless Z in ear Bluetooth neck band headset
content: Battery life is good, sound quality is excellent, Bluetooth range is also seems to be good, noise cancellation is good,. Headset fits the ear easily connectivity with the phone is excellent, need to improve in bass quality, build quality is good. In this price range the one plus bullets headsets seems to be excellent, I have been using this headset for more than 6 months, same effect right from I brought till today.

name: Sushrut Kasture
title: Microphone does not work, I returned the earphones
content: The sound quality is decent but the microphone is real bad. Does not seem to work with OnePlus 6. The earphones are not suitable for MacBook, the earpiece gets noise intermittently (I replaced it thrice, and the issue was observed with every single set of earphones). The microphone does not work on macbook, I tried with duo call and the other party kept complaining about low amplitude and the intermittent irritating noises.

name: sai kumar
title: Battery King!
content: The people who doesn't want the battery to drain for a whole day, this one is perfect choice! For a normal use the battery will stay for almost 3 days for a single charge! The quality is also very good and not like regular Chinese products. This is where one plus is making difference from other Chinese products. Definitely value for money!

name: Divya
title: Pros and Cons
content: Definitely go for it. Pros :. 1) Great battery backup. 2) Sound quality. 3) Crisp and clear sound quality. 4) Excellent feature of on/off. 5) Great build quality. 6) on heave usage 2,3 days and o normal usage 4,5 days easily. Cons:. Not for a bass lover... That's all...Great work Oneplus...Hurrayyyy...

name: Pavan
title: Value for money
content: Good for normal use, watching movies. Not recommended for music lovers. Pros: battery backup, fast charging support, type-c port,light weight, magnetic control.. Cons: poor bass,plastic material but looking premium,

name: Ramani r c
title: Bad quality of charging
content: Personally do not like this product as quality of sound, baas everithing is good but which I recieved the charging quality is very bad first time I charge for almost 2 hrs than only I got a white light and listen normally but 2 nd time charge it's been a more than 2 hours still don't showing white only red light is showing when I try to connect with phone bluetooth than no light blinks

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome Bluetooth headset
content: Almost I analysed all the product with different brand with this same price. but this one i choosed finally.. After using 3 weeks this is best Bluetooth headset.. Long term battery life. almost 48hours using continuously. while driving the car Bluetooth connectivity in-between phone and headset having strong connection and voice quality its too good.. this is my genuine review i am giving after 3 weeks.

name: Apue
title: What a great sound quality
content: Well am coming from jbl .. Right now am using oneplus nord along with oneplus z.. Extremely balanced sound quality , especially vocals are too good . Mids and highs are just perfect .. Now the most important past of a headphones is bass... Well though am coming from jbl but still i didn't feel bass is low or not up to the mark. Its just supremely perfect bass and high mid ratio. Something its sounds better than jbl .

name: Rajesh071
title: Best head set under 2000
content: Ideal for daily use no ear pain after long usage (3hrs). Ear peice is Quite uncomfortable when its used inside helmet. however it fits by adjusting. Calling:. The opp person is hears your voice well. I. E The ambience noise suppressed and speaker voice is heard more.

name: Amazon Customer
title: STOP working and no help from ONEPLUS
content: After exactly 30days of use,one morning it suddenly lights goes off and didn't turn on, and it is hardware failure, but the main things i can't avail my warranty because OnePlus is not responding to my emails and not recieving call. I think due to pandamic but it is very difficult for me as i am not getting any help from OnePlus.

name: Rahul kumar
title: Fitting probability is 50  50
content: Four star because of fitting. Everything thing is great good battery life,good sound quality etc but fitting is bad in my case its ok with listening music or watching movies but while running and exercise earphones come out from the ears

title: Best in class..... quality earphone.....
content: I owned OnePlus 7 t pro a month ago ....now just one plus z earphone just arrived ....... Satisfied user....best earphone in this price segment... Overall it's good. +Ve. Good sound. Excellent latency... Amazing Dolby effect. Waterproof. Weightless. Very friendly neck band. Overall quality. -ve. Irritable sound while long time listening

name: Maviral
title: Not what I expected but for the price it's great
content: I don't like it... The sound is very low compared to any other bluetooth I'm so disappointed. Bye bye oneplus. Edit:- oct9/2020 it's a rough and tough quality usage product.. 10/10 quality durability. 7/10 volume (it's completely low). 8/10 sound quality. 10/10 battery. 10/10 price.

name: M M JADHAV
title: Value for Money
content: It's best headphones.Charge quickly.. Exactly getting 10hrd battery backup in single charge of 10mins by warp charger..comfortable design.Great sound quality..Don't think about some reviews which mentions bass quality is low..It's actually great. OVERALL VALUE FOR MONEY...just go for it

name: Pradeep
title: Most Comfortable and Convenient Bluetooth earphones at very good price.
content: The battery life if not stellar as advertised, but it’s good. Lasts for 6 hrs of playback.. Charging not as dramatic, but charges fast.. Sound quality is good and comfort is also very good.. Calls/Mike quality is good as well.. Overall no regrets in purchasing this. Highly recommend it, but don’t go by PR numbers.

name: Janardhan
title: Reasonable product 😍
content: Guys don't buy plzzz I'm facing very problems don't waste your money on this , writing revies after 4 months use , Both the ear sound is gone like it fell into water & I lost 20% battery even I didn't use they say 10 min charge 10 hour music but noo it gave me like 6 hour & for full charge it took me 45 minutes

name: vikas salunkhe
title: Duplicate Product
content: I have received a duplicate (First Copy) already used and damaged product.. I have recorded a video while opening and found that:. 1. The earphones are used. 2. The wire is damaged. 3. Extra pair of earbuds is missing. 4. The package is not properly sealed. 5. The product is not genuine (The 'never settle' text is missing inside of the box). The is the rating overall for the seller. not for the product.

name: Madhu Kumar
title: Best Bluetooth earphone i have used
content: This is my second purchase of the same product and i don't have any complaints till date.. Bluetooth connectivity is top notch. It reconnects with the paired device in 2-3 seconds automatically.. Voice calls are better. Neither me nor the person at other end faced any issues during call.. Comfortable to wear, elegant look, excellent charge back-up and awesome sound quality.. Worth for the price we pay.

name: Venu
title: Google voice assistant is not Working. Can't use if you wear the full helmet.
content: Google voice assistant is not working properly. I'm using Samsung M31S new mobile. I use Google voice assistant regularly. But it disappointed me. And you can't wear this earphones if you use helmet as it had big ear phones. So that it lose 2 stars.

name: Harshal Dorlikar
title: Frequently DISCONNECTS automatically
content: IT AUTOMATICALLY DISCONNECTS AND GIVES A BEEP SOUND AND SOME TIMES THE SOUND COMES IN CRACKS I RETURNED IT TWICE BUT NO CHANGE I NEED ONEPLUS TO HELP ME IT DON'T WORK PROPERLY WITH SAMSUNG GALAXY A51 AND HAVE 3-4 SEC DELAY IF IT IS LIKE THIS ORIGINALLY THEN ITS NOT WORTH IT.

name: NANI
title: Call quality
content: i have recieved the earphones yesterday , i have observed the microphone is over sensitive it picks all the background noise where its impossible for other person to hear my voice, is this only happening with my piece or anyone encounter with the same issue, help me should i change to other product or other brand.

name: Akash banerjee
title: I needed just the backup, nothing else
content: Not concerned about sound quality too much, but battery which was the prime requirement fulfilled well.. If one is concerned of sound quality oppo enco headset is the one to consider as the hype is overwhelming.

name: Rajat Sharma
title: Bluetooth disconnects
content: It was working fine but after some days Bluetooth disconnects from phone while talking. Factory reset doesn't help.

name: Loyalist
title: Defective product, stopped working after 12 hours!
content: This product is a sheer disappointment when compared to OnePlus products. My last three phones have been oneplus and never imagined such a poor quality product could be launched by OnePlus...

name: Abhijith
title: OWSOME product man
content: Nice product ,go head if u need this. I don't fell any uncomfortable. Comfortable @1999. 1- good sound. 2-owsome battery backup. 3- Good Blutooth Range. 4- It's not for Game, Latency in Free fire playing Time. It's my Review after 1day use

name: T. BABA NAGA VENKATESH
title: IRREPLACEABLE
content: The best earphones forever.. Battery backup-25 hours on 70 to 80 percent volume. On 100 17 hours playback time.. Call quality-5/5. Noice cancellation-5/5. Bass-perfectly Re engineered, great sound.. Latency- not considerable gap.. This is genuine review, please trust me,. Excellent product from one plus.. Irreplaceable forever.

name: Chitrartha Mulasi
title: Great performance. Beast for Gaming.
content: These earphones are the easiest to use and manage piece of bluetooth headsets in the market. Switching between phones and turning the device on and off has never been easier. The audio quality is crisp and they work wonders when used with a OnePlus device. Tested them on a Oneplus 6 and a OnePlus 8 and I have to say this is the best gaming earphones I have used in a while.. The packaging from OnePlus is top quality as well. These are a steal at this price and you should definitely buy them.

name: Dinesh
title: Simply super.
content: Simply superb.. Realme buds is not near when compared to OnePlus.I had used realme and after this I bought this after a week usage it is super product.We can adjust the volume buttons 0-30.Yes you saw it right it has a maximum sound to 30 and when you reach the maximum sound it gives you a sound I felt it super.. Finally it has a great experience when you use it and it less weight.You never feel it as a discomfort.. Don't see the YouTube reviews about bass it is simply superb.

name: Sagar
title: No Physical Button for Quick Switch in Bass Edition.
content: All good.. excellent packaging and product. For the Bass Edition, keep in mind that it doesn't have a physical button for Quick Switch! They have mentioned it only on their website with really small fonts which one could easily miss, if they have a similar impression as normal edition. It still supports quick switch between 3 paired devices, but it has to be done manually by selecting the device in Bluetooth settings!!

name: Sanjeev Kamerkar
title: Best Earphones under 2K
content: Best budget earphones....very well balanced sound. You can hear music for longer period without any pain. Snug and comfortable fit.. I did not find any cons....because they are built with a purpose.. Bass is apt and perfect i.e. not very punchy and not low. Vocals are crystal clear and music separation is also good.. Battery life is a boon. Very long battery life and quick charge is like a cherry on top. Wireless Z has nailed it...go for it!

name: Karthik
title: Disconnecring and reconnecting issue 😡
content: Plz I want to ask for a fkng replacement...didn't I payed money fr this???....YES I DID ...then y this issue of disconnecting again and again and again ....plz rply me 😡 plzz

name: Sohum Parekh
title: Good earphones, not great.
content: The earphones are good overall but not great. The build quality seems too delicate. One of my earpiece rubber tore off within the second week of usage. Also faced issues of mic not working for call sometimes ( could be a software issue). Sound quality is average. Overall good package for the price but not something I'd highly recommend.

name: Anuj
title: Short Neckband but great sound
content: I have used the neckband style wireless earphones of various renowned brands. Oneplus delivers the short neck band which isn't comfortable to wear, and doesn't stay put when you're driving, running, or moving around. This is one of the most disappointing thing.. The sound quality is great, and the quick charge option is beyond awesome. I hope Oneplus takes note of this short neck band thing, and ensure improvements.

name: Harshit Varshney
title: No upto mark
content: Returned within 5 days. Sound quality is okayish. Bass quality too is not what one would expect. Had connection issues while taking calls and with my laptop while Realme buds performed way better in these aspects. Too much latency when not used with OnePlus phones in fanatic mode, once again realme buds perform better here too. So if you do not have OnePlus phone not so good an option.

name: Ralph Dias
title: The Bass is uncomfortably boosted
content: I ordered this because I heard that the original Wireless Bullets Z was lacking bass. But when I received it, it's bass was really too much. Couldn't hear the other levels at all. So I returned this and bought the BWZ. The quick switch is better implemented in the Original BWZ. And the audio quality is also much better including good bass. Plus you get longer battery life. So I think the original BWZ is a better deal.

name: RAKESH KUMAR KESHARI
title: Cution please : No quick switch facility like Normal edition
content: Guys no doubt sound quality is good. But as oneples claim of quick switch facility from one to another device but believe me there is no quick switch facility. You have to connect manually every time if you want use this.

name: Vinayak
title: If your purpose is listening to music then don’t buy
content: This earphone is not good for listening music coz this is not well balanced. So if your purpose is music then don’t go for this. Connectivity, battery life and charging time is better.. There are many people who did the review and said that this earphone is good but I disagree.

name: Deepan
title: Excellent Quality and value for price
content: Awesome product, nice battery backup and good quality. This has become a permanent stay around my neck 24x7 😂. I attend conference call connected to my laptop, at the same time I switch to attend phone calls and listen to watch movies. No complaint so far after 7 months of use.

name: shreyash
title: Terrible connection
content: Don't buy! Connection is extremely inconsistent and it gets very frustrating. Pathetic experience op.

name: Shashidhar
title: Don’t purchase they r cheating there is no repairing option
content: I’m using it from last 4 months everything is ok but after 4 months I faced a problem that my headset was not connecting to any device I went to service center they are saying we can’t help u contact one plus center so I called them and they also said we can’t do anything in this problem kindly purchase another one ... So pls don’t buy this product they r no service to repair

name: avik
title: Awesome .. good for music and call
content: Perfect balance of hi mid n low for listening any kind of song (Nirvana to Vini Vicci). Call quality is awesome, as for my office work i have to connect both from laptop mobile and never faced any call drop in any of the devices. I can wear it for long time as it perfectly fit in my ears. Most imp after couple of hour usage also battery hardly drained out. finally i got my desired headphone which perfectly fit as per my usage requirement

name: YASHDEEP
title: Good wireless earphone with avg battery
content: Reviewing this after 10 days of purchase. The sound quality, bass, noise cancellation, built quality everything is up to the mark. But only if the battery backup was to be good this would be the best earphone under this price range. I only get 10 hrs roughly after full charge, was expecting at least 15 hrs. This may be due to the old software of my phone but I think this earphone will work better with OnePlus phones.

name: Dhruv goyal
title: Great Earphones for the money
content: These earphones have a lot of pros up their sleeve like amazing battery life of about 2 days, clear balanced sound and good bass.. Another useful feature is double tap to switch between devices. The build quality is also amazing.. The mic quality is good but not great. And the fit for me was a little off. But overall I am pretty satisfied with the product.

name: srinivasanpeyam
title: Beware....
content: I received an item which was non functional.... absolutely stunned...problem with software or battery I don't kno...it did not even start to comment on sound, noise cancellation or bass..beware...check the quality...i.had to swaet out to return

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome
content: The product is very nice. Very smooth in syncing with devices, pausing and playing magnetic buds. The battery life is also good. Its almost same as product described (15 to 17 hrs). Call quality and mic are very good. The bass is also very nice

name: Manpreet S.
title: VFM
content: It's really good, after reading the reviews I thought the bass quality will be average but it's really good atleast for me.. The best part is the switching between two bluetooth devices was very convenient, by just pressing a button on neck band.

name: Aaditya Soni
title: Oneplus's Awesome Product....Must Buy Product
content: Do not think....just buy it...1₹-5000₹ ..there is no earphones like this.. Sound 9/10...((treble10/10...base 9/10)). Quality 10/10. Fitting 10/10. Calling 10/10. Accessories and Other Stuff 10/10

name: Roshan Chourasia
title: Sound as hilarious
content: I m really very disappointed with this product.It is not even as local product.Sound is very sting in ear.Bass is not good.And I listened dot dot sound everytime.Finally I requested for replacement but Amazon was denied to replace it and I returned this item.. Amazon service was very poor wrt to this item.

name: Praba
title: Below average bullet model
content: The noise heard from outside is more than ur voice for the people on the other side..there is no noise cancellation at all.. bass is bad, sound quality is annoying sometimes. only good thing is it's conmectivity with OnePlus mobile is so quick in a fraction of second it connects. Not worth the money

name: amresh kumar
title: Durability, goood sound
content: Good thing about this product is its durability. I am not a sound phobic person but if you want a strong and long life earphone with good sound then it is the best product for you. I have wasted lots of money on earphones now it us what i was looking for. I am using this for 5-6 month. No issues yet

name: Amazon Customer
title: Painful earbuds.
content: It's so difficult to hold earbuds on ear,we have tried with all 3different size ear buds,but it's not holding inside ear.Within 2-5minutes it losses.. Sound quality while hearing music is good,but during call we felt pain in ear buds and isolated feel from environment occurred.. Pain on ear is a big problem after 15min of use..Soft tissues of ear can't bear the weight and tightness of ear buds.

name: Bimal
title: OnePlus Wireless Zzzzz
content: It connects and disconnects perfectly with the help of magnets and battery life lasts 3 days for me which is beyond perfection. Noise cancellation, Sounds Quality, Microphone audio quality everything is great and as expected, except for the bass - many would suggest that Bass ain't that strong as compared to 'Boat' or 'Sennheiser' but that's not much of an issue.

name: Rovil
title: Earphones with Awesome Battery Backup
content: Sound is crystal clear, Battery backup is super awesome, 10 mins charge 10 hrs backup & 30 mins charge 20 hrs backup, although the bass is low.. If a person is purchasing from music point of view than he will little disappointed but you want but if ur finding some wireless Earphones for calling or light music , then this is the best choice just go for it. The battery backup is un questionable.

name: Akshay Choudhary
title: Connectivity issue
content: Worst products I have ever purchased. Never ever think about buying this.. Cons:. Connectivity issues-. ~ You won't be able to connect this Bluetooth device in one go it will take time to get connected.. ~ after connection it will frequently disconnect and then connect itself making you frustrated.. ~ The best option after 5 min. U will throw this device instead of facing this connection issue!

name: Swapnil S. Shivankar
title: Sound quality and connectivity is crap. Don't buy these earphones.
content: I got these OnePlus earphones 2 days back. Now after my initial use I have realised that the sound quality is crap, no bass at all. I basically bought it to attend my office zoom calls, during calls at times the audio quality drops like crazy.. PLEASE DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT if you are looking for a reliable audio quality.. OnePlus people, please launch good products or else don't launch at all.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Must read.. Noice cancellation not avilable
content: Pls dont buy this.. noice cancellation not avilable in this product... 100% disturbance.. otherwise battery backup 2 days.. quick charge, voice clarity ok.... am already having sony make bluetooth.. its Rs:700 only.. noice cancellation working while travelling.. Oneplus waste for me.. bcoz am always travelling bike or car.. its not useful for me.. anyone required noice cancellation facility, pls dont buy this....

name: arnab basu
title: Excellent product
content: the charging time, battery life and dual connectivity are the main factors why i chose this.. Super light weight and comfortable to use. Wish there were a few ither colors to choose from.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Unfortunate and unexpected and disappointing...
content: Not used for 2 hours yet and microphone isn't working.... Very disappointing. Seven days for replacement passed and from 9th day it's not working!. Amazon, seller and oneplus I am waiting what you can do for your prestige and quality and service......!. Reply... Waiting for it....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best device in this price
content: Using for a month. This is best Bluetooth Earphones i have ever experienced. Really easy to use. The earplugs perfectly fits into the ear-holes. Superb sound quality, fast connection over any device. You can even connect over a smart tv and watch movies at night without disturbing anyone. Loved it!

name: Anuj
title: Not satisfied
content: The noise cancellation sucks even when paired with a one plus device. Bass & sound quality are okayish. The only good thing is its battery life lasts for like two days. Charging is superemly very fast, true to its claims of 10 minute charging. Been using this for two months now, if you don't need it for calls and just want a decent bluetooth earphones for music, then go for it.

name: Nick
title: Oneplus fooled on dual pairing feature in bass edition
content: I bought it thinking it has bluetooth dual pairing for laptop and onephone 6t.. It has no dual pairing. the previous version has that switch. For me it is of no use. While working from home i have to take calls from phone and laptop.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Problem with mic
content: Mic quality not good. Other person always complain about the voice and noise cancellation do not work in this. Infact sound quality is pretty good. While play pubg you will get very low latency as I have OnePlus 7 and on finatic mode it works very good but again the problem is with the mic sometimes my teammates could hear my voice after 3 seconds or they didn't hear my voice properly. Giving it 3 stars only because of its sound quality.

name: Vipin
title: DONT BUY
content: DONT BUY! I put a 3* because 1* are often ignored!. Headset gets randomly disconnected, may not be discoverable at times, if on meetings and a 2nd call comes, then the device unpairs and doesn't connect till everything is reset,. Worst of all 1 year warranty is a lie, I called their customer care and response was in Chinese! And it was automated , and running in loop, effectively NO RESPONSE.

name: Paras Bhatia
title: Bang for buck
content: Sound is definitely bass heavy and treble is also higher than mids. If you have any experience using flat headphones you’ll notice the drop in quality. But overall decently balance. Build quality is average at best. But for the price it’s a great pair of headphones. Works perfectly fine with iOS devices, although switching between macOS and iOS devices isn’t as seamless, but I guess that’s what the AirPods are for

name: CHANDRASHEKAR R
title: Well kicked to my ear! gifted more than 10 people in my family!
content: this was one of the gifting product that usually i gifted to more than 10 people in my family, everybody loved it! they were also booked so many products and gifted to there relatives!

name: Krishnendu Ghose
title: One plus bullet Z review
content: I am using this earphone for around two months now. Very happy with the clarity of calls. My main purpose is to use this for phone calls, online meeting. Best part is its easy device switch option is great. Almost no lag and very quick too. With respect to bass and noise cancellation I don’t think it does a great job.. Overall I am happy with its performance and it serves my purpose nicely

name: Nandeesh C S
title: Good but Mic issue
content: Sound quality & battery backup is nice, bass also good ,but the problem is my mic is not working properly, other side person i unable to hear my voice properly. I don't know the problem is only with my product or Every one plus z wireless

name: Sai deekshith
title: Brand is always a brand no one can replace it
content: Firstly I like the brand OnePlus it's for my OnePlus7t 😘. For coming to the point in the OnePlus bullets z earphone r beast 💪 compare to all other in the implementation of the new features and it's really comfortable to keep the earphones long time in the ears. I didn't notice any lag .. issues and it may be offered to all get this one .. In the price segment go for it .. Am writing the review after using one week.. Thank u so much ❤️💕

name: sonia
title: Just go for it
content: At first i was a little hesitant about it after seeing so many reviews but trust me its worth you money as its audio quality is amazing but will vary according to the phone's output but its Bluetooth range and connectivity is awesome and same with the battery backup,in my opinion these are better than true wireless earphones as i've bought many in the past and i've faced many problems with them. example realme buds😂

name: Vinay
title: Don't waste Money
content: The worst nightmare with this is I can hear there is a delay in between two ear buds..I can hear the song a bit later in other bud ... Charging is excellent..Noise cancellation is poor.. Outfit looks good initially but as the time passes you will get completely disappointed

name: MOHANKUMAR
title: Average
content: Not upto the expectations. Ear buds are ok.. the ear nozzle end is bigger than usual headphones that doesn't let proper plecement in ears. Not advisable for long time use as it will irritate your ears..

name: Ra__v
title: Excellent buy .
content: Excellent battery and quick charging. 15+hours and 45 minutes respectively.. Bass is a bit low , everything else including call quality is great. Transition from one device to another is very quick, with the double tap.. Overall great

name: Ashish Bansal
title: Poor noise cancellation and poor bass
content: Pros. 1. Quick connect to one plus phones. 2. Very good battery. Cons. 1. Very Poor noise cancellation.( Especially if used with laptops or non one p phones). 2. No bass, poor low frequency. You won't enjoy any songs or Music on it.. Checked with ipad , music without this headphones was better :-).. No worth to buy.

name: Azeez
title: Not working properly
content: Nice product from OnePlus. Bass can be better. Cal quality was so good.. After using for 25 days, it's giving problem now. It's disconnecting while I'm talking. When I connect to mobile automatically volume getting increased everytime. Don't know why it's behaving like this. Didn't expect this from oneplus.

name: Joshua Kiran
title: Very very average sound with good build quality
content: The build quality is very nice, volume levels are nice, the bass is practically at minimum settings. I'm not a bass head myself but for the music to sound better a little more bass than this is required. They have xtra bass version for same price without Mic. It isn't logical making the customer choose between mic and extra bass..

name: Potato Chips
title: More than average but not wow product.
content: For all the bass lovers:. Download 'playit' app. Go to equalizer and select 'normal'. Set the level of bass booster.. Solved.

name: snehal
title: Very good product
content: I got a product in which mic was not working. So I returned it & requested for replacement.. When I received replacement, it was not faulty and working fine after use of 1 month.. Battery backup is awesome. Bass is less but not bad. Overall nice product.. Go for it.

name: Vaibhav Mehta
title: Value for money
content: I use this product during gym time. The bass quality is thumping at full volume, although never at high volume. Overall sound quality is good.. Battery backup: As mentioned the battery backup of 17 hours, you would want it to be correct, but not to be. You will get maximum of 12-13 hours of battery backup at medium volume level.. Earbuds often becomes slippery, had to clean it everyday for better grip.

name: Anand
title: Battery backup is good but not enough Bass 👎
content: PROS:. 1. Battery backup and fast charging. 2. Connectivity. CONS:. it lacks in bass. Maybe they sound good with OnePlus devices, in other brand phones you'll notice bass is low

name: Narendran
title: Enough for causal usage except mic
content: Oneplus bullets wireless z is sick. I am writing this review after 6 months of usage. It is working fine. Pros are the sound quality and battery. Sound quality is awesome. Bass will be little low but can't feel the difference while listening to soft music and movies. For me, it has enough battery backup for 2 days. Water resistant quality is good, mic is not so good. Often need to place mic close to mouth. Better in this price range.

name: kiran
title: Great for college
content: The ones I got set an example that OnePlus earphones are really great. The product quality was really great. Clear sound but bass could have been better. There is a bass boosted version of the OnePlus bullets Z if want that. I being a college student find these earphones to be the most convenient as I have the constant need to switch from my phone to my laptop. And these buds have a button especially for that. And it is seamless.

name: Huzefa Mizwan
title: Noise cancellation not available and buttons are inavident
content: 1) Usability is nill. 2) The buttons are not placed at right place. 3) You have to search for the buttons each time, i am using it since 20 days and still need to search for the buttons.. 4) Noice cancellation not available. I don't know how Amazon has 3.7 stars for noise cancellation. Which was the major reason for which I bought the product. But service centre says that this product does not have noise cancellation.

name: Anil Kumar
title: Good for calls (and music occasionally)
content: Sound quality is average, it is not particularly for listening music as sound is clear but bass is average. I am using it for attending calls from home. Amazing battery backup and good Bluetooth range.

name: I'm bad Movement
title: Best but yet some Cons ....
content: Everything is nice But some cons which I felt .... 1) Noise cancellation is not accurate somewhat Low sound near is less but not High sounds. 2) Bass is Ok but If u r using dobly atoms or Equalizer. 3) it take almost 2 hours to charge. 4) connection is Excellent but If U remove from ears the magnetic tip at endside it connects fast it trend to Disconnect while doing works

name: Sachkar
title: Just the way I wanted
content: This is the first Bluetooth headset I am using.. I was reluctant to go for Bluetooth headset because of sound quality.. But this one amazed me ,. Charging speed is the game changer.

name: Customer
title: Value for money
content: I love this product and I use it everyday since the day I received them. Only thing I don't like is the alert sounds. When it's turned on or paired or switched to different mode, the alert or feedback sound is really loud and I feel like it'll happen my ears for sure.

name: Mohd. Shehbaz Shaikh
title: Great product
content: Battery backup is awesome one full charge stays more than 24 hours. 10/10 for that.. Noise cancellation is not that good inside the house works fine outside it captures near by sounds which at time causes inconvenience.. Bass quality is good enough to enjoy music on the go.. Overall great product need upgrade for noise cancellation

name: Amir iqbal
title: Best Bluetooth Headset For Gaming
content: Oneplus Bullet Wireless Z, Best Bluetooth Headset For Gaming Right Now, Low Latency Feature is Really Awesome, I Recommend To Anyone Who Play Pubg Like Game, You Should Go For it.

name: Yashash Shroff
title: Overall, an amazing product
content: Love this product. It has become a part of my daily use!. Call quality - 10/10. Sound Quality:. For Calls - 10/10. For Music - 7/10 (I'm used to Sennheisers, so this is a downgrade). Pairing - 9/10 (I own a Oneplus Phone). Switching between devices - 10/10. Overall - 9/10

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mic stopped working within 2 months
content: Received product as expected. Initial 2 months audio in and out met all expectations. A day ago mic stopped working. Many forums suggested to perform hard reset but even that is not successful. A huge disappointment and even Oneplus customer care is working with minimal support and not accepting my call to make a formal complaint. There is no proper information on Oneplus website about how to claim warranty.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good buy for the price
content: Good buy. Worth the price. Do not expect much at that price.. Liked the warp charge.. Type C charge port. Should have had a power button.. Ear buds lill hard on ears but do not bother even using for longer hours.. Ear buds doesnt really stay in during workouts, they slip easily.

name: Indu Sethi Almadi
title: Amazing sound and battery. Simply love them.
content: I was a boat headphones user from long time. I never expected it to be that good. But it has very punchy bas and lows and mids are also very clear. Sound is amazing and battery is super Awosome . Am using it on decent amout per day that is 3-4 hours per day n it still says around 50 % . Its been 3 days m using it without charging. M very very satisfied.

name: NIRAV
title: Amazing under 5000 not under 2000💐
content: No Need to upload photos and all... Go for it .... If you have budget of 5000 then don't waste money...Save 3000 and go for it.... No one is better than this under 5000 ..... I have used all the companies..... Cons | Noise Cancellation and Not deep bass boost. Pros | Everything is perfect 💐

name: Kannan J.
title: #NEVERSETTLE
content: As expected Oneplus never let's you down and delivered me with the best wireless earphone with elevated bass, the sound is upto the stands, you can't doubt on build quality of Oneplus's products and the battery is pretty good and rest is the history. I have also used the Oneplus bullets wireless Z which have amazing low latency for gaming mode. Well both the products are TRUELY EPIC!!!!!!!

name: Kumar
title: Battery backup within 2 hours only not for 20 hours.  It’s too bad
content: They have given 20 hours backup but it’s coming within 2 hours only. So don’t expect 20 hours backup, first 6 months it will come around 15 hours after 6 months it come only 2 hours So don’t buy it

name: Shahbaz
title: Must Buy
content: It was really good and it met all of my expectations. The highs and lows of the music were really good and also bass quality and noise cancellation were also excellent. It lasts for 4-5 days if you use it daily for around 5 hours. No problem with this product

name: Neeraj Chourasia
title: Average quality.
content: I also have samsung Level U and it is nowhere near to it. It's sound quality is not giving comfort to your ears. One plus point is it's magnetic onoff switch linked to earbuds. However, missing the cover lid over it's charging pin is surprised to me which not suitable to rough outdoor use and in rains..Better go for Samsung by paying little more for premium or go with other dirt cheap one.

name: Gaurav
title: Bad quality
content: I have ordered one plus bluetooth from Amazon ,noise cancellation, sound quality and base quality is worst now because I purchased this around 24 may 2020 (3 months ago ) , this is in one year warranty so please replace my earphones as soon as possible & i spend 2000 on this bluetooth ,if one plus not givn me the best quality so why I purchase next time from one plus please help me with this and arrange new one plus bluetooth

name: bhupendra
title: Not a value for money
content: After 3 month of use:. Bad noise cancellation even truck buses dogs sounds are audible for other connected person.. Low base after 30 minutes ears are paining badly.. Connectivity issues while changing between mobile and laptop, pathetic.. Only cons it is a onplus but bad product at all.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bass and audio lovers you can skip this one
content: It took just 2 min to me for initiate return the product. For me bass and sound quality both not good compare to MI products. If you love bass and sound quality Don't buy this one. And while watching YouTube videos and listening music you will hear some moisture wicking in the background. As they mentioned latency pretty low when compare to MI head set.I don't know about battery life as i return the product within a day. In my opinion skip this one if you love sound quality and bass.

name: Thamizh
title: Excellent Battery Backup 👌👌💪
content: Excellent battery backup! I listened to songs and joined Skype calls for almost 8+ hours and charge didn't reduce from 100%..Sound Quality and Noise cancellation is exceptional. Bass is more than average.

name: Priyaranjan Panda
title: Bluetooth connection drops at times
content: IMP INFO : I recieved the bass edition on Saturday. After 2 days use I found bluetooth connection auto resets frequently with my redmi note 8 pro even when it's very close i.e. once or twice within an hour at times. Does anyone else face same problem ?

name: Ratheesh
title: Noise cancellation issue. 1 star.
content: Noise cancellation isue. U can go on if you want to use in a closed place without any disturbance. If you want to use while riding a bike then this is not the suggested one as you want to park your bike to attend the call.

name: A@di
title: Good Product but nothing Great
content: its good overall but not great.. In less price you will get better experience or as expected.There are many varities or brands will give you good quality of Sound , base , durability in less amount

name: M.teja
title: Nice one
content: Sound quality is good. you can experience the small instruments too. and the bass is not too good it's just average. And noise cancellation is very well. quality of the product is good magnetic stripes are very well I'm using this from 3 moths there no connectivity issues very nice product you can gift this for your parents 😊

name: Vinodh Rajakumar
title: Excellent product from OnePlus
content: Excellent Sound Quality. OK with Bass. Decent Build Quality. Extraordinary Battery performance (Half an hour charge will give you more than 15 hrs )

name: shubhank goyal
title: Great product. OnePlus again nails it
content: Amazing product from OnePlus. Sound quality is just top notch and much better than those expected from similar products. Light weight, so doesn't feel like a burden around neck. Been using for 9 hours straight. And then in just 10 min it's 80% charged. Bass is exceptional. So is Noise cancellation feature. Also when the two earpiece connect, it automatically turns off thus saving energy.

name: aravind meesala
title: Major issues with this product
content: The major issue is when we are using this Bluetooth earphones as it is 2.5 MHz it is interrupting my Wi-Fi signal and a large drop in the speed from 50 MBPS TO 0.87MBPS. I have bought this to attend meetings but when we are on zoom call, we cannot hear the other application sounds. If you update the sound settings in your PC, the sound quality suddenly drops to a sound of voice call. Think once while considering this product.

name: Moses mathew
title: Not comfortable around neck
content: Below are the issues. 1.the neck band is not user friendly....it gets tied up. It does not stay freely around the neck. You will feel that something messy around the neck. 2. The buttons are difficult to reach. 3.not good with notice around...it will catch all noice. 4. For me it does not fit in ear

name: Chahat kaur
title: Very very nice
content: Very good product and service after purchase. After 5 months it got damaged so the shopkeeper replaced it with completely new earphones and took no money . so good product nd service

name: sebinath
title: Replacing within 2 weeks of purchase
