content: I bought this Oneplus wireless Z after much hype, I'm impressed with the battery life, quick charge, quick connect and most importantly oneplus brand.. It was working fine, until the 10th day, it suddenly stopped working, the white light doesn't go off, unable to connect/charge/reset.. I checked with oneplus community and i was told to replace it, since there is no solution for this problem yet.. I hope oneplus will find a solution soon.

name: Anonymous
title: Tops class sound quality
content: Good impression after first use.. I have listened to Divine's songs, Nuclea and Hello by Adele. So far its nice.. For many the bass may not be satisfying as it's little less, but it's adequate. Hard core Bass lovers will expect it to be at least 30% more. I hope this is taken care of in OP's next version.. Expect for base, the sound quality is top notch. It's crystal clear.. Steal deal under ₹2K.

name: Amazon Customer
title: The best in the price range. Try Bass adjustment.
content: It is the best choice in the range of Rs.2000. I heard negative comments about the Bass in the headset. But I will give you one suggestion to get more Bass. I installed one music app called 'Music Player MP3' and then I changed the equalizer setting in the app. I changed it to Jazz and BassBoost to high. After this change I felt very good Bass in the sound. This is purely my experiment and it worked for me. You too can try it... All the best 👍😊

name: Mrs Ashok Kumari
title: Brilliance from One Plus.
content: This product gets all the marks because of it's lightning fast charging speed due to quick charge option that enables you to get upto a backup of 10hrs even if you put it on charging for 10mins. Connectivity is good. Just that on normal calls sometimes you have to be really loud. Sound quality is decent as it doesn't cancel noise but nevertheless, it does it's job for 1999 bucks. Great buy!

name: Mahip Gada
title: Bad product to buy
content: Noice Cancellation isn't working well I'm getting feedback from my friends that they are able to hear the background noice very clearly.. Sound is okay not very great, at times the volume become automatically low and high.. Overall the product delivered failed the expectations and one of the worst product of one plus.. Total waste of money.

name: Devashish
title: No Bass
content: This is a pretty honest and short review of these wireless bullets z. I ordered them as soon as i saw all those big features written alongside the description and also i have a OnePlus phone so it tempted me even more to do so. But i returned it the same day just because of one con it had...... It has NO BASS.... This is the biggest amd probably the only problem it has and to me it mattered a lot, Rest all features are same as said...

name: Customer
title: Stopped working
content: I bought these earphones as they would go well with my one plus phone as charging it would be easier. But the left earphones stopped working just after a week of use. Very disappointed. The return window is closed as well. Would never recommend this.

name: dheerendra singh
title: best quality at this price segment
content: the product i've purchased i didn't get but i've used it from some of my friends and for sure i can say that these are best quality blutooth earphones for now ,,overall performance and sound quality impressed me so much and the battery specially lasts so much long i've used 5 days for calling and music on short durations and it still have 10percent left so the product is valuable for this price segment .thats all for now .

name: Ram.vithanala
title: Fall in love ❤
content: Oneplus bullets wireless z is perfect. For all music lovers❤. *Premium quality. *i really shocked the price is 2000. *you can hear every small instrument sound. ***mainly charging is perfect. *fast charging. *10min charge - 10 hours battery life. Oneplus bullets >>>>> all blueetoth earphones. Iam using without charge from 3 days but the battery is half of the above percentage❤. Fast charging

name: Keerthan
title: Meh.
content: If music is your thing, then go for it.. Good bass, Good Sound Quality. Good Highs and lows.. The mic is bad tho. Poor noise cancellation.. The person listening, hears the background noise more than the speakers voice itself. So very bad mic and noise cancellation.. Sound quality is good. If you're gonna just listen to music.

name: Amazon Customer
title: The bass is very very very bad
content: Sound quality is okayish. The bass is HORRIBLE. For a music lover like me, i didn't like it and I've requested for a return. Battery life is great and the microphone is great. So if you need a good pair of earphones just for calls or office work, this one is amazing. If you need it for listening to music, go for better ones.. It's comfortable as well but it falls down when you move a lot.. Overall it's good, except for the horrible bass.

name: David
title: Amazing .... But has a hidden flaw?
content: The earphones are definitely worth the money, the sound is definitely less bassy and more clear and crisp, there seems to be no audio lag on my realme device for mobile games like pubg and COD, the earphones fit well in the ear canal and the battery does last for a long time, BUT after few days of use I seem to have some reconnection issues where the earphones disconnect abruptly and reconnect.... This is a very rare issue but it has happened... idk the cause behind this tho :-(

name: M J
title: Great Buy considering the price
content: The audio quality feels good. Bass is just enough and does the daily music job. The microphone and its noise cancellation is outstanding. The magnetic and connectivity stability is pretty great. The quality of the band and buds leaves a good impression.

name: Amazon Customer
title: 1.Doesn't show white indication after full charge. 2.Oneplus logo is Missing from inside.
content: It takes more than 50 minutes to charge fully with oneplus warp charger & company claims that it will give you 10hr listening time in 10 min of charging which means It should be charged in 20 minutes.. But it's not like that in real.. It doesn't show white colour light indication after full charge i reset it after that , but then also it not showing white light indcation after full charge.

name: Aniket zumbar pingat
title: Just awesome no words
content: This is just awesome ,just like others i was also confused in real me,one plus,oppo ,boat but in 2k one plus is king just close your eyes and go for it sound quality is too good you can't listen in full volume Bluetooth range is also top some times you may feel legancy but it is not too much battery is also very good charge for 15 min enjoy 2 days overall it's king in this price segment just go for it😊

name: Nishita giduturi
title: Good buy
content: I've bought 3 bullets at once. Everything about these headphones is great. The long battery life is the great thing about this product(it's just three days since I've bought, hope the depreciation is not too much over time). I didn't charge for one and half days even though I used continuously. On/Off feature is easy with the magnets. Remaining features are the same like any other regular brands. It works the same with any device it is connected to.

name: Tarun
title: One of the best product
content: Just today I received this product. Amazon is providing their best during this pandemic period also to deliver products. Coming to the product Oneplus Bullets Wireless Z, it is just awesome. The sound quality is awesome. The bass and everything is perfectly fine. So many are saying that bass is somewhat less. This is the best one for 2k. Features are best. Device switching is one of the excellent features provided in this product. If you can afford 2k just go for this.........

name: Joyet Thomas
title: A mid-range earphones perfect for day to day use.!
content: For a mid-range OnePlus earphones, it gives you good sound and bass quality. Noise cancellation works if you max out the volume. Comes with various fit-in earbuds and the headset is made of plastic(strong though). A full charge gives you almost a full days use, and charges pretty fast. Connectivity to OnePlus devices are amazing, take a minute or two to connect to a laptop or to change between devices.

name: saurabh
title: Its awesome. Quality, Switch, battery, awesome.
content: No noise cancellation. Go for wireless 2 for Active noise cancellation.. Mic needs to be held near your mouth only then other side will be able to hear you.. Rest everything is awesome.

name: Aditee
title: Excellent earphones!
content: The best earphones ever! I bought these for my brother a few months ago and made a second purchase last week for myself. The battery life is just unbelievably good. My earphones got delivered 3 days ago and I haven't charged them once. The battery right now is 60%. Absolutely in love with this product.

name: Shruti
title: Good earphones
content: Strong points-. Battery is damm good, it delivers 10 hours for a charge of 10 min.. Range is ok for daily use.. Sound quality is good for price range in bluetooth segment.. Go for it , can also try bass edition as some reviews says bass quality is low for music lovers.

name: Dhanush
title: Worse to use sometimes
content: The product is very good but sometimes the volume gets increased automatically and it wont stop even if you keep pressing the volume down button and the warning sound wont give a break because of that increasing sound even if it is the highest. This gets quiet irritating.

name: Ashish Chaudhary
title: Don't buy
content: There is a sound cracking problem.. I have redmi k20 pro if I connected to my phn and hear some song or video there is a problem of voice cracking and I also used it with my HP laptop but the sound cracking problem is still there ..and I also replace this item but the same problem prevail with 2nd piece i suggest u not to buy this worst product .my 2000rs totally wasted..plz one plus change my earphone ..

name: Aravind Girish M
title: Experience after using it for 3 days
content: Battery backup is excellent . Sound quality is awesome. Bass quality still needs some improvement and i would give a rating of 3 out of 5. Charging speed is unbelievable if you have a one plus warp charger it would only take 15 mins for battery reaching 100% and can easily use all day for the next 48 hours. Extremely satisfied and one of the best headphones to buy in this prie range.

name: Mohammed Asif
title: Bass and In Ear - Fitting issue
content: Overall quality is Very Good, battery backup is Mind-blowing ... Only negative is Not enough Bass ... and the in ear buds is not properly fitting my ears even after changing the small or medium buds.. There is a issue in fitting .. I have returned the product .

name: Shane Fernandez
title: Highly recommended product
content: Great sound quality and bass. Convenient magnetic separation to switch on. Ear pods fit perfectly into the ears. Great battery life. Great phone call quality

name: subramanian
title: Good audio quality with poor mic quality
content: It's a disappointment from OnePlus. Pro's. Audio quality is good,. Quick charge(OnePlus charger required). Light weight and Very much comfortable to wear. Con's. Mic quality is one of the biggest issue I've faced.. it's not audible for the receiver.. So any one looking for good audio quality you can easily pick this but if u r looking for good microphone quality then don't waste your time.

name: Kallem Sandeep Reddy
title: The Best under 2000
content: These are love.. One has to go for it if the budget is below 2000..Bass quality is slightly less than the other brands but that's not at all a problem compared to other features. The main thing is the battery backup. It is a beast in the battery backup, I am using it since three days without charging

name: Amazon Customer
title: Fentabulous sound.... Especially OnePlus
content: I can say it's fetabulous product.... Sound quality was amazing especially for oneplus mobile 5/5 for other mobiles 4.5/5. Voice call : 5/5. Connectivity: 5/5. Bass: 5/5. Previously I was used sony XB400 Xtra bass, quality was very bad... I can say OnePlus bullet Z quite amazing compare to Sony xb400. Just bilindly go for it...

name: Ajendra S.
title: Good wireless earphone
content: Please don't buy it for gaming.. .100ms delay is enough to loose all advantage in pubg.. Rest.. .it's best.. But battery getting drain faster as time passes. Of course it supports fast charging. After 2 month i got 14 hours of battery time.. .Jst listening music at medium volume.

name: Amazon Customer
title: poor bass and sound quality and no quick switch for bass edition
content: I have used wired jbl head set with average quality and that has better sound quality. If you are planning to use for quality music avoid this.. Bass edition is not available in bass edition. you need to manually disconnect from one device to connect 2nd device

name: Sajjan Kumar
title: False Promises on battery life & Fast Charging and cannot connect multiple devices.
content: Don't purchase this product, because according to his guarantee for battery life up to 17 hours has not fulfilled and his fast-charging is also a false promise. And most important drawback of this product is you cannot connect multiple devices, such as one mobile phone and your laptop. So when you are working on both devices then you will very angry with this product. So, in my opinion, you should go to another product.

name: sankar
title: Value for money.
content: Value for money product and very low bass effect and it could be easily pairing with two devices by double tapping the right side button.. And this feature is useful for student who uses two devices ( laptop and smartphone) eg) imagine you see a vedio in your laptop ( with pairing) and suddenly you received a phone call from your loved once. You can pair to smartphone by double tapping yhe button on your right side.

name: Sanjay Kamal reddy
title: Amezing product
content: Hello I'm sanjay I buy these Oneplus wireless z bass edition last 2 days ago I really love fast connecting technology in these headphones and amezing product I ever seen in neck band headphones bass is also good and build quality is speechless means awesome I'm giving 5 stars to these headphones thank u OnePlus and amezon love u buy these headphones and u will experience very amezing premium feel .. Thankk u

name: SD
title: You won't regret buying it.!
content: Best for this price.. Build quality is good.! You'll not like it if you're a bass lover. But the bass is decent, not bad. The rest is just awesome..! Battery life is terrific.. One full charge can get you through 3 working days straight, if you're a sort of moderate user.! Even when you're low on battery, a 10 min charge can get you 8 to 9 hrs of usage.!

name: Surya
title: Surya
content: Battery life in this price segment only one best bullet wireless z excellent battery life..... Sound quality... awesome...bass is very normal compare to boat rocker 255 pro..... but sounds contain very high details...in high's,low's. Pro. 1. Awesome design. 2. Magnetic control. 3. connectivity rang. 4. Sound quality and details. 5. battery life. Cons. 1 bass very normal

name: Vijay R.
title: Quality and Priceworthy
content: Hello guys,. I am writing this review after use of 15 days.. Battery:-8/10. Backuu is 16 to 17 hours.. Quality:-9/10. Bass lovers please avoid this is not for you.. Charging time:-I have 10w adapter it's taking 1 hour to charge but if you have any 18 or higher w adapter it will take around 25 to 30 hours.. I am not gamer so not sure about low latency mode. Overall it's good and Priceworth product.

name: Sushil Kumar
title: Excellent product at this price range
content: Perfect packing..... Genuine oneplus product. And battery life excellent and vocal and sound clearity is excellent.... If you looking for long battery, comfort, built quality then i suggest go for it. On/off feature is excellent which is best to boost the battery life forget to on off device...

name: Vedant Mohod
title: Almost the best
content: If you are looking for premium quality wireless earphones in affordable price go for it. Sound quality is good wherein the crispness of sound is concerned.Provides good noise cancellation.If you are looking for a earphones with good bass then go for Realme.. The best thing about these earphones is its battery life.Ttust me you will not regret buying it.

name: Sarathkumar
title: Don't buy this
content: Worst product quality. THE EARPHONES HAVE STOPPED WORKING AFTER 14 DAYS OF USE.. No charging light and not switching on, even by pressing the buttons or by separating the ear pieces.. I need a replacement from OnePlus ASAP. Someone please tell me how can i do that?. The return/ Replacement option is not showing since it has been more than 7 days. HELP ASAP Please

name: Sharif Shaik
title: Terrific Purchase
content: After seeing the reviews on YouTube, I thought to buy this.. But these were Out Of Stock. Finally I was lucky to Get One.. The Sound Quality is Brilliant, I was able to take the calls and attend the meetings with ease.. I made a Terrific Purchase, would highly recommend to others.. Just Go for it!

name: Prem
title: Except battery life its not a good choice. Think wisely.
content: Battery is topnotch but performance in call, noise cancellation worst experience and latency is very high. ( 2.5 / 5). I believe people need Good Audio Quality, Mic Quality and Noise cancellation go with Oppo Enco M31.. The headphone only cons is battery it stands upto 7 hours on full charge. We have to compromise sometime.

name: Puspanjali
title: Don't buy it.
content: This one is disappointment by one plus.i have one plus 6T so chose this over others and features were good but nothing fulfills the purpose.. 1.No bass. Not for music lover .. 2.On call the other person hears all the sounds in the background, wind, fan, ac ,.dog barks.. 3.It also gives pain in the ear after few hours.. 4. No warning for low battery. Disconnects abruptly when battery goes down.. 5. Only good thing it connects to devices easily.

name: kaustav chowdhury
title: Bass is awesome
content: All is good but charging port is not correctly placed. Sweat or water can enter & can damage the product

name: soumyadipbarmanroy
title: Worst mic quality.
content: Mic quality: Surrounding sounds are caught more over the caller voice. No doubt about its charge durability and speakers quality, but another the most important aspect i.e. mic 🎤 gave worst feedback. Since one day remains of my replacement window..lets what's kept thr.

name: Gokul Krishna
title: Quality wireless earphone
content: Good sound signature and clarity.. Long battery life and fast charging speeds.. Not thumping bass but surprisingly enough bass is there, not flat like many reviews I read.. A good option if you own a wrap charge enabled OnePlus device.

name: Deepak R.
title: Amazing Product with Superior Sound Quality
content: Sound quality is really good.. Immediately connects with any device.. I would like to mention here, initially the seller sent me an opened box which was lacking of USB Type C cable inside. I spoke to amazon customer care representative and asked to replace the product. New product was delivered to me within 3-4 days. This time it was sealed and had USB Type C cable inside. Thanks to the seller and amazon

name: Rahul
title: Don't buy
content: Sound quality is food but don't buy this product as I buy this product on 19th dec 2020 but on 2 jan I am not able to connect my device & unusual sound is coming from blue tooth all the time , this sound is like you are listening AM Radio with out any sound

name: Sreemurugan
title: The Wireless Killer
content: First of all... For those saying that it have low bass doesn't know what the hell they're talking about... It has a pretty decent bass. It's not bass boosted... But the normal bass is enough to give the perfect music experience... Terrific battery backup and the fast charging technology is a life saver... A killer product from oneplus

name: Pradeep Marella
title: Must buy
content: Best value for money product from Oneplus.. Very comfortable and nice fitting for both casual and workouts.. Highs, mids, trebble, vocals are excellent but bass is average.. Battery life and call quality are the outstanding features of this product.

name: Ashwin Tv
title: Amazing !!!!!!!!!!!
content: I bought this yesterday i was skeptical about it but trust me.its an amzing product and im loving it . Some say its doesnt do justice for the price tag . But i say it gives an overall balanced sound . I loved the build quality of the product and the sound output also and the pairing is mersering mahn i love tht i spent 2k for it. I knw some say its not up the mark but i muat disagree with them. And the call quality is good ... I m loving it

name: Aniket Mitra
title: Not for running/jumping rope or other heavy cardiovascular activities
content: Avoid buying it. Less than a few weeks and the earphones started the beeping sound where the volume increases by itself. If you google it, it’s a common problem.. the same happened with my previous one plus bullets but that was not sweat proof. Apparently these are but I doubt. A few 5k runs and one 60 min skipping session and the earphones started giving me trouble

name: Amazon Customer
title: Wordt customer support. Earphone got damaged within 1 month
content: Worst. The earphone not workig in just 1.5 months of usage. Not responding. Not detectable. And worst customer service from oneplus. No pickup service. And it seems i have to courier the earphone for repair. I called the service center and they are saying we cannot provide you any assured date of replacement or repair. Absolutely worst product and customer support.never buy oneolus products. You will repent for sure.

name: Rahul Pardeshi
title: This product is not support for Samsung M21.
content: When i connect with my phone audio quality was not good,. Not supported with samsung M21 phone, but when i connected this with my friend's oneplus phone that time audio quality supporting with good quality.. This product only support for oneplus devices.

name: Vijay bhaskar
title: Good headphone with average bass
content: Charging speed and backup is plus point.. Average bass only. Difficulty in switching to multiple devices. Better to go for normal edition (having swich button) instead of bass edition (no switch button and no bass)

name: S Pareek
title: Superb neckband of my life 😘😘😘
content: I love this neckband. I purchased 2 pcs on 27 may 2020. Overall sound quality is good. Battery backup mind blowing from purchase date i never charged it. It came with 100 percent charged and now it is showing 40 percent battery. Comfortable awesome. Calling quality is best out of best. Looks premium in black color. Overall experience with this is awesome. I give it 9 out of 10 rating.. Delivery packing was not so good.

name: Prahlad
title: best bang for your buck !!
content: I bought this thing 4 months ago and I have to say this is just incredibly good product.. 1. It is well built, lightweight and comfortable for long term usage.. 2. The vocals are pretty good, bass could have been a bit better.. 3. battery backup is amazing. I switched from wired to wireless using this and I had no issues.. Just buy this this at or under 2000 Rs /- with closed eyes.

name: Chetan Bane
title: Very good for using multiple handsets
content: I like the way it pairs so fast with your device....meanwhile when you disconnect the magnets and put it in your ears, you will find it already synced with your last connected device....also it hosts a button which enables you to quickly switch from one device to another recently paired device...this works so smoothly that i can easily toggle between my respective devices for attending the calls...

name: Kindle Customer
title: One plus bullets Z battery backup
content: Very ordinary performance. More importantly, device battery discharges within an hour of being fully charged. Contradicts the concept of being wireless as it constantly needs to be charged. Disappointing.

name: Miriyala Ravi
title: I liked it
content: I’ve bought the one plus Bullet Z wireless recently. One thing I noticed is the charge in it is not showing correctly. I mean it’s getting refreshed for every 20% but not every single percentage. I wonder is this happening only to me or for everyone. Except that everything is cool about this product. The built quality is fabulous and very happy with 2k worth product.

name: Swastik
title: NOT BAD FOR GAMING BUT ALSO NOT THAT GOOD FOR GAMING
content: You can go for it it's really having a nice bass and also battery life is too good but if you are searching a 3d like stereo headphones then I've personally tested it it's not at all stereo 3d sound effect headphone which can be a disadvantage for gaming but overall the headphones is best for this price and just go for it if you are searching for a good heaphones at 2000 rupees

name: Joshua Suvarna
title: Worth it!
content: I think this is the best Bluetooth neckband you can get in market at this range.. sound is balanced.. highs are clear and mids are crisps and bass is average. I have used it for months now it is very comfortable and lightweight.. battery is amazing and charging it is quick ! Overall it is better than the realme wireless buds and worth the money!

name: anand gupta
title: If you are looking for earphones under 2k - this is the one
content: Pros-. 1.Seamless connectivity- it’s easier to switch between laptop and phone with a double tap on earphones button.. 2. Battery backup - 20 hrs of backup gets you around 2-3 days normal usage on a single charge. 3. Charging speed - 20 mins full charge. 4. Sound is good not the best not too loud- just adequate. Cons. Not found any will update more after 2-3 months of usage

name: Zayn
title: Don't even think of buying if you are going to use it in noisy environment.
content: Changing review after 3 months of usage. Don't even think of buying if you are going to use it in noisy environment. It catches all the background noise coming from different person and may be so irritating sometimes

name: Sayantan Kumar Halder
title: OnePlus is All rounder plus...
content: Those people saying, the bass not up to the mark just set ur equilizer properly and use it. Best Bluetooth headphone at this price, go for it without hesitation, just immersive experience.

name: Laxmikant Salgaonkar
title: Crystal clear sounds n best for migraine
content: Best wireless earphones for people who suffering from ""MIGRAINE"'' condition.. .. Crystal clear sounds and 20-30% bass.. .. If you like music and afraid of migraine headache then go for it.

name: Deepanshu Agrawal
title: Read my review its imp
content: For those who have come untill here please read this!. Initially it was working well but i was working out one day and my ear stopped automatically it was charged. From then the buttons stopped working i can't even take calls from the button. Very bad and the sound from the earphont is coming very less. They have shut there service center from many places in india and i have to do a lot of jhanjhat for this to get replaced

name: Tanmay Srivastava
title: Value for money product at this price point
content: I have been using this product since 3rd august at the price point of ₹2000 it's a decent product if you are a normal user then you will get 3 days of battery life magnetic control feature is very useful for saving battery if you are a extra bass lover then this product is not for you however bass quality is good and if you like normal bass then you can go for this lastly profile switcher feature can be very helpful if you own 2 devices

name: Aarij zafeer
title: Not great but Best at this price point
content: With any mobile phone or laptop great sound , with one plus Dash charge 30t it charges in less then 20 min , sound quality is comprised to get better battery life ie 20 hours of battery life.

name: Amol Kamath
title: Must have for WFH
content: Love the earphones for work from home. An absolute stunner when it comes to long usage, battery life, easy switch button, volume control, etc.. The biggest advantage for this is the toggle button which allows to switch between devices and calls. Ideal choice for WFH for me that allows me to switch between laptop and phone

name: laxman
title: Bye bye realme wireless buds
content: Confused customer contact me on 838seven zero seven 8938 ...... Awesome product .... Worth buying. Got it on last Wednesday with 100 % battery .... Now it is in 30 % after one week .... Awesome battery backup

name: Shadab khan
title: Buy for many but bye bye for bass heads.
content: Not for bass heads. Dangling mic is a problem for crystal clear talking experience especially while travelling but not a turn down. Sound and fitment is better than realme wireless earphone but lacks bass. Realme had good voice reception comparativly. Speed charging and battery life is top of the game. Noise cancellation is good. Still, a better buy than many in the price bracket. Worth the money.

name: Amazon Customer
title: One Plus wireless z
content: According to the money this product is very costly, I am using this product for some week. It's sound quality is very bad and no noise cancellation as well as while talking get some disturbance. I will never suggest to buy this product. I want to return this product.

name: Satyanjay
title: Best Quality (But not good to play music)
content: The quality of this earphone is best. Battery last too long. Sound clarity is good. Mic clarity is good. In less than 1 hour it gets fully charged (my experience) and will last for too long time.. The switch between 2 devices also works fantastic.. The only downside is that the music quality is not that good. It has almost no bass.

name: Tushar M.
title: Received Faulty Item..Amzon promised to give replacement by next day
content: Received amazon delivery today.Unforunately item is faulty.Clear visible crack on it.I put replacement request.Amazon is delivering exact same item by tomorrow.Lets see how will be new Item.. Overall sound quality is too good..beyond expectations..Bass Mid Tribble ..total controlled sound..Just loved it..

name: Rahl
title: Oneplus living upto to its tagline..never settle
content: Notice cancellation perfect at this cost..easy to connect...once charged ,can be used for a long time..bass is good..I don't think at this cost ,anyother earphone can match this product..oneplus is realy making a market obviously with genuine products..go for it guys..5/5 for noise cancellation,4/5 sound,5/5 calls,5/5 connectivity,4/5 bass,10 for its texture..

name: GK Rao
title: Long lasting performance
content: I liked the sound quality, ease of using, ease of switching between devices and most importantly long lasting performance in single charging & fast charging. Overall its a good value for money product.

name: TEJAS PAREKH
title: Value for money
content: One plus never disappoints. Earphone is very easy to use and it has dual pairing device feature.. Batter life is also good and light in weight.. Magnetic on/off feature of this headphone make it more unique. If you are looking to buy wireless headphone with in 2000 and definitely go for it. Thanks.

name: Ranjan Kumar
title: Go for it....
content: Battery backup is great.... Charging too fast.... Sound is clear .... Better than Realme ..... Bass is good but not great.... I liked this product because I have one plus mobile.... And the main reason to like it is battery ...

name: Sam
title: Good for basic listening needs.
content: I use this mainly for virtual meetings. Super comfortable, can use whole day. However, microphone clarity is not as good as wired earphones, but is acceptable. Sound quality is nice. Bass is really bad.

name: Kartik
title: Good for the price.
content: The sound is pretty balanced, not too much bass heavy, but not light either. There is very little delay while playing games and watching videos( used on a oneplus phone). The connectivity is superb, it connects and switches instantly between devices.. Overall, great buy for 2000₹.

name: pradeep kala
title: Neither good for calling and nor for music (no bass)
content: Catches every background noise, even the slightest one . I bought this primarily for calling purpose. However it's difficult to talk as other person on the line complain of surrounding noise. Someone even speaking softly from 10-15 feets can be heard by the other person on the phone.Returned the product. Refund received. Prompt and efficient service by Amazon.

name: Ankuchat
title: Best for regular use.
content: It's one of the best wireless earphones for OnePlus users, the battery life is amazing, it turns on and off automatically with the magnetic locking feature. Noise cancellation is not that great but better than other earphones. Been using it for few months now.

name: Danish Shaikh
title: Worth hai Boss
content: I purchased this product 3 months ago,. Thanks one plus to make these kind of product.. If you don't have time to charge then pls go for it.. Still I am charging this Bulletz for 10 mints only and I have number of meetings in a day, but it will work more than one day for me.. Having normal bass not so good (I'm not a music lover so it won't affect me). Noise cancellation ratio is 7 out of 10.

name: Arun A.
title: Impressive sound quality and lightweight
content: Received the few hours back and is in my ear now. Excellent sound quality in 1999/-. Well balanced. Very light weight and feel almost there's none around my neck. Smaller ear pieces would be better though what it appears is not annoying. Haven't checked calling quality and fully charged playback performance till now. A good go for music lovers.

name: Anurag
title: Best Headphone Purchase
content: Well this is 2nd purchase of this product. We loved it so much. Best features are. - 0-100% battery in 20 mins. - Double Tap button to quickly switch to other paired device.(previously connected device). This feature is useful in case when I am listening to something on my laptop and if I get a phone call I can quickly switch.

name: Krishna Prasad
title: Good price good product
content: Good product. Helps to quickly shift between devices. Bass is good. Good mic quality for making voip calls in laptops. Good power backup. With 4-5 hrs of calls and music its lasting two days..

name: anirban sinha
title: Love it
content: I really loved how clear and loud the sound can get. Using it regularly and even the battery doesn't drain fast. 10mins of charging and I use it for 2 days at least. It was gift from a loved one and I totally love it. Worth all the money , go for it without a second thought.

name: Vishnu
title: This version is very well balanced compared to bass version
content: The sound quality is good, almost perfect and balance between different frequencies is awesome.. The bass is there too, one should not mistake that there is no bass just coz 1+ released a bass version.. In fact if I have to rate this 8 or 9, I would have to rate the bass version 6 or 7.

name: Mayuresh Lokmanwar
title: the rubber comedy and flexibility of its body is most important feature which no other brand has.
content: - It's sound quality is so good and smooth that it will give you a seamless sound experience.. - At just a specific limit but it's rubberized body is very flexible and unbreakable.. - And also it's charging I think is very faster that even does it take 30 - 45 mins to get fully charged but just in 10 mins of charging you can use it for upto 10 hours.. - It's volume rockers and all switches are also quick responding.

name: Sarthak
title: Best under 2k
content: Coming to the point.. 1. Best battery backup, 10 mins charge give you 10 hours literally, full charge leads to 2-3 days of usage.. 2. Sound quality is superb. 3. Bass is good not high as in boat or other neckbands. USP- Fast Charging and battery backup

name: HEMANT KHARE
title: Just superb👌Didn't expect from oneplus.
content: Brothers, This is my first oneplus product I have ordered, I have used every earphone within 2000 and wanted to try on oneplus. Let me tell you guys, this blutooth are just superb. Its sound quality, bass quality, everything is just wow. However it fits in ear very well. Highly recommended.. Just go for it blindly. Coz at this price range, I must say, this is the best bluetooth earphones.

name: deepak kumar
title: Don't purchase
content: Sound is awsome..everything is good except in 2 days the mic sropped working..guess it has some software issue.even if u replace,this prob is going to persist if one plus team doesn't do anything about it.now the only use of this is listen to music..

name: Adarsh Sunil
title: Worth The Price
content: If you are looking for a budget wireless earphones, go for it. I'm a person who forgets to keep things for charging and when I'm running late it kinda sucks. So this earphone does charge in 10 minutes and I'vent done a 10 hour continuous music test, but battery backup is really impressive. The sound does lack a bit of quality if compared to it's competitors from Sony. But yea, sony's wire is thinner so chances of damage is really high.

name: G S R RAJU
title: Always oneplus is No1
content: Oneplus is best earphones supplied sound quality e and noise cancellation is excellent I am using number of earphones but oneplus is done good job thank you very much Amazon and oneplus

title: Band for the buck !!
content: Good sound stage and great sound quality.. Light weight and comfortable to wear for long time.. Battery performance is massive which is a major plus point.. It's perfect inside the ears nd acts like a noise cancellation option. Great product all in all from Oneplus.

name: Rahul Nagrajan
title: Budget headphone with great sound quality
content: Had to return the first ones I got because of some bluetooth connectivity issues.. got a replacement in 5 days.. Coming to the earphones, the sound quality is amazing! Bass quality is adequate, not overpowering. Only thing that sucks is the noise cancellation or lack thereof.. Quick pairing and battery life are awesome! Overall 4/5 stars. If there was noise cancellation, it would have been 5/5

name: Balaji
title: Worth for every penny
content: After using many Bluetooth earphones & i chosen this but its fabulous. Blindly u can go to this product. I charge for every 4days it's based on my usage. Worth for each penny

name: Hemal Purohit
title: Unhappy with Service
content: Package received on time thanks to Amazon but after 1 week headphone not charging. Contact to OnePlus Service center but not given correct reply and saying that you may contact to Azazon. Also call to Amazon but again no proper response and saying that you may contact to OnePlus store. I really unhappy because both are not given proper answer. So please confirm who will give proper answer and replace headphone

name: Raj
title: Review after using 13 day #BycottMadeInChina
content: I had return earphone after 13 days bez cut the song as well as voice during phone in pocket. And it cannot suitable for riding bike bez neckband can’t stable in neck due to less weight. Talking about sound it not great like jbl c100 and sannhieser street2 bass is very low. But battery backup very good about 15 hr. Design quality is not enough good bez hinge the earphone outside when inside ear

name: sonu panchal
title: uncomfortable to wear.
content: earphones are good but the size of both buds is not symmetrical and they come out again and again . it's really uncomfortable to wear any size of given buds. May b I have received duplicate product or something but can't do anything now as replace window is closed.

name: Akash Vyas
title: Thank you OnePlus
content: Build quality - 9. Battery - 9. Fast charge - 10. Bass - 8. Sound quality - 8. Call quality - 9. Connectivity - 9. Overall nice deal in 2000/-. Go for it if you are using it for callijg purpose. Not that good for Music enthusiast and bass lover.

name: Praveen
title: Satisfied
content: Great produxt, great battery life.. Tried a couple of True Wireless Buds before buying this and the problems I have faced with those TWBs during calls are not at all an issue with this neck band.. It would have been better if this could provide an alert when the battery level is low or very low instead of switching off suddenly without any advance alert.

name: Poch
title: Four Star
content: Worth for money but dont expect too much. Battery back up is good , charging port missed a covering and too much lengthy feel . Noise cancellation is fine and sound wuality is good not much into a bass where clear solid sound . As the brand is trustworthy in this range this one is the best with no doubt

name: Anand Mishra
title: Balanced features and sound quality
content: Overall sound quality is excellent bass is medium,no active noise cancellation. Using right ear bud you get better sound. I am a bass lover still I am satisfied with the bass as it is giving me balance sound and give more clear sound in comparison to my realme buds Using realme 3 pro fast charging. Amazing charging speed. Give it 10 to 15 minutes and you are set for the day if you use continuously for 10 to 12 hours

name: Sarthak G.
title: Honest review
content: Gonna give u an honest review, I really liked the product and earphones get charged really quickly. Main problem I faced with this product is mic quality is average, sound quality is average. Earphones were quite loud in the beginning but after 1-2 months it's hard to hear, I recommend this product to many of my friends , now we all are facing the same problem. Don't know of it is a device problem or update problem. And FYI, I m using this with my op7 device.

name: Salma Sultana
title: Value for money, you can buy it if your budget is 2k, best you can get in this price range
content: Mind blowing product, received it today.. Sound is crystal clear and bass is ok. Connecting very quickly.. Brilliant packaging by OnePlus, loved the unboxing.. Very happy with the product.

name: Sanidhya
title: Sound quality not good
content: The sound is poor .. lower frequency sounds are almost nowhere. ...only battery life is awsm... Just so u know I tested it with OnePlus mobile... I compared it with boat rockers 400 and boat rockers 250...400 was better then both .... Best to use if u don't care much about clear sound.....disappointed..so returning

name: Sai shankar
title: "OK"
content: The product on overall is "ok"...been using this for a month now....the latency is very high which makes it a bad recommendation for gaming(good latency for oneplus devices).there's a small disturbance at times more like a buzzing sound...connectivity is also "ok". Finally you can buy this if you are not a dedicated user of the earphones and use it just for part time music and all. Thanks:)

name: Shubham P.
title: A lot better than other Chinese brand
content: Everything looks good. neutral sounds signature. I am a bass head and still like the amount of bass they offer. No problem found till now. Using them from past 5 months.

name: Shain Aslam
title: Great Bass for a nice music experience
content: Its Jxt Wow! ♥️❤️ My sis was using Oneplus bullets wireless Z regular one but it was decent and bass wasn't that great. The bass edition is tooo Awesome, I jxt tested the both in one time and in music Bass edition was a Clear winner. You can Buy Regular edition if u need 3 hrs more backup, i.e 20 hrs. Bass edition has 17hrs of full battery life though u can enjoy 10min charge 10hrs playback from warp charger.

name: Oliver Fernandes
title: Love the sound quality
content: I like the 2 device switching feature that is missing on the realme wireless. Also the sound quality is really good, the right amount of bass and more like the bose quietcomfort 25 I own.

name: Mohammed Riyas
title: Waste of money
content: After 1 month of usage the performance of the headphone is very worst and the main point is the battery performance of the headphone is very very worst. After full charge the usage time is only 5hrs. The brands advertisement 10min charge 10hrs play back is totally a fake and waste of money. This is why i write a product review only after use of 1 month. Please don't waste your money for buying this product.

name: Suroor Shaz
title: Best in the Best.
content: I have heared that the bass quality of this product is very bad according to other wireless devices.But im not able to note an issues like it on this one. Its very awesome for the budget. Get it for $1999. Amazing one go for it.

name: Bharath
title: Worthy buy
content: After using one month, this is best product compare to others in this range, built quality is too good. Sound quality is good. sound quality, bass, treble is too good it remembers my HTC 3D surround sound headphone (10 years old). Overall it's good to buy.

name: Aditya Kothari
title: The best option at its price point.
content: It's a great product. It does deliver stunning audio and even better than its noise counterpart.. -Pros:. Good bass. Great audio range. Quick charge. Long battery. Super light weight. -Cons:. Plasticy feel. Wires do feel a little delicate

name: Amrit Pratyush Pattanaik
title: Average
content: They are saying extra bass but this term is for marketing purpose only .., I appreciate that this can be the best wireless headset at this price point but if u compare with beats flex then beats flex is soo good but that costs 4499... Sound quality is good calling quality is also good ...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good headphones for daily use
content: The sound quality is good. The bass is neither less nor more, feels to be balanced.. The range for bluetooth is also good, it easily covers your entire flat range.. Charges quickly.. Comfortable to use.. Quick pairing and connectivity.. Build quality is good.. Overall a good buy.

name: Volume Keys are not Syncing
title: Volume key is not functioning at all.
content: I'm facing problem with it's volume keys as It's +(plus) switch ain't working at all... Only I can slow the sound though I resetted my earphone twice. It's really annoying. Also, it's power switch is not functioning, in order to pause/play when I press the switch it doesn't affect anything.. Worst experience... Could have given 0 star instead of 1... cc. I have just bought one week back !!

name: rahul k.
title: Honest Review
content: Sound quality is good.. 9.2 mm driver provide good bass.. Warp charging is charge u r bullets within 20 minutes. Mids and high is clear.. One thing I notice sound volume is enough at 70 percent volume u don't need increase 100 percent.. I have OnePlus 7 pro it gives good sound output.. And low latency mode work very well.. Very comfortable neckband. Even u don't feel u have wear the neckband.

name: H S Vaish
title: Best under 2k
content: Overall the product is very good at this price segment. If youre looking for a wireless headset under 2k than go for these. Bass was excellent. Clarity was good aswell. Only con i found was in the lows. They could have been better. Battery backup is good aswell. Lasts around 14-15 hrs on normal volume usage. Build quality is also good no problem with that.

name: Bharathi l.
title: It's been two days still 100% battery charge!
content: Oneplus! has never been less in impressing with thier products and this one among them. worth the buy.. # experience is as expected and delivers good sound. # compared to 2k budget BT headphones this one standout the crowd!. # importance - battery, price,quality and lightweight.. last but not least...OP z vera level!

name: Abhiram
title: Superb earphones but base is 20 percent lacking
content: Good ear phones at 2k all features are good battery fast charging quick switch and it has low latency to play games all are working fine and everything is good but I felt 20 percent base is less but I noticed ACC button on Bluetooth when I turned it on then the base is also superb . It is a good earphones but if you want xtra base go for oppoenco m31 it is better for Extra base other matters this is superb

name: swamy
title: I love this product,, value for money
content: I love this production very much, worth for money, this is better than all other Bluetooth handfree,, from 2 two years I've used Samsung brand,, but this one is better than Samsung 100%,,,one plus brand is very very good and impressive,,, battery life is very very very good,, user friendly,,, fast Connect,,, this one have so many features ,,2000rs product worth for Monday ,value for money

name: PRABAL TIWARI
title: Bass quality is OK but not that much. But worth the cost.
content: Since the day it's arrived, I am continuously using it. The sound quality is awesome, the battery life is too awesome. I charge it once and use it for 2-3 days until the next charge. The bass quality is okay but justifies the price at which the product comes. Overall I'm happy with what I got. Recommend purchasing it if you're looking for a wireless headphone. It works even better if you have a OnePlus device.

name: vimal Dhangar
title: Superb
content: Superb bass.. I want to purchase only wireless z but confuse with bass effect but this upgrade version of wireless z bass is very high and built qulity is very good..

name: D.K M.
title: Fake
content: Received a fake product. The earphones were missing the tag in the neck band region, box was torn, and 'never settle' was also not written inside the box. Applied for a replacement and again received another one with the same problems. This time tag was present but the earphones were not taped and the box did not have 'never settle' written on it. Buy it from the OnePlus store it's the same price there.

name: PRAVINKUMAR
title: about one plus bullet wireless z
content: Earphone is quite good, decent sound and good battery, it's on and off automatically when you connect or disconnect buds, but I think a manual button is also required for on and off because some time when it's not in use and magnetic buds not attached or detached by mistake with each other, then battery drains, otherwise it's really a good earphones to use.

name: KABIR
title: 👎👎Overhyped Product ,,The Volume or sound Is Not loud its is very less
content: I thought it must a good product but the moment i connected it and played A Song. I Was Really Disappointed As It Has Not That much volume ,It Is Very what we say play songs At Very less volume ,i Have Wired Earphones that are much louder than this ok f9 u are playing balancing sound but its not that satisfying ,i am highly disappointed and returning my product back

name: siddhesh
title: Best ever
content: Best quality wireless earphone. Bass quality is best. Battery backup is best till I experienced. Fast charge even with normal charger. Color combinations is also nice.

name: Vikash kumar
title: Worst product and worst customer service. OP support sucks.
content: worst product. Please don’t buy this product from one plus. I have purchased this product before 4 months and now it’s not working. Tried to reach service center it’s all closed and they switched off their contacts. Thay are also not replying through emails. 艹一加

name: Sandeep Patil
title: Amazing battery life with fast charging & decent sound quality, easy to switch and fast connection
content: I am using this earphone from last 15 days. The most amazing thing is its battery. It is lasting easily for two days and it charges very fast. It connects to the phone very fast and switching is very easy and fast. The sound quality is good though to very good. Built quality also good.. Overall it is a very good purchase.

name: ankit
title: Good product
content: The sound quality is good and does better if you have Dolby. It is sturdy enough. Battery life is very good and lasts at least 2 days with continuous online classes and media consumption. It also charges very fast with a fast charger. Realme buds wireless has better base, but battery life is overkill on this one.

name: Koushik dey
title: Great delivery and great product
content: The sound quality is very good .. the bass is balanced. Which I prefer very much.. the neckband is very light weight and comfortable , the fitting and noise reduction is good not excellent .. and and and ,. The pairing and quick switch technology is kick ass .. a recommendable device for sure.... Note :- I am not a gamer , so low latency mode is not my concern .

name: Sachin
title: Fake lag rahi hai
content: I got this a month back and at first everything was good but now it's giving some drrrr sound in background I donno wts happening im even in doubt if this is original product guys be careful and try to get in the store and I hope someone can replace this or something I don't wanna waste my 2000 bucks on smtng like this pls🙏 coming to colour n material black is good n feels thick n silicon kinda it's good

name: Ravikiran Shukre.
title: Go for it ! ✌️
content: Received the product within 3 days ! Great service by Amazon as always ! ✌️. By the looks of the product, prima facie it does not feel that it is made from plastic. Product is great, worth every penny and of good quality. Sound quality is really amazing and astonishing, I didn't feel any disturbance at higher volume.. Ear-buds are very comfortable and suitable for contiuous 2-3 hours of usage.. #GreatProduct ! ✌️🤩

name: Neha Deshmukh
title: Worst experience
content: Earphones stopped working the very next day of the end of return day. Lasted only for 10 days. I didn’t even use them much, still it stopped working. Maybe it was a defective product and service centre isn’t responding at all.

name: Pranay
title: Worth the money !!!
content: It felt a pretty decent wirless earphone to me. I'm using it on a One Plus 7t device and the latency between my other phone Iphone is quite good. Takes a second to connect and feels hasselfree to switch calls.. It doesn't have a disturbing or you can say irritating sound on high volume. Even after full volume you will enjoy the music and whatever purpose you intend to use.. Altogether in a budget of 2k felt happy.

name: Amit P.
title: Good Deal
content: Writing this review after one week use.. First of all thanks to Amazon's prompt on time delivery. The product was nicely packed and delivered.. I found One plus wireless z a good deal is Rs 1999/-.. For bass lovers it lacks that... But have experienced that in quite environments it sounds great.. Till date after one week the charging balance is 30%after medium use of it.. Thats Great.

name: indrayudh
title: THE BEST YOU CAN GET IN THE MARKET.
content: OnePlus is a recommended name in the smartphone market,but slowly it's also entering the audio market.Excellent purchase, excellent packaging in ONEPLUS style and also the perfect bluetooth headset.Good amount of base excellent vocals and mid tones are crystal clear.Highly recommended 👍👍

name: gautam
title: noise cancellation is poor
content: Bass is up to mark.. sound quality superb.. noise cancellation is not up to the mark. Zero Noise cancellation.. person on the call ,has to hear a lot of Background noises.

name: Kamruddin Haneef Ansari
title: Youtube video not working on Bluetooth of OnePlus bullets wireless z
content: First of all the log is not there when it has been unboxing the Never settle log is missing under the box... Every thing is good but the youtube video is not working on the one plus bullets wireless z.. If the YouTube video is not then there is no use this Bluetooth...

name: Sarthak Miglani
title: Inshort, it's performance in outstanding and it's worth the money you spent.
content: They really worth the money u spent on it. Music quality is also good. Gaming is really awsome no latency issue. Connection quality is good. Battery life is great!!. Bass is lil bit low. Definetly good buy for people having oneplus devices. At first i thought music quality is avg but after that dolby support in latest stable version they are really good!!!

name: omkareswara
title: OnePlus Bullets Z review.
content: Great battery. Great sound (for the price). Great range. Great connectivity. Overall...... Great product. Thanks OnePlus.

name: Rahul Patil
title: Nice quality headphones under 2k
content: I bought it one week before and Amazon delivered it in time. Thanks.. The sound quality and beats are very clear but the bass and treble is not matching. I feel treble is much. May be bacause I used bass headphones earlier.. Worth for the price.. Easy to use.. Light weight.. Good battery life.. Highly recommended.

name: Subin B Suresh
title: Best wireless neckband in the price range
content: Battery backup is as per advertised. Sound quality is superb compared to Realme Wireless Buds which is in the same price segment. The only drawback is the bud is made of plastic and not metal, but the overall build quality is good.. The best feature of this buds is the quick Bluetooth connectivity and quick switching between devices.

name: shaan habib
title: Superb basss definitely go for it
content: I am looking for best neckband under 2k.one plus bullet wireless z bass edition best in all categories. Bass ,noise cancellation and connectivity. Bass -9/10 bumpy basss not like sony but good. Connectivity-10/10. Built quality 9/10......@9/10 overall performance

name: Saiteja Patibandla
title: Battery backup is excellent
content: Firstly the battery backup is excellent. 10min charge easily gives 8 hours usage, within keeping full charge we can use it for 23 hrs approximately. Sound quality is excellent, especially in case of meeting the speaker voice is very clear. this earphones with connecting to OnePlus gives best output. Iam playing pubg in my OnePlus 7,the feel is excellent. If your primary choice is battery backup,then just go for it.

name: Ankit sharma
title: Good sound and battery life
content: Sound quality is good detailed sound and good mids and highs,battery life is good around 15 hours, bass quality is good but not as i expect with this bass edition,desighn is good and earbuds easily fit in ears.. Hope it help you...

name: Sagarika🦄
title: Unbeatable battery life!
content: Battery life is unbeatable, stays on for more than 10 hours by 10 mins of charging! Not ideal for music lovers as the bass isn’t up to the mark but surely for people who love to talk or for business needs- worth it.

name: S. Menon
title: All rounder🔥🔥
content: Sound quality. Excellent quality, retains the pure sound and its a real pleasure to listen through these.. Noise cancellation. If u have them on u don't even know what's going around you so I give it a 4.5.. Bass quality. Excellent bass, u get what u want even when u listen to bass boosted songs or 3d/8d songs, it does a great job.. Basically close your eyes and buy it👌✌️

name: AK
title: Poor quality and high prices
content: Quality is poor and magnet came out in 1 month.. Eveytime one side magnet comes out and stick to other side and it takes effort to remove it from other side and stick it back.. Compare to high prices quality is very poor. Sound quality is good.

name: Alanjoseph
title: only sound quality no bass quality
content: anyone looing for only making calls go for it but for music and others buy oppo enco m31 it is the best the sound quality is extreme and one plus is not as expected low bass so cant feel the music much oneolus is like just sterio headset

name: Anonymous
title: Average earphones
content: This review is after a month's usage -. 1. On pros, the sound quality is decent (Neutral sound); love the quick-switch feature; battery life is also pretty good.. 2. On cons, frequent connectivity issues while watching movies or videos (online as well as offline); the LED indicator constantly blinks even when connected, gets annoying if you're in a dark room.

name: Dr. Arpit Tiwari
title: Just wow❣️
content: Sound is just awesome with sufficient bass. Call quality is excellent. Range is great. Battery is just next level, you have to buy to experience it. Charging speed is superfast. Overall I can easily recommend this product. Oneplus I am your fan now.

name: Mohit Mafia
title: Only battery life is good.
content: You can trust this neckband only for battery life not for bass,the sound quality and battery is good but bass is very bad .It also burst the voice some times when immediately songs changes or any call rings.. 1.calling-4/5. 2.noise cancellation-5/5. 3.fit and comfort-5/5. 4.bass-1/5. 5.battery life-5/5

name: GURURANJITH
title: Cheating
content: Totally waste of your money pls don't buy 1. Already one customer using this product.. 2.Not working properly.. 3.Battery level suddenly low.. 4.Box also damaged.

name: Ishu a.
title: Best in range. Nice and sturdy product.
content: Battery life awesome . If u love balanced sound then bass is accordingingly same . Perfect fit in ear. Magnetic control works perfectly fine. Pairing very quick. Quick switch works fine . Not heavy at all. Using it for few days now will update if any needed . Do Upvote my review if u find it helpful. UPDATE- RANGE IS JUST 5-6 MTRS , this is the only disappointing thing i have found till now.

name: Muks
title: Amazing
content: Too good, max battery life, solid built, light weight, easy to use, beautiful design. Can be connect on two devices simultaneously and switch between the devices is done by a simple double click.

name: Rahul roy
title: Good product from one plus
content: Good product from one plus Full charging gives 18and half on hour by non stop listening music and other activities everything is perfect but low bass this is why I'm disappointed for this product .. it such a good product go for it

name: Kirtan Patel
title: Oneplus or Realme
content: I would say oneplus becoz sound quality and battery is excellent. Simply we can say a perfect package which cost 2000 and realme wireless which cost 1800.. Awesome product.. Bass is pretty good. Surround is excellent. Treble is good. Vocal is excellent. So if I rate out of 5 so its 4/5. If a bass was bit more it would be full on 5.. More over it's best product if compared to realme wireless

name: sachin
title: Awesome product don’t miss this one
content: I had used jbl,Sony & boat of this price range. I was really surprised that this is a awesome Bluetooth headphone.. Sound quality is very good and good bass. Overall it’s worth of money

name: Pratik Patil
title: Good product
content: Base could be more punchier.. Needed options for one smaller size ear tips.. Some times even for smallest size ear tips can be very uncomfortable.. Overall good functionality proviced( eg switching between two device......finally someone thought of it)

name: Avinash
title: Headphone problem some time it will not connect
content: Best headphone for price sound quality is good bass average but I got some time connecting issue some time it will not connect properly one one time my connecting waste sound will will be come sound after reconnecting that I will solve

name: Sukuna Ganeshan
title: Great product
content: The sound quality is really good, worth a purchase.. People who are planning to use it while riding a bike should be cautious. Cause when you wear a heavy helment and take it off chances are the head sets falls down along as it’s very flexible and light weight you wouldn’t notice.. And the product quality is really good the auto disconnect and connecting feature is really cool.

name: Pitt
title: Good in this price.
content: You get more worth than you pay for.. I needed headphones with a good bty life & decent sound.. so here it is. . It's not the best but wayy better than any other bluetooth headset In 2k range.

name: Vaasu Vyboina
title: Quick switch.. haha
content: The reason I bought this ear phones is for quick switch, but to my surprise the feature itself is not working fine, apart from this sound quality, surround, bass is so good.

name: J D
title: Ok, not per one plus standard
content: The product is good as long as it functions but the USB c charging port is of inferior quality. Got damaged within 2months. Buy a USB c magnetic adapter if you buy this

name: Shrads
title: Poor quality
content: Very poor mic quality. I threw the cover considering my trust with One Plus brand. Now as I am facing issues and unable to return.

name: Sapna F.
title: The volume is very low
content: This is the most honest thing I could tell about these earphones to all the people who are thinking to buy these.. is that... The volume level of these earphones is very low, even at the 100 level of volume we will only hear it as of 50 in general.. Even in a less crowded place you cannot hear anything because of the volume issues. People who do not own a oneplus Mobile phone, it's a suggestion for you to not buy it.

name: Pa1
title: Frequent disconnection
content: Audio quality is good and bass also good. But the main issue is frequently disconnecting and connecting automatically while it idle for 20 seconds like that. Its was annoying. Second issue is during phone calls audio was lagging in some times. Overall after using this anyone can through it away because of above issue. I tried with different mobiles nothing changed

name: Vineeth
title: A good buy but one issue
content: The sound quality is really nice. Not a thumping base but a good mix of base and treble. Initially my microphone didn't work properly, the output was too low at the other end. Then after factory rest it worked fine.. The only disappointing factor for me was that the earbuds slide out with some body movements. I tried all 3 earbud sizes but result was the same.

name: Ritika
title: Mic does not work on laptops, can’t be used for calls
content: I bought this for work calls to be taken from the laptop. The device paired with laptop, and I could play music from browser. However, when I had to make work calls where mic is required, the device does not work. I checked with friends on how to fix it, and it seems to be a common problem with no solution. Strictly avoid if you plan to use this to take any calls.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best wireless earphones under 2k.
content: Great wireless earphones for under 2k.Works well with OnePlus devices. Haven't tested with non - OnePlus devices.. Sound quality is really good with punchy bass, bluetooth coverage is really good, lasts 10-12 hours in a single charge. Mic is also really good. Will recommend this wireless earphone if you are looking for under 2k. I'll post an update if I incur any problems.

name: george
title: okay but one problem in it.
content: its okay u can but but one problem in it... audio gets turned off automatically and frequently... audio and bass is good and satisfied using for calls... if u use it for whole day and if u dbt hace patience think before buying coz it automatically turns off reason unknown and over all everything is good and it takes obly 10min to charge and u can use for 12hrs non stop music...

name: Rajesh
title: Worth for 1999
content: Comfortable in ears. Very flexible. Can fit in your pocket. Bass is not upto the mark but instrumental sound separation is awesome. Most enjoyed while watching movies. Good battery life. Quick switch option is awesome.

name: Aakriti Mal
title: Definitely NOT for calling purposes!
content: These earphones are only good for listening music that too as long as you're a person looking for average audio quality earphones! These are certainly NOT for calling purposes, as it creates a humming noise to the person on the other side of the call.. Definitely, not price worthy, the Realme wireless earphones are way more better than these (telling it from the experience I've had from both) !

name: Gopinathan
title: Must have blutooth ear phone
content: I bought this product for my office purpose and it worked really well. Sound quality is good both ear and speaker. No Connectivity issue so far and it is covering for longer distance. The battery power is amazing. Must buy.

name: Vamsi Krishna Bhagi
title: Excellent call reception
content: I bought this primarily for taking calls as my previous wireless earphones are not that great. 1+ did an amazing job w.r.t. call reception and quality.. Sound is balanced.. Build quality is decent. Fast device switching feature is a definitely time saver for me.. Earphone is not fitting properly on one ear. Should be an issue from my end.

name: JB
title: Good headphone for calls not music experience!
content: Product is good for Calls it has long battery life good to watch youtube videos.. For music lovers it dosent have that great sound quality with bass. I think oneplus should update on basss or create an common app equaliser to boost bass for all oneplus models.. My ratings will be 🌟🌟🌟

name: Shuvra
title: Best in class
content: Sound quality is 9/10 and bass is 6.5/10 .Great bettery backup..too mamy functionality .... quick switch is so smooth and gameplay sound is too good and latency is too low for that you can play and game like pubg without any sound lag.

name: श्रीdhar Dashwant
title: Paisaa Vasool!! Best in 2000₹ budget!
content: Sound Quality compare to the wireless z is Loud!!. Bass wise these Bass edition are Great!. It has inbuilt Mic! & Noise cancellation is also great!. Battery Backup is impeccable outstanding!. Just 10 mins of charge gives 8-10 hrs of use!. Built Quality is Premium!. Budget wise its total worthy!💯

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mic stops working in between the calls
content: While taking calls over Zoom or Teams over windows laptop, the microphone automatically stops working in between after 5-10 mins. The output from earphones continue, but the input from microphone stops working. Tried removing the device and adding it again, it again works fine for a while and issue arises again in 5-10 mins.

name: 「THE」艾 Gamma
title: Noise Adder 😤😤😤
content: Noise Cancellation is so poor ..., in other words I want to say that it is working as Noise Adder !! 😤😤😤. Bluetooth switching function is also lagging sometimes. 😒😒. I did not except this type of issue with OnePlus like company !! 🥴

name: Nayka Praniket
title: Superb product
content: Overall experience is superb. Awesome sound quality. Bass quality is superb. And long lasting battery backup

name: Bhanu
title: Simply go for it. It is awesome.
content: I have been using Sennheiser for a while and I must say that these earphones are just amazing. At this price point - everything it perfect. The built quality is really good, sound quality is also really good (though it is a subjective call) along with some awesome features.. With One Plus it works perfect. The sound is not too loud and it is perfect to the ears along with pretty good noise cancellation. The magnetic (on/off) feature is good.

name: Pravesh
title: Extremely Good
content: You can't expect anything more from. this price range !. Sounds rich.. Crystal clear vocals. Balanced Bass. Looks and feels premium. No cons 👍

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product under 2k
content: Good product under 2k. Sound quality is good. Bass is better than the bullet z normal edition. But company says 17 hours battery backup. But actualy it isn't. I used this earphone for two days keeping hours in count. Got the battery back up for roughly 13 hours. So 17 hours is a myth. And the conectivity is not that great. It takes a little extra time to connect. Overall, its an average vfm.

name: SINGH DIVY V.
title: BULLET HEADSET
content: Its good for hd sounds, and medium bass. Its battery backup is excellent , for normal use it can use in a Week after full charge. Movies background sound is well good. Low latency mode for Pubg is also good. Best for travel and long last use. PRICE IS QUITE HIGH. but by its performance is good. No Bluetooth headset gives this feature in this price range

name: vikash
title: Good but not amazing
content: A good product , sound is clear but it lacks the boom effect ,the noise cancellation is some what ok, considering the price I would say overall it is a good product. I was unlucky as it stopped working after 3 days of uses I have returned the product and I will try it's replacement (same product different item) .

name: Chandra mouli
title: Good
content: Liked Design and Audio Bass.. However there is a problem with the earphones. Whenever we connect, video/auido is playing on slow mode. Again to fix this, I have to do mutlple times connect/reconnect. Then I could hear normal audio .. Power backup is good

name: Nabam Naanu
title: No bass only treble
content: The sound clarity, noise cancellation, build material, quality, looks. Everything is impressive.. But the bass.... Without any external equilizer used, is FLAT. (YouTube videos music bass was flat) so...

name: Sasi Kumar
title: OP rules the market..!!
content: Sound quality is good but a normal headset. Built quality is awesome and I love that magnetic turn off feature. While playing music, the audio comes with high treble but video plays fine. Not a worthy buy for this price range.. Go for it only when you have a OP mobile

name: Ripender
title: No higher bass only treble sound.
content: These wireless headphone are suitable for non-bass boosting person. It's bass power is not that much greater although built-quality and working is good.. Please, buy these if you love listen soft and less bass boosted music. These are not for bass lovers.

name: Amazon Customer
title: My HONEST REVIEW after 3 weeks of usage 😊
content: Pros:-. * Awesome Battery & fast charging, i get 4 to 5 days back up easily. * Superb magnetic control , recomend for office use & calling professional.. * Good for heavy calling , very clear mic ,audio & bluetooth connection.. Cons:-. * Very average sound & bass , not at all recommend for music lovers, don't waste your money for music.. If you guys want SOUND QUALITY then go for Sony.

name: Sanjay Kumar Pathak
title: Duplicate product
content: It worked well till 20th August thereafter it would not switch on.Amazon has Duplicate products I guess. How come an original one plus headset stop functioning in just about a week. Did not expect this kind of cheat from Amazon. Highly disappointed

name: yuvaraj
title: Ok product not worth for 2k
content: Battery backup was good, band quality and sound was ok,not worth for 2k, and latency mode is just for selling the product, i used fnatic mode in my oneplus phone but still there is latency.

name: Ankita
title: Much better than I was expecting!
content: I bought these with a bit of apprehension because earbuds usually don't fit into my ears and keep popping out. But switching to the smallest size of the silicon buds helped a lot. The sound quality is much better than I expected, because I'm used to close ear headphones. The bass is also amazing! I love how convenient it is to use.

name: Tanveer Shaik
title: Excellent earphones
content: Excellent sound quality ... Great battery life, best at this price ... If you like bass sound effects you wouldn't like it ... But Vocals and treble is great ... Fits in in your ears perfectly

name: Gopal K.
title: Not worth the money
content: Sound is too sharp, bass is almost non existant. Even after tweaking the equaliser music quality is not impressive. Not worth the money, except if you want the long battery life. No cover on the charging port so doubt if it's really water proof but I'm not going to test it!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Call problem
content: Product is OK.. but it's have its negative point that when you are in call u hear the other person talk but that other person cannot hear you talk if ur using this headphone.. It does not happen continuously but on call u usually face this.. Which is not very pleasant

name: Sagar Bijlwan
title: Honest review.
content: One of my friend suggested me to buy these earphones and said that u will get satisfied with it..and guess what.. Its unbelievable, i am fully satisfied by the sound quality, bass quality and most important low latency rate... Unbeleivable battery backup. I must say, if u r looking for long life earphones , go for these... U can feel every beat even in low volume.. Overall, i loved the product. Worth every penny.

name: Aman Kumar (customer)
title: Bass quality is worst
content: I found the worst product ever with so called big brand. No bass, too much treble sound, no noise cancellation at all. I want to return it and advise you if you are music lover with perfeybass quality then please don't buy it. You will regret after using it. You can't talk with someone over the call with these earphones for longer than 1 minute.

name: Debojyoti Ghosh
title: Just Buy It!
content: People are saying the lacking quality of bass in it but i think the major problem may lies in their choosing of ear buds.If you choose perfect size depend on your size of the ear drum then you have any bass related problem.Rather i would it has a perfect tune of bass in it. Build Quality is superb as well the technology in it. I must say this product is goona set new bar of quality within the under 5000 range of wireless ear phones.Hats of One Plus.

name: Nayeem
title: OnePlus bullets wireless Z Review
content: Sound Quality : 4 out of 5. Bass : 4 out of 5. Bluetooth connectivity : 5 out of 5. Oral very nice product Quality also reasonably good, sound also nice, the greatest features are Warp Charging & Dual switch button.

name: Pavan Kashyap
title: Truely impressed with the Headset
content: It is really a very good product. If you have already have a Oneplus Charger then this headset gets charged very quickly. The battery backup is very good. Sound quality, Bass quality is amazing as well.

name: Rohit kamble
title: Value for Money
content: Not a awesome but it's good.. Awesome things i listed below.. 1.Design. 2.Built Quality. 3.microphone quality. 4.battery life 19 hour playback time (with 2A charger its take 45 min. To full charge)

name: kumar shashank
title: Quality uncompromised!
content: The one thing that OnePlus really understands is never comprmosing with the quaity. If you want a quality earphone that provides everything in just the right amound, this is the one. The fact that there is a OnePlus Bluetooth earphone at this price and such useful features is great in itself.. Don't buy it for something extra! Buy it for just the right amount of everything!

name: raju singha
title: Full useless earphone and so bad button
content: Full useless earphone I buy 1st July, and 7 th August earphone volume switch does not work.my 2000 ruppe is gone in water .full useless earphone I recommend that no one buy this earphone and services center is not good.

name: Rajdeep Das
title: Value for Money
content: Crystal Clear Sound, Good Finish & Build Quality. Warp Charge is really good,10mins of fast charge and it will last you for almost 2 days with heavy usage. However Bass delivery is above average. If you are someone who wants a premium bluetooth headset for the price, just go for it, but if you require substantial Bass in your music, go for RealMe

name: nitesh
title: Calls keep dropping
content: Bluetooth connection keeps getting disconnected during phone calls, and it's really frustrating. However when playing music or YouTube that's not the case. I used to own the bullet2 , that had no problems at all, expecting that same quality of bullet2 I bought the Z. Really disappointed.

name: sayed w.
title: 4 words, Not for Bass Lovers...!!
content: Honestly,. -Using it more than a week, no issues found.. -All working fine.. -its build quality is superb.. -Quality sound experience.. -Advance features as compare to others.. -10 Minutes Charging 10 hours is actually works. -Nice Battery backup.. -Quick Connectivity..
