Finally, if u r bass lover, then its not ur cup of tea...!!

name: Swapnil
title: Well its awsome , but has a issue of reconecting again and again
content: This is super value for money earphones sound quality is good. bass edition has more improved overall sound quality. bass i wont say is best but doesnt disappoint. Charging is crazy fast, that goes for battery too its good but only drawback i felt was it dissconnects from my phone at anytime and reconects agiain and it happens very frequently and that should not be there in this price segement

name: Sonu Gulfam
title: Better than Bot Rockerz 335?
content: We have compared this with Boat Rockerz 335 on our YT channel. Also there is a hidden surprise for you. Do check on our YT channel. Link in our Amazon profile.

name: Shivam
title: Think and buy
content: I bought this a day ago. Product features are good like switching of bluetooth from one device to another and its extra fast charging. But dont know why this earphones keep disconnecting when i am on call. There is some issue i guess so. I went googling there also many users have jotted down the same thing. Also noise cancellation and bass is not that good.

name: karthik
title: Bad noise cancellation
content: Everything about this bluetooth is good except the noise cancellation feature. Was driving at less than 15 km/hr still the other person on the call is hearing the air sounds higher than my sound.

name: Abhishek Singh
title: Awesome🤩🤩
content: It has been approx one and half months since I am using it. Sound quality is perfect. A bit low bass but no issues with that. Sound cancellation is perfect. Battery can be no more awesome than this and this was the main reason to chose it. Perfect in every way.

name: Vivek
title: Sound clarity as a crystal
content: Bought this after quite a research, but this is one of the best earphones for the price you get.. calls clarity is awesome and also battery life is awesome.. connecting to samsung note 8 is flawless and no need to worry about oneplus ecosystem... Would definitely recommend this for clear listening criteria but not heavy bass lovers..

name: shiv shankar kumar singh
title: Good enough for general purposes
content: The product is okay. Charging is fast as expected. Sound quality was never expected to be of highest of quality but it does okay. One problem is connectivity when connecting with a device for the first time. Once it is switched off, it is a headache to get it started. However, once connected with a device, works seamlessly. Work on its connectivity and suddenly it is ahead of its competitors.

name: Jestin John
title: No voice cancellation nothing as claimed I want a replacement-
content: There is no voice cancellation in it ....I have contacted many ppl but everyone has asked me to change the earphones ......so I would request you to look into this matter and provide me with what u claim to be right!. No voice cancellation nothing as claimed I want a replacement-the other person is not able to hear ur voice rather it's the surrounding voices that goes to their ears

name: It's Azlah
title: Sound is Kick ass
content: it's by far the best Set of earphones I've used till today and the battery life is Just what I needed it's worth buying ! And it's true that it give 10 hours of battery if you charge for 10 mins and 20 hours of battery if you charge 100% I'd totally recommend you to buy this if you're ready to pay This much amount but honestly it's worth it and You should try it ! Loved ittt

name: Gaurav Upadhyay
title: Worst products ever.
content: This bluetooth is very worst products after 15 days of purchase it stop working...also no service center will entertain you .. Please please please do not buy this head phone.

name: Pradeep kc,Mukkam
title: Poor One plus Z... Go with Bass edition
content: I had been used z for one month. Average performance sound-wise. Battery and build quality are good. Bass is below average. overall good by worth. After one month I bought the Oneplus bass edition. I have been using It for two weeks. Fantastic performance please go with, Bass, mic, battery, sound clarity, built quality are very good. I love it very much....

name: Ace Nam
title: One Plus 7 Bullet Wireless Z in-ear bluetooth is worth it
content: I found it worth the reviews, it is a decent piece for that price.. It's long lasting on a single charge works easily to around 9-10 hours on a single charge with fairly long intermittent usage.. Noise cancellation is decent, the audio quality is quite good. Doesn't feel like you are having it on you, after prolonged usage.

name: Ram
title: Wrost product wrost service
content: One of the wrost product it is good for only one month. All if sudden bluetooth pairing stopped with oneplus 6t and to another samsung mobile .. called oneplus they manyf warranty will applicable only for repair and they don't handle this kind of issue. talked to amazon they told me to contact manuf. End i dont have the earphones waste of money don't waste your 2000 rs

name: Geethajayapal
title: So mny  features but low sound quqlity
content: Dont get excited by all the features ,the headphone looks good, feels ok, but when u start listening to music you realise it was a waste of money since far more high quality sound is provided in non bluetooth headphones like sony and with way less price.

name: Rajat
title: Good product
content: Overall Sound quality is good but bass is little bit low but it's ok...No issue of latency for gaming...only for oneplus users..also i received call no complaint from other side....go for it...

name: Abhay
title: Good buy for ₹ 2K
content: It is a good product. I will recommend this. Mentioning some pros and cons based on my observation (leisure use).. Pros:. Fit and finish.. Sound is crisp.. Ok-Ok bass.. Decent noise cancellation.. Cons:. Neck band is too soft for my liking, gets all twisty and needs regular adjustment.

name: Om Prakash.
title: Not worthy
content: It's been 3 months that I'm using this product. Suddenly, a continuous beep sound started while the headset is in use. The very next day, the mic isn't working, I'm able to hear the voice on the other side however they aren't able to hear me. When contacted the one plus support, they asked me to visit the service center in this pandemic situation, wrong choice I guess. Bought it for 1999/-.

name: Anil
content: Over all sound quality is good but not impressed with noise cancellation, I dont mind about bass quality .Looks like good design and quality with great battery backup. NEVER SETTLE logo missed inside the box .Doesn't have protection like cap at charging position it may easily catch with water or sweat. 3.5/5

name: MULLAIARASU R
title: Verithanam... Verithanam..🔥🔥
content: Cost effective...Best Wireless headphone at this budget..Sound quality is crystal clear and depth..There is no lagging while gaming...I would recommend for users who want to buy budget friendly wireless headset...

name: Rahul Aswal
title: My honest review
content: Nice , OnePlus is always on top, but this price range this earphones are better than original. I have to feed recommend to buy this for good battery pack up and fast charging and balanced premium audio quality. You also got aac and sbc codec. If you want some thing else like better audio codec and deep bass u have to go oppo earphones. Overall this is awsm.

name: Anil Kumar Tiwari
title: Sound Quality, Noise cancellation, battery life
content: Sound quality is very poor including base which expected by oneplus brand and its official video claim, battery might be good but my earphone battery is not working fine thats why i am returning it, noise cancellation is noy good, front end receiver always told that there is more disturbance in your voice, and one more is earbuds are not wearable efficiently. Overall all not a good product.

name: udayan pal
title: Mind blowing product
content: One plus is an amazing brand and this version of wireless earphones are the best in class would recommend all to go for this, the neck band can be rotated and tied also the battery back up is mind blowing used continuously for 12 hours and the battery is still 79percent..amazing product by one plus

name: Harshit
title: Insane
content: I brought these earphones about a day back. And I'm impressed by its battery life and charging time, it's insane. I used these headphones for my online classes and it works very well. The base of these headphones is medium, I like it. Yeh OnePlus is Chinese brand and earphones are also made in china but no any other brand give this type of premium earphones. So this is the only option

name: Ganeshprabu
title: Worst product
content: Sound quality worst for bass increment mids and highs are not clear also bud size very big. Better go for oppo enco m31, also while AAC on only gives around 10 hours of playback. Finally mic quality very bad.

name: Mayank kapoor
title: Dont buy
content: There is problem with this product.. Whenevr i do a call and put earphones on , the other person always complaint abt no voice , breakable voice.. Now its even more.. Didnt expect such malfunctions at this price.

name: gowtham
title: Bang for the buck , can't expect a premium sound quality in a budget earphones
content: Nice sound quality awesome battery backup, but oppo enco m31 has a better soothing sound signature , if you are not an audiophile this is the goto budget wireless band earphones.. No noise cancellation as such , shell out extra buck for that.. Bass quality is sufficient and good enough.

name: harshal
title: Blue colour bullets.
content: I got this product today. Was quite confused on which one to buy among boat, realme and oppo earphones. But is great and has a nice sound quality. But the logo is missing inside the red box. And the packing was also no done properly. So a little bit disappointed. Or else is good.

name: SRJ
title: Worth it
content: If you're interested in headache free listening and calling .. Great music playback , nice sound every chord is vividly clear. No post headache , comfortable. Just not for recording sounds in wind. Great product .. Low latency even without fnactic mode

name: Ayush mani yadav
title: Best earphone under 2000
content: If you are going to buy realme or any other earphones in this price range stop because this OnePlus earphone is best in all terms sound quality is amazing base is ok built quality is nice feel light weight and best feature is when you remove earphone it automatically disconnected and when you suddenly plug in it within a second connect to phone its is amazing feature ❣️

name: SHOAIB
title: Sounds average
content: Pros :-- battery is awsam no other headphone provide long battery compared to this. Fast charging one of the best. Butt!!!!!!!!. Sound is not that much good. Trebble is so high that precking my ears. Bss is okk but not that much. Its sound quality is like ₹500 wired earphones. Although goood battery life premium build quality with underwhelming sounds quality 😌

name: riya
title: pure sound lust
content: if you have used boat 255f then you will surely feel ..less bass and the peak of sou d clarity still cant complain..pretty good wireless perfect fit in ear and using wid my poco f1 no issues and charging with 18watt charger n charging is really quick! 50-100 in 10 minutes

name: Chethan
title: Awesome OnePlus Bass variant headset
content: Good as expected.. Bass is a bit higher when compared with old variety.. I have both variant now with me and I prefer this one due to the bass and look.. It’s good for those who are using it for morning exercise(Running) since it wont loosen out during exercise due to balanced design.. Got prototype good backup of 2 day min,

name: Piyush rana (Uttarkashi)
title: Price is too high 2k not justifiable....
content: Music quality very avg(poor).....battery backup is what u have paid 800rs extra coz u can get any other bluetooth earphone at 1200rs range with much better sound quality...strictly not recommended for music lovers...... Built quality - 4star. Sound quality -1 star(compare it urself u will definitely see). Battry backup -5 star. Bass quality - 3 star (above avg)..

name: Abhishek Kumar Haith
title: Amazing sound quality & battery backup
content: I'm amazed with the sound clarity. Outstanding battery backup. All given features works as explained.. Bass is little low. If you listen to heavy metal tracks, then you can find double bass strokes are mixing up.. Other than that this product is really value for money.

name: Soniya Kapale
title: Descent headphones for listning mild music, Not good for calls
content: I purchased these headphones for my office meetings.. Overall look, build quality and audio output is descent. However, I'm disappointed in the mic quality. Mic was generating cluttering sound even if the connecting wire had some movement.

name: Albin Benny
title: Best ever ...
content: The sound quality is excellent..And it is very easy to connect with the device and also to pair with another device...Battery life is something that is beyond the expected level and also it takes 10 min maximum to get fully charged.. Best experience for OnePlus users as it has got particular options for OnePlus device users ..such as caller id telling and low latency in gaming mode in OnePlus fntatic mode..✨💜

name: RAZI WASHI
title: BEST FEATURES OF ONE PLUS BULLET WIRELRSS Z
content: 𝙏𝙃𝙀 𝘽𝙀𝙎𝙏 𝙏𝙃𝙄𝙉𝙂 𝘼𝘽𝙊𝙐𝙏 𝙊𝙉𝙀 𝙋𝙇𝙐𝙎 𝘽𝙐𝙇𝙇𝙀𝙏 𝙒𝙄𝙍𝙀𝙇𝙀𝙎𝙎 𝙕. 1)Charge for 10 minutes of charging give you 10 hours of listening time .. 2)Full charging gives 20 hr of listening. 3)Simply click the bullet together magnetically to turn them off and seperate them to turn on .. 4) Sweat and waterproof resistance.. 5) Ultra low letacy when gaming (only work in one plus phone).

name: fz099
title: not good for bass lovers - honest opinion
content: never buy this if u are a bass lover. bass is very bad. vocals are good. battery is very good. if u want to listen dj songs with high bass donot buy this. it is good for gaming as it show almost no latency.. mic quality is good but surrounding noise can be heard little.. good for melody songs or those songs concetrated on vocals and high tones. i used this for one week.. but due poor bass quality i requested return

name: Malem
title: Quite average for music listening experience.
content: It's a strudy build. Really like the flexible neckband. But I'm not satisfied with the sound quality for listening music. I prefer Sony/Sennheiser sound signature.

name: sachin sharma
title: satisfied
content: superb product!. sound quality is fabulous!. battery life is outstanding!. 10 mins charging enough for 7-8 hrs!. noise cancellation is very poor. bass okay!. premium look. one thing... there is a white dot light that keep blinking... irritating mostly in night otherwise okay!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Superb Sound Quality..
content: Amazing built and sound quality bass is realy superb... I was little doubt about bass before buying but after got and use, It's awesome.. I highly recommended for music lover, bass lover.. go for it.. It's really worth it..

name: chandra G
title: Very disappointed OnePlus product ....
content: Very very disappointed on one plus bluetooth ear phone ...I had lot expectations...after seven days it is having some disturbing noise in ear buds to other side ....I about return but return policy closed ..now I am searching for service center ...very bad ear phone ...I used realme bluetooth it was very very good still it is working superb.....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Damaged product received
content: I bought this produxt because of its long lasting battery and thought it would go well with my oneplus smarphone. When I received this package, one of the earphone wire was dislogged from the mic control side completely. Also, the earphone doesn't seem new. Extremely unhappy with Amazon and Oneplus about this. I've attached a photo for reference. Returning it right away.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Stopped working after a month
content: It has been working great initially. But soon the magnetic sensors of the earphones stop working. My earphones are stuck in a coma with a dim white light. Nothing works. Don't buy this.

name: The Mango Couple
title: Nice to have if you are one plus device owner
content: Very good product in terms of comfort and sound quality. We have received some cashback as well and ordered this fro one of our friend. Well packed and received on time

name: amartya ari
title: bullet earphones
content: Yes there are good. And has a long battery. I would have rated 5 star instead of 4 because. After keeping it for a long time it starts hutting the outer ear. Personally i like it has a medium bass and it gets fastly charged. I would recommend to go for the latest one plus bullets 2 wale. That is better than this one

name: Apoorv
title: Not worth the hype
content: Comfort. This is not at all comfortable in ears. Changed the buds to smallest ones and it started paining in about an hour. Changed to medium ones and again it started paining in about 15 mins. Didn't dare to use the large ones. Had to return.. Sound. Sound quality is little above average. That's it. Not worth the hype around it.

name: Kamaleshwaran Ganesan
title: Top notch bass quality
content: Top notch bass quality. I'm a bass head. I've used a lot of earphones wired, bluetooth and even tws. I never felt a good bass quality in any of the bluetooth headset at some point thought only wired earphones only gives the quality. Finally thought of giving a try to this because am a one plus lover and surprisinglythis is the perfect quality product I was looking for. Best for the price

name: Sriram V
title: Poor sound quality
content: If you have used quality earphones till now....the this will definitely disappoint you....i previously used jbl wired earphones and comparitively sound quality is worst.... veryyyy poor quality and also poor bass for bass edition.....i cant imagine how worse it will be if i purchase normal edition..... although feasibility and flexibility is good and also for built quality i would rate 2

name: Himanshu
title: Average product
content: This is an average product. Build quality is great but sound quality is average. if you are a serious and good listener then it is not good for you.. If you have an headphones jack then i would recommend "Boat basehead 225" it has an amazing base and a better vocals compared to this. I have tried many wireless earphone but i can't find a one that suits me so i am looking for another product

name: Adil Abbas
title: Not up for PUBG !
content: Anyone who is willing to buy this for PUBG, my suggestion for them is not to even think about it. Reason is though it supports low latency mode yet u have to suffer. And also the footsteps of left ememy and right enemy is not clear. If buyer wants to buy it for movie music etc then go for it.. Note- I have oneplus nord !

name: Afnan
title: One Plus is always premium!
content: Before product review, I would like to appreciate Amazon for delivering the product in less than 2 days time!. The package is nice and compact. Sound clarity is awesome. Loudness is perfect. Build quality also seems good. Charging speed and battery backup is fair enough.. The bass boosting is not too much good.

name: Balu C.
title: Trademark OnePlus quality
content: I'm really surprised at the product quality for a price point less than 2k. OnePlus quality is great.. 10min chnage gives you 16 hours of music play time, if that doesn't make you buy this product then what else will? Great for attending calls and online meetings during wfh

name: Akhil Reddy
title: If you are a bass lover please don't buy...
content: If you are a bass lover please don't buy..... Got a good amount of bass but not punchier.. You will be amazed by the battery backup and fast charging.. very easy to use ... Easily paired... Everything is good except bass..

name: JUNAID ELEYODATH
title: Very low sound poor bass quality
content: Hi. I am not suggesting this product, the sound quality and bass is very low and its not recommended at all. I got my device today and checked it.. If you want to go for music or clear voice call, the sound is not coming even at maximum volume.

name: SMIT PATEL
title: Value for Money
content: Great Wireless Earphones. They are great for Gaming(Pubg Included) but only for Oneplus Users. The sound delay is negligible because of the Low Latency Mode. If you are a Oneplus User looking to buy a pair of Earphones for Gaming should definitely go for these. And they are cheap so value for money.

name: Venkat
title: Decent Wireless in this price
content: Good One in the price. But too much hype. Doesn’t meet the expectations. Battery life is great. Charging is quick. Sound quality is average. Not a lot of lag. Not useful when riding on bike.

name: Krish
title: Worth Every Penny
content: Brought the One Plus Wireless Bullet Z Bass Version. Had been looking for a wireless bluetooth earphones so that I can use it on the bike precisely. Packing was awesome. It's very comfortable and light weight. I got it on the Republic Day sale for Rs.1899 and I think it's totally worth the price I have paid and to top it all it has a battery back up of 17hrs.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth  Buying
content: Writing this review after 4 months of heavy use. Best part about this ear phones is convineience. Takes hardly 10 min to charge 100% and takes all the time to drain ( Approx 15 hrs ). The sound quality is great. Altough am not a music quality freak, am much of a call and movie user. But it is decent in soumd quality and very comfortable to wear even for long durations.

name: Pushpendra D.
title: Best under price!
content: One of the best neckband style earphones. Good build quality, excellent battery, good connectivity, good charging speed, quixk switch feature. Only con is that they should have some plugs to have beetr grip inside ead because sometimes they seem to fall. Otherwise, its best in this category.

name: Yashas S R
title: Great battery!! But not so great bass
content: The battery life on this is awesome!! The sound on these earphones is also great for the price.. The only downside is that the bass isn't that great.. The volume can get pretty high, but due to that lacking bass, you might feel disappointed.. But overall, a well built earphone with a great battery for the price.

name: Vijeyakumar
title: Value for money
content: Overall it’s a good product.. Pros:. 1. Call quality is best. 2. Easy to pair. 3. Good battery life.. Cons:. 1. Old school design. 2. Can’t switch between devices.

name: Hari Shanker Kumar
title: Value for money... Superb quality!
content: Just go for it... Best product in the price range. Sturdy build. Battery backup is too awesome and sound quality is the finest at this price. Mic is also very good - my call recipients did not feel any difference compared to the mic on my phone. Kudos to ONEPLUS for such a great product!

name: Niharika Dubey
title: Works great between MacBook + Android phone!
content: The sound quality is great for the price. The beast feature for me is the Quick Switch between my MacBook and my Android phone which has usually been a sore spot for me otherwise!. Works effortlessly between both my gadgets. I can make calls, use Spotify, use Google Assistant, all without any hitch. And amazing battery life for sure!

name: Nitin Chauhan
title: OnePlus wireless Z
content: Bass quality is good, battery backup is awesome but sound quality is not good as much we are expecting from OnePlus.. Sound quality could be better so I am not happy with the sound quality. It is ok not very good.

name: rishu
title: Do not buy this - too bad mic voice quality. cant hear anything clearly from receiver side
content: Worst product by one plus I bought it 2 days before. too bad mic voice quality. can't hear anything clearly from the receiver side. whenever I call anyone I hear breaking voice every time. Initially, I thought it could be due to the network. But it happened with almost 9/10 people. when I disconnect it and call with my phone the voice is fine. Do not buy this product.

name: AN
title: A cracker of a buy !
content: Brilliant head set for calling and taking calls, Audio quality is stupendous too, I also use the Old Bose QC 15's, dare I say when plugged in the right way into your ears, they sound almost like the Bose🙃..Brilliant battery backup and speedy charging ...Simply superb !

name: Debraj R.
title: Pretty good deal at Rs.1999
content: I have also used the regular one's and the bass is definately improved in the base edition. Not the best bass but pretty good. Takes around 24 minutes to get fully charged. Only one little issue is that the noise cancellation isn't that good. Its fair but not very good. In Rs.1999 this is the best you can get.

name: Rameez
title: Bass Beast using with SG Note10 plus
content: Very crisp sound bass is poweful negligible latency is there as low latency mode not supported by phone other than oneplus. Build quality quite good.. battery backup is amazing

name: Fahim Mahalat
title: Go for it
content: This headphone is amazing and battery life is unavailable . Sound quality is best. If you went to buy a earphone in ₹2000 then go for it.this will not disappoint you i think so.. That is my opinion the decision on you. All the best.. And think u team OnePlus.

name: Prathamesh
title: Excellent headphone at this price point
content: Sound quality is good for calling &noise cancellation is good . Battery backup is also good , I am getting nearly 17-18 hrs of backup. Quick switch is also useful I am using this with my laptop and phone for calling. comfortable for log use, I used this headphone for nearly 2 month.build quality is also good.. Bass is not that good but it is ok.!. Satisfied with this purchase

name: Krishakumartb
title: Value for money
content: Working like charm. Bass is not that heavy but balanced. Instantaneous pairing with OP5T. Good BT range. Sound output is balenced. Extensively using for WFH now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst Product of one plus
content: After buying this product its working fine bass quality is little bit low but enjoying this product but today 12 oct while listening music one speaker gets off and not working and just 10 day has been passed and now amazon showing no return of this order that means by 2000 rupees get wasted.. So please don't buy this product..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Buy with eyes closed
content: It had been a while i used bluetooth headset. I always preferred headphones with jack, because as a audiophile, the sound mattered the most to me. The earlier bluetooth headset i purchased used to have little battery life, horrible sound quality, etc., but this headphone blew my mind. A+++

name: Bharti Agnihotri
title: REVIEW AFTER 2 MONTHS
content: Good sound quality. Bass could be better but i have heard that OnePlus has improved in this department in their new bullets wireless z bass edition. Bass is present but it is not as good and thumping as you would expect. Overall good connectivity with OnePlus phones and super low latency while in OnePlus fnatic mode. Go for it without any doubt.......

name: Mridul sarkar
title: Amazingly perfect
content: This is my 2nd purchase of oneplus bullets wireless z within 4 months of first one (purchased this to gift my brother) and i must say it is a full packed product with amazing specs and quality. I loved it a lot. My brother was happy wuth the battery backup and superb balanced sound. Only thing i have complaint with amazon is about the product is its packaging. Please improve packaging

name: Nadeem
title: Cheap build quality
content: Cheap build quality.. Buttons stopped working in 2 weeks. Went to the service center and got it replaced (has a one yalear warranty). But within a week, the buttons stopperld working on the replaced ones too. Pathetic quality. Expected at least a better product and service from Oneplus. Disappointed!

name: Prakash
title: Mic stopped working, worst product by Oneplus
content: Within 10 days of buying the product, the mic stopped working. Other person is unable to hear me.... Now after 10 days unable to file return and service centre bid also bad. The sound is also very less. Bass is Ok. Noise cancellation is Ok

name: Ankur Halder
title: Don't think just go for it.
content: This headphone is awesome. I prefer this one over oppo enco m31 because it is pretty balanced audio quality. I don't need too much bass. Bass is decent not too much. Built quality is very good 👍 and battery backup is just awesome.I had fully charged it at morning and spend time with 3hours of listening to music and 10-12 phone calls. At the night it is still 80% charge available.

name: Satish kadam
title: Low quality item
content: The quality of the headphone is too bad. it gets damaged within a month. it started getting switch on & off every 2 min automatically, sometimes in few seconds also, too much issues in connectivity. very much disappointment with the product quality.

name: Jaikishan
title: BATTERY BACKUP IS AWSOME
content: Battery Backup is super.. Bass quality is not good.. I purchased the Oneplus Bullets wireless Z with the hope that the battery will last for a few hours...(around 6-8-10 hours) But i was surprised that these wireless Z gives almost 2 dats of battery life with heavy usage for PHONE CALLS.. Have not yet tried for multimedia purpose..but i am sure i will not be disappointed.

name: cr7india
title: excellent earphones
content: + battery back up. + low charging time. + good sound quality. - no alternatives to this. nothing beats this product at this price point.

name: Himanshu
title: Best as it says never settle
content: First of all who are replying not good bass.. Guys in a oneplus mobile there is particular setting for earphones equaliser. There you can increase and decrease in your way your want.. Second battery at its best. Third i agree that noise cancellation is not so good but since according to rate its best although.

name: Abhishek choudhary
title: read this before buying
content: see this a genuine review after using one month. guyz if you looking for a good battery backup neckband please go for it no other neckband will give u such a good backup. but yes you have to compromise with bass, its not that too high aur not that low but its OK OK. rest everything is of very nyc quality. go for it guyz

name: Suman Pal
title: Want balanced sound? Buy now!!
content: The best sound according to my taste!! I'll certainly recommend this to all who are like me,e.g. don't like thumping bass and want balanced sound. It is so comfortable that after some time I wasn't feeling it anymore. Blazing fast connectivity, good build quality, overall a great wireless earbuds for you.

name: Sunil Devdas
title: Lovely
content: Love this sound. Also the earphones magnetically attach and shuts down Bluetooth which is smooth. And on a one plus phone the transfer from Bluetooth to normal is seamless. I can also use it with other non one plus devices which is a very pleasant surprise

name: Amazon Customer
title: Oneplus bullets wireless Z (mint)
content: First of all don't hesitate... It's a totally genuine product! I'm a regular user who uses earphones for movies and songs and these earphones are best for it! For the price, you get a good brand, crisp sound, amazing battery life, good build quality (in love with the mint colour)... What one could ask more!!

name: Jerrin Jokutty
title: Not good for a person having 2 phone
content: The product can connect to one phone only at a time... Need to manually switch at mobile to switch to each one... Not good for a person having 2 phone...

name: Saddam Khan
title: Background noise
content: Battery is good and it's an overall good product except it can't cancel the background noise on my phone, it could be my phone & not this product but I'm not sure. Callers get much irritated with background noise that they get from the earphone. I have also experienced the same on other earphones so it could be my phone.

name: Theindian
title: Not working or sync with zoom calls
content: It is usual product like other product. Light weight whiv doesn't felt pain in neck. Sync well. Issue is not working with laptop zoom other audio communication

name: H sridhar
title: OnePlus when it's comes to earphones music is main priority than features.
content: Sound quality was not good for the price, but has lots of features if you need it for your daily based works(work from home) or some for some online works with a decent Mike go for it.. Music listeners strictly don't go for it because sound quality is not well balanced here if your priority is music then just go for oppo enco m31.

name: @bb!e @l!
title: GO AHEAD & BUY THIS NECKBAND WITHOUT THINKING 2ice
content: For this price it's the best option available in the market... Sound is pretty good... Calling experience is also decent... Before purchasing it I actually searched a lot about some top/best neckbands under 2k... And I am very happy & also satisfied after owning the result of those Searches... Go ahead and buy this neckband without thinking twice...

name: Viresh
title: Review after using for 15 days
content: Reviewing after use of 15 days.. I bought 2 headsets,1 is working fine another one started giving problems after 10 days. On call next person cannot hear a word even when shouting.. Honestly speaking there are no good headsets in the range of 2000.

name: Megha N.
title: Great product at great price
content: Awesome product, met all my expectations better than the competitor realme and oppo.. Fast auto switch between devices, low latency on my one plus device, ideal for gaming.

name: Vipin Kumar
title: No. 1 Wireless Earphones
content: I ordered this product because i am using OnePlus mobile phone. I was a little bit confused between realme buds and one plus wireless. And because of that i ordered some other brand's headphones. But after few days i ordered these again. And i am very much satisfied with the performance. Whether it is battery backup or sound quality, everything is awesome in these.

name: Prashant chaurasia 9044346115
title: Paisa vasool hai bhai
content: Very clear sound and deep bass and soft vibration bass.. If u want good audio, instrumental clear audio, fast connectivity, heavy bass, balance sound, long battery, design, build quality..... Then go for it, buy it. If u worry about its ear grip, don't worry it comfortably fit in ear, for Workout its a good choice. 💯♥️

name: Ankit
title: Value For Money Product
content: Pros :. 1)Excellent Battery Life. 2)Easy Connectivity. 3)Clear Sound (mids & lows are very crisp). 4)Comfortable to wear for long time listening. 5)Fast Charging. Cons :. 1)Bass is not that great it's ok. 3)Charging port is not covered with rubber

name: Ravi Teja
title: Good but ut could have been better
content: Never settle logo is missing in box. Quality is not as good as expected. Earphone wires aren't of good quality which will wear off in 1-2 years of daily usage. Good call quality. Great battry life and value for money and my phone is oneplus 6 this is the only reason i bought it though its made in china

name: Prathamesh
title: Oneplus Bullet Wireless Z (Black)
content: for what you are waiting..... pros:. 1. fast charging 10 min half charge.. 2. Build quality top notch. 3. Felxible.. 4.20 hrs backup. 5. Fast switch between devices (hardly 2 sec). 6. Unique type turn off/on system (magnetic). cons:. there are no cons but the avability of the color specially for the mint

name: RAJESH KUMAR
title: Doesn’t have multipoint Bluetooth connectivity
content: It doesn’t have multipoint Bluetooth connectivity so I returned it because it doesn’t connect two devices simultaneously

name: Pari R.
title: Excellent Product
content: The OnePlus bullet z is too good but not for bass lovers and it also supports qualcomm aptx aac hd sound. A tip for you if you are bass lover then download ''subwoofer bass" app from play store then you get bass more than a headphones and I tested it works. But only the cons are that they support fast charging only on OnePlus warp charger and low latency mode only on OnePlus devices

name: ADARSH
title: Best for this price segment.
content: Best headphone under 2k. Main attracting factor is long lasting batteries and fast charging(less than 30 min enough).. light Wight. . Decent sound quality and noise cancellation. Bass not good as compared to realme.. otherwise it's fantastic.

name: Vijayaventh
title: Good but all notification ,message , keypad sounds hear in iPhone
content: After paring Connecting to iPhone very fast but we hear all sounds like message received , keypad sound , notification received sounds . It’s gets quite irritating . Sounds are fine . Only irritation is all sounds are heard .

name: Murtuza Zabuawala
title: Value for money
content: Pros:. Sound, Battery. Overall value for money.. Cons:. As pointed out by others,. - Noise cancellation does not work when you ride bikes, you won't be able to hear the music properly due to to wind.

name: Mojjada Venkata lakshmi Narayana
title: Never settle and excellent
content: Based on my experience it's too Gud and comfortable and flexible and batter life Is to excellent and quick charge and it's to easy too connect the device. Bass quality Is gud and noise cancellation and sound quality is too gud and 1second lagging thats not a big problem.

name: Raul D
title: Best in 2k.. Call and music lovers go for it
content: Music lovers go for it.. I used it from last one month and happy with its performance. Battery backup is more than expected. I charged once in 2 days for 1 hr.. I'm using it for my daily calling purpose and it is great compatible with mobile and laptop both.. Quick switch is most usable feature.

name: Ranjit Pattar
title: Jsut go for it guys
content: I really liked it.. It's very flexible and the battery is very good if the sound was little bit high it will be perfect but not so bad about the sound quality.. It's worth of 2k.. Go for its guys don't think ☺️🙂

name: Vinay
title: Best will be always best
content: Switching between devices is awesome and it's silicon neck band is very strong noise cancelation is nice but bass is better in realme than it but clarity of sound is better in it for communication and games it is best and better than realme and other at this range but make note that it is not water proof it is water resistant as it is use full workouts and etc...

name: prasanna
title: Good
content: This is a value for money at this price range. Excellent build quality. Sound signature is quite natural and not overtuned like realme. Gets pretty loud. This will definitely eat up OnePlus bullets wireless 2's market share.

name: Ravi
title: Practical review after using 10+ days
content: After using 10+days. Sound quality- amazingly balanced 5/5. Bass quality_ better 4/5. Battery_ vry good 5/5. Calling mic_ not good ( you can't talk in low pitch of voice) your sound will be decreased to the caller, u have to speak very loud to talk with it (only drawback) 2/5. Built quality_ very comfortable. Conclusion_ except voice calling everything is the best in this price segment

name: Lakshmi prasanna
title: Feel The bass !
content: More than I expected the Bass was Op!🔊. And the battery backup was superb !👌. And it gives me 19 hours of playback. and recommended to buy this headphones below 2000 rupees !!!!!!!! 😍💪

name: Fahad Shaikh
title: Build quality sucks and don't expect services if your product breaks even in the first month
content: This happened in just 1 month and also don't expect services if something like this happens,. Cuz my earphone works just fine but the skin is peeling off and if i go to the service center obviously they're gonna reject my req by saying physical damage 🤷🏻‍♂️ think twice , sounds good battery life is excellent.. But the vuild quality sucks

name: Aghoramurthy
title: This product has a microphone failure.
content: Sound quality is ok. And microphone is worse. I have to speak very loud so that people can hear me. Battery back up and magnetic tech is awesome. Requested for a replacement and the replacement has the same issue but better than the last one.

name: CS
title: Poor noise cancellation. Can't use for phone/ zoom calls.
content: Can't use this device for phone and zoom calls. Even fan noise is heard at the other end. My 500 rupees wired headset does a better job at cancelling the environment noise, and this 2k device is not able to. I like the magnetic feature, battery life etc. But, the basic feature of noiseless call is missing.

name: Amol Kedar
title: Superb
content: The quality and the design is really excellent than the wireless 2 earphones!. It comes with the magnetic attach, where song will be paused when u attach both ear piece, and I had a confusion in Turing ON the earphones, You need to separate the earplugs and automatically it will be ON and Pair instantly... Sound quality - really great experience. And bass is not that good!

name: Vatsala Pal
title: Highly recommended
content: This is the most awesome earphones that I have used in last few years. Great on sound quality. Also does an amazing job in noise cancellation. I was travelling in a cab with windows open and the other party couldn't even hear any disturbance on the call.

name: Aldrin J.
title: Disappointed
content: This turned out to be a disappointment to say the least. I thought it was pretty amazing at first, but in barely 3 months everything turned around. There are static noises almost every time I play the music, the mic is pretty much the big disappointment. Background noise kicks in big time when I use this for calls, makes this one pretty much useless on most occasions. Such a let down from OnePlus.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great product, Good sound
content: Great product for this price range with these features.. battery life is great. sound quality is average. magnetic pause works well. switching between device works great.

name: Karthik Vijayakumar
title: It is not amazon, it is the seller
content: Bought this through amazon and got it delivered in two days. 1. First day everything is working fine. 2. Second volume buttons issue. 3. Third day beep sound. 4. Online tech forums suggested to factory reset using volume buttos. 5. Fourth day somehow it worked. 6. Fifth day again beep sound started. This may look like best seller. But I think the seller is appario retail is sending out bad products. Waiting for some other reseller.

name: Debabrata Rajbanshi
title: Amazing earphone, worth of money, clear sound quality . Jst goo for it
content: I have received this earphone today. After checking the sound quality. I would say that this is the best earphone within this budget, sound quality really amazing and crystal clear sound. Bt don't expect to much bass. Little bit bass it has. Built quality is too good looking very cool and premium, Good bettery backup and ipx5 water, dust resistant. Overall worth of money. Go for it

name: Aniruddha Maji
title: Very Bad product from OnePlus, don't waste your money.
content: Very Bad product, I was buy in 2July and today 10th September, am writing the review the ear phone is not getting power on and not connected also. All to recommend you don't buy this product, don't waste your valuable monet.

name: Abhi123
title: Does not work well with IOS devices
content: This earphones does not work well with iPhone devices, Bass is very very Less. Battery backup awesome, Bluetooth connectivity awesome, sound quality awesome, but bass is very less. 2k is big amount, and if u want 2 use this earphones for calls and office use then u can buy, else for music purpose I recommend not to buy this earphones.

name: Swati
title: Good earphone but bad delivery services
content: The product is great. Fast charging and durable battery. Bit difficult to understand the technogy. But I will manage to understand with time.. Only a bad experience about delivery service of Amazon. Althogh I am a prime member, I could get the product after 2 consecutive cancellations.. Amazon need to improve there delivery services at the delivery agent level. Its necessary.

name: Abhilasha
title: Avg sound, uncomfortable buds
content: I'm used to sony in-ear phones, this is no where as good in clarity of sound n the buds are too large and uncomfortable despite using the smallest fixture. Unhappy

name: k.venkat tiru gopal reddy
title: Good for music and calls, not for gaming.
content: Its good for only calls and music. Its not for gaming, we definetly a lag while we r playing a game.most of the people r saying noise cancelation issue but here we have to use a finger to keep a mic near to us. Other wise we definetly notice that issue.

name: P.d.j.kishore k.
title: REVIEW OF ONEPLUS WIRELESS Z
content: It can be only used for calls , But for music lovers it’s not good. Pros. 1. It’s charging speed is ok. 2. Calling quality and while using ping u can here the foot steps. Cons. 1. If you are using for playing videos and musics I don’t recommend this one. 2. No bass will be there...some type of doing is coming instead of that. 3. No returns policy is available

name: Lokesh Kumar
title: Price Justified!
content: * Battery backup is excellent.. * Sound quality is also good.. *10 minutes charging for 10 hours playback is one of its unique features.. * It quickly pairs with your smartphone.. * Good built quality.. What else do you need for ₹1,999.

name: Ashutosh Patle
title: Total value for money
content: The earphones are good. Total value for money. pros: build quality, sound and brand name. Cons: more bluetooth range, volume up down button is separated from the neck band. Can break easily during workout

name: abishekkumar
title: Lack of bass audio
content: This product is not recommended for bass lovers, because this product lacks of bass and mid and high tones are very clear, This product is only recommended who loved the music in detailed and crystal clear audio,This neckband gives rubbered neck style its very tangy when you fold the headphone, overall best headphone for connectivity and quality

name: Asish George
title: Quality product
content: The build quality is good.It would have been great if 1+ had given little more thought on the bass. It is not that the bass is worst or bad but within the price range and comparing with the other alternatives it ranks a step down. It is a must say that the charging capability and battery backup is amazing.overall it is a worth the money package.

name: Ladybug 🐞
title: Bass quality is poor !!
content: It’s just ok but not great ! Bass quality is not good as mentioned and I don’t get to feel the bass so if you are a music lover then it doesn’t help much !! If you want to use it for call purpose the it’s good !!! Mic is not bad and the other party doesn’t have problem in hearing!!

name: Lal babu singh
title: Defective Piece. Return Issue!
content: I got a defective piece. Earphone automatically gets disconnected for 4-5 seconds. I have experienced similar problem while using the earphone with laptop and mobile phone. I decided to return but Amazon is not ready to pick it up and I am forced to send it back to the seller through post office or courier service. I never expected this kind of service from Amazon.

name: Arman khan
title: Worth it
content: Please go for it,this is just Worth it thing. I have read the review about its sound quality and i am not agree on all points because it gives really crystal clear sound but yes,bass is low,it is on you what you like balanced sound or just bass😒,just one cons.. Pros:-battery life😱,comfort,design and built quality,water resistant,etc. Just go for it.. Better than Realme's one

name: gnana suthan.b
title: Personalised experience
content: The product was excellent. One plus nailed it considering the sub 2000rs. Battery is just above extreme. The sound quality is also good. Microphone works really well. Call quality is good. Better than most of the earphones at this segment. It is made of plastic which causes some worry for me. Latency is up to the mark. No delay in delivering the sound. Overall “Go to product” under this segement.

name: Dev Banerjee
title: Very nice product
content: Too good... Easy to use.. Very good battery backup... And sound is next level.. Only the extra ear buds they had provide is not perfectly fitting in my ear but not a big issue

name: Mrs Daniel
title: It's ok ok
content: 1. It is good to hear a song. But not so good when taking a call. Noise cancellation is worse when we take calls. Even minute sound, like rubbing of a plastic cover or clothes, could be heard by the person on the other end, when taking a call.. 2. The ear tips that we insert into the ear does not stay for long. It keeps falling.

name: Piyush Malviya
title: Excellent Battery Life & Performance
content: OnePlus brought a very good product at such a decent price. The battery life as per my need is insane, it gets completely charged through one plus charger at around 5-15 minutes. Sound is not that much great, bass is kind of dull but performance is good. It is not recommended for hardcore music enthusiasts as its sound is not that great...

name: Ramshad
title: Not even lasted 6 months
content: I was using this headset past 6 months and suddenty the mic trouble started, sometimes the other end person can't hear my voice or the mic volume level is really low can't hear what I'm saying

name: Arnab Dutta
title: Excellent at this price
content: Sound quality is excellent. Bass is a little on the low. But considering the offering price, the deal is very good. Low latency is excellent while playing games like PUBG. 10 mins charge will easily get you through more than a day. Excellent deal. Using with OnePlus 7t, I have modified the equalizer to suit my needs and it sounds way better. Great product in this price point.

name: Vaisnav Vasudevan
title: So close to perfect but yet to far.
content: Everything is good in this but I wish I had the normal version of the same as there isn't any quick switch. OnePlus says quick switch is available in brand ads. However it's a great product. Neck bands built quality and fit and comfort is premium. Great value for 2k. I wish low latency mode can be made available for non OnePlus device through a custom app developed by OnePlus.

name: Pankaj P Gajjar
title: Don't waste your money on this product there is no bass
content: First of all thanks to Amazon for great support for refund my money.. About OnePlus Z bass edition- Guys there is no bass in this product. Don't purchase this product. I am using neckband from last 3 years and tried too many neckband but OnePlus Z bass edition is third class product don't waste your money.. Thanks Amazon for giving me full refund

name: Amazon Customer
title: It's good
content: All.the function are very helpful but at times call voice is not heard on the other side and need to bring mic closer . It's overall good and specially magnet buds to pause and play is awesome for.my usage

name: VIKRAM KARNAM
title: Its good to have one, but if it would have made for multiple connections.
content: It is good one to have but it would be excellent if it connects with multiple devices at a time and active, because i generally use two mobiles and a laptop. ill keep switching manually that make me annoy.

name: gvvsatyanarayana
title: Very good.
content: Very good. Flexible part is excellent and comfortable to wear for any longer time. Connectivity is easy and simple. Disconnection is also very simple. By Joining 2 ear buds magnetically one can disconnect bluetooth and vice-versa.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product. But no provision to get it repaired
content: After 30 days of usage. Overall a good product. Very handy and was working perfectly fine until this morning. Gets charged in 10 minutes.. Although Its mike stopped working after 20 days of usage.There is no provision to get it replaced or repaired.

name: Ankan Srivastava
title: Received a duplicate product
content: I have received a duplicate order. I am 100% sure about that as in the OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z earphone box there is a space where the OnePlus tagline is written NEVER SETTLE. But in my received piece that was missing and that space was also very small compared to the original. I either want an original product or a complete refund for my order. Never buy anything from this seller. Totally fake!

name: Sainadh.Mokara
title: Worth for 2k❤️ bass ❤️❤️ battery life ❤️❤️❤️
content: Connectivity no issue, and quick switch is the best option for me and moreover am using OnePlus 7T after getting update 10.3.3 these are the perfect match because of Dolby Atmos ❤️ coming to the bass quality it's classic, And finally battery backup is insane for 10 minutes of charge we can get 9 hours of battery life. Quality of wire is not upto the mark but for 2k it's the best choice OnEpLuS ❤️❤️

name: Guru Chethan
title: Mind blowing.....Perfect for 2k
content: I am writing this review after using these for about a month. This is the perfect one we can find in the market. BASS Quality is awesome and SOUND Quality is mind blowing. Anyone who is searching for wireless can definitely go for this. This is also far better than bullets 2 which is nearly 4k. Guys I would recommend you this wonderful quality wireless earphones.

name: Arjun G
title: Best Buy For The Price !
content: The first thing about #OneplusBulletsWirelessZ is that this is the best buy among the available neckbands for Rs 2k. Its actually also an amazing product for the price. No other neckbands in the price range comes close to #OneplusBulletsWirelessZ in Performance and Build Quality.

name: Bhavesh
title: Good buy for a daily user for music and calls
content: Good quality earphones.. 1. Excellent battery life. 2. Very fast charging. 3. Good sound quality. 4. Quick switch feature is very useful if you have multiple devices. 5. Call quality is good, same as normal earphones. There is no active noice cancellation but it is good enough for everyday calls.

name: Rushikesh koli
title: Go for it but not those who are bass head
content: Sound quality is amazing and also battery backup is truly awesome. But I was disappointed by the bass, though it was mentioned that it has balanced sound but still. Otherwise, those who are not into bass so much I would recommend you to buy it.

name: Vinoth Kumar
title: Headphone stopped working
content: Brought on October 2020, After 4 months of single usage, right side speaker stopped working, only a mild sound I can hear from right side and this is pathetic and didn't expect from one plus and now I have to call the support team and check the process. Don't know how many stories they going to cook up.

name: Mohit
title: Disappointed with its noise cancellation and not working with laptops
content: I am using OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z in-Ear Bluetooth Earphones with Mic since last two months. The sound qualirty is excellent. I found two issues with this product are its noise cancellation is not working. I am not able to use it while driving, it is not able to filter the wind noise. It is very disppointing. The second thing i found is, It is not working with my laptop.

name: Barun Maity
title: Overall best wireless headphone
content: Very good headphones I got as much as I expected and the sound quality and Noise cancellation is excellent and the design of the headphones is very good The best quality headphones.

name: Mohd Usman
title: All things are good except sound. Thanks
content: Trebble and pitch of sound is too high.. But the battery life is excellent.. Charging time is also very les i.e.about they 20 minutes.. Build quality is very good .. Low latency is about .9-1.5 second.. I like the product but the only thing i don't like is the sound quality is very poor.. I don't want to tell not to buy them but these are very good in this price rate.

name: subha shanmugam
title: Good choice for long time users of mobiles with calls, music's
content: It is too good. I didn't find any negative. Worth for money. One who are engaged with mobiles for long time in calls, meetings, or music lovers, can buy it. Charge is superub, it takes only 10mins to full charge and long last for one day.

name: SHASHANK KUMAR
title: Best earphone till now.
content: It's best and it should be as it is one plus product.. Perfect noise cancellation and good bass.. Product is strong and it's not weak like Boat Rockerz product at this price.. 5 star.

name: Aswin
title: A steal at ⅓ the price of BW2.
content: A steal at ⅓ the price of BW2. The BWZ has a better battery claim and even an IP55 over the BW2. The only downgrade is the 9.2mm mono driver but ngl this sounds louder to me for some reason.

name: BD
title: Good one for under 2000
content: Good one for under 2000. Works well with one plus 7. Bluetooth switch works effectively between laptop/mobile /tablet. Absolutely no noise cancellation.

name: tejas a.
title: As music lover I regret wasting money on this, voice distortion also found in it.
content: It is good in terms of feature but sound quality is just disgusting according to price. Also Google assistant don't work properly with this whenever I asked to ring my phone to find it, it always stated to unlock it first, if I was having it then why would I asked to find it. Many time Google assistant in indicating sound is not available which I hate the most.

name: shivam Panchbhai
title: If you are a bass lover stay away from it.
content: The bass is bland. Everytime I listen music on Spotify I have to use the Equalizer for bass. Why there is so much hype for these Chinese earphones. Better go for Sony.

name: PRADEEP R
title: Value for Money
content: Good product overall, little delicate to handle. Wireless feature is not very good if you use it beyond 2 walls.. Other wise battery and sound quality is one of the best.

name: Gaurav Agrawal
title: Worth the money. Go for it
content: Great product. Worth the money! Quick switch really helps to switch between the phone and device and the fast charging is amazing. It's been a day since I used it and I personally feel it's better than the normal earphones. Could not even feel the weight on my neck. Build quality is really good and premium. Was able to connect with my android tv and experience was too good

name: Amit
title: Please don't buy there are better products with one plus
content: Very bad product. Voice breaks. If we call then the other person is unable to clearly hear the voice . There is lot of disturbance. bad quality product

name: Amazon Customer
title: One Plus Bullets Z Bass Edition
content: Sound Clarity is good. Battery backup is good. Bass is good not very high bass. Magnetic control is best, automatically connect with seconds when detach buds.

name: Srinath
title: NOT FOR SOUNDS.. BUT FOR BATTERY
content: I bought a black coloured one..... Overall i give 3/5.....the band is very comfortable.... But look wise it is not attractive....only positive Thing which I give 5/5is battery..... U can't find better battery options than this one...... But ur interest is in music and in bass better search other ones... Latency issues not found.... 5/5.......

name: MohanaRaoBongu
title: Better in battery performance
content: If you want to buy it ...it giving only battery performance not other than anything... remaining features are great better in the road side products compared to this product.so I suggest if you want to see battery performance other than anything it is the best best best option

name: Sibananda Mahapatra
title: Never Settle 🔥
content: Great packaging 👍. Good sound quality 👍. Mids, highs are excellent. Lows slightly lag but decent. Overall a great sound qualit 👍👍. Build quality is pretty good, I'm happy with that 🙂. And It gives monster power backup 🔥 🔥 🔥. And charged very fastly 👍👍. Overall At the price point it's a great deal 👍

name: Prashant K.
title: Noise cancellation NOT AT ALL
content: cannot connect with 2 devices at the same time.. secondly if u are using it when there is even very slow wind .. other person will hear lot of noise. even if u r standing below fan than also lot of noise goes.

name: srinigv
title: Works with mobiles. But poor clarity with laptops.
content: Battery is ok. Volume and microphone works good with mobile.. When connected to laptop microphone is pretty bad, my colleagues keep complaining that my voice is not clear ☹️☹️.

name: diptanshu kumar
title: Review of OnePlus bullet wireless z
content: Well very very happy with the product.. Pros. 1. Good build quality. 2. Very long battery life good for up to 3 days. 3. Crips, clear and bassy sound. 4. Instant conect and long range up to 40m in open and 20m in home. 5. Manetic touch and Google assistant. Cons. 1. Blinking light is irritating which is fine in daylight but not in night.

name: Siddhivinayak Dubey
title: These are just too good to be true in this price range!
content: It's one of my best purchases I ever made for earphones.. Prior to this, I was using skull candy Ink'd Wireless and they worked pretty great but it was of about 4.6k though I got it on a sale of 2.2k but compared to these bullets they're not even close in the sound quality. It's just bullets are too good to be true in this price range

name: Bhagyesh
title: Not for music and best for calls
content: Call Quality is clear. Noise cancellation is also good. But those who are searching for listneing music u will get disappointed as i get.. Spending of Rs.2000 which is not satisfying.. Irritating music sound quality. my wired philips headphone has better music quaity than this one plus earphones.. No issues on Call connecting. There is also some battery problem.

name: Manpreet Singh Saluja
title: True Wirless Earphones
content: These bullets are really awesome oneplus did really good job. Some of guys are saying everything is awesome but bass is not good but after using it for more than 1 month i have to say bass of these earphones are really awesome and real if you want more bass than go to sound settings and just increase the bass. For battery life i really forget that when i really charge my earphones last time😂

name: Abhishek Pawar
title: NOT LOUD ENOUGH/ NOT ENOUGH BASS
content: These headphones have a lot of features like connection with 2 devices, auto pause/ play etc., so I ordered them but I was relly disappointed when I heard the actual sound, even Sennheiser CX 180 are better than these. DO NOT BUY YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED 100%

name: MAHEMUD SAIYAD
title: Loving it!!
content: I am just loving it. i am using this earphones from last 1 month. Totally worth it. Sound and connection speed is at top. Minor sound delay is there. But overall it's great. (For gaming, everry wireless headphones have little sound delay, so go for wired one

name: Krishna
title: Decent headphones .
content: Pros:-. --------. Sound quality is decent.. Excellent battery backup.. Comfortable eartips .. Water resistant.. Cons:-. --------. Connectivity issues sometimes.

name: M Ananda Moorthy
title: Best one and Amazon service awsome
content: I bought the first headset and it was superb but had little mic issue which any product can have like manufacturing issue.. But it was so quick when I ordered a replacement it was replaced within 24 hrs. Really impressed with the time take for original order and replacement as well

name: Amazon Customer
title: I'm flabbergasted!!
content: Let me tell you something honestly, you wont find anything like this under 2k.. You may go for truly wireless just cuz they new fashion but aint nothing matches the premiumness of these earphones.. Sound could be a little louder but the overall quality of sound is amazing!. Must buy.

name: Nadeem
title: Technology👌sound quality(👎x100)
content: The magnetic technology that they used is super with fast connectivity and switching between devices. But what matters is the sound quality which is very poor. Voice cancellation is null and the voice of the other person on calls is hardly audible on outdoors plus bass is also very bad. Only thing that is good is battery.. Recommend not to waste 1999/- on this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bluetooth earphone
content: It's a ok product but the overall sound is not that good. Sometimes there are connectivity issues. You have to reset to factory settings to be able to connect. Battery life is good as promised

name: SAMEER C.
title: Help me!!!
content: This product is good but from few days it is not working like I start my online zoom and google meet classes and meetings it is not working it is showing the connection but not working rather then online classes it is working with every app and also for calling. But for me online classes is most important so pls help me to sort out this problem. As soon as possible... TQ

name: C ma
title: Good one.
content: Good :. Super battery life. Easy to pair. Fits well into the ears.. Bad : ear buds too big for smaller ears. Only one size of ear buds given.

name: Anand Sharma
title: Balanced sound. Best in this range 👍 . But Bass is average not bad. 👍
content: I would like to say that the earphone is quite good in this range. And i don't like so much bass so basically for me it's very good earphone with balanced sound but if you like to listen so much bass then this is not for you. Who like balanced sound so it's perfect for them. 👍

name: javed ali
title: not bad
content: I have been using OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z in-Ear Bluetooth Earphones with Mic (Black) for 5 months. quality, battery backup is very nice. it gives me back up for 2days. I have some issues as its audio will be muted automatically while I'm connected to my laptop. apart from this everything is good.

name: Ciju Varghese
title: Excellent for my purpose
content: I don't think this headset excels with sound and bass quality, but its a perfect ear fit and long lasting battery charge which is exactly what I wanted ☺️. This is a perfect workout partner 💪 and the Bluetooth range also is awesome.

name: VINOTHKUMAR M
title: its worth
content: It feels good and working perfectly. only the bass feel a little low comparing sony .otherwise its worth for 2k.

name: Max
title: Missing never settle logo inside the box
content: It is good to buy in this price range but I regret that when I opened the box and pulled out the wireless z ,i didn't see any logo of never settle in that box,but I recognise that I see that logo of never settle in one of its review on youtube.

name: Rupam Paul
title: A decent one
content: A decent product with decent sound quality. Bass is quite a bit lower side. If you are a huge bass lover then you can skip it. Facing no issue while calling. Build quality is great. And such a extraordinary battery backup with minimal charge. Feel little annoyed with the tiny white blinking light. Overall great audio quality with this price point. Happy with this product.

name: parikshit sharma
title: best battery earbuds
content: the overall performance is very good and the battery backup is very sound after pne month of uses i can say that they are having a very good battery life and fast charging add-on to it.go for it.

name: Richa
title: Awsome sound with Awsome bettry
content: This product is awsome, it's connects very fast and easy to use. The sound is crystal clear and bass is good. The noice cancellation is also very good. The earpiece fits nicely and you get all sizes of buds with product. The most attractive feature is it's bettry backup which can slay you. Overall it's a good budget earphone.

name: Shravan
title: worst products
content: Unlike the OnePlus Bullets Wireless 2, the OnePlus Buds doesn't come with support for advanced aptX codec, which might have made a slight difference in sound quality. But, the wireless earphones at least supports AAC Bluetooth codec. ... As far as call quality is concerned, the OnePlus Buds did a good enough job

name: akshay sharma
title: Battery backup and calling
content: Good for calling but if ur soul purpose is to listening song bass is not satisfying altough vocals are satisfactory and clear easy to pair for iphone too.

name: Gaurang S.
title: Best for office use...
content: If your purpose is to attend office calls then just buy these!! Best feature is the switcher.. switch easily from laptop to phone and back... This is my daily driver... Music is loud and clear.. Good sound quality neither too high or low.. its perfect.. use for jogging and it fits perfectly.. Battery life is amazing.. I have to charge once in 2 days..

name: Ashish Daharwal
title: Good sound quality good base easy to carry
content: Built quality awesome Sound is very clear crystal and balanced good base if we talk no outside noise comes to other person who is talking to you connects very well withing a mini second volume rockers works fine.

name: ANIKET KARDILE
title: Worthy of every penny
content: I liked these headphones they are quite good in terms of sound, also great for calls and gaming but to pick minor faults these feel a little bit uncomfortable in ears to be used for long hours. They are light weight and easy to use and has long battery life just a -ve out of many positives is the discomfort in ear while using for long hours.

name: Sagar Thapa
title: Call Quality not Good
content: We are Very Lucky that we are getting a Brand Like OnePlus in 2000₹..No even comes closer to Oneplus. Earlier I had some issue with the mike so I returned the Product..And again I re ordered & now I am Completely satisfied...Bass is too good..Vocals are Excellent...Don't think...Just Order

name: Sunny Sobhwani
title: Nice and Flawless
content: Awesome product and flawless in terms of sound, usability and ergonomic design. Settles well on the ears so would recommend this as a perfect buy incase of attending long calls or workout. Not sure how this is going to perform when jogging. Hope to found that out soon

name: Sugeesh
title: Simply Amazing ❤️
content: Sound quality is awesome with good noise cancellation. Base is not very high but good enough. Sound clarity is exceptional. Lived up to the OnePlus expectation. Way better than Realme Wireless Buds from my experience !

name: Aman Bhatia
title: THE BEST NECKBAND BY ONEPLUS
content: The charging speed is just awesome. The sound is good. No connection issues with this neckband easily work with any android device. Battery Backup scores 10/10. Low latency mode works well with ONEPLUS. Megnatic Controller works very well. Noise cancellation is also good. The build quality is so premium. In terms of this price range the best neckband we get

name: Aashiq
title: Build Quality Not Good.
content: Two Bad Experiences.. I Purchased it 2 times.First One Received was not turning on.Looked for Replacement but was out of stock.So waited and ordered again.. But again the Received product was damaged.This time the mic was not Working.. I think the Product Quality is not up to the mark.

name: Nikhil
title: Good product for 2000rs
content: Amazing product. bass is really improved. Connection distance 10m. Mic quality very clear.. Build quality: 9.6/10. Audio quality : 9/10. Bass: 8.6/10. Connectivity: 10/10. Battery life (and fast charging): 9.8/10. Ear fit: 9.8/10. Mic: 9.9/10. According to the price

name: Abhinav Rawat
title: Not worth the price.
content: •Doesn't meet the expectations. Even my JBL 600 rupees earphones sounds much better than this.. •No bass at all.. •Just for the sake of battery life Rs. 2000 doesn't worth it.. •Raising the volume a bit high makes sound very sharp and irritating.. •Can't listen songs for more than 1 hour continuously.. •Build quality is awesome and also light weight.

name: venkatasuresh
title: Ok ok
content: Overall ,ok. But didn't meet the expectations. It is connecting easily with OnePlus mobile,but not with other brand.The instruction manual is not much informative.For understanding the way of use, spend some time on other souces available on internet. If you are expecting high bass, dont go for it.

name: Sigrun Roesel
title: Non-functional in less than a month
content: Lousy product as it stopped working after only about 3 weeks of moderate use. Unit seemed to still charge as white light comes on but it can then can neither be switched on, nor paired nor re-set to factory mode. Awaiting feedback from customer services but do advise already not to buy.

name: Tushar Arora
title: Amazing for ₹1999 buy it
content: The best thing one plus can offer. At this price point of ₹1999 it's an amazing deal. Loaded with features, good sound quality, amazing design, innovative technology, great battery life.

name: VENKATESH
title: Very nice product
content: Very nice product. I bought Sony wireless earphones before this and doesn't satisfied with the performance. Then I bought this, I'm extremely happy with the performance. On small thing is, can't use in sleeping position as the buds are big in size.

name: Balaji Kumaran
title: Not upto the mark of noise cancellation and bass
content: Over All it's A powerful Headphone in 2000₹ range segment. But may be the noise cancellation could have improved. OnePlus Z lags in that. And the bass could have been even more. Sound and call quality is good. But not for riders and outdoor users.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No Bluetooth switching from device to device
content: The earphone works perfectly but the device lacks the feature of switching from device to device as it was in the earlier model. This is a bit of setback as i have to switch between mobile and 2 laptop and this becomes painful without the feature.

name: Rohit
title: Nice product
content: Its better than boat Bluetooth earphones. I have used boat also. But I am really happy with this one. But there is a small issue in this. When I watch any movie or music the sound is getting delayed .

name: Ashish K.
title: Voice quality
content: I bought this mainly for calling purpose. I am using OnePlus 5, so was hopeful to get best performance out of it. But it turned out to be a bad experience. the voice volume while talking on the phone is way below normal even in office environment and is almost inaudible in open/traffic. I used Boat earlier. The sound quality was perfect.

name: Vinay
title: Must buy for 2K
content: One of the best wireless earphones... Battery backup is unbelievable.. more than 22 hours of call. Switching between two devices is awesome. Extremely fast connect. Flexible and east to carry in jeans pocket. Noise cancellation is good for this price range

name: Vaibhav
title: Good product but a bit disappointed with the sound quality
content: Product is good. Fit finish quality level are too good. Packaging is also just awesome. But a bit disappointed with the sound quality ! So just 4 star. Battery backup is good 👍

name: farees
title: Battery backup ❤️
content: It's an awesome product good battery backup got 18.5 hrs on single charge and got 8.5 hrs for 10 min charge. Only drawback i would say is 9.2 mm drive but it doesn't bother me i like it very much and no latency issue while playing pubg

name: Mohan
title: Connectivity problem.... U can't decide it wen to connect,  u will be having no control on it.
content: It's getting disconnected for no reason... Again to connect need to struggle like anything..... Most of the morning when we start a day to ofc 1st prblm m facing is connecting this Bluetooth to my phone.. I have purchased 2 of it actually. One is for my friend band one is for me... which m using have a connectivity issue.. Personally I don't this product to anyone.

name: Vamshi Krishna Katroju
title: Poor voice assistant performance . buttons works 3 seconds delay...
content: 1. Voice assistant is very slow.. when press for 3 seconds no indication sound to start speaking... 2. When listening to music .. play / pause button ... 3 sec delay. Slow performance... 3. if click a button on earphones.. its work's after 2 -3 seconds... I checked almost 3 of my friends ONEPLUS blutooth too.. all are same problem..

name: Krishna kumar P
title: Awesome product from OnePlus
content: Awesome quality and you feel premium when you are using with one plus mobile. It stands on its verbatims. Good noise cancellation, super bass, you really enjoy the music

name: Amazon Customer
title: Rich & melodious Sound Quality, Best in segment.
content: Excellent sound & Decent bass, some of the reviewers are saying that it doesn't have a good bass & that's not true. it has an excellent balanced sound and with a great signature. I can even able to identify musical instruments.... - if you care about overall sound then its a best choice in this segment.. (Note: i use these head sets with Dolby Atmos as of now)

name: Aidul Hussain
title: My opinion after using for 2 months regularly
content: Very satisfying product and really value for money. I use earphones only in office hours (9.30-6.30), so it gives me 5-7days battery back-up on average easily. Connecting & switching is very fast that to with just double tapping on switch key. Ear grip is also enovative. Mic. is very clear and it can be heard if you speak with very low voice. Don't think, just get it.

name: Gitesh salunke
title: Great piece of invention by OnePlus.. Must buy.
content: Reviewing after 5 month's of continuous use.. Pro's :. - Awesomeness Battery life. - Button's are placed appropriately. - Dual pairing is also works great.. In seconds can access other device. - Quality of entire neckband is awesome.. Con's. - Person on other side can hear lot of background noise.

name: Mani
title: Worst noice cancellation
content: I am using this earphones from the last 1 month, i don't have any issues with the sound quality but when it comes to noise cancellation it is very bad.. While you are outside or riding a bike the opposite person can not hear your voice at all.. I am very disappointed with the noise cancellation.

name: Arman Hoque
title: Perfect deal for productivity.
content: Great battery life, almost after 4 days of moderate usage it remains 30 percentage.. Quick switching option is very helpful for productivity.. Sound quality is above average 👌.. Build quality is very perfect. Microphone placed in an inteligent manner so that the opposite person never find any difficulty in hearing phone call.

name: Kunal Takiar
title: One of worst bluetooth which stopped working within 12days
content: Earphones mic stopped working within 12days and this is basic problem with this eaephones so dont waste ur month on such horrible product ! Not worth a penny

name: Deepak
title: Worth for 1999 only
content: When I bought these I thought it just regular old bluetooth neck band thingy. but when I used this thing got crazy these neck band got good battery life ever then I expected when it's comes to bass quality it's worth a penny.but not clear as water it's ok to hear that's all I don't know about noise cancellation it doesn't do any thing sound quality is good that's all

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best earphone under Rs2000
content: Superb wireless earphones under 2k. Pros: Super fast charging. Charges completely in 15mins. Good Battery life. Sound quality is good. Low latency while gaming. Comfortable to wear. Fast pairing & conectivity. Con: Low Bass

name: Shashank
title: Ok wireless headset with good backup
content: This does not works with MS teams. It just confuses. The battery backup is very good. Sound quality is ok you cannot call it bad. Little overpriced for what it offers

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disappointed due to false descriptions!!
