content: If you look for switching between your laptop and Mobile, this one will definitely not gonna help you. You have to switch it manually, since there is no switch or options available, false commitment from one plus. Disappointed!!. Remaining product descriptions are fine.

name: Md I.
title: Worth for money
content: Packing was good.. Product delivered in good condition.. Headphone is best under 2k with one plus branding.. Sound is also best .. Fitting in ear is good.. Bass is super.. Noise cancellation is somewhat less than expected.. The product is quite good.. You can buy this product without any confusion.

name: CN
title: Below average sound quality!
content: Returned the product after using it for a couple of days. Its only for taking calls. The sound quality is below average... similar to cheap wired headphones that cost around 500/-

name: Amazon Customer
title: I wouldn't recommend it due to disturbance through out the call
content: Just received it today.. Don't buy it, disturbance through out the call.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Well worth the price
content: Very good packaging according to price and premium build quality.Sound quality is balanced as expected.Battery life is best in the segment,you need not worry about charging it often.This earphone has a balanced output not like other earphones which has overpowering base .So we can plug in the earphone and enjoy audio for a longer durations comfortably👍

name: Fahad_bichu
title: BEST IN CLASS , MUST READ
content: Best sound quality , great for Playing pubg , auto connects when when buds are pulled from magnet , super fast connection ,. Highlight is battery , I havent charges the headphone till now , still 80% battery , i played music and pubg for around 6hr now , still 80% left , thanks to oneplus for bringing such great earphones. Only thing i didnt like is length of the earphone

name: Shailesh Rathod
title: Mic For Voice Call Quality Very Lower
content: Mic For Voice Call Quality Very Lower. When launching a new product comoany should make it a little better than the old product instead of just focusing on making comoany cheaper

name: himanshu
title: Best in this range
content: Best in this range.. Sound 5/5. Comfort 5/5. Design 5/5. Connectivity 5/5

name: Raghav Sharma
title: Extremely recommended
content: Sound quality is good. Bass is better then previous generation. Battery is good but not best. Thanku amazon and oneplus for this amazing product. Amazon always provide best service

name: DEB KUMAR SUR
title: Good quality, Worst Service
content: Made in China. But quality good. Although Service very poor . In USB mode , audio not working. Complained to AMAZON , ONIDA(MICR) , Consumer forum. But no solution given yet.

name: Shailen
title: A very good product, must buy without fears, if happy with ltd BASS.
content: Hi,. Really appreciate ONE PLUS for mftg such a smart product.. The sound quality is excellent. NC works good due to vacuum ear buds.. Bass quality could have been improved, but it's okay, not bad even at this cost, hence giving 4 star. 1+ brand is having a very good credibility in the market, hence bought this product. Thanks Amazon for faster delivery, really appreciate.

name: satishkrishna gubbala
title: Perfect for talkatives.
content: Previously i used OnePlus bullets wireless 2. Honestly it is a bit replica but only in build aspects and sound output/quality is fine. For calling its very convenient. One in a nutshell its a budget bullets 2.

name: Ashish
title: Charge 10 minutes and lasts 10 hours.  Very good product
content: Charge 10 minutes and lasts 10 hours. Very good product. I liked it very much. Its voice is also very clear and there is no problem in it. all very well. Calling is also very good. Mike is also a very good product thanking you for Amazon for delivering such products.

name: Pank
title: Bullets wireless z getting disconnected when on call
content: I have been using this headset continuously for 1 week and observed that it's disconnecting while you are on a normal call or WhatsApp call.. I have tried different options to fix this but the issue still persists.. So please don't buy this headset, yo can go for the boat at least they will have good bass and noise cancellation and frequent.

name: Loganathan Kasi
title: No one speak about noise cancellation
content: I have used OnePlus wireless bullets which costed me 4k that I have used for around 1 and half years. Unknowingly my nephew damaged it and right earbud stopped working so I bot this one. Honestly Z has better bass. Noise cancellation in wireless bullets is really poor and OnePlus has improved that in Z.

name: SPKM
title: Best in Class
content: One of the best blueooth earphones i brought. Sound quality, overall, is excellent. It can handle bass and treble with obsolute ease. I've tried different frequencies on my audio player equalizer settings to see how it sounds and I am quite satisfied with it. It all depends on your audio settings after all.

name: Somya raj sinha
title: A great wireless earphone under 2000 rs.
content: Great for oneplus devices. Pairing with phone is an ease. Liked the battery life of this earphones. A perfect fit to ears. Great sound quality in this price range. A little low bass compared to other earphones but clarity is assured. Little lag while gaming (Pubg) but less than other wireless earphones.. Overall a great product under 2000 rs.

name: Darshita P.
title: Good one!
content: Sound quality is very good,noise cancellation is not that much good.. Bass quality is level, neither too much high nor too low. If you guys need more battery life then please go ahead with this. You can easily talk while riding bike, the person can clearly hear you if you are in croud also. This is an amazing product and i got it in time. Thank you one+ & flipkart.

name: Surendra Singh
title: Poor built quality, Expensive
content: The product was delivered on 23 May 2020 but its mic stopped working on 15 July 2020. I use it for running but it can't handle sweat and the volume keeps on increasing/decreasing automatically. I regret to purchase it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: User friendly, excellent product.
content: Works very well especially the way it can connect with magnetic control to OnePlus 7.. Switching between devices is so easy with press of a botton.. Charging is fast, excellent battery life of 20 hours.. Sound quality is good. Bass quality is average.

name: BiskaRak
title: Really it's not worthy!!! It's very much big to years
content: It's not that much worth product! It's really a big one to years!!!. It causes ear pain on continues usage where no reviewer told us!!. Hate this one when compared to sony!!

name: Zeba
title: Oneplus wirless z bass edition
content: Great job one plus with the wireless bass edition.. i am a bass person and for bass lover you should definable go for this product .. i am using iphone 7 plus and the sound is awesome better than regular wireless z model.. i am a gamer .. Game latency is awesome you cant differentiate.. my opinion go for this if you are a bass lover.

name: SS
title: Good product, if price around ₹1500
content: As reviewed by many, quality of sound is good. Noise cancellation is also good. But bass is low and when you remove the magnet the music doesn't play.. No warranty card is there inside the box. I don't see the registration is available for it in online also.

name: Chandan
title: Laptop connectivity is not good
content: In the Box: I didn't got any usb cable, no extra silicon earbuds, not loud or premium sound when connected with Dell laptop.. Since the pack was seal with plastic coated but no extra buds and no c-type usb was present in the box.. May be amazon delivered me a morphed product or One Plus has this worst sound quality (when connected with laptop).

name: Raseel
title: Read it full you can get an idea😅
content: Noice cancellation is not good the person your are calling can hear background voices loudly than your speaking wtf is that i dont know. The second major prblm is this ear buds was very cheap quality you can see my pictures of that after 1mnth use this happend cheap build quality only 1 advantage is this battery backup i am a continues user it gives 1.5 day easily

name: Rene
title: Not for small ears
content: Decent inear headphones. Noise cancellation is horrible when talking over the phone on a call. Not meant for small ears. Even the smallest size doesn't fit well in small ears. However the easy use of this headset is good. The quick switch is a scam . Rarely works. Mic doesn't work for voice notes.

name: Anbarasan
title: Base sound waste
content: Everything is awesome except bass sound system, seriously waste ,last time I'm purchased skyfeb Bluetooth 999rs this head phone base awesome and so super comparing to one plus head phone.dont waste of money to this head phone friends.

name: hasibul islam
title: Awesome product. On this price this is the best wireless headphone
content: Awesome product.. On this price this is the best wireless headphone except realme buds.. Awesome bass. Awesome sound quality. Awesome charge service.

name: Apurba Bera
title: Better than expected
content: Suitable for oneplus phone as some of the features really works only with oneplus devices. Sound quality is good not the best. Good for casual and everyday travel. Easy to handle. I should have appreciated if the noise cancellation was also given in it

name: ANKIT SINGAL
title: Amazon has a quick service and product is amazing
content: Sound Quality is too clear and good. Bass is just perfect as no harm to the ears . A decent noise which we expect. Recommended for those who prefer a decent and quite clear Sound . Probably the gamers won't like it.. But I have an amazing experience with OnePlus product. They provide a very reliable products and a great service.

name: Sumit kumar
title: एक ही बात लिखूंगा । लाजवाब लाजवाब लाजवाब
content: मैंने इसको 18 फ़रवरी को 1999 रुपए में खरीदा था और आज 22 को अपना रिव्यू दे रहा हूं । जिस चीज ने मुझे सब से ज्यादा प्रभावित किया है वो है इसकी बैटरी लाइफ। बहुत अच्छा ब्लूटूथ है । साउंड भी अच्छा है । बेस भी अच्छा है । बिना किसी झिझक के आप इसे खरीद सकते है । आपको निराशा हाथ नहीं लगेगी । जाइए और बिना किसी झिझक के खरीद लीजिए

name: Meghna251
title: Not for music
content: Excellent battery life. Can switch between two devices, which is great. But not so good for music listening as the sound quality is really bad.

name: Rushikesh Dhondge
title: Battery backup decreased
content: The earphones are a good choice overall sound is good battery backup also too good. But suddenly after 9 months of purchase my earphones' battery backup has reduced to merely some hours initially I used charge the earphones once in 3 4 days now I have to charge daily and that too doesn't last long so sad 😔 and disappointing by oneplus product

name: sumit bhandari
title: Very Heavy
content: Sound and other feature are gud. Its working across walls and good noise quality.. For me , Problem is subjective.. Its very heavy as compared to my super light Skull candy InkD plus

name: Sagar Gaikwad
title: Both have some Pro & Cons
content: Sound Quality - Normal Edition ✓. Battery Life - Normal Edition ✓ ( 3 hrs More). Bass - Bass Edition ✓ ( excellent performance ). Connectivity - Both are really Good ( Easy & Fast ). Microphone - Both edition do well but Normal Edition did great job ( Normal edition ✓). Quick Switch - Only available in Normal Edition ✓. Magentic Control - Save battery

name: Sureshkumar
title: Poor quality (Chaina).
content: While connecting a voice call via bluetooth headset not reach even one metre.. Worst bluetooth caverage.. Worst Voice call sound quality.. Always Chaina product are poor quality.

name: saurabh verma
title: Sound quality is not good and not fits in my ear. They should provide small ear tips also
content: Sound quality is not soft. Its deliver very hard music. If i want to rate. I will give 3 for sound. And 0 for bass. However its bettry life is good. Fast charging is good. Light weight. And other features are good as music or video paused with magnetic stuff.. Moreover its not fits in my ears and causing pain.

name: Munna Kumar
title: Value for Money !!!
content: Simply i would like to say, it's Superb product.. Great sound & bass quality with advantages of noise cancelation.. Well designed, comfort ear buds, nice look & well packing.. If you want to spend 2000 for Earphone then go for it.. But it's a Chinese product, i wish we will start making product better than this soon.. Except it's a Chinese product, it's awesome.

name: Avinash
title: Best of all, better than all other
content: You may easily get any other product in range of 1500 bucks, but you can't compare this with anyone.. Battery back is fabulous minimum 5 days and it hardly require 5 to 10 min charge to use for one day. Superior quality from One+

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best earphone under 3000
content: Works best with OnePlus device.. Except for bass everything is great about these earphones .. Battery life is best in its class .. Range is very good.. Weight is lite, after 2-3 days of use you won't even feel them on your neck .

name: Salman Arif Shaikh
title: Truely Inspired
content: I preferred OnePlus as have 7T and it's a great product truely exceeded my expectations. Battery life is amazing. Sound quality is excellent while on calls. Enjoyed lots of movies and bass quality is also good. It eliminates good portion of noise and able to concentrate well. Overall very Happy to have this.

name: Nikhil C.
title: Not Worth It !!!!
content: I have purchased this 2 days ago before that I was using boat rockerz 400... The Technology in this is insane but for Base lover this OnePlus wireless doesn't suit because the bass was little bit on the lower side... spending 2000rs on this product is nt worth it... I have watched lots of movies with this but it doesn't give you that feel!!. 3 star is more enough for this product ✌️...

name: akshay rattan
title: Great product
content: After using bullets wireless 1 and bullet wireless 2 bought wireless Z.. It is cheapest offering by OnePlus and surely value for money. Althoughy sound quality is better in the other two but considering price difference wireless Z are great. Would highly recommend

name: Gowtham Kumar
title: Poor sound quality
content: Maxout volume is very lower than expected, bass is not that punchy, Quality of sound could be much better. Don't know exact problem is it with my device or every device is same. By the time I get a chance to use it properly its out of replacement time for so.. just using it as is.

name: Vikas Choudhary
title: Don’t go for this if you are music lover
content: Sounds quality is not good, totally bass less. Only trebles sounds is too much which is irritating. If you are music lover so don’t go for this. Also calling sound is not too good

name: sompalli.hari
title: Nice product
content: Sound quality - superb. Bass - ok. Built quality - good. Battery backup- extraordinary. 10 minutes = 10 hrs ( atleast you will get 8 to 9 hrs) note : in some reviews they told it can be charged by any charger for fast charging but it is not correct I am using my redmi note 8 charger 18 watts it took nerly 45 minutes for full charge but for me it's not a issue.

name: ABHIKESHWAR ARUN KUMAR
title: The selling point is the battery life and fast charging
content: Build quality and fit is great. It is expected from OnePlus. Battery life and fast charging is really good. Battery lasts all day. Sound quality is decent. Not bass heavy like many people want. Sound is balanced and loudness is decent.. Strongest selling point is the exceptional battery , fast charging and build quality.

name: Ajay kumar
title: Sound is Good But Bluetooth connection is breaking automatic time to time
content: verything is ok like sound and bass but sometimes mic is not working properly and maximum time when i am using earphone with bluetooth connection and WiFi for internet same time then automatically connection break with net connection.

name: Vinod K.
title: Good for calling but not for music and regular use
content: Good for calling purpose.. battery backup excellent and fast charge feature is also an advantage. Sound quality is also good but not for music lovers. I feel uncomfortable for wearing it for long time as thick rubber strip do impact on neck after few hours, good for collars shirt.. Okay product as compared to quality but weight is more as compared to Sony 200..

name: Dineshkumar
title: Was my product original or duplicate?
content: I bought this product and when I unboxing it I just noticed there is no "Never settle" print inside the box. I saw in YouTube unboxing about this product it is there, but it is missing in my box is it original or duplicate? Also I faced few lag in volume and play/pause control. Then I have decided to return this product.

name: Venkatesh
title: OnePlus always rocks
content: Amazon delivery system is amazing...I am in rural area,. Within 3 days I got the product.. Sound is Cristal clear.... I am using this headset for pubg gaming.... There is no sound lag for my device in fanatic mode...I am using OnePlus 7t.. There is some decent bass is available.... Charging speed is awesome..I charged via warp charger. just 10 mins I get 7 hours playback...

name: Hemanth kumar ch
title: Average quality
content: Sound quality is good but noise cancellation and bass quality is below average.

name: Shri
title: Go for it
content: Its very good, served my purpose.. (Little heavy at mid). If they provide some application or display on earphone. It would be nice.

name: bunty
title: An 3/5 product
content: The Bass is excellent and The buttons of the product is not that Good. And somewhere I felt its expensive band.. Charging is not That Great in a Typical Day.

name: Om prakah kharbanda
title: Don't buy these earphones!!!!
content: It is only brand name ,not worthy to buy these earphones.Poor sound quality ,it sounds like no signal sounds on tv . One plus is a big brand but I got a earphone that is worst than Rs.100 earphones.

name: H R
title: Really Amazing
content: Really Amazing in this price....duel phone connection feture is really i like it...built quality is good... connection is very good....and u use oneplus so no onther option think...

name: Prathmesh N
title: VFM and Long Lasting with Minimal Charge Time. Good for Games, Calls and Movies.
content: Bass is Thumping, but Reverberation Resonance is a bit off and has to be fine-tuned via OnePlus EQ. Using it on OnePlus 7 Pro and audio delay is negligible with games like Pubg and Call of Duty. Watching movies with the device connected to Wireless Z sometimes needs change of HW/HW+ acceleration on MX player. Otherwise Good. Not Excellent. But Perfect for VFM.

name: Unknown
title: Go for it 👍
content: Using it with laptop and OnePlus 7 Pro, it's super awesome, bass quality is great . Battery backup insane, I mean I charge it for 10 mins and boooooooooom, lasts for hours....

name: Shikhar G
title: Good buy
content: I like the neck band than air pods because they hand in your neck and minimal chances to lose them.. These areas amazing. Runs for atleast 2-3 days on frequent use.

name: Mithun.M.Biju
title: Good product
content: The quality of the product is amazing and there is a little bit problem in playing some kind of auido. Other wise the product is awesome fast charging is better and you will need lots of to drain the battery. Awsome product.

name: Swapnajeet Nayak
title: Best Budget Earphone♥️
content: Best wireless earphone you can get for the price range. I was concern about the mic but I was shock how good it's mic is. Bass quality is quite good. And has a very loud speaker too. It has the most amazing battery. 10hour battery life in just 10min no hoax. Just go for it you won't regret.

name: Amazon Customer
title: I am very happy with the OnePlus Bullets Earphones
content: In the past I have used so many earphone both wired and wireless - Mi, RealMe, House of Marley, BoAt, Sony wireless earphones, etc. Every earphone has some or the other issues. But with OnePlus I didn't face any of such issues so far. The charge time is very less and it lasts really longer.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Honest review
content: Previously i am using realme buds 2. But this is better than those not best. Bcz realme buds 2 are loud after 80% volume it annoying for my ears. Battery life is lit continuously 10 songs still 60% remaining

name: Chitranjan kumar
title: Must buy in 2k range💪💪
content: Don't mind others brand, I buy today its best in my experience, roughly use there is no any pblm I am tooo happy to use oneplus headphone. Main advantage :. 1: battery backup is must dangers after full use in day I notice battery is not drop.. 2: suggest for those who love lone battery life after once charge. 3: sound is superve, no any daubt

name: Yogesh
title: Not for gamer and music lovers
content: Inspite of body design and battery life there is nothing you will like.. You can get good headset cheaper than its price.. Firstly I had high expectation with oneplus product (phones). poor bass quality not for music lovers and watching movie. Audio latency in gaming (pubg). But thanks to amazon its not too late so i m going to return it.

name: Jyothish
title: Good one
content: It's good one, but I didn't feel it's for 1999. Decent sound quality, but Bass is poor. Bluetooth connectivity is not much good.. Great battery life. Totally it's good one. 7/10

name: Dhaval pankhaniya
title: Worst ip55 ever i have payed re.2000 for this.
content: Everything is good not excellent but it's worst on ip55 part my left side speaker along mic and buttons are not working now due to some rain only some rain i can't believe my 2000 re. Are gone. Well played oneplus with ip55 huge applause for you i just got on 28/07 and its stop working after 10 days. ip55 god damn.

name: Mohammed Shaad
title: Better than Boatcrockerz 335 and very good
content: Sound quality is good. Heard better than this but the bass is fabulous. Ease of access and use is superb. The quick on/off is very helpful. Great battery and nice charging speed. Many people are saying that it isn't too loud and stuff but I thought it was very loud and ic u have Dolby atmos in ur phone it's a sweet combination.

name: Kunwar Shekhar Singh
title: Best wireless neck band earphones for 2k
content: After listening to bullet wireless 2 I was not expecting these too be this good. I had used realme wireless earphones and I didn't like them also they are using old micro USB. These fullfilled all the basic requirements I had.. Battry life ✅. Fast charge ✅. Long range ✅. Good bass ✅. Light weight ✅. USB C ✅

name: Kevin Malde
title: Better features and Balanced audio
content: Well most of you will be comparing to realme buds.. I have used them both.. The build quality on realme is better.. And the bass and the thump effect is better in realme.. But for the rest of the features.. Like balance audio output.. Quick charging.. And mode switch between two devices makes one plus and edge

name: Abhay
title: Amazing Earphones under 2K!!!
content: Its a stunning piece of hardware and delivers a value for money experience.. Has a great sound quality with brilliant noise cancellation. Its an absolute steal for 2k. I have a Sennheiser Momentum too and these earphones have a similar quality. Bass is really good too but could have been a little better deoth to it.

name: Md Shahbaz khan
title: Worst charging
content: Sometimes bluetooth works and sometimes it will not connect after 1 hour it works initially u have to charge 10 mins and use upto 10 hours but after a month u need to charge as normal earphones i feel so bad for this product my investment is waste for this product i suggest not to buy this product go for realme buds its much better than that.. Disgusting

name: Ovais Hakak
title: Productive and Worth
content: The product is worth to price, sound quality & bass is very productive but noise cancellation is liitle dull - i have been using it for multiple purpose like gyming, walking, functional workout, etc which is very compatible because the neck band sticks with the neck which i have not seen with other products. I would give overall rate on this product 4.2-4.5.

name: Anandhu
title: Kollam powli sanam......💥
content: From these reviews the mic complaint is common .I too have this same issue with mic, it's not working . So everyone should check the mic quality too .when you got the product check the sound quality and mic quality, Is there any issues replace the order because the replaced one I got from one plus is too good ❣️so check it and make sure that the mic is working good or not

name: agrim aggarwal
title: Must buy allrounder low budget BT earphones
content: Sound is very clear for both music and calls. Bass is pretty good for Bluetooth earphones, don't expect the kind of thumping bass you find in Sony or Jbl. I've been using these continously for a couple of days without any ear fatigue and still left with 30% battery. Overall it's a steal at 2000 rupees

name: Mann r.
title: Oneplus did it this time!!!!!
content: Ordered yesterday.... received today.... quite a delivery ha!!!!!! BTW earphones are hands down best in this price range just noise cancellation is not best...still good and pubg latency is good if you have bt 5.0 above device and if oneplus device than no problems at all....if buying for music listening than thry are best and above all battery and charging speed is damn....

name: B.N. Rout
title: No quick switch button , its clearly cheating with customer
content: Oneplus relly dissapointed me their specifications say it has quick switch option but in the earphone it is not present , this is a total cheating with the customer by oneplus ,the play and pause button also sometimes doesn't work and many times there is a lots of latency in tge response. Not worth the money and feeling cheated

name: SUSANTA KAR
title: Best products
content: Guys the best earphone I have ever bought that this rage and it's really good for pubg the foot steps are really clear and the bass is not that good but I listen to slient music and it's really good. Go for it guys. And battery I will say I got it yesterday and haven't charged it yet and it's still 60%. Really love the product and go for it guys

name: Ganesh kumar
title: Just go for it....
content: Awesome product at this price range.... I tried 3 bluetooth earphones before this one... But not one of them match this.... Amazing battery and light weight.....

name: Souvik
title: Good Product
content: Hi All, I brought this product after discussing it with friends and checked the reviews on Youtube & Amazon etc.. Overall nice product.. The switch option between devices is very good & fast.. The sound is good. The earbuds are comfortable for long use too.(6-8 hrs).. The best thing I liked is the battery life & fast charging.. Overall Paisa vasool.

name: One plus 5 user
title: OnePlus at its best.
content: Overall it's good wireless earpiece by OnePlus with a price tag of Rs.1999, but the bass and sound quality can be maximised at this price point. I'm satisfied with the quality, material & overall product.

name: garima
title: good product
content: its a very good product. Good quality, light weight, easy to carry, good sound quality, charges very fat, lasts long. i think at this price this is the best that one can purchase. No complains at all. im writing a review after using for almost 4 months now.

name: Sahil
title: Worth it!!
content: Sound quality is great, bass could have been more better.. Connectivity is easy and quick and the magnetic feature to turn off is cool.. 10/10 for battery life it really lasts up to 20 hours and it takes around 20 mins to charge fully.. I have only one issue with the design that the earplugs feels bit long.. Overall it's a 10/8.5 product totally worth it.

name: vijay
title: Very bad design and bad bass
content: Bad bass experience. I dont know name mention in bass edition. But no bass. Audio is clear only but no bass.. Wire is too short.. No prober water proofing.. Finally i say dont buy this one. Very bad experience from oneplus. I am really disappointed with my first oneplus product...

name: ankit Kolte
title: Not up to the mark, technically flawed.
content: Not up to the mark. it's not possible to connect to it while a call is ongoing.. There are technical issues with one pluse bullet wireless, it gets automatically disconnected while using.. Another problem is while using it on Microsoft teams it gets disconnected automatically.

name: Sudhanshu Vishwakarma
title: Mind blowing purchase❤️
content: Superb purchase ❤️❤️. Talking about the sound quality - it is phenomenal. Bass is neither too much nor too less - good for people who don't like deep. Base and want the good quality music. Build quality - Good. Note - if you are a deep base lover plzz don't go for this. Just received the package today , Will update further using some days

name: Zainab
title: Not as expected but awesome for oneplus users
content: I dont why people say that its bass quality is average. I found it very good.. Cons-. 1. Latency issue which was claimed is least in oneplus z is almost same as other brands (i have boAt rockerz). 2. Where are the extra earbuds? It was not included in my package.. Are you giving me the used product, Amazon??

name: Sid
title: Slightly below average.
content: Sound quality is okay and you get almost no noise cancellation with minimum bass. If you want to show off by purchasing a one plus product, go for it, but if you're an audiophile, this one's not for you buddy.

name: Swapnil
title: Revising my rating because of pairing issues.
content: Having annoying pairing issues intermittently. I'm using it with my One plus 7 pro and every once in a while when I detach the magnets it should connect and switch to the bluetooth audio automatically but it doesn't. I need to restart my phone to get it to connect again.. 😠

name: Amazon Customer
title: If u have the cash, buy it.
content: Being of a successful brand ensures it's quality. That much said, it's the best in wireless range in this price.. Fast charging. Crystal clear calls. Perfect for music lovers (Low on bass though). During PUBG it may lag for some days but eventually it accomodate paradoxically.😁

name: Venkatesh j
title: Very worst quality!!!
content: Very worst quality and works like a local product.Noice cancellation is just for name sake,Sound and bass quality is not worth for this price.We can get a local brands for Rs.300 for this quality!!!

name: Amazon Customer
title: All essential product needs are met*
content: The most complete package at this price, sound is perfectly balanced and the thump is good. Some guys complain abt bass, but its very well maintained,. If i hav to giv Ratings-. Sound quality- 9.5/10. Bass 9/10. Bluetooth connection and switching 10/10. Fast charging n battery 11/10 :P. Confort- 9/10. Built 9.5/10

name: danish ansari
title: Review based on Utility
content: If you are purchasing it for attending calls or for educational point of view its good since its gives you good battery back upp of 17-18 hrs in one charge ....but if you are a music lover its not at all a good choice ...bass is missing not upti the mark while vocals are clear but it could have been more better.

name: Rahul W.
title: Worst Ecom courier bhiwandi opening packing of product and worst wireless earphones...
content: First thing, delivered product package was opened Ecom courier services bhiwandi is worst opened the packing this happened first time in 2 years, it's mic is worst, while using can't reach to other end of the on going call... No bass not good for gaming, no noise cancellation... Waste of money...I'll suggest go for some other than this one...

name: mr_amaan
title: Amazing.. worth the money..
content: Amazing product. Before it I was using MI bluetooth. That time I bothered for charging again and again. But, this one plus bullets charged in 10 minutes and gives 10 hours of battery backup. Once you full charged it, you hardly need to charge after 3-4 days. Sound quality is good but not pretty good and you need to remember the price. I think, under 3K.. this is the best.

name: Amazon Customer
title: One month experience
content: Noise cancellation is very bad in this earpiece instead of the other person's voice you can listen to all other surrounding sounds.. Overall quality is good of this product.. And when ever you are on vehicle like bike this earphone is so lite that it keeps floating if you are in speed.. This experience I am sharing after using this for a month

name: viretha
title: Happy with the purchase
content: The sound quality is awesome... value for money.. Writing the review after using it for 5 months. On one side the earphones, there is a breakout. The wires within are visible. Didnot expect this from OnePlus brand.

name: Anjinesh
title: Battery sucks
content: See I am satisfied with this product but I want to share my experience with it's cons. 1.bass is not that powerful. 2.battery disappoints because my old headphone had 12 hrs battery life and this one has 17hrs but it's not.. It seemed that 12hrs was like 1 week. But 17 hrs is 2 days. So quite disappointed by battery life

name: Madhu G
title: Very good product
content: Very very good for pro users, I'm using head set for a week with single charge and that to super responsive nature from headset. U can buy it without having doubt. It is more than value for money.

name: Prasant B.
title: Sound Output was Great but I Hardly Used It For 15 a days.
content: The Product WAS good. I Purchased this Item On 24th Nov but All Of Sudden Right Hand Side Earbuds Was Not working Properly means The Sound Automatically down But at The Same Tym Left Side sound Out put was Good. TODAY ON dated 08.12.20 this Earphone Makes Me Sad Becuz Of This Problm. And I Found No Return policy Also provided By The seller.

name: Sanchit Singh
title: The Perfect One
content: Well, truly Oneplus Bullets Wireless Z is the perfect one's bluetooth earphones. Well I read a lots of bad comments, reviews, but trust me guys, They are perfect. It feels premium in your hands. Good to Go, :)

name: Captain Planet
title: Too good best bluetooth headphone under 2000
content: Build quality is very good, after latest software update from OnePlus sound quality improved a lot , bass , highs vocals all are brilliant , best buy for 1999.

name: Georgin Sabu
title: Actually pretty good but not having multiple device support is a bummer
content: The sound quality is good, bass okay, connecting speeds great. But I really miss the multiple device connectivity on Samsung level U. You will have to manually go and pair again and again if you use it between your computer and phone. That's really annoying..But the sound quality is great as well as the battery.

name: SaleeemAmin Ibni Noorul Amin Bhat
title: Genuine and very sophisticated
content: I am totally satisfied... I have been looking for a deal like this i was worried after reading the load of mix mixed comments.... But I still put on a little faith and bought it. It turned out to be better than I expected.

name: AKASH
title: Delivery agent
content: Product is good. But the delivery agent was worst at his conversation with the customer. He was ready to fight. He was telling that he has no fear. His name was Rahul. Kindly take some action against him. It was the worst experience for me from Amazon.

name: Vaisakh s
title: For the quality and duration❤️
content: Highly recommended! Im a oneplus user! Switching between my phone and ipad is just a click away (in earphone) and that's really handy! Quality is topnotch for the price! Best part is charging.just charge for 10mkn and forget it! I charge this very rarley for 2hrs use per day!

name: Ravindra Kumar
title: Totally wastage of money.
content: In the staring it is working fine but after 15 days its mic is not working.. Checked that microphone is working or not... It is working... It is usable when we disable the option of Phone Calls from Bluetooth device settings. But once we enable that option then Microphone is not working. Please don't buy this. totally wastage of money.

name: Aman Upadhyay R
title: Oneplus has posted incorrect information about Quick switch. It doesn't exist.
content: Quick switch does NOT exist. False advertising. I never thought a feature mentioned in the details would be missing from the earphone! I couldn't find this written in the reviews as well.

name: bhawani singh
title: Awesome Charge Backup
content: It's sound quality is really good. Charging time is very fast. Most important thing which I personally liked is battery backup. Design is also awesome.

name: Nagaraj BN
title: Big flop of noise cancellation
content: Elevating background and long distance noise while in call with others. I brought for office use,but totally useful due to end users hearing background noise clearly instead of caller voice

name: Praveen
title: Call switch option is a pathbreaking feature
content: It's the best product and value for money. Audio is so clear bass is just amazing. I cannot ask anything beyond. One of the nextgen thought based feature is you can switch between the last device which was used. This feature is making WFH easy I switch between my work calls and mobile calls with a single click.

name: MA
title: Fake product??
content: Had to return the product twice.. first time the product was not switching on after charging. Also its said that the product comes with 100% charge but it didn't stay even for 8 hours. Second time the bluetooth range was really low. Both times the logo 'Never Settle' was missing.

name: Niharika Singh
title: Not for everyone
content: If u want it for good music experience,do not buy it ,the bass quality is very bad the only good thing about is the 🔋 battery.. Low latency mode does not even work with iphones it only works with oneplus devices but still there r recognisable lag during pubg sessions.

name: Shishir Chamoli
title: Good purchase
content: Sound Quality is very good.. Mike is also good as long as you are not driving a two wheeler. While driving, the other person hears other sounds as well

name: Dhritiman Das
title: Review after 2 months about sound quality
content: The sound quality is fair enough. But there is not much bass, not recommended for hip hop listeners, noise cancellation is very good. And it is also very good to play pub g with. Battery life is the best. Best in this range

name: Deepkapi
title: Ear piece broke and poor Sound & Mic. Quality.
content: I brought this a month back, the sound quality and Mic. Quality is very poor. Opposite person cannot hear you if you speak normally and the mic has to taken close to your mouth or speak louder to hear what you say. Also the product is not durable, it broke and the earpiece got separate while wearing the earpiece. This is Pathetic and full waste of money.

name: Gayatri
title: Amazing !
content: Sound quality -10/10. Connectivity-10/10. Bass-8/10. Rest the design is amazing ! Go for it ! 😁. But it's not suitable for playing pubg !

name: GABBAR
title: BEST IN CLASS
content: Best in class. Very balanced sound quality. Much better then boat rokerz and realme buds.. Worth of money. Wrap charge worked execllent.. Got more then 18 hrs of battery backup.. Very smood finish and super flexible.

name: Nitin Pathak
title: Premium quality and Premium packaging
content: The Product looks like a premium one..It has a very good sound quality and also has a very quick charge....The packaging also looks premium...Satisfied with the price and product!!!!

name: True Alpha
title: Unboxing
content: Well, battery did not come with any charge and as they claim in many reviews that it comes with 75 percent charge, mine came with empty battery!! Will update once i use it for couple of days

name: ashp
title: An ok purchase
content: The ear pieces aren't as comfortable as I'd have liked them to be. Hurts ears after four-five hours of use. The blinking blue light just doesn't turn off during use, which is quite annoying especially in a dark room! Sound quality wise, quite good!

name: Hardik
title: Unbelievable battery, clear sound, good mic.
content: Battery is epic, unvelievable, which is the main problem with bluetooth earphones. Sound is very clear which you won't get if there is a lot of bass. Mic is really good which is my top priority.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome Product! Expected no less from Oneplus!!
content: It is very especially for people who are buying it to listen to music. Superb bass, superb noice cancellation, superb sound quality and superb sizes of the buds. It is very to take off and put new buds. Its sound quality beats JBL. It know as I have used JBL C50 HI and this is way better. Awesome product I recommend it strongly.

name: Vivek kumar
title: Sound quality is bad . Not a good.
content: Mony west this product purches.. Sound quality is bad not is good.. This product made in China.. Yes this products also bad because off made in china .. So I requested for all Indian do not purchase this product for made in china .

name: Annavaram
title: Not Working Properly
content: I don't know what to comment on this product within 1.5 month of purchase it's not working properly.. When I am on call most of them complains the voice is not clear I tried connecting other devices same problem.. I don't know exactly what is the problem and whom to contact hence raising the issue here so that someone can help me out.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best one ..for everyone
content: Sound quality is good and battery backup I can't say anything...better then all available bluetooths in online or offline..bass ok not good its above average..noise collection is good...worthy product I you want long life product please go with this and quality also good ..overall nice ..I am giving 5 out of 5

name: Nilesh garasiya
title: Connectivity ptoblem
content: Everything is good abt this product ! Sound quality is damn ! Bettery back-up also amezing ! But major problem what I'm facing is it gets disconnected automatically while u r on call ! Or watching videos ! And I'm tottaly dissapointed with this ! Connectivity is very very poor ! I requested for replace this but now it's not even showing return option !!

name: amol
title: Value for Money!
content: Nice ones. Work perfectly for me to attend meetings from laptop.Mic clarity is good and works perfectly. Buyed this more for wireless headphone to use during long meetings and does the job quite good.

name: KnockOut
title: Good & convenient for calls,  not so much for music.
content: Convenient features and quite good bluetooth range. Works well for phone calls. Not satisfactory for listening to music (my previous one was a wired Soundmagic E10C)

name: Deepak
title: I didn't find any warranty card/details in the packaging
content: I have ordered the product on 9th July and received on 19th July. Nothing I have found related to warranty. Don't even know about the warranty period

name: Anzus
title: NOTE !!!!
content: If you can't see the charging cable and extra buds, open both ends of the accessory box and you'll find them. I almost complained for not having them but then I checked a little further.

name: kamal
title: Money worthy
content: Well at first the sound quality is awesome. Bass is balanced but not too loud. Those who love the bass, this earphone is not for you. The battery back is quite awesome. There some problm with the earplugs as its will irritate your ears if u wear it for long time. Overall i would rate 3.8 out of 5 . On my final words this earset worth money according to its price

name: akki
title: Must buy..
content: Overall sound quantity is best every detail clearly delivered..best in neck Bluetooth headphone..but one thing for bass lovers it might dispointing..but itz not big issue after day use you can't adjust with it.. battery backup is top level..

name: abhisek.m
title: DONOT buy if your requirement is for calls and meetings
content: Its very frustrating to use the mic for calls - needs to be constantly positioned and even then its inaudible to the receiver - this is a glaring problem and quiet embarrassing to be honest - what's the point of having other so called "cool" features (warp charge, quick connect) if the basic functionality itself is flawed.

name: Virender singh
title: Sound quality decent, bass and connectivity not so
content: The built quality is good, sound is decent. Bass is not great. The biggest problem I faced is connectivity issue with this. The sound on call was not good because of this connectivity issue.. Overall built quality is goof. Battery and sound quality is decent. Bass and connectivity not up to the mark

name: aditya singh
title: Review
content: Loved it what a complete packaage it h as better bass than headphones i have used sony and jbl headphones but i have found this one different . Bass quality is superb it is worth of rupees 2000 .i totally recommend it

name: Rahul Manohar
title: Best bluetooth headset
content: I had second thoughts by watching various reviews. But once I started using, all the negative rumours were crushed. The headset is worth money and has good battery capacity. The switch option within two device is the master stroke. I just love it.

name: Vishal S
title: OnePlus y did u do this,
content: It's feature packed, but what's catchy is the unforgivable use of cheap plastic on ear case too🤦, n made in china add tag of worse,. Previously I was using realme wireless buds,n it was of finest build quality n best segment sound delivery, but it lacked feature, so buy OnePlus wireless Z only if u have OnePlus device

name: Came
title: This earphone is wow😚👌😍
content: Oh my god...this earphone 🤩😍I just love it....itz connectivity, sound quality, noise cancellation,base quality and band which is staying in neck of earphone is really good and awesome. And specifically battery power is...just omg👌 I totally loved it....my 1st experience is this and was the best experience.

name: Dinesh Sharaf
title: Good quality product
content: Purchased this primarily for calls. It serves the purpose well. Even the quality of sound from both calling and receiving side is really good. Read few review that the call quality is not good but I didn't face any issues in that.. Battery life is awesome. Overall I'm happy with the purchase.

name: Basha Shaik
title: Best in-ear earphones under 2k...!!!
content: Charging time is very less if you are having OnePlus Warp Charger.. Sound Quality is good and Mic is working welll.. Battery is also great, it can easily lasts 20hours with fullcharge and moderate usage. Quick pairing, double press to change the device when paired with multiple devices. As always Amazon's delivery was fast and quality is good.

name: Apoorva
title: A good purchase. Have been using for 2 weeks
content: Good for wfh during covid times, good battery life, fast charging is a boon, does not come out while running, sound quality is good. Can't complain. I'm not too techie so there might be some issues that I'm not aware of, but it works well for me so I'll definitely recommend it.

name: Shahrukh
title: Nice product
content: Sound quality is very good but the bass quality is poor. Little bit noise cancellation occurred. But it has the battery backup for more than 1 day.

name: Nishant Kamal
title: Just buy it u will not regret (not bass heads)
content: I have been in search of best sounding earphone for a long time. I don't know about bass treble but just wanted to have awesome sound quality. I have wasted 10-15k till now. But at this price point i got this much feature it's crazy. I have bought this earphone for my daily calls but now I use it to hear music as well it's just awesome.

name: Maulin Shah
title: Sound quality and switch on and off system...
content: Amazing sound. And specially switch on and off facility just on connecting magnets is amazing. Beautiful connectivity. Just need to improve response time.. Over all. Worth spending... loved it. Superb product from One plus again...

name: Amitanshu
title: Value for money
content: Overall a decent headphone but really helpful in switching devices coz I use my Laptop and Mobile frequently so it is more helpful in that way.

name: S Pillai
title: Go for boat 355.Dont buy this if u are a music lover.
content: Sound quality compare to Boat 1 star.If you are a music lover dont buy this one.Go for boat.I dont know how can oneplus make a ear phone like this.

name: Suraj kumar
title: Long Battery backup👍
content: Sound quality is very clear and superior,but without bass,if you are bass lover than this is not that type of headphone you wants,noise cancellation is good.new technalogy with megnet control bluetooth connection.thats really nice.

name: sandeep sagar
title: Very uncomfortable. Great battery life and features
content: Very uncomfortable in ears. Ears starts paining within seconds.. Great features and batter life. If you are lucky maybe they will be comfortable for you

name: Tamanna g.
title: Amazing product
content: Just go for it. Amazing battery backcup and connectivity. Sound clarity is superd for online streaming. Seamless connectivity.

name: Dibya
title: Impressive
content: Impressive battery performance. Bass quality is better than I read in pre-buying reviews. Just need to choose the right buds those fit to ur ear size. The crystal clear sound makes it the 1st choice.. But yes if you are looking for a mic which can filter the sound of air like noises then you will hv to compromise here. But I will give it a thumbs up.. Thank you.

name: Pavan konatham
title: Not good as bullets 2 but bass added
content: Good one but in my openion OnePlus bullets 2 is much better than this cause I can hear quality every instrument sound bullets 2 yes bass is not much in bulles 2 but the sound quality was very good you can get bass in bullets Z but not get sound quality as bullets 2

name: Karthik
title: Waterproof and 3 days Juice
content: Sooper good and sweet as it's made with love.. Downside : on high speed ride ( *ride not drive ) heavy hush on other side that does not what you converse.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not a great experience
content: I would have loved to rate the product 4+ star but the usb cable is not working . Its defective piece. But the Bluetooth is working fine as I am using my 1+ mobile charger to charge the Bluetooth. Don't want to return as it took me lot of time to recieve the SKU. Can't take chance with the delivery. Poor delivery system.

name: Rashmi Mardithaya
title: Problem while on calls
content: I had purchased this product as reviews said that this is a good option for making calls. However it picks up a lot of background noise and it is very difficult to speak on the phone. On the other end as well the caller says that they cannot hear clearly. I do not have a oneplus phone so maybe that would make a difference. However it should not be so.

name: velraj
title: Nice product with low bass 🙂😉
content: Nice product, clear vocals, not punchy bass but nice sound delivery, battery backup is just amazing and the charging time also few minutes I am really happy about this product and overall this will be a. good product.

name: Harry James
title: Good buy for the price.
content: Expected a little more considering the brand but it's good for the price. Sound quality is not the best but that could because I'm an audiophile and it just be good enough to all. Build quality, battery backup and everything else is just as promised. Good buy for the price

name: BALAJI A
title: Needs to be improve noise cancellation
content: First time purchased one plus product. I expected more but one plus not fullfilled. Noise cancellation very poor.. Suppose you are in traffic and you are answering the call. Opposite person getting heavy noise.

name: Vipul
title: Good vocal and poor instrumental
content: Good clarity in vocals but very poor instrumental and bass both. Doesn't distort much at high volume but overall puch is missing. Music Sound similar to free earbuds received with budget mobile.. Definitely not a product for music lover. Big big disappointed product from OnePlus.

name: Pruthvi Raj
title: Worst product DO NOT BUY
content: Worked for one month and stoped working suddenly tried multiple tiens for one plus customer support provided couple of troubleshooting steps it works fine for one or two days and issue persists.. Worst product support and worst product. PLEASE DO NKT BUY

name: Chandrasekhar K
title: Really superb
content: I have been using it for almost three months. When these earphones are listening to songs, the vibrations come not only from the body but also from the soul. very awesome product.. But there is no "noise cancellation" in it. Except this everything is good.

name: Vijay N.
title: Worth the money
content: Review after usage of this for a week. Battery life for 2 and half days charged only twice during this week and just 30 min. Sound quality and voice quality awesome. Before this I was using Samsung level u and post 6 months the voice and sound quality dipped drastically so I brought this and loving it

name: chbadari
title: Really worth for your money.
content: The product design is more than the value of the money.The warp charge 30 is promising.Really satisfied with the product.Great work by OnePlus.The battery life is about 18-20 hours.The connectivity with the phone is great.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Cheap chinese product
content: Really a pathetic product from one plis. Didn't expect such cheap quality from ONE PlUs. Volume control button and call receiving button went out of order after one month of use. Don't buy at all. Noise's bluetooth earphones are better. Hopeless chinese product.

name: Chandru Vijay
title: Sound Quality and equalized Bass.
content: Amazon Delivered the parcel just with in a day.. Best in Sound quality,liked the most. High Bass sound will affect the actual music, Perfect balanced bass effect.. Simply superb.... Highly impressed with the Switch On technology. Just separate the ear buds, then within 0.5 seconds your device will be connected.

name: shijo
title: Mic issue
content: Quality of the product is great. i have being using this product past 2mnts. It has the issue of connection it will get disconnected on call without your knowledge. If you reconnect it Mic will not be active and you have to discontinue the call and call again to activate the mic. It's so annoying when you'd drive two-wheeler mainly

name: himanshu garg
title: Battery champion
content: Sound quality is just fabulous,. Trump card of these headphones are its charging and backup. 10mins charge give enough battery life for a day. Bass is little weak. Trick for it :- put phone volume at highest and control rest of the volume with headphones, you'll get ample bass

name: Akash B
title: Excellent option for this segment
content: The sound quality is really nice. The base is on the lower side and doesn't compromise on the quality of music and one gets used to it in a few days. Battery backup is excellent. The quick switch button is quite handy and so is the magnetic lock for power on-off.. Overall an excellent purchase at this price point.

name: vishnu reddy
title: Got defect product two times
content: I have order two times becuase first time got defect piece... Even second time also having some defects.. bluetooth range mentioned 10 meters ..but it connecting/workinh with in 2 meters only ...very tiff to always carry mobile within home when using Bluetooth.... Amazon please help me to get new product...

name: sai krishna
title: Good battery backup... 12hrs
content: Overall, there's not much here to complain about. As far as neckband style goes, the Bullets Wireless Z are a well-designed pair of earphones that look and feel better than other brand

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not a good earphones
content: First of all I would like to say it's a good bluetooth earphones Sound is good at lower volume u also feel nice base effect but the main prob is those people who are searching for calling earphones please ignore this product the other person can't hear properly and within 10days one side stop working I return to Amazon

name: Swathi Santhosh
title: Average product
content: The product is overhyped it doesn't deliver what it says. It's impossible to play pubg in laptop due to the high latency.. If you are think of buying it to play games look somewhere else.. But the sound quality and noise cancellation are on the better side.. Should have noted that before buying this unit.

name: Venki
title: Just go for it!
content: I bought this ear phones just to make calls. The call quality is good and the people on the call can hear you loud and clear. The noise cancellation is not that great but let's not complain as this product just comes for 2k. Sound quality is very good but even I felt the Bass could be improved.. In this price range, this is the best product you can get.

name: Afshad
title: Value for money, excellent quality...
content: Best build quality.......worth 2000rs ...bass is adequate but no so deep... Vocals are sharp and clear.....Instrument separation is bang on...... overall balanced sound not more not less........Battery life is excellent.... connection establishing is fast....... Mic quality is good no complaint.... Definitly my suggestion if you are not into bass..

name: Vikash s.
title: very very low volume
content: After I bought it , it works just fine with fine volume not so loud nor so quit, but almost after four month it's like I'm playing with 5% volume, tried on every device from laptops to android there is same issue don't go for it, I made a big mistake , not any external damage happened till date but suddenly one day it's so quit, I hate this product.

name: Sankaralingam
title: Superb product for dual purpose laptop and mobile.
content: Amazing product for guys who's working with Microsoft teams / any other conference mechanism over laptop. The Bluetooth switch over from mobile to laptop or vice versa option is awesome (double tap button). Battery capacity is high. User-friendly device. Close to 4/5 members procured in a short span. Very great durable product for this money. Thanks

name: jaks
title: Pathetic low quality earphones
content: Buy only if you want to use it in indoors. I used for running and in gym. Within a month it stopped working, due to sweat. So it's not sweat proof. Service centre updated that it can't be covered under warranty.

name: Anik Ghanti
title: Good product from One Plus with moderate price range.
content: Handy & Compact. Very stable and strong Battery life. Bluetooth connectivity is good. We always expect the best products under range from OnePlus but here Sound quality is not up to that level. Simple looks but smart choice.

name: SAJAL BANSAL
title: It's a good earphones in this range.
content: I was looking for a long time to buy a Bluetooth earphone and when I heard about OnePlus launching this I got excited. It was totally in budget and credibility came from Brand of OnePlus.. For 2k, you can totally go for it.

name: praveen kumar
title: If your bass lover go another brand
content: Sound quality is good and bass and noise control compare to another brand it's not better and gaming time the sound not taken in time

name: Prashant Sani
title: Stopped working within 10 days of use. Do not buy this!
content: Although the packaging and delivery was perfect by Amazon, the product stopped working within 10 days of use. The headphones are simply not turning on inspite of being on a full charge.. I would not at all recommend these headphones.. Reaching out to call their customer care. Will update the review in adding in more details in Future.

name: Vivek Kumar
title: Nice
content: Liked:. 1. Sound quality is excellent.. 2. Looks & build quality is awesome.. 3. Battery backup is superb & it charge very quickly.. Disliked:. 1. Never settle is missing in the box.. 2. Sometimes it produces weird sound like beep or like something else.. like low quality earphones.

name: Ajith Joseph
title: Reasonable for oneplus phone users
content: For oneplus users. Inclusion of dash charge is great advantage since we already have dash charger with us.. But the sound and bass is not that great. For 2k is reasonable product. If non-oneplus user, then there are other options

name: Jignesh
title: BAD MIC QUOLITY.
content: Can't hear on call, it stopped working after 10 days. Stopped working on the 11th day. can't hear anything clearly from the receiver's side with bad mic voice quality. I didn't expect this from the top brand OnePlus.. I can't replace it as the return window closed on 11-Dec-2020.. Very disappointed.

name: DANNY
title: beast battery ever
content: bass quality is not good otherwise all going well. battery is long lasting .you never compromise with charging. 3 days in normal calling and music.

name: Chatan
title: Good product for money
content: It is a very a good product in very good substitute for oneplus bullet wireless 2. It has nice bass and sound quality but it has low noise cancellation but its all its ok but this price it is ok and I have used oneplus bullet wireless to this metallic fell where are the wireless z as this plastic fell for this money It's very good.

name: Abhisha
title: PERFECT
content: One of the best product at this price range, Dolby Atmos an surround sound is mind blowing. Just go with it. Product quality is premium royal touchban look.. Easy to handle, u can put this any where 100% flexible.. Bass is lil low we can consider it 95%, however when it comes to Dolby an sorround sound it best that as well.

name: Ritu Mehta
title: Best Quality
content: Can trust this brand any day and it's product always.. Sound system and the new technique of getting switched on n off is just Fabulous. It's a blessing for making my work calls easy.

name: Nabeel Shaikh
title: awesome bullets by OnePlus
content: Built Quality for wireless Z Bass Edition is best under any 2k bluetooth bullets.. Added advantage is its sweat/water resistant with flexible wires.. Sound quality is quite good with smooth and clear BASS. And it has SuperFast charge in 10 mins and use it for 10 hrs, fabulous.. If you have budget under 2k then got for it...

name: Vanlalfela
title: Amazing product
content: I've recieved the product today and i'm very much suprised about the quality of the product, from packing to the quality of the sound it produced. Thanks Amazon for the amazing product, one plus bullet z might be the best bluetooth earphone for a long time..

name: Alak Saha
title: Just awesome
content: After using almost 2 months I can say it is the best earphone u can get at this price range. Battery backup, sound quality, build quality is upto the mark. Great job onepluss

name: Sivaraju
title: Two times received product with battery defect
content: I have purchased the same product 2 times. Every time i got product with battery defect.. like battery percentage is showing always 100 and stopped working.

name: Venkatesh Vanjaku
title: Excellent Latency & Long Delay in Switching Paired Devices
content: I'm using this bullets since more than a month. The product is not all worthy and it has multiple issues. Noise cancellation is something which I haven't experienced with this so far. I can notice high latency for about 3-5 seconds with my laptop and I could see long delay to switch from one paired device to other paired device.

name: Dnyaneshwar Jadhav
title: Noise cancelation, connectivity and battery y
content: Noise cancelation can be improvised. Battery backup and charging time is great. Sometimes you need to manually connect Bluetooth with oneplus device otherwise magnetic control is superb, Go for it.

name: VASUDHA SONDHI
title: Very good earplugs
content: Very practical product. Good sound quality. Even though it's a OnePlus product, I could easily configure it with my Redmi mobile handset.

name: Neel
title: Sound quality not good.
content: Its a great budget neckband its comfortable the design is too good and its feature is too good even battery life is too good it worked for me 10days in a single charge but when it comes in sound quality i think it could have been better the realme wireless neckband which comes in less price then this that sounds too good then this.

name: Anshu singh
title: In a bad condition  pls help me out
content: Sound quality is gradually decreasing and its vey faint to hear the sound so i want the company to take the product back and yes the magnetic buds are very loose now its very hard to handle because it gets seprated its on when it hanged on my neck so pls help me as soon as possible and tell me whom i can claim to amazon or oneplus

name: Reyaz Shaik
title: Best
content: Best in quality with good bass ... I can excellent bass.. Build quality is okay. Best piece than any other device like Samsung's buds plus. I have buds plus too.

name: KMR
title: Superb👌🏻
content: Best wireless earphone within ₹2000 range. Superb voice clarity. Uncomparable battery backup and charging speed. The only defect is that the bass quality is not very high. But it's very good for a normal user.

name: Bhrukuti Patel
title: Should buy
content: Best earphone to invest in, specially its base its amazing, and the feature when you connect the magnets of earphone itself turn off which is a best feature till now and its four months I have bought this product and I haven't used it's on and off button . If you are looking for earphones under 2000 this one is the best option you will ever get

name: KrishnaSai
title: Do not Buy
content: This earphone is not that good as expected.. main reason is battery. If you listen for 1 hour continuously all of a sudden it gets off again we need to charge. Sometimes if we don't use also automatically it will get low in the same day.

name: Kaushik Jha
title: Great product
content: Sound quality is awesome, but if you are a bass lover then this product is not for you , don't get me wrong, bass is their but not punchy base. Battery is A+ , it will last you easily around 16-17 hours . Built quality is also very nice and also support fast charging , i can charge it completely within 50 min from my 30 watt realme charger .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy if you value audio quality at all
content: Audio quality is not adequate or average as most of the reviews will tell you. It's just straight up bad. Maybe these people have some really low standard for sound but if you value sound quality this is unusable. Audio is clear enough for calls and stuff though so if that's the use case go for it. 3 stars because battery life and charging speed are best in class.

name: Padmanabhan
title: Worth product to Buy on 2k below budget
content: Product is perfect. Thanks for the perfect delivery of the Amazon ATS team. Happy to have this product. Perfect headset below 2k budget.. Perfect sound. Perfect battery backup. Perfect response on connectivity to Mobile. Worth buying this product.

name: ritu
title: Awesome..
content: Best for its price, I tested for 3-4 days, I can get almost around 17-18hrs of playback time. That's pretty impressive.. Just go for it!!

name: Gautam mayya
title: very comfortable
content: it's a very comfortable and nice product for office calls and some punchy songs as well. sound quality is 8/10.. connectivity is awesome.(connects very quickly with devices). battery charging speed is too good.it actually charges from 10 to 80 percent in 10-12 mins.. best for office calls and long meetings.

name: Siddharth Verma
title: Best all rounder under 2k.
content: Low latency does not work guys really. If you're gonna buy this especially for Pubg then dont. It will dissappoint you for sure. But apart from this, every other thing about it it best in class. From the build quality to battery back up, the sound quality and hands on feel is pretty much satisfying for its price segment.

name: Sumit Kumar
title: ONE PLUS LOVE
content: 1-base is so natural it not irritate ears in full volume very balanced base music lover love this. noise cancellation is best sound quality is pure dont hesitate to buy in review on utube

name: vekariya sagar m.
title: One plus Z Bass Edition ( Reverb )
content: Today I received One plus Z Bass Editon ( Reverb ) From Amazone it's very excellent product in terms of Voice + Bettery beckup + Bass overall superb 11 hours use and Thanks Amazone to Deliver short time

name: SK
title: BATTERY BACKUP ONLY SPECIAL
content: Write review after four months. BATTERY BACKUP is good😍. FAST CHARGING is good 🙏. Sound is good but ear fit👂 not comfortable. BASS it's ok👍.. NOISE CANCELLATION very very BAD 😬😬Running bike opposite side listen only BUZZING SOUND no my voice. Standing or walking is good VOICE clear listen opposite person. It's ok.

name: Syed Danish
title: Worthy to buy this product
content: Vocals are superb. Over all best product at this price range. Amazing product (wow product). Really loved after all its OnePlus. Premium Quality. Delivery on given date. Thank you Amazon. Can't heae that thumping sound bass is a little low. Mic quality is also good

name: Kiran Mahesh S
title: Not good as expected
content: I heard that this earphones has 20 hours battery backup. I used the earphones 4-5 hours a day and the battery lasted to 1.5-2 days. Also when I attend calls, my receiver heard some weird notice and then I had to change theode to phone. I thought this product was good.. But it's not that great

name: Abhinavan
title: Best
content: Good build quality and sound . But I'm not satisfied with the bass . If we use more time you will get ear pain. low latency is not working in other mobiles other than one plus mobiles . This is good for melodious music lovers . It had good vocals and battery life. It is a beast for battery life . Battery life is more than 18 hrs.

name: Poornima B.
title: Poor quality
content: Very poor. Asked for a replacement. Got one before this and it stopped working in a few days. Sadly i threw the box so it couldn't be returned. Thus piece adjusted its own volume without the buttons being pressed and the mic stopped working sometime.

name: Vijay
title: It's value for money 💰...
content: Overall sound quality charging backup is good. Build and design is good but charging port is always open little negative one but it's worthy on this price range compared to all neckband earphones...

name: Shraddha Shukla
title: Sound quality problem.
content: I have ordered two of this nd it's working very weirdly. Sound is not properly audible during calls. Very low sound is Audible. Plz do something about this. I have not invested my money for any low sound quality product. Right side earphones are not working properly..sound is very low. I want a replacement. Rply asap. It's not been even a month.

name: Vishwas G
title: "Best budget wireless earphones But not so perfect....Weak microphone"
content: Build quality and charging is the best one here. Sound clarity is also good bass is sufficient and treble is also equalised balanced. The only thing is the microphone ...It id very weak...while riding u can't talk to anyone more of the wind noises are heard ... Looking forward for OnePlus to fix this as it makes a huge difference in prize point.

name: Ajit Vijay mandke
title: Not satisfied
content: Not satisfied ear phone because my Real me head better than one plus super quality bass sounds and strong quality wire but not satisfied one plus ear phone and better price my real mi ear phone better than oneplus disappointed i suggest not buy this because not bass sounds other wise battery backup good

name: ARUN MANJUNATH N
title: Awesome Battery backup
content: Good one, I'm using it with my OnePlus 7T, it can easily gives you 3 days of battery backup even with heavy usage, but its not soo good for music lovers because the bass it produces is not upto the mark and while riding bike it doesn't gives you better microphone performance as u have to shout a lot while riding bike

name: Abyaya Prasad Hotta
title: Great Deal under 2k price
content: After using of more than 6mnths giving this review,. 1. Great quality under 2k price. 2. Comfortable to use. 3. Super Flexible. 4. Have issue in noise cancelation not even cancel it almost add extra noise 🤣

name: Sidharth Ramesh
title: Best budget bluetooth
content: Its a great product. I bought it coz I do not like long earphones becoz they get tangled and the buds are too small I might loose them. The sound quality is good. Mike is great. Great battery life. Overall worth it.

name: Sri harsha
title: Take a right direction
content: WARP CHARGING working like a charm. Decent amount of Bass. love the feature of Magnetic control .. for 1999 rs it is more than enough..

name: Naresh Aachanta
title: Best of its kind
content: Awesome experience. Light weight. No lag in playing Pub-G. Sound is clear. Great packaging with USB cable inside.Nice look.will get auto pause when you remove from ear and both get magmatic. Connectivity is very quick with Oneplus 7T.No better set in this price range.Go for it with Bindazz.

name: Harish M
title: No Quick switch feature
content: This product description from OnePlus is misleading. The earphone doesn't support quick switch in this bass reverb edition. Amazon needs to update their description and stop doing the same mistake OnePlus did.. Feeling cheated. At least on the plus side the delivery service from Amazon was amazing as well.

name: Nikhil sode
title: Worst built quality
content: I bought this bullets at 2k price.. all was ( good sound, mic , full charged in 50 min.) Until i found cracks on plastic body 💔. Cracks are not visble until to take a look closely. So disappointed with the built quality .

name: Rajitha
title: not supporting calling feature on Redmi note 3
content: Though I am able to listen to music and media files. It is not supporting calling feature for my Redmi note 3 device . Also I have noted that the magnetic feature stops the music. However, if i am detaching it the music doesnt start automatically.

name: Amazon Customer
title: You van think of it
content: Sound quality is kay not that great u can but a wired earphone of sony of somewhere around 1200 rs and u will get better sound quality but this is handy connectivity is soo quick thanks to magnetic controls looks cool and comfortable no pain in ears....at first the fitting is not that great but i get used to it in around 5-6 days

name: Yogesh Rajath
title: Voila 10mins 100% charge best wirelessz earphones
content: Best wireless headphone but lacks noise cancellation and this price you cant expect that feature. I hope they release newer models lik this. You get 100% in 10mins and also 30mins for 4days usage. I rarely charge 3 days once. Best battery backup and usage.

name: Bhavik Solanki
title: Overall good product
content: •Good product in this price range.. •Sound quality is good, comfortable, amazing battery backup.. •Battery level is insanely great. Runs for like complete 2 days after full charge ( and that too during lockdown period 😜). •Bonus : Get 50 ₹ cash back for using UPI as a payment method.

name: GAURAV RAUT
title: Keep showering cash backs !!
content: I gifted this to my mom with my first salary. She is so happy to use this. Thank you Amazon. The product was delivered in 3-4 days after ordering it. Excellent packaging. Full marks Amazon !! Keep it up !! Amazon gave me ₹100.00/- cash back on this order for paying via Amazon Pay Balance during the offer period.

name: Manmeet singh
title: Good sound quality with great battery backup
content: Pros :. 1. Good sound with clear vocals. 2. Great battery backup. 3. Fast charging. 4. Comfortable. 5. Decent price. 6. Quick switch button (very useful). Cons :. ********Not found******

name: Vijay Mathiyazhagan
title: Never settle this one
content: Comparing to other headphones its bass quality is low it's better choice to buy this one for 1+ phone at low cost its life time is awesome. Low latency mode available only for 1+phone note this point.

name: Shailender Kumar Yadav
title: Very disappointed. Bluetooth disconnected multiple time while in call. .
content: Very disappointed. Bluetooth disconnected multiple time while in call. And after some time connected back. When I connected this ear phone with my laptop and make jabber call for meetings, audio will not comes in earphone. I purchased this earphone for long conference calls and sadly it's not working for me.

name: Shahrukh Ahmad
title: Overall good product. A bit expensive but good in quality
content: Initially I did not like it but after using 2 days roughly I liked it. Battery life is amazing around 15 hours. I ONLY CHARGE 20 MINUTES. If it is required. Base quality is good but not if I compare with Boat. However it is too light that you won't feel pain in ears.

name: Aman
title: Great product....Go for it guies 👍
content: Sound quality is awesome. Battery backup is really great. bass is good and it's feel a good music. Somebody says that bass is not available.....But I bought this product and give a original review. If you like listening to perfect combination of music than go with one plus bullet z. You feel a good quality of bass. I am happy with this one plus.

name: Kabir Varsha
title: Good but not that great
content: So good !!! Not much bass but a decent sound cancellation and sound quality is good for the amount invested. Overall a good product but not recommended for someone who craves for that benchmark sound quality

name: Ananthu
title: Get this for the battery and the durability.
content: ₹2000 is really the max I can think of spending on an earphone. And this product is well worth it. My Boat ones failed on me six months into purchase, and this one came on sale exactly then.. Battery lasts ages, and charges super quick. It goes into standby mode when you clip the two magnets together. And switches devices with a simple button press.

name: ANISHA T.
title: Great buy.
content: The feature that distinguishes it from the other products is its magnetic toggle feature that allows you to toggle on/off like a breeze. So you don't have to keep it on all the time to attend calls. The quick switch feature is not that great as advertised.

name: S kumar
title: Poorest Sound and Low quality products
content: Poor quality and sound. After 5 min of use one starts getting irritated with the quality of sound. My worst buy in the past 12 months

name: Amazon Customer
title: Amazing Battery Life ... Good for calls.
content: I am using this for my office online meetings/calls. Good sound quality and noise cancellation is good too. Battery life is just amazing. Did a lot of research and finally decided to buy this. Absolutely worth the price. One of the best feature is the quick switch button that helps you to switch between 2 devices.

name: Shailesh Sharma
title: Decent one
content: Battery backup is excellent. Try charging to full at once for enhanced battery life. Bass quality could have been better. Sound quality is good...great to use for casual listening like YouTube, Netflix. But you're into Amazon Prime Music, Gaana+, or Spotify/Jio Saavn/Tidal Premium, it's better not to use this one.

name: Emran khan
title: Good for voice but not music.
content: I had great expectations from this product after I got OnePlus phone. But the quality is not upto expectations. The battery lasts long and is good for voice calling but you don't enjoy music and videos or webseries. It doesn't give the feel.
