Also the earpiece slips from the ear on the slight movement of the head.

name: sacinandana c.
title: Issues
content: I have purchased this hearphone. the sound quality is very good but it is disconnecting frequently i thought i had this problem in my phone later i have checked through some other mobiles and i have faced same issues.. i have replaced the product & again same issues so personally i won't recommend this product to anybody.. do any one faced this same issues ?

name: souravranjan sohala
title: Awesome purchase but beware of mic.
content: The sound quality and noise cancellation is awesome. Only problem I faced with it is the mic. Worked fine initially, but suddenly, stopped working for audio recording, Google assistant in some games. It worked fine for a week, then suddenly stopped working. But works still fine for calls.

name: shijo thomas
title: Just ok
content: Better connection with blutooth 5.0 up to 18 meter. Battery capacity 18 hrs . Control button position should be in band ear fit not good enough compare with Samsung level u. Packaging was awesome from oneplues. Level u is best for ear fit and comfort. Z falls from ear several times in 2 hr.

name: MD IRSHAD HAFIZ
title: Long Battery life 10 minutes charging🔋10H 🔋20H backup
content: 2020 the best product oneplus wireless headphone Z. Best feature 👌 this product 1 Quick & warp Charge. 2 Long Battery life 10 minutes charging🔋10H 🔋20H backup. 3 water proof. Thanks for OnePlus. #1999

name: Sudha
title: Earbuds
content: Received OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z in-Ear Bluetooth Earphones with Mic today. I have no specific complaints regarding this product. However the only design issue that I see is the ear bud doesn't fit into my ears and its really annoying. After using it for 10 mins ear starts paining. So can't really comment on other features of this product.

name: Aravind
title: Emits Radiation.. Bass poor.. sound quality good.. Awesome battery backup
content: Emits radiation.. You feel pain after using of 30 mins.. Battery back up is awesome(2 days complete use after one tym of charging).. Bass is poor... Sound clarity is good.. Don't go with any type or any company bluetooth headphones.. Those were emitting radiation which cause pain in ears.. Go for wired earphones .. And it cost low and healthy..

name: Rishav Jain
title: Punches above its weight
content: Its an amazing feeling when you get great earphones and start to hear low sounds and instruments in your favorite songs you didn't earlier. Plus I also wanted just one set of earphones for everything - casual listening, office calls and workouts. It does a good job throughout.

name: Sathish
title: Good bluetooth headset only  down side can connect to only 1 device at a time
content: Good bluetooth headset only down side can connect to only 1 device at a time. So each time I want to use in different device have to pair again

name: Harpal Singh
title: No bass and connection frequently disconnect
content: this is a 3rd grade quality earphone, there is no bass and Bluetooth connection frequently lost while phone as well whatsapp calling. dear buyers don't spend your hard earned money on this 3rd quality earphone. another lot of option are available. Boat/Noise/Boult brands earphone is 10 time better than oneplus z. only positive in this earphone is its battery life

name: Mayank
title: Worst call quality
content: Ok ok for listening music.. worst product for calls..call quality is sluggish..zero noise cancellation..you will hear enhanced extra sounds apart from call conversation..

name: Azad
title: Pretty Good product from oneplus under 2K
content: Amazing product by oneplus. If you are having oneplus mobile device then go for it with out hesitation. The connectivity is very fast with oneplus mobile. I didn't try with other devices though. Overall very good sound quality, sits comfortably in the ears and frankly the bass is not so powerful as other earphones. But its good enough for my preference. Genuinely just go for it 👍

name: Shivaraj.G
title: Good wireless neck band.
content: Good head phones, with awesome battery back up. No issues with music play or call.. The connection gets disturbed as u move few feets away from phone. So far this head phone is worth buying.

name: Raj Amit Singh
title: Its good and value for money in this price range
content: Using from last 6 months everything is working fine no battery issue or sound issue.. Mic clarity is good. Battery backup is perfect. Fast connectivity in Bluetooth.. comfortable in-ear support and sound. If you are looking for noise cancellation go for a higher range in one plus.

name: Chetan Kumar
title: Battery backup and charge time.
content: Hope it’s worth for money, let’s have some info about battery backup and charge time. After delivering product have used one and half day until battery get drained. Kept for charge checked after 25min of charge looks almost full, kept like that to get battery full signal took almost 50min to get complete.

name: Akash Rajput
title: Excellent
content: This is the best earphones in this price range. Sound is good. Bass could be little much better. But it's good enough.

name: Shailesh pawar
title: Head Pan In Back Side
content: Headphone quality, noise Cancellation and Sound is Perfect But ,When we Wear This Headphone start pain In Back Side Of head ......any Person Face This Issue please Comment.....only one or two times use this Headphone .....I think this Headphone Bluetooth. Radiation is vary high ,that's the Reason of my Head pain.

name: vishnuvijwani
title: SOUNDS TRASHHHHH. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
content: Good build quality and amazing features. But! SOUND QUALITY IS TRASHHHH!!! 9mm driver doesn't sound good at all. No bass. Don't listen to the reviewers!! Highs hurt, mids are decent and bass is just disappointing af. OnePlus needs to learn how to tune these. Sound stage sucks AND BUY SOMETHING LIKE SONY WI-400 XB

name: Eshan
title: Paisa Wasool...
content: It's too soft neck band with very soft material no doubt it is comfortable but due to too much softness neck band change their position easily and some time it could be risk of lost too if u r riding on bike...

name: Rajiv
title: So So...
content: So So... Best part is battery life n charging speed.... Worst part is grip in ear they come out while walking normally n can't workout because these neck rubber part is heavy... I wish they added sports grip in these n lighter neck rubber...

name: DVS
title: Worth for Money
content: Clear sound quality.. Battery backup is good enough.. Call quality is excellent.. Bass is little low but it doesn't matter if you are a pure music lover.

name: Venkatesh
title: Waste of money..Received fake product with no warranty card..Not working after one day.
content: No noise cancellation.. No bass quality.. Simply wasted my money.. Even it is not working after oneday of purchase... Received fake product with no warranty card. Need original one plus ➕ head set as a replacement. Dissapointed 😡

name: Sandeep
title: Doesn't offer you "THE BASS" but it has some decent bass
content: Everything thing is superfine with this, looks premium, feels premium but you had make some compromise in the bass sector. it has some bass but doesn't have that "THE BASS" in it. battery life amazing as they claim and connectivity issues. I mainly brought this because that switching button.

name: Syeda Umme Salma
title: Amazing Quality of Sound and Battery
content: For sure, Value for money. I should have gone to one plus bullet sooner than investing on 400-500 Bluetooth devices. Dont waste your money on 999 Headsets. Charge 1s and run for 2 days and more

name: Arslan S.
title: Worst wireless headset ever.
content: sound quality is worst, noise cancellation and bass quality is worse than worst. Battery sucks.. And worst is Amazon service, they're not even returning the product. This is the worst experience I ever had in my life with amazon.. Don't go for it. Not recommended. I have another pair of wireless headset from Realme, they are far better than OnePlus.

name: Debjyoti C.
title: Cheaper, Good Quality and long battery life
content: The Bullets Wireless Z are the cheapest wireless set from OnePlus so far. They have the longest battery life and proper water-resistance. The soft rubberized material for the neckband sits comfortably on your neck and the whole thing is light enough that after a whileyou barely notice they are there. It's just a more pleasing sound overall.

name: Rima D.
title: How's the seal?
content: Well well well. I got this product on time. Inside the delivery package, there was a box which was sealed with a cello tape. The earphones were 80% charged. The noise cancellation was awful so I asked for a return. The new box which came, was totally sealed in plastic!! The earlier one was maybe a used one. Beware of such products, buyers!!

name: Priti Chakraborty
title: Great Quality, but logo is missing
content: This earphone is really great and good quality for me..but I have one problem that is in my box i have not found any "Never Settle" logo..This was quite a bad mistake..firstly I thought that this is a fake product that I have received but the quality is original..but I have to tell that why this logo is missing?? Please tell me the reason🙃

name: akkycam
title: Buttons not working automatically volume button
content: Worst earphones ever . There are no of issues in wireless z earphones .Buttons are not working I want replacement . Volume button, pause button not working . I have on/off reset many times but it is not working. When I connect it automatically on low volume .

name: Dhanush Dhanpal
title: Excellent quality. Low latency.
content: Excellent Noise Cancellation for an in-ear headphone.. Excellent Battery life, easily lasts over 15hrs of play time on 100% charge.. Still in my 1st week of usage. Will update the review if required.

name: Himanshu Verma
title: Average sound quality
content: Sound quality is not up to the mark... I think wireless earphones lack in sound quality... Go for wired earphones if you can bear the burden of wires i have one more piston earphone other than bullets and i can say that they sounds much much better than these oneplus wireless..

name: Rahul
title: Not worthy.
content: Buy this product only if you want to use it for listening music. Not at all usefull for calling purpose as there is no noise cancellation.. Even if you are sitting in a room with a fan on then at the other end huge noise will be there. Not of use while driving.. I wish if I could have an option to exchange this.

name: ArunBudaraju
title: Fully packed product at 2k go for it with out thinking..
content: Awesome brand awesome quality at reasonal price compare to real me and other products.. Build quality is awesome and connectivity is very good.. Battery no words it's awesome.. Bass is good not much but ok at this price.. Overall a very good product.. Amazon delivery is very good.. Thanks amazon..

name: Akash Lamba
title: This or bass version which one you should buy?
content: I like the sound of this version instead of bass version.the sound quality is awesome and perfect for mostly all types or sound other side in bass version you can play games good bt when music listen the bass is extra and you can listen to songs very clearly and in original voice the voice you get goes up very loud jst take this instead of bass version

name: Komal Verma
title: amazing product for a month than stopped working
content: i am really happy with the product especially its battery hold, its amazing, i use to charge it once in 2 or 3 days. I have been using the product since month, but now its showing connectivity errors. After detaching the magnet buds its blink once white then red light and beep for 3 sec and turned off automatically, that is really annoying.

name: Dilip sunchu
title: Great sound quality, usable bass level
content: Coming to the point. 1) "sound quality" is very crisp.. 2) "Bass quality" is okayishh for low bass songs and for the songs with thumping bass, you can feel that perfect bass. For overall sound quality - 4.5/5. For Bass quality - 3.8/5. Battery- 5/5. Latency is acceptable.. Nice build quality,. overall go for it highly recommend for regular usage.

name: Prathamesh
title: BASS QUALITY ISN'T BAD AS ITS PORTRAYED EVERYWHERE
content: I went through many youtube reviews and many comparisons with this earphones. I seen that these earphone was blamed for its bass quality. But trust me, it's not that bad as its portrayed everywhere. Bass of the earphone is phenomenal and the sound is very well balanced. I will only say that GO FOR IT WITHOUT A SINGLE THOUGHT AND WITHOUT A SINGLE DOUBT.

name: Customer
title: Best
content: Battery back up, noise cancelling quality, sound quality are the best....its been 4 days I haven't charged the battery and it's still more than 50%....

name: Harsh Jadav
title: Good in its segment!
content: Got it yesterday. Built quality is quite good. Connectivity to the devices are also good. When we are talking about the "Bass Quality", I would say, it is lacking on it. Otherwise, battery backup is really awesome with the fastest charging time. Go for it, if you want to listen good sound quality. But you have to compromise for the bass quality.

name: KANTANAND US
title: Awesome sound quality
content: Awesome sound quality. Base - 5/5. Tone - 4/5. Music - 5/5. Answer Phone calls - 3/5 ( you need to get used to for longer usage ). Caller ID ( some mobiles does not support ). over all good

name: SaBa
title: Impressive Battery backup.
content: It's fine. Bass could've been better. But overall it delivers decent performance. Long lasting battery feature is best, I use it whole day. Even use it for running, never faced any issues, fits perfectly. For pubg it's fine, for calls fine, no issues. Loving it.

name: Gargi sildas
title: Good earphones
content: Everything is okay type in this OnePlus bluetooth earphone except it's battery backup, connectivity and range. The battery backup is awsome as compaired to other bluetooth earphones and it's connectivity and range is also praiseworthy.. O am overall 75% satisfied with this product.

name: debasis
title: Above average
content: Working good with one plus nord but in case of laptop it connects but no sound while the laptop wifi on.there is noise disturbances with. laptop

name: Shikhar gupta
title: Good product, great battery life.
content: Good product, great battery life.. Been using for 2-3 months now. No complaints.. Sound quality is good(but not better then oppo enco). But there is nothing to hate about its sound.. My top priority was battery life anyways.. Charges very quickly.

name: Ravirr77
title: simply super
content: for mid range ( dolby & hi-res support) and high range mobiles it give excellent output u can enjoy bass ,trebles , sound quality is up to mark . for budget mobile ( no audio support ) its performance is poor sound like normal cheap headphone , if u want try pls check ur mobile audio support .

name: Maichel Manohar
title: Ear Phones not working after 10 days
content: We recently have bought this. It only worked for a week. This is absolutely dead . Despite keeping it charged, it doesn't even switch on. The most pathetic product and service I ever have received. The worst part is that the date for shipment return is over and there's no customer service details or warranty labels along with the product.

name: aasish arumilli
title: Do not hesitate to buy it
content: The first thing I have to say is the insane battery life. After even three days of usage after purchase I am left with around 30%. Well I did not notice any noice cancellation because the body is made of plastic. Bass quality is satisfactory but not too good.. Quick pair and switching is extremely useful, loved this feature.. Value for money 👌

name: Bharat Adhikari
title: BAD PRODUCT, NOT WORTH IT AT ALL!!
content: Everything about this bluetooth is just bad, in a month had to get the first one replaced cuz it wasn't charging and connection was dropping very frequently. Got a replacement from service center but the mic does not work at all, very bad product, STRONGLY RECOMMEND NOT TO USE THIS ONEPLUS BULLTETS BLUETOOTH!!

name: shiva a.
title: Good sound quality nd best battery, but a bit dissopointed in base quality.
content: 1st i like the connectivity. Easy to connect nd change the conecting device between 2 devices so easily.. Nd batteru life is good nd lasts long. But the base is not upto the mark as expexted. Vocals and all Musical instruments quality audible clearly nd sharp but base has to improve a bit. But over all good product for this price.

name: Kalaiarasu
title: Suggestion
content: 1. when we are buying ear phone that too wireless obvious expectation is to have best quality of voice withe laptap as well. But its normal only. 2. volume button press would have been better. 3. Mic Mute option is not there only pause option is there ( for audio) when u have conference call mic mute option is important

name: Akanksha
title: Best in Battery backup , bass very low not for listening music
content: Best battery backup you don't have to charge it daily ,but less bass ,not for listening music...

name: sanjithsivapuram
title: Best neck-band earphones for 2k...
content: This is a perfect product for listening music playing games, and for long battery life. The bass is very good also the noise cancellation is pretty good. I had a doubt because most of then have written bad noise cancellation in comments. But its actually the opposite and another important thing is that the material quality is nice including the boxing too.

name: Pritika
title: Quality product
content: If you have a budget of 1500, just go a little bit extra and get this one, its a quality product that you won’t regret investing in

name: Aayush
title: Don't buy ITS CHINESE
content: Don't buy this has product... You are paying money to China... Can buy from boat or portronics these are Indian companies providing good good quality products that to on a lower price point.. Don't buy one plus its CHINESE

name: Avi
title: Goodness
content: Bass is okayish, i only bought it to take calls. So im okay. Overall sound is good thou. But i feel volume is a bit less..or maybe its my ears..!!

name: Payal
title: its defective
content: there is an auto-pause play feature in one plus wireless z is not working in mine, it pauses while connecting magnet buds but when I separate them again they don't playagain and when I am using in my laptop when I sticking buds its doesn't pause it get disconnected and video plays in speaker and when I separate again it plays in earphones

name: maxportsss
title: Best in its segment. Buy this if u on tight
content: Better than any tws available in market even in a segment higher than this, if you want quality sound go for this. Atleast in this price ranges its the best sounding bluetooth.

name: Anuvind A
title: Just go for this.
content: Best in battery performance.. I just use it daily for some hours. I think totally i get around 16-18hours. Really liked it.. I have warp charger so charging also is fast.. Little bit less in bass.. Good while playing pubg.. Liked it😎

name: Deepak T. Anto
title: okay
content: First one had connectivity issues. Amazon got it replaced. Second one is working fine for now. Bass is too much and not in a good way of to my liking. It is good for watching movies but not much for music in my opinion.

name: Mohamed shah
title: Poor call quality
content: I was facing latency issues while attending online meetings, I was able hear few glitch (Not so frequently) sounds while listening to music. Didn't expect this from Oneplus

name: Monica
title: Oat colour
content: Like= sound quality is almost all good. Very flexible to kept in pockets. Light weight.. Dislike: charging port is opened free, does not mount any caps to close the port, bass is very low.. Colours: mostly black is good, another colour go for oat colour, blue and green is not looking premium its looking like a local shop purchases.

name: SHUBHAM JAIN
title: Ok OK but should have been awesome as it is a one of the product of ONEPLUS
content: Stability is not there in connection flow .. As for a continuous use of more than 4 hrs the disturbance keeps getting arised and no noise cancellation is there ... That maker the user pissed off and bumped up... Sry Amazon but that's my genuine review. So overall product is. Great but not AWESOME or mind-blowing...

name: Vikash Shah
title: Warranty time ?
content: My question is this product warranty time not mantion ?

name: Bhavya prakash
title: Good wireless earphones
content: The sound is crisp and clear but the bass is not soo loud its giver good bass but not soo much if doest optimised on phones sound setting. Battery life is so amazing full charge and goo to goo for 2 day all time use . And the magnetic switch off feature is so good yo save battery. Fitt is decent. But not very comfortable for long use.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product under 2000
content: Good product . One plus has again came up with their unique idea .. the magnetic poweron and power off works perfectly. Sound quality is not very good but justifies the price. I use it for zoom calls and microphone also works very well. Overall good product in this range..

name: User2721
title: Received defective product.
content: I've received a defective product which has no working microphone. I would blame it on the seller for this. This is my first Worst experience on Amazon. I made the mistake of not giving it much attention since audio is working fine and battery life is legendary! so now... I can't return it back.

name: Mr. Singh
title: Worth the shot! Also thanks Amazon.
content: Had to return my first product because of Mic issues, the replacement came in quick and it was worth it. Couldn't recommend anything better than this in this price bracket.. Amazon you deserve an applause for your customer support and quick to response team.

name: Sri Prakash Babu
title: If you are a classic music lover.. blindly go for it... NOT FOR BASE LOVERS🤗🤗🤗
content: Very decent... Mids Vocals are excellent.. battery backup is also good... But Bass.... decent that's it.... overall 👍

name: venkateshaperumal
title: It's best for this price
content: It's good for price. I gift this my friend and it's bass and call quality is amazing. I used many Bluetooth headset but this one have long battery life than any one. I have using it continue 14 hours for single charge.

name: dr partha sarathi mondal
title: Fantastic product
content: A nice product overall..good sound quality..built quality is also very robust..go for it..cudnt find anything better in this budget

name: Indradev Singh
title: not worth
content: 500 rs is enough for this

name: Shemall Soni
title: Oneplus Super awsome at high price 😂😂
content: Earphone is best, but still it need good build quality, i feel its quite delicate.. Music is perfect, very perfect bass, music is very clear.. Most like feature is quick swtich.

name: ajeet kumar
title: Excellent product
content: Build quality as well as sound quality is excellent,bass is balanced neither too high nor too low. Noise cancellation could have been a bit better but not a big issue. So 4 star for noise cancellation, have been using the product for more than 3 months no problem so far can not forget to mention battery life, it's superb overall deserves five star.

name: Raman Kumar
title: Must Be Fake Item - Multiple Issue in 3 weeks - oneplus is Not first chose anymore
content: I had so much trust in #oneplus until I ordered OnePlus Bullets #Wireless Z in-Ear #Bluetooth #Earphones with Mic. No Noise cancellation feature work even Call quality is very poor. I lost 1999 INR for this item which is not profitable still have to buy another one. Suggest #Nooneplus #poorquality #notproming I wish I could give 0 star

name: VIKRAM
title: Bad quality of one plus Bluetooth hands free
content: Oneplus bluetooth purchase on the basis of its quality and brand name. But Amazon given me third class product. It's get connected to mobile and all of suddenly stopped working.. I'm taken wrong decision to buy from Amazon not from direct from One Plus.. I'm not satisfied with the quality of the bluetooth hands free.

name: Deep Amazon Customer
title: Good headphone..
content: Great headphone with great sound quality...crisp and clear sound..soft bass(low frequancy quality bass ,not like noisy bassy..)..pairing is also good..call quality good and coverage is also good..

name: Garvit Aggarwal
title: Smart earphones
content: Love these! Amazing voice catching by the mic. When magnetically stuck together, the earphones switch off - and when switched back on - connect automatically to the phone. Great buy! Thanks oneplus.. Delivery by amazon - 6/5 (yeah!). Received the product in less than 5 hours or ordering.

name: Mukesh Beladiya
title: Lot of bugs
content: This product has lot of bugs. Don't know how it ended up in this state but Not able to control volume using +/- keys when connected to PC. sometimes, it shows connected to my phone but plays sound on mobile speaker. Sometimes it just disconnects from phone suddenly though battery is full. Would like to return if possible.

name: chirag
title: The bass is too heavy and connection issue while on call, battery drains too fast
content: I was confused for the 1st time that how can the battery drain so fast and plus the connection between the headphones and mobile while on call use to take 10 sec of laps time to connect while the headphones was already connected with Bluetooth still it use to take a 10 to 20 sec of laps time to get connect while on call..

name: Narsi k.
title: Chinese product don’t buy I made a mistake not every Indian should
content: Everything is fine but the tag made in China made it worst please don’t buy I made a mistake by purchasing it. One plus should setup a manufacturing company in India that would one plus even more better. If u wanna then please got to one plus store it may be manufactured in India. In amazon it is the old stock

name: Muskan
title: Poor bass. Advised against this.
content: Average sound. Hardly any bass. In simpler terms please avoid buying this. Anyone who has given it a nice review clearly has somewhat moderate standards of sound quality expectation. If you are a music buff who likes feeling the beats, would definitely not recommend this.

name: Shubham Bhadani
title: Only Good for Battery Life
content: Sound quality is like a local Chinese product, no bass at all, ear fit is also very bad. If you need a headset for calling purpose then this may be good as you don't need sound quality and you'll require longer battery life. If you love listening to music try considering boat headset, they sound much better at this price range.

name: Sunita Ajankar
title: Poor sound but nice build quality.
content: the sound quality of the following product is really poor we cannot feel any bass in it .. but on the other side the build quality of the device is really nice and the magnetic tip feature really helps a lot.. if you want good bass oneplus launched the bass edition for the following go through that.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Lot of noice from outside. Wired headset doing better I really disappointed.
content: Sound quality ok.. I replaced two times with in 3weeks.. I got 3rd item now.. Every one have separate issue. Connectivity issue, disconnected frequently and lot of noice from outside. Windows machine music not working current headset. I wrote review first time. Bcz of this irretating issue.

name: Jitender Ahuja
title: BAD QUALITY PRODUCT
content: I PURCHASED THIS EARPHONE ON 15 JULY AND GOT IN 3 DAYS . AFTER 6 MONTHS THE RIGHT SIDE EARPHONE IS NOT WORKING

name: Wasim
title: Disappointing
content: Please don't go for this if you like good sounding headphones. The sound is pathetic.. The only plus point is the battery life.. Please go for Realme ones instead.

name: Paranveer kumar
title: Not a good product from OnePlus
content: Didn't expect from such as brand,,while on call ,voice level is very low.. No cover over usb port for dust protection and all. No holders for earpphones. I bought on basis of review but ....

name: Babu Reddy
title: Great Bass and so the sound quality
content: Most of the users are complaining about BASS here and I was also little hesitant prior to buying. But trust me the BASS is very superior and so the sound quality. I totally love it. And special mention to the packaging - outstanding.. Best with One plus mobiles.

name: Ram
title: Best in the segment!!
content: Good product, not a hard thump of bass but acoustic is good. Overall good for me. Good battery backup, wireless range is better than others.

name: Ajay Gabrani
title: Very Good Earphones..🤘🤘✌🏻✌🏻
content: I like everything about earphones specially the battery life its awesome,except that white light which is blinking in every 5 Seconds after connecting that's the only thing which I don't like and it's very annoying whenever i am watching something at night in dark it catches the eyes...apart from that the earphones are fantastic...🤘🤘

name: S.N.SANAPALA
title: Before purchase Google it how amny are facing problem with OnePlus wireless Z Bluetooth.
content: I want to give negative stars with a lot of hope I used to purchase this wireless Bluetooth z type headset.after few days it's stopped working suddenly.Later I google it and noticed somany people are facing same issue in OnePlus forum.Even though How people gave 4stars I don't know.Oneplus people didn't respond even after sending somany mails and chat.

name: Ilhan ul haq
title: Zero noise cancellation.
content: The music is ok. There's zero noise cancellation. While being on a call, people keep complaining about the noisy frequency they hear more than my voice which annoys a lot. You have to be completely stationary to have an undisturbed conversation. I regret buying these despite of realme one's. Bass is also unrecognisable.

name: Haki
title: Not worthy. Bass edition is only for name.  Sounds like 200/- earphones.
content: The bass is not that clear. It is like listening to music in an auto with wooden supported speakers. didn’t expect this from oneplus. Named bass edition. But bass is like listening to 200/- earphones. Not worthy of paying 2000/- for this product.

name: Hirak Sarkar
title: Not for Bass lovers, it doesnt sound like a 2k headset
content: sound quality not good, bass is almost absent. but, enormous battery, quick Switch Between 2 connected device is very useful, comfortable to wear for long time

name: DX
title: Honest Review
content: Everything is up to the mark except for the bass....battery is tremendous as written upto 20hrs and very comfortable.. Sound quality is also very good ...I hope they added some bass..and those who r criticizing the review who claimed to not getting proper bass...they are actually tell the truth..it actually have a less bass.👍

name: vishnu
title: Best build  and sound quality, warpcharge 10minutes charging give 10hours of usage, good flexibility
content: High build and sound quality, big battery support. Oneplus claim that 10min charging give ten hours of use is truely support. Connect to Bluetooth devices very fast provide Bluetooth 5.0 , swich Bluetooth device very fast,. Good felxiblity, value for money

name: nomad
title: Happy customer
content: Happy with the purchase. Sound quality (I only use it for calls and YouTube videos ) and battery life is amazing. Worth the price.

name: Vijesh
title: Product, quality, delivery 👌👌👌 Awesome
content: Great product as described n awesome battery life, am writing this review after 3 weeks of usage, recommended seller n product...

name: pramod sasindradev
title: Overall good
content: Brilliant package which is a usual from One plus.. Good sound experience with the head phone for the first day.. Will write more after some days of use.

name: prashant bansode
title: Masterpiece by OnePlus.
content: 1.Best sound quality in its price range. 2.played pubg and it works unbelievably well got each and every footstep.No latency at all.best for pubg lovers.. 3.bass is average as compared to my old Mi onear headphones.. 4.Build quality great .. 5.Gives premium feel .. 6.Go for it if u r ok with low Bass.

name: Umesh
title: Confused Value for money or not I also confused before buy this so I will say price is high
content: I was very excited before I use this earphones my honest review for this product build quality was good battery life awesome package and changing speed very thik is perfect but according to me Sound quality was ok ok bass is fine limited but I don't feel clear sound behind instrument sounds and other not that much clear

name: Rish
title: The best bluetooth device
content: Just amazing device. The sound quality is perfect and the best part is it automatically switches off when not in use . Very comfortable to wear

name: Ashish
title: one plus z earphone
content: Bass could have been little better, liked the switch feature, helps me switch to laptop and mobile very quick. Battery back up is also nice.

name: Manu S
title: 2 headset brought. Both are complaint😡😡😡
content: 10 day before i brought the first one. Connecting with the phone is not properly that's why i replace with an another oneplus. The second one mic not working whn we do calls. That's why i return the product and reorder a new one. Hope it will be a good one.

name: Bhushan
title: Good value for money, long range
content: Good feature of swithcing off when not in use and saves battery also range is good within house it works over 10-12 feet easily.. good microphone even when talking outside home

name: Aarti
title: Best
content: As a one plus phone user for years, this product has kept up my expectation. Worth the money. Light weight and comfortable to use.. Great sound quality.

name: gaurav
title: Not good
content: Overall product is good not best so plz order on ur risk. Always unpair just only removing head phone into ear. No call alert ⚠.. Worst product because of battery life to less only 6-7hrs only. Sound quality also not good.. So we carefull before buy this

name: NANDESH
title: Great deal in 2k
content: I was using boat rockers 255 and we cant compare this base in 255 base quite good.. Battery : 5/5 ( alomost work for 2.5 day on continous usage ). Charging Time - around 45 min. Base - there is lack of base as per youtube reviews but i feel base is good enoguh. Compare to realme i feel oneplus are way ahead in sound.

name: Khursheed sultan
title: The best one!!
content: I have used multiple brands but this one is the best.. if you are looking for headphones please go for it. Amazing battery life!!!. You can use In gym during running as well. It's very convenient!!

name: saket kumar sah
title: Very good features ,very quick and quite good/balanced sound quality
content: Earlier i was using JBL LIVE200BT which was just bad after 6 months of usage. But one plus bullet Z wireless is ismply awesome ,it is very quick to connect or reconnect and have quite good/balanced sound quality superb, charging is superfast. Really good.

name: Niranjan
title: Very very low sound
content: I see this product is doing same in both mobile and laptop. I am using other wireless ear phones and didn't faced any issue. Where as this product is showing very differently in laptop, as voice is very low, even volume is full. where as in mobile, it is good.

name: kalyanam kiran
title: Broken Microphone
content: Microphone started malfunctioning in less than month. One plus's service request website/page isn't even working. No response to service request emails. Microphone stops working working every 30 mins. Need to cut and redial the call every time to get it working again. Noise cancellation is non existent. Weak Bluetooth.

name: Venkatesh
title: This is the Best Ever Neckband I have Experienced... Go with it ..
content: Awesome Product ... Fully Impressed by the Product OnePlus bulletz Bass Edition ... This is the Best Ever Neckband which I Experienced ... Delivery is also fast nd Contactless ... I m posting my Review after using of this product for 5 days ... Fully Impressed by the Product as well as Delivery too ... Go with this ...

name: Rahul Raj
title: Poor build quality leads to higher sound in side and much lower sound in other side after 2 weeks.
content: I bought this product last week, starting days it was working fine ...but now I am facing a problem that is the one side ear bud has higher sound and other side ear bud has lesser sound comparatively and this is so irritating that I can't even use my headphones. I don't why this happened or like how many people faced it till now but this is a alarming condition.

name: Ashvin Ramani
title: 50+50 Products Note match like brand name
content: Connectivity is very bad I am not happy with my this problem otherwise nice like build quality, sound and most important delivery is fast and safe. I I'm not happy with this product. Zoom app sound is not property.

name: Geeta
title: Poor quality; bad investment
content: Bad quality. Worked only for few weeks. Now within 6 months one side has stopped working completely while other is barely audible. Won't recommend.

name: Noel F.
title: Pros and Cons
content: Pros: Connectivity, no latency, very good mic quality and very well audible on calls and battery life very good. Cons: Don't buy it if you want to listen to music. Solution: get the bass version. Not a bad earphone just has a different usability

name: majid shaikh
title: Bass Quality improved👌👌👌
content: I ordered these product, the quality of sound is perfect as compare to others and bass quality is also improved as compare to previous version, and its give the best battery backup as we aspect on the review of these product bt quit different in noise cancellation not best, bt better, and easy to handle and carry in the pocket👏👏👏

name: aryaman
title: Buy it
content: Worth the money!!, Battery life is insane have been using it for 2 days (5-6 hrs everyday) and it still has 40% left. The bass quality is better than expected and they are super comfortable to wear and don't fall off while exercising. The blue ones look premium.. Btw the battery decreases in decrements of 100-80-60-40 and so on

name: Mitali Kamli
title: Good Product
content: I like this wireless bullets. I'm purchasing this for my dad. And he also loves it. Easy to connect with mobile. Sound quality is very good. And the most important feature of this product is that it has an excellent battery life. So, worth product.

name: Pooja Singh
title: Just buy it as soon as possible.
content: Best in this range of price ...Sound quality is very good and noise cancellation is also better during call . Bluetooth range is about 20 to 30 meter. Bass is little less but overall music experience is very nice . Built quality is very nice. Easy to wear and you can wear it whole day without any problem.

name: Rohini
title: WORST SELLER!!!
content: I got a used product, no seal on the box and it was also slightly damaged and the official OnePlus seal tape which keeps the earphone at its place in the box was also removed, there were also many dirty finger prints insid the box which clearly screams that it was used before and also no extra eartips!!!!!. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!

name: Rohit Sunil
title: Must buy
content: Nice earphone from oneplus with overall good sound quality and above average bass . The ear have low latency so there is no voice delay during call or playing pubg.... Battery backup is upto the mark that is claimed by the oneplus. Thnks amazon for superfast delivery

name: regallasaketh
title: Dont buy for calls. only for songs
content: sound quality is awsome but Noice cancellation is not working. if i have an opportunity i want to beat oneplus people by showing On-call clarity. when i call somebody everybody is asking a regular question that Are you using headset?. if i switch to mobile it was clear. so if u want to use this for calling please go for another.

name: Lokeish Desaichetty
title: Microphone not working after two weeks
content: I'm writing this review after two weeks suddenly my microphone is not working I am not able to attend calls using this earphones. Totally dispointed for purchasing this one. Don't choose this one later u will regret.

name: Akshay Kuamr
title: Do not buy it if you want to use it for work
content: I ordered this since it allows easy switching between 2 devices at the same time, but it's not at all worth it, there's too much lag and a annoying disturbance if I'm trying to take zoom calls.

name: Dr. Dinesh Pal
title: एकदम लाजवाब ब्लुटूथ
content: वन प्लस ने बहुत ही जबरस्त ब्लूटूथ बनाया है। 10 मिनट चार्ज करके 10 घण्टा तक उपयोग किया जा सकता है। चुम्बक का तो कमाल अलग ही है, जैसे ही दोनों सटा डिस्कनेक्ट हो गया और दोनों अलग करो फिर ऑटोमेटिक कनेक्ट हो जाता है। इसीलिए जल्दी डिस्चार्ज नहीं होता है। आवाज तो एकदम लाजवाब है। मैं बहुत प्रसन्न हूँ इसे खरीदकर।

name: Rahul Patil
title: Must buy under this price
content: These are really good. Battery backup is good, sound quality good for calls. Not much bass effect. Good for normal music. Magnetic buds are really effective. They switch the headphone on / off. I also like the switch button where we can connect other device easily.

name: Ritikesh
title: THINGS TO NOTICE
content: Pros:. 1.Awesome quality sound. If you don't feel bass, change buds.. 2. Great battery life.. 3.super build quality. 4. Quality product in affordable price range.. Cons:. 1. Not support aptx hd(available in bullet wireless 2). 2. Latency is very good but if you play heavy games like pubg it won't go for rank pushers, otherwise it is brilliant.

name: Shubham Kumar Gupta
title: Best Bluetooth earphone under 2K
content: It has a good sound quality and a perfect balance of bass and treble . Its noise cancellation is also good . The best part of it is its battery backup. Charge for 10 min and use for 10 hrs and it takes about 25-30 mins for full charge and then the backup is around 18-20 hrs . It also fits easily in ears and too comfortable to use .

name: Nisha Thakur
title: Premium product
content: PROS :. Totally satisfied with sound quality. Impressive battery backup almost 8 hours of use and still 60% left. Great calling experience no problem. Good looking product and attractive.. CONS:. Almost no cons at all. But can't reach the neck band's buttons while hanging on neck.. Still it's worth the money😍😍

name: Fabian Johnson Panakal
title: Perfect fit.
content: Good quality Bluetooth earphones. Loved it. Made it easier to take calls hands free for my wife. Loved the sturdiness and looks. It was perfect fit too.

name: Akshay Warhade
title: Beyond Expectation..Superb Sound Quality
content: I hv been using OP bullet Z earrphone since last month, and genuinely i am writing comment on this product that i have expect lot more from this and it has fullfilled my expectations with having crisp sound with minimal base around that is what i want. Thanks to amazon and seller for faster delivery and genuine product

name: Ajay singh bhardwaj
title: Excellent product with gr8 Battery life
content: Gr8 headphone if u look for battery.Battery life is awesome.. Sound quality is average like all other headphones.. Built quality is good.

name: Abhishek
title: Value for Money 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
content: Value for money 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 previously I was using bullet 2 only difference is built quality bullet 2 feel more prime with metal body n rubber wired which are not in Z version but as per price they are good with no compromise in sound and has higher volume n bass.✌🏻

name: Anand Mishra
title: Stopped working within a month how to claim for warranty?
content: It stopped working within a month.. I am extremely disappointed with the product.. When I used to put it on charge it shows red lights but now only white light is continuously glowing also I am unable to connect it to my mobile.. I am unable to find out what exactly happened and also I don't know whom to complain?

name: Saahil Singh Bains
title: No lag in Fnatic mode
content: I bought these only to play Call of Duty mobile. There is zero lag when you play in Fnatic mode. I also use these for workouts and have no problem.

name: Ashutosh Upadhyay
title: Product ok but accessories missing..
content: There were missing accessories in the box only earphone is there hence either replace or return it.. Havent expected from such brand.

name: Tara Singh Sethi
title: A Good one for Soft music listeners
content: Build quality is good.. Battery backup is amazing.. Charge time is very quick if using one plus warp charger. it nearly takes 10-15 minutes if fully drained.. I would not recommend this one for bass lovers.. Its good for listening light music, calling specially for work from home people.

name: Aman wadekar
title: Yooo...sounds great. But only for oneplus devices...
content: Wow one plus good idea..It works great only with oneplus devices.2. i have tested with my poco f1 but it doesn't sound more.... 3.so if you are poco user plz don't go for it.. Thank you

name: DANIEL DARPELLI
title: Worth the money
content: I received the handset in the morning. It's was 100% charged . I used for around 10 hours . The battery life is amazing . This is totally worth 2k. I really like these would recommend anyone to pick these if you'll are looking for a budget wireless headset.

name: DAIVIK
title: Din light restricting the connection and charging
content: There is a dim white light and no connectivity to device. Even while charging the same light is seen and no red light. And from last one week I kept it detached but still white light is on and battery is draining or not that also I am not sure.. Lot of people are facing this issue.You can search this on the internet.

name: Vimal kumar
title: Excellent
content: The OnePlus bullets wireless z was an Excellent wireless headphones at the price point under 2k.. The headphones playback was nearly 18-20 hrs and charges in almost less than an hour.. Overall I recommend this for everyone for those who want to buy headphones under 2k.

name: Shamim Y.
title: Not recommended for exercising/jogging
content: Although product is no doubt pretty good but it is not meant to be used while exercising/running. With IP rating of IP55 it stopped working twice due to sweat going inside volume switch. Once it is already replaced. Second time waiting for the replacement.

name: Naiciya juwal
title: As expected
content: I dont know why people are degrading this product by saying no bass. If you want good bass go for wireless z bass edition. Am completely satisfied with the purchase.

name: shahabaaz banu
title: Not satisfied
content: Not good ....not satisfied at all ...first I orderded and I got bluetooth which was not working ...they replaced it ok that was done got new one but rite after one mnth again the same prblm it stopped working ...plz give genuine products we r buying coz of trust don't break that

name: sathish
title: GOOD PRODUCT. ONEPLUS BULLET Z
content: Sound quality has to be good bass standred less rate of bass noise cancellation is not there totally its good for the cost comfortable. For neck around wear distance also comfort cleare cut voice no issues delivery. Has to be ontime i got before they mentioned time they said 9pm but i got same day 10am at morning within one week mic is not working

name: alka saini
title: Very bad product
content: Don't buy this product, it is serious feedback of useing 5 months,, now it's charging time increses to more than 1 hr and playback time reduced to less than 7 hrs. And also I am using OnePlus phone sometimes facing issue of connectivity. I m helpless due to corona bcz there is no service centre near my town. It is very bad product

name: nitish yadav
title: wiring is little bit weak u hv to take care of it
content: trust me this product is worth its price.... 1) best battery back up u can get which charges just only in 10-15 mins.. 2) sound quality and bass is ok ok.... main thing is about the wiring which i think is little bit weak from the joints so you have to take care of it.... in short product is best in its price

name: Abhishek pathak
title: Not able to connect , may be defective piece
content: Sound was very good .. But not able to connect with my phone and any other phone next day .. Light on seen only on charging .. I want to replace it

name: Yash l.
title: OnePlus wireless bullets z...,,👌👍
content: Guys for sure these earphones are just awesome. Many people and Youtubers are criticizing these earphones because of their low bass but trust me it's just perfect and the overall sound quality is just brilliant. If you think spending 1800-2000 ₹ get these , don't think for 200₹ ,these are 10 times more perfect then the realme one.

name: Dibyanshu Sharma
title: Sony level, totally recommend
content: I've been coming to one plus from sony XB55 extra base earphones.. i can easily say that this one plus z is definitely high class earphones. Crystal clear sound. Amazing base 👏

name: Shalibhadra Hakani
title: Worth for Buying
content: No words for it. It brand always matter for this kind of product well design and effective noise cancellation with clear sounds.

name: karthik shankar
title: Nice Product
content: Nice product worth its price and extremely quick delivery from Amazon..Very good for music hearing, sometimes it disconnects during calls and meetings which was the reason I have 4 stars

name: S.karteek
title: Awesome battery backup
content: Awesome budget wireless earphones.. Battery backup crazy. We can use more then 24 hours continuously, If it is idle mode we can use 48 hours.. Mainly 10 min charges 10 hours backup.. I'll suggest this to everyone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Defective product received.
content: Firstly I am happy that when I received these earphones they have 100 percent battery. But after using for some hours I saw that it is always showing 100 percent battery. When I plug it to charger it never charged compleley. The red led never turns white as shown on OnePlus specifications page. I will initiate a return

name: Vishnu Raj
title: Value of money
content: very nice product , value of money , i bought it for my brother,. con's is - background noise are more high than caller voice.

name: Mohfeez
title: One ear phone not working for music!!
content: I received the product and checked, one ear phone is not working and i replaced it. Received other one, now i noticed that one ear phone is not working for music but both are working perfectly while talking to call. Don't know what's the problem.

name: Buyervlkm
title: Great product from OnePlus
content: Clear voice and noise cancellation. Bass is good and sufficient. Excellent battery back-up. Switch over and re-connection speed is also best in class.

name: Darshil
title: Only Buy if you like To listen Vocals
content: I just got this delivered. And its my honest review.. The quality of the product is amazing. But it has no bass. I must say there is nothing like bass in this neckband. But trable and vocals are amazing. So if you like to listen hip hop songs don't buy this.

name: vicky
title: One plus brand
content: After using it about month Everything is good about it, one plus has thought about the price and People, with this price range everyone can buy these earphone from OnePlus. Sound quality good, battery back is the best etc.

name: Joseph Zechariah
title: Great supplemet if a you have a good wired set just for music
content: I'm not a huge fan of Bluetooth earphones when it comes to sound quality.. they just don't do the job. But relative to other products.. the comfort, quick charge and the fast connectivity with OnePlus devices - this is a great product under 2k.. Quick charge, 15+ hours backup and switching devices with a double tap? I'm a fan!

name: Ashwin cs
title: Not for gaming, no noise cancellation
content: Latency problem with pubg gaming except that its nice. I am using OnePlus 5 mobile. Noise cancellation is not upto mark. Will hear too much background noise.

name: Chudamani Neyyala
title: 1+ bullets z Superb
content: I like it very much just because of sound quality and bass. While playing PUBG smooth sound quality with no irritation.. Call quality also super. It is arrived two days before delivery date. Amazon courier works fast. At Rs.1999 price it is very best Bluetooth earphones I've bought.

name: Kunal Sherpa
title: Loved it
content: Sound quality is good. The bass could have been a little more but its ok given the other cool features like fast charging, quick switch b/w devices and water resistant.. Tip: For OnePlus users turn on the fnatic mode while Playing games like pubg for improved sound sync. Overall an awesome product.

name: Dody
title: Awsome product.. but not for calling!
content: It's an awesome product under 2k.. Pro's. Good sound quality. Awesome battery backup. Noice cancellation is fine. Comfort to use. Cons:. *It makes a tik tik noice after some continuous usage.they replaced item bt still issue exist. * Mic will receive more surrounding sound than yours while calling.

name: Shubham Kamble
title: Don't think too much, it's worth it's Price.
content: Connectivity is a plus (5/5). Sound Quality similar like Sennheiser CX 180 (4.5/5) , Bass is pretty Good (3.5/5). I bought it 2 months ago. And let me tell u it really is a quality product. I've been using wireless earphones for a while now and I can say this one is the best I came across.

name: Pranay
title: Go for it!!
content: Excellent built very low weight.very comfortable.nice sound quality but lags in bass so if you are hindi songs lover this might disappoint you in terms of bass but if you are not concerned about bass then go for it. OP has just launched wireless bullets z with improved bass at same price that might take a month or two to be available on amazon!!

name: vinay kumar
title: When I will get my refund ?
content: Product was not good .... battery was not good. after full charging , the device get discharge within 30 min that’s why I return the product on next day ... also the product was picked 1 July 2020 but still I didn’t recieved my refund...

name: Sachin
title: WORKED ONLY FOR 4 MONTHS
content: WORKED FINE FOR 4 MONTHS BUT NOW ITS GLOWING DIM WHITE LIGHT CONSTANTLY. NEITHER CHARGING NEITHER CONNECTING. MAGNET SWITCH OFF IS NOT WORKING ALSO.

name: Animesh Kanungo
title: Awesome battery backup
content: Good for its price, battery backup is humongous. I charge these earphones once in 8-10 days and still it gives me 4-5 hrs of playback time daily. Only one issue sometimes auto-connection is not accurate, even on OnePlus phones.

name: MAHESH SAHU
title: Best Earphones under 2000
content: 1.Sound Qualityly 9/10. 2. Bass 10/10. 3. Battery 9/10. 4. Design 9/10. 5. Charge 10/10. 6. Noise cancellation 9/10

name: SANKHADEEP DEB
title: ONEPLUS NE DHOOM MACHADI.
content: Awesome Bluetooth headset,Bass are low but overall sound quality is vastly better then rs 2000/ other available Bluetooth headset..must buy without any hesitation, Go for it..

name: stanis
title: Low Base... But Audio Tuner can help fix it somewhat
content: Lots of features like Battery life... Bluetooth sync between 2 device... Only Major issue is Base... But If you have Audio Tuner that can be fixed to some extend... I think its worth INR2000

name: MariMuthu B
title: Best and good oneplus had phone
content: Good quality, easy handling,sound quality is good,25 min charging withstand 1 and half days with full use .normal use battery life is 3 days in 25 to 30 min charging.Best head phone and Buds are too big for me.

name: Jatin
title: No Never Settle logo.
content: Why is the "Never Settle" Logo missing on my product

name: Muddassir
title: Earbuds Problem
content: I only have one issue with this earphone is that the left earbud doesn't fit in my ear, it fell oftentimes and I have tried every earbuds. The left side earphone is heavy than right side so left earbud fell from my ear, and everything is great. Sound quality is great.. Fast Charging.. Battery last a Day

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best in-class earphone
content: The best part about this earphone is the awesome battery backup. Another, worthy feature is the seamless switches between 2 bluetooth devices. Highly recommended for calling, but if you are a music enthusiast I will recommend the Bass addition of the same earphone..

name: Muhammed sakkeer
title: Best Product Under 2k
content: Amazing Battery Backup Excellent Quality but sound quality is not much better . This product is perfectly matched for one plus devices. If you have any oneplus device Gohead it's yours.....

name: Utkarsh
title: It is made ONLY for oneplus.
content: Everything is as promised but this is exclusively for oneplus. I tried it with Iphone, all the features does not support. Everytime you receive a call you will have to select the audio output manually on the phone. I tried it with MI, does not support quite well. Once you disconnect, quite difficult to connect again.

name: Ayushi Singh
title: Connectivity issues
content: The sound quality, range, and design are all great but they keep getting disconnected again and again. I use them with a OnePlus 6 and have been facing this issue ever since I got them. Sometimes, even after turning my bluetooth off, it shows that they're still connected and I can't get my mobile audio to work and I just ???????

name: HIMANSHU
title: WOWWW
content: If ur using OnePlus device and u play pubg on this, Then this is for u guys and If ur not using oneplus device and u want to play pubg then it's not for u guys. For music Lovers its just Fabulous thing to buy, bcs I have used Boat, Realme, Xiaomi, and oppo but non of this was this good, Value for money thing, one time investment

name: Prithvi
title: Pathetic experience
content: Just received the product half an hour back, low sound, no bass, mic is not at all working.. Will never recommend anyone for this product, i am a person who loves music with amazing bass and sound quality, but this product is 0 for me.. Defective product, not at all worthy, don't spend 2000 Rs on this crap product.

name: pradhan
title: Great connectivity and fast charging
content: In this price range it was an great head set and have amazing features but the sound quality was not good and faceing some laging isu when playing game. But the for normal usage these are great and changing was very fast and also connectivity was very good and not faceing any problems in connectivity.

name: shubham shrivastava
title: One buds review
content: These are Damn good and with one plus 8 this is a beast if you enjoy gaming. It says 20 hours of playback. Its true but only in watching movies and in gaming around 14 to 15 hrs you can say atleast. But with one plus 7 series and 6 series low latency didn't work quite well. On one plus 8 series you can observe how low latency works

name: Virat hrx arya
title: Thanks Amazon whole team
content: Just had these delivered today..!! Amazing sound.. Best bass. Best noise cancellation. Everything is best. In love with this headphones,. Thanks Amazon For Repecment Quickly

name: Himanshu
title: No bass but good battery life and connectivity
content: It's good earphone if you only buying for calling and long battery purpose. For music lovers it's not grrat. Even after using bass booster am unable to get any good bass. Vocals are good so if you don't care about bass it's good

name: Vishwa
title: No bass ,worst experience
content: Genuine review. Pros:. Excellent built quality. Good charging. Type c. Fast charge. Cons:. No bass worst. In bass 150 rs earphones is best I think. Volume is low. Good instruments. Simple who is not interested in bass can buy this. Intrested in bass better go to realme

name: himanshu
title: Mixed opinion
content: Writing this review after 2 weeks of purchase my opinion regarding this product is mixed got this product at 2000 sound quality is good,battery life and charging is also great available in market the only field where it lacks is bass quality and high latency even while watching movies you can notice sound delay

title: Superb one of his kind in this range
content: Don't think for a second whole day I was listening music and have watched two episodes and battery is 65% two days three days easily it will।give you backup

name: HARIKRISHNAN J
title: The only WARP charging enabled Wireless Headset
content: 10 mins to full charge and 10 hours of uninterrupted music. As promised, it delivers - bass quality is decent and the best part is that it does over amplify the sounds and never fails to capture even minute details of a song which in my opinion of what makes it special for a wireless headphone with a price range of below 2k. Go for it!

name: Amazonian
title: Very good quality earphones in the price range
content: I'm writing this just after opening the box.. There is a lag when you listen by connecting to a laptop.. Overall the sound quality is excellent and the connectivity speed is off the charts!. Bass quality is somewhat good.

name: Narender Sharma
title: Amazing earphone
content: Meets my expectations.. Thnx #Oneplus and #Amazon :)

name: RAMANESH M
title: Just grab it fast.....
content: No Other thoughts required just order these..... Really so good beast of current trends.. Sound is excellent...... music lovers just enjoy these...vocals,beats,tunes are so crystal clear.. Don't expect much bass.... still it's a beast... you'll just love it

name: Bashir Ansari
title: Every penny worth.
content: Top quality product. At this price range, it is worth every penny. Sound is good. Bas is good. Overall build quality is very good.

name: Km
title: Not good for calls
content: Calls are unclear and filled with disturbance. Cannot return after hardly a week - so usually the problem kicks in after a bit of usage and then you are stuck. There is no way to contact the seller also. I bought the Bass version and the sound quality is so-so only (bass or otherwise). Better to go with more established brands.

title: Faulty headphones received
content: Product came as a faulty one.. while on charge the led blinks on the headphone but once i detach the buds, i cant pair with any device. Looks like charge issue, my headest are not getting charged.. I have order previously the same product and happy with the quality provided, but my second order is a failure. Requested for return

name: Aamir
title: Awesome headphone by oneplus...
content: This headphone is really awesome. I am writing this review after 1 week of usage. The colour is really cool and charge is superb. Charge is going for 3 days after charging 1 time.....thank you amazon for quick delivery and quality product......

name: NIDHI AGARWAL
title: One plus pods sucks ....never buy it....u end up being troubled only
content: Don't wvwn want to post a picture. The device doesnt give back for more than half an hour. Doesn't charge fully. Amazon says talk to the merchant. Merchant has not contacted me back. The merchant is not approchable for warranty. Amazon or merchant warranty doesn't work. One plus sucks .. Highly disappointed

name: Bhavin Jain
title: Nice product
content: The sound quality is excelllent for the price offered. Controls are convenient. Battery life, controls, light weigth, comfort of use for long time are other added advantages.

name: Lakshminarayanan N
title: Once again a best quality VFM product.
content: Once again, OnePlus prooves it's quality. No strain to years, smooth sound after long use. Battery life amazing. Vlaue for money.

name: Ds Swarup
title: Oneplus bullets wireless z Review
content: Pros.......... 1.Good Build Quality. 2.Sweat Proof. 3.Has Fast Warp Charge(10min charge gives 8-9.5hrs of playback). 4.Low Latency Support(Pubg Sounds Good😁). 5.Low Price Tag💥. 6.Good Colour Options. Cons......... 1.Bass Not Upto The Mark. 2.9.2mm Driver Is Not As Good As 10mm Dynamic Driver In Wireless 2)

name: Muthu Vignesh
title: Battery & Convenience !!!
content: Pros:. 1.Best in class battery. 2.Fast Connectivity. 3.Convenient quick switch. 4.Decent sound quality. 5.Good Build Quality. 6.Good Call quality. Cons:. 1.Lacking Bass. 2.Fast charging other than Warp charge does not exist.. Summary:. If you can put up with some low bass, Best in class

name: Harish
title: Never buy this.
content: Omg this is worst quality sound. Hearing sound like ₹100 headphones. So poor quality sound...... First time bought 1+ product very bad experience. Never ever try this 2k ₹ waste.. Please rename as 0-

name: Vaishali Dhote
title: One plus is one plus 😍🥰😍
content: I wasn't expecting it would be this great..... 10 min =90%=10 hours. 15mints=100%=22hours with full volume. If you want best products within your budget go for it you won't regret it. I'm using it every 18 hours a day and still my ears won't hurt.. You would love it.. Thank me after you buy it.

name: arpita bhattacharjee
title: ONEPLUS ❤️❤️❤️
content: Excellent product.... If you are Oneplus user, don't think twice about this product.... I am very satisfied... Sound Quality Outstanding. Noise collection 👍. Bass quality Excellent.... Within 10 mints 100% charge..Will work for 20 hours..... I found the Colour is also very Sexy..!

name: Rishabh
title: Good purchase
content: It's a really nice product and the sound quality is also amazing for the price you pay. The product quality is also really good and really light weight. I also like the battery back up that it gives and charges completely in a giffy using the OnePlus warp charger.

name: Megha
title: Sound is amazing
content: Sound, battery backup and everything is amazing, only thing I don't like is that it doesn't fit well inside the ear, the design is not good.

name: Harshit Shukla
title: Too much latency( over 01 whole second)
content: Cons- 1) Too much latency. There is a latency of over 1 second.. 2) Doesn't connect in Android 6-7 or below.. 3) The beep light is too bright(especially when using in the night). 4) Fully plastic material.. Pros- 15 hrs battery backup.

name: shyam karki
title: West for Manny
content: Sound quality wasted my money. Today I got delivery, thanks to Amazon for quick delivery... sound 2 star because not expected such low level sound quality.. sound quality is not good vary bad no Bass..😠. But battery life is very good

name: ROHIT ROY
title: OnePlus 🔥🔥🔥🔥
content: Sound quality - 10/10. bass quality-8/10. noise cancellation-10/10. bettery backup-10/10. mic quality - 10/10. overall quality is good and best for gaming👍 best good quality wireless headphone in 2000rs.. OnePlus 🔥🔥

name: Akii
title: Overall all packed...so it's like 19- 20 in sound
content: I would say...the sound is balanced...not so high bass boosted..or not so troubled.... That's for sound.... Now the battery... Nothing to say ... It's awesome in battery...it lasted me for almost 17-18 hours .... Overall I would say.. The product is good as many product coming on this price range .... Thanks for reading...😉

name: Anonymous
title: Does the job well, for the price
content: The earphones connect smoothly. The sound is good. One caller claims that they can't hear voice clearly but others don't complain. So, that may be an exception.

name: Veeresh
title: STEAL
content: Received the product just a few hours ago and have been using it since then.. I haven't really used Bullets 2 but prior to this was using Sony wireless earphones of the same range and trust me Oneplus stands out both in terms of sound quality and price range. I would recommend this product to anyone who's looking for wireless earphones in and around 1-3k.

name: Saurabh Saxena
title: Just best
content: Good bass... And sound quality is very good

name: Arun thomson
title: Product is good.. But check your earphone for any damages
content: Build and sound quality of product is good but the seller is selling product with seals already open. When you pay a price for a brand new earphone you a expect a fresh pair of earphones and not a used product.. Product is good but can't say the same about the seller.. It happened twice that's why I am saying.. Buy cautiously

name: Ankit Chauhan
title: Good product but not for gaming.
content: Very low bass and not for gaming... But one thing i liked about this is that we can switch between two devices by pressing the switch button twice... It really helps alot. #innovation

name: vrushali salunke
title: Planning?? Go for it!
content: I must say they are worth buying. No connectivity issues faced. Best audio quality, will give a good company during workout!😉

name: Lokendra
title: Perfff💥💯
content: Tip- find the right ear bud according to your ear !. And the bass is perfect ! To all those who are saying it's less, just find the right bud.. Another oneplus product and I'm still fan of oneplus.. There are some glitches while using the product idk why is that so !

name: Abhiedd
title: The best you can get for your money.
content: Even though its made out of plastic, the overall quality feels premium. The sound is well balanced and sounds easily comparable to headphones of higher price segment. Of ofcourse there are compromises to keep the price low but nothing that you can't live with. Overall, its great product for the price.

name: Manikandan M.M
title: Not suitable for Voice calling. It won't work.
content: Very disappointed. 1 month no problem after that i have Bad experience, it doesn't work during phone calls but shows as connected. I have to use my phone in earpiece mode until the voice come through headset (Note: my phone settings are ok). Media play and Bass is ok. Not suitable for Voice calls.

name: Sahil Kabeer
title: You have a 1+ device then go for it.Dont think too much.
content: Perfect partner for oneplus device.One of the most neckband of the gadgets unde 2k.Sound and bass vibrations excelent for 1+ device.No latency on Pubg,but you shoul use fnatic mode must.. Battery life is mindblowing peefomence and itz water proof.Build quality isalso superb.Dont think too much you have a 1+ device and go go for it .my rating is 5/5

name: Ankit Singh
title: At last my search for a good earphone is completed
content: I am so happy that i made the decision to buy this product is way better then apple air pods im so in love with this ear phone.. Thank u amazon. Thank u oneplus. Packaging is really really good.

name: Nikhil Puj
title: A worth buying product
content: Features are good like multiple connections and switching between devices.. Sound could have been better but overall product is pretty good in 2k segment. It feels premium and wire rubber material is thick which is best.

name: Balaji
title: Bad quality
content: Not worth for 2000... Body quality - ok. Sound quality - Not Bad. Bass - No bass i think. Worth for - below 1000. Selling only because of the brand name, simply was of money..

name: Common Man
title: Quality music
content: Excellent sound quality. Very nice and best neckband . I tried so many neckbands but one plus z sound bullets really super. Music lovers must buy this neckband.

name: Sivashankar N
title: Best wireless headset for calls
content: If you are using just for calls then this the best wireless Bluetooth headset with wonderful battery backup, Type C fast charging, premium look, easy to wear and easy to connect. If u need to listen to music it will give decent output but not the best.

name: Dipu Kumar
title: Nice choice  for all types
content: Sound quality is so good for you have to listen all types of music except bass music ,because bass is normal as a simple earphone....and for calling its a best option that you have choice 👍🏼......and the battery life is for music 20 hour experience this is so amazing ...this is all about that my experience when I used it...

name: Gagan
title: These bullets are like actual bullets
content: The delivery was very fast and i got it next day of ordering.. Yeah its a very good product. Sound and bass clarity is very good . I can also hear some of the small beats also. When it comes to calling the other side person can hear us clearly but they can also hear some of the outside sound. But its value for money.....

name: surajgeorge
title: Not worth the money
content: I have been using this product for 1 month and after using this product it did not meet my expectations bass is not that great if you are a music listener this is not for you .Noise cancellation is not that great while playing pubg i like this headset best feature of this product less charging time needed not worth 2000 rps

name: Tilak_tinku
title: Worth and trust on company👍
content: Worth the ammount we spend and the main cool feature is the battery omg i haven't charged since 2 days from the date of arrival of parcel. The quick switch is awesome we can work and attend the calls easily . I think the range is so less and experiencing slight disturbances when we are a bit away from mobile and during calls

name: Ramdayal Bareth
title: True review
content: Sound quality is extremely poor..base is extra poor . Even during the phone call I feel like very very cheap earphone.So I seriously request to one plus that they need to much more work on sound quality. I like only 1 things that is quick pairing system and battery backup as well as fast charging.

name: Pandurang K
title: Best working with AAC enabled phones
content: I have redmi note 6 pro and AAC is not there. AAC quality is very nice but this doesn't work in redmi note 6 pr. It works by SBC and sound is good but not as high quality as AAC

name: Kaif
title: Mic
content: I got mic defeated

name: Prabhakar Yalla
title: Satisfied
content: Sound is excellent.. Bass quality is also very good.. call quality is amazing.. super battery life.. the only problem is latency while playing games.. there is no problem even while watching a video but while playing games sound comes late.. product is not good for Gamers.. other than that.. the product is very good.. overall I will give 4 stars out of 5..

name: ashish b
title: Go for it
content: Has really good call quality. No issues with both iOS and android. Battery is descent . No connectivity issues.sound volume is good but quality is avg

name: Sushil Pandey
title: Doesn't meet expectations.
content: First of all. Don't go on the name of the Brand. You will get better sound quality in Oppo wireless earphone compare this. It gives flat sound. Also while watching movie on OTT platforms you hardly hear any low sound dialogues. For PROs it has fast charging and great battery life only. This is a true review.

name: Nikhil
title: Versatility -5 stars, everything else below averave
content: Connectivity- Very Good. Durablibity- Good. Sound quality- Below average. You do not want to continue having this headphone on your ears for more than 1 hour.. The music/ sound gets stuck in ear canal making entire experience painfull. Call reception on other side is also poor.

name: SJ
title: Left earpiece stopped working
content: Bought this in May, around 28th.. Built quality is great.. Amazing battery backup.. Sound quality is superb.. But, after 2 months my left earpiece stopped working. I am really disappointed as I wasn't expecting this from OnePlus. I am not sure if it was just with the product I received or is it everyone!

name: Dinesh
title: good bluetooth earphones if you are using oneplus phones
content: headset works perfect with onplus 8 but when i switch to ios it has some lagging issues sound is buffy sometimes but iver all very nice product mainly impressed me with its battery life charge for 10 minutes get 10 hours battery life

name: DD Kushwaha
title: Nice device.. works well. Worth
content: After daily use for more than a month:-. Good sound quality.. Bass also ok.. Battery backup more than 10-12 hrs.. Connection time only 2-3 second.. Price Worth.. Go for it without any doubt.

name: Shubham
title: A decent product.
content: I have been using this earphones as my primary one for past 4 months. Below are the points I would like to share.. Is battery life your no. 1 priority?. Go for it.. If good bass is your priority, look out for some other option.. Sound quality is good.. Overall the product is decent.

name: Kapil
title: Great earphones.
content: Earphones are quiet nice. Best in this price range. Battery performance is on another level. 🔥 I saw people complaining about the bass, but I didn't felt any less bass I don't know how much more bass people want?! This is good product and great if you have an oneplus phone.

name: Sagar.P.Shelar
title: Balanced earphones
content: Overall a great earphones, reviews wer not great in bass but I didn't found it, has a good amount of bass and balanced, initial stage for 10 days it was hurting in ear but later no problem. The connection with laptop is not working good, have to use a spare wired one for office calls.

name: Aashay Deshpande
title: Good overall product
content: This earphones slightly lesser value for money comparing it to the Boat rockers 355 neckband. This is a typical OnePlus product with better feature experience but the double press and triple press to change songs is not the best experience.. Dont buy this is if you have small ears, they hurt "a lot".

name: Saksham j.
title: Sa e your money Don buy
content: Don't buy this for one plus brand on because you heard of one plus buds they are a cheap version made to look the same. The connection time is very slow the latency mode doesn't work always and you can't take calls the mic is of very low quality plus they aren't very comfortable

name: Ankit Sinha
title: 2000rs for a beautiful thing💞
content: I have been using this for 3 days. Firstly i want to talk about the brilliant battery backup. And second the quality of the sound.. Believe me you are not going to waste your 2000 rs for this.. Easy to handle and features are exellent. such as auto connect feature when you plug it in your ears.. Amazing product. #oneplus love💞

name: Uma Shankar
title: I'm satisfied with it.
content: This product have good quality but bass is not most powerful it also contains 360 degree sound. Sound quality is good. Comfortable with ear of us. Battery is most powerful pat of it, it is make it genuine for a personality. It is not make any noise only music. It is also block environmental noise. Finally it is good for me.

name: Dr Subir Roy
title: Discharges fast
content: Sound is ok. Nothing exceptional. Problem is with my piece- it gets discharged really fast. Forget 17 hours, its discharging within 8 hours. And fast charging does not really work.. I am sure this is the issue specific to my piece.

name: RAVISH BATRA
title: Good deal
content: POSITIVES. 1.SUPERB BUILD QUALITY. 2.EXCELLENT FOR CALLING. 3.BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY IS AWESOME. NEGATIVES. BASS IS JUST OK. OVER-ALL THE PRODUCT IS GOOD IN 2000RS.

name: Manu Payyada
title: Returned due to connection issues
content: Everything about this headset I heard from the reviews was right, but unfortunately my piece had connection problems. It getting disconnected frequently.. Returned this product

name: Gaurav Maratha
title: Uncomfortable and Poor sounding
content: Quite uncomfortable earphone for long listening experience. There is very less instrument separation. Quite muddy output, with very less capability of reproducing high tones.

name: Keerthy kumar
title: amazing quality and charges in 10 mins
content: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z in-Ear Bluetooth Earphones are full worth the money. the quality of sound, effects and noise cancellation are making it worth a buy. no regrets. worth the investment.

name: Krishlodhi
