title: Defective mic
content: I like tha product. But after 10 days its mic do not works properly so i want to replace it with a new one plus z bullets earphone. Since it carries warranty period. So please help me to change it

name: Sachin Saurav
title: Awesome
content: Loved it.....no complaints at all.... everything is just too good.... sound quality, bass , treble, highs and lows...you can feel it all..

name: ATul SHarma
title: average sound with non oneplus devices
content: using with samsung note 8 but sound is not very loud and bass is just okay sound is clear and clean but not loud.. connectivity is smooth and quality of material is great.

name: R Deepak
title: Value for money product
content: Packing was so cool..... The touch and feel of the package and product was soooo soft..... Sound quality is superb.... Fit is firm and after some time I forget Tat it's even there.... And the base is like wowwwwwwwwww..... Soft and perfect... Over all I loved it....

name: Sriyansh
title: Oneplus
content: Battery Backup is just amazing sound quality is awesome high's and lows are good over all sound is very pleasent but if u are bass lover ignore these i m using it since last 6 months and it has never disappointed me i use them very roughly but build quality is so awesome these products from oneplus is awesome

name: Aadil
title: No happy with such purchase
content: Product is not upto mark۔ for 2 to 3 months worked fine but then mic problem ۔ voice on the receiving end gets damped۔. Mic problem, voice is not heard at other end clearly. What is the fun if this won't work even for a year. And long standing time this is not a quiet good purchase if such problem arises.

name: hardik tyagi
title: Build quality is military grade😂
content: Left earbud stopped working after 1 month of usage. Very sad experience with OnePlus. Black crush and color degradation at low brightness in onePlus 8 pro. Wireless buds going silent after 1 month.. Will recommend to stay away from onePlus until they get their act together.

name: Tejas Khare
title: Amazed by these
content: Amazing earphones under Rs 2k.. You can feel the bass lacking in some of the songs but it does a great job overall.. Noise cancellation works great too for a price of 2k.. Battery life is like way above the price range so that's awesome. Call quality is very good too.

name: Akshay Jawalkar
title: Head started paining. Low bass. Chillar sound
content: Anyone going for atleast a medium bass, ignore this earphone. Very worst sound quality. Sounds like Chillar and like 50 rupees earphone.. Anyone for watching Netflix series may orefer it. But again bass quality too low.. Head starts to pain after listening for more than 1 hour.. Worst experience

name: Prabhat Singha
title: Killer Earphone
content: One time u charge it....u can enjoy almost 20 hours ....it's built quality is really aswam....so soft ..u can listening song when u r in sleeping position.....best quality in this budget ....nd its sound preety balance u can feel the bass in low sound.....also best for playing pubg...u can feel the foot steps

name: Vikas Uikey
title: Bluetooth Connectivity Issue
content: this device we are using with my oneplus 6t phone, and while i am calling someone then the bluetooth is disconnecting again and again.. and every time this problem is coming while i am calling.

name: Sahil
title: red cable and extra pairs of buds missing
content: there is no red charging cable and extra pair of buds inside the box disappointed, i request you to please arrange it.

name: Ddev😊
title: The best one
content: Received may 21st. This earphone gives you the perfect escape. Impeccable sound quality which gives you the hometheatre feeling. Bass quality sure is one to be mentioned and yeah it is sweatproof!. Bingo!!!

name: CharanKanwal
title: Value for money at INR 2,000/-
content: This is typical one plus product. At INR 2,000 price point, these headphones are spot on. Sound quality aside (which is good of course), it has great call quality. Features such as quick pair, fast charging, comfort etc. are something which give its edge over the competition. Highly recommended!

name: vaibhav chauhan
title: Looking at the price, the product is good.
content: Bass edition has definitely more bass than the regular bullets Z. But it has an average sound quality. I was a bit disappointed with the battery life. Not getting battery backup as claimed by oneplus. Charging is pretty quick. Build quality is good. Overall looking at the price range it is good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not so great
content: Disappointed. Wanted to use the microphone for recording songs but there is a lot of delay that ruins the karaoke.. Bass is decent but mids and highs are not great. For 2k earphones, they are ok ok.

name: NYADE NOMUK
title: Highly recommended
content: Go for it without a second thought. Awesome earphone comfortable on ear with good sound quality. Plus point is it has a fantastic bass

name: Reviewer999
title: Loving it...
content: Superb product by OnePlus.. Satisfactory in terms of battery life (charge once in 3 days) , sound quality, call quality etc.

name: Rajnisg suvagiya
title: Value for money💰
content: Heare i added original item pics what i have receved.. Very impressive👍. If you want listen over music like loud bass not possible on this. Because it's like provide you nature 🌿🍃 sound with compatible bass.. Best product by one plus.. No connection issues. Also fast paired within 1-2 sec. Really ⚡fast.

name: Rakesh m k
title: Connectivity
content: Sound bass quality of material is all satisfaction, but connectivity for 33 feet is not true, I can't move around at house connect to phone , if that is solved it is great to use ,. atleast 100 feet connectivity made possible then no need to hold ur phone with you in home or office.

name: rakesh gupta
title: beast in every situation.
content: Really, It is wonderful earphone under rs1999. I went through lots of youtube review. I was just confused about it's bass. but guys, bass is really good. voacal is impressive. sound is clear too. in case of it's features no any earphone can beat it. it is beast in charging and in battery backup. if you have budget nearly 3000. just go for it. and save 1000.

name: mohd taukeer
title: Overall it is a very good product & value for money
content: Sound quality is very good and bass is normal in this means it has sufficient bass that we can enjoy. Battery backup is awesome i am using from yesterday approximately i have used 10 hours and it still has 60% battery i think it will match the company's announcement.. I have a great experience with oneplus bullets z.

name: Aviskar Kanjilal
title: Amazing product with perfect value for money
content: This product ia the best in its range. I have bought other neckbands of the same ramge including realme and this one stands out. It gets full charge in 10 minutes exact and can run up to 10 hours with call and music. Built quality and sound quality is fine for the price.

name: Kolla Srinivasa Rao
title: Overall Best Product Under 2k
content: I am purchased renewed product at 1040.00 price. looks like new and no item miss.. Sound quality and performance is good compare to Normal edition.. Thank you Amazon. ✌. Amzon is good choice of all shopping categories.

name: sathwik
title: Totally disappointed 😥... Not for bass lovers...
content: Absolutely nothing in these Bluetooth bullets... No sound clarity no bass expected no noise cancellation... Price is low but do not fall for it unless u using one pluse mobile this doesn't work for other mobile brands... Looks premium but not that accessible to other devices..... Finally disappointed 😥....

name: Subhash SJ
title: Worth and Best for soft and steady music lovers
content: Best in this range compare to other brands, build quality is okay, but the sound quality is top level and it goes great and feels too good when you listen the songs in major music apps such as wynk, Amazon music or Spotify

name: raul
title: Go for it
content: Great product. I was using the bullet 2 before this. No major changes from that one. They don't provide the carry case in this one. But overall great product.. The magnet on/off feature is so good that it is difficult to use a pair of wireless headphones without it after using this.

name: Saurabh kumar
title: Best one if you're not heavy base lover
content: Don't get me wrong it does have nice base but not that hard.. If you are OK with decent amount of base then go for this without any second thought.

name: Abhishek chauhan
title: Disappointed
content: there is a connection problem with my 6, I don't know if its the problem with the phone or the earphones. It connects and suddenly disconnects after a few seconds. Even when playing songs are breaking in between.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Call quality issue.
content: Music feels very good to hear but getting crackling noise during all my calls in a month's useage.. After doing factory reset this issue goes but reappears in the subsequent calls.. Hoping to get replacement

name: Mr.lucky
title: Awesome product
content: It is very good product..i love this product...super sound quality...good noise cancellation...and main thing is it's battery life... very very good battery life I really impressed...I use minimum 19 hrs with 30 min charge...the bass is low but it doesn't matter for me... it's very good product

name: Anand S K
title: You can go for it
content: Good quality wireless neck band sound is quality is nice bass is ok not too much bass but good. Thumping sound is good.

name: Ritik gupta
title: Value for money.... It's could be much better if price little much more less
content: Best earphones under 2000....price is little much high.... Realme earphones is much better nd price is also low... Overall if u will see this is best earphones.... Nd battery back up company claim for 20 hour bt its up 15-18 hours depend on ur uses... Bt its really charge to fast it gives 8 hour of charge in 10 min

name: Jagdish Parmar
title: It's good deal in this price range.
content: The sound quality is descent. Noise cancellation is very good in calling & during listening music it's good. Vocals clearly head. I'm disappointed with bass quality. The bass is normal, not up to mark. It's not for bass lover.

name: Neelrajsinh Jadav
title: Amazing product by One Plus.... worth it
content: I'm fall in love with this bullet... Awesome product...😍😍 Must buy it for OnePlus device users, I'm using this wireless bullet with my OP 5T. Speaker and bass quality is amazing....👍. Delivery is little bit deley from Amazon..... Built quality is also good.... It's look like one plus wireless bullet 2. Thank u One Plus....👍

name: Ajit K.
title: It's just amazing.
content: Sound quality is just amazing.. Bass is good.. Noise Cancellation is also good.. And it has quick charge and long lasting battery. So you can enjoy music and play game for a long period of time. Just charge 20 min and enjoy 20 hours.. I am very much impressed with the sound quality of this earphone.

name: Jagriti
title: Best in the market
content: The headset is really good,like it says 10 min charge and 10 hour playtime.first I thought it’s not possible but to my surprise it turned out to be true.i liked the sound quality it’s too good,noise cancellation is at par and battery backup is the best.Go for it u won’t regret.thanku oneplus for such an amazing headset.

name: Hello...
title: Not satisfied for this price
content: I have seen many reviews and finally bought it but I experience that sound quality it not much good as expected, I have mi basic earphones before it sounds better than this ... I don't know you will believe or not but really I feel disappointed by sound clarity. Expected that quality is good battery is also very good ..

name: Priyanka Basak
title: It is recommendable!
content: Using it for 2 months now, its sound quality is really good better than other brands I know. It gets fully charged in just 10 mins and then I can use it the whole day. But there is just one problem, when you watch a video the sound comes a bit late after video, so its difficult to match up. Otherwise the product is good.

name: Jay K.
title: Superb soubd quality, best in everyway
content: I had a doubt while buying that is it better than the bass edition?. But after buying i m fully satisfied that everything is perfectly balanced, the bass is enough not over powered while listening i haven't feel it lacking in anyway, I've used sony bass edition headphones and it's much better than that.

name: Abdul Hakkim A J
title: Awesome
content: Awesome product. I really like it🥰. Design build quality and especially battery backup is amazing. Only one thing is bass is ok but not good.Over all product super.But one thing I didn't see the never settle logo inside the box..that's why...?

name: suman
title: Microphone problem
content: May I please know why the microphone isn't working while I am making the normal calls and it is working while doing a what's app call ?

name: Vinay Rao
title: Best Headphones for this price ♥️
content: I have not used the previous one plus headphones .. bought this for the first time... Very fast connectivity and switching between paired devices .. long battery life and stylish design.. Loved it and I highly recommend it for all OnePlus phone users especially ♥️♥️. I connected it for my one plus 6 and MacBook Air.. works perfectly 👌👌🔥♥️😍

name: Tamilselvanas
title: Useful gadget
content: Such an awesome gadget. Major advantage is its power back-up.. bluetooth disconnect feature when magnet touches each other. Charge lasts minimum for 3~4 days. Compact to wear behind the collar. Exact length of ear phone wires. Best to buy in reasonable price.

name: Vigyan Anand
title: Affordable & reliable
content: The sound quality is just okay. Battery life is insane. Very light and comfortable. Great for sweaty workouts, jogging & cycling.. Watching video is more fun than quality music.

name: Rajesh Mupparthi
title: Decent sounding device
content: The overall quality of sound is good but the call quality could have been better as lot of noise arround us can be heard on the other side.one thing that is awesome is the battery backup which lasts for a day for an average user

name: Amazon Customer
title: A2Z like amazon
content: Reviewing this product after using for long days. Really appreciate and satisfied with product,though checked lot of reviews.. Happiee after experiencing myself. A2Z quality is good. Can buy without 2nd thoughts.

name: Salman Shamsudeen
title: Charging time.
content: The headphones is good. Good amount of bass and sound quality is nice. Some charging issue is there. The red light never turns white. It is taking more than 40 mins with one plus dash charger.

name: Shivendra Pratap Singh
title: Not recommed to buy
content: The sound is good .Battery is awesome !! But it keeps on disconnecting while on call .I exchanged it thinking ths might be issue that particular earphone.But the new headset had the same problem and moreover the new ones one side stopped working after 2 days.Returning it.

name: Akshay R
title: You love sound quality?..never buy this.! You want battery backup,etc...Buy it now..awesome
content: Battery, Charging, Easy to connect, Quality, Packing,....These features are awesome....... But...this is earphone....Main features are missing. sound based factors like sound quality...bass...noise cancellation ..etc. sound quality & bass are very very poor...like cheap & very local headset

name: Vivekbharathi
title: Worst brand one plush ,don't buy my huge request
content: I bought the headset on 22 October ,12 days agung but now the lest ear not working i called one plush customer care they said we have one and only repair service area at T nagar so my question is why it not working after 12 days and why only one repair service in chennai .Don't buy it guys it is poor customer service ..

name: BharathRam
title: Good for day to day usage
content: After using OnePlus z earphone for a month.. As said in ads 10 mins charge would enough for the day even in heavy usage.. People on the other end of the call will hear clearly hear background noise but not your voice. Noise cancellation is poor and sound quality is fair.. It's not for bass heavy users.

name: Aashna khan
title: Good at battery
content: If you searching for bluetooth earphone.... Then I will definitely recommend this one.... Sound quality is good... Noise cancelling is also good.... If I talk about bass,not that much good.... And battery is just aussom....11/10. Although It does not fits in ears properly.... But overall good....

name: Hardip Bakutra
title: Kindly solve my above mentioned problems.
content: There is one problem with the device i purchased.Sometimes it remains on despite the magnet of both earpiece will be attached.Not always but many times.And sometimes one earpiece will be off on its own.I have faced these problem after the date of return already passed.please suggest any solution.Thank you.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Really astonishing !
content: After a lot of research finally settled to bullets zee.. Amazon delivered it with nice packaging, with a descent volume and bass perfect for a music lover with clear and feels bit crunchy at higher volumes that doesn't matter much surly will blow your ears worth every penny just go for it you won't regret.

name: Junaid
title: good in music worst in GAMING
content: If you purchased this earphone only for the calling purpose and for the music then it is good but if you purchase it for the GAMING purpose than it is waste of money it is too bad too bad too bad..... and if you are in the room and there is is a running fan then other one hear like that there you are in near to the khatara cooler

name: Kaustubh P
title: OnePlus you Rock.
content: The overall sound quality is amezing I feel mids and high are great but i can't say great for bass. Bass is present but still there is a chance improvement, But at this amazing price tag which doesn't matter at all.. Connectivity and build quality are amezing no issues at all.. we can increase bass a little bit with the help of Equalizer😉.

name: Vishnu vardhan Reddy vemireddy
title: Best in quality and worth of money
content: It is one of the best wireless earphones I have bought untill now .. Worth of money the sound quality is perfect .. Any other brands can't get the competition to this earphones .. Best in audio quality and also best in sound quality also .. We can clearly hear the low voices also with this

name: rohan patil
title: Very poor battery life and bad noice cancellation
content: Product has good bass and sound quality.. Extremely poor battery life hardly sustain for 6 to 7 hours. Very bad notice cancellation. Will pain pain in ear if you wear for more than 1 hr.. Charging is fast within 25 mins.

name: Syam kumar
title: Base & noice cancellation...
content: There is no noice cancellation in this, and u didn't feel base at all...but..sound clarity and instrumental differentiation is awesome...keep an eye on improve base and noice cancellation ...totally best in quality...

name: Nadim Ahmad
title: Main highlight is battery backup and fast charging
content: Battery backup is good that is about 15 to 18 hours. Sound quality is also good on while playing movie or song but while talking on call sound quality is average. It takes 50 minutes to full charge. Overall it's ok.

name: Kaushik
title: Bang for the buck !!!!
content: Ordered and received within a single night. Bass is there but spend a few minutes and set the. Equalizer & then you will the bass as you need. So comfortable ,. If u have any OnePlus 6 above with the new update ,which has a decicated setup for z earphones, then the job is much more simple.

name: Aarav yadav
title: Zero noise cancellation but music and battery quality is amazing....
content: Earphones are awesome for music and for battery life. When it comes to noise cancellation it's like hell, when you are on call other person can hear each and everything going around you except your voice. I will never suggest anyone to buy this for calling. You will regret that your entire life. But for music it's amazing.

name: Raj Kumar
title: Good battery but noice cancellation and bass is not expected
content: Nice product, battery backup is good and as expected but noise cancellation and bass is not upto mark. Okay for this price range.

name: Rajesh S
title: Stopped working in 15 days
content: Bought this on 7th August and It stopped working on 20th August just 5 days after 7 days return time was over. It doesn’t charge anymore. Can’t return it or exchange it. Complete waste of money.

name: Ayush
title: Simply Amazing
content: Thanks Amazon to deliver this product before commitment.. For product I would say only few things that some of reviews are misguiding you not to buy this as it has no bass and gud mic etc!!.. But I would say it is best product available under 2-4k range category.. So go for it without any second thought.

name: Akash Batham
title: Good headset
content: A good pair of headphones. Overall they are perfect for someone who's looking for something that's super easy to carry and use. Battery life is around 12-15 hours not 20 but charging speed is super fast.

name: yoseph
title: Best product under this price segment 👌
content: I have been using OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z in ear bluetooth headsets for over a month now. They are very good. Value for money purchase. Charging, magnets-touch on-off, and sound quality are excellent. Bluetooth connectivity is very fast. Noise cancellation, sound quality and bass quality are good.

name: Chinmayee Sahu
title: The product got damaged in less than a month.
content: The product isn't functioning in less than a month. I had received the product on 3rd of August and now it's 31st August and the volume up and down and call receiving buttons aren't working. Had a lot of expectations from this product. The sound quality was good initially but now it has reduced to half all by its own.

name: Saitama
title: Awesome earphone but I feel the packaging is not original
content: Great product. Amazing mic and audio but the package i received doesn't look like the one which is received by other customers.. The never settle part is completely missing. 🥺

name: Rohith
title: One word - Amazing
content: The best part about the product is battery backup. It's AMAZING. sound quality is good and it fits quite well in ears. Liked the bass tone as well.

name: Pavitra
title: I dont like this product
content: For me this is not upto mark oneplus standard quality....bass quality is not upto mark...they mention that latency will be low on oneplus fnatic mode but on my oneplus 5 latency is very much high and i cant play games on this bluetooth earphone......otherwise battery life is very good...but if u buy for gaming purpose i dont recommend this product

name: Prateek Gupta
title: Loved everything except Noise cancellation...
content: Loved the product.. Bass-good. Battery life-good. Sound quality-good. Device connectivity - good. Mic quality-good. Noise cancellation works well in normal or noisy env. But if there is high wind in the background, noise cancellation doesn't work well.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Decent sound output with a good battery life, warp charge is a bliss!
content: Pros:. Comfortable to use for long hours. Warp charging. Long battery life. Cons:. Sound quality is Ok - strictly not for audiophiles, high bass lovers. Can connect to only 2 devices in parallel - if there is a 3rd Bluetooth device - it goes crazy!

name: Rohit
title: Everything u could ask for.😍😍
content: Fab aound quality very balanced sound,charges really quick even with normal charger 10 min charging gives upto 4 hsr of backup..and ofcourse with one plus warp chrge it takes 20 min to chage fully n lasts for around one and half day witb normal usage...one of the best quality product..

name: Rishab Mittal
title: Full Marks its awesome
content: Features are the best no comparison to any other product in market ... If buying for only music (Bass) then do reconsider else for talking over phone, switching between devices (i tried with 2 device non-onplus products) it worked super best and fast, battery is also good, no issues while doing work-out & good bluetooth Range ...#fullmarks

name: Ravi
title: Best Sound Quality
content: Best Sound Quality... I have used JBL and Sennheiser Earphone earlier..they have bass only. But If you want to feel the real Beats go with one Plus z bullets only.

name: Pavan
title: After 13 days Magnet switch off not workings.
content: Magnetic switch off not working soon return policy expired i don't know how to get warranty claim in this amazon. Got defect product.

name: Nikhil
title: Class but need a bit more
content: The earphones are perfect only thing they lack is the charging port cover. Dust and dirt may enter the charging port. Rest everything is perfect ..people who complaint of not being as loud as bose. Well you can't use with that level of sound for long. Rest classy look earpiece are half matte half shiney . But that's the difference btw bulletes 2

name: Yogesh Chandra Pant
title: No Bass at all...
content: There is no Bass...I regreat buying this but thanks to Amazon return policy.

name: Sachin Parmar
title: Best one
content: Best in this price range. No need to spend more for bluetooth headset. This is a product which can easily fulfilll all your needs. Music. Calls. Movie. Game

name: Akki
title: Useless purchase for this price
content: Noise cancellation doesn't work. Sound quality is also worst . No bass in it . Only good thing is it's battery life.

name: thanveer
title: Nice looking but less bass makes em not-nice hearing ones
content: Looks wise - good. Sound quality- good. But.... Bass quality is bad, you won’t just feel it. That’s my opinion

name: Danish
title: I want to return it...
content: Very less quality and not compatibility to redmi note 8.... Want to return this product.

name: D
title: Fit perfectly to feel perfectly.
content: To got a perfect feel of bass, you need to fit these in your ear untill u ensure outside noice to be cancelled.. Deep fitting in ear.. Then enjoy the music. A perfect product.. Don't go for realme, boat or any other.. Brand is the only "ONEPLUS". It really matters.

name: PD
title: 👍👍👍👍👍 day one impression are awesome.
content: The headphones has its own volume controls, when changed it does not change the mobile volume which is a cool feature. Pause the song automatically. Good sound quality. Packaging is also premium. Overall I really like the product 👍👍

name: Vaibhav Darkunde
title: Every time you need to disconnect-connect it to hear sound if you paused video/audio in the middle.
content: If we paused video/audio in the middle and then resumed it again then we can't able to hear sound, only video plays so we need to disconnect headfone and then reconnect it to hear sound of video. I have faced this problem a lot and it's kind of irritating. Every time you need to disconnect-connect it to hear sound.

name: Rajat
title: Below expectations !!!!
content: The sound quality is awesome when using with phone, but when I switched to laptop it drops down. Also faced some connection issues with laptop. The build quality is good. Noise cancellation is ok. Magnetic buds to stop and play works fine. Overall it works perfectly fine with phone but not with laptop. Returned after 2 days of use.

name: Aman Gangwani
title: Just go for it.
content: Best in class earphones. To be honest, i am using oneplus device and still dont feel any difference in gaming mode vs fnatic mode. Quick switch button is "the best feature"of this device as it lets me connect to my laptop everytime i have to switch. Overall a great deal at this price point.

name: ROUNAK MANDAL
title: No quick switch feature
content: There is no quick switch feature in this earbud, So if you want to buy this earbud for quick switch feature, then I recommed not to buy this earbud.

name: Adypriya15
title: Worst product by OnePlus
content: Firstly design is so uncomfortable it is very hard to fit in ear that mean you can't use while work-out...and sound is so low class you can't use in gaming ...not expected from great brand like OnePlus

name: sijo
title: Good one!!!
content: So far so good. Received item second day👍. Wireless Z fully charged in a normal charger with in 25 minutes. Sound quality is very good. I don't find this kind sound quality in this price. Overall good product. Go for it with out doubt.

name: Pankaj Gupta
title: Worst neckband you can purchase .
content: Worst sound quality, even worse than cheaper quality ones. Also built quality is very low. I had purchased it with great expectations but it totally anniyed me when I used it. Looks like a very lical type set which co. has procured from anywhere. Thanks I had purchased it from Amazon ,so I got my refund very easily.

name: MAYUR PATIL
title: Best at the prise point
content: Delivered one plus bullet wireless z today. After too much of market research I buy this earphone. Overall sound quality is best. Baas is also there and sufficient.. First I bought realme wireless but the sound quality of relame is disturbing due to over bass so i returned it and buyied one plus. Satisfied with one plus overall quality is best

name: Sufi S.
title: Worst earphone.. Totally waste of money..
content: Noise cancellation is worst.......don't buy from amazon coz they gives internal defective product...like the wireless.... Overall don't spend 2000 on this earphone better to buy boat quality is same and one can save 1000 rupees also.... So this earphone is worst only thing that is good is the battery...

name: Kumar Saurabh
title: Works fine except magnet has separated. Hard to use
content: Works fine. Smooth pairing and decent quality. One touch pair is also working smoothly.. In my piece the magnet has separated from one of the earbuds so will have to ask for a replacement. Not glued well I suspect. Otherwise build qual seems decent

name: Dwarampudi vinod reddy
title: No base, call breakage,No noise cancellation
content: I got used product without seal, so please check it. The product was not so good for long use ears were paining and no base, no noise cancellation

name: Shrutik
title: Worth buying
content: The sound is really good. I haven't tried noise cancellation yet. The bass quality was not good when I used it for the first time but after some days of use it got better and I don't know how. But now I'm happy with the bass as well. Overall it was worth buying at least for me.

name: Suraj Kumar
title: Loved it
content: Loved the product I love one plus product and the bas of this is too good but I will recommend to one plus that they should work on the outer part to make it more premium

name: Sai Sri Sailesh Kothapalli
title: Amazing Sound and Battery
content: Regardless of being a Chinese product, OnePlus always satisfies the customer in terms of quality. Sound and Battery are the major segments that score high here. One discouraging part is the latency while gaming, not up to the mark. Rest all, OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z is worth the price.

name: Radheya Taralkar
title: Perfection re- engineered
content: Pure And High quality sound . This bass edition is superb than the BWZ. The bass has been enriched. Battery life is also excellent and it's 10 min charge gives you 10hr of play which is superb in this segment.

name: Shubham
title: BEST WIRELESS EARPHONES UNDER 2000👍
content: Best wireless earphobes under 2000, I had used jbl, Sony and some other wireless earphones also but I don’t like the bass of them but of oneplus I loved it’s t bass and it’s tunes are so clear that a high pitch song can be heard clearly with no cracking of sound, don’t think just buy it👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

name: Abhijith CV
title: Sound Quality really great, automatic disconnect problem
content: Sound quality is good. Bass is standard. Better product than boat rockerz 335 (Apex hd). Oneplus have AAC codec.... After 1 day , the neckband is automatically disconnecting in a time of every 20 minutes(aprox).. Really irritating.. I just reset the headset. If the problem continues I wil return it back.

name: Christlyne D'souza.
content: The quality and the design is really excellent than the wireless 2 earphones!. Design of One Plus Bullets Z wireless is really very amazing, and this piece is really Very nice because neck band is part of rubber and soft..I really like it ..very think of one plus Bullets is very nice and brand product 😊👌🏻👍🏻

name: pooja hora
title: Perfect fit doesn't fall of Bang on Sound quality
content: Fit is great , can be used for running or jogging for sure as there are different sized earplugs delivered . Sound quality is bang on.. Perfect In ear headphones can be easily used in gym, on treadmill, for jogging etc. Very happy with the product

name: Saravanan
title: Weightless & Ultra fast charge
content: First Bluetooth headset which i bought and its performance is too good, fits perfect, sound & mike quality is good and best advance feature its full charged in 10 mins and automatically disconnect and goes to power saving mode when headset bud gets connected joined.

name: TC SAINI
title: Great
content: This product is good for sound qulity but it is best in long Battery life and quick charge

name: Kartik Vashishtha
title: Good and very loud but not better than oppo enco m31
content: The sound quality is amazing and the battery life is superb👌. But I have also tried Oppo enco m31, if I compare both then Oppo wins in only terms of sound quality and comfort. Don't get me wrong but on the other hand Oneplus wins in the expect of built, loudness, battery and connectivity.

name: Miheer Kumar
title: Not for Bass lovers but surprisingly good
content: This one is not for Bass lovers for true although the quality of audio is superb. Love keep it on for hours. Its comfortable, long lasting, fast charge available. Only one drawback bass is not that punchy its there but not like wow. Else at this price point it is giving more than anything.

name: vinay
title: Absolute delight for music and lyric lovers
content: This is my first ever review on amazon and THIS PRODUCT deserves all the appreciation.The quality of Mids and highs from this product is altogether next level.Absolute delight for music lovers.No second thought.. Apart from the sound quality, the battery and premium built design is wholesome treat.

name: Basavaraj sajjan
title: Good product for long time users
content: I don't know why they are not printing Never settle logo inside box.Maybe it's not original.... But all features as they mentioned about battery,water resistant,etc are working properly.. And why it is showing as OP bluetoth I don't know.

name: Tarun B.
title: Poor customer experience
content: Waste of money, the magnet came out by itself in one month’s usage. The product can’t be used any further!. The service center declined to cover under warranty.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disappointing
content: 1. BUild quality is excellent. 2. Wont fit into ears properly. Only ear phones which fits well into ears is Iphone. 3. Got to keep switching on everytime, I want to connect to oneplus bluetooth

name: Samiuddin A
title: Valuable for money
content: Oneplus Bullet wireless z earphones are best in the market compared to other brands. Its amazing built quality is also good and comfortable to wear. Thanks Amazon and Oneplus who give us good products.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very bad product from One plus
content: During calling continuous tapping sound heard on receivers end. Again the volume automatically goes down. I dont know this is manufacturing defects or what. I need to return this and don't want replacement for this kind of rubbish products.

name: muthukumar
title: Just try it...
content: Battery is the main reason I've gone for it... But boat is launching new earphone with same battery life which costs less than 1500 so.. wait till this prime day and choose wisely.. but u should try this... It's just amazing and charging speed with WRAP CHARGER .. is killing it ... Charge for 10 mins and enjoy the day

name: Abhishek
title: Pretty Good!
content: Awesome product. Sound quality is very good not great. Bass is on the okay side. What I liked about these earphones is that they charge up pretty quick. I mean charging up for 15 minutes can give you a whole day backup. And the other things I liked were the quick switch option

name: Hamza Mohammed Khan
title: Quality is catastrophic and trending!!
content: It's exciting and a definition of beauty. The quality is extremely magnificent and amazing. The bass is very much enjoyable and a complete craze. I love this product 😍. One full charge and it gives me a 10 or more than 10 hour of madness and enjoyment. Totally worth for 2k👍. Well done One Plus. so did amazon

name: Amazon Customer
title: Loving it ☺️
content: Liked the product.. Battery backup is very good and if you have Oneplus fast charger then 10 minutes charging will be good enough for a day (only for calls).. Sound quality is very good.. No problem with Connectivity.

name: Shailesh
title: Totally waste of money
content: One month good but For the last few days, along with the connection problem, it remains in charge for the whole day and the charge is not happening. I am worried. please don't buy this product. If ask customer service no reply regarding this issue. Please don't buy, don't buy

name: Parminder Singh Nagi
title: No Voice cancellation
content: I bought one plus 8t and these Bluetooth headphones. While on calls, People had to tell me to shut them off as it doesn't do any noise cancellation and it was very disturbing for people on the other side of the call. I had to finally remove them and talk on the phone directly. Doesn't serve the purpose they are designed for.

name: Amrendra Yadav
title: Best Quality
content: Lastly i got a good product trying so many earphones like Boalt, Realme this two disappointed me and lastly i bought 1+. This is the best in class best sound quality and best in battery backup ,i recommend everyone who want a best earphones in this price range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Clicking sound when using volume buttons
content: I can hear clicking sound whenever I click the volume buttons. Even though it is a bass edition, but the bass is not that clearly noticeable.

name: Varun
title: Average product
content: Bought it for my dad, the microphone went kaput in litte less than 2 weeks. Oneplus hasn't done a good job with this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste of money don't buy
content: Poor quality product , on off switch is not working fine... I can't understand product like OnePlus does it. I having 7T mobile and earlier I was with OnePlus 6 but earphone quality is so so poor. Rs. 2000 just a waste... Unhappy... Don't buy it guys...

name: Aman
title: Great Buy in this Segment.
content: Bass Quality is good but not great. If you are a great bass lover, then you might have to compromise a bit. Sound quality is great. Crisp and clear. Packaging stands out. The battery lasts long and quick charging is a great feature. Definitely worth a try in this price range. Google Assistant easily recognises your voice through this.

name: Sharwari Walimbe
title: Returned.
content: The earphones worked great for 7 days.. but suddenly started giving some weird beep noise and disconnected from phone every 2 minutes. So returned them. Earlier I had given a very good review with initial impressions. Not sure if this was a faulty piece.. but I would prefer going with official website from now on.

name: Maheshbhai Panchasara
title: Pathetic Bluetooth connectivity
content: Earphones getting frequently disconnect & coonect on its own. Also while watching full hd content on youtube, the sound breaks while the sound is perfectly fine on phone (OnePlus 6) spear/other wired headphones. I have requested a replacement. Will post update if issue gets resolved with the replacement earphones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best earphones in this price range
content: Bass quality is enough for a music lover...if you are a lover of melody songs u will surely love this product...vocals are clear...mic quality is good.. latency while playing games like pubg is very minimal.u won't even feel it...if you are using OnePlus phones, just blindly go for this...for those using other phones too,this is a great buy@2k

name: Shivam Singh
title: Amazing earphones but not bassy
content: Well this earphone is amazing in contrast to battery and its sound quality.. But its bass is too bad and if you are a bass loving person then I'll recommend you to not buy this earphone.. One more thing that I like is its comfortability.. Only bad thing here is its bass quality.. It can handle sweating and water problems.

name: Annson M.
title: Value for money
content: Using for 3 months. Nice headphones great battery.. Disply battery information on handset.. It swiches off when two units get joind magnetically... saves battery... My main use for calling... Good quality sound. Bass is enough... good for ears...(No heavy bass). Excellent product... value fir money

name: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect 5
content: After extensive search and reading numerous reviews for a good economic wireless earphones I finally ordered these one plus bullet z and believe me these are perfect balanced earphones. Bass is not so high but thats good for ears. M completely satisfied and happy one plus customer be it phone or earphones.

name: Sumit Kumar
title: Nice product at this price
content: Product was good enough at this price range.. Sound quality is good but not best. Bass is also good enough. Mic and noice cancellation is not good in this.. I have ordered 2 items at the same time but you can’t call using this in noisy or little noisy environment

name: Arun
title: Blue tooth head phones
content: Product original one plus and is per specication of one plus web site, suitable for one plus 8 , how not tried with other blue tooth products having blue tooth 5.0 version

name: Swapnil Thakur
title: Thank You Amazon
content: I had received a tampered product of which one ear bud was working with no accesories,even the box was tampered . Thank You Amazon. One plus headphones sound quality is awesome , but yes bass is also fine

name: Raghu
title: Value for money
content: Sound quality is excellent, noise cancellation of course it's available, bass quality is also good for this price, over all it is value for money, you can go for it with closed eyes.

name: Pawan
title: No BASS at alllll.... Perfect stereo headset
content: The product build quality is very good, looks premium. Connectivity and range and battery is also super, BUTTTTTT it lacks way far behind with BASS.. I COULD SAY IT'S JUST FEELS LIKE A STEREO EARPHONES, the person who have used Skullcandy, Sennheiser, Sony earphones previously please don't consider this option at all.. you will regret for sure.

name: Pranjali
title: Uncomfortable to wear
content: Sound quality good, battery span is good, bass is average , looks nice , connectivity is quick. Its ear piece is very uncomfortable and annoying... I wish they made comfortable and proper fit device , material is very hard that it hurts the ear pinna and canal .

name: ravi dhotre
title: Superb Bass !
content: Bass is Superb..!!. I confuse between realmi buds and OnePlus bullet z. But in that case i use both so OnePlus is always better than realmi. Bass is Superb and punchy !. Overall sound quality is best... Go for it

name: Manisha Sharma
title: Sheer money wastage
content: Sheer money wastage!. Lot's of issues while connecting. Initially every thing was good but they didn't even last three months.

name: S chand
title: Recommended
content: Nice product sound quality is awasom build quality good, but operating key is left hand side. But mangage it its not big issue.

name: Vaibhav
title: You can't use here sound enhancer or equaliser only it is bad thing.😪
content: Here in this device you can't use sound equaliser and sound enhancer else all bluetooth speaker or home theater support that . Build quality is quite good. But design is too nice. I appreciate it. Packaging and accessories is nice no issues. But again you don't get deep bass sound. Charging is nice.

name: Manish Jha
title: Defective Product and Inadequate Amazon Support
content: Product stopped working in 48 hours, initially it was intermittent so I thought charge issue and there after adequate charge same issue followed by COMPLETE STOP.. I am not able to return or replace as per Amazon (though it says for return or replace) PLEASE EXCHANGE THE PRODUCT OR REFUND.

name: luke ranjan
title: Worth the penny u spend
content: This is just ok. Good mids nd melodies, not punch type of bass, its just good for decent listening, the call quality is good, the buttons are lil hard, but u cant expect something big of its budget. Overall worth the price. But still outdated. When it comes to design and model

name: faheem fayaz
title: BEST DEAL IN EARPHONES
content: I just loved this product writing this review after using 5 days Continusely battery is good, I'm using this with Redmi note 9 pro max.. If your looking for Earphones and have budget of 2000 go for it without any second thought ..

name: AvishekX1
title: Useful product
content: Good useful product...call quality is average, sound quality is good. The best feature is the long battery life and convenience of use.

name: Shiva
title: Best ever...
content: Best of the best one plus bluetooth headset evr used... Fasting charging if we use fast chargers.. long lasting battery power... Bass quality superb.. audible to remote person on phone calls without any issues.. sound quality is great.. i recommend this

name: Vikas
title: Great deal
content: Best neckbend , sound quality is amazing to my previous boat 255 earphone bass is fine not too much , sound signature is great using this earphone with poco work, low latency mode work amazing

name: Gaurav
title: One Plus Bullet Z Bass Edition vs Oppo Enco M31
content: I have recently bought this OnePlus Z Bass Edition and I also bought Oppo Enco M31. Personal preference is One Plus coz' of better bass than the m31. The build quality of both these wireless earphones are good. Battery backup wise OnePlus is way ahead.

name: Aakash Kumar
title: Damaged Product from Amazon
content: I received a damaged product from amazon. The product is not working. As you can see in the video, there is a cut in the product and it was there when I unboxed it.. I completely wasted my Rs. 1999/- by ordering it from Amazon.. Highly disappointed by amazon.

name: SUNDARRAJAN
title: Frequent disconnection and noise reduction problem
content: First one I am faced frequent disconnection problem. After getting new one under warranty replacement that also from1st day onwards it is having more noises while speaking and informed to customer care.now they are telling it is phone compatibility issue. but earlier used same headset, I not faced noise problem.

name: Antriksh.priyanka
title: Misleading : No quick Switch
content: If you are looking for a product with quick switch feature DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. This does not have the quick switch feature in bass edition. Normal edition has it ans one plus very conveniently does not inform anyone about the 1 feature it removed. I CANT EVEN RETURN THE PRODUCT & now i am just stuck with it

name: Amazon Customer
title: Right ear stopped working after 3 months of use , cant even claim warranty
content: Product was good initially, sound and build quality of these are decent. But they suddenly stopped working. First the right ear , now even the left ear sounds debased.. How do I even claim warranty for these buds, oneplus care has support only for mobiles/Tv's .. Such a pathetic customer care by oneplus.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Lovedit
content: Built up quality is great. Bass is moderate (average) ... Duration almost 20 hours after full recharge. ... Overall value for product... Quality product... One plus rocks... .

name: Kritesh Singh
title: Not Satisfactory
content: Reviewing after week of use : Sound quality is good, battery life is excellent. But led light keeps on blinking and it is very irritating to use it in dark as it will always draw your attention. And one more thing I observed is it keeps disconnecting when paired with mac. On mobile there is no connection drop problem.

name: ravi wagh
title: Jugad earphone
content: This earphone support only one plus mobile. It have hardware but no music technology. Go for earphone company which make earphones. This is jugad earphones. Go

name: Slm r.
title: Boom
content: 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝘀𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗮𝘀𝘀 𝗾𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗶𝘀 𝗻𝗼𝘁 𝗴𝗼𝗼𝗱 𝗯𝘂𝘁 𝗺𝘆 𝗼𝗽𝗶𝗻𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗶𝘁 𝗶𝘀 𝗳𝗮𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝟮 𝗸. 𝗚𝗼 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗶𝘁. 𝗦𝘂𝗿𝗲𝗹𝘆 𝘀𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘀𝗳𝗶𝗲𝘀 𝗺𝗲 😘😘😘

name: Jatin Gujarathi
title: Recommended for daily use
content: Battery backup is good. Sound quality is also nice. Bass would have been better. Call quality is also good. Range is quite good. Play a lots of songs , not seen any movie as of now. Óverall earphone are working good... 3.5 star from my side. Cut half star for bass. And 1 star for noise Cancellation

name: sameer
title: Excellent and decent sound
content: This product is awesome really awesome, if we talk about sound quality it's a really decent sound and able to noise cancellation but bass is not like other like boom boom it's again decent wuality..when will on call it's a really qualitative product in this price awesome product...not cheap product

name: Thushar
title: Satisfied with the buy...
content: Good product used it for a week , good product design especially the earpeice , plugs in comfortably inside even while running n working out , comfortable to use even while sleeping .. best product in the market , thank you ... #oneplus

name: Niraj
title: Must buy if you're budget is 2k
content: Best battery life , best sound quality, best connectivity , modrate bass , switch between devices is the best with in 5 sec it switches from 1 device to another connected device . Design 5 star as well as the durability . Kudos to the OnePlus team for making such kind of earphones . ❤️

name: Aravind A
title: Right side speaker problem
content: I am unsatisfied with my product. right side speaker not working and then the next day left side speaker making some noise, i hope may be this produce gets this kind of issues.

name: Sushanth
title: Very bad Sound quality and high latency. Utterly dissatisfied and disappointed.
content: very bad Sound quality and high latency. Utterly dissatisfied and disappointed. I didn’t want expect that so called “fast products manufacturer one plus” created such a mediocre product with high latency.. Very bad.. I suggest people to buy sony or Samsung level U at the same price. They are better than this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst for Voice Calls - DON'T BUY
content: You can't use this for voice calls. It picks up even small background noise and amplifies it. Person at the other end hear loud background noise while talking. I stopped using it. Waste of money. Amazon should stop showing it as a recommended product.

name: Sai
title: 1 plus lover 😍😍
content: Super sound quality especially for melody songs lovers.... Bass is also good... On my oneplus 7 pro. Low latency works fine.... Battery 🔋 = no words it's a monster. Charging 10 min = 10 hrs true... But it takes more than half an hour to full with my warp charger... Overall 4.5/5. And value for money... Go for it guys

name: RAJENDRA RAIKWAR
title: Product dead before 24 hrs, only white light still, very bed product
content: Product dead before 24 hrs, only white light still, very bed product

name: jitendra singh
title: जबरदस्त
content: One plus bluetooth is have good battery back up,sound,bass,noise cancellation.it is flexible.good option have this bluetooth is magnetic switch on off

name: Anuj Dhiman
title: Awesome
content: Bass is fine. ❤️. Battery back up10/10. Best in this price.. For me its better than realme bluetooth earbuds.

name: kapil jhajhria
title: Works as advertised
content: Awesome battery backup, you can try but you won't be able to drain it in a single day. I use it continuously while i am awake and it still lasts me whole day. For normal users it should easily last 3 days.

name: DINESH KUMAR N
title: Sound & Bass quality
content: Hi, 3 days back I purchased one plus bullet z. About the quality of the product, particularly sound and bass.. Sound: the quality of the sound was fair not my expected level.. Bass: The bass quality is too bad.. Battery: Excellent.. Package & Delivery: Excellent.. Thanks

name: rishabh
title: Thump of music ...BLAST
content: It's great product love the bass quality is awesome and it's crystal clear sound amplification with 9 mm driver producing thumping sound... Go and grab best products created by one plus team..thanks for providing amazing product in 2k ...

name: P Birla
title: Good for calls, videos but avoid for music
content: Average sound but good with calls and good fast charging. It is well built and will last you some time. Definitely avoid if music is the primary use, it's fine for movies/videos.

name: varun
title: Bass review
content: Most comfortable and least irritating, sound quality is best in this price range, bass is perfect for english song and old songs lover , but can be less for those who loves punjabi music

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money
content: Best earphones for the price.... If u r bass head then it will not disappoint you too much... Bass can be enhanced using equalizer.... Built Quality: excellent. Bass: good. Treble: excellent. Vocal: excellent. Battery life: excellent. Over all EXCELLENT

name: Arvind Parsana
title: Useless while driving
content: Google assistant not work while your phone locked and no voice cancellation..so those people who want to buy for purpose of use it while driving bike..it's useless...I tried manytimes, little bit wind make it useless..

name: s.kartheekeyan
title: AFTER A COUPEL OF WEEKS OF USE
content: These things are a real bang for the buck.They are phenomenal for 2k.the battery life in real world testing is about 15 hours while used in 65% volume. The sound quality is on point ,while it certainly lacks in base and noise cancellation,it makes up on persistence and comfort.i really recommend these earphones if ur on a budget

name: Angad Sanwal
title: Balanced sound with good battery life
content: Amazing product..!!. Awesome battery life!!. Well balanced sound!. Good controls too... Connectivity is good too (with other androids as well)

name: Jaspreet singh Jassal
title: Best battery life , best magnetic switch.
content: I have been using oneplus wireless for long now.. X is lighter previous model (wireless 2 for 6k price) , build quality is not that great... Sound quality is ok... The best things the battery and magnetic switch which gives you long battery life. Overall 4 star's at this price.

name: Ratindra Kumar Sharma
title: Not recommended in this price range
content: Not a quality product.. No bass, No noise cancelation and top of that it will not call out the callers name.

name: Darshan Rayate
title: Best earphone with fast charging
content: It gets charged in just 10min and then can listen music upto 10hour. And if charge for 30min then 20h. Fast connectivity and also fast phone switching. Best feature is that we don't hve to press any button to turn on just plug earphone to ear and go

name: NAVEEN
title: SUCH AN AMAZING PRODUCT FROM AMAZON 😍 ONEPLUS EARPHONES AM FULLY SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT

GOOD SOUND QUALITY. 20HRS LOIN BATTERY. 10MINS🔥 CHARGE 10HRS PLAY BACK

name: Dashmeet
title: One of the best
content: I have seen many YouTube review when I order it I was thinking it is worth spending money but now when it is in my hand it is really something else.dont go on seeing the driver sizes this best you want to get a good earphones these are for u

name: raman
title: Decent ...better than competition
content: Only thing I like about this is comfort .....for op users it is boon....sound quality is nice for price ....but bass is big no......and there is no thing like low latency mode...it is bullshit...rest product is good....m using it with op 6t

name: Yash yadav
content: Suddenly my bullet wireless z stopped working today. I fully charged it today and when inserted in the ear it became unresponsive . The white led is in ON state . I tried to reset the earphone but nothing is happening also tried detaching and attaching the bud but no response.

name: Prashant Kumar
title: Stopped working after a month.
content: UPDATE : After visiting OnePlus service center they replaced it with new one since it was in warranty and it was a manufacture defect.. Was watching a movie and suddenly It stopped working, no led is blinking while charging or separating the magnet earpieces now. Its hardly been a month of usage, didn't expected this.

name: niteesh yadav
title: Best Headphones under 2K
content: First time I have purchased the bluetooth headphone and this one is best one In my experience sound comfort zone and you already know the battery backup I am using this headphone with my Redmi note 8 pro Bass Good

name: Shobha S.
title: Amazing Sound Quality
content: Everything is just perfect in this Price range, but if you are expecting Bass...you must choose any other earplug.. This is perfect for moderate songs not for those with Heavy Bass and all stuff.. Talking about microphone quality, It has also satisfied me a lot.. Overall great choice.

name: aditya bendre
title: Pathetic. Typical Chinese product stop working after few days..

And OnePlus costumer service is pathetic. Really disappointed with this product. Except phone I don't think anything from OnePlus is worth buying.

name: RAJ
title: Very nice and awesome
content: Sound clearity :- 5*. Bass :- 4* not loud but very decent. Battery :- 5* awesome. Noise cancellation:- 5* awesome. Looks and comfort :- 5* .... Looking premium and u can use continuosly for hours.

name: Indraneel Ghosh
title: Just go for it, without thinking twice👌
content: Best bluetooth earphone under ₹2000. Brilliant purchase 🥰.. Connectivity is not as strong as mentioned in the box, it's bit annoying. It has hardly a range of 20 feet.

name: Arnab Pakhira
title: Best earphone at this price range 😍😍😍

name: Anand Gaurav
title: Overall

name: Raunak shaikh
title: Battery lasts really long.
content: I use these for about 4 hours a day and they can go without charging for about an entire week. Media control works just fine and the sound quality is also nice.. Definitely worth buying.

name: Saurabh
title: Initial Impressions

name: Shashank
title: Don't buy..bad product
content: Bad product from one plus..volume starts increasing automatically while on voice call..and same time while talking to someone a disturbing beep noise continue to b there untill headphone Is switched off..its only been one mnth and I has started showing its true colours...as I'm already a one plus 6t customer didn't expect it frm one plu

name: Dr.Sudhanshu Singhal

name: Shreyas khade
title: Buy it provided that you are not a hardcore bass lover

name: prashant sameer
title: Issue in noise cancellation
content: Music lover like this headphone but i case of calling noise cancellation is very poor....oneplus should improve noise cancellation system in it.... Overall i love is product

name: Aniruddh
title: Wrost costumer support ..
content: Waste of money .. one plus don't interested in solving the problem after buying the product of the oneplus .... If they got any damage then no support by one plus is provided .. one plus try to work on your costumer care instead of working on anything

name: Devanand Ullas

name: Onmaya RV
title: Often disconnected

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great wireless earphones from one plus
content: Comfortable neckband, good sound quality and of course low price makes it one of the best wireless earphones in the market

name: Javaid Sofi
title: I Regret buying this product

name: Nilesh

name: Arpit kumar singh

It's sound quality is impressive which comes with a good noise cancellation and bass quality is nice but not that great. It's quick switch feature gives me easy switch between other paired devices.

name: Pradeep

name: TINO T.

name: Nikhil khurana
title: Money waste product

name: Mahesh Pawar
title: Average quality wireless earphones at high price
content: Bass edition is not good at shows in add also it doesn't have any two devices connecting features like switch if you can buy this then plz buy normal edition.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disappointed
content: The mic doesn't work.. I just opened the box and mic doesn't work at the first place. I got it replaced and again the mic is not working in the replaced one. Really disappointed

name: Dishari Chatterjee
title: Awesome things
content: Awesome product for 2k. If you are looking for a cheap yet powerful earphones, this is the one. If you are a music lover and love the extra bass in your music, then I would say you would be little disappointed, but for normal life this is the one.

name: Rohan
title: Excellent product. Go for it blindly 😘
content: Excellent product. Best from oneplus and Amazon service is very good.. best seller sent me the exact product . Awesome earphone go blinding without any second thought. 🔋 battery backup is excellent.. Oneplus love you

name: onkar koli
title: Not recommended
content: Sound Quality is good but mic mice and magnets Stop working as expected after 3 months of use ..also lag issue is there so Now looking for replacement or refund..Not really satisfied with products

name: SageT Tech
title: Oneplus is the winner in the three
content: See if you're confused between realme Vs oneplus vs oppo then. Listen. I have tested all three and I liked oneplus most although oppo has better bass. Oneplus has better built quality and it sounds best in all means rather than bass. Idac codex in oppo is just sh!t and realme 11.2 Mm doesn't make any difference

name: Poonam
title: Bad noise cancellation
content: Very good for music lovers. But for calling purpose very bad. It catches alot background noise. Other party gets lot of disturbance during calls. I bought this with brand name but It didn't meet my expectations. Wish better headphone from OnePlus.

name: Harshit
content: Sound quality is a bit average like it's not better than sennheiser cx 180 or cx 213,. But if you are looking for wireless earphones they are amazing in this range, other than this battery is just amazing, mic is not at all good like voice is not clear and range is also not that much great.

name: Himanshu Mathur
title: Impressive
content: Received today. Grt earphones at such an affordable price for any normal user. Built quality is awesome and the sound obviously is minblowing. Battery life has to be observed but I am sure it will be very good as per the reviews and many unboxings I have seen. So overall a decent purchase for me.

name: User1
title: Worst quality microphone
content: Very bad product... Listening to music isw very good, but the mic is crap.. don't buy this product. Had two replacements and still same issue.. mic is very very bad

name: Sikandar
title: One plus wireless z ❤️
content: Best in class... Giving reviews after one month. Battery backup is just awesome. exactly if you charge it for 10 min it gives 10hrs playtime. We have all the colours. If you want to purchase a brand with class and good battery backup just go for it. I bought it for 1999rs each.

name: Adesh Gaurav
title: Best bullets wireless by oneplus
content: I have a very great experience with the oneplus bullets wireless. The sound quality is very good and bass is up to the mark. The best thing about the bullets is the battery, it has long-lasting battery life. And the build quality is very good as we can expect from onplus. Overall it is a value for money product.

name: Nirav  Nareshbhai Tailor
title: Awesome product.
content: Its a wonderful product from One plus. It have one of best feature of fast charging. It charges upto 60% battery just in 5 minutes. It have batter sound quality. Its buds are so soft and comfortable for ear. I used it continue for 4 hour and I never fill discomfort, while using it.

name: Sanket
title: Best one in this price range
content: It's is too nice, specially the charging time is very less and it can easily last for 3 days with normal use in a single charge. Only issue is with the bass (too low) and noise cancellation is not there.

name: Korak pal
title: Value for money 😊
content: The wireless is very good sound quality is impressive bass is good overall value for money nd no competetor for one plus most impressive is battery life just awesome nd some sound issue when play pubg.. without OnePlus charger the headphone take near about 1 hour to full charge ( realme 20 watt charger )..overall it's a good value for money 🔥

name: Indivar Syam
title: It's not working
content: I bought this product 3days back and it stopped working. It's totally dissatisfaction and the charging capacity also is less compared to jbl or boat. If willing to buy wireless for less price and for a great working condition go for boat. This is completely waste of money.

name: Nitin
title: Boat is not a good brand
content: I gifted 3 pieces of this product to 3 people and there are issues with all 3. Boat customer service is so bad they are not attending the products from 2 months. Very poor quality brand and after sale services.

name: Chinmay Phadkule
title: Amazing
content: The earphones are amazing. It's quick to connect. The fact that it gets fully charged in 10mins is true..!! I have tried many Bluetooth earphones, but this one is the real-beast.... Loved it...!!

name: bhavesh
title: Overall a good package
content: I think at full volume, the tribble gets too high and so ncomfortable that you have to lower the volume. Overall,the sound is well balanced at mid volume and the features offered are great at this price

name: Ronak Ruparel
title: I am getting background hiss noise(it seems some kind of disturbance)
content: I love the build quality but the main issue I found was background hiss(static disturbance) it is very irritating have applied for new product and if the issue persist then will get the refund.

name: Akshata dawkhar
title: Must buy..!!
content: I would like to give 5star to this product.. #sound quality❣#bass quality❣#noise cancellation❣.. You can charge your device in just 5 minutes and can run for more than 21hours...i specially give thanks to Amazon for available this product

name: pratyush behera
title: Very bad quality earphone
content: Earphone works properly for 3-4 months...then suddenly problems arise.During listening song,it stop working for 2 to 3 seconds n then working n it happen repeatedly..I try every possible way to fixed it..but i can't..I don't expect such a bad quality product from a renowned brand like One plus

name: afsal
title: Best choice for an average user and not for bass lovers
content: Sound quality is good and battery backup is awesome but bass is low. Users who need more bass I won't recomment it but for others it's a best choice.i have an issue for my device it disconnects rarely and tries to reconnect and some times sounds breaks , issue only overcomes after disconnected

name: Aaradhya jain
title: THESE ARE USEFUL HEADPHONES AT THIS PRICE.
content: IN THIS PRICE THIS OPTION IS GREAT TO BUY THIS ONEPLUS BULLETS Z BECAUSE , IT PROVODES GOOD SOUND QUALITY WITH 10 HOUR PLAY WITH 10 MIN CHARGE , SO ITS TIME SAVING , GREAT TO BUY BUT THE BASS IS NOT SO GOOD , YOU CAN BUY BLUE IT LOOKS NICE OR YOU CAN BUY BLACK COLOR BUT ITS COMMON LIKE OTHERS.

name: Jeff Foster
title: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition Reverb Red
content: I like the product quality and bass & quick connect best quality for this price thanks to Appario retail & Amazon.

name: Zahid
title: OnePlus is awesome as always.👍👍
content: I am giving review after 15 days of using this wireless earphones.First of all the sound quality is crystal clear .the bass is amazing but I am worried about noise cancellation will not work in crowded area... overall it is one of the best earphones at this price range

name: Siva Rama Krishna
title: Solves the problem of convenience and much more
content: These earphones add value more than just conveniences such as outstanding battery life with fast charging capability. Switch between two devices with a click of a button and much more. With some minor equalizer adjustments, these earphones can pump out excellent bass. I recommend it to each and every one.

name: Heymanth
title: Very good
content: Best for the price. Very good sound quality. Battery backup is very good, lasts for 8 to 10hrs. charges to 100% in approx one hour.

name: Naveen Kumar
title: It serves the purpose of calls only
content: Pros:. Quick switch. Built quality. Battery backup. It is good for calls. Cons:. Don't expect Bass. Sound Quality. Low latency is gimmick. If you are looking for the Bluetooth earphones with good battery backup and for only calls this is good for you.

name: mani
title: Worst earphones, Bluetooth not getting connected
content: It's a worst earphones,Brought in October 23,not even a month when I am hearing songs a beep sound came,I restarted after that moment bluetooth was not able to pair and even not even showing in pairing devices.. One of thw worst ear phones,I suggest to buy another good earphones in this range,my money was wasted

name: Pranav Balan
title: Stopped working
content: Changing the rating to 1 after 6 months. Stopped working and white light keeps in On always.. Saw in one plus community , many are facing this issue.. If not possible to deliver good product with a brand name , please step out and start beg and live

name: Pradeep Sharma
title: Average sound quality
content: Sound is not soft compare to any wired headphone of any standard company.. I am using for mostly calls, and it's hard to use it for more than 30 mins. Now I am preferring back to use my old sony wired earphone.. Not good for listening songs and long calls. Battery life is good.

name: mayank m.
title: Awesome Product
content: hey its great product go for it.. In this price range it's the best in market. It's a premium quality earbuds.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mind-blowing deal
content: If u want an all rounder in each and every department then without any doubt go for it. Battery backup is awesome. Sound was very balanced,clarity was excellent, call quality more than decent. Loved it. Only one problem is there and that is noise cancellation. It failed totally in the department of noise cancellation.

name: Bappaditya Bhakta
title: Read my review for clear decision
content: Sound :- 8.5/10 ( great balance sound ). Bass :- 7.5/10 (good bass). build quality :- 9/10. style :- 9/10. Fit in ears :- 5/10. Battery :- 10/10. feature (switch quality and magnetic on off) :- 10/10. Mic :- 7/10. noise cancellation:- 9/10

name: Sameer
title: Poor noise cancellation. Rest product is fine.
content: It catches lot of noise from outside even noise comes from very far area. Still it reaches to someone you are talking to.

name: Rohit Chopra
title: Value for money!!
content: This was a good purchase, the best bluetooth headphones so far.. The magnets work great ,the earphones disconnect after attaching magnets together and reconnect automatically when we put earphones in ear again.. very comfortable to wear and the neck band is soft.. mic also good.

name: Mdu123
title: Useless for TV
content: One star becoz I bought it for my android Sony TV but it is not pairing. So useless for me.

name: Akshu
title: Overall a good experience ( Not excellent)
content: Review is based on my usage since past 10 days. Battery- Excellent. Voice - good ( certain high pitch sounds very irritating and hurts my ears during calls and music both). Voice cancellation- good. Comfort- average (ears start hurting after continuous use of earphones). Connectivity- Excellent ( with my OnePlus 6)

name: Rashmi Ranjan
title: Not worthy. Having so many issues with one plus devices also
content: I bought this on 21 August. And it is not working on 30 August. Seriously i am so disappointed.. Not even i am able to return it. Customer care of oneplus is so bad. Better to go for a Boat earphone. There after sell service is awesome.

name: Kurian Daniel
title: Best bluetooth earphone
content: Charging last for very long time and fast charge. Next band quality is very good. Bass is ok not that good. Awesome sound quality and noise cancellation. Range and bluetooth connectivity is very good. Value for money earphone

name: Sumit sharma
title: Not available
content: I want to purchase but its not available

name: saurabh khandelwal
title: Average product
content: The product built quility is very good, all features are good, connectivity is very much better and fast but sount quility is poor, no bass, only and only instryments sound in my case it was very poor as far as sound quility is concerned. Otherwise its better product.

name: Rohan jadhav
title: Product is amazing !!!
content: One of the Best headphone if compared with all other wireless headphones at 2k budget.. Some reviewers are criticizing about Bass quality but quality is good.. It is using AAC codec instead of aptx HD.

name: Shaswat Shekhar
title: Best VFM Neckband of the price segment, period ONEPLUS product...!
content: Build Quality - 4.5/5. Smart Features - 4/5. Battery & Charging - 5/5 (Literally charges to 50% in 10mins). Sound Quality - 4/5. Not enough for bass heads and as good as Rs .1500 In ear earphones - If you want good sound quality and practicality together...go for them...!

name: Vidyasagar
title: LATENCY!
content: Everything is good except that the latency is very high for non-oneplus devices.. Do not buy if you wanna game with it,(again OnePlus phone users can go for it as the latency is very low).. Devices (non-oneplus) with gaming modes in them also have low latency.

name: P V RAJGOPAL
title: Highly recommended.
content: I am an old man of 79. I am slightly hard of hearing. It's a problem making out what the person at the other end of the line is saying. With the help of this Bluetooth, I can hear the voice clearly. The clarity of this BT is ideal. I am impressed. Its value for money.

name: Niroj
title: Wonderful product...
content: Really good product. Seems authentic and nice quality. No doubt of duplication. Arrived within 24hr for Bangalore location which is surprising for me.. Con: when I connected to lappy and get any notification, I could hear some noise along with notification sounds.

name: Divakaran
title: Neckband Superstar
content: Best neckband compare then others of this price catagory..Very easy conection & quick supoort for even multi connections.No lag during gaming mode..Little bit difference in bass quality while deep concenrartion.Otherwise such a wonderful neckband.Thans Oneplus team & Amazon team.

name: Aravind Kumpatla
title: Not satisfied
content: I was using very low volume and I played video and audio below 50% but it one day that too I don't use very high volume I use only calls maximum but not giving expected battery life. Noise cancellation is also very bad when I ride on bike there is no clarity in calls but connectivity is very good

name: Gowtham
title: Bass quality very low
content: Dear One Plus is the company ,You name this z Bass Edition as Special,But not even a little bass to compared,boat and realme,one plus branded Bought for, but bass quality very low,bass edition Do not be fooled by that

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best bluetooth earphones for no headphone jack phone
content: Sound is 9 out of 10. Noise cancellation 8 out of 10. Bass is 10 out 10!!!!!!!. Battery life 17 hours on Bass Edition, which is gud enough for normal users.. No Cons find till now after 30 days of use.

name: Shubh Agrawal
title: Something problem in devide switching
content: The sound quality and noise cancellation of Oneplus wireless z earphone is excellent but when I use switch option of the earphone then in 1 device it's sound is normal but in 2 devide it's sound is slow...so can you tell me my this is happening..when I switch my earphone to another device then it's volume become slow

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy!
content: Has many bugs. Microphone doesn't work 90% of the time during calls. Volume buttons are faulty, volumes keeps increasing even when no buttons are pressed (or even touched).

name: Amaan Imtiyaz
title: Great Product
content: People have reservations about its Bass, I think it has decent bass, music quality is excellent, battery is excellent, range is excellent. The Switch button which switches to other paired devices is the feature which makes the product nothings less than more praises worthy. Excellent Product

name: Amit goud
title: ok type product as per price its too costly
content: As a look wise its cool but if you are looking for sound i mean bass then this is not the correct product and its not fit to ear properly as compared to other boat and jbl what I used earlier .So over all Ok type product I have to use it more for a perfect review.But I didn't liked that much

name: Melissa
title: Excellent product for the cost but I received a defective item
content: I received the product on 2 days ago and found that there is slightly an connectivity issue.The bluetooth connects perfectly but when you wanna hear songs you have to slightly expand the neck band and works fine.I had to do it everytime.But the sound quality,bass,noise cancellation is bestt.

name: Kishore Kumar
title: Noise cancellation not working
content: Earphone is good, sound quality everything is perfect but the noise cancellation doesn't seems to work fine. Other person sound can able to hear my friends have said my call feedback

name: Rachel
title: Good purchase
content: Love the quality, feels premium, great sound quality, moderate noise cancellation but my ear is kind of small so it doesn't fit snugly, however it still is usable.

name: Aryan G.
title: Don't buy this earphones
content: Very bad product. Whoever is reading this please don't buy this product. They are giving you the default or used products. I reordered for the second time and it is still not working. There is no action taken. There are better earphones in rs-2000, buy something else. Don't be get fooled by this fake one

name: Harpreet
title: Flagship killer headphones
content: Crisp clear calls and wonderful sound ....thank God I choose OnePlus wireless bullet z instead of realme wireless buds ...dnt trust some YouTuber who's saying like this no bass at all...... I'll Strongly recommend everyone...

name: Timothy
title: Satisfied
content: This is one of the best Bluetooth earphones available..... The best part is the charge.. I charge it for 20min and and use it for 2 and a half days using it for minimum of 8 hours a day..... Fetures were they tell the name of the person calling over the phone is my favourite...... Love it....

name: Shreeyansh
title: Not working fine .
content: It was working fine till now but now they are having connectivity issue and sometimes the volume start decreasing or increasing automatically . Sometimes it starts beeping . In short not working properly . And I also don't have any nearby service center . So I don't know what can I do with the warranty .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Charging problem
