content: Everything good except charging problem,you should have to charge it very frequently which is very very annoying 🤯

name: Yatin
title: Good for Music. Bad for calling.
content: Good for music and movie experience. Very poor for phone calls and WebEx or zoom calls. It just disappear while you are speaking. Funny part if I choose audio device as phone on and back to bluetooth then it start working.

name: gurpreet b.
title: Good product
content: Perfect for running/working out (although not sweat proof) battery life is awesome, comfort is good, bass not heavy but sounds good for the price.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality .. Sweetness not found
content: My experience is not good , sound quality is not good , music was like noisy, truble is not sweet .... Battery backup and connectivity is good...

name: balaguru
title: Never settle tagline is not printed inside the box..?
content: Never settle logo is missing inside the box.. Its original or fake.? And bass is low. Noice cancelation does not have this device.... Charging performance is very good.... Full charging time 35 min only. Audio plsynack 20 hours with 100 % volume. If u use 50 % volume you get more play back time

name: Saurabh
title: Very bad service 😞 of customer care
content: Overall good experience. But there is no service center near by.. I bought my Bluetooth on line and stop working after 3 month but service center not near and they have no policy of parcel. Ear phones price 1999. If I go service center I pay transportation 2000. 😡😡😡😡

name: MAYUR YADAV
title: Unhappy Customer
content: The battery life is not as promised, im unhappy with the product, wanted to replace it but out of the guarantee now, a big regret!!

name: Sanket
title: Great bass. Bang for your buck
content: It's my first ever OnePlus product and absolutely love it. Good noise cancellation and great bass too. The plugs fit in snugly and do not cause any discomfort. Pretty sure you can wear them all day and still wouldn't get uncomfortable. Grab yours already!

name: Ashiba
title: No water / sweat resistant
content: I won't recommend this as Firstly after 6 month of usages one side ear stopped working. I got replacement . Another time it's again stopped working and they didn't replace as there was sweat inside. So do not prefer it if gonna use during light workout .

name: shashank khawle
title: Not good for calling
content: Not worth. Sound quality is not good. Ears start to hurt after 1hr. Not good for calling. Other person can't hear u properly. Most of the time sound is distorted and low for other person as mic will pick surrounding noises.. Battery backup is good, connectivity is good.. I use it with OnePlus 7T

name: Avinash Gadde
title: Awesome product with zero cons !!!
content: Very satisfied with the quality. Many said bass is bad but reality is surprising. As always " never settle". One more thing is if you're a prime member, you're officially VVIP for Amazon. I've received my order in just 36 hours ( Saturday 9:30PMto Monday 9:15AM). Great work by both Amazon and OnePlus ❤️

name: Akash Malhotra
title: Good for six months only. Bad noise cancellation.
content: All was going good but after six months chargeing issue is raised.... Charging only up to 60% only. And discharge after 2 hrs only...... Also, it is always bad with noise cancellation. When I make call using this earphones, the caller on other end will listen to outer sounds more than mine....

name: Akash Bhurle
title: Amazon not responsible for this product after 10 days from delivery.
content: I order this product before 4 month and there is problem in mic.. when I call amazon service center they told me that they cant provide warranty or replacement for this product after 10 days from purchase date.. Worst experience ever.. The product is good.. but service is very poor

name: Harshit kumar rai
title: After sometime stop working
content: after a week of using, the earphones have stopped working automatically. The white light is continuously on and nothing else is functioning (I tried charging, disconnecting earphones from all paired devices, resetting them as mentioned on the manual etc) but there is no response. I want my money back

name: Ameet
title: Terrific purchase
content: I must say I was hesitant at first and confused also between realme and one plus bullet z but after lots of paid review and genuine review i went for this and believe me when I say it was worth every penny, specially for those who have one plus phone with them. Just go for it .

name: Anmol n.
title: Value for money at this price.
content: Delivery was fast. Totally satisfied. Although sound is not best in class but has great package to offer in this price. Latency is great while gaming on fantic mode. This is the wireless headphones which can be used in daily life. Calling,mic,sound,bass,battery life is good.

name: Deepu Sreekumar
title: HeadPhone stopped working in 10 days
content: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z in-Ear Bluetooth Earphones with Mic (Black) stopped working in 10 days. WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON !!!!!. What a pathetic product !!!. I need to get this replaced ASAP and STOP SELLING LOW QUALITY PRODUCTS !!!!

name: Manmohan Mohapatra
title: Impress.. bt small regret.. frm 1+❤️
content: Impress by its Sound(vocals, instruments.mids) and Build quality.. but the only small regret for the Bass . Bcz it will definitely better... dnt say tht .. ki it don't. Have the bass.. as per me by giving all another feature the bass also good.. but must be better..

name: Avsk Reddy
title: Best value for money
content: They are built good. The battery is a beast. They never trouble to charge again and again. Vocals are clear but the bass is a bit low. Noise cancellation can also be improved.

name: Minhas
title: Built & Battery Super, but Sound Not Ok!
content: Like: Battery Life. Quick Charge. Packing. Build quality. Over all Design.. Dislike: Sound quality. Having used both branded and budget bluetooth earphones, I would rate it -just above average, especially at this price range.

name: Amrita Lohia
title: Paisa wasool product
content: In love with them .... Being a fitness coach I always to be clear with my command and as we are virtual these days these headphones are amazing..

name: mahesh
title: Low quality headphones, device stopped working in just one month
content: Got the headset delivered by 23rd jun 2020,it was working fine till 16th july and all of a sudden it just got off, initially i thought it was due to low battery but even after putting it for charging, no led indication or anything the device just was dead! ,Didn't expect this low quality product from oneplus.

name: Vinu.k.mohan
title: Good product 👍
content: Very good earphone. Best battery backup, i use oneplus 7t. So i can access all the extra features specific for oneplus devices.. Iam not a bass lover. I play musics at 40% sound most of the time.. Very good quality product. Btw i also use sony xb450 headphone.

name: Joginder
title: It is very bad quality and worst thing, don't go for this product.
content: I am using it about 2-3 months it is worth there is written 10 minute charge and enjoy 10 hours it is fake it is not truth in my experience and full charge endurance is up to 20 hours it is also fake my earphone's endurance is up to 6-7 hours in full charge. "So don't go for this product "

name: Ankit joshi
title: Less audio from one side and no Quick switch
content: No Quick switch , less battery as compared to normal one plus bullets but charging is fast and I started facing issue with one side of earphone giving less audio than other side after 15 days. Other than that bass and music quality is good but because of my issue I am giving low rating

name: Ankit Anand
title: Just go for it without thinking way better than any Bluetooth earphone under 3k
content: One of the best Bluetooth earphone i have ever use previously i was using Samsung level u but this one is way better than that l.. In terms of music i will give 9 out of 10 bass nd everything is perfect in this earphone.. One more thing connecting speed of this earphone is awesome.

name: Soujanya
title: Defective
content: Stopped working in a day. Raised refund. None came to pick up. Nothing shows up in order history

name: Akshay
title: For me it's value for money product.
content: Con: Sometimes there is lang in audio of about 1 second. That's annoying, you have to disconnect and then reconnect to listen lag free.. Pro: Rest everything is in pros like sound quality, bass quality, battery backup, quickly pairing to the device previously connected, light weight, fast charging.

name: Jayesh Ingale
title: Superb deal
content: Best in class deal. After using it for more than a month realised that it's the best in class bluetooth earphones.. Add on features are just amazing which make operations so easy.. One of best feature is the fast charging.. Sound clearity is just perfect. Where as it lack in heavy bass.

name: Wild_Survivour
title: Stopped working after 4 months
content: Bass is not good. Sleek design, comfortable to walk around in them, magnetic pause is a good feature.. Again, bass is disappointing :(. Update: right earplug stopped working after 4 months, threw the trash in the trash can

name: riginold
title: Best budget friendly headset but with more CoNs than pros
content: The blue tooth disconnects frequently while switching between cellular calls and whatsapp calls or other apps like duo or zoom.. Battery performance is excellent. No clear voice calls lot of unwanted noises heard. The microphone doesn't recognise the voice when outside

name: raja goyal
title: Great product
content: Just one word for this product "awesome". Trust me guyz thus product is way way better at this price range . In the beginning i thought the base is not good but when i started using this i feeo that uts quite perfect and the vocals mids and highs are cristal clear. Just go for ut .oneplus never disappoint 👍👍

name: Ashok Chaudhary
title: Good product
content: Overall good product. Bluetooth range is better than compitition. Material quality could be better. Bass could be better.

name: Aamir
title: Good Quality earbuds
content: Good build quality, sound output is quite nice. I missed a dedicated power button though. Overall quite nice pair of headphones.

name: Seshan1195
title: Good battery life and sound quality.
content: Nice earphones with 20+hrs in this price range. Warp charge really fantastic. 10 mins charge gives abt 10hrs music. Good one... Go for it.

name: Sandeep Baskaran
title: Best design
content: Bass not available in black color.. If u r looking for bass supported, go for blue color. Cannot skip to next song. Using with one plus 7T phone. Sound quality and voice quality during calls are good. Bendable and compact design.

name: Aakriti Rai
title: Not recommend for gaming(pubg)
content: This earphone is good.. The sound is perfect, but if you want to buy for gaming purpose ie; pubg then you shouldn't buy this. Even thou I use this earphones with my oneplus device it is not good for pubg.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Completely worth it
content: Exceeds all expectations. Excellent battery life, great sound quality, completely worth it, just go for it.

name: Praveen
title: The audio quality is good. The 🔋 life is great
content: headphones are good ,The audio quality is good. The battery is great, Cmon 10mins charge 10hrs. And headphone is Lightwait Budget value 2k is best option, I have received 1week back 3days back Full charged still now battery life Awesome 👍

name: Teja Geddada
title: If you're gamer skip this item..,
content: Sound quality was too clear, Bass is low and there is noice cancellation.. When i make calls other person on call say the vehicle name with the help of noise.. PUBG:. Actually i am hard gamer i can't play PUBG with this becose of sound delay. I hear the enemy bullet sound after i dead and foot step sound also.

name: siddhant
title: Sound quality is not good, only thing good is battery backup, rest all is just a joke
content: Okay, I agree battery backup is good , but the sound quality is pathetic, no bass, and the shape of the earphones is no good , just pain after 1 hour of use.. If you are willing to sacrifice battery life, there are other products like boat or realme that will be good with sound quality and comfort

name: subhash chandra
title: Product is good but service is not better
content: This product can replace in exclusive service centre only and not in authorised centre and you should send it to service centre on your own cost so if you want to buy this product you should prepare for to take this risk or you should check that there should be a exclusive service centre in your town.

name: Arup barua
title: Best on budget
content: Best headphone under 3000, i know its 1999 inr. but belive me on 3000 budgets its still good for you... and my friend also purchase Gaming chairs for his. its Respawn 205 Gaming chai. respawngamingchair.net

name: Ayush
title: Many technical errors are there
content: Every Time technical errors keeps coming in this earphone, once it was not switching on, once it did not Switch off, many time it gets disconnected while using it, many problems occur with this earphone. Only the PRO with this earphone is battery backup

name: Rahul
title: Nice Bluetooth headset
content: Nice product! Overall performance is incredible for as per Bluetooth headset standards. Con is it doesn't fit in my ear, sometimes falls off. Battery backup is the biggest advantage. The Samsung level I used before doesn't even come close to this. Satisfied for the money paid.

name: Prudhvi Raj Nakka
title: Good quality product
content: The quality product at this price. You can never expect this quality under this price. No issues, thank you Amazon

name: Gokul
title: Very very very poor choice made by me for which i am regretting
content: Very baad dont trust positive reviews i also thought that i would take them by seeing those reviews but after 2 months of usage while playing pubg my earphones gets lagged for about 3-4 secs every 30 second and game also lags when earphones . Please dont buy them terrible .

name: Ravi
title: Over priced,looks cheap.
content: Charging super fast 10 min fast charging give 4 days for me.design quality poor.connection and sound quality average,bass is not there.price should around 1200.2k not worth it,go for other Brand,honest review.

name: Amulya
title: Worth for money
content: I don't know about all, for me it was so cool... I'm using daily 6 hours, charging will come up to 3 days...really worth for money.I get tensed before it buying but after I use its cool.. Request u youth can try this...

name: Deepanshu Sonparote
title: Great Piece of hardware!
content: Build quality is good, headphones are lightweight. Sound quality is great, vocals are crystal clear. The only con with these is the bass is too low, so if you prefer bass it's better to opt for something else

name: kanchan l.
title: Best Buy.
content: First I had doubts about either buying Boat Rockerz or OnePlus bullets, but luckily I got these as I'm using OnePlus 6T and it compliments the device very nicely. Best part is the battery backup and the clearness in the noise. And even you're free to roam around in your space there'll be rarely any disconnectivity.

name: Vinodh
title: Excellent, Awesome loved it...
content: It's really wonderful product. I suggest to everyone at this price it's worth just go for it. Packing awesome, delivery no other words Amazon is great. Overall it is awesome...🥰

name: SK
title: Best.
content: I am writing this after one month of using. Only i can say it's best one in the neckbands catagory. No doubt.

name: Abhishek A.
title: Best Battery life, Average Bass
content: Best battery life among all bluetooth earphones.. Can be fast charged using any fast charger (mi charger as well as power bank works for fast charging). 10 minute charge can last for 7 hour continuous at max volume. Bass not as amplified.. Mids and highs are good

name: Sonali Das
title: Oneplus is always a good choice
content: Just the way I thought it was exactly same.. Sound quality is good & battery backup is superb.

name: Abhilash
title: Think twice.
content: I bought it. After three months it got damaged. And there is no service centre in Kerala.Authorised service centre in Trivandrum first took up my repair request and after 2 hours said that they temporarily closed the service and returned it without repair. Think twice before you buying.

name: Sriram
title: Not too good but its just ok
content: Expected a lot since it is Oneplus but not up to the mark. Sound quality is ok but the bass is little weak. Not reached my expectations. Iam having problem while playing.Beginning I thought its my phone problem but its happening more when I was playing . Battery is really awesome. But overall its ok.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Fake product received
content: Fake product was delivered to me ...being a loyal customer of amazon it was not expected...product was received wherein the packaging was not proper. I have used amazon coupon code which i received as a diwali gift from my office and was really excited abt my gift ...but it was a big disappointment..

name: Chandrakant Yadav
title: Good For calling. Average Music experience
content: Good build quality, quick to connect to BT. Using it for call mostly having no issue in voice quality. Music not satisfied with Bass range although voice quality overall is Good...

name: singara velu
title: Received a DUPLICATE ONE!
content: Received a duplicate one! The 'Never Settle' logo was missing. And , the audio quality was WORSE !!! Maybe it's because the product is duplicate. Anyway , I've returned it

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good for music
content: The music quality is good. But for calls it is not that great. I have ordered for a replacement and the new one is also bad for calls. Lot of noise for all audio calls.

name: Tushar Thakur
title: Misleading Information No Quick switch button in Bass Edition🙄
content: Guys do not buy BASS Edition because there is no quick switch button as well as misleading information on website they are saying manually process is also quick switch.. Literally pathetic updates by OnePlus this time.. So if you have 2 phones do not buy this at all.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mic not working within one month
content: Just one month after buying the product, the mic has stopped working,. Useless for calls,. Mailed one plus but no response,. Called on support but all lines are busy,. Very disappointed.

name: Eswar sai
title: 🔥🔥Dekhh the real review🔥🔥
content: Somebody said that one plus bullets not having bass that much .. don't listen to that trash words .go for these .....or else if u r ultra bass lover go for boat 225pro...but it will make disappointes within 3 monthss ...if u having money ...then go for one plus ..if u want to budgeted and bass go for boat 225 or realme

name: Deep d.
title: Damage product
content: It's not work .I don't know how it's possible. Something went wrong . Though OnePlus is a branded company . How can it's possible.

name: Maddy
title: Best product in this price range
content: This is my first one plus device i am satisfied with product. Battery life is really really good. You will get 17 18 hr playback time . And you can do full charge this with in 20 min. Bass is not that much good but it's okay. Sound quality is very good. In this price range this is the best product.

name: Gautam choudhary
title: Good
content: Good product. Awesome packing and material quality is too good. Very light weight and flexibility is awesome . Sound was good noice cancellation is not available. Vacume type ear phone is very comfortable . Overall product is good in this price range product product deserve 4.5 out of 5.

name: Sandeep Singh
title: Not good product
content: Product not good, only look wise better but sound quality and bass quality poor regarding price

name: nehal
title: Stopped working
content: It stopped working without reason pliz help me i bought it one month ago n one day i woke up and try to connect my fon and it wasn't working i try to charge it still no response pliz suggest what to do..

name: Tanvi Thakur
title: DOES NOT HAVE MUTE/UNMUTE functionality
content: DOES NOT HAVE MUTE/UNMUTE function !!!. Good for listening music, does not help taking calls from a distance. You’ll have to sit next to your phone or laptop. Not truly wireless. Bought it for my office work and calls. Useless.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not happy with the product
content: Initially when I had received a product it was working perfectly. Connectivity was so smooth with one plus phone. But after a month connectivity is not good. Need to reconnect multiple times. Sometime it shows connected on mobile but voice doesn't come through in ear phones. Now frustrated bwith the product.

name: Raghav
title: Ultra max less latency and nice connectivity
content: The earphones are awesome the connectivity is very fast and very nice very less latency I didn't even feel it ignore all the negative reviews these are the best Lelo Lelo

name: Umang
title: Was good in start but now 👎
content: The sound quality is good.. Switch option from different devices is quick.. Battery life is awesome can use it easily for 2 days.. Full Charge within 30-40 mins.. But 10days after my purchase i am facing connectivity issue with my OnePlus device,it keeps disconnecting again and again .

name: jitendra puhan
title: Over all good product but it's a Chinese  brand so going to boycott Chinese product..
content: Over all a good product... I used continuosly for 2hrs to watch a video 20% battery consumed... sound clarity is best... The best bluetooth headset ever 👍.... Go for it .... Soon going to replace with non Chinese brand as it's a Chinese product..😤. But really a great product

name: allan fernandes
title: Great buy .
content: The earphones are loud but lacks in bass depth but the battery makes up for it as you can use it all day long and even if the battery runs out just need 10 mins and it's good to go for another 10 hours .Built and comfort is good too. Overall it's a worthy buy .

name: lakkireddy
title: Not worthy of 1999/-
content: Iam using this with my OnePlus 6. But not compatible. Some times getting connectivity issues and no sound some times Hanging. Average.

name: naveen
title: sound quality and noice cancellation
content: I am pretty satisfied with one plus bullets- earphones. sound clarity is good, noice cancellation is fine. bass is good. product appearance is elegant. Overall value for money. amazon delivered very fast.

name: arun
title: Product gets
content: White light not going off. Product seems stuck no option to reset. Very bad , bought in june. Stopped working by October first week. Money gone.

name: Deepan R
title: It's ok not warranty
content: What is the warranty details not updated please update.

name: ajay
title: Too good
content: Its too good product must buy it iam satisfied with this product .

name: Anant Jaiswal
title: Worst electronic product ever bought
content: Audio quality is nowhere near to xiaomi earphones of half the price. ++ Adding more update. after two days of use it has started malfunctioning while listening to music and taking calls.. Sound starts breaking after 5-10 minutes of use. Wasted 2000 completely

name: neelesh
title: Laptop connectivity issue and caller voice not up to the mark
content: I am trying to connect with my asus x54c laptop with windows 8 os So it was connected for 1 min and no music on earphones then within 1 min it's Completely Off from 100% charge .again tried same process same problem only it's works perfactly in mobile phone ... anyone solved please let me know..thanks in advance 😊

name: Poonam verma
title: Value for money
content: Sound quality is good noise cancellation is also good best quality moderate and build quality is also very nice switching is very fast one to another device overall value for money product.

title: Doesn't live upto expectation, waste of money.
content: They claim that a charge of just 10 mnts last 9 hours.All false. I used it for just 2 hours and next day when I tried to use it it was completely discharged. I tried agai, got it fully charged and used it for 2 hours only and the same outcome. Do not buy it! Waste of money!

name: Amazon Customer
title: OMG.....The sound is a blast....
content: Who the hell can make this headphone at such low price..... 500% flawless sound....Wow Battery Performance..... Why think twice...Just buy....

name: Austin Vas
title: connectivity issue
content: It has connectivity issues, every often it automatically get disconnect and get connect while watching video or while listening music. Very very disappointing.

name: Sandeep
title: Nice product
content: Wonderful packaing, gud quality of sound however it's bass is average, although wonderful product at this price, couldnt ask for more

name: Ben
title: For OnePlus users it's a good product
content: For OnePlus users use onplus equaliser it has given in Dolby settings u can set their u can adjust the base I useing more than one week it is really nice and base quality is good and for non OnePlus users u have to download equaliser and u can adjust the base 😉

name: Nishith S Shetty
title: It's worth your buck...!
content: I liked this product a lot. One plus have done a really good job with response to good sound quality... Noise cancellation is not that great but works at normal scenarios..... Bass is reduced which is a good thing as I can enjoy the other aspects as well...

name: SHUBHAM GUPTA
title: Value for money
content: Awesome bluetooth earphone sound quality improves further as driver burns. Battery life is same as claimed. Latency mode is also same as claimed. Pairing is easy. pugb playing is amazing with these earphones. Best earphone at ₹1999. Build quality is also good

name: Sabarina
title: More pros than cons
content: No bass. Will get out of ears while exercise.. Comfortable,. Quick charging. No bass. Good mic. Good connectivity. Good for calling purpose. Will get out of ears while exercise.

name: Harshita
title: Worth the buy !
content: OnePlus - I wasn't expecting such a nuce product in this price range.. Comes with awesome packing, great sound quality, battery backup and noise cancellation.. A must buy for sure :)

name: T Sakthivel
title: Sony is better choice than OP
content: My 1.5 years old sony EX155 is better than this interms of sound quality. Not crispy enough.. Moral of the buy: Stick with Sony headsets.

name: NIKHIL D
title: Useless. Could have got a better one at a cheaper price
content: Did not meet the expectations. Ear fitting too poor. Falls recurrently from ear. Every 2 min I have to adjust. Magnets are too poor in quality. Literally I have to make them touch each other then they ll hold on to each other. Noise cancellation is hardly there. Bass is also not there.

name: Yashika
title: Audio Video Lag; Audio Breakage during Online Meetings
content: With Moto G6, it was not compatible. Audio-Video were not matching. Moreover, I was not able to attend online meetings properly due to sound breakage which was definitely not because of Internet Connection. With Aux cable earphones I tried, and the meetings were working fine with them.

name: Prad
title: Good earphones
content: Top rated and top quality product. Good battery backup amd best sound quality and great noise suppression.

name: senekh
title: Worth it
content: This one for 2k is really good. You can charge if for like 10 mins and you get charge for atleast 8, 9 hours. Haven't actually tried out the 10 hours they advertised but the sound quality and the charging speed all make up for it.

name: R S
title: Extra sensitive mike
content: Mic picks up a lot of extra background noise. Between app switching is buggy. The call shifts to speaker at times. .

name: Aarav D'cruz
title: For this price range beat and comfortable product just noise cancellation is ok ok
content: Noise cancellation is ok ok other than that it’s very nice nice product in this price range. Decent base clear sound good battery backup very comfortable and flexible to use .

name: Vipin
title: Best Product , Great Value for Money
content: Excellent sound and build Quality ,only thing is it lacks that xtra punch forthose Bass Lovers , being said it excellsnin every other departments considering its price range

name: CHIRADIP
title: Average
content: Nothing special! Just like any other ordinary head phone. Don't go by the youtube review! Mids are average, bass is ok. Not for audio quality, only a bt head phone & thats it.

name: Akshay Sharma
title: No other best products like  ONEPLUS BULLETS Z
content: Compared to other products it will be like insult of this one ... premium quality , premium design , best sound quality and the major fact ..that it has the best battery life ...full charged once , no need to charge for 4-5 days .... Guys just trust the brand and buy it ..you will not be disappointed.

name: Rohan D.
title: Must buy for OnePlus users!!
content: Battery life and the clarity of sound are the two best things about it ....bass is a bit decent but not bad ...can use it for long time ...OnePlus Z Buds and Z wireless are the ones I would recommend ...

name: Harry
title: Hard disappointment
content: Product quality, color is very worst. It's looking like 100rs very cheap quality headset. Very much disappointed

name: Naresh M Gohil
title: Awesome product.
content: One of best bluetooth earphone I ever seen. Sound quality is best. If you found that the bass is little bit low than download bass booster. You will get super output. Battery life is awesome. After changing, I used my this earphone for 3 days. It takes only 20 to 30 minutes for full charge. Grab it.

name: Uday Teja Reddy
title: Very good but Not a Pro
content: Good built quality. All the background noises are very clearly transmitted. Auto connecting function is revolutionary. it does glitch but very less frequently. Battery life is exceptional. Charges 100% like in 5 minutes.

name: Sanjay Chettiyar
title: Worth it..
content: I wasn't sure about this but later my friend suggested this so thought to give a chance.. Great bass and sound quality.. Must say.

name: Ravi
title: Simply awesome
content: I'm writing this after using it for 20 days.. Simply the best in it's price range.. Bass lovers may find it low but for me it's adequate.. U can switch it easily between two devices. The magnetic buds are awesome.. Go for it if u r looking for a one with a premium feel

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average
content: I bought one month before, sound is not coming now from one side of ear phone, we have to choose is only for battery, otherwise this product is average in remaing categories

name: Raja vijay kumar
title: Awesome n worth..
content: Awesome product.. best sound quality, to switch between two phones it takes just 3 seconds, by sticking the two magnet ear buds it's gets off and activate once separated.. long battery life, I'm charging it once in 3 days.. best than other neck bands..

name: RUEBEN
title: A very good product overall, best buy if u have 2 devices. Only concern - durability
content: A wonderful product. If u have two devices, the quick switch feature is really helpful. The sound quality is pretty good for the price. Only thing I am concerned about is the durability of the product as I don't think the cables are lasting enough.

name: R. Agarwal
title: Buyers Beware - Quick Switch feature missing in One Plus BWZ - Bass edition
content: One plus BWZ - Bass edition doesn't have quick switch feature.

name: Pratik
title: No lag in ping game
content: Best earphone ... I have never seen like this earphone using in lung game. Lil lag but no issues. Lag means like. Wire earphone are not lag in ping game and this wireless earphone lag means 0.10. It's not notice

name: Abhishek
title: Go for it
content: Really good product, better bluetooth connectivity than my Realme buds air. Premium build,good sound quality in youtube and call, comfertable while wearing, quick charge, extremely good battery life. Overall really good and go for it product within <₹2000.

name: Niraj Ukunde
title: Overall nice product for daily usage
content: Overall good product.. Build quality is good. Good battery life. Good bluetooth connectivity. Good sound quality. Bass is not good as compared to oppo enco.. I would recommend oppo enco if you are music lover. Otherwise you can go with this headset

name: Faraz
title: Good value
content: If u r using oneplus phone with Dolby Atmos u can tweak the sound for higher quality and loudness and base without Dolby Atmos it is just ok product music not that great compared to wired earphones but it has great featuresblike quick charge and magnetic switch

name: Payo
title: Bummer!
content: Was expecting something similar to the OnePlus bullets but its bass quality didn't live up to the mark, plus I personally feel it's quite heavy on the neck. So I am not happy with this purchase!

name: Varun Kumar
content: You'will need equaliser for bass, otherwise it sucks horribly, best part is fast charging and long battery life. Calling is working perfectly fine. The only thing irritates me is the hard beep sound it makes while joining with bluetooth, that sound really blows my ear off. I am not sure about build quality.

name: Utkarsh Shankar
title: Bass and Charge
content: Bass is on lower side if u connect it with a laptop. It gets compensated if u use a equaliser. Great experience. Awesome charging speed. It gets enough charge in 10 minutes to last a day!!

name: Tejas suryawanshi
title: Very good for gaming
content: The product has a very good battery life it will last at least around 2 days of next day if constant usage +it charges very quickly it took about 25 minutes for full charge.sound quality is also good and if you are looking it for gaming then go for it you will not get too much delay go for it.

name: Ranjith**3937
title: OnePlus ❤️
content: One of the best Bluetooth earphone in this 2000rs budget ,very impressed ,don't think about go to buy this product guys , beautiful design ,and sound quality was awesome,then boss effects is perfect ,please buy this product is the best in the market ,then thank you for Amazon 2 days fast delivery

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best neck band
content: Basically I bought this because I want best noice cancellation over in traffic area and actually I found it good one best noice cancellation ever. And there is no competition with this neck band within a good price range best #Oneplusrocks

name: pavan
title: Decent one
content: Moderate sound quality but coming to build quality and battery i can give it a five star but for given price range i would expect better sound quality and bass

name: Ajay Manohar
title: Excellent
content: Sound is crystal clear..... Excellent battery backup..... Got a new update from OnePlus which gives Dolby Atmos support for this headset.... Quick switch function helps alot for hassle free connection between devices...

name: Naveen kumar
title: Excellent choice
content: Good quality...when watching video, remove the ear bud and connect both in the back side magnet the video voice quite from the bluetooth mode and again whne u release from magnet it will connect automatically.

name: Nidhi
title: After 2 Month of use
content: Don't buy if you use this in meeting or phone call because it don't have noise cancellation , so other guy really get pissed off if background is not silent.. For normal use it goes 2 days and after 2 month of use it take 1 hours to get full charge.

name: Rakesh
title: Super
content: I like this 👌 product. Looking nice. Gud backup. And sound quality is excellent. Bilud quality is reasonable price

name: prashant wala
title: Upto the mark of expectations of a customer.
content: 1) it's very handy & light weight. 2) sound quality - 5 stars. Noise cancellation - 3 stars. Bass quality - 3 stars. 3) quality of material - 5 stars. Cons :. Sometimes bluetooth gets disconnected without any reason.

name: Mitashree
title: Had to replace
content: Disconnection while on call, or while listening to music, having phone in hand... Have placed replacement order, let's see...

name: Shubham Shukla
title: Solid clarity
content: The headphones are light Af... sometimes I don't even remember that they are still around my neck.. Bass is good enough sound clarity is great. Noise cancelation is fine. The best thing is the battery backup and minimum to no latency.

name: surya srivastava
title: Mic not working on one plus phones
content: Mic issue on my one plus 7t. Headset is good for listening songs , pairs quickly and also quick switch is good. But mic is not working while on call or playing games. Its some software bug I guess in one plus devices but would be a deal breaker until resolved.

name: ashwin
title: Fully satisfied
content: Mind blowing headphone sound quality is upto the mark was qualities up to the mark Bluetooth range is very good overall outstanding headphone fully satisfied

name: Harsahda Patil
title: Average product
content: They are ordinary earphone like any other companies , nothing special one plus effect.. Good for taking calls and music but lacks in bass and latency issue is still a factor. I mainly use during workout and for 2k is a good deal

name: Amazon Customer
title: Robust headphones for everyday users
content: A robust and decent headset that does the job very well. It does not score high if you are into highfidelity audio. Music sound quality is decent and it truly shines as far as voice call audio quality goes.. Not to mention the usb type c fast charging is a plus too.

name: Shaik Arshad Ansari
title: Disappointed
content: Being a OnePlus fan ,After 3 months of usage right earphone stopped working,I felt latency issues with other devices when connecting

name: D Chandra Sekhar
title: Good product
content: I used for 4 days I found there is delay on call while we are talking with other person and there should be noise cancellation because other person on call can hear clearly my beside person voice clearly who are far away from me...

name: Hardik N Gada
title: Its OK.
content: Only reason why I bought them is due to the company behind this. Honestly we could get better ones. But its worth it if it's below 1.5k.

name: Dileep sen
title: Think twice before buying this..
content: After seeing so many positive reviews I bought this product but connectivity is a biggest problem if you are using in MI mobiles.. Sound quality is not much good it's average.. It's not working properly with calls..

name: NIKHIL MISHRA
title: A awesome product form oneplus.
content: I have just received this earphones, and now using it since more than 2 hours..... And the percentage of the battery is still 100%, soo I'm very glad that this contains a very good battery life....

name: Ragini Gunnam
title: Review after use
content: Battery backup is awesome. Sound quality is good. 0 noise cancellation. I have a problem with the earbuds. They are not fit into my ears. So I tried with the smaller buds but they are not fit still.

name: Annapoorani
title: Don't buy it....I gave 3 stars because 1star rating not accepted by Amazon from me
content: Product received in good condition....But OnePlus never settle logo is missing inside the box....2pair of extra buds present.....But it is mentioned as 3 in the description...... On second day my earphone stops working...so I returned...and now waiting for the replacement one....

name: Rupinder kaur
title: Amazing
content: I'm reviewing after using it couple of months,this just ten on ten...fast charging in just 10 mints as it claims,and the sound and bass quality is just awesome too... battery backup is just superb..if uh want a wireless Bluetooth headphones then please go for it blindly.

name: Kushal Goyal
title: Highly recommended
content: If you have oneplus device then go ahead. Allround performance under 2k is the USP of this product. Not just about battery but the sound quality is also impressive , balanced sound with ok bass, i personally not a bass lover i wanted an versatile sound and this product is offering that.

name: Rutik Patel
title: Good overall performance
content: The overall performance is very good but bass is on the lower side of the spectrum. Another trivial thing that could be noticed is that the led on the headset blinks on every 5th second while using it. This should probably be turned off when connected to a device as it consumes battery and reduces the battery performance.

name: parthibaan
title: Worst product ever seen
content: Worst product. Cable and extra earbuds was missing. I bought two oneplus z. Both having same issue. It was very irritated. I paid full amount but still you didn't gave me the full product. If I pay less amount means u can accept? Please don't give that kind of missing products to the customers.

name: Raghav Maheshwari
content: Superb sound quality and built.. Great value for money.. Great battery life . Mine lasted for a week with heavy usage.. Best sound signature in the price range. Apt bass and loudness.. And for those who recieved box missing tag line "never settle" the product is genuine. Which is confirmed by oneplus.

name: Himani Pant
title: Good. Music friendly. Long battery life.
content: Battery life is really good. I went a day without charging it but the next and previous button is not working for the music. It can only help in receiving the call and increasing the volume. Earbuds end up giving pain while using it for longer time. Overall it is a must buy product.

name: Ashish jadhav
title: Connecting issues
content: Headphones can only be turned on when fully charged. And the charging always shows full, never slows down and suddenly shuts down then can't be started by charging a little till the battery is full and it lasts for 1 hour.... others earphones not like that type so it is not usefull.

name: Soundarya
title: Not as Expected
content: No noise cancellation, no bass, and was defective because the output was unbalanced in one of the ears.. Blue tooth connectivity was very good, can cover up to two rooms away. after one week of usage, I didn't like it much. Sound Quality was no that good.

name: sanker
title: Good purchase
content: Overall earphone is really good.it have decent base and trebles.for base freaks i dont recommend this.battery backup is just amazing.overall product experience is good

name: Gargi Agarwal
title: Bluetooth not connecting without charge
content: Everytime when I want to connect the bluetooth it is asking for the charging even if it is 100% charged and used for 1 hour even after that it is asking to charge to connect.

name: Alok
title: Nice Headphones
content: Nice product by One Plus, quality is always superb and even sound quality, but call quality is just average in terms of noise cancellation. Overall it's a great buy for the price.

name: Dinesh kachhwaha
title: Headset not working
content: I'm really disappointed with this product. I got delivered today. As I tried charging ( get a red light) and when I try turn them on I get no response, none of the buttons reacted. Am I doing something wrong or is there a secret I don't know about? Can someone please help me or is anyone else having this issue?

name: Vikash Kumawat
title: Satisfied??
content: Sound Quality is excellent if you listen songs or something else in normal voice if you will raise the volume than you will not be able to listen the songs for lone time.. And the price should be @1799rs maximum.. But if you do want to go for OnePlus than you can buy it Definitely!

name: Gajanand
title: Worst Product
content: Worst Product, only for charging 30 minutes it will come around one day continues use, but improve noise cancellation and also in middle of the play it hangs a lot you need to pause and wait for 30 seconds, try to improve it, in middle of the play it hangs lot, fix it ASAP, that disappoints product, still waiting

name: Shilpi
title: THE BEST, THE BEAST!
content: This product is AMAZING. I'm really happy and proud of owning OnePlus devices.. These wireless earplugs are THE BEST. No lags, great sound quality, comfortable fit, and easy to connect. AND THE BATTERY LIFE. Works for 10+ hours in a single charge. It proves to be the best.

name: Phani Kumar
title: Don't Buy - Don't buy - Don't buy
content: Earphones not at all working.. Not connecting, not charging, no power-on, no never settle logo in the box.. Don't consider if logo is missing inside the box.. Time waste of ordering and waiting for delivery.

name: sivam reddy
title: Ok
content: Amazing product,. Voice quality is excellent,. Build quality good,. Product is good for this price range,,,,,,,,,. Thanks amazonnnnnnnnnn.. Base is not enough for me ,i ruturn this product for base edition,igot refund within a day ,Amazon is great in refund their money.

name: Pradosh
title: Review Of Bullets Z
content: It is very good earphones but it has a very high audio lag not suitable for Playing pubg. I used it for two days it was soo good and after that audio lag started and if it's charge is low very worst audio lag and if it high a decent audio lag is there and other wise for normal usage this earphones is beast it soooo gooood

name: Kaelen
title: Quality product in a good price...worth buying
content: Very good for this proce range...cherry in the cake is the battery life and 10 minute 10 hour charge time.. Wont regret buying it.

name: Customer
title: Crap!!  Earphone volume is low ...at full volume..its just 35%
content: The earphone volume has gone down....wasted money money on this crapy earphone... 100% volume has now gone down to. 35%.

name: Syed Abdul
title: Incomplete accessories & damaged cable received
content: Quick delivery, but received damaged product or without charge & earbuds both the Times. Hope in next order I'll not face this issue.

name: Meghdeep Mandal
title: Overall review after 1st day of use
content: Best in this price range, Bass is little bit less but good enough, noise cancelling is good and vocals are very good. And it does not feel anything when in my ear, very much comfortable.

name: ajay k.
title: Good
content: Some time it's connected to the mobile via Bluetooth but sound come through mobile, not in the ear buds, it occurs suddenly even during running. When we connect it again then voice comes in ear. It feels awkward like product is not mating it's price tag. Other wise good

name: Mimi seal
title: You can't feel the bass
content: Sound quality is good but bass level is low. Battery life is awesome. Features are unique

name: Amazon Customer
title: My one plus loss mic quality. Now it non useful
content: I purchased one plus bullets wireless z on Aug 13,2020. I like the product very well and smooth going the use, but since yesterday my mic suddenly loss sound quality and can't under stand others what I'm telling them. The product have One year warranty. Please give your valuable response to me.

name: cinita sojan
title: Poor bluetooth connectivity
content: Everytime you make a call, the bluetooth gets disconnected. Connecting to bluetooth is not so fast either, it takes time to pair up and also to get connected. Its very frustrating at times. Sometimes, the headaet stops working, it would be connected still, you wouldn't be able to hear anything.

name: Abinash Dalai
title: Good product
content: This is a very good earphone with 16 hours play time and charging time 30 minutes. It's sound quality is good and bass is also good. It connecting at a time with 2 phones, but you can't use it when charging.

name: PARTH SAHU
title: Microphone volume is very low in call
content: In call the voice volume is very low.. Its only good if you keep the microphone sticking to your mouth

name: ADITI
title: Day 1 review of product
content: Day 1. Received this product today. Already in love with it. Was fully charged. A special thing about this one is that even after long time play you don't feel that your ear hurts because of loud volume. It's a soothing and beautiful experience of music listening. Note : Does not support Oppo A57 hence had to return

name: Mukul
title: Expensive but good
content: Price on the higher side. And I couldn't figure out a manual way to switch on/off the bluetooth. Good sound quality otherwise

name: ckarthikin
title: Good Product...
content: Except one flaw everything is good, connection drop is the only issues right now i am having after two days issues, otherwise all are perfect..is there any specific reason for drop in connectivity, its only for 2 to 3 seconds but frequent drops..sound and bass quality is perfect...

name: Niju Mathew
title: Not possible to switch btw two device
content: This don't have a quick switch option. Switching btw devices happens only by going to the device settings and connecting and disconnecting.. If you are buying this to use in two device.. better not.. it's a wrong info mentioned in the product description

name: Anbu
title: Good one !
content: As usual, OnePlus rocks... Battery is amazing and connectivity is good. Except bass, it's a decent buy for 2K...

name: Udit
title: Not perfect
content: Very nice for the price but fit could have been better.

name: Shivam Mishra
title: Best Deal
content: Oneplus Bass Edition. Connectivity good. Clear sound. One problem not auto switch to other connected devices

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good one
content: Pros. You can hear the instrument sounds very clearly,. Battery backup,. Built quality,. Cons,. Low bass. Go for boat if your purpose is only for music

name: Cdr parvinder sahota
title: Go for it
content: For the price range it's the best battery life a charging capabilities is amazing sound is good again for the price its a great buy over all.. Good for calling too without the guy complaining abt why does it sound like you in a bathroom. 😝

name: Raghavendra
title: Best product
content: Very nice neckband in affordable price.Nice and clear sound.So quick connectivity.And an extremely long battery that last very long.But the only issue with the bass.Bass is not soo punchy.i think becoz of its small 9.2 mm.But that doesn't matter much.Still these are the best neckband from a trusted company.Thanks oneplus.

name: Sam
title: Worth buying
content: Superb buying 100% satisfied with the purchase some how built quality and voice is not very extra ordinary but over all it's good products with our any lagging

name: yash thacker
title: Product not working after 1st time charge.
content: Worst quality ever. I bought this product and this product not working on second day , i have charged this product and after charged product doesn't work.. Please help me

name: Nits
title: Great for Oneplus Devices..!!
content: Great for my Oneplus 7t , during PUBG the latency is quite better than my JBL BT wireless.. After the Update from Oneplus the Sound quality, Surround & Bass has drastically improved.

name: satyagopal
title: Low Bass ...Huge Battery life...Totally good
content: Sound is clear, call communication and quality is good,but we Indians love bass music which is bit low in this, but I installed an android app Equalizer+ which enhanced and all is wonderful now, BATTERY Man ...it's awesome and a big thumbsup...Overall for me...3.75/5.0

name: Amazon Customer
title: One Plus Z wireless
content: Really good product for this price .amazing voice clarity for call purpose.Super notice cancellation.voice capturing is very good for phone calls.Sound clarity,base everything is good Design also good.Only one thing that it is little difficult to identify the answer button while getting a call

name: Govind
title: Nothing less than extraordinary
content: Nothing to say regarding this product. Exactly mind blown by this one. I was deciding to a buy a true wireless, but I bought this but I have to say, in daily usage, these type of wireless are much more productive and reliable than a true wireless. Just, just go for it. Nothing to complain bout

name: Arun
title: Not worth buying for quick switch and noise cancellation feature..
content: The quick switch function is not available..tried doing it via the manual Bluetooth connectivity but could not ..also tried doing after reading the manual..still could not..the company claims that the quick switch is an USP of this product..and I bought this for this sole reason .

name: Prakash
title: Best wireless earphone in this price range
content: If u want to buy this for pubg then maybe u will be disappointed otherwise this is best wireless earphone in this price range especially its battery i used it for 15 hrs and still there is 30 %percent. So u don't have to worry about the battery. And look is very premium and buds are so comforting as well

name: Ash
title: value for money earphones
content: good quality earphones worth for the price not recommended for bass heads. can be used for daily use no issues at all . great battery back up

name: SAGAR
title: No logo
content: Oneplus is superb, but dnt no they there is no logo of never settle inside the box,

name: Binoy
title: good quality product
content: Good product from one plus. easy to use. battery charge is amazing. 10 minute charge will last long for 3 more days.

name: Adnan Shakeel
title: Bang for the buck
content: Overall good... Loudness was a Little bit on the low side... Otherwise with this price tag its the perfect choice..

name: Harsha
title: Awesome product
content: Audio is very clear but bass is a bit on the lesser side. Charges very quickly and good battery life.. This earphone is clearly a value for money (dont worry ,product is very good)

name: Amaninder Singh
title: Complex to use
content: The main problem is to make connection with earphone. Most of the time it not comes on pairable mode.. Second battery is not as they said in advertisement. also 10 mins charge = 10 hour music time is not true.. May be this has made only for OnePlus phone mine is Redmi.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pathetic product
content: The worst earbuds I have ever used. Sound quality was terrible. Mic was extremely bad quality the other party couldn’t hear properly. Even those 50Rs earphones they sell at railway stations have better mic than this.

name: Ganesh Kisan Nirgude
title: Its awesome
content: This wireless Bluetooth earphone is fabulous. Its battery 🔋 life is awesome. The bass is not that high. If you want more bass go for realme. Sound quality is clear. Very fast to connect. Flexible and comfortable no issue

name: Jaydeep Mistry
title: Disconnects automatically
content: It's alright to use with a good battery life and a balanced sound..... I face a problem with this OnePlus .. It disconnects automatically and can't connect again untill i fully resets it...... It annoys me lot.

name: Sudhanshu Vish
title: Amazing earphones by OnePlus
content: Everything was good on this one. Loved it. I don't think there's any other earphones better than this under 2k.. The sound quality is also amazing. The bass and the music are perfectly balanced (try listening Sugar & Brownies). Bluetooth range is also very good. No distortion at max volume.

name: asutosh pandey
title: Overall it's good but issue with mic, pls help me replace it.
content: Overall it's a good one at this price. However, it was delivered to me on 18th sept and now I'm facing some serious trouble with it's mic and people talking to other side face trouble hearing me. Pls assist if u ppl can as now unable to replace it. Assist me if u can.

name: Plash
title: Dont buy it. Very bad product
content: Dont ever buy this product. Only after 2 months of use there is issue in the left earplug and when i reached to one plus they denied the replacement. And on websites they claim the warranty of a year. Frauds

name: Akshay Goel
title: Steal-Deal
content: Recieved them yesterday.. Quality is good!!. Good battery backup... With Good Noise cancellation.. Easy to carry. Unbreakable. Smooth sound. Easy to connect on bluetooth and calls

name: WAJEEHA RUMANA
title: Pathetic product
content: Its so uncomfortable. My ear started hurting in just 10 minutes after using it. Its a complete disaster. Regret buying it. Also there isn't any return policy so now total waste.

name: Amazon Customer
title: 70% good 30% bad
content: The sound quality is good and also the noise cancellation is pretty good. I have 2 major problems with it. 1) sometimes it gets disconnected on its own 2) sometimes the sound is not clear, it starts to break until I reconnect

name: Ch shanmukha srinivasu patharlapalli
title: MICROPHONE NOT WORKING 4 days later
content: ONE PLUS BASS EDITION used after 4 days MICROPHONE not working,,,, luckily i replaced new one,, used after 7 days cant REPLACEMENT item..

name: Pallavi
title: A great product.
content: I absolutely loved the product. It offers an amazing sound quality with a reasonable price.. The battery life is great, bass is good and even noise cancellation. I totally recommend to buy this if you have a OnePlus phone, that will avail the best performance for this device.

name: Pramod kushwaha
title: Good Earphones not best
content: I am using this for last 1 month and found following observations:-. - sound quality is good. - bass could have been little better. Bass is not that much good as it is claimed.. - at high volume, sound penetrates the ears.. - connectivity with the devices is good.

name: Rupali Gargate
title: Good
content: Buds could have been better , it does not fit right in everyone's ears. Quality is good , charging lasts 10 hours ..

name: banty
title: AWESOME
content: NICE PRODUCT FROM ONEPLUS. BASS IS NICE AS LOTS PEOPLE ARE COMPLAINING (WONT REGRET AFTER PURCHASE). BASS IS THERE AND QUITE LOUD. BATTERY LIFE IS INSANE. OVERALL BEST EARPHONE

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst experience....spoiled in 6 months
content: Its been 6 months I have used but suddenly it stopped working....2000 rs Bluetooth atleast if worked for a year it would have been something good ...but I'm very disappointed with the product ..wish I had a exchange or covered under warranty....

name: Shivam tiwari
title: Must but if you are looking for a better battery life.
content: I bought it only because it offers a great comfort as far as battery life is concern. I am writing this review 1 month of usage and I am really satisfied with the sound quality, build quality and battery life adds an advantage to this product.😀

name: SKDas
title: Very low sound when on call
content: I have been using oneplus product since long time now. Overall sound quality is good but there is a big drawback that's very low sound intensity when on call. I barely can hear the opposite person while on call. This really broke my trust on this earphone.

name: Vignesh
title: Poor microphone quality
content: Microphone quality is very poor. The people on the other end of the call are not able to hear me properly. They were only able to hear a muffled voice.. Good for music. Utter bad for calls!

name: Himan
title: Classic Oneplus Masterpiece
content: Sound clarity and quality is 9.5/10. Lows (Bas)s is 6.5/10 but you can tweak Equalizer and get that extra thump. Highs and mids (vocals) 9.8/10. Built quality is calssic oneplus top notch. Range and other things like microphone are awesome cz come on, its oneplus guys... I would definitely recommend it

name: VAISHNAVI TYRES
title: Under 2k the best of the best : Beast @ Oneplus bulletz Bass edition
content: Sound quality was simply better than saying good 😅.. I don't prefer this earphones who use these for calling because the noise cancellation was not up to the mark (simply awful).. Bass edition has the best bass. But i had understood that this bass was not good as like iphone earphones (3.5mm)

name: Abdul Basit
title: Amazing Oneplus Bullets z Bass edition i am surprised it packs a good hard punch.
content: Amazing Sound and Bass quality i am surprised i didn’t expect such a punch for under 2k Wireless earphones. Superb build quality premium Quality.

name: Mathews V James
title: Best Bluetooth for Voice, sports and Music
content: One of the best product, i had Samsung and Boat Bluetooth but 1+ is amazing quality...value for money

name: Manikanta Sunku Veera Venkata Nagendra
title: Product not meeting expectations
content: Received the product on same day after placing order. The earphones was disconnecting in between calls. Requested for replacement. The new earphones was just getting charged but unable to switch ON or pair to phone.

name: vrushabh
title: It sucks.... Waste of 2k.
content: Pathetic !!!. 1) It's gets disconnected in between calls. Battery issues.. 2) Charges way too fast. Like it went from 30% to 100% in 5 min. And the droped to 80% suddenly.. 3) Range is also not that great. Lags during PUBG.. 4) Shutter sound during call can be heard suddenly.

name: Mak sagar
title: Perfect Wireless, Satisfying product
content: An Outstanding Product 👌❤️☮️!!. Better light weight and silicone gives premiuim feel, easy to carry, foldabe. Satisfying battery backup 17 hr as mentioned. Chargs very quickly in 30 min (type c). Quick connectivity. Everything great a perfect one wireless earphones to buy

name: vijaykanth
title: Worth for what i paid
content: Work absolutely great with iphone xr and while separate hear buds it’s quickly connected and very user friendly sound quality amazing battery life superb first time i use other than sony product for sound but it’s satisfied my acceptation simply worth for what i paid

name: Shabbir Ahmad
title: Suberb headphone👌👌
content: Sound quality is great during call and while playing song.. Bass is slightly low.. Neck band is little big around my neck.. Neck band is soft and comfortable.

name: baswanth
title: The best !!!
content: Didn’t expect this to be soo good. Love all the features, quick switch and the power saving method. Quick charging. Auto connect feature when we separate the ear phones. Great product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good
content: Works amazing...what I have noticed in last 2 days is the battery quantity...just wow.. Next is the sound..it's good.. The earbuds could have been better.. It's not that great...while running it comes out soo.. But overall it's nice.

name: Priya sri hari
title: Good product but needs some improvement
content: Sound quality great and immersive sound feels you in another travel. Noise cancellation is good but still job not completely done by OnePlus and bass quality is also better compare to my previous experience. Overall OnePlus has done good job on this product and needs some fixes.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice
content: Nice build quality.sound quality good but not that much then mivi thunderbits.bess little bit more I wish..but overall I'm happy with this product cs I'm using one plus device n it's low latency mode work just awesome..in that price segment good product.

name: IMTIYAZ ALI
title: Has few issues but overall a good product
content: Not very good with laptops. Sound gets distorted after sometime when using with laptop. It has an issue that something it gets connected with both cellphone and laptop at the same time, which can be inconvenient because when you get notification on phone laptop sound gets muted. Apart from that it's a good product.

name: cyril mathew george
title: superb.👍👍
content: amazing sound quality... ease to connect...battery life .. used it for 1 week now.. highly recommended.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Love these.
content: An absolutely lovely piece of audio tech. Performs in every way as advertised. Even the bass isn't bad and can be adjusted through an equalizer according to your preference. Beautiful pricing. Delivers more than it promises. I'm very happy with my purchase.

name: Navneet Sinha
title: Awesome product😍😍
content: I really like this earphone. Its package was also good.It's best thing is ... It takes only 10 min. For fully charged.🔋👍🏻😍. Sound quality is good and if u have equaliser setting in your music player then you can enjoy bass also.🎧🎶. I'll give 8½/10 rating.⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: Abhishek Agarwal
title: Woking fine when connected with TV
content: I am using it for around 2 months, while using with mobile i see disturbance while listening whereas when I connected with TV, it worked file.. Advantage: magnetic off, it really same battery power.. Disadvantage: I found audio volume little low .

name: Gojeta
title: Improve bass
content: Bass not that great....sound clarity is crystal clear...phone call quality satisfactory.. battery is awesome...

name: Sanil vasudevan
title: Do not buy
content: Good for phone calls.. sometimes there is connection issue during Calls.. Do not prefer this for music and movie experience. Purely CHINA product

name: Arun Kumar Maurya
title: Better than realme
content: Awsm mid. Awsm low especially treble. Descent bass works well with dolby atmos. Superb tones😊. Go for it ... I first brought realme buds wireless but it has poor trebble and not that punchy bass so i returned it and grab this one....just go for it u will not regret 😊😊

name: dr.chandan kumar
title: Loving it
content: Really loved it...it synched into my OnePlus 7 like a charm...and battery lasts upto 7 hours..it's been a couple of weeks...will get back with long term usage review...

name: Jiljith
title: Go for it!!!!
content: I think its a best catch under 2k. Connectivity is very good.. What is stunning is its Battery life.... I could listen to music more than 3 hours straight by charging it for 10 minutes with my powerbank when the battery was low.. But if you are a bass lover, it might disappoint you.

name: vishnu
title: It's ok i am not satisfied much
content: Lot of disturbance is coming while talking call to others. Some kind of noise is creating to both people who are talking in call.. Battery 🔋 backup is very good.. Sound is also clear.. Bass is not too much buy ok.. Please do something to the disturbance in call.

name: Fuad
title: PUBG Issue
content: Overall this is an amazing product for sure.. Whatsapp uses phone's mic instead of headset's mic for voice messages ( not in calls ). And same while playing PUBG Mobile. ( I don't know weather it is an headset issue or the app issue. ). Hope this review is helpful.

name: neeraj
title: Simply best
content: These are just awesome. Best i have ever used and trust me i have used alot. Bass is not that great but its good. Call quality is just great no complaints at all. Battery backup is huge. Takes 15 minutes to fully charge.

name: Sachin Howale
title: Good one
content: Voice quality is absolutely good..... Auto off n on function is too good... Easy to use... Recommendable.... One thing with which really upset is made in China!!!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best item
content: It was a very good experience to buy this as the item is very nice especially the battery back up is solid and nice built quality of the headphones so overall very nice product and Amazone Delivery is Best as usual

name: Jagadish sanapathi
title: The best sound ,quality, and comfortable.. Really nice Bluetooth earphones
content: So firstly im gonna thank Amazon for this lovely product as i changed so many earphones and bluetooths but ididnot experienced this type of sound quality and music yhe best.. Really loved it.. Go for it guys.. Its a awsome product..

name: K srinivas
title: OnePlus eartips
content: As OnePlus User i can say everything is quite excellent which i have been using OnePlus 7 and OnePlus bullets z..... But why i can't find the spare eartips for the same... Couldn't use any other eartips.... Please note this team.....

name: Ravi
title: Awesome product
content: Super quality product! Great bass, you can literally enjoy the music. Compared with other neckbands but this one is worth to purchase

name: Hardeep Singh
title: Overall nice product
content: Good battery backup. Getting backup of 15 hours. Sound quality is great. If you are buying this earphone for calling purpose then choice is good . Mic reception is good.

name: Prem Kumar
title: Full review after 1 week
content: Clear listen every instruments in music. Best for pubg for oneplus devices low latency. Bass was average. Battery was to good. Wrap charging was extraordinary. Quick connect to device. Build quality looks premium but plastic made. Type-c cabel plus point

name: One Stop Services
title: Good Product Nice Design
content: Best quality high flexibility better soud quality auto on off battery life also good buds also very comfortable eaven set every one according to your size of buds give 3 extra sizes comes nice product ....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mic malfunction within a month
content: I got this delivered on 28th June 2020. I ordered for blue but black was delivered still I was ok and was satisfied until today morning. Suddenly my mic has stopped working and during calls no one can hear me however I can hear clearlyy. Music is also working fine. Mic malfunction within a month

name: Mani k.
title: Substandard and faulty  product
content: After useage of One month the earphone stopped charging and running and I have to run from post to pillar for getting it repair or replacement ..now I am at the mercy of the service centre and after sale service is very pathetic and literally speaking no presence authorise service centre in Mjmbai

name: Vivek Pratap Singh
title: Honest Review
content: Build qualities not good. I don't know how cracked my neckband battery area. But sound quality is good and battery backup is awesome like they promised

name: ayush patil
title: Can't sacrifice music quality for battery life
content: A very important note it's noice is pretty good but the bass and lows are not at all good and it feels so incomplete for and music device and you have to sacrifice the sound quality for battery backup which is not that much important. Please improve that

name: Arvinder
title: Don't get confused.
content: First of all don't get confused that it has low bass...The sound quality is just brilliant.Crystal clear voice in music with a nice thump in bass.If someone has a problem it can be fixed by equiliser definetely.Also the calling voice is very clear.1999 INR is just worth of it.

name: Rahul Kumrawat
title: Oneplus- naam hi kaafi h
content: That is amazing product by Oneplus, sound quality is amazing and battry life is better than other brands earphones. So don't miss the chance to by this amazing product......

name: praveen
title: Good
content: Value for money...built quality and sound quality is soo good...mainly fast charging on full charge I m using it for 4days...on 10mints of charge we can use 1 full day easily but bass z some what low for base lowers....

name: Saumya Sahoo
title: Bass lovers
content: Best quality product but it’s bass is not that good but other things are good so i rated it five star and rated 1+ 4star bcoz he has to increase the bass of this headphones comparison of one plus bullet wireless z it has better bass for bass lovers it’s not at all and the loudness is great

name: Lakshmi Narayana
title: Power button not working properly
content: Power on button is not working properly, trying to connect with onplus 7 it's not connecting, even it's not showing power is on/off.. Any one can help is there any different way to connect

name: Omkar K Shet
title: Missing quick switch but great bass
content: I order this oneplus bullet z Bass edition earphones 19th oct and was delivered at 21th oct. Delivery was quiet fast.. Bass -10/10. Sound quality -9/10. Built quality-9.5/10. Connectivity- 10/10. Comfortability -9.2/10. Battery (fast charging/battery backup)-9.3/10. No quick swift button

name: Amazon Customer
title: Microphone issues
content: This product is having issue @ receiver end. If iam talking i can hear properly but other end cant receive my voice. can any one help in address this issue. iam sending to lucknow service center. as this process may delayed and day to day activities are distrubed , i may purchase new one also..

name: SOUVIK GHOSH
title: Nice and value for money product😌
content: I like the build quality of the product so much.... And I must have to mention that the sound quality of the product is awesome... I love the overall sound quality, call quality... Highs, mids and lows are very nicely maintained in this product... I fall in love with it...

name: Srivalliraju
title: Quickswitch only through bluetooth settings to 3 paired devices
content: Disappointed with the quickswitch functionality,. We have to switch to another paired device through bluetooth settings only.they've mentioned the same in website as well.but that is not the expected thing from OnePlus.decent vocals, mids and. Bass was improved really.

name: Rajiv Rathod
title: Frequently disconnection issue
content: Hi,. Actually I bought this on 14th December. It was working well, but suddenly from past 15 days it showing abnormal behaviour, Like it getting disconnected suddenly. And it happens frequently.. Could you please do needful with priority. Huge Disappointed.

name: Arif Pasha
title: Worst Noise Cancellation. No Bass.Great Battery Life.
content: The Noise cancellation is worst in these headphones. Whenever you are on a call the other person can only hear the background noise and that too very loudly. The bass quality is low. The battery is really great like really great. It easily lasts 3 days for me. The sound quality is very Good even in high volume.

name: Jay S.
title: Not comfortable in the ear
content: I love the headphone and quality under Rs. 2000 but it's not comfortable in the ear for longtime use over 1 hour.

name: Aakash Dahiya
title: Great Value!
content: Sounds great, a little less on the bass side but everything else is great!. Thank you Amazon the delivery was great!

name: Sourav Kundu
title: Awesome Experience
content: Awesome, but Never Settle logo is missing from the package. This at first made me doubtful about its authenticity. But then i searched on google and found that there had been a change in since april-may. Whatever the sound is amazing and also the build quality is excellent, feel like premium quality.

name: Pulkit Choudhary
title: Simply Amazing Sound Quality & Great Battery Backup
content: Two word "Simply Amazing"...the sound quality of these is on par with many high quality audio products that I own...the battery backup is great and functionality is 10/10. Good buy!

name: ramdora
title: Budget in premium quality.go for it.
content: Sound excellent.. Clear voice calling.. Battery life so good.. Bass good

name: Paramjeet Kaur
title: Best in quality
content: Great quality earphone. But after first charging earphone unable to pair with phone, thanks to Amazon they created replacement.

name: Aneesh NanDa😍😘🥰
title: #OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z
content: Bass Is Not Good And Product Is Awesome. If U R Not A Bass Lover U Can Buy It And Vocals And Trebles Are Awesome.. U can Buy. It Is An Awesome Product At 2k Product.

name: Venkatesh
title: Product is good but the service centre ppl didnt respond well
content: Product is good. But it broken as seen in the pic. I went to oneplus service center to replace the product...but the service center ppl told me tht the broken piece wont replace with the new one.... Plz give me the suggestion to replace the old oneplus bullets with the new one

name: Dr. Ajit Varwandkar
title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT, BEWARE
content: Within 7 days the product has stopped working. The return window is also closed.. Its a waste of money. NO value.. Not at all recommended.. Dr Ajit Varwandkar

name: Kaustav Mukherjee
title: Go for it
content: The battery life is pretty good , the overall soud quality is very good as well, the design is quite simple with comfortable earbuds.. And lastly not to mention the magnetic switch....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not for calling
content: Bought it for taking calls while driving, useless for calls while driving. Previously I was using jabra since last 3 years which if very good for calling.

name: ezra
title: Just try it...you would not regret
content: After so much of research...I am satisfied with this product... nice sound quality...bass is really good....charging we should not worry about.. excellent back up

name: Adrojavarun
title: Best product
content: Low weight high bass excellent product.. Bettry almost 2 days. Music great. Noise canceling is much improve while ride bike

name: YATIN KUMAR SINGH
title: Please dont buy them
content: Sound quality 2/10. Bass 1/10. Noise cancellation 3/10. Seriously the sound is tooo lowww. When you are in noisey location you will not be able to listen. Dont buy go for realme. Or wired are best. Not expected this. I returned them

name: Navaneeth Shetty
title: Worth for money 💵
content: Worth for the price 👌 nice backup battery life sound quality is also quite best I like the double connectivity from device to device for a double tap ,. I major thing it's charge Damm quick. Worth to invest it doesn't disappoints u 😉

name: Gopal
title: Battery capacity is awesome, quick charging which is most essential.
content: Battery capacity is awesome, quick charging which is most essential. Over all performance is good. Only missing part is quick switch.

name: Shanu Sandeep
title: Top Notch Neck Band
content: A must buy product specially for those who are holding their One Plus device's. Sound and Bass is very good, low letency works like a charm while gaming. Battery life is absolutely amazing no doubts. Build of the band is very cushioning.

name: NAGA VENKATESWARA RAO BOMMI
title: Defect product:  Battery not charging.
content: Defect product: Wireless ear phones was not charging though it was connected to power source with adapter for more than 1 hr. Defect product recieved.

name: Vats
title: Very good
content: Very good earphones , sound is crisp clear but bass is not as high as Boat but overall it good .. Once more thing we can't go in previous track just can do forward through the headphone

name: suraj kumar maity
title: Overall below 2k Excellent Product..
content: 1)In 20min full charge the earphone .. 2)After full charge approximately 15-16hr charging back up give.Now a says this is very very required point.. 3)Sound quality Ok.. 4)Noise Cancellation work excellent 👌.

name: Kiffu
title: Stopped working in 10 days.
content: It was working good for few days and now it stopped working. I see stable white light , not connecting to phone or laptop anymore. I see many people are facing similar issue with this product. I see there is no return option since it's been 10 days.. Very disappointed

name: Varsha Sharma
title: Awesome Product
content: It's been about 2 months using this product. The product is really awesome. Sound quality is very nice. I'm using it with my Nord. The connectivity is super fast. The battery backup is really awesome. Overall a nice product. If you're planning to buy this i must suggest you to go for it.

name: Sufiyan Siddiqui
title: Not met my requirements
content: Logo is missing inside the box and bass is not good as expected.. I wish one plus should design much better earphone under Rs.2000.

name: Rahul
title: Overall Product is good.
content: Good product. Not finding any cons as of now. Material, sound, bass all seems good for me. Hoping my review doesn't change in coming days.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice headphone
content: Sound quality is pretty good. Bass is average but not bad. Charging fast when using oneplus dash charger. I love its Long lasting battery.

name: sahil
title: Without battery backup it's a waste!!!
