content: One plus is not providing the sound quality at all!. It just give me the feeling of the local brands!. Buttons are also not working properly and the microphone is the worse I'm unable to talk on the call by using this earphone!. Except the battery backup it's a waste of money!. Thank you!

name: Harsh
title: Good for rigirous use
content: Using this product for online classes on regular basis from around 2 months and it feels awsome. Best thing is fast charging and battery backup with easy to use design and comfortability.

name: Sushant
title: Value for money 100%
content: Its value for the money spent.. I was previously using Airpod Pro. And trust me on Iphone even it goes hasselfree.

name: Prathamesh
title: Must buy!!!! Don't think at all
content: Fantastic.... Rich sound and feels grt... Awesome connectivity. Connects with your phone in a splash🤩. Less than 2-3 seconds... A bit heavy in ear. Bt overall very lightweight and isn't feel at all. Must buy, a bit costly bt value for money

name: Harish AHUJA
title: Don't buy one plus
content: One of the worst Bluetooth I purchased ever, unable to hear properly, and on Field it's useless coz u can hear anything ultimately u have to remove and use the phone , then what the purpose of buying this, I believe this is good only for cars, not good for biker's. Don't buy

name: Yojana Shetty
title: Original is original
content: Works amazing with One+ phone & as truly said requires only once in week charging with regular use

name: Mallu purushotham reddy
title: Best product
content: Simple review :. GAMING : 0 latency while playing pubg never expected. BASS : bass is there but not that much( no bass lovers). MUSIC : Excellent trebbles..can hear singer voice and instrument music clearly. OVERALL BEST FOR MUSIC LOVERS AND AS WELL AS GOOD OPTION FOR GAMERS TOO.. LITERALLY 0 LATENCY

name: Deep Mukherjee
title: No 1
content: One plus is the best.. battery, compatibility, performance, notice cancellation.. bass.. clearly.. I give 10/10

name: mitul roy
title: Bass
content: Who said that there is no Bass.....It's there actually...... A very good amount of bass and believe me it's better then oppo enco M31's bass mode.....

name: DEVI HARI CHARAN
title: Never expect the unexpected
content: Didn't expect this from one plus. 1)Sound quality doesn't remain stable it shifts as the video quality changes upon change in network speed. 2) if you want a long life battery ear phones with lower sound quality go for it if not just go for boat rockers 255 worth it

name: Mayuresh Roy Chowdhury
title: Premium quality headphone
content: Very premium quality headphone. Battery backup is also good. If you love the bass most then this headphone isn't for you, cause not that good with bass. Sometimes connectivity problem occurs very few times though. Rest is good. Value for money.

name: Sabyasachi Khuntia
title: Better than oppo
content: I HAVEN'T CHARGED IT FOR 14 DAYS !!!. Just go for it !. It has sufficient bass ! And for those who want more bass please buy a home theater instead .. And if you are confused between oppo and OnePlus for LDAC . Go for oppo only if you have Spotify,saavan, any music app subscription ...

name: Md Ubaid Ali
title: For the budget the best headphones
content: Its a awesome looking and perfectly working headphone....total value for money....i dint find any problems or cons so far

name: NIVEDITA
title: Product is Ok ok
content: Overall its ok. The button works for pausing video or song but doesn’t work to resume.. Also the keypad tone.. tak tak tak.. it just annoys. Though the phone setting has no keypad tone active, still with earphone it has keypad tone like hammering.

name: Yash Kumar
title: Go for it guys
content: Its a nice built product. Sound quality is 7/10. But not too much base isf u want that u should for for its bass edition. Range is 10m and really good. Is to pair and to connect

name: Rajesh D
title: The best of all bluetooth headphones.
content: The best product I have seen, I have used sony, JBL, boat and other brand headsets but this one is the best. Sound clarity and quality is excellent. Was amazed of battery backup and charging time. Best product in market.

name: Ranjitsinh Thakore
title: Worst Product with Zero Bass
content: Zero Bass....One of the worst Sound quality....I paid 2k for this useless product.... Battery drain Very fast.....Never recommended to anyone

name: Myndfreakchamling
title: Oneplus
content: If you want a great battery life and can comprise a little on bass or you don't like bass heavy sound than this is the wireless Bluetooth headset for you. It also supports fast charging.

name: Mukul Narayan
title: ONLY CONS I WISH TO MENTION.. AT PROS SIDE, ITS AT ITS BEST
content: The connection cable from headset to our ears are so thin, it may detach off if the same got accidentally pulled off while you exercise or got stuck somewhere. Only con I observed..!! ;)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice product to buy
content: Very Nice product and easy to use.. Very easily can switch from one device to other with single click.. Very fast charging as mentioned by company. And battery is also long lasting.

name: Ronak Dagli
title: Good Product. Replacement is easy upon problem.
content: Everything is good about this product. The Mike stopped working in use of month. but the OnePlus service center replace it easily.

name: MeenakshiTangdipa
title: Met my expectations
content: Thay look cool and battery life is decent. It meets my requirements. Noise cancellation is also fine. I use my haedphone during skipping rope or running and enjoy songs with my workout. Also blutooth connectivity is pretty good.

name: KS
title: Overall ok product for calling functionality
content: If you need this for continuous calling, go for it.. For music, you can look some other options. Bass quality is good but sometimes i faced disturbance in music. Hence, there is no good balance between sound quality and bass.

name: abhishek mondal
title: Good product and thnx amazon for delivery
content: In this price it's a wonderful product. One plus is known for their quality of the products. Under 2k it's the best headphone. Even in this pandemic situation delivery process of amazon is so much appreciable.

name: karthiga
title: Too good!!
content: I am using this headphone for 3months.. I am really satisfied on this product. Especially the battery capacity. The sound quality also too good ... You can go for it. Best wireless phone under 2000

name: Jeff
title: Go for it!
content: Oneplus Bullets wireless Z is the best Bluetooth product out there in this price range.. Best in battery life. Best in voice over calls. Best in durability and flexibility. Best in sound clarity within this model type and price range.

name: Rajesh Panigrahi
title: A great deal by OnePlus
content: One of the great product bu OnePlus in terms of build quality as well as sound quality. Battery life is also very good which lasts around a day with normal usage.

name: Adil Mohammed K
title: Great battery, Fast Charging, Light weight
content: The product arrived in a neat package. The Headphones look a bit premium. The battery is excellent. I ahve classes for 4-5 hrs a day, and it stays up for 3-4 days before charging. And charging using Oneplus warp charger is pretty damn good

name: rahul jain
title: Don't buy any product from amazon
content: I have seen really à worst product.within a month OnePlus z bluetooth is having connectivity issue & sound quality is become low quality . I think waste of money , when I call to Amazon , customer service is saying-we are unable to help you pls contact to OnePlus service center. This is ridiculous .

name: Mayuresh
title: Good product 👍
content: I'm almost using this earphones for 2-3 months now this are really good quality product.. Battery backup is terrific, in full charge it gives almost 3-4 days of backup.. Bass quality is good but only if your mobile got audio equilizer. But overall great product

name: Alaguraj
title: Mic issue
content: Mic quality is poor. Can be considered as a failure. Missed talking with friends family. They too suffered a lot due to this headset.. People looking for music with wirefree requirement can go ahead with this. But, if you want to answer call, this is not the product you are looking for.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Satisfied
content: I like them. They are good. Initially I had connectivity issues. Where the earphones disconnected often. There were some resolutions online for this problem. I tried that and it works great. They are good for their price and brandname.

name: SMRITI SHARAN
title: More than impressed.
content: Loved it. I was not buying one plus bullet earphones just because i am a huge music lover and this solved my problem when OnePlus launched z bass edition.

name: Manohar singh
title: Build quality is not
content: There was some problem in Bluetooth detection,. white light indication didn't appear which shows that bluetooth headset is ON, I tried many times even after full charging but it didn't work.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Overall it's a good buy
content: Overall a good wireless earphone. Not giving full 5 only because of the thin wire attached to the buds other than that in this price is a very good earphone obviously wireless earphone.

name: Ansh S.
title: This is my best Earphone ever.I just love it
content: Building materials is nice . It's sounds quality is awesome.it has many functions like noise cancellation which cancel outer noise tooo good and much more.which can't describe in words.

name: Gopendra Yadav
title: Satisfied with the product
content: The battery backup is excellent and the sound quality is above average the only issue faced is when on call the background noise come out very loud. The rest is switching between the devices is very fluent and easy

name: Srikar
title: Sound quality 👍
content: Sound quality ,bass quality is very good. Noise cancellation is not much . When you are paired to two phones, you should switch the bluetooth connection switch of headphones respectively to your phone. But switching with in 5 seconds. Dont choose this product for using of two phones at a time

name: Suresh Yadav
title: Don't Buy. Poor Bass
content: Disappointing for OnePlus fans. Poor Bass, Sound quality not up to the mark. You can feel delay of sound while playing PUBG. Overall don't buy.

name: Sagar Sathwara
title: Never settle logo missed & power button is not working
content: I ordered on 26th September & received 27th September. In my bluetooth box never settle logo missed and bass is too low quality,Today I have problems with power button. Not a satisfied with standard company products n received duplicate products bcuz in my box never settle logo missed

name: nonu
title: Disconnected many times volume is very low and voice delayed
content: This wireless sound quality is awseome but this not support in my iphone 11 and one plus 8pro they have lot’s of voice delay and disconnect many time and not supported when i play game so this is useless and not working properly this is not for me refund my money i order other company headphones

name: samir
title: Not Recommended stopped working after 27 days..
content: I am a very safe and respectful user of products... Only 27 days and now It has stopped working... It is troublesome to go for service center for such low value products..

name: Puneet Khandelwal
title: Earphones stopped working properly after 15 days of purchase
content: Earphones stopped working properly after 15 days of purchase. Heavy Noise sound started coming from the earphones which makes it unusable.

name: Dinesh Choudhary
title: Value for money product
content: Sound quality is very good sound is balanced no heavy bass but sound is good value for money product

name: Nithin
title: Overall good quality
content: Quality of the product is good in overall aspect.But not suitable for listening musics because of less bass effects.

name: Sky
title: Extraordinary product. But Google assistant is not there.
content: Best quality. I like it. But Google assistant is not there.

name: vishesh agarwal
title: Not great for calling under wfh
content: The product is good, only one complaint. The mic does not have noise cancellation, so during call the other party will hear lots of disturbance.

name: X PREDATOR
title: Good at this price segment
content: Great sound quality at this price range clear vocals and punchy bass not like bass heads but clear and decent.using it with OnePlus phones adds much taste to hese headphones you will never regret buying these

name: mahesh khaleja
title: Waste
content: Actually I've used realme buds for a year and for a change I've bought this.thats where I did a huge mistake ...it's so disappointing, especially in ear fit and call quality ..call quality is deaddd completely dead while coming to duo it's insanee waste for calls average for music

name: Paul Thomas
title: Good headphones
content: On the whole I loved the product, the only reason that I give it a 4 star is that you can't use the low latency more on all phones as it only works for one plus phones ,and if you use it on any other phone the latency is easily noticeable

name: Gnana S.
title: Disconnecting every 30 sec
content: The device is good but Bluetooth gets disconnected in 10-20 secs to my OnePlus phone. Quite irritating when you are on a call. Also noticed the sound goes low all of sudden and you may have to reconnect again. Don't suggest this to anyone

name: Deepak
title: Good sound quality, very bad Mic
content: Pros:. Battery backup. Fast charging. Sound quality. Comfort around neck. Cons:. Very bad call quality, no noise filter. So not useful to talk in crowded or noisy environment.. Consider other options if your prime factor is calling.

name: Rohit chaudhar
title: Not good for bass,auto discounted while call
content: Bass very low ,facing auto discounted while phone call every time. If their any solution for auto discounted plz upload on YouTube so I can solve problem,due to corona pandemic can't replace or visit seriveo center

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mic not working. Flat sound.
content: Average bass. sounds a little flat. I was using wired realme buds earphone before this. That has a better soundscape and better bass. This can be tweaked up with eq but didn't come upto my expectations. Also the earphone mic isn't working. Have to return item.

name: Adamya Gupta
title: Go for it. Best product under 2K.
content: I absolutely love this earphone. I am using OnePlus 5 and the sound and bass quality is pretty decent. A great product under 2k. It has latency but it's quite better compared to other bluetooth earphones I have used in the past. Overall a great product indeed.

name: Dr Binduu Raathore
title: Best in class
content: Better than JBL and Sony. Excellent battery bck up, clear nosie, magnetic lock. Sturdy nd good looking too

name: MadMax
title: Worst one plus product
content: Worst sound I ever heard after Nokia earphones, sounds just like nokia earphones, no bass, no punch, just flat speaker, only good for making calls, connectivity was good

name: Rohit Rawal
title: One of the best earphones
content: They got a superb battery life but the noise cancellation is not so good. This product is good for travellers as the battery literally last more than 20 hours on a full charge. Sound quality is great, bass lovers can skip this product.

name: Amit
title: Value for money
content: This oneplus headphones sound quality is just best in this range and about battery life is more than 20 hrs. if i will tell you my experience is i use this bulets z headphone normally for 2 to 3 days in one go charge, Seriously this is value for money product.

name: shubham
title: Beeping problem
content: If you are reading this so please take my words seriously. Once you buy this product after 1 month it will starting very annoying beeping sound and earphone will go crazy if you are not happy with my comment so please check this on google. It's waste of money please don't buy

name: Sainath
title: Good but not Great.
content: As per my usage, sound quality was good but noice cancellation is horrible. These earphones pick soo much of outside noise. The other person won't able to hear our voice when we sit inside a room with Fan ON. And even when we are outside, these earphones will pick Wind noise as well.

name: VISHNUPRIYAN
title: Mixed
content: It's really good but now I'm facing a little problem, my left earphone feels doesn't sounds the same as my right earphone 🙄 if you turn your earphone sound to maximum you can feel the difference. One side you hear the sound and the left side feels like empty

name: Sheeba E.
title: Excellent sound quality to listen to music
content: Been using this for 9 months. Excellent sound quality, specially when you listen to music. Great purchase.

name: Chethan
title: Go for it
content: • I have oneplus bullet z & bullet bass edition. • but bass edition is top notch compared to bullet z. • same specs, same price, bit change in design but I'll recommend bass edition. • bcoz wire is soft in bullet z but good quality wire is added to bass edition. Go for bass edition

name: Harish raj
title: Nice one
content: Plus. Auto on and off. Excellent battery’ backup. Elegant design. Noise cancellation. Minus. Bass lover will get disappoint

name: Jinto
title: Quality product
content: Very good sound quality. Mike is not that good, sometimes the voice is not heard properly.. It looks stylish, flash charging is a grace to us. I am happy with this prodect as I am not using it's mike.

name: Anshuman Singh
title: Worst comfort at all.
content: Not comfortable at all. After an hour my ear starting feel the pain. And I have to remove it . The 20 hour of battery is useless if I can not use it for more than 1 hour at a time.

name: Yatin Satam
title: Great earphones with bit low basss....price should have been bit low
content: Really good handy earphones...bass should have been more..but base is still there...also all other sounds are crystal clear..but price should be between 1500 to 1700 not more than that

name: Cchri
title: Awesome headset just go for it!!
content: Awesome headset. Bass and design is really good. Switching between the devices functionlaity helps a lot. Don't think too much just go for it

name: Venkatesh
title: Good one in price range
content: Music quality : 4.5. Noise cancelation : 4.5. Microphone : 4. Latency : 5. Connectivity : 4.5 "got dropped the connection while being in a call but fixed it by resetting the headset". Swich device : 5

name: Jitender
title: 20/10 performance,exquisite
content: Overall performance is beyond excellence , as it satisfies the brand equity of one plus. bass quality is a bit low which is good as it doesn't Raise the pitch of the overall sound quality, Completely satisfied, couldn't have asked for anything more

name: sagar visa
title: Pathetic product
content: It stop working after 10 days of purchasing ....it just gets disconnects or even if it's connected it won't work........ So pathetic product I would say........

name: Sanjay
title: Amazing Battery Life
content: Best option in this price range. I have been using these for over a month, and I have been charging them every alternate day even though I use them for 7-8 hours everyday. Its connection range is pretty good, I moove around in my house and it does not disconnect even once. No issues until now!

name: Shobhit tripathi
title: Very premium product with features
content: Very good premium product in this price range. The quality is very fine with the features.. Sound quality is also good but not much quality in bass.

name: Sanju
title: Miss part very disappointing
content: Miss part in box and its look like used little bit.. i think someone return that i got.. I return item let's see now what I get ..

name: vimal murali
title: 4 star rating
content: Overall product quality is good. Crystal clear sound. But bass is not upto the expectation. Jbl and sony headsets are better for bass

name: Jitin Chandrawanshi
title: Value for money
content: Good for attending calls. I am using it daily. Easy to switch connected devices. Good quality. Perfect fit. I am not a music lover so not tested bass too much, but definitely good compared to other companies products.

name: Harjot Singh
title: Easily last 2 days on a single charge.
content: Sound is crystal clear. Handling it is actually quite easy as both buds can stick together. But the reason that i purchased this is it's charging speed and its battery backup. 👌

name: Ahmedhaqib
title: Go for it green 💪
content: I like this product because it has a very good quality of plastic I will recommend everyone because it is very cheap. Obviously it has a better dynamic white fit inside ear perfectly value for money

name: Bimal Singh
title: Very Bad ,From day One Left Hand Side ear Phone Not working,
content: I have been trying from Day one , of delivery, but no one is responding , left side ear bud is not working, i am tryiong to talk to One plus service center through thier Toll free Nos and whatup chat, but unable to get through. Please help to get this replaced immeditely

name: Channakeshava V.
title: Waste
content: Waste products. I buy one plus bullet wireless 2 .price 6k but after use of one year wire sleeves came outside. I ask with service center they told physical damage. My friend Bluetooth also same problem. Simply fool the people. Waste of money to purchase if more money go ahead.

name: Shaikh shafi
title: Awesome 👍🏻
content: Guys instead buying any other earphones I'll suggest you to buy this awesome sound quality and noice cancellation.. And this edition Bass was extraordinary.. I am very much impressed with this product quality.. If you are searching for wireless earphones go for One plus.

name: Soirav choudhary
title: Buy at ur own risk
content: There are so many problems, coz.. It is a beta version... Buy at yours own risk.... "The warrenty in not for india " And i dont know how to time will it take to drane battery maybe 1-2 weeks, headphones automatically comes in standby mode and without dranage battry it won't work

name: Shashwat Kumar
title: connectivity
content: its a very nice product but the only demerit in it is that if i connect it to my laptop and after using it, i have again to switch it off and then connect it to phone, but if i have connected to mobile, then another time when i have to connect to it then it connects within a second.

name: Ajay Ingle
title: Worth of its cost.
content: I am a huge fan of sony and jbl bt this time i tried oneplus , and results are quite good , sound quality i give 4.3 /5 cause its clearity is nice bt for bass i give 3.8/5 its can be improved, for this value noice cancelatin and design is worth so basically it is worth of its cost .

name: Joel James
title: Loved it!!
content: An awesome product! Those who were saying that bass is less in it just try increasing bass from the phone equaliser especially if you have OnePlus phone then you will love the bass after increasing the bass from the equaliser! I'm just in love with it❤️

name: Prasad Krishnamurti
title: Once a fan, always a fan
content: I bought this for my father and guess what, he loved it!! I am a fan of OnePlus products, and they never fail to satisfy our needs!

name: KRR
title: Awesome product
content: Sound quality is good and nose cancellation os ok and a good bass.. Overall good product for the price tag.

name: Raghu Kuber
title: Missing "Never settle" inside box. Returned the product.
content: I bought this oneplus wireless z earphones. When I unbox it I couldn't find "never settle" print inside the box. And many others faced same problem. People's bought from oneplus official website have same issue and there is no reply from oneplus community. So have doubt on this product original or duplicate. Returned this.

name: Hk
title: Value for money 💯
content: Pros:. Good Batterylife. Fast charging (very fast). Nice sound especially vocals n base. Cons :. Pairing (even with a one plus phone) is awful. No Policy for refund if u don't like this product. No spare ear tips

name: Binosh Eldho Baby
title: Within 5 months this thing became useless because of the mic's issue
content: I like this product's battery backup & audio output quality. Packing was nice. But when comes to the mic. Its really getting worst. Not much catchy. The person from the other side can't even hear properly. So the product will be useless as soon

name: sanket d.
title: degrading from Sennheiser to oneplus.....
content: previously I used to listen with my Sennheiser cx275.... this op earphone feels like I'm degrading my sound quality as well as comfort.. 1) sound - good. 2) bass - adequate. 3) eartip - paining after some hrs of usage

name: Narendra
title: Value for money
content: Product is very nice .. have good sound quality. But bass quality is not satisfying.. over all nice product .. And I got instant replacement in 2 days after I complain about the product stop working in between ..this part is very impressive that I received new one .. 👍

name: Anil kumar
title: It oftenly disconnected with the phone.
content: It works great ..but in some times it automatically disconnected itself and didn't connected further with the phone..i am using OnePlus 8 pro..but sometimes it didn't connect with OnePlus debide too..then it has to be hard reset and the phone has to be..so i returned it

name: SAGAR
title: The product is overall good
content: Hello,. The pro regarding this is, it comes with high battery backup, dis-connectivity provided by magnets are awesome and noise cancellation is good, cons regarding this, it is with low bass compared to wired headphones.. Overall headphones are very nice.

name: Sahil hussain
title: Would neber recommend others to buy this
content: Such a third quality rubber has been used that it reacts with ur skin and magnet is very tight it can tear the wire, there r many other better headphones in the market which is less then this price and much durable. I feel. That I have been cheated by oneplus by this 😩

name: Pabitra Sasmal
title: The perfect value for money. Worth it.
content: This is the perfect wireless headphone.. Bass -4.5/5. Noise cancellation -4.8/5. Sound quality -5/5. It gives a balancing sound out put.. Vocal is very much clear.. It gives the music instrumental location... Battery back up -super..it will give 18-19hrs of playing.

name: Nagendra Bathala
title: Just Ok
content: Compare to H freelace Just Ok, Since I'm using last 2 months back Huawei free lace it's great sound, bass and charging.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Within 15 days ear phone stopped working
content: My earphone stopped working in 15 days time period. I am religious follower of one plus brand with phone but never faced such issue in quality. One ear plug is echoing while another one is working okay. Highly disappointed with this time purchase.

name: Mayura Priya
title: Worth buying
content: Everything is super , worth buying , don’t regret, I m very much happy , thank you Amazon

name: nilesh deshmukh
title: Must buy. Amazing product.
content: Amazing product. Get charged in 20 minutes. You can use for 10 hours of songs, call etc. The best wireless earphone at affordable price.

name: Ganapathy
title: One plus = best as always
content: Sound quality very good. Bass very good. Overall fantastic product for a great price. 11/10 would recommend this

name: Ravi Teja
title: Bad base quality and no noise cancellation
content: I didn't like in ear feel of one plus bullet wireless z.. Pros: long battery life. Cons: low base. Feel of neck band is cheap. Noise cancellation is not good. Expensive compared to peers. Not reached my expectations. Completely dissatisfied with the product.

name: Abhi
title: What i experience i wrote
content: Superbbb sound quality..... Mids, highs,vocals are excellent....we can listen minimals sounds but bass is there but extrass bass is lacking.. overall very goood product.... We can wear easily more than 5 hours ... No irritations in ear.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good battery life
content: Indeed the battery works for 20 hours and quickly recharged. Sound quality is very nice. What else you expect from a headphone.

name: Vivekanand
title: Pathetic earphones
content: This product is a branded version of low quality chinese product. Sound is pathetic while listening music, the quality degrades further on a call. High chances of getting a headache after long call with this earphone.. Only plus point is battery backup.

name: Biswajit sahoo
title: Average..not upto mark for price
content: Utterly disappointed..the sound is not even half of what boat have.. Bass isn't there .. regretting my decision for buying it . don't know why people are dying over this hype..

name: simi t
title: Overall good
content: Excellent battery capacity. Even the smallest earbud doesnt fit into my ear.Magnetic strength low

name: RAMESH H.
title: worst product supplied
content: worst product. i m facing problem in this with in 6 months. no return facilities available now even though the product has 1 manufacturers warranty. i think they have supplied the old stock.

name: Naveen
title: Perfect pair for oneplus phones
content: Liked the way it has been designed. Best fit for my ears. Connectivity is so far so good and pairing is quick with my 8T.

name: Piyush Sethia
title: Mic stopped working
content: Mic stopped working within 3 months, so cannot use it to take calls.. now it's just an ear phone, so can only listen to music etc. Expected one plus product to last longer, do disappointed

name: mayank pareek
title: Magnet doesn't work
content: Very bad product because I use it around 2-3 months now magnet doesn't work. So please change this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Appario Retail is selling duplicates.
content: Volume buttons and quick pair buttons stopped working in two days.. No never settle logo in box. Seems like duplicate product.. Sound quality sounds like 500rs earphones.. No base.. Its my second time that Appario Retail has sent me duplicate product.

name: Monali goswami
title: Best in this price 👌
content: Bass is not good , it could be. But in this price range this Z is better than anyone else in the market.. go for it, battery life is awesome, using it around 3hours still 100% of battery remains.. Easy to use it no on off button is present so u just need to attached magnetic earbuds together to stop Playing.

name: Anisha
title: Pathetic

Good sound quality specially for OnePlus mobile users.. Good fit in the ear

name: vijayakumar

name: Amazon Customer

name: Yatin
title: Poor Quality Product

name: Atharva bhatkande

name: Sahil Kumar

name: Mandeep
content: Best quality in best price

name: Amazon Customer

When i search about the solution i found many of them are facing the same problem..... So it's not a unique problem... It's happening with everyone after 6-9 months of use.

name: prakher srivastava

name: Christine Fuhrmann
title: Good but...
content: Very good product. Good sound quality and it charges very quickly. Only downside is that they keep falling out of my ears. It's ok for watching a movie but wouldn't work for exercise or running.

name: Maitreya
title: I don't know what is wrong.
content: It was working alright for for months but then one ear piece stopped Worthing. It looks alright, never fell down or anything unwanted happened. Just went useless. Sad. It still looks new....🙄😷

name: Ajit
content: it's awesome. nice sound quality, but if u are using multiple devices, pairing becomes some what difficult . if u are using a single device, this is best. i bought it for 1799/- during the sale

name: Soumen M.
title: Stopped working in 3 months!
content: It stopped working completely after three months of the purchase date. It stopped suddenly while I was on call. After that, the LED indicator never glows. I try to charge it but, no light shows.

name: Siddhartha Sarkar
title: Too expensive at 1999 but its good
content: Too expensive at 1999 but its good. Had the price been lower I would have loved them even more.

name: Dinesh Pareek
title: As a Gift from my wife.
content: Sound -> Awesome.. Bass -> Good.. Battery-> Tremendous.. Build quality and connectivity -> Perfect.. It is my first ever OnePlus product and i am very happy.

name: MUHAMMAD HATHIM WAJIDH
title: EXCELLENT BATTERY
content: Best bluetooth earphones for 2000 rupees. Good audio quality. Decent bass. Excellent battery life. But not suitable for gaming like pubg. Having 100 to 200ms of latency (sound delay) with non oneplus devices.

name: Madhukar Monu
title: Oneplus gives you feeling of two plus 😊😊😊
content: Thanks oneplus for a wonderful product...good product in this range and battery backup is great. Once you buy i am sure you will fall in love with this fabulous earphones. Go for it without any worries

name: SCR
title: Just okay earphones
content: Feels like sound is trapped inside ear very annoying.. Battery backup and charging is good.

name: Arvinz
title: Value for money
content: Good sound, not of amazing quality. Switching between two devices is not that easy.

name: sai
title: Good product
content: Good product value for money easy to use and the sound quality is good best product

name: Puki lona
title: Bye
content: Its a huge waste of money, pls pls don't buy.worst quality product. in my first time charging battery it did not last for an hour and after that it's never gets charged. No electronics from amazone. Bad experience.

name: Ajinkya
title: Quality product.
content: Pros: Sturdy, good finish, light-weight, snug fit. Cons: sound quality could have been better especially lows. Need some more bass boost.. Would definitely recommend over all other headsets upto 3000 range.

name: Emmanuvel paul
title: Good one to buy in budget
content: Sound quality 5/5. Noise cancellation 5/5. Bass quality is good but can be increased by setting in phone equalizer. If doing so the earphones are the best ones to hear. You would love it.. Overall 4.5/5

name: Mohammed Kazim
title: Very good headset
content: Awesome headset good sound clarity, though the bass is not the best, but really fast charging and best battery life, best for calls and has low latency.

name: Ravi teja Podilli
title: It's a good peace
content: I well liked it because I used it for hearing music it's good in bass and sound quality.but when ringing phone the ringtone is not coming on its coming beap sound when the phone rings I did not like it

name: Yatish Shinde
title: Duplicate item rec'd
content: I had ordered, but it seems that a duplicate product was rec'd as the branding of 'Never Settle' was missing in the box. Also the bass was disturbing in most of the song @30-40 volume. Hince, opted for Oppo neckband

name: zeeshan
title: noise on call
content: the other side kept complaining of noise during call also it become very irritating to use it for a long time battry backup is awesome

name: Ajay k.
title: Comparison
content: I buyed last week. Best for watching Hollywood movies. Good feel on ear. Low weight no hard feel on neck. Good magnets. Good connectivity. Realme vs OnePlus z. Realme 4/5. One plus 4.7/5

name: JAYESH
title: Nice Good Quality earphones. Worth Buying
content: I liked these earphones. These are good in sound and battery life is also good. It is very useful for daily usage calling

name: PK
title: Worth buy....(Review after 15days use)
content: Although not calculated battery backup properly, but it has good battery backup and thats not a matter of concern

name: kiran AMARA
title: Awesome
content: Amazing...I was looking at buying 10k headphones...but luckily I tried one plus ..sound is awesome.
